Yi yu boèñboñ ená beèe wááwá a lá mncir ce vi yu nje múè bguèu. Tá mmbañruè a ba mini neè wap bbyeèñge tá bbyeèñge a ba mini neè wap mmbañruè. Nyúè be keè sa' beèe ce a ce koo bduu beèe mo', keèr sa' beèe ce a ce koo bbyeèñge beèe mo'.	Let marriage be held in honor among all, and let the bed be undefiled: but God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterers.
Woweèe a yu aèmboè ma rdip rgoèr ce li ke bañti, mdip mi ce ko' mbekïì ce gweè naè. Yaèp buu bbebep yu aèmboè mghaa ce rdip li fúr mbe waa ñkúè wa'a. Woweèe a yu aèmboè mkaèñsïì ce mi ke táá mbe dïû' mo'sir ka' naè. Nyúè aè kupshi dïì' mo' neè woweèe; faè dïì' anaè ku ba ba túè'nji, aè ba dïì' ce woweèe a be cu nfeseè.	wild waves of the sea, foaming out their own shame; wandering stars, for whom the blackness of darkness has been reserved forever.
ená e gee rfaè' ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès ce Judaès aè m ce faè', a ka' ma'shi a du faèdïì' ce e ba duè.”	"to take part in this ministry and apostleship from which Judas fell away, that he might go to his own place."""
Weèr aè m laèa ba buu ce vi fa weèe ñger keèr geèe tá wee mntee vi ce fúte. Weèr aè m cep weèe ená weèe gee ba ñgeèe ce Nyúâ koèñ. Ku ba ye ce e ká' weèe tá weèe bo ye rboèñ ba foèo efa yi kúú.	to the end that you should walk worthily of God, who calls you into his own Kingdom and glory.
“Ñgaèa ca yu ená, ñgúè buu yu nlaâa Nyúè.	Now the parable is this: The seed is the word of God.
AÈmboè yi yu wa'a, seèe aè ka' lor blaèa ce vi yu aèmboè rluèñ ce li vúè ese Nyúè na aètáèr, seèe gee seeká ka' fúú efa ñgá'. Tata Jisoès aè m káè' a suñ beèe blaèa ca, beèe ce a m yu' blaèa ca ese ye a geèe seèe aè riñ ená blaèa anaè vi yu mini.	how will we escape if we neglect so great a salvation--which at the first having been spoken through the Lord, was confirmed to us by those who heard;
Pitaè aè laa enáê, “Máè rïìñ neè mini-ñwáè ená Nyúè e ke loèr ñwáè moè' jáá ka'.	"Peter opened his mouth and said, ""Truly I perceive that God doesn't show favoritism;"
Yi ka' tá ba wa' ka' baná weèe aè m duè aè ryá ká? Weèe aè m duè aè ryá ñwáè ce e suèsi nyor neè bcáè' yoèo, a? Yi yu wa' ka'. Beèe ce a ke suèsi nyor neè bcáâ' yoèo, a ke cu ba aè mnto'.	But what did you go out to see? A man in soft clothing? Behold, those who wear soft clothing are in king's houses.
E cu à mbèp ce Ndì tɛɛ nà.	There he is on the side where Ndi is standing.
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' beèe ca a kani efa rrïìñ Nyúè aèmboè yaèp Nyúè, Nyúè aè ma'shïì woweèe a ce kwaè'shi ba mkwaè'shïû mmbembep tá woweèe a bo geèe buu ce vi yu yáánïì ka' na.	Even as they refused to have God in their knowledge, God gave them up to a reprobate mind, to do those things which are not fitting;
Jisoès aè laa enáê, “Ñwáè moè' aè joèo máè, njobeè' máè yu' aèmboè ñger yi fúú máè enje nyoèr.”	"But Jesus said, ""Someone did touch me, for I perceived that power has gone out of me."""
Ndap Siyuès aè m ba aègee rla'. Ñwáè tañshi tañshïì neè nyúè anaè aè vú neè naè' ba fúèlawaè njep cuâu ñka' njobeè' ye ker ba yïì beèe a m ce koèñ aè rtañshi tañshïì neè ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès.	The priest of Jupiter, whose temple was in front of their city, brought oxen and garlands to the gates, and would have made a sacrifice along with the multitudes.
Woweèe a m loèr yaèp nfeè' a yu' ryá'nïì ce ñgaâa ntuu Jisos Kraâis a m ce yá'ni, a ce vúè aèbee cá'cá', a ce ye wap byee ker ba byee Nyúè aèbee, a ker ce geèe mloo.	They continued steadfastly in the apostles' teaching and fellowship, in the breaking of bread, and prayer.
Beèe ce a m ce keè'ni rsheè a wáp, a kañ seê, a ba aèmboè bgúâú beèe wa'a.	For fear of him, the guards shook, and became like dead men.
Máâ geèe wa' wáá, laa neè yaè nyor enáê, Wáè túr ku' buu bboèñboñ ce aè be ye aè bfeè' aèñgoo seê. Loèr ñgoèñ aètáèr, yeñger, noñger, yu' rboèñ neè yoè nyor.’	"I will tell my soul, ""Soul, you have many goods laid up for many years. Take your ease, eat, drink, be merry.""'"
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Bkúú beèe enje jáá a ke sa' yap beèe neè ñger- ñwáè, beèe a ce too ñgaâa rsa' anaè ená ñgaâa rjaè'.	"He said to them, ""The kings of the nations lord it over them, and those who have authority over them are called 'benefactors.'"
Seèe riñ ená a ke ce tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì efa múè beèe tá e bo táá aètu beèe kuèntombïì neè Nyúè, koo buu ce beèe a fa neè Nyúè, keèr tañshi btañshïì aètu yaèp buu bbebep.	For every high priest, being taken from among men, is appointed for men in things pertaining to God, that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins.
Keèr kwa'shi neè aèmboè ma keñ enjep rdip rgoèr. Fu' tatap yi ka' ce doèo ce duè aègho aè jáá, ñwáè rdoèo ku beesi ba mú co' mo' embe keñ anaè, e du aè njïì ce ñwáè rdoèo ce koèñ.	Behold, the ships also, though they are so big and are driven by fierce winds, are yet guided by a very small rudder, wherever the pilot desires.
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba mbe ndap rloo anaè ce yú' bebep yi m ba njep ye. Yú' ana yi m waa, a laa enáê,	Immediately there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit, and he cried out,
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè byemi njobeè' wáè yá máè. Bghoènïì vi yu neè beèe ce a yá ka', a ku byemi.”	"Jesus said to him, ""Because you have seen me, you have believed. Blessed are those who have not seen, and have believed."""
E toshimbì nè mɛ̀.	He is a bit elder than me.
ntáè' Ashaè, ntáè' Naptaleè, ntáè' Maènasïìs,	of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand, of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand, of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand,
Yi ku ba aèmboè nyor e ke ba moè'sir, mñgúè' nyor vi ku ba jáá jáèá jáá naè. Mñgúè' nyor ca vi ke tarshi nyor aèbee, gee nyor moè'sir. Jisos Kraâis ku ba wa' foñ.	For as the body is one, and has many members, and all the members of the body, being many, are one body; so also is Christ.
E ka' ye, Sataèn aè niñ njep yeâ ntee. Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Fa caèasi nfeè' ka', geèe yuu ce aè ce koèñ aè rgeèe naè cárcár.”	"After the piece of bread, then Satan entered into him. Then Jesus said to him, ""What you do, do quickly."""
À be vʉ̀ à nǒŋ fɛ?	Which day are you going to come?
Mɛ̌ kwàʼ enɛ e be fʉ vʉ̀ àyàŋsè .	.
Mrùʼ mi ker ba kaʼ njobèʼ mi cetê.	There is no wine because it has stopped flowing.
Ñwáè a ka' gee moè' efa boo bká' ce a byemi neè máè na a gee yuu bebep, baná yi be ba aèndeèe neè ñgaèñ, ce a ka' lor ma luâr ñgoè' baa, cúú ye kuè ndoñ, ma' ye njep rdip rgoèr, tá e no mdip kwe.	but whoever causes one of these little ones who believe in me to stumble, it would be better for him that a huge millstone should be hung around his neck, and that he should be sunk in the depths of the sea.
Byú' ca vi vúè neè bkúú ca aèbee aè dïì' ce a too aè li Jus ená AÈmaègádoèn.	He gathered them together into the place which is called in Hebrew, Megiddo.
Máè yu' aèmboè njeèndoñ aè laèa embe kaèbaèraè' enáê, “Beèe wááwá ce a yu ñgaâa mfaè' neè Nyúè, a ce wáp Nyúè foñ naè, a yoñshi yïìseèe Nyúè. Káè yu beâe bgoèrgoèr áè, káè yu beâe bká'ká' áè, yoèñshi neè Nyúè.”	"A voice came forth from the throne, saying, ""Give praise to our God, all you his servants, you who fear him, the small and the great!"""
Yuu ce yaè Ta koèñ yi yu ená ñwáè ce e ka' yá muu yïì, byemi neè ye, baná ñgaèñ be koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè. Be ba aè noèñ elúèsimbuèu, m gee tá ñgaèñ fúú efa rkwe.”	"This is the will of the one who sent me, that everyone who sees the Son, and believes in him, should have eternal life; and I will raise him up at the last day."""
Nsaʼ à bʉ à cicì njobèʼ woowèe a m̀ gèe fàa bsìp.	They have lost the case because they all did wrong.
E du a yá ñwáè embenjïì ñwáâ nlee, a laa yuu ce e ba laa neè ñwáâ nlee naè neè ye. E beesïì a laa enáê, ‘M be duè.’ A ka' laèa wa'a, a du ka'.	He came to the second, and said the same thing. He answered, 'I go, sir,' but he didn't go.
Mɛ̀ tuu muu enɛ e du cete kèŋ.	I have sent the child to close the door.
Tantò yu ŋwɛ̀ jaja.	Tanto is a person who is ignorant of witchcraft.
E naŋsi ndap ce e m boo nà bòŋboŋ sê.	He did very careful work on the house that he built.
Baná weèe lor nfeè' faè dïì' weèe lo kani efa ryu' blaèa ce ñwáè ce e ce laèa neè weèe naè aè m ce feè'shi naè ka'. Beèe eluâuñgoèñ ce a m kani efa ryu' blaèa ce ñwáè ce a m ba njep ñgoèñ na aè m ce feè'shi, a m luèñ efa ñgá' ka'. AÈmboè woweèe a m luèñ efa ñgá' ka', baná aède' seèe ce seèe aè yu' blaâa ñwáè ce e suèu embe buèu, seèe luñ efa ñgá' aè njáâá ká, ce seèe aè ka' kani efa ryu' blaèa anaè.	See that you don't refuse him who speaks. For if they didn't escape when they refused him who warned on the Earth, how much more will we not escape who turn away from him who warns from heaven,
Jisòs à m̀ fʉʉ efa rkwe a du mbe bùu.	Jesus resurrected and went to heaven.
Mɛ̀ cìr yaa bo à ŋkaʼ zhi koʼ.	I have hit my hand against the fence and it has swollen.
Joân aè ka' ce mïìsi li rfaè', a laa enáê, ‘Weèe ce kwaè'shi ená a máè ñwáè anaè a? A máè ye ka'. Ñwáè moè' ce vúè embe máâ njïì, aè ba ñwáè ce máè ghááte aè rbaè'shi vi blaba' ka'.’	As John was fulfilling his course, he said, 'What do you suppose that I am? I am not he. But behold, one comes after me the sandals of whose feet I am not worthy to untie.'
Ñwáè aè ka' bipshi neè weèe enáê, ‘Weèe ce fyáèá jaèaki' anaè njoká?’ weèe suñ ye enáê, ‘Tata ce taè' geèe yuu aègho ka' kúsi.” ’	"If anyone asks you, 'Why are you untying it?' say to him: 'The Lord needs it.'"""
Ñwáè moè' yu ce e láè mncir wááwá tá Nyúè bo laèa ená ñgaèñ yu ñwáâ nyáánïì ka'. Yuu ce mncir vi geèe yi yu ená vi geèe beèe a riñ buu bbebep.	Because by the works of the law, no flesh will be justified in his sight. For through the law comes the knowledge of sin.
a laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè niñ aè mndap beèe ce a geèe búè ka', a yeñger weèe woweèe njoká?”	"saying, ""You went in to uncircumcised men, and ate with them!"""
E naa yi bo a duñshi ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu aègho, a laa enáê, “Yáê, a yaè ma ba bfúr wa na.	"He stretched out his hand towards his disciples, and said, ""Behold, my mother and my brothers!"
Njáèá bfee ca vi vúè ese Nyúè ka'; yu ba bfee enjep ñgoèñ, aè ba bfee ñwáè ce vi vúè ba ese Sataèn.	This wisdom is not that which comes down from above, but is earthly, sensual, and demonic.
Tantoʼ à m jar nè ŋgwa e caŋ.	Tanto maltreated his wife and she ran away.
Woweèe a m laèa neè weèe ená be ba aè mnoèñ elúèsimbuèu tá beèe a ba ce a be vúèshi weèe. Beèe anaè a be yu'ni neè Nyúè ka', ce geèe ba yuu ce a koèñ aè rgeèe.	"They said to you that ""In the last time there will be mockers, walking after their own ungodly lusts."""
Buu moè' ce weèe ce laèa vi yu bfi neè weèr, weèr aè ce koèñ aè rrïìñ vi.”	"For you bring certain strange things to our ears. We want to know therefore what these things mean."""
Ñwáâ nsoèñ ca aè laa neè Felep enáê, “Suñ laè máè, ñwáè ce ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè anaè ce laèa du kuu ye yu nda? E ce laèa ba aèmboè yïì nyor káè aèmboè ñwáè moè' lá?”	"The eunuch answered Philip, ""Who is the prophet talking about? About himself, or about someone else?"""
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, ‘Gú'shi neè Tata ce e yu yoè Nyúè, fa' ba neè ye caè'caè'.’ ”	"Jesus answered him, ""Get behind me Satan! For it is written, 'You shall worship the Lord your God, and you shall serve him only.'"""
E be kuè cu mbe buèu caar baè' aè nfeè' ce Nyúè be geèe tá buu wááwá kúti bfi aèmboè e m laèa njïì enjep yi ñgaâa ntuu eluâuñgoèñ ce aè m ba beâe brara naè.	whom heaven must receive until the times of restoration of all things, which God spoke long ago by the mouth of his holy prophets.
Hároèd aè ka' kwe, Josáèf aè yá ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè rlo aè to' Ijïìp.	But when Herod was dead, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt, saying,
Saimún Pitaè aè beesïì enáê, “A wáè Kraâis anaè ce e yu Muu Nyúè ce e yu nteèe.”	"Simon Peter answered, ""You are the Christ, the Son of the living God."""
E loo enáê, “Yaè taê, aède' aè gee buu wááwá. Geèe tá ndoñ ñgá' ca caa embe máâ tuè. Geewa'a, ke' ba ená aè gee ba aèmboè m ce koèñ ka', geèe ba aèmboè wáè koèñ.”	"He said, ""Abba, Father, all things are possible to you. Please remove this cup from me. However, not what I desire, but what you desire."""
Beèe mo' efa woweèe a daè' njïì wáá, a du ba aèmbuèu Sataèn.	For already some have turned aside after Satan.
Mɛ̌ kòŋ à rcu fa wàp mʉ̀ kaʼ.	I donʼt like to stay among them.
Beèe anaè a beesïì enáê, “Weèr be túúshi wáè neè bluèr njobeè' buu bboèñboñ ce wáè geèe ka'. Weèr be túúshi wáè neè bluèr njobeè' wáè bepsi rlii Nyúè. AÈ ku ba ba ñwáè, a ce laèa wáná aè yu Nyúè.”	"The Jews answered him, ""We don't stone you for a good work, but for blasphemy: because you, being a man, make yourself God."""
A m kupshi buu mo' bbaa aèmboè bcïìndap Nyúè wa'a, ce vi m ce duèñshi foèo Nyúè, a tooshi mbenduè ñkuèp anaè aè rduèñshi ená Nyúè yu mbe dïì' anaè. Vi m táá aè bgeñ ñkuèp, a búr bbaèp vi tarteè a tá'shi ñkuèp ce Nyúè e ke foèosi buu bbebep beèe mbo. AÈde' weèr suñ weèe buu ca wááwá seè'ni ka'.	and above it cherubim of glory overshadowing the mercy seat, of which things we can't speak now in detail.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèe fa ce lu'shi ená mnyúâmkaè' vi yu'ni neè weèe ka', weèe lu'shi ba njobeè' a sañ me mlii mbe buèu.”	"Nevertheless, don't rejoice in this, that the spirits are subject to you, but rejoice that your names are written in heaven."""
Jisoès aè laa enáê, “Caè'si neè luèr anaè.” Maataè ce e m ba njar ñkúsheè ñwáè naè, aè laa neè ye enáê, “Tataê, e be rúèú seê, njobeè' yu mnoèñ kyeèe seè'ni aèmboè a mú tuñ ye.”	"Jesus said, ""Take away the stone."" Martha, the sister of him who was dead, said to him, ""Lord, by this time there is a stench, for he has been dead four days."""
njobeè' Jus magoèr a m maè'shi woweèe a byemïì neè Jisoès njo' ye.	because on account of him many of the Jews went away and believed in Jesus.
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a bipshïì neè ye ená ñgaèa ca yu ba ená ká lá?	"Then his disciples asked him, ""What does this parable mean?"""
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Fa wáp neè ka', a máè.”	"But he said to them, ""It is I. Don't be afraid."""
Ñwáè ce e ka' ce geèe njáèá ñgeèe ca ka' baná ñgaèñ yu aèmboè ñwáè ce e feèp wa'a, a ce yá buu ce vi yu aè njïìsaèp ka', a lese yi yu ená Nyúè aè suè'si ye efa faèa ce e m geèe.	For he who lacks these things is blind, seeing only what is near, having forgotten the cleansing from his old sins.
E ka' kúti, a yá aèmboè ñgaâa yá'nïì yïì buu a ce buumi. E laa neè Pitaè enáê, “Saimúèn, aè ce buumi a? AÈde' aè ke' ke'seè mú teèteè ka' a?	"He came and found them sleeping, and said to Peter, ""Simon, are you sleeping? Couldn't you watch one hour?"
Woweèe a bu' cuèu aè cicïì, a ce boèose beèe ce a ce gheèter aè rfúú efa múè beèe ce a ce geèe yuu mini ka', a ce laèa ená woweèe a gee ba yuu ce yaèp nyor koèñ.	For, uttering great swelling words of emptiness, they entice in the lusts of the flesh, by licentiousness, those who are indeed escaping from those who live in error;
Woweèe a m laèa enáê, “Wáâ Nyúè ce ñger wááwá yi yu mba wáâ mmboè, wáè m ba, a ba seè'ni na. Weèr ce yoèñshi wáè njobeè' wáè loèr ku' yo ñger anaè a ká' a ce sa' ñgoèñ aègho.	"saying: ""We give you thanks, Lord God, the Almighty, the one who is and who was; because you have taken your great power, and reigned."
Jisoès aè beesïì nyor a fyá' ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a laa neè Pitaè enáê, “Loè efa máâ geñ, Sataèn! Mo mkwaè'shïì yu ba mïû ñwáè, yu mïû Nyúè ka'.”	"But he, turning around, and seeing his disciples, rebuked Peter, and said, ""Get behind me, Satan! For you have in mind not the things of God, but the things of men."""
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè Nyúè, e duèñshi seèe ená e koèñ seèe seê, njobeè' aè m ba aè nfeè' ce seèe aè m ku bii ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep naè, Kraâis aè kwe a seâe btuè.	But God commends his own love toward us, in that while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe be no enjep ndoñ ce m be no enjo ghup. Ka' yi yu wa'a, máè túr ñger aè rlaèa ená ñwáè cu a máâ bo maè' káè a máâ bo ñkoèp ka'. Bdïì' anaè vi yu ba neè beèe ce yaè Ta aè m kupshi a lá neè woweèe.”	"He said to them, ""You will indeed drink my cup, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with, but to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it is for whom it has been prepared by my Father."""
Woowèe a sìi ye nè baa enɛ e zhe, e kanì.	They have forced him with food that he should eat and he has refused.
Ka' cu ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè nyáêá, rraa li raa mbe múè shañ; e lipshïì Pitaè neè bo aè gee nyor, a yáá ye efa mmirloè a laa enáê, “Naèti mbekïì cárcár.” Bkwaèñ caè vi m gweèñger efa yeâ mkoo.	"And behold, an angel of the Lord stood by him, and a light shone in the cell. He struck Peter on the side, and woke him up, saying, ""Stand up quickly!"" His chains fell off from his hands."
Woweèe a m ce koèñ aè rduè ba aè rla' ce li boèñ a caa faèdïì' ce woweèe a m ce cu. Rla' anaè yu lïì embe buèu. Baná woweèe a ka' too Nyúè ená yaèp Nyúè, rïìtu yi ke' koo Nyúè neè woweèe ka'. Seèe rïìñ wa'a njobeè' Nyúè aè kupshi rla' a lá neè woweèe.	But now they desire a better country, that is, a heavenly one. Therefore God is not ashamed of them, to be called their God, for he has prepared a city for them.
E ke koosimnse neè beèe ce a ce wáp ye ká' embe ñgúè beèe moè' du ba' mbe moè'.	His mercy is for generations of generations on those who fear him.
Blaèa aèmboè Tata ce vi loè ese weèe vi ku ba' ba aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè ba aè ñgoâñ AÈkayaè ka', beâe aè bto' wááwá a yu' aèmboè le rbyemïì ce weèe túr neè Nyúè. Yi ka' ba wa'a, yuu mo' ce aède' weèr ker suñ beèe aèmboè weèe yi yu ka'.	For from you the word of the Lord has been declared, not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith toward God has gone out; so that we need not to say anything.
M ce loo máná Taèr Nyúè ba Tata Jisos Kraâis a túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, ker fa weèe cumúnyañ.	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “M be geèe tá bfee ñgaâa bfee vi bú aè cicïì. M be geèe tá beèe ce a feese, a jep.”	"For it is written, ""I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, I will bring the discernment of the discerning to nothing."""
“Weèe yu mgwañ enjep ñgoèñ na. Ka' yi yu wa'a, mgwañ mi ka' cir, aède' a gee eká mi ka' ker leêe? Mi be keèr ba yuu ñgeèe yuu ka', tá a cu' tá beèe a ce caèa ce nyáèñshi neè mkuèu.	"You are the salt of the earth, but if the salt has lost its flavor, with what will it be salted? It is then good for nothing, but to be cast out and trodden under the feet of men.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	14	Weèe yu rraa enjep ñgoèñ na. A ka' ba'ri rla' mbe rtuèu, aède' beèe a buu efa ryá li ka'.	You are the light of the world. A city located on a hill can't be hidden.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	15	Yi yu foñ ená aède' ñwáè cú' laêm, lor ghee kúpshi aègho ka'. Ñwáè aè ka' cú' laêm, baná e be tár ba mbe tábuèr tá ndap bo raa neè beèe wááwá ce a yu mbe ndaèp.	Neither do you light a lamp, and put it under a measuring basket, but on a stand; and it shines to all who are in the house.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	16	Baná wee weèe ma'shi tá le rraa li raa aè bsii beèe, tá woweèe a bo yá me mfaâ' mmboèñmboñ, kuè'si yeè Ta ce e yu mbe buèu.	Even so, let your light shine before men; that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father who is in heaven.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	17	“Weèe fa ce kwaè'shi ená máè vúè aè rsiñsi mncir ker ba yuu ce ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m laèa ka'. Máè vúè aè rsiñsïì ka'. Máè vúè ba aè rgeèe tá buu embe mñwaè' anaè vi bo ghááte njo.	Don't think that I came to destroy the law or the prophets. I didn't come to destroy, but to fulfill."
Seèe rïìñ wáá ená Joshuèwaè aè m loèr viseèe btarkú a du aègho aè to' Kánaèn. To' Kánaèn anaè aè m ba ba dïû' rlúèshïì anaè, Nyúè aè m ba ker laa aèmboè nfeè' rlúèshïì ce e bii ka' ba ka'.	For if Joshua had given them rest, he would not have spoken afterward of another day.
Yɛ ma ce ca.	See this big tree.
Bwap bvi yû?	You have shown us a bed.
Ke' ba ená m ce laèa njobeè' yuu mo' yi buu máè ka'; máè lááte aè rcu, mú yïì ce máè túr yi ghááteè máè.	Not that I speak in respect to lack, for I have learned in whatever state I am, to be content in it.
Muu ñwáè be kuè duè aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè naè. Ka' yi yu wa'a, ndoèo be co' ñwáè ce e be fyeèni ye. Yi yu aèndeèe neè ñwáè anaè ená a m ba bi ye ka'.”	"The Son of Man goes, even as it is written of him, but woe to that man through whom the Son of Man is betrayed! It would be better for that man if he had not been born."""
Baná weèe aè rïìñ, a byemi yuu ce weêe bta a m geèe. Woweèe a m yúshi ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, weèe aè ce boo ye ba msheè.	So you testify and consent to the works of your fathers. For they killed them, and you build their tombs.
Woweèe a laa enáê, “Mboè ntee yi ba ce luèu soè se aè nfeè' ce e ba ce laèa neè soè aè nduunjïì, a ce naèshi yuu ce Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa naè a?”	"They said one to another, ""Weren't our hearts burning within us, while he spoke to us along the way, and while he opened the Scriptures to us?"""
M ce yoèñshi Nyúè njobeè' m ce laèa bli ce máè m be yá'ni ka', a caa weèe wááwá.	I thank my God, I speak with other languages more than you all.
Bkar waê, seèe yu boo Nyúè seè'ni. Yuu ce seèe be keè ba yi be yááti neè seèe ka'. Geewa'a seèe yi ená be keè ba aè nfeè' ce e vúè tá seèe feese ye njobeè' seèe be keè yá ye aèmboè e yu.	Beloved, now we are children of God, and it is not yet revealed what we will be. But we know that, when he is revealed, we will be like him; for we will see him just as he is.
Ka' e m ce koèñ aè ryú Joân wa'a, geewa'a njïì yi buêu, njobeè' beèe anaè a m byemi ená Joân yu ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè.	When he would have put him to death, he feared the multitude, because they counted him as a prophet.
Jus a m ce roèo ye aè ñkaè' anaè, a ce bipshi enáê, “Ñwáè anaè yu fá?”	"The Jews therefore sought him at the feast, and said, ""Where is he?"""
Woowèe a rìŋ à rbii bii gòr njobè woowèe a m lòr ba àtʉʼ.	They know how to dance very well because they acquired it mysteriously.
Woweèe a ka' yá ye ka', a kúti aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè rroèo ye.	When they didn't find him, they returned to Jerusalem, looking for him.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a vúê, a yá ye, a bipshi enáê, “Ñwáè ce e yu ñwáâ ñgoèr seê mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè yu nda?”	"In that hour the disciples came to Jesus, saying, ""Who then is greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven?"""
Ñwáè anaè e ke geèe ñgeâe bebep neè beèe ka', e ke weti ka', e ke cápñger ka', e ke láè yuu bebep njep ntee ka'.	doesn't behave itself inappropriately, doesn't seek its own way, is not provoked, takes no account of evil;
Pitaè aè laa enáê, “Beèe ca wááwá a ka' ma' wáè, m ma' wáè ka'.”	"But Peter answered him, ""Even if all will be made to stumble because of you, I will never be made to stumble."""
Pol ba Baènabaès a ka' ce fúú embe ndaèp rloo, beèe anaè a bu' mmbo neè woweèe ená woweèe a ker vú aè mmbomntaa Nyúè ekoâ ker suñ woweèe buu anaè.	So when the Jews went out of the synagogue, the Gentiles begged that these words might be preached to them the next Sabbath.
Wɛ̀ càaca ntìni gòr.	You have been moving up and down today too much.
Sol aè m ku bii ce wápsi beèe ce a m ce duè aèmbuèu Tata Jisoès ená e be yúshi woweèe. E m duè a yá tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì,	But Saul, still breathing threats and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord, went to the high priest,
Ñwáè ce e ka' ba yïìseèe ñwáè bbaèa ka', baná e yu yïìseèe ñwáè.	For whoever is not against us is on our side.
Yi m ku ba aè nfeè' yïì Lot wa' foñ. Beèe a m ce ye buu, a ce no buu, a ce yuu buu, a ce fyeèni buu, a ce byeè buu, a ce baè'ri mndap.	Likewise, even as it happened in the days of Lot: they ate, they drank, they bought, they sold, they planted, they built;
Máè yu' aèmboè njeèndoñ moè' aè suèu embe buèu a laa enáê, “Fúú neè efa múè rla' anaè yaè beèe. Fúú neè faè dïì' weèe rla' ca weèe lo cú' mmbo tá wee weèe foñ lo geèe buu bbebep ka'. Fúú neè faè dïì' wee weèe foñ lo yá ñgá' ce a be fa neè rla' anaè ka'.	"I heard another voice from heaven, saying, ""Come out of her, my people, that you have no participation in her sins, and that you don't receive of her plagues,"
Woweèe a ye a yu', a baashi bbábá' ce vi m báti, vi ruu aè mñkaèa saèambaê.	They ate, and were filled. They took up seven baskets of broken pieces that were left over.
M ce sañ cena neè weèe du kuu beèe ce a ce roèo aè rbo' weèe.	These things I have written to you concerning those who would lead you astray.
Njeñwáè moè' aè m ba aèfo ce e m cu mbe kuèu aè bfeè' ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú, ñwáè mcáèp moè' aè ke' ba ce aède' e m ba kupshi ye e ke'se ka'.	A woman who had a flow of blood for twelve years, who had spent all her living on physicians, and could not be healed by any,
AÈde' ñwáè moè' ker boo kuèundap mo' jáá caa efa yïì ce a boo war ce yu Jisos Kraâis na ka'.	For no one can lay any other foundation than that which has been laid, which is Jesus Christ.
“Ñkúú Agripaè, máè yá máná máè koni rboâñtu ntïìni na aè rtáá a wáâ bsii laèa yuu kuu buu wááwá ce Jus a laèa kuu máè.	"I think myself happy, King Agrippa, that I am to make my defense before you this day concerning all the things that I am accused by the Jews,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	3	Yi yu wa' ghup njobeè' wáè rïìñ ndeèe to' Jus ker ba buu ce woweèe a ke sár mnsár aètu mo, baná m ce bu' mmbo neè wáè ená aè kur ntee yu'shi yuu ce m be laèa.	especially because you are expert in all customs and questions which are among the Jews. Therefore I beg you to hear me patiently.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	4	Jus wááwá a rïìñ njáèá ñwáè ce máè m ba, ká' embe nfeè' máè m ba ghaèrñwáè a ce cu a máâ to' ker ba aè nfeè' ce máè m ce cu aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm.	Indeed, all the Jews know my way of life from my youth up, which was from the beginning among my own nation and at Jerusalem;"
Weèr ce loo neè Nyúè neètú' ba neèmootïì ená e fa weèr fáñ tá weèr vúê, tá seèe yáni, tá weèr yá'ni weèe buu moè' ce weèe aè be riñ ka' naè, tá le rbyemïì li bo ruusi.	night and day praying exceedingly that we may see your face, and may perfect that which is lacking in your faith?
À kaʼ ce no mrùʼ, à no àndèe.	If you are drinking wine, drink within limits.
E m yu' aèmboè Pol ce laèa. Pol aè ke' ye a yá ená e túr njáèá rbyemïì ce aède' li gee ye e jáêr.	He was listening to Paul speaking, who, fastening eyes on him, and seeing that he had faith to be made whole,
Yi ka' ba wa'a, yïì beèe ce a m ce duè a yeâ mbuèu a lor ye neètú', a lá njep ma ñkaèa moè', a torsi njïû aè wenduè ñka', a suusi njep nsheè.	but his disciples took him by night, and let him down through the wall, lowering him in a basket.
Tɛɛ m̀ vʉ̂.	Hold on I am coming.
Waè' beèe wááwá a yu ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a? Waè' beèe wááwá a yu ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a? Waè' beèe wááwá a yu ñgaâa ryá'nïì a? Waè' beèe wááwá a yu ñgaâa rgeèe buu bghagha' a?	Are all apostles? Are all prophets? Are all teachers? Are all miracle workers?
Btu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ca a m ce tañshi aè mnoèñ wááwá. Woweèe a m ce káè' be tañshi aètu yaèp buu bbebep wáá, ka' tañshi aètu buu bbebep beèe. Jisoès aè m tañshi tañshïì yi ba aè njáâá wa' ka'. E m tañshi yi nfeè' moè'sir yi ku mi wa'a. E m tañshi tañshïì anaè ba aè nfeè' ce e m fa yïì nyor, a kwe a seâe btuè naè.	who doesn't need, like those high priests, to offer up sacrifices daily, first for his own sins, and then for the sins of the people. For he did this once for all, when he offered up himself.
E ka' joèo cáè' Jisoès, yañ ca yi ku borni, e ku yu' nje yeâ nyoèr ená e keè'se.	Immediately the flow of her blood was dried up, and she felt in her body that she was healed of her affliction.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' moè' beèe a ce cáp weèe aèwañ a ker ce fa weèe ñgá'. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' moè' weèe aè ba aè múè beèe moè' ce a m ce yá njáèá ñgá' ca foñ.	partly, being exposed to both reproaches and oppressions; and partly, becoming partakers with those who were treated so.
Muunje ca à ghɛɛ ce e ba dù bgùu.	This girl is mature enough to get married.
Jisoès aè duè a niñ mbe dïû' rara anaè entombïì neè seèe a táá mbo a seâe btuè, a ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì nfeseè aèmboè Máèlkisidáèk aè m ba naè.	where as a forerunner Jesus entered for us, having become a high priest forever after the order of Melchizedek.
E ka' niñ mbe ndaèp, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu aè ku ba Jisoès a woweèe, woweèe a bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Weèr aè ba moo a rfúr yú' anaè enjep ye laèr njoká?”	"When he had come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, ""Why couldn't we cast it out?"""
Ñwáè aè ka' yá'ni yïì nyor aè rgeèe mcáâr, mú sá' ku ba njo. Geewa'a, ñwáè aè ka' yá'ni yïì nyor aè rkwaè'shi ba aèmboè buu Nyúè, sá' ba njo aè buu wááwá njobeè' njáèá mkwaè'shïì ca mi kaè'ni seèe rcu rboèñboñ seè'ni na, ker ba rcu rboèñboñ aè nfeè' ce e bii ka' ba.	For bodily exercise has some value, but godliness has value in all things, having the promise of the life which is now, and of that which is to come.
AÈmboè seèe yu yi seèe beèe ce seèe ce cu ba aè rraa, baná seèe tami nyor. Seèe tá'shi viseèe mnyor aèmboè bsoogáè a ke tá'shi wap mnyor aè ñkúè bïìr naè. Seèe lá viseèe mntee njep Nyúè, ker koñ ye foñ tá cena yi bo ba aèmboè kañ ce seèe aè tá'shi viseèe mñguèñ aègho. Yi yu foñ ená aèmboè seèe cu a ce keè' nfeè' ce Nyúè be jaè' seèe, cena yi yu neè seèe aèmboè rtaa bco' ce seèe aè soèp mbe tuè tá li bo tá'shi tu wa'a.	But let us, since we belong to the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love, and, for a helmet, the hope of salvation.
E laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Weèe ce wáp ba ká wa'a? Weèe aè be túr rbyemïì ka' a?”	"He said to them, ""Why are you so afraid? How is it that you have no faith?"""
Nyúè aè m bepsi ñgoèñ eluâuñgoèñ ba neè mdip aè nfeè' ce mi m ruu a cete ñgoèñ dúèdúè naè.	by which means the world that then was, being overflowed with water, perished.
Mú nfeè' moè' aè ka' tuuse, beèe mo' efa múè beèe Farïìsi ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a loâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, a vú a yá Jisoès, a bipshi neè ye enáê,	Then Pharisees and scribes came to Jesus from Jerusalem, saying,
Buu wááwá aè m loè ese Nyúè, buu anaè wááwá aè ba aègho njo' ye, buu wááwá aè ba yïì buu. Tá beèe a ku'si ye nfeè' sïìp! Yi yu wa'a.	For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things. To him be the glory for ever! Amen.
To máè m ku ce yá'ni weèe mbe Ndaèp Nyúè aè mnoèñ wááwá. Weèe aè ke' koo máè mbo ka'. Geewa'a, tá yuu ce Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa yi ghááte njo.”	"I was daily with you in the temple teaching, and you didn't arrest me. But this is so that the Scriptures might be fulfilled."""
Rbyemïì li m geèe beèe Isráèl a jár a kaari to' Jáèrikuè aè noèñ aè noèñ, mnoèñ vi ka' ba saèambaê, ñka' aè to' anaè yi káátïì.	By faith, the walls of Jericho fell down, after they had been encircled for seven days.
Geèe neè le rfaè' neè ntee boèñboñ. Weèe fa geèe aèmboè weèe ku ce faè' ba neè ñwáè wa' ka', weèe gee li ba neè Tata Jisos Kraêis.	with good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men;
a laa enáê, ‘Koèniyuès, Nyúè aè yu' lo rloo a yá ená aè yu mmbo mtoo, a ce kuushi wáè.	and said, 'Cornelius, your prayer is heard, and your gifts to the needy are remembered in the sight of God.
Nzhɛ̀ɛ à bapni a zhɛɛ mbàa.	The thief has gone secretly and stolen money.
Woweèe a ka' baè' nje w a roè, fúú embe keñ, a yá mor, a yá bráâd, a yá nca njep mor anaè.	So when they got out on the land, they saw a fire of coals there, and fish laid on it, and bread.
E kòŋ ŋgwa zhì sê.	He loves his wife very much.
Yi yu mini ená Jisos Kraâis aè m fúú efa rkwe. Efa múè beèe ce a m kweñger, a ye ce e m káè' a fúú efa rkwe.	But now Christ has been raised from the dead. He became the first fruits of those who are asleep.
E laa enáê, ‘Nyúè yïì viseèe btarkú aè ce wáè tá aè bo rïìñ yuu ce e ce koèñ ená aè geêe, keèr yá yïì Ñwáè Rfaâ' Nyáánïì, yu' aèmboè e ce laèa,	He said, 'The God of our fathers has appointed you to know his will, and to see the Righteous One, and to hear a voice from his mouth.
Ñwáè anaè aè beesïì a laa enáê, “Koèñ Tata ce e yu yoè Nyúè neè yo ntee-ñwáè, ba neè lo ryoèñ-ñwáè, ba neè yo ñger wááwá, ba neè wo bfee wááwá, ker koñ nfúroè aèmboè wáè koèñ yoè nyor.”	"He answered, ""You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, with all your strength, and with all your mind; and your neighbor as yourself."""
AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na ce weèe aè luèñ efa buu bbebep a ba bkwaèa neè Nyúè na, sá' efa gho yu ená weèe yu beèe Nyúè ce weèe yu brara, loè koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè.	But now, being made free from sin, and having become servants of God, you have your fruit of sanctification, and the result of eternal life.
M ce suñ weèe máná be keè ba aè noèñ anaè tá ñgá' yïì beâe aè rla' Sodoèm ba aèndeèe neè ñgá' yïì beâe aè rla' anaè.	I tell you, it will be more tolerable in that day for Sodom than for that city.
Yuʼ zhi bàŋri.	The banana has become a little ripe.
Ncïìndap Nyúè anaè aè koo mor embe dïì' ce a ke fa rfa, a lá njep rkïìñ anaè a ma' njep ñgoèñ. E ka' maè', mbeèñ aè rúúñgeèr, a bapñger, a wañger, nshe aè ci'tïì.	The angel took the censer, and he filled it with the fire of the altar, and threw it on the earth. There followed thunders, sounds, lightnings, and an earthquake.
Mncir Nyúè vi ce laèa enáê, “Fa koo ñgwa ñwáè moè' káè nduu ñwáè moè' ka', fa yú ka', fa yáèá ka', fa gani ka'.” Mncir ca wááwá ker ba mncir mo' vi táá ba mbenduè ncir e mo'sir. Ncir anaè yi yu enáê, “Koèñ nfúroè aèmboè wáè koèñ yoè nyor.”	"For the commandments, ""You shall not commit adultery,"" ""You shall not murder,"" ""You shall not steal,"" ""You shall not give false testimony,"" ""You shall not covet,"" and whatever other commandments there are, are all summed up in this saying, namely, ""You shall love your neighbor as yourself."""
Beèe ce a koèñ aè rkuè' aè buu a lo gwe rmoèoshïì, kwe aè taa. Taa ce woweèe a loè kwe aègho na, yu ba buu ce woweèe a koèñ neè blúr-ñwáè, ñgá' aè ba njo. Buu ce woweèe a koèñ neè blúr-ñwáè na yu buu ce vi ke suèusi beèe njep nsheè, bepsi woweèe dúèdúè.	But those who are determined to be rich fall into a temptation and a snare and many foolish and harmful lusts, such as drown men in ruin and destruction.
E beesïì neè woweèe ená, “Yaè ma a nda? Bfúr wa aè ba weèe ká?”	"He answered them, ""Who are my mother and my brothers?"""
Woweèe a ka' yá ye neèñguu túè, a laa neè ye enáê, “Rabaèi, wáè vúè aèfa aè se'ká?”	"When they found him on the other side of the sea, they asked him, ""Rabbi, when did you come here?"""
Woweèe a geèe yuu ce AÈsayaè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m laèa naè yi ghááteè njo. E m laèa enáê, ‘Beèe ca a be ce yu', ce rïìñ yuu ce woweèe a ce yu' anaè ka'. Woweèe a be ce yá, ce rïìñ yuu ce a ce yá anaè ka',	In them the prophecy of Isaiah is fulfilled, which says, 'By hearing you will hear, and will in no way understand; Seeing you will see, and will in no way perceive:
Nyúè be laè' beèe ce a ce geèe buu bbebep aè buu bbebep anaè. E ke so'niñgoèñ ka'.	But he who does wrong will receive again for the wrong that he has done, and there is no partiality.
“Weèe fa sa' beèe mo' ka', tá a bo sa' weèe ka',	"Don't judge, so that you won't be judged.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	2	njobeè' njáèá njïì ce weèe ce sa' beèe mo' ku ba njáèá njïì ce a be keèe sa' weèe. Njáèá njïì ce weèe aè geèe yuu neè beèe mo' ku ba njáèá njïì ce a be geèe neè weèe foñ.	For with whatever judgment you judge, you will be judged; and with whatever measure you measure, it will be measured to you.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	3	Wáè maè'shi ntaañguu nje rlïìr njep wáè, a ce fyá' ba ñkúè' ce ce yi yu nfúroè nje rlïìr njoká?	Why do you see the speck that is in your brother's eye, but don't consider the beam that is in your own eye?
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	4	AÈde' aè laa neè nfúroè enáê, ‘Naèa rlir tá m koo wáè ñkúè' ce enjo,’ ce ntaañguu yu wáè nje rlïìr, aè njáâá ká?	Or how will you tell your brother, 'Let me remove the speck from your eye;' and behold, the beam is in your own eye?
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	5	Wáè ce aè yu ñwáè mbo'ni, fúr ntaañguu ce e yu nje rlïìr nje wáè wáá, tá aè bo yá ñkúè' ce ce yi yu nje rlïìr nje nfúroè boèñboñ, ka' fúr.	You hypocrite! First remove the beam out of your own eye, and then you can see clearly to remove the speck out of your brother's eye.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	6	Fa fa yuu ce yi yu rara aè bsii Nyúè neè ñgwe ka'. Fa maè' yo yuu boèñboñ se neè ñkuânyaèm ka'. Wáè ka' ma' neè ñkuânyaèm baná ñkuânyaèm yi be nyáèñshi neè mkuèu, beèeñger koo wáè, ceeshi aè btete aè btete.	Don't give that which is holy to the dogs, neither throw your pearls before the pigs, lest perhaps they trample them under their feet, and turn and tear you to pieces."
Wáè teèe tu, a kani efa rkupseè, baná aè ce keè' seè'ni ba rshentee Nyúè ce li be keè yááti aèwañ aè noèñ ce e be keè sa' beèe wááwá aè njïû yáánïì naè.	But according to your hardness and unrepentant heart you are treasuring up for yourself wrath in the day of wrath, revelation, and of the righteous judgment of God;
Nyúè ce e yu yïìseèe Taê, ker ba Tata Jisos Kraêis, túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, ker fa weèe cumúnyañ.	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Wèr à dù a koo ŋgwagùu nè yer bo.	We went and too the bride ourselves.
AÈmboè seèe táá njep mini ba rkoèñnïì Nyúè, m ce loo máná Nyúè Taèr, ba Jisos Kraâis ce e yu Muu Taèr ghoni seèe, koosimnse neè seèe, ker fa seèe cumúnyañ.	Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
E m loè embo, a du a niñ mbe yaèp ndap rloo.	He departed there, and went into their synagogue.
Ca yi m ba wa'a, tá yuu ce AÈsayaè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m laèa yi bo ghááte njo. E m laèa enáê, “E m koo viseèe bsáè, a ker byá' viseèe byañ.”	"that it might be fulfilled which was spoken through Isaiah the prophet, saying: ""He took our infirmities, and bore our diseases."""
Káè ñwáè aè geèe búè áè, káè ñwáè aè geèe búè ka' áè, yïì anaè yi túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe ka'. Yuu ce yi yu goèr yi yu ba ená ñwáè lá mncir Nyúè.	Circumcision is nothing, and uncircumcision is nothing, but the keeping of the commandments of God.
Njeŋwè ce e tɛɛ kùna na feese njar yàa.	That woman standing over there resembles my sister.
Máè yá máná yi yu boèñboñ ená m tuu nfúr yïìseèe ce ÁÈpafroèditoès tá e kúti vúè yá weèe. E yu ñwáè ce weèr ye ce faè' aèbee, a ce maè' bïìr Nyúè aèbee. E yu foñ ñwáè ntuu ce weèe aè m tuu ená e vú ja' máè.	But I counted it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, fellow worker, fellow soldier, and your apostle and servant of my need;
M ce fa ñgá' neè yaè nyor, a gee e kútïì aè ñkwaèa faè dïì' m ce feè'shi neè beèe moè', loè gweè, bá blaè' ka'.	but I beat my body and bring it into submission, lest by any means, after I have preached to others, I myself should be rejected.
Musïìs aè m laèa enáê, ‘Yu'ni neè yoè ta ba yoè maê.’ A ker laa enáê, ‘Ñwáè ce e ka' cáp yïì ta káè yïì ma áè, baná a be yú ñgaèñ.’	For Moses said, 'Honor your father and your mother;' and, 'He who speaks evil of father or mother, let him be put to death.'
E ka' laèa neè woweèe wa'a, a cu yi yu aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê.	Having said these things to them, he stayed in Galilee.
A m taa Jisoès mbe kïìntaa aè nyúè búè'ú aè ñgaèptú'.	It was the third hour, and they crucified him.
Yi yu ená faèdïì' ce yeè buu yu, a faèdïì' ce ye ntee yi yu foñ.	For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
Yáê, nfúroâ ÁÈlisabáèt aè koo rbúè aè nfeè' ce e yu nleeñwáè seê. Ñwáè ce a m ce too ená kar yu neè rbúè seè'ni aè mñwáá ntuunfu.	Behold, Elizabeth, your relative, also has conceived a son in her old age; and this is the sixth month with her who was called barren.
Ñwáè ce e baèa nfúr yïì yu aè túè'nji, a ce jáèr aè túè'nji, a ke' yi faèdïì' e ce duè ka', njobeè' túè'nji aè beèesi ye aè nfeèp.	But he who hates his brother is in the darkness, and walks in the darkness, and doesn't know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
Pol aè kar nyo ca efa boè, e gwe njep mor, yuu mo' yi gee ye ka'.	However he shook off the creature into the fire, and wasn't harmed.
“Weèe rïìñ weená ku báti mnoâñ bbaa tá a ye ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap. A be koo Muu Ñwáè fa neè beèe tá a taa mbe kïìntaa.”	You know that after two days the Passover is coming, and the Son of Man will be delivered up to be crucified.
Ñwáè ce e yu ñwáâ ñgoèr yu ba nda? Yu ba ñwáè ce e ye byee káè yu ba ñwáè ce e ce caèasi byee neè ye aè? Mboè yu ñwáè ce e ce ye byee a? M yu ya fa weâe mú aèmboè ñwáè rfaè'.	For who is greater, one who sits at the table, or one who serves? Isn't it he who sits at the table? But I am in the midst of you as one who serves.
Mboè weèe aè be be' foñ mbe ñwaè' mncir ená ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì embe Ndaèp Nyúè a ke bú' ncir mmbomntaa Nyúè ke' ba faèa neè woweèe ka' a?	Or have you not read in the law, that on the Sabbath day, the priests in the temple profane the Sabbath, and are guiltless?
Mnoèñ vi ka' caâa btaar woweèe a yá ye mbe Ndaèp Nyúè aèmboè e cu mbe múè ñgaâa ryá'nïì, a ce yu'shi buu ce woweèe a m ce yá'ni, a ce bipshi buu neè woweèe.	It happened after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the teachers, both listening to them, and asking them questions.
Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, ba beèe Farïìsïî. Weèe yu ñgaâa mbo'ni njobeè' weèe aè boo msheâ mmboèñmboñ neè ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, ba beèe ce a m ce cu rcu yáánïì, a kupshi mi, mi ba yáánïì.	"Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you build the tombs of the prophets, and decorate the tombs of the righteous,
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	30	A laa weenáê, ‘Weèr aè m ba ba aè ñgoèñ aè nfeè' ce weêr bta a m ba naè, weèr aè m ba cú' mmbo weèr woweèe, yúshi ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè ka'.’	and say, 'If we had lived in the days of our fathers, we wouldn't have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	31	Baná weèe ce laèa weená weèe yu boo beèe ce a m yúshi ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè.	Therefore you testify to yourselves that you are children of those who killed the prophets.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	32	Geèe neè yuu ce weêe bta a m káè' a ce geèe naè, misi yi.	Fill up, then, the measure of your fathers.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	33	Weèe ce weèe yu aèmboè mnyo, a ba boo bfïî, weèe be geèe weeká ka' cañ ñgá' mor?	You serpents, you offspring of vipers, how will you escape the judgment of Gehenna?
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	34	Baná m ce tuu ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè neè weèe, ba ñgaâa bfee, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, tá weèe yúshi beèe mo' efa woweèe, taa beèe mo' mbe kïìntaa, lïìp beèe mo' efa woweèe aè wee mndap mloo, fa woweèe ñgá' aè mla' jáá jáèá jáá,	Therefore, behold, I send to you prophets, wise men, and scribes. Some of them you will kill and crucify; and some of them you will scourge in your synagogues, and persecute from city to city;
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	35	tá weèe yá ñgá' njo' beèe ce a yúshi aè cicïì njep ñgoèñ na, ká' embe nfeè' ce a m yú Ábáèl ce e m geèe faèa ka' naè, du ba' aè nfeè' ce weèe aè m yú Saèkaèriyaè muu Baèraèkuyaè mbetar dïû' rara ba dïû' ntoèo rfa embe Ndaèp Nyúè naè.	that on you may come all the righteous blood shed on the earth, from the blood of righteous Abel to the blood of Zachariah son of Barachiah, whom you killed between the sanctuary and the altar.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	36	M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ñgá' be koni ñgúè beèe ce e seè'ni na njo' buu ca.	Most certainly I tell you, all these things will come upon this generation.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	37	“Jáèrusaláèm, Jáèrusaláèm, wee ke yúshi ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, a ce túúshi beèe ce a tuu ená a vú yá weèe neè bluèr, yu nfeè' sá' ce máè koèñ aè rbaashi boo wee aèmboè mañgúp e ke ku'ri boo naè, weèe aè koñ ka'.	Jerusalem, Jerusalem, who kills the prophets, and stones those who are sent to her! How often I would have gathered your children together, even as a hen gathers her chicks under her wings, and you would not!"
Mɛ̀ kèse kwâa zhìi ba yàa a du àgho.	I have added his corn to mine and have gone with it.
AÈde' ñwáè cu njáèá rcu ca njobeè' e ce keè' ryoèñ ce nfeseè. Tá ñgoèñ yi ka' keè ba, Nyúè ce e ke nya' mnde' ka' aè m kaè' ená e be fa beèe njáèá ryoèñ ca.	in hope of eternal life, which God, who can't lie, promised before time began;
Mɛ̀ vʉ̀ àfa njobèʼ mɛ̀ kòŋ rfàʼ ca.	I came here because I love this work.

Yi ker joo Jisoès, e du mbe dïì' ce rsheè li m ba. Rsheè anaè aè m ba mbúè' ce a m soè' nje ryáá, a biñsi luèr a cete aègho.	Jesus therefore, again groaning in himself, came to the tomb. Now it was a cave, and a stone lay against it.

Jisoès aè ka' tuu neèñguu roè, ba seè'ni ba aè ñgoèñ beèe Gáèrasaè, a yá beèe a mmbaa ce byú' mnyúâmkaè' vi m ba njep woweèe, aèmboè a ce vúè efa dïì' ce a m ce tuñ beèe. Woweèe a m ce fa ñgá' se aèmboè mñgaèa-baa wa', ñwáè aè ker ce baèp njep nduunjïì ce yi m caèa aè dïì' anaè ka'. Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe fa laèa ená ñgaèñ borni ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' gee rfaâ' rghagha' fa máâ rlii baná aède' e laa yuu bebep kuu máè ka'.	"But Jesus said, ""Don't forbid him, for there is no one who will do a mighty work in my name, and be able quickly to speak evil of me."

AÈmboè buu ca wááwá aè geèe máè neè ma mmbo a?’	Didn't my hand make all these things?'

Rmòoshì ca rli bòni sê.	This test is very easy.

Cumúnyañ ba neè wáè. Bkar a ce caè'ni wáè. Caè'ni bkar aè mlii.	nan

Bèe mòʼ bàa msur sê.	Some people hate pepper too much.
E m ce baèpñger aèmboè sa'mbeèñ wa'a, vi bcáè' vi ce fúp aèmboè mmbaè' wa'a.	His appearance was like lightning, and his clothing white as snow.

Rraa Nyúè li m ce sañ aè rla' anaè, rla' anaè li ce laè'ñger aèmboè luèr ce a too ená jaspaè, a ce raañger aèmboè kwakwa' wa'a.	having the glory of God. Her light was like a most precious stone, as if it was a jasper stone, clear as crystal;
E m siñsi mncir Musïìs ce vi m ce suñ beèe buu ce beèe a ba ce geèe. Ntaaŋguu anà à tooŋger gòr, gwàr zhì njɛɛ.	That stick has twisted too much, cut another one.
Yi yu ená aè rlaèa li moè' ce ñwáè aè m be yá'ni ka', yu ba ncoèo neè beèe ce a byemi neè ye ka', ke' ba ba ená yu ncoèo ba neè beèe ce a byemi wáá ka'. AÈ rcep ntuu Nyúè yu ncoèo ba neè beèe ce a byemi neè ye, ke' ba ená yu ncoèo ba neè beèe ce a byemi neè ye ka' ka'.	Therefore other languages are for a sign, not to those who believe, but to the unbelieving; but prophesying is for a sign, not to the unbelieving, but to those who believe.
M ce sañ ñwaè' ca neè Taitoès ce e yu muu waè ce mini njobeè' e byemi neè Jisos Kraâis aèmboè seèe aè byemi naè. M ce loo máná Nyúè ce e yu yïìseèe Ta ker ba Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yïìseèe ñwáè rjaè', túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, ker fa weèe cumúnyañ.	to Titus, my true child according to a common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Savior.
Jus a m yá máè ce sár mnsár weèr ñwáè moè' embe Ndaèp Nyúè ka', a ker yá ená máè ce káè' ñgá' aè mndaèp mloo káè aè dïì' mo' aè rla' na ka'.	In the temple they didn't find me disputing with anyone or stirring up a crowd, either in the synagogues, or in the city.
Weèr aè ka' ba bgoè'sïì, weèe ba btatap, nyor boñ weèr seê. Weèr ku ce loo neè Nyúè ba ená weèe kupse, ba yáánïì.	For we rejoice when we are weak and you are strong. And this we also pray for, even your perfecting.
Jisoès aè ka' laèa buu ca mïìsi, a loâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a du aè mbeèp ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè ce e yu neèñguu rdip Jodaèn.	It happened when Jesus had finished these words, he departed from Galilee, and came into the borders of Judea beyond the Jordan.
Weèe ce weèe ce koèñ ená weèe ba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njobeè' weèe ce láè mncir, weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe aè gaèpni. Weèe aè bá yuu boèñboñ ce Nyúè aè ba geèe neè weèe.	You are alienated from Christ, you who desire to be justified by the law. You have fallen away from grace.
Mɛ̀ ba gee mamnjiʼ.	I did it by myself.
Weèr ce suñ weèe ba yuu ce Tata aè laèa. Yi yu ená be ba aè nfeè' ce Tata aè vúè, seèe ce seèe bii bteèe seèe ke' du yá ye entombïì neè beèe ce a kweñger ka'.	For this we tell you by the word of the Lord, that we who are alive, who are left to the coming of the Lord, will in no way precede those who have fallen asleep.
a laa neè ye enáê, ‘Loè efa wáâ ñgoèñ, fúú efa múè yoè beèe, du aè ñgoèñ ce m be duèñshi wáè.’	and said to him, 'Get out of your land, and from your relatives, and come into a land which I will show you.'
Beâe aè rla' anaè a m lu'shi seê.	There was great joy in that city.

Buu wááwá aè m geèe yi aè ñger Nyúè. Yuu mo' yi yu ce yi m buu efa rgeèe ka'.	All things were made through him. Without him was not anything made that has been made.
Wɛ̀ ke zhʉʼnyor à buu cicì sê.	You always procrastinate over very little things.
Ñwáè anaè e ke yu' rboèñ aè yuu bbebep ka', e ke yu' rboèñ ba aè yuu ce yi yu mini.	doesn't rejoice in unrighteousness, but rejoices with the truth;
Ncïìndap Nyúè yïì elúèsimbuèu aè ñwañ ñgá' enjep ghee yi mbekïì. E ka' ñwañ, njeèndoñ aè laa embe kaèbaèraè' ce yi m ba mbe Ndaèp Nyúè naè enáê, “Yi mïì.”	"The seventh poured out his bowl into the air. A loud voice came forth out of the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying, ""It is done!"""
Beèe mo' efa weâe mú a ce kwaè'shi ená m be kúti vúè yá weèe ka', a ce naèa tu.	Now some are puffed up, as though I were not coming to you.
AÈ ka' ba neètú', ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè vúê, a mú' bkeèñ shañ, a fúr woweèe embo, a laa enáê,	But an angel of the Lord opened the prison doors by night, and brought them out, and said,
Bfúr waê, m ce kwaè' máná máè be koni yuu anaè ka', yuu mo'sir yi yu ená máè maè'shi buu ce vi m caèa, a ce duè ba aèmbuèu yuu ce yi bii kuèntombïì.	Brothers, I don't regard myself as yet having taken hold, but one thing I do. Forgetting the things which are behind, and stretching forward to the things which are before,
Rbyemïì li m geèe e loâ aè to' Ijïìp a du yi yu a ke' wáp njobeè' ntee yi m bep ñkúú ka'. E m kur ntee a du aèmboè ñwáè ce e m ce yá lá Nyúè ce aède' ñwáè yá neè mmir ka' naè wa'a.	By faith, he left Egypt, not fearing the wrath of the king; for he endured, as seeing him who is invisible.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ñwáè ce e ka' ce geèe buu bbebep baná ñgaèñ yu ñkwaèa neè buu bbebep.	"Jesus answered them, ""Most certainly I tell you, everyone who commits sin is the bondservant of sin."
ÁÈno, Taèr, ca yu ba yuu ce wáè m ce yu' rboèñ aè rgeèe.	Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
Baná máè yá máná yi yu seè'ni aèmboè ncir wa'a ená m ka' ce koèñ aè rgeèe yuu boèñboñ, ku vú ba yïû bebep njep máâ ntee.	I find then the law, that, to me, while I desire to do good, evil is present.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, woweèe a gwar bbaèp mtáá a du a koni ye aègho aè nduunjïì, a ce yoèp enáê, “Hoèsanaè! Bghoènïì vi yu neè ñwáè ce e ce vúè aè rlii Tataê, a ba ñkúú aè to' Isráèl.”	"they took the branches of the palm trees, and went out to meet him, and cried out, ""Hosanna! Blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord, the King of Israel!"""
Jisoès aè m naètïû aè aèfo, a du aè dïì' ce rla' Tayaè li m ba. E m duè a ba' aèfo, a niñ mbe ndaèp, a koñ ená ñwáè moè' riñ ená e yu mbo ka'. Geewa'a beèe a ku rïîñ.	From there he arose, and went away into the borders of Tyre and Sidon. He entered into a house, and didn't want anyone to know it, but he couldn't escape notice.
Zhii kɛ̀ŋ zhi ku cu bìi.	His door is still closed.
Nyúè aè m kani efa rfa muu yïì ka'. E m fa muu yïì a seâe btuè. E ka' fa muu yïì, baná e be fa seèe buu wááwá foñ aè cicïì.	He who didn't spare his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how would he not also with him freely give us all things?
Weèr aè rïìñ yer yu aèmboè e geèe a ka' ce yá buu ka', a riñ ñwáè ce e geèe e ka' ce yá buu ka'. Bipshi neè neè ye. E yu nleeñwáè. E be suñ weèe neè yi cuèu.”	"but how he now sees, we don't know; or who opened his eyes, we don't know. He is of age. Ask him. He will speak for himself."""
Nráèá ce Jisoès ce toèo neè Nyúè anaè yuu seèe. Nráèá anaè yi ce rúèú aè múè beèe wááwá, káè yu beèe ce a be luèñ áè, káè yu beèe ce a be bú áè.	For we are a sweet aroma of Christ to God, in those who are saved, and in those who perish;
Ñwáè moè' ku ba ce e ce suñ aèmboè máè. M rïìñ máná yuu ce e ce suñ aèmboè máè yi yu mini.	It is another who testifies about me. I know that the testimony which he testifies about me is true.
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a m bipshi neè ye enáê, “Rabaèi, a m bi ñwáè ca e ku ba nfeèp njo' yïì buu bbebep káè njo' buu bbebep yïì ma ba yïì taê?”	"His disciples asked him, ""Rabbi, who sinned, this man or his parents, that he was born blind?"""
Yuu ce aède' ñwáè fa aètu li ryoèñ yu ká?	For what will a man give in exchange for his life?
E ka' baè' yu' ená AÈkáloè aè ye kúú yïì ta Hároèd a ce sa' aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè, e wáp aè rduè cu aèfo. Nyúè aè ka' báá ye aè rlo, e natïì a du aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê.	But when he heard that Archelaus was reigning over Judea in the place of his father, Herod, he was afraid to go there. Being warned in a dream, he withdrew into the region of Galilee,
Máè m ba weèr woweèe, a ke'ni woweèe, woweèe a cu njep lo rlii ce wáè m fa neè máè. Máè cïìñ woweèe, yuu mo' yi ke' joo woweèe ka'. Yi ka' ba wa'a, moè' efa woweèe aè m bú caa efa ñwáè ce yi yu ená e be bú naè ka'. E m bú tá yuu ce a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi bo ghááte njo.	While I was with them in the world, I kept them in your name. Those whom you have given me I have kept. None of them is lost, except the son of destruction, that the Scripture might be fulfilled.
Mɛ̀ sʉ̀ti berɛ̀ŋ kù ŋgàa.	I hid the groundnuts on the shelf.
Nyúè aè m duèñshi li rkoèñnïì neè seèe aè njáèá ená e m tuu muu yïì ce e m ku ba moè'sir njep ñgoèñ ená seèe bo cu njo' ye.	By this God's love was revealed in us, that God has sent his one and only Son into the world that we might live through him.
Ka' ba ená yuu bebep ce ñwáè moè'sir aè m geèe, yi m geèe rkwe li túr ñger mbenduè ñgoèñ wááwá, beèe wááwá a ce kweñger njobeè' ñwáè moè'sir anaè, baná yi yu foñ ená rboâñntee ñwáè moè'sir, ce yu Jisos Kraêis, li be geèe beèe magoèr a koni rfa ce aè cicïì, ba beâe byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè, koni ryoèñ, so buu bbebep.	For if by the trespass of the one, death reigned through the one; so much more will those who receive the abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness reign in life through the one, Jesus Christ.
Máè m ka' tá baè geèe mfaè' ce ñwáè aè m be gee ka' fa waâp mú na ka', a m ba taèa woweèe aè yuu bebep ka'. Woweèe a yá mfaè' ca seè'ni, a ku bii ce baèa máè, ba yaè Ta foñ.	If I hadn't done among them the works which no one else did, they wouldn't have had sin. But now have they seen and also hated both me and my Father.
Bfúr waê, weèr ce koèñ ená weèe riñ njáèá ñgá' ce weèr aè m yá aè ñgoâñ Áshaè. Ñgá' anaè aè m tap seê, a ba aèmboè ntáèr ce yi m rïìr a caa yer ñger wa'a, wer aè lo a ce kwaè'shi ená ñwáè be cu nteèe ka'.	For we don't desire to have you uninformed, brothers, concerning our affliction which happened to us in Asia, that we were weighed down exceedingly, beyond our power, so much that we despaired even of life.
Bkar waê, máè m ce koèñ magoèr se aè rsañ neè weèe kuu liseèe rluèñ. Geewa'a, máè yá máná yi boèñ ená m sañ ñwaè' neè weèe seè'ni tá m bo fa weèe ñger tá weèe táá tatap njep rbyemïì ce Nyúè aè m fa neè yïì beèe. AÈde' nsuñ du kuu rbyemïì ca kee kupse ka'.	Beloved, while I was very eager to write to you about our common salvation, I was constrained to write to you exhorting you to contend earnestly for the faith which was once for all delivered to the saints.
Zhì mâ à ba deʼ ye e koʼni.	Her mother shouted at her and she became sad.
Máè rïìñ máná wáâ ke yu' la rloo aè nfeè' wááwá. Geewa'a, m ce laèa cena njo' beèe ce a táá na, tá woweèe a bo byemi ená a wáè ce wáè m tuu máè.”	"I know that you always listen to me, but because of the multitude that stands around I said this, that they may believe that you sent me."""
Jisoès aè m fúú embe Ndaèp Nyúè, a ka' ce duè, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a du a yá ye, a duñshi ye Ndap Nyúè.	Jesus went out from the temple, and was going on his way. His disciples came to him to show him the buildings of the temple.
E ká' beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, a bipshi neè woweèe ená yi m ba ená a be bi Kraâis anaè ba fá lá?	Gathering together all the chief priests and scribes of the people, he asked them where the Christ would be born.
Mɛ̀ làa enɛ à fa ne mɛ̀ àtu yaa mbàa.	I am saying that you should give me because my money.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa enáê, “Haba! Beèe eluèuni ce weèe buu rbyemïì, a beesi mini tútúèñ na. M be cu weèe seèe, kur ntee neè weèe duè baè' fá? Vúè neè muu woè mbena.”	"Jesus answered, ""Faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you and bear with you? Bring your son here."""
Awá e laa beèe anaè a cuteè aè nsheè. E lor bráâd saèamba caè, a yoñshi Nyúè, a bá'shi a fa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a gapshïì neè beèe anaè.	He commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground, and he took the seven loaves. Having given thanks, he broke them, and gave them to his disciples to serve, and they served the multitude.
Baa zhi yu fɛ̀ɛ njobèʼ mor zhi kɛti kaʼ.	The fufu is soft because the fire is not burning.
Mboè weèe bii kuushi ená aè m ba mbe nfeè' ce seèe aè m ba naè, máè suñ weèe buu ca a?	Don't you remember that, when I was still with you, I told you these things?
AÈmboè m yu ñwáè ntuu Jisos Kraêis, aède' m laa neè wáè a máâ ñger máná aè gee yuu ce aè túr aè rgeèe.	Therefore, though I have all boldness in Christ to command you that which is appropriate,
Máè m ce sañ ñwaè' ca neè weèe wa'a, a ke' ce sañ ba ená m ce sa' ñwáè ce e geèe yuu bebep, káè beèenjïì ñwáè ce a m geèe yuu bebep neè ye ka'. Máè m sañ tá weèe bo yá rara aè bsii Nyúè ená weèe aè fa weêe mnyor neè weèr neè mini- ñwáè.	So although I wrote to you, I wrote not for his cause that did the wrong, nor for his cause that suffered the wrong, but that your earnest care for us might be revealed in you in the sight of God.
Loo neè ená Nyúè ja' máè tá m gee tá beèe a riñ nsuñ anaè boèñboñ aèmboè máè ba geèe.	that I may reveal it as I ought to speak.
Yu yuu bwáp seê, ce ñwáè aè ka' táá ená Nyúè ce e yu nteèe teni mi mnsa'.	It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God.
Mɛ̀ yuu cɛ̀ʼ anà à ntaa jòr sê.	I bought this cloth at a very cheap price.
Woweèe a bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Njeñwáè, aè ce war ba ká?” E laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ce war njobeè' a loèr yaè Tata a du aègho, máè ke' riñ faèdïì' ce a láè ye ka'.”	"They told her, ""Woman, why are you weeping?"" She said to them, ""Because they have taken away my Lord, and I don't know where they have laid him."""
Mboè weèe rïìñ weená weèe yu Ndap Nyúè, Yú' Nyúè yi ce cu njep weèe a?	Don't you know that you are a temple of God, and that God's Spirit lives in you?
M ce suñ weèe ba buu ce máè yá ese yaè Taê, weèe aè ce geèe ye ba buu ce weèe aè yá'ni ese yeè taê.”	"I say the things which I have seen with my Father; and you also do the things which you have seen with your father."""
Woweèe a laa enáê, “Habai! A m baè'ri Ndap Nyúè ca aè bfeè' ncoèp-ntuunfu- aè-mñkyeèe. AÈde' aè gee wá ká ka' ba'ri aè mnoâñ btaar?”	"The Jews therefore said, ""It took forty-six years to build this temple! Will you raise it up in three days?"""
Tata Jisoès aè ka' rïìñ ená beèe Farïìsi a yu' buu ca, e natïû aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè a ce kúti aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê.	he left Judea, and departed into Galilee.
Yàp ndèe bòŋ kaʼ njobèʼ woowèe a ke tarshi gùu a bjàr wèe.	Their custom is not good because they usually marry their sisters.
Woowèe a mʉ laa enɛ woowèe a yuʼ nè wap btùʼ waʼa a ka byemi.	They said that they heard it themselves before they could believe.
Mɛ̀ m dʉʼ a caa ye.	I ran fast and passed him.
Woweèe a m duè njïìsaèp ka', ma nteèendúñ moè' aè suâu aè to' Kreêt, aè ba yïì ce a too enáê, Yïû aè bke'.	But before long, a stormy wind beat down from shore, which is called Euroclydon.
Bkar waê, baná yi boèñ ená weèe yu'ni neè máè seè'ni ce m yu njïìsaèp na, yu'ni neè caa aèmboè weèe aè m ce yu'ni neè máè aè nfeè' ce seèe aè m ba naè. Weèe ku ce fa', ce kañ neè rwáp-ñwáè tá weèe bo mïìsi koni rluèñ.	So then, my beloved, even as you have always obeyed, not only in my presence, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.
Ñwáè wááwá e ke geèe buu bbebep magoèr. Ñwáè aè ka' ba ce e ke laèa yuu bebep ka', baná ñgaèñ yu yáánïì aè buu wááwá, a ce loèr nfeè' aè buu wááwá ce e ce geèe.	For in many things we all stumble. If anyone doesn't stumble in word, the same is a perfect man, able to bridle the whole body also.
Njáèá sá' ce aède' m konïì efa rfaè' ca yu ba ká? Yaè sá' ku ba ba ená m fe'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè beèe aè cicïì. A mbuèu ce m ce laèa máná beèe a fa laè' máè aèmboè ñwáè rfeè'shïì ka'.	What then is my reward? That, when I preach the Good News, I may present the Good News of Christ without charge, so as not to abuse my authority in the Good News.
Vi m túr ñger aè rgeèe ñwáè tá e ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè ka'. Yuu ce seèe ce laèa aègho seè'ni yi yu aèndeèe njobeè' a yuu ce aède' yi vú neè seèe aègee Nyúè.	(for the law made nothing perfect), and a bringing in of a better hope, through which we draw near to God.
Waè' cena yi yu ená woweèe a m kote tá woweèe a bo gweè keèr naèti ka' a? AÈde' yi ba wa' ka' koo múcaèr. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' woweèe a m geèe yuu bebep, Nyúè aè fa fáñ neè beèe enje jáá tá woweèe a bo luèñ, tá beèe Isráèl a ko'ndoñ neè woweèe.	I ask then, did they stumble that they might fall? May it never be! But by their fall salvation has come to the Gentiles, to provoke them to jealousy.
Weèe aè ba ce lu'shi lu'shi ená weèe ce yá ñgá' ce Kraâis aè m yá, tá weèe bo keè lu'shi ce yu' rboèñ aè nfeè' ce e be vúè duèñshi yi foèo.	But because you are partakers of Christ's sufferings, rejoice; that at the revelation of his glory you also may rejoice with exceeding joy.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Tu ñwáè embo a yïû nda, rlii ce a sañ mbo aè ba li nda?”	"He asked them, ""Whose is this image and inscription?"""
Yer nsuu zhi ki sê.	Our farm has overgrown.
Ŋwɛ̀ ca tʉr rba à nyòr.	This person has a deformity in the body.
Ñwáè aè ka' bipshi ená weèe ce fyáèá njoká lá, weèe suñ ye ená, Tata ce taè' geèe yuu aègho, ka' kúsi.”	"If anyone asks you, 'Why are you doing this?' say, 'The Lord needs him;' and immediately he will send him back here."""
Yáê, m be suñ weèe yuu ce weèe aè m be riñ ka'. Seèe wááwá be keè kweñger ka'. Seèe wááwá be keè kupse kupse.	Behold, I tell you a mystery. We will not all sleep, but we will all be changed,
Woweèe a m káè' a ce toshi ye enáê, “Weèr aè yá ñwáè ca aè ce karsi btu ese yeèr beèe. E ce laèa neè beèe ená woweèe a fa maè' mbaâa baèraè' neè ñkwe Rum ka', a ce laèa foñ ená a lá ye Kraâis ce e yu ñkúú.”	"They began to accuse him, saying, ""We found this man perverting the nation, forbidding paying taxes to Caesar, and saying that he himself is Christ, a king."""
a laa enáê, “Máè geèe yuu bebep, a fyeni ñwáè ce e geèe yuu mo' bebep ka'.” Woweèe a laa enáê, “Yïì anaè yi túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè weèr ka'. A yoè nsa'.”	"saying, ""I have sinned in that I betrayed innocent blood."" But they said, ""What is that to us? You see to it."""
Weèr aè naèa tu a caa embe dïì' weèr aè ba naèa ka' njobeè' weèr aè naèa tu neè rfaè' ce beèe mo' a geèe ka'. Weèr ce kwaè'shi ba ená le rbyemïì li be kuè ce kuè' tá ler rfaè' ce weèr ce geèe fa weâe mú li ku' foñ seê.	not boasting beyond proper limits in other men's labors, but having hope that as your faith grows, we will be abundantly enlarged by you in our sphere of influence,
Nyúè aè maè' yïì beèe ce e m ce efa rkáè' ka'. Mboè weèe rïìñ yuu ce a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè aèmboè AÈlajaè naè a? AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' moè', e laa bebep aèmboè beèe Isráèl neè Nyúè.	God didn't reject his people, which he foreknew. Or don't you know what the Scripture says about Elijah? How he pleads with God against Israel:
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè, Jisoès aè gee beèe a ke'seè efa byañ njáèá jáá jáèá jáá, a gee beèe ce a m túr byú' bbebep a ke'seè, a gee beèe ce a m feèp, a ker ce yá buu.	In that hour he cured many of diseases and plagues and evil spirits; and to many who were blind he gave sight.
Woweèe a ka' ce koèñ aè rrïìñ yuu mo', woweèe a bipshïì neè bduu wap aè mlaè'. Yu yuu ncoosi tu neè bbyeèñge aè rlaèa yuu mbe múè coêr.	If they desire to learn anything, let them ask their own husbands at home, for it is shameful for a woman to chatter in the assembly.
Jisoès aè fyá' woweèe, a laa enáê, “Ca yi yu tatap se neè beèe, aè ka' ba yi neè Nyúè, buu wááwá yu aètáèr.”	"Looking at them, Jesus said, ""With men this is impossible, but with God all things are possible."""
Mfaè' mi yu jáá jáèá jáá ce beèe a ke geèe, aè ku ba Nyúè moè'sir ce e fa beèe wááwá bfee aè rgeèe mfaè' anaè.	There are various kinds of workings, but the same God, who works all things in all.
AÈde' ñwáè lor mruâ' mfi foñ lá njep mñguèp mruè' vïû brúèú ka'. E ka' gee wa'a baná mruâ' mfi anaè mi be loè koo, to'shi mñguèp mruè' anaè, tá mruè' mi kúte aè nsheè, tá mñguèp mruè' anaè vi bú aè cicïì. Yi ke ba ená a lá mruâ' mfi ba njep mñguèp mruè' vïû bfi tá mi bo kúète ka', tá mñguèp mruè' vi to'ñger ka'.”	"Neither do people put new wine into old wineskins, or else the skins would burst, and the wine be spilled, and the skins ruined. No, they put new wine into fresh wineskins, and both are preserved."""
Má máè yu ñwáè ce m ce faè' njeptii beèe ce yap nta' yi caèa ya. M túr bsoogáè ce a yu njep máâ tïìi foñ. M ka' laa neè moè' enáê, ‘Duè’, baná e be duè. M ka' laa neè moè' enáê, ‘Vúè’, baná e be vúè. M ka' laa neè yaè ñwáè rfaè' enáê, ‘Geèe ca’, baná e be geèe yi.”	"For I am also a man under authority, having under myself soldiers. I tell this one, 'Go,' and he goes; and tell another, 'Come,' and he comes; and tell my servant, 'Do this,' and he does it."""
M ce loo máná aè koo muu waè OÈnásimoès ce máè beèeti yi ta seè'ni ce m yu mbe shañ na.	I beg you for my child, whom I have become the father of in my chains, Onesimus,
M ce laèa ba yuu mini aè rlii Kraêis. M ce nya' mnde' ka'. Ya ntee ce Yú' Rara yi yu njo yi táá yaè njïìnsa' ená,	I tell the truth in Christ. I am not lying, my conscience testifying with me in the Holy Spirit,
Ka' cu, ñwáè msaèasïì aè vú a gú'shi njep yeâ tïìi, a laa enáê, “Tataê, wáè ka' ce koèñ, aè gee m ke'seè, ba nrara.”	"Behold, a leper came to him and worshiped him, saying, ""Lord, if you want to, you can make me clean."""
Nyàa zhìsèe yû?	Where is our meat.
Woweèe a niñ aè mndap mloo, koñ aè rcu aè mnta' beâe bgoèrgoèr, a baè' aè mñkaè', ce ba mnta' bboèñboñ.	and the best seats in the synagogues, and the best places at feasts:
Yi yu neè mini-ñwáè ená Hároèd ba Pontiyos Pailáèt a m vúèse aèbee aè rla' ca a beèe enje jáá weèe, ker ba beèe Isráèl, a ce roèo mkuèu Jisoès, ce e yu yoè ñwáè rfaâ' nrara ce wáè m yo'.	"For truly, in this city against your holy servant, Jesus, whom you anointed, both Herod and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles and the people of Israel, were gathered together
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	4	28	Woweèe a m ku gee ba yuu ce wáè m kwaè'shi a lá aè yo ñger ená yi be keè koni.	to do whatever your hand and your council foreordained to happen.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	4	29	Tataê, yá laè seè'ni aèmboè a ce wápsi weèr naè, geèe tá yoè boo mfaè' a fe'shi wo blaèa neè ntee-ñwáè,	Now, Lord, look at their threats, and grant to your servants to speak your word with all boldness,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	4	30	naèa yo bo mbekïì, gee tá beèe a luñ efa byañ, fa weèr ñger tá weèr bo duèñshi mncoèo, geèe buu bghagha' aè rlii Jisoès ce e yu yoè ñwáè rfaâ' nrara.”	while you stretch out your hand to heal; and that signs and wonders may be done through the name of your holy Servant Jesus."
a ce laèa enáê, “Tata aè fúú efa rkwe neè mini-ñwáè, a duñshi yïì nyor neè Saimúèn.”	"saying, ""The Lord is risen indeed, and has appeared to Simon!"""
Máè yá máná yi boèñ wa'a. Máè rïìñ máná m be cu weèe seèe, tá m bo jaè' weèe tá weèe du kuèntombïì neè le rbyemïì, keèr ce lu'shi,	Having this confidence, I know that I will remain, yes, and remain with you all, for your progress and joy in the faith,
Awá Jisoès aè ka' ce yá'ni mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, a laa neè ñger-ñwáè enáê, “Weèe rïìñ máè, a riñ faèdïì' ce m ce vúè. Ka' yi yu wa' máè vúè aèfa ba aè ya ñger ka'. Ñwáè ce e tuu máè yu ñwáè mini. Weèe rïìñ ye ka'.	"Jesus therefore cried out in the temple, teaching and saying, ""You both know me, and know where I am from. I have not come of myself, but he who sent me is true, whom you don't know."
Yu yuu boèñboñ seê, ce aè ka' ce yá ñgá' aètu yuu ce wáè geèe ka', a kur ntee, a ce yá ñgá' anaè wa'a, njobeè' aè ce koèñ aè rgeèe yuu ce yi boèñ Nyúè.	For it is commendable if someone endures pain, suffering unjustly, because of conscience toward God.
Káâ' seè'ni na, ñwáè fa keèr fa máè ñgá' ka', njobeè' ncoèo ce e yu a máâ nyoèr ce duèñshi ená m yu ñwáè Jisos Kraêis.	From now on, let no one cause me any trouble, for I bear the marks of the Lord Jesus branded on my body.
“Cúú neè mñkaènda mbenduè bcáè', cú' wee blaêm, tá vi ce raa.	"Let your waist be dressed and your lamps burning.
Luke	Luêk	12	36	Ba neè aèmboè beèe ce a cu a ce keè' ená yaèp masaè kúti efa Ñkaâ' bguèu, e ce kúti, kuèushi keèñ, tá woweèe a bo kuè múè' neè ye aè nfeè' ce e kuèushi anaè.	Be like men watching for their lord, when he returns from the marriage feast; that, when he comes and knocks, they may immediately open to him.
Luke	Luêk	12	37	Rboâñtu li be ba neè ñgaâa mfaè' ce yaèp masaè aè ka' vú yá aèmboè woweèe a tami nyor. M ce laèa neè weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená e be cúú cáè' rfaè', laèa tá woweèe a cute aè nsheè tá e caasi byee neè woweèe.	Blessed are those servants, whom the lord will find watching when he comes. Most certainly I tell you, that he will dress himself, and make them recline, and will come and serve them.
Luke	Luêk	12	38	Rboâñtu li be ba neè woweèe ce yaèp masaè aè ka' vú neè ntee-tú', káè tá túè' ka' raa áè, ku yá aèmboè woweèe a tami nyor.	They will be blessed if he comes in the second or third watch, and finds them so.
Luke	Luêk	12	39	Rïìñ neè ca ená ñwáè ndap aè ka' ba riñ nfeè' ce nyáèá ce vúè, e ba maè'shi tá nyáèá kep yïì ndap ka'.	But know this, that if the master of the house had known in what hour the thief was coming, he would have watched, and not allowed his house to be broken into.
Luke	Luêk	12	40	Baná wee weèe foñ tami nyor njobeè' Muu Ñwáè be vúè aè nfeè' ce weèe ce keè' ye ka'.”	Therefore be ready also, for the Son of Man is coming in an hour that you don't expect him."
Mnoèñ vi ka' caâa btaar, ká' embe nfeè' ce Fástoès aè m koo nta', Fástoès aè natïû aè rla' Sisaèriyaè a du aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm.	Festus therefore, having come into the province, after three days went up to Jerusalem from Caesarea.
a vú a táá mbe yeâ njïì aègee mi mkuèu a ce war, mñgoommir mi ce cáácá mbe mkuèu Jisoès, e ce siñsi neè yi nyúè'tu. E m nyoè'shi mkuèu Jisoès, a cu'ni mgúr ce e m túr naè aègho.	Standing behind at his feet weeping, she began to wet his feet with her tears, and she wiped them with the hair of her head, kissed his feet, and anointed them with the ointment.
Beèe a ka' niñ coêr, ñwáè wááwá ce cep ntuu Nyúè, njáèá beèe ca a ka' niñ, yuu ce woweèe a yu' yi be geèe tá woweèe a yá yaèp buu bbebep, keèr geèe tá yap ntee ye sa' woweèe,	But if all prophesy, and someone unbelieving or unlearned comes in, he is reproved by all, and he is judged by all.
Jisoès aè m ce kuè' aè nyoèr ba aè bfee, a túr bsii wañ a Nyúè ker ba beèe.	And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and men.
Yu ye ce e geèe seèe aè konïì fáñ, a riñ rboâñntee Nyúè ce seèe ce yá seè'ni na, a ce lu'shi njobeè' seèe rïìñ seená seèe be koni foèo ce yi loè ese Nyúè.	through whom we also have our access by faith into this grace in which we stand. We rejoice in hope of the glory of God.
Nfeè' aè m tuuse ka', ghaa yi ko' aè rla' Áfásoès wááwá. Beèe ca a m koo Gayoès ba AÈristakoès a du aègho mbe mambe ñgoèr. Beèe a mmbaa ca a m ba beâe aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè ce a m ce kar a Pol weèe.	The whole city was filled with confusion, and they rushed with one accord into the theater, having seized Gaius and Aristarchus, men of Macedonia, Paul's companions in travel.
Nyúè ce m ce faè' neè ye neè ya ntee wááwá aèmboè m ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè muu yïì na, rïìñ ená m ce loo neè weèe aè nfeè' wááwá.	For God is my witness, whom I serve in my spirit in the Good News of his Son, how unceasingly I make mention of you always in my prayers,
Be ba aè nfeè' ce woweèe a ce cep ntuu Nyúè anaè tá woweèe a túr ñger aè rgeèe tá mbeèñ ker gweè aè nfeè' anaè ka'. Woweèe a be túr ñger aè rgeèe tá mdip enjep ñgoèñ wááwá mi beeñger aè bláá. Woweèe a be túr ñger aè rgeèe tá mñgá' njáèá jáá jáèá jáá vi koni beèe enjep ñgoèñ aè nfeè' wááwá ce woweèe a ka' koêñ.	These have the power to shut up the sky, that it may not rain during the days of their prophecy. They have power over the waters, to turn them into blood, and to strike the earth with every plague, as often as they desire.
Blaŋ nfuʼ ba blaŋ Sàamba bvi ku ba yɛɛnì.	Carved statues of the doorframes of the ʼnfuʼ and ʼsaambaʼ secret societies are same.
Zhi yu beer.	It is difficult.
Weèr yu yer beèe Nyúè. Ñwáè ce e rïìñ Nyúè ce yu' yuu ce weèr ce laèa. Ñwáè ce e yu ñwáè Nyúè ka', ce yu' yuu ce weèr ce laèa ka'. Cena a yuu ce yi ce geèe seèe ka' ce rïìñ yú' ce mini, ba yú' mnde'.	We are of God. He who knows God listens to us. He who is not of God doesn't listen to us. By this we know the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

Ndì a zhìi mâ a dù ntaa, a yuu cɛ̀ʼ.	Ndi and his mother have gone to market and bought a cloth.

Bfee ce Nyúè aè fa neè beèe mo' aè rcep yi ntuu vi be keè caèa, tá bfee ce e fa neè beèe mo' aè rlaèa bli ce a m be yá'ni ka', vi mïî, tá bfee ce e fa neè beèe mo' aè rrïìñ buu, vi ker ba ka'. AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè rkoèñnïì, aède' li ke mi ka'.	Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
Wèr à kwàʼshi nè yer tu enɛ zhi bòŋ à rvʉ̀shi ye kaʼ.	We thought that it will not be good to laugh at him.

AÈde' ñwáè moè' aè m ba yá'ni yáá anaè caa efa beèe ce a m ba ncúèkïì rjeèe neè ncúèkïì ncoèp-kyeèe-aè-mñkyeèe naè ka'. Ñwáè aè ka' ba goè'sïì aè buu Nyúè, máâ kwaè'shi aèmboè ye, ba aèmboè ñwáè ce e goè'sïì wa'a foñ. Ñwáè aè ka' gee yuu bebep, mluè mi koo máè seê.	Who is weak, and I am not weak? Who is caused to stumble, and I don't burn with indignation?

AÈ ka' ba njobeè' weèe yu boo Nyúè, Nyúè aè tuusïì Yú' muu yïì ená yi vú niñ njep viseèe mntee. Yú' ca yi geèe seèe ce ká' Nyúè enáê, “Baâa, Taèr.”	"And because you are children, God sent out the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, ""Abba, Father!"""
Vúè neè ye bgúâú bkúú, ba bgúâú beèe ce a m ba btu neè bsoogáè, ker ba bgúâú beâe bgoèrgoèr. Vúè neè ye bgúâú mnyaèabaèraè' ba bgúâú beèe ce a m ce cañ mbo. Vúè neè ye bgúâú beèe wááwá, káè yu bkwaèa áè, káè yu boo áè, káè yu beâe bgoèrgoèr áè, káè yu beâe bká'ká' áè, ye neè bgúèú efa gho.”	"that you may eat the flesh of kings, the flesh of captains, the flesh of mighty men, and the flesh of horses and of those who sit on them, and the flesh of all men, both free and slave, and small and great."""
