Wàʼ mɛ ke yɛ wɛ̀ cɛʼcɛʼ a?	Do I always see you?
Byú' anaè yu mnyúâmkaè', a túr ñger aè rgeèe buu bbáèá. Byú' anaè vi m duè a yá bkúú enjep ñgoèñ na wááwá, a baashi woweèe aèbee tá a bo maè' bïìr a Nyúè weèe aè noèñ ce Nyúè ce ñger wááwá yi yu mba yeâ mmboè be duèñshi yi ñger.	for they are spirits of demons, performing signs; which go forth to the kings of the whole inhabited earth, to gather them together for the war of that great day of God, the Almighty.
msheè mi mú'ñgeèr, beèe Nyúè magoèr ce a m kweñger a fúú, a ba bteèe.	The tombs were opened, and many bodies of the saints who had fallen asleep were raised;
Pol aè beesïì enáê, “M yu ñwáè Jus ce aè rla' Tasoâs aè ñgoâñ Sïìlesïìyaè ce yu rla' ce li yu aètáèr ka'. Kyer wáè, maè'shi tá m laa yuu neè beèe ca.”	"But Paul said, ""I am a Jew, from Tarsus in Cilicia, a citizen of no insignificant city. I beg you, allow me to speak to the people."""
Máè laèa cena neè weèe tá weèe bo koni cumúnyañ njep máè. Weèe be yá ñgá' njep ñgoèñ na. Ka' yi yu wa'a, kur neè ntee. Máè so ñgoèñ ca.”	"I have told you these things, that in me you may have peace. In the world you have oppression; but cheer up! I have overcome the world."""
E ka' yá woweèe, a laa enáê, “Duè neè du duñshi wee mnyor neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì.” Woweèe a ka' ce duè, a ke'se aè nduunjïì.	"When he saw them, he said to them, ""Go and show yourselves to the priests."" It happened that as they went, they were cleansed."
A mlii ñgaâa ntuu ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú anaè na: Ñwáè entombïì aè m ba Saimúèn ce a ce too ená Pitaè, ba nfúr yïì ce Andruè, ba Jáêms, muu Sábáèdïî, ba nfúr yïì ce Joân,	Now the names of the twelve apostles are these. The first, Simon, who is called Peter; Andrew, his brother; James the son of Zebedee; John, his brother;
E m ku tuu ñwáè soogáè ená e du vú neè tu Joân. E du mbe shañ, a tee tu ese Joân,	Immediately the king sent out a soldier of his guard, and commanded to bring John's head, and he went and beheaded him in the prison,
Ñwáè Rjaè' ce yu Yú' Rara ce Taèr be tuu a máâ rlii, yu ñwáè ce e be vúè yá'ni weèe buu wááwá, geèe tá weèe kuushi buu ce máè suñ weèe wááwá.	But the Counselor, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, he will teach you all things, and will remind you of all that I said to you.
Weèe aè luèñ efa buu bbebep, a ba bkwaèa neè ñgeâe yáánïì.	Being made free from sin, you became bondservants of righteousness.
Yi yu aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “E láè mi mmbo mtoo neè ñgaâa fuèp, yi ñgeâe boèñboñ yi ce kupse aè nfeè' moè' ka'.”	"As it is written, ""He has scattered abroad, he has given to the poor. His righteousness remains forever."""
Cu neè neè bfee-ñwáè, ce ke'nïî, njobeè' Sataèn ce e yu yeè ñwáè bbaèa ce kashi aèmboè búrúè' ce e ce waa wa'a, a ce roèo ñwáè ce e bo koo, ye.	Be sober and self-controlled. Be watchful. Your adversary, the devil, walks around like a roaring lion, seeking whom he may devour.
A mboè rbi Jisos Kraâis li m ba aè njáèá enáê. Yïì ma ce aè m ba Máèári aè m koo kwaèñ ese Josáèf ená e bo duè bguèu a ye. Tá a ye a ka' keèe rïìñni mnyor aèmboè nduu a nje, e ba neè rbúè aè ñger Yú' Rara. Josáèf aè lo a riñ ená e yu neè rbúè.	Now the birth of Jesus Christ was like this; for after his mother, Mary, was engaged to Joseph, before they came together, she was found pregnant by the Holy Spirit.
Woweèe a m duè foñ aè rgeèe tañshïì aèmboè ncir Tata Nyúè yi ce laèa. Yi yu mbo ená ñwáè ka' tá geèe tañshïì ca neè bbeâñ bbaa ka', e gee neè byoo buâu bbaa.	"and to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord, ""A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons."""
E yu ñwáè ce e rïìñ buu ce vi yu btatap neè seèe, a ce koosimnse neè seèe njobeè' ye ye ku ba aèmboè seèe. Rmoèoshïì li m vúè neè ye foñ aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá aèmboè li ke vúè neè seèe, geewa'a e ke' gwe ka'.	For we don't have a high priest who can't be touched with the feeling of our infirmities, but one who has been in all points tempted like we are, yet without sin.
E beesïì enáê, “Cena yu ba yuu báèá! Ka' weèe rïìñ faèdïì' ce ñwáè ca ce vúè ka' wa'a, ñwáè ce e geèe máè ka' ce yá buu aè geèe ye.	"The man answered them, ""How amazing! You don't know where he comes from, yet he opened my eyes."
Ka' yi yu wa'a, Tata Jisoès yu ñwáè mini. E be fa weèe ñger, keè'ni weèe ese Sataèn ce e yu ñwáè bsaèrbuu.	But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you, and guard you from the evil one.
Taèr e ke sa' ñwáè ka', e fa ñger neè muu yïì ená e sa' beèe,	For the Father judges no one, but he has given all judgment to the Son,
Geewa'a, m ce suñ weèe yuu mini. Yi yu boèñboñ neè weèe ená m duê, njobeè' m ka' tá duè ka', Ñwáè Rjaè' vú cu weèe woweèe ka'. M ka' duê, m tuu ye tá e vú cu weèe woweèe.	Nevertheless I tell you the truth: It is to your advantage that I go away, for if I don't go away, the Counselor won't come to you. But if I go, I will send him to you.
[A m ce ye Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap, yi ba ená Pailáèt be fúr yaèp ñwáè moè' embe shañ, fa neè woweèe.]	Now he had to release one prisoner to them at the feast.
Weèe aè ka' loo buu ese Nyúè ke' túr vi ka', baná weâe loo neè mkwaè'shïû mmbembep. Weèe ce loo aè rkoni buu ce weèe ce tañ aè rtúr njep weâe mntee.	You ask, and don't receive, because you ask with wrong motives, so that you may spend it for your pleasures.
Weèe aè yá'ni a riñ buu seê, nfeè' aè ka' gháá ce weèe aè ba yá'ni beèe mo' foñ, weèr aè yá werná ñwáè moè' aè ba keèr yá'ni weèe buu Nyúè ce weèe aè m rïìñ efa rkáè' naè. Weèe ku bii nyoñ ba mmbee, ce weèe aè ba ghááte aè rye ba buu.	For although by this time you should be teachers, you again need to have someone teach you the rudiments of the first principles of the oracles of God. You have come to need milk, and not solid food.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, woweèe a ker túr yuu laèa ka' njobeè' woweèe aè m yá aèmboè ñwáè ce e m kepñger anaè táá aègee Pitaè ba Joân.	Seeing the man who was healed standing with them, they could say nothing against it.
Embenjïì mo AÈlajaè aè ker loo, mbeèñ aè gweê, byee vi ká' a ce kuè'.	He prayed again, and the sky gave rain, and the earth brought forth its fruit.

Lòr mntaaŋguu kyèe fa mɛ̀.	Take four sticks and give me.
Kwaè'shi ka neè aèmboè bfúèlawaè vi ke kuè'. They don't toil, neither do they spin; yet I tell you, even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.

Jisoès aè m loâ aè to' anaè, a du fa yeâ laè'. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a du fa yeâ mbuu.	He went out from there. He came into his own country, and his disciples followed him.
Láè neè wee bkuè' ba mbe buèu mbe dïì' ce aède' mfyáp vi ye ka', nlo ye ka', byáèá vi kep mbo yáá buu ka'.	but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust consume, and where thieves don't break through and steal;
Baná weèe co' ñguâp nrúèú ce e m geèe weèe aè ce geèe njáèá ñgeèe ce weèe aè m geèe naè. Buu bbebep ce vi bo' weèe, weèe aè ce koèñ aè rgeèe vi naè vi bepsi weèe.	that you put away, as concerning your former way of life, the old man, that grows corrupt after the lusts of deceit;
Pitaè aè m táá yi ba njep ncúèúndúè' njepmbeè. Ñwáè yá'ni buu Jisoès moè' aè m ba aèfo ce ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì aè m rïìñ. E m fúú njepmbeè a laa neè muunje ce e m táá aè ncúèúndúè' ená e ma'shi, e lor Pitaè a ye a niñ mbe mambe caè.	but Peter was standing at the door outside. Jisoès aè ka' loè fúú efa rkwe, woweèe a fúúseè enjep msheè, a niñ aè Rla' Rrara, a duñshi yaèp nyor neè beèe magoèr.	and coming out of the tombs after his resurrection, they entered into the holy city and appeared to many.
Yeè ndeèe moè' yu ená a ka' ce ye Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap, m fúr ñwáè moè' embe shañ, fa neè weèe. Weèe ce koèñ weená m fúr ñkúú Jus fa neè weèe a?”	"But you have a custom, that I should release someone to you at the Passover. Therefore do you want me to release to you the King of the Jews?"""
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' máè m ba munte, máè m ce laèa buu aèmboè munte, a ce kwaè'shi buu aèmboè munte, a riñ buu aèmboè munte, máè ka' ba nleeñwáè, a borni buu bbonte.	When I was a child, I spoke as a child, I felt as a child, I thought as a child. Now that I have become a man, I have put away childish things.
Ñgá' mor, ba ñgá' njemor, ba ñgá' rúèú mkaèñ ce yi m fúú ekuè cuèu mnyaèabaèraè' ca naè aè m yú ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar efa beèe enjep ñgoèñ.	By these three plagues were one third of mankind killed: by the fire, the smoke, and the sulfur, which proceeded out of their mouths.

See ke coʼ ŋgʉʉ efa bzhee tɛ bvi bo kùʼ.	We usually pull off weeds from crops so that they should grow.

Woweèe a ka' vúèshi ye mïìsi, a co' yap cáâ' beer caè, a lor bcáè' vi, a kúsi ye aè nyoèr, a lor ye a du aègho aè rtaa mbe kïìntaa.	When they had mocked him, they took the purple off of him, and put his own garments on him. They led him out to crucify him.
Nyúè yu ñwáè mini. E be kúsi mcucu' neè beèe ca njobeè' a ce fa weèe ñgá',	Since it is a righteous thing with God to repay affliction to those who afflict you,
Ñwáè ce e ka' tá koèñ Tata Jisoès ka', ndoèo co' ye. Yeèr Tataê, vúè.	If any man doesn't love the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be accursed. Come, Lord!
Táá neè ba njep rkoèñnïì Nyúè aèmboè weèe ce keè' nfeè' ce Tata be koosimnse neè weèe, loèr weèe tá weèe woweèe cu nfeseè.	Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to eternal life.
AÈ ka' ba aè mú ñgaèptú', beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba bleebeèe a cuteè, a seesi aèmboè a be geèe ka' yú Jisoès.	Now when morning had come, all the chief priests and the elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death:

Ntɛ̀ʼ ce lùu.	The ambience is lively.
Ñgaâa ryá'nïì ba ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè ce a m ba mbe cor aè rla' Antïìyoèk, aè m ba Baènabaès ba Simïìyoèn ce a m ce too ená Ñwáâ Nsii, ker ba Lushoâs aè rla' Saèireên, ba Manáèn ce e m kuè' a Hároèd ce e m be sa' njeptii ñwáâ ñgoèr, ba Soêl. Yi yu foñ ená ñwáè ce e m ba ñkwaèa aè nfeè' Nyúè aè m ká' ye ka', yu seè'ni ba ñkwaèa Jisos Kraêis.	For he who was called in the Lord being a bondservant is the Lord's free man. Likewise he who was called being free is Christ's bondservant.
Mbuèu njoká ce nfúr moè' e loè lor moè' du aègho mbe kor du táá kuèntombïì neè beèe ce a byemi neè Jisos Kraâis ka'?	But brother goes to law with brother, and that before unbelievers!
Yuu ce m ce laèa elúèsimbuèu yi yu ená aèmboè weèe Tata Jisoès weèe yu aèbee na, táá neè tatap, koni ñger ese ye ce e túr ñger goèr.	Finally, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his might.
Mgʉr mi mì mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ku jaa waʼa.	My oil has finished and I canʼt do anything about it.
Yap ntee yi ruu neè buu bbebep njáèá jáá jáèá jáá. Woweèe a ce geèe bsaèrbuu. Woweèe a lá mmir mbenduè buu beèe mo', a ce kwaè'shi bebep aèmboè beèe mo'. Woweèe a ce ko'ndoñ, a ce yúshi beèe, a ce reè bkoèr a beèe weèe, a ce bo' beèe, a túr mntee byayañ neè beèe, a ce cúè beèe, a ce sa' beèe.	being filled with all unrighteousness, sexual immorality, wickedness, covetousness, malice; full of envy, murder, strife, deceit, evil habits, secret slanderers,
Ka' yi m ba wa'a, ñkoosimnse Nyúè aè m caèa ñger, e ker koñ seèe magoèr.	But God, being rich in mercy, for his great love with which he loved us,
Weèe be roèo máè, yá máè ka', njobeè' aède' weèe vú faèdïì' m be ba ka'.”	"You will seek me, and won't find me; and where I am, you can't come."""
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Duè neè aè bto' wááwá fe'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè ñwáè wááwá.	"He said to them, ""Go into all the world, and preach the Good News to the whole creation."
E yu ñwáè ce a m geèe tañshïì aègho ená a bo foèosi seèe yïìseèe buu bbebep. A m ku gee wa'a a seâe tu caè' ka', aè m ba foñ aètu buu bbebep beèe wááwá.	And he is the atoning sacrifice for our sins, and not for ours only, but also for the whole world.
Jisoès aè waa tatap aè nfeè' anaè, a kwe.	Jesus cried out with a loud voice, and gave up the spirit.
Wer à dù a baʼ soso a yuʼ nè wer btùʼ.	We arrived there and heard ourselves.
Ñwaè' ca aè sañ máâ Joân neè bcor saèambaê, ce vi yu aè ñgoâñ Ásïìyaè. M ce loo máná Nyúè túr ntee boèñboñ neè weèe ker fa weèe cumúnyañ. Ku ba ye ce e yu seè'ni na, aè ker ba Nyúè ce e m ba, aè ku ker ba ye ce e be keè vúè. Buu ca aè loè foñ ese Byú' saèambaê, ce vi táá kuèntombïì neè yi kaèbaèraè'.	John, to the seven assemblies that are in Asia: Grace to you and peace, from God, who is and who was and who is to come; and from the seven Spirits who are before his throne;
E ke gèe zhì buu àwàa sê.	He does his things very carelessly.
Fa kèr waa mbekì kaʼ.	Donʼt shout aloud again.
Ŋwɛ̀ anà à ba vʉ a dû.	The man came and went away.
Ŋwɛɛ Lùu [ŋwɛ̄ː lùː] cn 7.	month of November.
Ñkaè' yi ka' mïì, woweèe a natïì a ce kúti aè laè', Jisoès aè cu yi mbenjïì aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm. Yïì ta ba yïì ma a riñ ka'.	and when they had fulfilled the days, as they were returning, the boy Jesus stayed behind in Jerusalem. Joseph and his mother didn't know it,
Woweèe a ka' ce báèáñger aèmboè ca, beèe a m baa a nyáá, a táá fa waâp geñ. Bcáè' ce beèe anaè a m maè' vi m ce laè'ñger seê.	It happened, while they were greatly perplexed about this, behold, two men stood by them in dazzling clothing.
Njeñwáè moè' ce nyúèrkaè' aè m niñ njep muu yïì, aè m yu' ená Jisoès yu aèfo, a vúê, a gwe njep yeâ tïìi.	For a woman, whose little daughter had an unclean spirit, having heard of him, came and fell down at his feet.
E ghááte aè rjaè' beèe ce rmoèoshïì li vúè neè woweèe njobeè' rmoèoshïì li m vúè neè ye ye, e riñ ñgá' efa rmoèoshïì foñ.	For in that he himself has suffered being tempted, he is able to help those who are tempted.
Muu Ñwáè be kuè kwe aèmboè yi m ba aè rba, geewa'a, ndoèo be co' ñwáè ce e be fyeèni ye.”	"The Son of Man indeed goes, as it has been determined, but woe to that man through whom he is betrayed!"""
Nyúè ye ye aè koèñ ená beèe ce a be loè koni yuu ce e m kaè' neè woweèe naè, a riñ ghup ená e be kupse yuu ce e m laèa ka'. A mbuèu ce e m kaèa aè li rlii.	In this way God, being determined to show more abundantly to the heirs of the promise the immutability of his counsel, interposed with an oath;
Woweèe a m laèa ená a woweèe a cu aè mú nfeè' moè'. E kanïì.	When they asked him to stay with them a longer time, he declined;
Ku báti nfeè' múcaèr tá beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a ker yá máè ka'. Geewa'a, weèe be yá máè. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' m cu nteèe, baná weèe be cu bteèe foñ.	Yet a little while, and the world will see me no more; but you will see me. Because I live, you will live also.
E ce gɛŋge nè ntʉŋ mdip.	He is moving and dangling with a pot of water.
Ñwáè aè ka' loo yuu ese wáè, aè fa ye yuu anaè. Ñwáè aè ka' koo yo yuu, aè fa keèr laèa ená ñgaèñ kúsi neè wáè ka'.	Give to everyone who asks you, and don't ask him who takes away your goods to give them back again.
Wèr be kù kèʼ caar tɛ e vʉ̂.	We will just wait until he comes.
Wɛ̀ koŋ à rlɛ̀ àmbommoo a?	Do you want to keep it on your own?
Nyúè aè geèe ená mbañruèñwáè ce e yu ñwáè rbyemïì ka' koni bghoènïì ese ye njo' ñgwa yïì ce e yu ñwáè rbyemïì. E ker gee foñ ená njeñwáè ce e yu ñwáè rbyemïì ka' koni bghoènïì ese ye njo' nduu yïì ce e yu ñwáè rbyemïì. Yi ka' tá baè ba wa' ka', boo wap aè ba ba boo bbebep, geewa'a, woweèe a yu brara.	For the unbelieving husband is sanctified in the wife, and the unbelieving wife is sanctified in the husband. Otherwise your children would be unclean, but now they are holy.
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená be keèe ba aè noâñ mnsa' tá ñgá' aè rla' Sodoèm ba Goèmoraè ba aèndeèe neè ñgá' aè rla' anaè.	Most certainly I tell you, it will be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrah in the day of judgment than for that city.
Njáèá mmbañruè ce a bo' bbyeèñge na a baèa yuu ce yi yu mini aèmboè Jánïìs ba Jámbráès a m geèe neè Musïìs naè. Wap mntee vi yu bsii, lap rbyemïì li ba mini ka'.	Even as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses, so do these also oppose the truth; men corrupted in mind, who concerning the faith, are rejected.
Jus a m ko'ndoñ neè woweèe, a du a yá ñgaâa bsaèrbuu mo' efa múè ñgaâa fa ñgá', woweèe a baashïì beèe, beèe anaè a ká' ñgá' aè múè la'. A ka' káè' ñgá', a cañ a du mbe ndaèp mbe Jasïìn aè rkoo Pol ba Silaès, fúr woweèe fa neè beèe.	But the unpersuaded Jews took along some wicked men from the marketplace, and gathering a crowd, set the city in an uproar. Assaulting the house of Jason, they sought to bring them out to the people.
Jisoès aè ka' yá lap rbyemïì, a laa neè ñwáè yañ anaè enáê, “Ñkaraè, máè foèosi wáè efa yoè buu bbebep.”	"Seeing their faith, he said to him, ""Man, your sins are forgiven you."""
nan	to the only wise God, through Jesus Christ, to whom be the glory forever! Amen.
Ñgúè buu ce e m gweèñger yi ba mbe nshe yïû mboèñmboñ naè táá aètu beèe ce a yu' blaâa Nyúè, lá njep ntee boèñboñ seê, neè mini-ñwáè, ku', táá tatap, gee ñgúè.	That in the good ground, these are such as in an honest and good heart, having heard the word, hold it tightly, and bring forth fruit with patience.
Weèe aè m káè' neè Yú' Nyúè, a ce taè' mïìsi ba aè ye ñger njoká? Weèe yu blúr wa' njoká?	Are you so foolish? Having begun in the Spirit, are you now completed in the flesh?
Woweèe a ba' a cu aè rla' anaè, nfeè' rbi aè gháá.	It happened, while they were there, that the day had come that she should give birth.
A mbuèu ce wáè ka' tuu beèe ená a vú ká' máè, máè laa yuu mo' ka', a ku nati a ce vúè. M ce bipshi neè wáè ená wáè tuu beèe ená m vú gee ká lá.”	"Therefore also I came without complaint when I was sent for. I ask therefore, why did you send for me?"""
Yi ka' ba wa'a máè laa mánáê, ‘Tata Nyúè, a máè na. Máè tami nyor aè rgeèe buu wááwá ce wáè koèñ ená m geêe, aèmboè a sañ mbe yo ñwaè' mncir.’ ”	"Then I said, 'Behold, I have come (in the scroll of the book it is written of me) to do your will, O God.'"""
Buu wááwá ce beèe a geèe ce vi yu yáánïì ka', yu buu bbebep. Geewa'a, yuu bebep mo' yi yu aègho ce aède' yi gee ñwáè kwe ka'.	All unrighteousness is sin, and there is a sin not leading to death.
Jisoès aè ka' kuè yu' yuu ce yi koni, a loâ faèdïì' ce e m ba, a niñ mbe keñ, a du faè dïì' mo' ce ñwáè moè' aè m ker ba aèfo caa efa ye ka'. Beèe a ka' yu', a fúúse efa mla' wááwá, a jár neè mkuèu, a du a yeâ mbuèu.	Now when Jesus heard this, he withdrew from there in a boat, to a deserted place apart. When the multitudes heard it, they followed him on foot from the cities.
M ce laèa aèmbo ñgeâe bkwaèa tá yuu ce m ce laèa yi bo ba rara njobeè' yi yu tatap neè weèe aè rrïìñ buu ca neè bfee vïû ñwáè. AÈ m ba entombïì weèe aè fa weêe mnyor neè buu bbebep, a ce geèe ba bsaèrbuu. Baná weèe fa weêe mnyor seè'ni na ba neè ñgeâe yáánïì, tá weèe bo ba beèe Nyúè ce weèe yu brara.	I speak in human terms because of the weakness of your flesh, for as you presented your members as servants to uncleanness and to wickedness upon wickedness, even so now present your members as servants to righteousness for sanctification.
Lòr buu àtɛ̀r.	Take things easy.
E ke koèñ aè rjaè' beèe tá woweèe a bo rïìñ yuu ce yi yu mini.	who desires all people to be saved and come to full knowledge of the truth.
A be yoèñshi ye foñ njobeè' weèe yu mmbo mtoo neè woweèe, ker ba neè beèe wááwá.	while they themselves also, with supplication on your behalf, yearn for you by reason of the exceeding grace of God in you.
Rkoèñnïû neè Nyúè li yu ená seèe gee buu ce e ce laèa. Buu ce e ce laèa vi gha' seèe aè rgeèe ka',	For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments. His commandments are not grievous.
Sèe du ghanì njobèʼ a tòo fòo.	Let us hunt because they have burnt the bush.
E lòr mbàa embenjì.	She took a loan without consulting me.
Geèe neè buu wááwá ce weèe aè yá'ni ese máè, a koo ese máè, a yu' ese máè, a ker yá ese máè tá Nyúè ce e yu ñwáè cumúnyañ bo ba weèe woweèe.	The things which you learned, received, heard, and saw in me: do these things, and the God of peace will be with you.
Ŋgùŋ à làa e serna.	An ululation has sounded from that end.
Mɛ̀ sɛ̀ njobèʼ muu wàa ce yaŋ sê.	I am very disappointed because my child is very ill.
Yi ba wa'a, baná yi ntee yi gaèp nyor aè buu bbaa. Boo mñgoèñgoè ba bbyeèñge ce a túr bduu ka', a ke kwaè'shi aèmboè buu Tataê. Woweèe a loè lor waêp mntee ba waêp mnyor wááwá fa neè Nyúè. Bbyeèñge ce a túr bduu a loè kwa'shi ba aèmboè buu enjep ñgoèñ na njobeè' woweèe a koèñ ená a gee tá nyor boñ bduu wap.	There is also a difference between a wife and a virgin. The unmarried woman cares about the things of the Lord, that she may be holy both in body and in spirit. But she who is married cares about the things of the world--how she may please her husband.
Wáè rïìñ wáná beâe aè ñgoèñ Áshaè wááwá a maè'shi máè, máè ba mamñgi'. Beèe mo' efa woweèe aè m ba Fugáloès ba ÁÈmogánïìs.	This you know, that all who are in Asia turned away from me; of whom are Phygelus and Hermogenes.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Seèe du aè mla' mo' tá m du feè'shi aèfo foñ. A yuu ce máè m vúè aètu mo.”	"He said to them, ""Let's go elsewhere into the next towns, that I may preach there also, because I came out for this reason."""
Jisoès aè ka' yá aèmboè Máèári ce war, keèr yá aèmboè Jus ce a Máèári weèe a m ce vúè naè a ce warse, yi joo ye seê, mluè mi koo ye.	When Jesus therefore saw her weeping, and the Jews weeping who came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled,
M ce laèa buu ca, aè ke' ku laèa ba máè ka', ncir Nyúè yi laèa wa' foñ.	Do I speak these things according to the ways of men? Or doesn't the law also say the same thing?
Ncïìndap Nyúè anaè aè m duèñshi máè rdip ce li ke fa ryoèñ, li ce laè'ñger aèmboè glaês. Rdip anaè li m ce fúú enje kaèbaèraè' ce túr Nyúè ba muu njeèe.	He showed me a river of water of life, clear as crystal, proceeding out of the throne of God and of the Lamb,
Woweèe a m ku yu' ba buu ce beèe a m ce laèa aèmboè máè. Beèe a m ce laèa enáê, “Ñwáè ce e m ce fa ñgá' neè seèe naè ce feè'shi seè'ni ba aèmboè rbyemïû neè Jisos Kraêis, ce e m ce koèñ ená li ba ka' naè.”	"but they only heard: ""He who once persecuted us now preaches the faith that he once tried to destroy."""
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè boo ñkúú, a be keèe fúr woweèe embo, maè' aè dïì' ce ku ba ba túè'nji, ce beèe a ce warse ce kúr msoèñ aèfo.”	"but the children of the Kingdom will be thrown out into the outer darkness. There will be weeping and gnashing of teeth."""
Woweèe a ká' a ce fa Jisoès ñgá' njobeè' buu ce e m geèe nyúè mmbomntaa.	For this cause the Jews persecuted Jesus, and sought to kill him, because he did these things on the Sabbath.
Muunje moè' ce e m ba ñwáè rfaè' aè yá aèmboè e cu a ce yár mor, e fyá' ye mbe mmïìr, a laa enáê, “Ñwáè ca aè m ba a Jisoès foñ.”	"A certain servant girl saw him as he sat in the light, and looking intently at him, said, ""This man also was with him."""
Mkuu mi waŋger e.	The beans have exploded.
Mbuèu ce wáè ba laèa buu ca neè woweèe yu ená woweèe a bo koèñ beèe.
