Cuèu yi ce luèu ye aè ryá weèe, mluè mi ce koo ye njobeè' e rïìñ ená weèe aè yu' yi yañ.	since he longed for you all, and was very troubled, because you had heard that he was sick.
Cena yi ka' mïì, máè yá ncïìndap Nyúè moè' aèmboè e ce suèu embe buèu. E m túr ñger goèr seê. Yïì nyor aè m ce raa, rraa efa yeâ nyor anaè li raa aè ñgoèñ wááwá.	After these things, I saw another angel coming down out of the sky, having great authority. The earth was illuminated with his glory.
“Vúè neè vú yá ñwáè ce e suñ máè buu wááwá ce máè m ce geèe. Seemoè' ñwáè anaè a Kraêis.”	Come, see a man who told me everything that I did. Can this be the Christ?
Yi ka' ba wa'a, weèe aè buu mo' efa buu wááwá ce Yú' Tata Nyúè yi ke fa neè beèe ka', aèmboè weèe cu seè'ni ce keè' nfeè' ce weèe be keè yá Jisos Kraâis na.	so that you come behind in no gift; waiting for the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ;
Baná seèe yoñshi Nyúè ce e fa seèe dïû' kúú ce aède' ñwáè ci' ka'. Seèe yu'ni neè ye, gú'shi neè ye neè rbonïì-ñwáè aè njáèá njïì ce ye ye koèñ. Seèe wáp ye foñ.	Therefore, receiving a Kingdom that can't be shaken, let us have grace, through which we serve God acceptably, with reverence and awe,
Bkar waê, aèmboè Nyúè aè geèe mkaè'ni ca neè seèe, seèe raasi viseèe btu efa buu wááwá ce vi ce bepsi viseèe mnyor ba viseèe byú'. Seèe ce wáp Nyúè, fa viseèe btu wááwá neè ye, ce gee ñgeâe rara aè buu wááwá.	Having therefore these promises, beloved, let us cleanse ourselves from all defilement of flesh and spirit, perfecting holiness in the fear of God.
M rïìñ máná weèe be loè rïìñ weèr boèñboñ. Yi ka' ba wa'a, máè kwaè'shi máná m be caè'ni weèe entoèmbïì tá weèe bo lu'shi ñkaèraè' baa.	In this confidence, I was determined to come first to you, that you might have a second benefit;
Bèe ce a maʼshi nàʼ à làʼ gòr yu Mbòroro.	Most of those who rear cows in the village are the Bororos.
Ñgaâa ntaa caè a be laèa enáê, “Buu wááwá ce wáè m koèñ naè vi mïì. Yo foèo ba ku' buu ce wáè m túr naè vi mïì. AÈde' aè ker túr buu anaè ka'.”	The fruits which your soul lusted after have been lost to you, and all things that were dainty and sumptuous have perished from you, and you will find them no more at all.
Ñwaè' ca aè sañ máâ nleeñwáè neè njeñwáè ce a ce, ker ba boo vi ce m koèñ neè mini-ñwáè. Ku ba ba máè caè'caè' ce m koèñ weèe ka'. Beèe wááwá ce a rïìñ yuu mini a koèñ weèe foñ,	The elder, to the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all those who know the truth;
Jisoès aè ka' rïìñ ená woweèe a m ce de'ñger njobeè' yuu ce e m laèa na, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Cena yi bep weèe a?	"But Jesus knowing in himself that his disciples murmured at this, said to them, ""Does this cause you to stumble?"
Moè' efa beèe a mmbaa ca ce e m yu' yuu Joân aè m laèa a du aèmbuèu Jisoès foñ naè aè m ba Andruè nfúr Saimún Pitaè.	One of the two who heard John, and followed him, was Andrew, Simon Peter's brother.
Jisoès aè m niñ aè rla' Jáèrikuè a to'ni rla' anaè a ce caèa.	He entered and was passing through Jericho.
Mɛ̀ m dù mbǎa.	I went there.
Rkòŋ tʉʼ rli m sòp ye mbe njì.	Cancer affected him on the back.
Mɛ̀ gèe rfàʼ anà jòr sê.	I did this work very easily.
Muu ca e ke fyɛ̀p sê.	This child is too greedy.
Bbyeèñge foñ a ba yu'ni neè bduu wap, bduu wap mo' a ka' ba ce a byemi blaâa Nyúè ka' tá yap ñgeèe yi bo geèe woweèe tá a byemi ce woweèe a laèa yuu mo' neè woweèe ka',	In the same way, wives, be in subjection to your own husbands; so that, even if any don't obey the Word, they may be won by the behavior of their wives without a word;
Jisoès aè ciisïì neè ye enáê, “Yáê, fa suñ ñwáè ka'. Duè duñshi yoè nyor neè ñwáè tañshi tañshïì embe Ndaèp Nyúè, gee tañshïì ce Musïìs aè m laèa ená ñwáè yañ msaèasïì gee tá beèe a bo rïìñ ená ñwáè anaè aè keè'se naè.”	"Jesus said to him, ""See that you tell nobody, but go, show yourself to the priest, and offer the gift that Moses commanded, as a testimony to them."""
Jisoès aè m suñ woweèe rara enáê, “Lasoèroès aè kwe.	"So Jesus said to them plainly then, ""Lazarus is dead."
A máè cuâu ñka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' caa njïì enjep máè baná ñgaèñ be luèñ efa ñgá'. E be niñ mbo aè nfeè' ce e gwáá, koni yuu ye.	I am the door. If anyone enters in by me, he will be saved, and will go in and go out, and will find pasture.
E be keè duè entombïû neè ye neè njáèá yú' ker ba ñger ce AÈlajaè aè m túr, tá e bo geèe tá btar boo a boo wap weèe a kúti aèbee, geèe tá beèe ce a teèe btu a túr bfee aèmboè beèe ce a yu yáánïì a túr, tá beèe Nyúè a bo tami nyor aè rkoni Tataê.”	"He will go before him in the spirit and power of Elijah, 'to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children,' and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just; to prepare a people prepared for the Lord."""
E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Weâe ce duè, ñwáè fa loèr yuu mo' ka', ka' mbaèñ, ka' baèa, ka' bráêd, ka' mbaèa, ka' cáè' áè, ñwáè fa loèr ka'.	"He said to them, ""Take nothing for your journey--neither staffs, nor wallet, nor bread, nor money; neither have two coats apiece."
Geewa'a, m ce sañ nlaâa fi neè weèe ce yi ce duèñshi nyor njep Kraêis, ker ba njep weèe foñ. Yi yu wa'a njobeè' túè'nji ce fa njïì, rraa ce mini li ká' a ce raa.	Again, I write a new commandment to you, which is true in him and in you; because the darkness is passing away, and the true light already shines.
Yuu anà zhi yu fyɛ̀pte.	That thing is airless.
Wáè ka' gee wa' baná aè be ba ñwáè rboâñtu njobeè' woweèe a túr yuu mo' ce aède' a la' wáè aègho ka'. Nyúè be keè laè' wáè aè nfeè' ce beèe ce a yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè a be keè fúú efa rkwe.”	"and you will be blessed, because they don't have the resources to repay you. For you will be repaid in the resurrection of the righteous."""
Baná seèe fa ce buumi aèmboè beèe mo' a ce geèe naè ka'. Seèe ce ke'se, tami nyor.	so then let's not sleep, as the rest do, but let's watch and be sober.
Máâ suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè máná, ñwáè ce e ka' tá koo kúú Nyúè aèmboè muu ñká' ka', aède' e ke niñ mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè anaè ka'.”	"Most certainly I tell you, whoever will not receive the Kingdom of God like a little child, he will in no way enter into it."""
Seèe yoñshi Tata Nyúè ce e yu Taèr neè Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yïìseèe Tataê. Yu ye ce e ghoèni seèe neè buu embe buèu. E ghoèni seèe neè buu ca njobeè' seèe yu beèe Jisos Kraêis.	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ;
Ñgaâa mnde' anaè a ku ce koèñ ená woweèe a koni sá' efa buu wááwá. Woweèe a be bo' weèe neè mnde' tá a bo ye sá' efa mnde' anaè. Yu nfeè' njïìsaèp aèmboè Nyúè ce e be sa' mnsa' beèe teni aè tami nyor aè rfa woweèe ñgá' njo' yaèp ndeâe mbembep anaè. Ku báti nfeè' múcaèr tá e misi woweèe nfeseè.	In covetousness they will exploit you with deceptive words: whose sentence now from of old doesn't linger, and their destruction will not slumber.
Baná seèe be laèa seeká? Waè' seèe be laèa seená Nyúè aè m geèe yuu mini ka' a? AÈde' yi ba wa' ka' koo múcaèr.	What shall we say then? Is there unrighteousness with God? May it never be!
Bfúr waê, m ce koèñ máná weèe riñ buu moè' kuu bfee ce Yú' Nyúè yi ke fa neè beèe.	Now concerning spiritual things, brothers, I don't want you to be ignorant.
Atà m̀ ̀ beʼ ŋwàʼ ca.	I am able to read this book.
tá ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè ye, e bo koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè.	that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
a m bipshi neè Joân enáê, “Wáè ka' tá ba Kraâis anaè ka', ba AÈlajaè ka', ba ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè ce Nyúè aè m laèa ená e be tuu naè ka', wáè ka' ce baèptir beèe njoká?”	"They asked him, ""Why then do you baptize, if you are not the Christ, nor Elijah, nor the prophet?"""
Yi ka' ba ená a be koo ñwáè fa aè shañ baná aède' ñgaèñ buu efa rduè shañ ka'. Yi ka' ba ená a be yú ñwáè neè saè' baná a be kuè yú ye ba aègho. AÈmboè yi yu aè njáâá wa'a, baná beèe Nyúè a ba táá tatap, láè ntee ba neè Taèr Nyúè.	If anyone is to go into captivity, he will go into captivity. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, he must be killed. Here is the endurance and the faith of the saints.
Baná weèe ce weèe yu Jus ka' na, weèe ker bii bkïìloè káè beèe ce a ce caèa caèa ka', weèe yu boo ñgaâa nshe weèe beèe Nyúè weèe, a ba beèe embe ndaèp Nyúè.	So then you are no longer strangers and foreigners, but you are fellow citizens with the saints, and of the household of God,
AÈmboè yi yu wa' na, m ce wáp máná Sataèn be jepsi btu ese weèe aèmboè e m loèr vi bkwáèá a bo' Ef aègho naè, tá weèe ker láè ntee njep Jisos Kraêis, fa wee mnyor neè ye ka'.	But I am afraid that somehow, as the serpent deceived Eve in his craftiness, so your minds might be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ.
Ryoèñshïì ba mcáp mi ke kuè ce fúú ekuè cuâu mo'sir. Bfúr waê, yi boèñ wa' ka'.	Out of the same mouth comes forth blessing and cursing. My brothers, these things ought not to be so.
Saè' mbyáèráñ aè m fúú eku yeâ cuèu. AÈ m ba saè' ce e be so bto' ce a baèa ye aègho. E be loèr yïì mbaèñ kúú ce a geèe neè bco', sa' woweèe aègho. E be nyáèñ gráâp ce a m ceni naè njep beè'teè ce a ke nyáèñ. Rnyáèñ efa gho li táá aètu ku' rshentee Nyúè ce ñger wááwá yi yu mba yeâ mmboè.	Out of his mouth proceeds a sharp, double-edged sword, that with it he should strike the nations. He will rule them with an iron rod. He treads the winepress of the fierceness of the wrath of God, the Almighty.
E ke ba nètʉʼ ŋgòŋ zhi ce sii.	In the night, places are dark.
Wer ke loo aè nfeè' wááwá ce kuushi weèe ker ce yoèñshi Nyúè njo' weèe.	We always give thanks to God for all of you, mentioning you in our prayers,
Ncǎrkwe e ke ba ncòo rkwe.	Small termites are the sign of death.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, bfúr vi a laa neè ye enáê, “Naètïû aèfa, du aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè tá ñgaâa yá'ni yoè buu a bo yá mfaè' ce aè ce geèe na.	"His brothers therefore said to him, ""Depart from here, and go into Judea, that your disciples also may see your works which you do."
AÈmboè weèr ce cu njep ñgoèñ na, rkwe li ce rúèú wer aè nfyeènyú aè nfeè' wááwá njo' Kraêis, tá li ryoèñ li bo yááti nje weâr mnyoèr ce vi be loè kweñger naè.	For we who live are always delivered to death for Jesus' sake, that the life also of Jesus may be revealed in our mortal flesh.
Nyaèa anaè aè m ba nteèe a ker bii nteèe seè'ni ka'. E be fúú enjeèp rwee ce lúèsimbuèu yu aègho ka' naè, tá a lo yú ye tá e kwe dúèdúè. Beèe ce a ce cu njep ñgoèñ na a be yá nyaèa ca, báèáñger seê. Beèe ca yu beèe ce a m sañ map mlii mbe ñwaè' ryoèñ ka', tá ñgoèñ yi ka' keè ba aègho. Woweèe a be báèáñger njobeè' nyaèa ca aè m ba nteèe a ker bii nteèe seè'ni ka, keèr loè kúti nteèe.	The beast that you saw was, and is not; and is about to come up out of the abyss and to go into destruction. Those who dwell on the earth and whose names have not been written in the book of life from the foundation of the world will marvel when they see that the beast was, and is not, and shall be present.
Nyúè aè m loèr nfaèñ mbañruèñwáè a boo njeñwáè aègho, njeñwáè ye ye aè ba ñwáè ce e ke bi mbañruèñwáè. Buu ca wááwá aè m geèe ba Nyúè.	For as woman came from man, so a man also comes through a woman; but all things are from God.
Rfaè' ce tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì e ke geèe li yu ená e koo buu ce beèe a fa, ker ba buu tañshïì, gee tañshïì aègho. Baná yi m ba boèñboñ ená tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ce e táá a seâe btuè mbe buèu naè túr yuu mo' ce ye ye be fa neè Nyúè foñ.	For every high priest is appointed to offer both gifts and sacrifices. Therefore it is necessary that this high priest also have something to offer.
Jisoès aè karsïì nyor, a yá ye, a laa neè ye enáê, “Muu waè, kur ntee, lo rbyemïì li geèe wáè ke'seè.” Njeñwáè anaè aè ku ke'se aè nfeè' anaè.	"But Jesus, turning around and seeing her, said, ""Daughter, cheer up! Your faith has made you well."" And the woman was made well from that hour."
“Yaè Ta aè fa buu wááwá mba máâ mmboè. Ñwáè moè' rïìñ muu caa efa Taèr ka', ñwáè moè' aè rïìñ Taèr caa efa muu ker ba beèe ce muu aè koèñ aè rduèñshi ye neè woweèe ka'.	All things have been delivered to me by my Father. No one knows the Son, except the Father; neither does anyone know the Father, except the Son, and he to whom the Son desires to reveal him.
Weèr aè ka' loâ aè rla' Trowaès, a niñ mbe keñ, a duê, a táá aè dïì' mo' ka', caar a ba' aè rla' Soèmatáráès. Túè' aè ka' raa, weèr aè ba' aè rla' Nïìyapolïìs.	Setting sail therefore from Troas, we made a straight course to Samothrace, and the day following to Neapolis;
Mnoèñ vi m caèa aèñgoo seê, weèr aè be yá rlir nyúè káè mkaèñsïì ka', nteèendúñ aè ku ce caèa tatap seê. Weèr aè riñ ená aède' weèr luñ efa gho ka'.	When neither sun nor stars shone on us for many days, and no small storm pressed on us, all hope that we would be saved was now taken away.
Seèe rïìñ seená aè m ba aè nfeè' ce a m taa Kraâis mbe kïìntaa naè, a m taa njáèá ñwáè ce seèe aè m ba naè mbo foñ tá a bo yú yïìseèe ndeâe mbembep, faè dïì' seèe bo keèr ba bkwaèa neè buu bbebep ka'.	knowing this, that our old man was crucified with him, that the body of sin might be done away with, so that we would no longer be in bondage to sin.
Máè ker yá ncïìndap Nyúè moè' aèmboè e fúú embe Ndaèp Nyúè embe buèu, a túr saâ' ncáncáp mbaè boè foñ.	Another angel came out from the temple which is in heaven. He also had a sharp sickle.
Bfúr waê, baná yuu mo' yi yu ce seèe be kuè geèe, aè ke' ba ená seèe yu'ni neè nyor, cu ba aèmboè e ce koèñ ka'.	So then, brothers, we are debtors, not to the flesh, to live after the flesh.
Buu ca aè ka' mïì wáá, Jisoès ba ñgaâa yá'nïì yïì buu a natïì a du aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè, e cu a woweèe aèfo, a baptir beèe.	After these things, Jesus came with his disciples into the land of Judea. He stayed there with them, and baptized.
e yáátïì neè beèe ce a woweèe a m jáâr aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a du a ba' aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm naè, aè mnoèñ aèñgoo. Woweèe a ce suñ yïìseèe beèe seè'ni aèmboè ye.	and he was seen for many days by those who came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem, who are his witnesses to the people.
Woweèe a m ker ce roèo aè rkoo ye, e fúú efa waâp mú a duê.	They sought again to seize him, and he went out of their hand.
AÈde' ñwáè moè' máñnïì buu ca ka', baná ñwáè moè' fa keèr fa ñgá' ka'. Cu neè múnyañ.	Seeing then that these things can't be denied, you ought to be quiet, and to do nothing rash.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a duñshi woweèe mi mmbo ba mi mkuèu.	When he had said this, he showed them his hands and his feet.
Beèe ce a m vúè a Máèári weèe naè, a m yá yuu ce Jisoès aè m geèe, beèe magoèr efa waâp mú a byemïì neè ye.	Therefore many of the Jews, who came to Mary and saw what Jesus did, believed in him.
Beèe a m vúè aè bkúr aè bkúr a yá Joân ená e baptir woweèe. Joân aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Boo bfïî, ñwáè ce e báá weèe ená weèe cañ soèrti efa rshentee ce Nyúè be ko'si neè beèe naè, aè báá nda?	"He said therefore to the multitudes who went out to be baptized by him, ""You offspring of vipers, who warned you to flee from the wrath to come?"
Weèr aè ka' fa' a weâe mú, bye buu ce aè yú' njep weâe mntee, yi ke' ba yáánïì ená weèr aè ba koni buu ce vi be geèe tá weèr cu rcu ryáánïì ese weèe a?	If we sowed to you spiritual things, is it a great thing if we reap your fleshly things?
“Weèe ce ká' máè enáê ‘Tataê, Tataê’, a ce geèe buu ce m ce suñ weèe ka' njoká?	"Why do you call me, 'Lord, Lord,' and don't do the things which I say?
Luke	Luêk	6	47	Ñwáè ce e ka' vú yá máè, yu' yuu ce m ce laèa, gee yi, baná m be duèñshi weèe njáèá ñwáè ce ñgaèñ yu.	Everyone who comes to me, and hears my words, and does them, I will show you who he is like.
Luke	Luêk	6	48	E yu aèmboè ñwáè ce e m ce baè'ri yïì ndap, a tuñ kuèu yi suu boèñboñ seê, a táá mbenduè ryáá, e boo kuèu ndap mbo. Rdip li ka' ruu cirshi ndap anaè, a gee yuu mo' aègho ka' njobeè' a m baè'ri ye yáánïì.	He is like a man building a house, who dug and went deep, and laid a foundation on the rock. When a flood arose, the stream broke against that house, and could not shake it, because it was founded on the rock.
Luke	Luêk	6	49	Geewa'a, ñwáè ce e ka' yu' yuu ce m ce laèa, gee yi ka', baná ñgaèñ yu aèmboè ñwáè ce e m ce baè'ri yïì ndap, a tuñ kuèu ka'. Rdip li ka' ruu cïìr ndap anaè, e ku kááñger a gweê, a koo yuu efa gho ka'.”	But he who hears, and doesn't do, is like a man who built a house on the earth without a foundation, against which the stream broke, and immediately it fell, and the ruin of that house was great."
Beèe a ka' yá ca, a wáp seê, a yoñshi Nyúè aè njáèá ñger ce e fa neè beèe naè.	But when the multitudes saw it, they marveled and glorified God, who had given such authority to men.
Cena yi ka' mïì, bcïìndap Nyúè saèamba ce a m túr msoèñ saèamba naè a tamïì nyor aè rfyáp msoèñ anaè.	The seven angels who had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.
Jisoès aè m tuu beèe ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú ca, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe fa duè aè ñgoâñ beèe enje jáá, káè aè mla' beâe aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè ka'.	"Jesus sent these twelve out, and commanded them, saying, ""Don't go among the Gentiles, and don't enter into any city of the Samaritans."
Dïì' ce woweèe a m vúè táá aèfo anaè aè m ba dïû' boèñboñ aè rcu aè saa ka'. Beèe magoèr a fa ntañ ená a gheter yá ená a be baè' aè rla' Fenïìs cu ba aèfo lá. Fenïìs aè m ba dïì' moâ' aè to' Kreât ce bkeñ vi m ce vúè ce táá, ka' ker ce co'ti ce duè. AÈ m ba dïì' ce wáè m ka' ba táá ce keè' mbaè mbuèuntii, aè ku yá rdip aè yo bo ñkoèp ba yo bo maè'.	Because the haven was not suitable to winter in, the majority advised going to sea from there, if by any means they could reach Phoenix, and winter there, which is a port of Crete, looking northeast and southeast.
Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “AÈ rla' Bátáèláèháêm, aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè. Ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m sañ enáê,	"They said to him, ""In Bethlehem of Judea, for this is written through the prophet,"
Bcɛ̀ bwaa bvi sii kaʼ.	My clothes are not dirty.
Woweèe a m yu' yuu ce e m ce laèa boèñboñ njobeè' yi fii ce e m geèe aè bfeè' aèñgoo, beèe a bááñgeèr naè.	They listened to him, because for a long time he had amazed them with his sorceries.
Jisoès aè niñ mbe keñ, a ker tuu neèñguu roè, a du a ba' fa yeâ laè'.	He entered into a boat, and crossed over, and came into his own city.
Njáèá ñgeèe ca yi fa keèe ba fa weâe mú ka'. Yi yu ba ená ñwáè efa weâe mú ce e ka' ce koèñ aè rba ñwáâ ñgoèr, baná ñgaèñ ba ñwáè rfaè' neè weèe,	It shall not be so among you, but whoever desires to become great among you shall be your servant.
Yǎanà a ncʉʼ efagho.	That is transferred aggression.
Weèe aè duè aèmbuèu Jisoès ce e m loèr yïì nyor a fa neè Nyúè, Nyúè aè ye leè' aègho a ñwáè naè wáá. Weèe aè láè mmir ba mbenduè bláá Jisoès ce a m ñwañshi, yuu ce bláá anaè vi táá aètu mo yi caèa yuu ce bláá Ábáèl vi m táá aètu mo.	to Jesus, the mediator of a new covenant, and to the blood of sprinkling that speaks better than that of Abel.
E fúr Baèrabaès embe shañ, a fa neè woweèe, a laêa, a lip Jisoès neè yáánsoè. A ka' lïìp wáá, a fa ená a taa ye mbe kïìntaa.	Then he released to them Barabbas, but Jesus he flogged and delivered to be crucified.
Wáè ka' suñ buu ca neè bfúr enjep Jisos Kraâis baná aè yu ñwáè rfaâ' mboèñmboñ neè Jisoès, a ce duèñshi ená aè ce nyañ yoè nyor neè blaèa ce vi kuèu rbyemïì, ker ba ryá'nïû rboèñboñ ce wáè ku táá njo naè.	If you instruct the brothers of these things, you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus, nourished in the words of the faith, and of the good doctrine which you have followed.
Beèe mo' a ba a Pol aèbee, a byemi. Beèe mo' efa beèe ca aè m ba Daèyonishoès ce e m ba ñwáè embe rcuteè AÈropagoès anaè, ker ba njeñwáè ce a m ce too ená Damáreès, ker ba beèe mo'.	But certain men joined with him, and believed, among whom also was Dionysius the Areopagite, and a woman named Damaris, and others with them.
Nyor ce bòni Siŋkɛ,seemòʼ tu zhi be luu ye.	Singke is getting weak, may be she will be attacked by headache.
E ka' laèa wa'a, msaèasïì mi ku lo ye efa nyoèr, e ba nrara.	When he had said this, immediately the leprosy departed from him, and he was made clean.
AÈmboè beèe magoèr a m ba ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep njobeè' nteèetu ñwáè moè'sir naè, yi yu foñ ená beèe magoèr a be ba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njobeè' ñwáè moè'sir aè m yu'ni neè Nyúè.	For as through the one man's disobedience many were made sinners, even so through the obedience of the one, many will be made righteous.
E m laèa neè woweèe wááwá enáê, “Ñwáè aè ka' ce koèñ aè rvúè fa máâ mbuèu, baná ñgaèñ kani yïì nyor, byá' yi kïìntaa aè mnoèñ wááwá, ce vú fa máâ mbuèu,	"He said to all, ""If anyone desires to come after me, let him deny himself, take up his cross, and follow me."
Baná, tá Nyúè ce e ke fa beèe cumúnyañ njep ntee, fa weèe buu bboèñboñ tá weèe bo geèe buu ce e ce koèñ ená weèe aè ba geèe. Tá e fa' njep viseèe mntee, gee tá seèe ba njáèá beèe ce e koèñ ená seèe aè ba ba, aè ñger Jisos Kraêis. Tá beèe a ku'si Jisos Kraâis nfeseè. Yi yu wa'a.	make you complete in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is well pleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ, to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.
Yi loè gee ye, e gwe aè nsheè, bdúdú' vi fúú ye aè cuèu, e ce kúr msoèñ, tee mbaè yáá. Máè laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yoè buu máná a fúr yú' anaè, woweèe a moo laèr.”	"and wherever it seizes him, it throws him down, and he foams at the mouth, and grinds his teeth, and wastes away. I asked your disciples to cast it out, and they weren't able."""
Máè yá yuu mo' yi feeseè rdip rgoèr ce a geèe neè glaâs ce a fïìñshi mor aè múè mo. Máè yá beèe ce a m so nyaèa ba blañ nyaèa caè, ba nombaè rlii nyaèa anaè aèmboè a tááte aèwaâa rdip rgoèr a túr mluñ Nyúè mbaè mmboè.	I saw something like a sea of glass mixed with fire, and those who overcame the beast, his image, and the number of his name, standing on the sea of glass, having harps of God.
Máè m geèe wa'a njobeè' máè m koèñ máná weèe byemi ba njo' ñger Nyúè, ke' ba ba njo' bfee ñwáè ka'.	that your faith wouldn't stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.
E fyá' mbekïì, a beesi enáê, “M ce yá aèmboè beèe a ce jáèshi, a ba aèmboè bce wa'a.”	"He looked up, and said, ""I see men; for I see them like trees walking."""
AÈ ka' ba aè mú ñgaèptú', e ker du mbe Ndaèp Nyúè. Beèe wááwá a du a yá ye mbo. E cu aè nsheè a ce yá'ni woweèe.	Now very early in the morning, he came again into the temple, and all the people came to him. He sat down, and taught them.
Buu bbebep vi be kuè' goèr, tá rkoèñnïì beèe magoèr li wánïî.	Because iniquity will be multiplied, the love of many will grow cold.
Wowèe a be fʉ vʉ̀ àyàŋsè.	They will come tomorrow.
Wɛ̀ koni mbàa à laʼ mɛ̀.	If youʼve got money, then pay me.
Mmbañruè a baa ca a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Beâe aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, weèe aè táá a ce keè' ba ká mbe buèu? Jisoès ce Nyúè aè loèr ye a du aègho mbe buèu na, e be keè kúti aè njáèá njïì weèe aè yá ye e ce duè na.”	"who also said, ""You men of Galilee, why do you stand looking into the sky? This Jesus, who was received up from you into the sky will come back in the same way as you saw him going into the sky."""
Kúr beèe anaè a beesïì a laa neè ye enáê, “Hábá, ñwáè ce e ce roèo aè ryú wáè a nda? Yú' nyúèrkaè' yi yu njep wáè.”	"The multitude answered, ""You have a demon! Who seeks to kill you?"""
E ka' naèti embe dïì' ce e ba ce geèe rloo naè kúti, a yá ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ce buumi. E laa neè Pitaè enáê, “Baná aède' weèe aè ke' ba cu mbekïì tá seèe ce keè'ni aèmboè awaè moè'sir ka' a?	"He came to the disciples, and found them sleeping, and said to Peter, ""What, couldn't you watch with me for one hour?"
Jisos Kraâis aè m tuu máè ená m du baptir beèe ka', e m tuu máè ba ená m du fe'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ. Máè m ce feè'shi nsuñ ca ba neè bfee wa ka'. Máè m geèe wa'a tá ñger efa rkwe ce Jisos Kraâis aè m kwe mbe kïìntaa yi bo buu efa ryáátïì ka'.	For Christ sent me not to baptize, but to preach the Good News--not in wisdom of words, so that the cross of Christ wouldn't be made void.
M be maè'shi weèe neè ye tu ka'. M be duè kúti vúè yá weèe.	I will not leave you orphans. I will come to you.
Yi yu ená Jisoès ce e ke geèe beèe a ba brara aè bsii Nyúè, ker ba beèe ce e ke geèe woweèe a ba brara anaè, a ku túr taèr moè'sir. A mbuèu ce rïìtu yi ce koo Jisoès aè rtoo woweèe ená bfúr vi ka'.	For both he who sanctifies and those who are sanctified are all from one, for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brothers,
E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe fa bepsi nshe káè mdip, káè bce ka', caar tá weèr fa mncoèo aè mnsaèpsi beèe ce a ce faè' neè yeèr Nyúè.”	"saying, ""Don't harm the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, until we have sealed the bondservants of our God on their foreheads!"""
Jisoès aè m duè, a ka' baè' aè múè mla' ce mi m ba aègee rla' Sisaèriyaè Fileèpaêi, a bipshi neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Beèe a ce laèa ená Muu Ñwáè yu ba nda?”	"Now when Jesus came into the parts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, ""Who do men say that I, the Son of Man, am?"""
Bcor aè ñgoâñ Áshaè wááwá vi caè'ni weèe. AÈkwilaè ba Prïûskaè ker ba beèe ce a ke niñ cor mbe waâp ndaèp a caè'ni weèe se aè rlii Tataê.	The assemblies of Asia greet you. Aquila and Priscilla greet you much in the Lord, together with the assembly that is in their house.
Máâ ke yoèñshi yaè Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá ce m ce kwaè'shi aèmboè weèe.	I thank my God whenever I remember you,
Beèe anaè a ba rïìñ ená buu ce weèr ce sañ neè weèe aè mñwaè' njo' weèr yu aèfo ka' naè vi yu jáá efa vïì ce weèr be geèe aè nfeè' ce weèr aè vúè a yá weèe naè ka'.	Let such a person consider this, that what we are in word by letters when we are absent, such are we also in deed when we are present.
Yu ba njo' Jisos Kraâis ca ce Nyúè aè m ce weèr ená weèr ba yïì beèe. E ke geèe buu wááwá ba aèmboè e láè ená e be geèe.	in whom also we were assigned an inheritance, having been foreordained according to the purpose of him who works all things after the counsel of his will;
Dù nè àmbùu ye.	All of you should go after him.
ntee yi fa yaèñse bu' weèe, káè weèe fa yaèñse tuè'te njobeè' beèe moè' a ce laèa ená noèñ Tata anaè yi yu aètútú ka'. Seemoè' káè aè laèa ñwáè ce e ce suñ beèe buu ce Yú' Rara yi geèe e riñ áè, káè ñwáè ce e ce feè'shi ba blaâa Nyúè áè, káè beèe mo' a ce laèa ená weèr aè sañ ñwaè' áè,	not to be quickly shaken in your mind, nor yet be troubled, either by spirit, or by word, or by letter as from us, saying that the day of Christ had come.
AÈde' beèe a fa' neè ye aèmboè e buu lá buu wa' ka', njobeè' ku ba ba ye ce e ke geèe beèe a cu bteèe ce yoèñse, ker fa woweèe buu wááwá.	neither is he served by men's hands, as though he needed anything, seeing he himself gives to all life and breath, and all things.
Máè koo ñwaè' anaè emba yeâ boè, a ye. Máè ka' ye, yi lee kuè cuèu aèmboè bluè, a bep njep rbúè.	I took the little book out of the angel's hand, and ate it up. It was as sweet as honey in my mouth. When I had eaten it, my stomach was made bitter.
Pitaè aè ruu neè Yú' Rara aè nfeè' anaè, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñgaâa sa' to' ker ba bleebeèe!	"Then Peter, filled with the Holy Spirit, said to them, ""You rulers of the people, and elders of Israel,"
AÈmboè woweèe a m ce duè aèmbuèu mmbaè', a ker tuu rdip rbeer ca, cena yi m ba neè woweèe aèmboè njáèá baèptir moè' ce e m geèe woweèe a ba beèe Musïìs.	and were all baptized into Moses in the cloud and in the sea;
Pol aè laa enáê, “Káè yu nfeè' yïû múcaèr áè, káè yu yïû njïìsaèp áè, m ce loo neè Nyúè máná wáè ker ba beèe wááwá ce a ce yu' yuu ce m ce laèa ntïìni na, a ba ba aèmboè má máè yu na, ke' ba ñgaâa shañ foñ aèmboè máè ka'.”	"Paul said, ""I pray to God, that whether with little or with much, not only you, but also all that hear me this day, might become such as I am, except for these bonds."""
Mú nfeè' moè' aè ka' tuuse, Jisoès aè yá ñwáè ce e m geèe ye e luñ naè mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, a laa neè ye enáê, “Yáê, wáè luèñ efa yo yañ. Fa keèr geèe buu bbebep ka', faè dïì' ñgá' moè' goèr lo koni wáè caèa cena ka'.”	"Afterward Jesus found him in the temple, and said to him, ""Behold, you are made well. Sin no more, so that nothing worse happens to you."""
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, ba bleebeèe, a ku vúshi ye aè njáâá wa' foñ.	Likewise the chief priests also mocking, with the scribes, the Pharisees, and the elders, said,
M be yu' nyor neè njáèá ñwáè ca, ke' ba ba neè yaè nyor ka'. Yuu ce aède' m yu' nyor aègho neè yaè nyor ku ba wa bgoè'sïì caè'caè'.	On behalf of such a one I will boast, but on my own behalf I will not boast, except in my weaknesses.
Yuu yi ka' yááti aèwañ yi kútïì ba ba yuu ce aè rraa. A mbuèu ce a laèa enáê, “Wáè ce aè ce buumi, lá' efa mmirloè, fúú efa rkwe, tá rraa Kraâis li sañ mbe wáâ nduè.”	"Therefore he says, ""Awake, you who sleep, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you."""
M be gheèter tatap seê, ka' m ka' kwe, tá weèe bo ku ce kuushi buu ca aè nfeè' wááwá.	Yes, I will make every effort that you may always be able to remember these things even after my departure.
Woweèe a rïìñ seè'ni ená buu wááwá ce m túr, vi loè ba ese wáè.	Now they have known that all things whatever you have given me are from you,
a ce yá boèñboñ ená weèe yu ñwaè' ce aè sañ ba Jisos Kraêis, a ka' tuu weèr aègho. Ñwaè' ca yu ñwaè' ce a sañ ba neè mdip ñwaè' ka'. A sañ ba neè Yú' Nyúâ nteèe. A sañ ba mbe luâr mbáèmbár ka', a sañ ba njep mntee beèe.	being revealed that you are a letter of Christ, served by us, written not with ink, but with the Spirit of the living God; not in tablets of stone, but in tablets that are hearts of flesh.
Yoo zhi ku tɛɛte àbee.	My goats have escaped.
Bbyeèñge a baa a be keè ce goè' baa aèbee, tá a lor moè', ma'shi mo'.	"There will be two grinding grain together. One will be taken, and the other will be left."""
AÈde' ñgoèñ a baa weèe ka'. Woweèe a baèa yi máè njobeè' m ce suñ woweèe ená woweèe a ce geèe buu bbebep.	The world can't hate you, but it hates me, because I testify about it, that its works are evil.
Beèe anaè a ka' yá ncoèo ce Jisoès aè m duèñshi na, a laa enáê, “Neè mini-ñwáè, ñwáè ca yu ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè ce a m laèa ená e be keè vúè njep ñgoèñ naè.”	"When therefore the people saw the sign which Jesus did, they said, ""This is truly the prophet who comes into the world."""
Baná ñwáè rbyemïì aè ka' túr byepkúú mbe yeâ ndaèp, e fyá' aè byepkúú anaè. E fa láè ntáèr ca mbenduè cor ka', tá cor bo fyá' aè byepkúú ce a yu byepkúú neè mini-ñwáè.	If any man or woman who believes has widows, let them relieve them, and don't let the assembly be burdened; that it might relieve those who are widows indeed.
Yi yu ba ená btañshïì ce a ce tañshi njep feè' njep feè' anaè, vi geèe beèe a kuushi yaèp buu bbebep,	But in those sacrifices there is a yearly reminder of sins.
Ñwáè ka' laa wa'a, m beesïì mánáê, “Yuu wááwá ce wáè ka' ce geèe, káè aè ce ye ye áè, káè aè ce no no áè, geèe ba aè njáèá njïì ce beèe mo' a ka' yá, tá woweèe a bo kuè'si Nyúè.”	Whether therefore you eat, or drink, or whatever you do, do all to the glory of God.
Woweèe a ka' loèr ku' nfeè', seèesi yuu ce a be geèe, Pitaè aè natïì mbekïì a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Bfúr waê, weèe rïìñ ená aè m ba efa rkáè', Nyúè aè ce máè tá beèe enje jáá a bo yu' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ eku máâ cuèu, byemi.	"When there had been much discussion, Peter rose up and said to them, ""Brothers, you know that a good while ago God made a choice among you, that by my mouth the nations should hear the word of the Good News, and believe."
“Tá buu bo ba yáánïì neè wáè, tá aè cu aè ñgoèñ ca njïìsaèp.”	that it may be well with you, and you may live long on the earth.
Máè byemi neè Nyúè, a ce keè' aèmboè woweèe foñ a byemi a ce keè' ená beâe bboèñboñ ba beâe bbebep a be keè fúú efa rkwe naè.	having hope toward God, which these also themselves look for, that there will be a resurrection of the dead, both of the just and unjust.
Ñwáè wááwá fa aèmboè e kwaè'shi enjep yeâ ntee aè rfa. E fa, e fa ce de'ñger káè fa njobeè' a taèa ye taèa ka' njobeè' Nyúè koèñ ñwáè ce e ce fa neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè.	Let each man give according as he has determined in his heart; not grudgingly, or under compulsion; for God loves a cheerful giver.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa enáê, “Yuu ce aède' weèe gee yi yu ená weèe byemi neè ñwáè ce e tuu máè.”	"Jesus answered them, ""This is the work of God, that you believe in him whom he has sent."""
E laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñkoosimnse ce e yu njep máâ ntee yu yïì ce aède' e ku yú máè. Cu neè mbena ce ke'nïî.”	"He said to them, ""My soul is exceedingly sorrowful, even to death. Stay here, and watch."""
Ñwáè Farïìsi moè' aè laèa neè Jisoès ená a ye a du yeñger. Jisoès aè du a niñ mbe ndaèp mbe ñwáè anaè, a cu, tá a ye a bo yeñger.	One of the Pharisees invited him to eat with him. He entered into the Pharisee's house, and sat at the table.
Bkaŋ bwee bvi yû?	Where are your pans?
Bfúr waê, baná seèe yu boo njeñwáè ce e yu ñkwaèa naè ka', seèe yu ba boo njeñwáè ce e yu ñkwaèa ka' naè.	So then, brothers, we are not children of a handmaid, but of the free woman.
A sañ mbe ñwaè' mncir ce Nyúè aè m fa neè Musïìs enáê, “Fa kur cuèu naè' ce e ce bu' msañ ka'.” Nyúè aè m ce laèa buu ca a ke' ce laèa ba aèmboè naè' ka'.	"For it is written in the law of Moses, ""You shall not muzzle an ox while it treads out the grain."" Is it for the oxen that God cares,"
AÈ ka' ba aè nyúè taar anaè, Jisoès aè waa enáê, “ÁÈloêi, ÁÈloêi, Lama Saèbaètanïì”, ce e yu enáê, “Yaè Nyúè, yaè Nyúè, wáè leèse máè njoká?”	"At the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, ""Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani?"" which is, being interpreted, ""My God, my God, why have you forsaken me?"""
M ce yoèñshi Nyúè ená e geèe Taitoès aè koñ aè rjaè' weèe aèmboè wer weèr foñ aè koèñ aè rjaè' naè.	But thanks be to God, who puts the same earnest care for you into the heart of Titus.
Tee mrùʼ anà fa mɛ̀ bɛr.	Reduce that wine and give me the remaining.
Woweèe a m bipshi neè ye enáê, “Ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a ce laèa ená AÈlajaè be vúè entombïì njoká?”	"They asked him, saying, ""Why do the scribes say that Elijah must come first?"""
AÈmboè e m ce kúti anaè, yi m ba ená e be kuè duè ba njïû aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè.	He needed to pass through Samaria.
Yi yu ba ená máè koni yuu ce máè ce roèo aè rkonïì naè ka', a ke' ba ená máè buu faèa dúèdúè ka'. M ku bii gheèter ce duè kuèntombïì máná m bo koni yuu anaè, ce yu yuu ce Jisos Kraâis aè koo máè mba yeâ boè aètu mo.	Not that I have already obtained, or am already made perfect; but I press on, if it is so that I may take hold of that for which also I was taken hold of by Christ Jesus.
M be keè geèe buu bghagha' mbe buèu, duèñshi mncoèo njep ñgoèñ na. Bláá vi be keè ba, tá mor yi ba, tá ku' njemor yi dú'.	I will show wonders in the sky above, and signs on the earth beneath; blood, and fire, and billows of smoke.
Vi m túr mñkuèñ aèmboè mñkuèñ nyobsaa wa'a. Vi m tashi beèe neè mñkuèñ anaè, a fa woweèe ñgá' aègho aè mñwáá taê.	They have tails like those of scorpions, and stings. In their tails they have power to harm men for five months.
E kupse mntaʼ embe zhǐi ndàp.	He has replaced the chairs of his house.
Buu ca vi m koni ba aè rla' Bátanïì ce li yu neèñguu rdip Jodaèn. A faèdïì' Joân aè m ce baèptir beèe.	These things were done in Bethany beyond the Jordan, where John was baptizing.
Zhìi ndap tɛɛ seryɛɛ na.	His house is across there.
AÈde' ñwáè konïì ba njáèá sá' ká ce e ka' túr buu enjep ñgoèñ na wááwá, bá li ryoèñ?	For what does it profit a man, to gain the whole world, and forfeit his life?
a ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèfo.	There they preached the Good News.
Wɛ̌ ghor àgho gòr.	You have insisted with it too much.
Ñwáè ce e ka' táá tatap aè nfeè' ce rmoèoshïì li vúè neè ye, baná ñgaèñ yu ñwáè rboâñtu. Rmoèoshïì li ka' vú neè ye, e so, baná Nyúè be fa ye ryoèñ ce yu blaè' ce Nyúè aè m kaè' ená e be fa neè beèe wááwá ce a koèñ ye.	Blessed is the man who endures temptation, for when he has been approved, he will receive the crown of life, which the Lord promised to those who love him.
Loèr neè nfeè' efa rkoèñ mbaèa. Maè'shi tá buu ce wáè túr naè vi ghááte wáè, njobeè' Nyúè aè laèa ená aède' e ma'shïì wáè aè nfeè' moè' ka'. E be jaè' wáè aè nfeè' wááwá.	"Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, ""I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you."""
Ka' e m ba ñwáâ nrara a ba ñwáâ nyáánïì wa'a, weèe aè m máñni ye, a laa neè Pailáèt ená e fúr ba ñwáâ nyúshi beèe embe shañ, fa neè weèe.	But you denied the Holy and Righteous One, and asked for a murderer to be granted to you,
Muu ca yu mbòŋ.	This child is beautiful.
Nfò e ke yàp njàp sê.	Nfor usually eats soup very irrationally.
Woweèe a m ce roèo Jisoès, a ká' a ce bipshi fa waâp mú mbe Ndaèp Nyúè enáê, “Weèe ce kwaè'shi ená ká? E be vúè ñkaè' ca káè e be vúè ka'?”	"Then they sought for Jesus and spoke one with another, as they stood in the temple, ""What do you think--that he isn't coming to the feast at all?"""
Bzhɛ̀ɛ à sòŋ yaa mbàa.	Thieves stole my money mysteriously.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè buu Nyúè ce Jus a byemi aègho, máè m faè' neè ya ntee wááwá aè rfa ñgá' neè ñgaâa coêr. Baná aèmboè mncir Jus anaè vi yu, máè m bú' mo' ka'.	concerning zeal, persecuting the assembly; concerning the righteousness which is in the law, found blameless.
Yi yu neè rïìtu-ñwáè aè rlaèa aèmboè buu ce woweèe a ce geèe aè bsúèti.	For the things which are done by them in secret, it is a shame even to speak of.
Rlee ñwáè li yu aèmboè mor, a ba aèmboè ñgoèñ ce yi ruu neè buu bbebep, a ce bepsi ñwáè dúèdúè. AÈde' li ku too ñwáè, ñgaèñ yá mluè caa kwe. Mor Sataèn a yuu ce e ke cúè' mor ca.	And the tongue is a fire. The world of iniquity among our members is the tongue, which defiles the whole body, and sets on fire the course of nature, and is set on fire by Gehenna.
Jisoès aè ka' ku fúú embe keñ, beèe a yá ye, a rïîñ.	When they had come out of the boat, immediately the people recognized him,
Yi yu foñ ená viseèe bta a m ce fa ñgá' neè seèe njo' faèa ce seèe aè geèe, seèe yu'nïì neè woweèe. Baná yi yu boèñboñ ená seèe yu'ni neè yiseèe ta ce e yu mbe buèu boèñboñ seê, tá seèe bo koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè.	Furthermore, we had the fathers of our flesh to chasten us, and we paid them respect. Shall we not much rather be in subjection to the Father of spirits, and live?
E lor kúè a gee ñgwaèa aègho, a juu beèe anaè aègho, a ker juu yap njeèe ba yap naè' embe Ndaèp Nyúè. E m buète btábuèr ese beèe ce a m ce kupse mbaèa naè, a da'si yap mbaèa anaè aè nsheè.	He made a whip of cords, and threw all out of the temple, both the sheep and the oxen; and he poured out the changers' money, and overthrew their tables.
Nahoèr aè ba muu Sáruèk, Sáruèk aè ba muu Rugaè, Rugaè aè ba muu Páláèk, Páláèk aè ba muu Ábáèr, Ábáèèr aè ba muu Shálaè,	the son of Serug, the son of Reu, the son of Peleg, the son of Eber, the son of Shelah,
M rïìñ máná Hároèd ye ye aè yá ená e geèe yuu bebep ka'. A mbuèu ce e kúsi ye neè seèe. Yi yu rara ená e geèe yuu mo' ce aède' a yú ye aètu mo ka'.	Neither has Herod, for I sent you to him, and see, nothing worthy of death has been done by him.
tá ñwáè moè' bo rïìñ yuu ce weèe aè fa ka'. Weèe aè ka' gee wa'a, baná yeè Ta ce e ke yá buu ce beèe a geèe aè bsúèti, be laè' weèe.	so that your merciful deeds may be in secret, then your Father who sees in secret will reward you openly.
Nkòni efagho zhi yu ba fɛ?	Take that basket and give me.
Máè yá byú' bbebep vïû btaar, vi feeseè bja'. Vi m fúú ekuè cuèu nyaèa ce e m feese nyaèaroè naè, ba nyaèa ce e m fúú enjep roè naè, ker ba ekuè cuèu ñwáè ce e mú ce nya' mnde' ená e yu ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè naè.	I saw coming out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet, three unclean spirits, something like frogs;
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' e túr njáèá ntee ce aède' yi gee ye e gee yuu bebep, e riñ foñ yuu yáánïì ce aède' e gee neè beèe ce a ku ba aènji, a ce daè'.	The high priest can deal gently with those who are ignorant and going astray, because he himself is also surrounded with weakness.
AÈde' seèe laa seeká aèmboè Abraèham ce e yu tar neè seèe ce seèe yu Juês?	What then will we say that Abraham, our forefather, has found according to the flesh?
Jisoès aè naa nyor mbekïì a laa enáê, “Njeñwáè, woweèe a yuê? Ñwáè moè' aè geèe yuu neè wáè ka' a?”	"Jesus, standing up, saw her and said, ""Woman, where are your accusers? Did no one condemn you?"""
Viseèe mnyor ce vi ke kwe búte na, vi be keè kuè kúti ba a njáèá mnyor ce vi ke kwe ka', búte ka'.	For this corruptible must put on incorruption, and this mortal must put on immortality.
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba aè rla' Sisaèriyaè ce li rlii li m ba ená Koèniyuès. E m ba tu neè kúr bsoogáè ce a m ba rjeèe. A m ce too kúr bsoogáè anaè ená bsoogáè enje Italeè.	Now there was a certain man in Caesarea, Cornelius by name, a centurion of what was called the Italian Regiment,
E tòo kòʼ mbà rleemor.	He has roasted coco yam right inside the fire.
Buu ce vi túr myoèñ vi túr nyor njáèá moè'sir ka'. Nyor ñwáè yu jáá efa yïì nyaèa, nyor siñ aè ba jáá efa yïì nca.	All flesh is not the same flesh, but there is one flesh of men, another flesh of animals, another of fish, and another of birds.
Baná weèe kansuèr weèe aè ba cep ntuu neè tu yïû goèr ená e vú neè Pol fa neè weèe, aèmboè weèe ce lá koèñ aè rfyá' njep múè vi mnsa' boèñboñ wa'a. Weèr aè tami nyor aè ryú ye tá e ka' vúè baè'.”	"Now therefore, you with the council inform the commanding officer that he should bring him down to you tomorrow, as though you were going to judge his case more exactly. We are ready to kill him before he comes near."""
Beèe ce a m duè a Pol weèe naè, a m duè caar a du a ma'shi ye aè rla' Atáèns. A ka' ce kúti, Pol aè laa neè woweèe ená a du laa neè Timotïì ba Silaès ená a vú cárcár vú yá ye.	But those who escorted Paul brought him as far as Athens. Receiving a commandment to Silas and Timothy that they should come to him very quickly, they departed.
Kuushi neè foñ ená bcïìndap Nyúè ce a m kani efa rcu mbe dïì' ce Nyúè aè m fa woweèe, a ma'shi yap dïì' anaè naè, Nyúè aè ma' woweèe njep dïì' ce ku ba ba túè'nji tá woweèe a ku noèñ njo neè bshañ kuè mkoo caar duè baè' aè noâñ goèr ce Nyúè be sa' ñgoèñ naè.	Angels who didn't keep their first domain, but deserted their own dwelling place, he has kept in everlasting bonds under darkness for the judgment of the great day.
A be toʼsi bʉbʉ ntìni.	They will announce the chiefʼs death today.
Judaès aè natïì a duê, a yá beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba beèe ce a m ba btu neè beèe ce a m ce keè'ni Ndap Nyúè, a seesi a woweèe aèmboè aède' e gee ka' fyeni Jisoès neè woweèe.	He went away, and talked with the chief priests and captains about how he might deliver him to them.
Jus ce aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a m tuu beèe moè' efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba beèe Lávïì ená a du yá Joân, bipshi neè ye enáê, “A wáè nda?”	"This is John's testimony, when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him, ""Who are you?"""
Weèe aè be riñ ñwáè moè' efa múè ñgaâa rsa', káè beèe Farïìsi áè, ce e byemi neè ye a?	Have any of the rulers believed in him, or of the Pharisees?
Ka' yi yu wa'a, ñwáè moè' aè ka' suñ wáè ená byee ce aè ce ye anaè yu byee ce a tañshi tañshïì aègho, aè fa ye ka'. Fa ye ka' njobeè' ñwáè anaè ka' yá aèmboè aè ce ye, e kwa'shïì yi ená wáè geèe ba yuu bebep.	"But if anyone says to you, ""This was offered to idols,"" don't eat it for the sake of the one who told you, and for the sake of conscience. For ""the earth is the Lord's, and all its fullness."""
Muu nsuènsuè ca aè ka' yu' wa'a, a sá seê, a nati a du njobeè' e m túr ku' buu seê.	But when the young man heard the saying, he went away sad, for he was one who had great possessions.
Woweèe a m koo Jisoès, a du aègho mbe ndaèp ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì. Pitaè aè m ce duè a waâp mbuèu, a ba yi encaèñ.	They seized him, and led him away, and brought him into the high priest's house. But Peter followed from a distance.
Tata Jisoès aè ka' laèa neè woweèe wa'a, Nyúè aè lor ye a du aègho mbe buèu. E ka' baè' mbo a cu aè bo maè' Nyúè.	So then the Lord, after he had spoken to them, was received up into heaven, and sat down at the right hand of God.
Woowèe a ba nyɛɛ njep nduunjì à fèʼ ce wèr à ba sɛ̂.	They suddenly appeared on the road by the time we were tired.
AÈmboè yi yu seè'ni na, aède' a ku koo seèe aètu ñgá' ce e koni ntïìni na. Yi ka' koni wa'a, seèe túr yuu aè rlaèa ka'.”	"For indeed we are in danger of being accused concerning this day's riot, there being no cause. Concerning it, we wouldn't be able to give an account of this commotion."""
Yuu ce ñwáè aè bi, yu yïû ñwáè. Yuu ce yú' yi bi, aè ba yïû yú'.	That which is born of the flesh is flesh. That which is born of the Spirit is spirit.
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Tata Nyúè aè m laèa enáê, ‘M be tuusi beèe ce a ce laèa li moè' jáá, tá a du suñ wa blaèa neè yaè beèe. Ka' m be geèe wa'a, yaè beèe ca a be yu' yuu ce máè laèa neè woweèe ka'.’ ”	"In the law it is written, ""By men of strange languages and by the lips of strangers I will speak to this people. Not even thus will they hear me, says the Lord."""
Weèe yu aè múè boo blee vïû Nyúè, ce Nyúè aè m sañ map mlii mbe ñwaè' embe buèu naè. Weèe táá ba aè bsii Nyúè ce e ke sa' beèe wááwá. Me myoèñ mi yu aè múè myoèñ beâe mini ce a geèe woweèe a ba yáánïì naè.	to the general assembly and assembly of the firstborn who are enrolled in heaven, to God the Judge of all, to the spirits of just men made perfect,
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Maè'shi tá a nyañ boo entoèmbïì njobeè' yi boèñ ená a lor byee boo ma' neè ñgwe ka'.”	"But Jesus said to her, ""Let the children be filled first, for it is not appropriate to take the children's bread and throw it to the dogs."""
Ryá'nïì mini ca yu ryá'nïì ce li ghááte a ke' ba jáá efa Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ce Nyúè aè fa mba máâ mmboè ka'. Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca ce geèe beèe a ce rïìñ foèo Nyúè ce e yu ñwáè bghoèo.	according to the Good News of the glory of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.
Ma rla' rgoèr caè li tenïì nyor bdïû' btaar, mla' ce mi m ba aè bto' wááwá enjep ñgoèñ na mi gweñgeèr. Nyúè aè m kuushi ma rla' rgoèr ce a m ce too ená Babiloèn naè, li rshentee ba yïì ñgá' aè vú mbenduè rla' ca. Nyúè aè m geèe rla' ca li no li rshentee ce li m ba njep yeâ ndoñ aèmboè ndoñ mruâ' mtatap wa'a.	The great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell. Babylon the great was remembered in the sight of God, to give to her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath.
Ŋgǎa lɛ̀pshi ŋkòʼ a ke tòʼ bcɛ̀ʼ.	Those who beckon the big mask juju usually tie a piece of cloth around their waist.
Ca yi m gha' woweèe seê, woweèe a bááñgeèr, a laa enáê, “To beèe ce a laèa na yu beâe Galeèleê!	"They were all amazed and marveled, saying to one another, ""Behold, aren't all these who speak Galileans?"
Nfeè' aè ka' tuuse aèmboè awaè moè'sir wa'a, ñwáè moè' aè ker laa tatap enáê, “Neè mini-ñwáè, ñwáè ca aè m ba a ye. E yu ñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê.”	"After about one hour passed, another confidently affirmed, saying, ""Truly this man also was with him, for he is a Galilean!"""
Felep aè ka' loè a ku yá ená e yu aè rla' AÈsotoès, a ka' ce caèa, a ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aè mla' wááwá caar a du a ba' Sisaèriyaè.	But Philip was found at Azotus. Passing through, he preached the Good News to all the cities, until he came to Caesarea.
À be dù làa nè yoo cùu.	You will go and say it yourself.
AÈ m ba neètú' ce túè' be raa tá Hároèd fúr ye embe shañ sa' naè, Pitaè aè noñ mbetar bsoogáè a baa, a cúú ye neè bkwaâñ bbaa aè mkoo. Bsoogáè ce a m ce keè'ni shañ a m táá aè cuâu ñka' shañ.	The same night when Herod was about to bring him out, Peter was sleeping between two soldiers, bound with two chains. Guards in front of the door kept the prison.
Ñwáè ce e ka' táá tatap, caa rmoèoshïì baná m be fa ñgaèñ bcáâ' bbúú aè nyor, keè' siñsi li rlii embe ñwaè' ryoèñ ka'. M be táá kuèntombïì neè yaè Ta ba vi bcïìndap, laèa aèwañ máná ñwáè anaè yu yaè.	He who overcomes will be arrayed in white garments, and I will in no way blot his name out of the book of life, and I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.
Mɛ̀ barni wɛ̀ à ntaŋ ce wɛ̀ fa anà.	I have supported you for the suggestion youʼve given.
Saimúèn aè ka' yá ená ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a láè mmbo mbenduè beèe, woweèe a konïì Yú' Rara, e vú neè mbaèa ená e bo fa neè woweèe,	Now when Simon saw that the Holy Spirit was given through the laying on of the apostles' hands, he offered them money,
Weèe aè ka' tá foèosi beèe ce a geèe buu bbebep neè weèe ka', yeè Ta embe buèu foosïì weèe yeè buu bbebep ce weèe aè geèe foñ ka'.	But if you don't forgive men their trespasses, neither will your Father forgive your trespasses.
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a m loè embe rtuèu Oleèf a du aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm. AÈ rloè embe rtuèu Oleèf duè Jáèrusaláèm e ku ba aèmboè mar moè'sir.	Then they returned to Jerusalem from the mountain called Olivet, which is near Jerusalem, a Sabbath day's journey away.
AÈmboè weèe aè rïìñ ená buu wááwá vi be keè bú na, baná njáèá ñgeèe ce weèe aè ba ce geèe yu njáèá yïû ká? Weèe aè ba fa weêe mnyor neè Nyúè, geèe ba ñgeèe ce Nyúè koèñ.	Therefore since all these things will be destroyed like this, what kind of people ought you to be in holy living and godliness,
AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' e seè'ni ce yu ba mnoèñ elúèsimbuèu, Nyúè aè laa neè seèe njïì enjep muu yïì. Nyúè aè m geèe ñgoèñ ca wááwá ba njïì enjep muu yïì anaè. Nyúè aè m ce ye tá e bo fa buu wááwá mba yeâ mmboè.	has at the end of these days spoken to us by his Son, whom he appointed heir of all things, through whom also he made the worlds.
A m cáp ye, e ke' kúsïì ka'. A m fa ye ñgá', e ke' gee yuu mo' ka'. E m ku lá buu anaè ba mbe mmbo Nyúè ce e ke sa' mnsa' yáánïì.	Who, when he was cursed, didn't curse back. When he suffered, didn't threaten, but committed himself to him who judges righteously;
E m laèa enáê, “Loèr neè nfeè' neè ñgeèe ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir. Woweèe a ke koèñ aè ryar mñgaèbúlaè ce kar aègho, koñ ená beèe a ca'ni woweèe aè mntaa. Woweèe a niñ aè mndap mloo, ce ba mnta' beâe bgoèrgoèr, a baè' aè mñkaè', ce ba mnta' bboèñboñ.	"Beware of the scribes, who like to walk in long robes, and love greetings in the marketplaces, the best seats in the synagogues, and the best places at feasts;
Luke	Luêk	20	47	Woweèe a ke bo' byepkúú, ye yaèp buu wááwá, ce geèe mloo msaèsap aè rduèñshi neè beèe ená woweèe a rïìñ aè rloo seê. Yaèp ñgá' be keè ba goèr seê.”	who devour widows' houses, and for a pretense make long prayers: these will receive greater condemnation."
Weèr aè duèñshi ená weèr yu ñgaâa mfaè' neè Nyúè aè yer ñgeâe rara, ba aè buu Nyúè ce weèr aè rïìñ, ba aè njáèá njïì ce weèr ce kur ntee, ker ba foñ aè njáèá njïì ce weèr ce geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ neè beèe. Weèr aè ruusi ba neè Yú' Rara, a koñ beèe neè mini-ñwáè.	in pureness, in knowledge, in patience, in kindness, in the Holy Spirit, in sincere love,
AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' e seè'ni Nyúè aè gee weèe woweèe aè kútïì bkar njo' rkwe ce muu yïì ce e m ba ñwáè aè m kwe a seâe tuè naè. Nyúè aè m geèe wa'a, tá e bo tár weèe a yeâ bsii aèmboè yïì beèe ce a yu brara, a túr faèa ka'.	yet now he has reconciled in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and without blemish and blameless before him,
Yi yu mini ená weèr ce cu njep ñgoèñ na. Weèr ce cu njo wa'a, a ke' ce maè' bïìr ba aèmboè beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a ke maè' naè ka'.	For though we walk in the flesh, we don't wage war according to the flesh;
E mʉ lip ye, a tosi zhì nfur.	He beat him and increased the pain of his injury.
M táá mbetar. M ce koèñ máná máè ba maè'shi tunshe duè cu weèr Jisos Kraêis. Yïì anaè yi boèñ a caa rcu embe tunshe na.	But I am in a dilemma between the two, having the desire to depart and be with Christ, which is far better.
A nda e tɛɛ mbenjì ce nà?	Who is standing behind the tree?
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba fa waâp mú ce a m ce too ená Josáèf. Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a m ce too ye ená Baènabaès. Mbuèu efa rlii ca yu ená, ñwáè nfa ñger. E m ba ñwáè embe ndúè' Lávïì, a ba ñwáè ce a m bi ba aè to' Saiproès.	Joses, who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas (which is, being interpreted, Son of Encouragement), a Levite, a man of Cyprus by race,
Timotïì, ke'ni buu ce Nyúè aè fa mba wáâ mmboè na boèñboñ. Fa fa yo cuèu njep múè bde' bcicïì ba mnsár ce beèe a ce kwaè'shi ená yu bfee naè ka'.	Timothy, guard that which is committed to you, turning away from the empty chatter and oppositions of the knowledge which is falsely so called;
Ñwáè moè' aè ke' ba mbe buèu, káè njep ñgoèñ na, káè mbaè yir ce e m ghááte aè rbúèr ñwaè' anaè, fyá' mbo ka'.	No one in heaven above, or on the earth, or under the earth, was able to open the book, or to look in it.
Weèe aè m yu' aèmboè máè m suñ weèe máná m ce duè kúti yá weèe. Weèe aè ba koñ máè, weèe aè ba lu'shi ená m ce duè aè ryá Taèr, njobeè' e kuè' a caa máè.	You heard how I told you, 'I go away, and I come to you.' If you loved me, you would have rejoiced, because I said 'I am going to my Father;' for the Father is greater than I.
Pitaè aè ka' ce señ ená rlo ce e yá naè li ce laèa ba ená ká lá, beèe ce Koèniyuès aè m tuu naè a banïì vú a roo ndap yïì Saimúèn a yá, a táá njep cuèu ñka' ce a m sïìr ndap anaè aègho,	Now while Peter was very perplexed in himself what the vision which he had seen might mean, behold, the men who were sent by Cornelius, having made inquiry for Simon's house, stood before the gate,
Ñwaè' ca ce sañ máâ Pitaè ce m yu ñwáè ntuu Jisos Kraêis. M ce sañ neè beèe Nyúè ce a da'se a ba bkïìloè aè ñgoâñ Pontuès, ba Gaèláshaè, ba Kaèpaèdosïìyaè, ba Áshaè ker ba Bïìtinïìyaè.	Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, to the chosen ones who are living as foreigners in the Dispersion in Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, and Bithynia,
Lu'shi neè aè nfeè' wááwá,	Rejoice always.
A m laèa neè mñguu ca ená vi fa joèo yuu ce yi fúú enjep nsheè a ce kuè' ka'. A m maè'shi ená vi fa ñgá' ba neè beèe ce a m buu ncoèo Nyúè nje nsaèpsi.	They were told that they should not hurt the grass of the earth, neither any green thing, neither any tree, but only those people who don't have God's seal on their foreheads.
Jisoès aè m naètïû aè dïì' ce rla' Tayaè li m ba naè, a to'ni rla' Sidoèn, a caa Mla' ce Rúêú, a du a ba' aè rdip rgoèr ce aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê.	Again he departed from the borders of Tyre and Sidon, and came to the sea of Galilee, through the midst of the region of Decapolis.
Weèe fa maè'shi tá ye ntee yi ce fa weèe ñgá' aè rye nyaèa ce weèe a yuu efa ntaa ka'. Weèe fa kwaè'shi ená weèe ka' gee wa'a ba yuu bebep ka'.	Whatever is sold in the butcher shop, eat, asking no question for the sake of conscience,
Buu ca vi koni wa'a, tá yi bo kuè ghááte aèmboè a m sañ mbe yap ñwaè' mncir enáê, ‘A m baèa máè aè cicïì.’	But this happened so that the word may be fulfilled which was written in their law, 'They hated me without a cause.'
Yi ku ba wa'a neè yeè Ta ce e yu mbe buèu. E ce koèñ ená moè' efa boo bká' ca bú ka'.	Even so it is not the will of your Father who is in heaven that one of these little ones should perish.
E gwè jàmishòn njobèʼ e m ce dù ŋwàʼ kaʼ.	He failed the exams because was not going to school.
Nfeè' aè m káè' a ce gháá ce beèe Jus a ke ye Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap. Jisoès aè du aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm tá e bo ye ñkaè' anaè foñ.	The Passover of the Jews was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.
M be beèesi buu ce weèe aè m sañ a bipshi neè máè naè. Ñwáè aè ka' tá loèr ñgwa ka' yi ku ba yáánïì.	Now concerning the things about which you wrote to me: it is good for a man not to touch a woman.
Mɛ̀ ba deʼ ye e war.	I shouted at her and she cried.
Hároèd aè ka' yá Jisoès, a yu' rboèñ seê, njobeè' e m ce koèñ aè ryá ye ká' ese aè nfeè' njïìsaèp. E m yu' buu ce Jisoès aè m ce geèe, a ce koèñ aè ryá yuu ghagha' mo' ce e be geèe.	Now when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceedingly glad, for he had wanted to see him for a long time, because he had heard many things about him. He hoped to see some miracle done by him.
Njeŋwɛ̀ fa vʉ̀ mbena kaʼ njobèʼ ncɛ̀p à bàʼri mbo.	A woman should not come here because a juju has settled on this spot.
Bkar waê, m ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ce weèe yu bkïìloè a ker ba beèe ce a ce caèa njep ñgoèñ na caèa, ená weèe borni buu ce wee bláá vi luèute aè rgeèe, aè ba buu ce vi ke jepsi wee mntee ce weèe aè láè neè Nyúè.	Beloved, I beg you as foreigners and pilgrims, to abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul;
Wèe ce ghani ba mbàp a?	Are you hunting rats?
Yǎanà a nkapni.	That is a mystery.
Mɛ̀ dù a yɛ ye nèŋgòŋ.	I went and saw him actually.
Beâe aè rla' anaè a m fúú nto'nïì baa, beèe mo' a du aè ñgúè' yïì Juês, beèe mo' a du aè ñgúè' yïì ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès.	But the multitude of the city was divided. Part sided with the Jews, and part with the apostles.
E be siñsi map mñgoommir wááwá. Rkwe li be keèr ba aègho ka', ñkoosimnse ba aègho ka', rwar li ba aègho ka', ryañ li ba aègho ka', njobeè' buu brúèú aè mïì dúèdúè.”	"He will wipe away from them every tear from their eyes. Death will be no more; neither will there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain, any more. The first things have passed away."""
Bïìr ce weèe ce maè' weèe buu bbebep naè aè be ba' mbe dïì' ce weèe ma' wa'a kweñger ka'.	You have not yet resisted to blood, striving against sin;
AÈde' ñwáè konïì ba njáèá sá' ká, ce e ka' túr buu enjep ñgoèñ na wááwá, lo bá li ryoèñ? Yuu ce aède' ñwáè fa aètu li ryoèñ a ká?	For what will it profit a man, if he gains the whole world, and forfeits his life? Or what will a man give in exchange for his life?
AÈ yu nda, ka' sa' ñwáè rfaè' ñwáè moè'? Ñwáè ce aède' e laa ená ñwáè rfaè' aè geèe boèñboñ káè bebep áè, ku ba yïì masaè. E be gweè ka' njobeè' Tata túr ñger aè rgeèe ye tá e táá tatap.	Who are you who judge another's servant? To his own lord he stands or falls. Yes, he will be made to stand, for God has power to make him stand.
Cena yi ka' mïì, máè yá nyaâa mbembep moè' aèmboè e ce fúú enjep roè. Nyaèa anaè aè m túr btu saèambaê, a túr mdoñ rúêú. E m túr mtaa kúú mbe mdoñ anaè wááwá. A m sañ mlii mbe btu anaè a ce cáp ba Nyúè aègho.	Then I stood on the sand of the sea. I saw a beast coming up out of the sea, having ten horns and seven heads. On his horns were ten crowns, and on his heads, blasphemous names.
Tata aè beesïì a laa neè ye enáê, “Maataè, Maataè, mluè mi ce koo wáè aè buu magoèr,	"Jesus answered her, ""Martha, Martha, you are anxious and troubled about many things,"
Yàa taa à cɛ̀psi mbì fàdìʼ bèe a bo kèr zhɛ̀ɛ kaʼ.	His father has put medicine on the kola nut so that people would not steal again.
M ce suñ aèmboè ya tu, ñwáè ce e ce suñ aèmboè máè foñ yu yaè Ta ce e m tuu máè.”	"I am one who testifies about myself, and the Father who sent me testifies about me."""
Ŋgɛʼ à ba deʼ enɛ e zhɛɛ yuu, mɛ̀ cop ye.	Ngeh wanted to steal something, and I saw him.
Nyúè aè ka' coo, Jisoès weèe a fúú aè múè rla' anaè.	When evening came, he went out of the city.
Geèe neè buu wááwá neè rkoèñnïì-ñwáè.	Let all that you do be done in love.
Seèe ka' tá ba mini neè ye ka', aède' e kupse efa rba njáèá ñwáè ce e yu na ka'. E be kuè ba yi yu mini aè nfeè' wááwá.”	"If we are faithless, he remains faithful. He can't deny himself."""
Ñwáè aè ka' ce roèo aè rgeèe yuu bebep neè woweèe, baná mor yi be fúú eku waâp cuèu, toèo ñgaèñ. Baná ñwáè wááwá ce e ka' ce roèo aè rgeèe yuu bebep neè woweèe, baná ñgaèñ be kuè kwe.	If anyone desires to harm them, fire proceeds out of their mouth and devours their enemies. If anyone desires to harm them, he must be killed in this way.
Weèr aè m naèti yer a du entoèmbïì, a du a niñ mbe keñ ñgoèr a du aè rla' Asoès. Yi m ba ená weèr be baè' aèfo koo Pol mbe keñ. Pol aè m seèesi a woweèe wa'a njobeè' e m koèñ aè rduè aèfo neè mkuèu.	But we who went ahead to the ship set sail for Assos, intending to take Paul aboard there, for he had so arranged, intending himself to go by land.
Beèe wááwá a beesïì a laa enáê, “Maè'shi tá vi bláá vi ba mbe weâr tuè keèr ba mbe tu boo wer.”	"All the people answered, ""May his blood be on us, and on our children!"""
njobeè' muu waè ca aè m kwe a ker kúti nteèe, e m bú, a ker yááti.’ Woweèe a ka' geèe wa' wáá, a ká' a ce ye ñkaè'.	for this, my son, was dead, and is alive again. He was lost, and is found.' They began to celebrate.
Cuâu ñka' yïû yi'seè ba nduunjïì yïû yi'seè yi ce duè ba aè dïì' rcu ce nfeseè, beèe ce a ce yá yi, a ba múcaèr.	How narrow is the gate, and restricted is the way that leads to life! Few are those who find it.
Nfò à nòŋsi zhii ŋwàʼ mbendùu kìdàŋ.	Nfor has left his book on the bench.
Jisoès aè m fúú embe Ndaèp Nyúè anaè a du a cu aèwaâa roè.	On that day Jesus went out of the house, and sat by the seaside.
Beèe ce a ka' ke fúú efa rkwe entombïì baná woweèe a yu ñgaâa mboâñtu a ba beâe brara. Rkwe embenjïì li be joèo woweèe ka'. Woweèe a be ba ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì neè Nyúè ba Kraêis, sa' a Kraâis weèe aè bfeè' ncúèkïì.	Blessed and holy is he who has part in the first resurrection. Over these, the second death has no power, but they will be priests of God and of Christ, and will reign with him one thousand years.
Ñwáè aè ka' ba a weâe mú ce e túr bfee, a yi buu, baná li rcu rboèñboñ li be kuè ce duèñshi ená e túr bfee. E ka' ce cu wa'a, e ba múfáèá aè yi ñgeèe aèmboè ñwáè bfee aè ba ba.	Who is wise and understanding among you? Let him show by his good conduct that his deeds are done in gentleness of wisdom.
À ba koni kɛ ye?	What happened to him?
E la' mi mmbo mbe waâp nduè, a loo, a nati a duê.	He laid his hands on them, and departed from there.
Kuushi beèe ce a yu mbe shañ, koosimnse neè woweèe aèmboè wá wáè yu lá mbe shañ wa' foñ. Kwaè'shi aèmboè beèe ce a ce yá ñgá', njobeè' aè ku túr nyor foñ aèmboè woweèe.	Remember those who are in bonds, as bound with them; and those who are ill-treated, since you are also in the body.
Máâ tuu ye ená e vú yá weèe tá e bo suñ weèe aèmboè weèr yu, keèr fa weèe ñger foñ.	I am sending him to you for this very purpose, that he may know your circumstances and comfort your hearts,
Seèe rïìñ ená Nyúè aè fa mncir ca ba njo' beâe bboèñboñ ka'. E fa vi njo' beèe ce a teèe btu, a ce bú' mncir, ker ba beèe ce a ce yu'ni neè Nyúè ka', a ba ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep. E fa vi foñ njo' beèe ce yap ñgeèe yi yu rara ka', woweèe a ce jaèasi buu Nyúè. E fa vi njo' beèe ce a ce yúshi wap bta ba wap mmaê, ker ba beèe mo' foñ ce a yu ñgaâa nyúshi beèe.	as knowing this, that law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and insubordinate, for the ungodly and sinners, for the unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,
Jisoès aè laa yi yu neè ye enáê, “Kúsi saè' mbaè ruèu njobeè' ñwáè ce e co' saè', be keèe kuè kwe aè saè'.	"Then Jesus said to him, ""Put your sword back into its place, for all those who take the sword will die by the sword."
Seèe be keè kupse nfeè' moè'sir. Tá ñwáè ka' keè búèr rlir seèe aè kupse neè wáá. Be ba aè nfeè' elúèsimbuèu tá rsoèñ li laêa, tá buu ca koni. Li be keè laèa, tá beèe ce a m kweñger a fúú efa rkwe neè njáèá nyor ce aètaè e ke kwe ka', tá seèe ce a cu bteèe, kupse.	in a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trumpet. Yá neè ená wee blaèa vi yu bboèñboñ, a ker ce leèe aèmboè mgwañ wa'a. Ñwáè ka' bipshi yuu neè weèe, weèe gheteèr beesi ye aè njïû mboèñmboñ.	Let your speech always be with grace, seasoned with salt, that you may know how you ought to answer each one.

AÈ m ba aè nfeè' entombïì weèe aè ba aèmboè bgúâú beèe wa'a, njobeè' weèe aè m ce geèe buu bbebep, a ke' túr ncoèo ce yu ba ncoèo beèe Nyúè ka'. Seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe aè ka' ba aèbee, Nyúè aè foosïì seèe efa yïìseèe buu bbebep wááwá, a gee seèe aè kútïì bteèe seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe. Muu à mʉ ce yaŋ, mamuu à ku ce war nfèʼsìp.	When the child was sick, the mother was crying everyday.

M ce laèa ya neè weèe ená, ñwáè fa kúúsi yuu bebep neè yuu bebep ka'. Ñwáè aè ka' lip wáè neè bo aè geè', aè beesïì geè' mo' neè ye foñ tá e lïîp.	But I tell you, don't resist him who is evil; but whoever strikes you on your right cheek, turn to him the other also.
Nyúè aè fa nsuñ ca ce yu nsuñ mboèñmboñ seê, mba wáâ mmboè. Loèr nfeè' faè dïì' ñwáè moè' kupse nsuñ anaè ka'. Lor nfeè' ba aè ñger Yú' Rara ce yi yu njep wáâ ntee.	That good thing which was committed to you, guard through the Holy Spirit who dwells in us.

Bfúr mo' ce weèr woweèe aè m ce cu, a m ba beèe nsaèambaê. Ñwáâ nlee aè loèr ñgwa, a kwe, a bi boo a ye ka', a ma'shi ñgwa neè nfúr yïì.	Now there were with us seven brothers. The first married and died, and having no seed left his wife to his brother.
