A mbuèu ce máè laèa máná weèe vúê, tá m yá weèe, tá seèe de'. Kwaèñ yu máè kuè rkoo seè'ni na ba aètu ñwáè ce beèe Isráèl a m cu a ce keè'.”	"For this cause therefore I asked to see you and to speak with you. For because of the hope of Israel I am bound with this chain."""
Zhi bòŋ enɛ sèe lɛ mncir Nyʉ̀.	It is good that we should follow Godʼs commandments.
Woweèe a m loo weèr, a loo neè mini-ñwáè ená weèr gee yuu boèñboñ neè woweèe, fa woweèe njïì foñ tá a ja' beèe Nyúè ce a yu aè ñgá'.	begging us with much entreaty to receive this grace and the fellowship in the service to the saints.
E ba buʼŋgùŋ bèe a kaʼ caŋni ce vʉ̀ ŋgàabaa à ba nè a gwar ye nè sàʼ.	She ululated and before people came, the madman had already cut her with a cutlass.
Ñwáè ce e ka' gee yïì nyor ba ñgúè' moè' efa nyor Tata Jisos Kraâis baná Jisos Kraâis a ñwáè anaè a yu ñwáè moè'sir aè yú'.	But he who is joined to the Lord is one spirit.
E seki enɛ e be lìp mɛ̀.	He is determined to beat me.
Yuu ce yi be geèe tá weèe riñ ená nsuñ ca yu mini yi yu ená, weèe be duè yá muu aèmboè a kur njep bcáè', a noñsi njep rghii njeèe.”	"This is the sign to you: you will find a baby wrapped in strips of cloth, lying in a feeding trough."""
M ce laèa neè wáè aè bsii Nyúè ce e ke geèe buu wááwá ba bteèe, ba aè bsii Jisos Kraâis ce e m laèa boèñboñ aè bsii Pontos Pailáèt.	I command you before God, who gives life to all things, and before Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate testified the good confession,
Mɛ̀ tii rlàŋ a yɛ Nfò nje kìbùʼ.	I have opened the curtain and seen Nfor in the palace council hall.
Nyúè ka' ker gee ñwáè moè' ye ye riñ yuu mo' ce aède' e suñ beèe, baná ñwáè ce e ba ce laèa naè fa ye njïì foñ tá e laêa.	But if a revelation is made to another sitting by, let the first keep silent.
Máè ke' geèe wa' ka', njobeè' m ce koèñ aè rgeèe yuu ce aè buu efa rrïìñ enjo ka'. M ce koèñ ba máná aè ka' ce gee yuu boèñboñ neè máè aè gee ba aèmboè wáè gwáá.	But I was willing to do nothing without your consent, that your goodness would not be as of necessity, but of free will.
Wɛ̀ bèesi rbipshì anà yɛɛnì.	You have answered that question correctly.
Jisoès aè vúê, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “A fa ñger embe buèu ba enjep nsheè wááwá neè máè.	"Jesus came to them and spoke to them, saying, ""All authority has been given to me in heaven and on earth."
E m cu aèfo aè mnoèñ mñkyeèe, Sataèn aè ce moèoshi ye. Mnyaâa aè rïìñ vi m ba aè dïì' anaè, bcïìndap Nyúè vi ce keè'ni ye.	He was there in the wilderness forty days tempted by Satan. He was with the wild animals; and the angels were serving him.
Woweèe a m lá', a wáp seê, a ce kwaè'shi ená woweèe a yá ba nyir.	But they were terrified and filled with fear, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
Fa laèa blaâa bebep ka'. Laèa ba yuu boèñboñ ce aède' yi ja' ñwáè, tá wo blaèa anaè vi bo vúè neè rboèñ neè beèe ce a yu' vi.	Let no corrupt speech proceed out of your mouth, but such as is good for building up as the need may be, that it may give grace to those who hear.
Yu ba ñwáè ce e ce laèa ená e yu yáánïì ce aède' e ba yáánïì ghup aè bsii Tata ka'. Ñwáè ce e yu yáánïì aè bsii Tata yu ñwáè ce Tata rïìñ ená e yu yáánïì.	For it isn't he who commends himself who is approved, but whom the Lord commends.
A ke gèe kìnfɛ̀r ntɛ̀ʼ ce lùu.	When we crack jokes the ambience is high.
Maè'shi neè woweèe. Woweèe a yu mnfeèp. Nfeèp ka' ce duèñshi nfeèp moè' nduunjïì, baná woweèe a be gweèñger njep beè'teè bsïìp.”	"Leave them alone. They are blind guides of the blind. If the blind guide the blind, both will fall into a pit."""
Jisoès weèe a ka' naèti ce duè, beèe a vú neè ñwáè moè' ce e m ba lúr, yú' nyúèrkaè' yi ba njep ye.	As they went out, behold, a mute man who was demon possessed was brought to him.
Lee rkap rli ghɛɛte kaʼ.	Your bride price is not enough.
M túr buu moè' ce vi ce suñ aèmboè máè caa vïû Joân. Mfaè' ce m ce geèe ce yaè Ta aè fa máè ñger ená m gee misi mi ce suñ aèmboè máè, a ce duèñshi ená yaè Ta aè tuu máè.	But the testimony which I have is greater than that of John, for the works which the Father gave me to accomplish, the very works that I do, testify about me, that the Father has sent me.
Jisoès aè kúsïì neè woweèe enáê, “Musïìs aè m sañ ncir ca neè weèe njobeè' weèe teèe btu.	"But Jesus said to them, ""For your hardness of heart, he wrote you this commandment."
Yi yu aètáèr aè ryu' blaèa ca ka'. Máè yá ya máná vi kuèu Kraâis ba yïì coêr.	This mystery is great, but I speak concerning Christ and of the assembly.
Tɛ Nyʉ̀ kaʼ kèe boo ŋgòŋ, nlàa zhi m ku ba.	Before God created the world, the Word was there.
Bcirmbèŋ vi ke ba banɛ bèe be dù à mŋkʉ̀ʉ kaʼ.	When we have early morning rain which lasts for long, people donʼt go to the farm.
Beèe mo' a ka' tá rïìñ ená m yu ñwáè ntuu neè Jisos Kraâis ka', máè rïìñ máná weèe rïìñ wa'a njobeè' weèe yu ncoèo ce e geèe beèe a riñ ená m yu ñwáè ntuu neè Tataê.	If to others I am not an apostle, yet at least I am to you; for you are the seal of my apostleship in the Lord.
Jakoèp aè m túr rdip rtuñ aèfo. Jisoès aè ka' baè' fa rdip anaè, a lúshi aègee mo njobeè' e m jáèr a sáê. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè nyúè aè ká' a ce kuèu ñgoèñ.	Jacob's well was there. Jesus therefore, being tired from his journey, sat down by the well. It was about the sixth hour.
AÈ ka' ba aè mbuèuñkuèr, keñ aè ba mbe ntee rdip, Jisoès aè ba nje waa ñkúè mimñgi'.	When evening had come, the boat was in the midst of the sea, and he was alone on the land.
Pol aè suu njep nsheè a gwe mbe yeâ nduè, a baa ye nje nyoèr, a laa enáê, “Weèe fa wáp ka', e ku bii nteèe.”	"Paul went down, and fell upon him, and embracing him said, ""Don't be troubled, for his life is in him."""
Cena yi ka' mïì, yuu mo' yi coo máè mbaè tuè' embe buèu aèmboè mnjeèndoñ ma kúr beèe wa'a. A m ce yoèp yáá enáê, “AÈleèluyaè! Rluèñ ba foèo ba ñger wááwá yi ba mba yeâ mmboè.	"After these things I heard something like a loud voice of a great multitude in heaven, saying, ""Hallelujah! Salvation, power, and glory belong to our God:"
Stáfaèn aè m túr rboâñ Nyúè ba ñger Nyúè seê, a gee buu bghagha' ba buu bbáèá aè múè beèe.	Stephen, full of faith and power, performed great wonders and signs among the people.
Nyúè aè naèa ye a cuusi aè li rkoo maè', e koo Yú' Rara ce yïì ta aè m kaè' naè. Baná yuu ce weèe ce yá a ker ce yu' seè'ni na, yu ba yú' anaè ce e ce fa neè weèr.	Being therefore exalted by the right hand of God, and having received from the Father the promise of the Holy Spirit, he has poured out this, which you now see and hear.
E m tarni ka', a ku byemi ená Nyúè be geèe yuu ce e m laèa. E m ku táá tatap njo' li rbyemïì, a ce kuè'si Nyúè.	Yet, looking to the promise of God, he didn't waver through unbelief, but grew strong through faith, giving glory to God,
tá yi ka' ba aètáèr Nyúè bo fúr máè efa rkwe, fa máè ryoèñ ce nfeseè.	if by any means I may attain to the resurrection from the dead.
Bbyeèñge a m ba aèfo aèñgoo, a táá aè njïìsaèp a ce fyá'. AÈ m ba bbyeèñge ce a m loâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a du a Jisoès weèe, tá a bo jaè' ye aè buu.	Many women were there watching from afar, who had followed Jesus from Galilee, serving him.
Ñwáè aè ka' top mkúâñ bráêd, too bráâd yïì entoèmbïì fa neè Nyúè, baná bráâd wááwá ce e be toèo efa mkúèñ anaè yu yïû Nyúè. Mñgaâñ ce ka' ba vi Nyúè, baná mmba' ce yu vi foñ.	If the first fruit is holy, so is the lump. If the root is holy, so are the branches.
Jisoès aè fúr ye embe múè beèe, a fa ye mntummbo mbaè btuè', a ce mce, a joo ye rlee aègho,	He took him aside from the multitude, privately, and put his fingers into his ears, and he spat, and touched his tongue.
Bfúr waê, kuushi neè yuu ce m be laèa neè weèe na. Moè' efa weèe aè ka' ma'shi nduunjïì Nyúè, nfúr moè' ja', kúsi ye njep nduunjïì Nyúè, baná nfúr anaè aè tee yú' ñwáâ mbembep caè efa rkwe, a ker búsi ku' buu bbebep magoèr.	Brothers, if any among you wanders from the truth, and someone turns him back, let him know that he who turns a sinner from the error of his way will save a soul from death, and will cover a multitude of sins.
Yi yu ená ñwáè ce e ka' boñshi li ryoèñ baná e be bá li. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá boñshi li ryoèñ njep ñgoèñ na ka', baná ñgaèñ be túr li ryoèñ, cu nfeseè.	He who loves his life will lose it. He who hates his life in this world will keep it to eternal life.
Woowèe a sɛɛ nàʼ.	They have slaughtered a cow.
Woweèe a laa neè ye enáê, “Tu yi kar wáè embo.” Muu anaè aè laa tatap se ená yi yu mini wa'a. Woweèe a laa enáê, “Yu ncïìndap Nyúè ce e ke keè'ni Pitaè.”	"They said to her, ""You are crazy!"" But she insisted that it was so. They said, ""It is his angel."""
Ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a m leèse aè rloèr bráêd, a ku túr ba ntu' bráâd mo'sir mbe keñ.	They forgot to take bread; and they didn't have more than one loaf in the boat with them.
Jisoès aè laa neè beèe ker ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê,	Then Jesus spoke to the multitudes and to his disciples,
Jisoès aè lor bráâd ta ba nca baa ca, a ke' mbe buèu, a yoñshi Nyúè, a bá'shi, a fa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ená a gapshi neè beèe anaè.	He took the five loaves and the two fish, and looking up to the sky, he blessed them, and broke them, and gave them to the disciples to set before the multitude.
Ñwáè moè' aè m be yá Nyúè ka'. Muu Nyúè ce e ku ba moè'sir, a ker ba mntee Nyúè, a ye ce e duèñshi seèe njáèá ñwáè ce yïì Ta yu.	No one has seen God at any time. The one and only Son, who is in the bosom of the Father, he has declared him.
Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “E be yúshi beâe bbebep ca aè njïû mbembep seê, láè yi nsuu anaè neè beâe jáá ce nfeè' ce a ke tee msini aè ka' gháá tá woweèe a bo tee mi fa neè ye.”	"They told him, ""He will miserably destroy those miserable men, and will lease out the vineyard to other farmers, who will give him the fruit in its season."""
Pitaè aè beesïì enáê, “ÁÈno”. A ka' niñ mbe ndaèp, Jisoès aè ká' a laa yuu neè ye entombïì. E m laèa enáê, “AÈ ce kwaè'shi yo wáná ká Saimúèn? Beèe ce a ke laè' mbaèa neè bkúú enjep ñgoèñ na e ke ba weâe ká? E ke laè' ñgaâa to' káè bkïìloè?”	"He said, ""Yes."" When he came into the house, Jesus anticipated him, saying, ""What do you think, Simon? From whom do the kings of the earth receive toll or tribute? From their children, or from strangers?"""
Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè' ñgaèñ yu' yuu ce Yú' Nyúè yi ce laèa neè bcor wááwá.’ ”	He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.
loèr yeèr nfeè' ce geèe rloo, keèr ce feè'shi blaâa Nyúè.”	"But we will continue steadfastly in prayer and in the ministry of the word."""
Beâe aèfo a ka' yá ye a rïîñ, a cep ntuu neè beèe ce a m ba aè mla' wááwá aè ñgoèñ anaè. Woweèe a vú neè beèe wááwá ce a m ce yañ,	When the people of that place recognized him, they sent into all that surrounding region, and brought to him all who were sick,
ba onïìk, ba kaèniliyaèn, ba kwoêt, ba báèrïîl, ba topaès, ba krisopráès, ba jasïìn, ker ba amátïìs.	the fifth, sardonyx; the sixth, sardius; the seventh, chrysolite; the eighth, beryl; the ninth, topaz; the tenth, chrysoprasus; the eleventh, jacinth; and the twelfth, amethyst.
“M ce loo neè woweèe. M ce loo ba neè ñgoèñ ca ka', m ce loo ba neè beèe ce wáè fa neè máè na njobeè' woweèe a yu yoè beèe.	I pray for them. I don't pray for the world, but for those whom you have given me, for they are yours.
AÈ m ba entoèmbïì, Nyúè aè gee beèe a riñ yuu anaè ka'. AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na e tuu yi yú' yi gee yïì beèe ce e m ce aè ñgaâa ntuu, ker ba beèe ce a ce suñ beèe buu ce Nyúè aè geèe woweèe a riñ naè, a riñ yuu anaè.	which in other generations was not made known to the children of men, as it has now been revealed to his holy apostles and prophets in the Spirit;
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì a toshïì ye aè ku' buu goèr.	The chief priests accused him of many things.
Ñwáè ryá'ni mncir moè' aè naèti mbekïì aè rmoèoshi Jisoès, a bipshi enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, yuu ce aède' m gee ka' koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè a ká?”	"Behold, a certain lawyer stood up and tested him, saying, ""Teacher, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?"""
Btañshïì anaè vi m ka' ba túr njáèá ñger ca, beèe a m ba keèr ce tañshi btañshïì ka' njobeè' woweèe a m ba baè raa mïìsi, keèr rïìñ ená woweèe a yu ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep ka'.	Or else wouldn't they have ceased to be offered, because the worshippers, having been once cleansed, would have had no more consciousness of sins?
Yap ñger mnsár aè Stáfaèn weèe yi m sáè njobeè' Stáfaèn aè m ce laèa ba neè bfee ba ñger Yú' Rara ce Nyúè aè m fa ye.	They weren't able to withstand the wisdom and the Spirit by which he spoke.
Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì aè bipshïì neè Stáfaèn enáê, “Yi yu wa' a?”	"The high priest said, ""Are these things so?"""
Foèosi weèr yeèr buu bbebep, njobeè' wer weèr e ke foèosi ñwáè wááwá ce e geèe yuu bebep neè weèr. Fa maè'shi tá rmoèoshïì li vú neè weèr ka'.’ ”	"Forgive us our sins, for we ourselves also forgive everyone who is indebted to us. Bring us not into temptation, but deliver us from the evil one.'"""
Caè'ni neè AÈsinkiritoès ba Fïìlágoèn ba Hámïìs ba Paètoèropaès ba Hámaès, ker ba bfúr ce a yu a woweèe wááwá.	Greet Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas, and the brothers who are with them.
Wɛ̀r ye à m̀ tʉr mŋkàʼni nyʉ̀ sondɛ̀.	Him and I had an appointment on Sunday.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Boo, weèe aè koo nca ka' a?” Woweèe a beesïì neè ye enáê, “AÈi'.”	"Jesus therefore said to them, ""Children, have you anything to eat?"" They answered him, ""No."""
Mɛ̀ yɛ nè laa rlir.	I saw it myself.
Beèe a be laèa neè weèe enáê, ‘Yáê, a ye njena’ na, káè ená ‘Yáê, a ye mbena’ na. Weèe fa naèti duè a waâp mbuèu ka',	They will tell you, 'Look, here!' or 'Look, there!' Don't go away, nor follow after them,
Jisoès aè ka' yu' yuu ce woweèe a ce laèa, a laa neè Jairoès enáê, “Fa wáp ka', kuè byemi neè máè.”	"But Jesus, when he heard the message spoken, immediately said to the ruler of the synagogue, ""Don't be afraid, only believe."""
Beèe mo' ca a feè'shi buu kuu Jisos Kraâis njobeè' woweèe a ce koèñ aè rba beâe bgoèrgoèr. Yuu ce woweèe a ce feè'shi yu ba yuu ce woweèe a túr njep ntee ka'. Woweèe a ku ce roèo ená mluè mi ku ce koo máè aèmboè m yu mbe shañ na.	but the latter out of love, knowing that I am appointed for the defense of the Good News.
Yàp mâ à ŋòʼshi njàp à mkìŋ.	Their mother has dished the soup into the pots.
Mnyaèa njáèá jáá jáèá jáá vi m ba njep cáè' anaè, ker ba buu moè' aèmboè mnyo, ba bbar, ba bsiñ.	in which were all kinds of four-footed animals of the earth, wild animals, reptiles, and birds of the sky.
E m ce jáèr aè dïì' anaè, beèe a ce yu' faè dïì' e yu, byá'se ñgaâa byañ, vú aègho, yá ye.	and ran around that whole region, and began to bring those who were sick, on their mats, to where they heard he was.
“Ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir ba beèe Farïìsi a cu mbe nta' Musïìs.	"saying, ""The scribes and the Pharisees sat on Moses' seat."
Wèr ye à ràte.	He and I are related.
Mbàa yee zhi yû?	Where is your money?
Beèe wááwá ce a m yu' vi a m ce kuushi vi, a ce laèa enáê, “Njáèá muu ca be keè ba njáèá muu ce ká?” Bo Tata Nyúè yi m ba mbe yeâ nduè neè mini-ñwáè.	"All who heard them laid them up in their heart, saying, ""What then will this child be?"" The hand of the Lord was with him."
Jisoès aè ka' kuè bii mïìsi efa cuèu, Judaès ce e m ba moè' efa yïì beèe ce ncoèp- baa-aè-rrúèú naè aè toseè. E m ba a ku' beèe ce a m túr bsaè' ba mmbaèñ. Beèe ce a m tuu woweèe aè m ba beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, ker ba bleebeèe.	Immediately, while he was still speaking, Judas, one of the twelve, came--and with him a multitude with swords and clubs, from the chief priests, the scribes, and the elders.
Yuʼ ca zhi bàŋ gòr a bonî.	This banana is too ripe and has become soft.
Ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m loèr nfeè' a fyá' njep múè rluèñ ca boèñboñ seê. Woweèe a m suñ beèe aèmboè rboâñntee Nyúè ce yi m ba ená weèe be koni.	Concerning this salvation, the prophets sought and searched diligently, who prophesied of the grace that would come to you,
E du a cu mbe rtuèu Oleèf, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a du a yá ye, a ku ba a woweèe mbo caè'caè'. Woweèe a laa neè ye enáê, “Suñ weèr nfeè' ce buu ca vi be koni. Yuu ce yi be duèñshi ená aè ce vúè, ñgoèñ yi ce mïì foñ yu ká?”	"As he sat on the Mount of Olives, the disciples came to him privately, saying, ""Tell us, when will these things be? What is the sign of your coming, and of the end of the age?"""
E m geèe wa'a, a ce kuushi mkaè'ni ce e m geèe neè Abraèham ker ba neè yïì ñgúè beèe aè nfeè' sïìp.”	"As he spoke to our fathers, to Abraham and his seed forever."""
Máè mú bu' mmbo neè ñgaâa yá'ni yoè buu ená woweèe a fúr yú' anaè enjep ye, woweèe a moèo aè rfúr yi laèr.”	"I begged your disciples to cast it out, and they couldn't."""
Jisoès aè m laèa wa'a a ce taase Felep taase njobeè' e m ku riñ yuu ce e be geèe.	This he said to test him, for he himself knew what he would do.
Pitaè aè laa neè ye enáê, “Beèe ca wááwá a ka' ma' wáè, m ma' wáè ka'.”	"But Peter said to him, ""Although all will be offended, yet I will not."""
Máè yá aèmboè mbeèñ ce baèpñger a ce rúèúñger, a ce wañger embe kaèbaèraè'. Máè yá bturkañ saèamba aèmboè vi tááte kuèntombïì neè kaèbaèraè' a ce raa. Bturkañ anaè vi táá aètu byú' Nyúè ce vi yu saèambaê.	Out of the throne proceed lightnings, sounds, and thunders. There were seven lamps of fire burning before his throne, which are the seven Spirits of God.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè Joân ñwáè baèptir beèe aè ká' a ce feè'shi blaâa Nyúè aè ntee rïìñ aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè.	In those days, John the Baptizer came, preaching in the wilderness of Judea, saying,
Ka' yi yu wa'a, m be fúú efa rkwe, du aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, tá weèe vú koni máè aèfo.”	"However, after I am raised up, I will go before you into Galilee."""
Pitaè aè ku bii njep mambe anaè, muunje moè' ce e m ce faè' neè ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì,	As Peter was in the courtyard below, one of the maids of the high priest came,
AÈmboè weèr ce cu neè nyor ca njep ñgoèñ na, weèr ce shooñger aèmboè weèr aè byáè' lá ntáèr yi ce rïìr se wa'a. Yi yu ba ená weèr ce koèñ aè rco' cáâ' rúèú ca ka', weèr ce koèñ ba aè ryar cáâ' fi, tá cáâ' rúèú yi kupse dúèdúè.	For indeed we who are in this tent do groan, being burdened; not that we desire to be unclothed, but that we desire to be clothed, that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Yú' nyúèrkaè' yi yu njep máè ka'; m ce yu'ni ba neè yaè Taê, weèe aè ke' ce yu'ni ye yu neè máè ka'.	"Jesus answered, ""I don't have a demon, but I honor my Father, and you dishonor me."
Jisos Kraâis ye ye aè m kwe nfeè' moè'sir aètu beèe magoèr tá e bo siñsi yaèp buu bbebep. E be keè kúti njep ñgoèñ na, kúti tá e bo siñsi buu bbebep beèe ka'. E be keè kúti tá e bo geèe tá beèe ce a ce keè' ye a luêñ.	so Christ also, having been offered once to bear the sins of many, will appear a second time, without sin, to those who are eagerly waiting for him for salvation.
tá ñwáè mbaèa ye ye ce lu'shi ená Nyúè aè suèusi ye njep nsheè, njobeè' e be kuè loè ba aèmboè fúèlawaè ce e táá ntïìni ce foo, tú' e ce raa e banïì yuushi naè.	and the rich, in that he is made humble, because like the flower in the grass, he will pass away.
Leè' ce Nyúè aè m ye eluâuñgoèñ naè yi ku ba wa' foñ. E m ye leè' anaè, a gee mkaè'ni anaè ba neè Abraèham ba yïì ñgúè. Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa enáê, “Neè yoè ñgúè”, ce yi yu ená e m ce laèa ba aèmboè beèe aèñgoo ka', e m ce laèa ba aèmboè ñwáè moè'sir, ñwáè anaè aè ba Jisos Kraêis.	"Now the promises were spoken to Abraham and to his seed. He doesn't say, ""To seeds,"" as of many, but as of one, ""To your seed,"" which is Christ."
Suŋ nè nè ye enɛ wèe à yuʼ nè wee btʉ̀ʼ.	Tell him that you heard it yourselves.
E m laèa enáê, “Muu ñkúú aè m duè aè to' mo' aènjïìsaèp seê, ená a bo duè ghar ye aè ñkúú tá e ka' kúti.	"He said therefore, ""A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom, and to return."
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce weèe aè m ba bkwaèa neè buu bbebep naè, ñgeâe yáánïì yi m túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè weèe ka'.	For when you were servants of sin, you were free in regard to righteousness.
Beèe efa yeâ laè' ker ba beèe ce a m yá aè nfeè' ce e m ce loo buu naè, a laa enáê, “A'a! AÈmboè ñwáè ca yu ñwáè ce e m ce cu ce loo buu naè a?”	"The neighbors therefore, and those who saw that he was blind before, said, ""Isn't this he who sat and begged?"""
Beèe ce a m da'se njobeè' a m yú Stáfaèn, ñgá' aè konïì cor naè, a m duè aè bdïì' jáá jáèá jáá. Beèe mo' a m duè aè ñgoâñ Foènishaè, beèe mo' a du aè to' Saiproès, beèe mo' a du aè rla' Antïìyoèk. Woweèe a m duè aè bdïì' ca wa'a, a ce feè'shi blaâa Nyúè ba neè Jus caè'caè'.	They therefore who were scattered abroad by the oppression that arose about Stephen traveled as far as Phoenicia, Cyprus, and Antioch, speaking the word to no one except to Jews only.
Loè neè tá seèe ce duè. Ñwáè ce e fyeni máè naè yu aètútú.”	"Arise, let's be going. Behold, he who betrays me is at hand."""
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “M ce suñ wáè neè mini-ñwáè ená a ka' tá bi ñwáè neè mdip ker ba neè yú' ka', aède' ñgaèñ niñ mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè ka'.	"Jesus answered, ""Most certainly I tell you, unless one is born of water and spirit, he can't enter into the Kingdom of God!"
Máè suñ woweèe ená ndeèe Rum yu ená a ka' vú neè ñwáè ce e geèe faèa, baná beèe ce a laèa ená e geèe faèa naè, a be vúè, tá ye ye laa yuu kuu faèa ce a laèa ená e geèe, tá a ka' teni mnsa'.	To whom I answered that it is not the custom of the Romans to give up any man to destruction, before the accused has met the accusers face to face, and has had opportunity to make his defense concerning the matter laid against him.
E ka' laèa ca, rïìtu yi koo beèe wááwá ce a m baèa ye, bár beèe wááwá a yu' rboèñ aè buu bboèñboñ wááwá ce e m geèe.	As he said these things, all his adversaries were disappointed, and all the multitude rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him.
Baná káè aè yu Jus áè, káè aè yu ñwáè enje jáá áè, káè aè yu ñkwaèa áè, káè aè yu muu áè, káè aè yu mbañruèñwáè áè, káè aè yu njeñwáè áè, jáá jáèá jáá yu aègho ka' njobeè' weèe wááwá yu ñwáè moè'sir njep Jisos Kraêis.	There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither slave nor free man, there is neither male nor female; for you are all one in Christ Jesus.
Ñwáè ce a m geèe yuu báèá neè ye, e jár anaè, aè m caèa bfeè' mñkyeèe.	For the man on whom this miracle of healing was performed was more than forty years old.
To wɛ̀ rìŋ enɛ m̀ be fʉʉ vʉ̀ àyàŋsè.	You know that I will be coming tomorrow.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè ye enáê, “AÈ yu ñwáè rboâñtu, Saimúèn, muu Jonaè, njobeè' aè geèe ñwáè wáè ka' riñ yuu ce wáè laèa na ka', aè geèe ba yaè Ta ce e yu mbe buèu.	"Jesus answered him, ""Blessed are you, Simon Bar Jonah, for flesh and blood has not revealed this to you, but my Father who is in heaven."
Máè fyá' a yá nyaèabaèraâ' mbúú. Ñwáè ce e m cu mbe nduè mo aè túr ñgúú mbaè boè. A m fa ye rtaa ce a ke fa neè beèe ce a maè' bïìr a so naè. E cañ mbe nyaèabaèraè' anaè a ce maè' bïìr tá e bo keèr so.	And behold, a white horse, and he who sat on it had a bow. A crown was given to him, and he came forth conquering, and to conquer.
Mboè weèe rïìñ weená yuu wááwá ce ñwáè e ke ye yi ke duè njep rbúè, lo fúú a?	Don't you understand that whatever goes into the mouth passes into the belly, and then out of the body?
njobeè' ñwáè wááwá ce e yu muu Nyúè e ke so ñgoèñ. Yuu ce yi so ñgoèñ yu liseèe rbyemïì.	For whatever is born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world: your faith.
Be keè ba aè nfeè' moè' tá m tuu ñwáè rjaè' moè' neè weèe ese Taèr. Ñwáè anaè yu Yú' ce yi loè ese Taèr, yi ke suñ beèe yuu mini. Yi be vúè tá yi suñ beèe aèmboè máè.	"When the Counselor has come, whom I will send to you from the Father, the Spirit of truth, who proceeds from the Father, he will testify about me.
John	Joân	15	27	Wee weèe foñ be suñ aèmboè máè njobeè' seèe aè m ku ba aèbee efa rkáè'.	You will also testify, because you have been with me from the beginning.
John	Joân	16	1	“Máè suñ weèe buu ca tá weèe bo táá tatap, keè' kúti njïìnjïì ka'.	These things have I spoken to you, so that you wouldn't be caused to stumble."
Zhìsò à mʉ bep e.	I want to buy a new car.
E bi muu a saŋ ye mbɛ̀ʼ.	She was delivered of a baby and has circumcised him.
Caè'ni neè Rufoès ce e yu muu rlii efa múè beèe Tata naè, ker ba yïì ma ce e m gá' neè máè aèmboè muu yïì wa'a naè.	Greet Rufus, the chosen in the Lord, and his mother and mine.
Ñwáè ce e m cu mbe nyaèabaèraâ' mbúú naè aè lor saè' ce e m ba ku yeâ cuèu naè a yúshi bár beèe ce a m ce duè aèmbuèu nyaèa anaè aègho, bsiñ vi vú a ye bgúâú beèe ca, a sáê.	The rest were killed with the sword of him who sat on the horse, the sword which came forth out of his mouth. All the birds were filled with their flesh.
Baná yuu ce aède' ñwáè nsuu gee neè woweèe yu ká? E be vúè yúshi woweèe, láè nsuu neè beâe jáá.	What therefore will the lord of the vineyard do? He will come and destroy the farmers, and will give the vineyard to others.
E m bi muu rñgoèo, aè ba muu mbañruè. E m kur muu anaè njep bcáè', a noñsi njep rghii njeèe njobeè' ndap aè m ruu neè woweèe.	She brought forth her firstborn son, and she wrapped him in bands of cloth, and laid him in a feeding trough, because there was no room for them in the inn.
Loèr neè nfeè' faè dïì' ñwáè moè' efa weâe mú lo buu efa rkoni bghoènïì Nyúè ka'. Loèr neè nfeè' faè dïì' ñwáè moè' efa weâe mú lo ba aèmboè ñgúè cece' ce ñwáè e ke si'si mbaè mmboè, e joèo byee neè mmbo vi ku ce' foñ naè ka'. Njáèá beèe ce a yu aèmboè ñgúè cece' a ke vúè yap ba neè ñgá', bepsi ñgeâe beèe magoèr.	looking carefully lest there be any man who falls short of the grace of God; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you, and many be defiled by it;
È ku cu mbɛ̀ʼnsʉ̀r.	His is still uncircumcised.
E lor ndoñ, a ka' yoèñshi Nyúè, a fa neè woweèe, woweèe wááwá a noê.	He took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave to them. They all drank of it.
A m taa byáèá a baa a Jisoès weèe mbe bkïìntaa, moè' aè ba aè bo maè', moè' aè ba a yeâ bo ñkoèp.	Then there were two robbers crucified with him, one on his right hand and one on the left.
M ce vú aè ryá wáè seè'ni, a ce laèa buu ca njep ñgoèñ na, tá la rlu'shïì li bo mïìsi njep woweèe.	But now I come to you, and I say these things in the world, that they may have my joy made full in themselves.
Weèe ce koñni wa'a njobeè' weèe rïìñ ená nfeè' ce weèe aè ba lá' efa mmirloè aè gháá. Nfeè' ce Nyúè be geèe tá seèe luñ yu seè'ni aètútú a caa aèmboè e m ba aè nfeè' ce seèe aè m káè' byemi neè Jisos Kraâis naè.	Do this, knowing the time, that it is already time for you to awaken out of sleep, for salvation is now nearer to us than when we first believed.
Ñwaè' ca ce sañ máâ Pol ce Nyúè aè m ce aèmboè e m koèñ, ená m ba ñwáè ntuu neè Jisos Kraêis, tá m bo suñ beèe ená Nyúè aè kaè' ená e be fa beèe ryoèñ ce nfeseè njïì enjep Jisos Kraêis.	Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, according to the promise of the life which is in Christ Jesus,
Máè rïìñ ñgá' ce weèe ce yá. Máè rïìñ fuèp ce e koo weèe. Yi yu mini ghup ená weèe yu ñgaâa fuèp ka'. Nyúè aè ghoèni weèe magoèr seê. Máè rïìñ buu bbebep ce beèe ce a ce loèr wap btu ená a woweèe Jus naè a ce laèa aèmboè weèe. Woweèe a yu Jus ka', a yu ba beèe ce a ce duè aèmbuèu Sataèn.	"I know your works, oppression, and your poverty (but you are rich), and the blasphemy of those who say they are Jews, and they are not, but are a synagogue of Satan.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	10	Fa wáp neè ñgá' ce weèe be yá ka'. Yáê, Sataèn be moèoshi weèe. E be fa beèe mo' efa weèe mbe shañ tá a yá ñgá' mbo aè mnoèñ rúêú. Yi ka' ba ená weèe kwe njo' máè, weèe ku táá tatap tá m bo fa weèe rtaa ryoèñ.	Don't be afraid of the things which you are about to suffer. Behold, the devil is about to throw some of you into prison, that you may be tested; and you will have oppression for ten days. Be faithful to death, and I will give you the crown of life.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	11	Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè' ñgaèñ yu' yuu ce Yú' Nyúè yi ce laèa neè bcor wááwá. Beèe ce a ka' táá tatap caa rmoèoshïì, baná rkwe embenjïì li be joèo woweèe ka'.’ ”	He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. He who overcomes won't be harmed by the second death.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	12	Ñwáè ce máè m yá naè aè laa neè máè enáê, “Sañ ñwaè' neè ncïìndap embe cor aè rla' Págamoèm enáê, ‘Cena yu blaèa ce vi loè ese ñwáè ce e túr saè' mbyáèráñ.	To the angel of the assembly in Pergamum write: ""He who has the sharp two-edged sword says these things:"
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba beèe wááwá embe kansuèr a m roèo beèe tá a bo vúè táá njïìnsa' tá a koo Jisoès, yú. Geewa'a, a yá faèa ka'.	Now the chief priests and the whole council sought witnesses against Jesus to put him to death, and found none.
Ndì à bʉsi zhii ŋwàʼ, a ce seŋ buu.	Ndi has lost his book, and is wondering what to do.
Nyor e ke túr ñgúè' nyor moè'sir ka', e ke túr mñgúè' nyor jáá jáèá jáá.	For the body is not one member, but many.
ce e m kwe neè seèe. E m kwe neè seèe tá seèe woweèe bo cu aèbee aè nfeè' wááwá. E ka' vúê, káè seèe cu bteèe áè, káè seèe aè kweñger áè, tá seèe woweèe bo cu aèbee.	who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
A sañ buu ca tá weèe bo byemi ená Jisoès yu Kraêis, ce Muu Nyúè. Weèe aè ka' byemi wa'a, weèe bo koni ryoèñ a yeâ rlii.	but these are written, that you may believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God, and that believing you may have life in his name.
“Ñwáè ryá'nïì, Musïìs aè m laèa ená ñwáè aè ka' lor ñgwa, a ye a bi boo ka', ñgaèñ kwe, baná nfúr yïì be laasi ye, tá a ye a bi boo neè nfúr yïì ce e kwe anaè.	"saying, ""Teacher, Moses said, 'If a man dies, having no children, his brother shall marry his wife, and raise up seed for his brother.'"
Kuè cu neè ba mbe ndaèp anaè, ce ye ker ce no njáèá ká ce a ka' fa weèe, njobeè' yi yu yáánïì ená a la' ñwáè rfaè'. Weèe fa loè embe ndaèp moè' duè mbe moè' ka'.	Remain in that same house, eating and drinking the things they give, for the laborer is worthy of his wages. Don't go from house to house.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè rfúú ce beèe ce a kweñger a be keèe fúú efa rkwe, mboè weèe aè be be' yuu ce Nyúè aè m laèa neè weèe a? E m laèa enáê,	But concerning the resurrection of the dead, haven't you read that which was spoken to you by God, saying,
Yú' bebep yi ke fúú enjep ñwáè, kashi aè ñgoâñ yuur aè rroèo dïû' rlúèshïì. Yi ka' roo yá ka', yi laa enáê, ‘M be kúti mbe ndaèp ce máè m fúú embo naè.’	The unclean spirit, when he has gone out of the man, passes through dry places, seeking rest, and finding none, he says, 'I will turn back to my house from which I came out.'
AÈmboè Musïìs aè m naèa nyo ce a m toèo neè bco' mbekïì aè nfeè' woweèe a m ce jáèr aè rïìñ naè, a mboè a be kuè keè naèa Muu Ñwáè wa'a,	As Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of Man be lifted up,
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Loèr neè nfeè' faè dïì' ñwáè moè' bo' weèe ka', njobeè' beèe magoèr a be vúè a máâ rlii ce laèa enáê, ‘A máè Kraâis anaè,’ keèr laèa foñ enáê, ‘Nfeè' ce gháá.’ Weèe fa duè aèmbuèu woweèe ka'.	"He said, ""Watch out that you don't get led astray, for many will come in my name, saying, 'I am he,' and, 'The time is at hand.' Therefore don't follow them."
Fa fa yo cuèu njep mnsár ka'. Nsár yu yuu blúr ce vi ke vúè ba neè mlap.	But refuse foolish and ignorant questionings, knowing that they generate strife.
Faèdïì' ce yoè buu yu, a faèdïì' ce yo ntee yi yu foñ.	for where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
a laa ená beèe ce a ce koèñ aè rsa' mnsa' a Pol naè a vú yá wáè.] Wáè ka' bipshi buu neè ye, wá wáè foñ ku riñ yuu ce yi yu mini kuu buu ce weèr aè suñ wáè ená e geèe na.”	"By examining him yourself you may ascertain all these things of which we accuse him."""
Wèr à mʉ du wɛɛ mɛ̀ tʉʉ cʉ̀ʉ.	We went for a hunt and I shot a duiker.
Mɛ̀ koŋ rʉ̀ʉ yuu anà kaʼ.	I donʼt like the scent of that thing.
Seèe aè ka' ma'shi ená e ce gee njáèá buu ca, beèe wááwá a lo byemi neè ye, tá beâe aè to' Rum a lo vúè bepsi yiseèe dïû' rara ba yiseèe to'.”	"If we leave him alone like this, everyone will believe in him, and the Romans will come and take away both our place and our nation."""
Máè laèa wa'a njobeè' beèe mo' ce a ce yu'ni neè Nyúè ka', a súèni a niñ a weâe mú, a ce gheèter aè rkupse nsuñ ce e yu aèmboè ntee boèñboñ ce Nyúè túr neè beèe naè, tá weèe bo byemi ená aè rgeèe bsaèrbuu yi yu yáánïì. Woweèe a geèe wa'a, a ce kani Jisos Kraâis ce ku ba ba ye caè'caè' ce e yu yïìseèe masaè, a ker ba Tata neè seèe. A m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè eluâuñgoèñ ená Nyúè be fa ñgá' neè njáèá beèe ca.	For there are certain men who crept in secretly, even those who were long ago written about for this condemnation: ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into indecency, and denying our only Master, God, and Lord, Jesus Christ.
Mmbomntaa Nyúè mi ka' caèa wáá, ce túè' be raa tá ba noèñ entombïì embe múè ñgaèa naè, aè ku bii aè mú ñgaèptú' seê, Máèári ce aè rla' Makdalaè, ba Máèári moè' caè, a du aè rfyá' rsheè.	Now after the Sabbath, as it began to dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary came to see the tomb.
M yu ñwáâ nteèe. Máè m kwe a kúti nteèe, cu nfeseè. Rkwe ker ba ñgoèñ byir a yu mba máâ mmboè.	and the Living one. I was dead, and behold, I am alive forevermore. Amen. I have the keys of Death and of Hades.
E natïì a du a woweèe aè rla' Nasaráèt, a cu a woweèe, a ce yu'ni neè woweèe. Yïì ma aè m láè buu ca wááwá njep yeâ ntee.	And he went down with them, and came to Nazareth. He was subject to them, and his mother kept all these sayings in her heart.
M ce loo máná Nyúè mú' wee bfee tá weèe bo yá li rraa, rïìñ buu wááwá ce weèe aè láè mmir mbenduè mo njobeè' e m ká' weèe, ker riñ ená bti' ce Nyúè aè láè neè yïì beèe vi boèñ a caa ñger.	having the eyes of your hearts enlightened, that you may know what is the hope of his calling, and what are the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
Beèe a ka' riñ njáèá ñwáè ce Nyúè yu, lo beesi njïì neè ye, njïì moè' ker ba aègho ce aède' ñwáè geêe, woweèe a beesïì yap ntee aè nfeè' moè' ka'. Woweèe a m yá rraa ce li m loè ese Nyúè, a riñ bghoènïì ce Nyúè aè fa woweèe, a koni Yú' Rara njep waâp mntee.	For concerning those who were once enlightened and tasted of the heavenly gift, and were made partakers of the Holy Spirit,
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená m be keèr no mruè' ce a geèe neè mbaèñ ce na ka', caar duè baè' aè nfeè' ce m be no mïû mfi mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè.”	"Most certainly I tell you, I will no more drink of the fruit of the vine, until that day when I drink it anew in the Kingdom of God."""
A ka' laèa wa'a, Jisoès aè ma' ñgaèa neè woweèe enáê,	He told them this parable.
Muu ca aè m kuè' a túr ñger, a ker túr bfee foñ seê. Nyúè aè túr ye aè ntee boèñboñ.	The child was growing, and was becoming strong in spirit, being filled with wisdom, and the grace of God was upon him.
Woo bbyèŋge a bòŋ ndèe sê.	Your wives behave very well.
Ñgaèñ aè du a ce kar aè Mla' ce Rúêú, a ce suñ buu ce Jisoès aè m geèe neè ye. Beèe wááwá a bááñgeèr seê.	He went his way, and began to proclaim in Decapolis how Jesus had done great things for him, and everyone marveled.
E kòŋ mɛ̀ sê.	He loves me very much.

Fa kàa à rlii Nyʉ̀ kaʼ.	Do not swear by the name of God.
Mɛ̀ sɛpsi nè muu.	I spoke harshly to the child.
Beèe ce a m ce geèe ntaa a túr ku' buu se naè, a be yá aèmboè rla' ca li ce yá ñgá', wáp, táá aènjïìsaèp, taa mmbo mbe tuè, war, laèa enáê,	The merchants of these things, who were made rich by her, will stand far away for the fear of her torment, weeping and mourning;
M ce laèa mini aèmboè ñwáè Jisos Kraâis ená aède' ñwáè moè' ce aè ñgoâñ AÈkayaè jepsïì máè faè dïì' m yu' nyor aè yuu ce máè geèe na ka'.	As the truth of Christ is in me, no one will stop me from this boasting in the regions of Achaia.
Waè' cena yi yu seè'ni ená seèe lor mncir aè yuu cicïì njo' rbyemïì a? AÈde' yi ba wa' ka' koo múcaèr. Yi yu ba ená seèe tapsi mncir.	Do we then nullify the law through faith? May it never be! No, we establish the law.
Woweèe a byemi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca ka' njobeè' Sataèn ce e yu nyúè enjep ñgoèñ na aè geèe woweèe a feêp. AÈde' woweèe a yá rraa ce li ce raa mbe waâp nduè ka'. Rraa ca yu rraa ce li vúè njo' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè foèo ce Kraâis túr ce e ku ba aèmboè Nyúè ye ye yu naè.	in whom the god of this world has blinded the minds of the unbelieving, that the light of the Good News of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God, should not dawn on them.
E kanïì, a laa neè ye enáê, “Duè fa wáâ laè' du suñ yoè beèe buu ce Tata aè koosimnse a gee neè wáè.”	"He didn't allow him, but said to him, ""Go to your house, to your friends, and tell them what great things the Lord has done for you, and how he had mercy on you."""
Woweèe a war a ká' mtuèu ba myáá a laa enáê, “Gweè neè mbe weâr nduè, cete weèr, faè dïì' ñwáè ce e cu mbe kaèbaèraè' yá weèr, tá Muu Njeèe bepsi ntee, fa weèr ñgá' aètu yeèr buu bbebep ka'.	"They told the mountains and the rocks, ""Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him who sits on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb,"
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Nyúè aè m láè mi mmbomntaa tá mi bo jaè' ñwáè, ke' ba ená ñwáè ba ñkwaèa neè mmbomntaa ka'.	"He said to them, ""The Sabbath was made for man, not man for the Sabbath."
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Yu ñwáè ce m be bá' bráâd cúè' njep njaèp fa neè ye.” E ka' laèa wa'a, a bá' bráâd a cú' njep njaèp, a fa neè Judaès, muu Saimún IÌskarïìyoèt.	"Jesus therefore answered, ""It is he to whom I will give this piece of bread when I have dipped it."" So when he had dipped the piece of bread, he gave it to Judas, the son of Simon Iscariot."
E a boo ndap, zhì tâa à saʼ.	He built a house and his father scattered it.
Yi ka' ba wa'a máè loo neè weèe ená weèe ku gee ba yuu ce m ce geèe.	I beg you therefore, be imitators of me.
Ñwáè ce e ce laèa enáê, “M rïìñ ye”, ke' ce geèe yuu ce e laèa ka' yu ñwáè nya' mnde', a buu mini.	"One who says, ""I know him,"" and doesn't keep his commandments, is a liar, and the truth isn't in him."
Geewa'a, aède' mncir vi fa ñwáè ryoèñ ce nfeseè ka'. A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená buu bbebep vi túr ñger mbenduè ñgoèñ ca wááwá. Baná yu ba beèe ce a byemi neè Jisos Kraâis naè, ce a be túr buu ce Nyúè aè m kaè' ená e be fa neè beèe ce a byemi neè ye.	But the Scriptures imprisoned all things under sin, that the promise by faith in Jesus Christ might be given to those who believe.
A ka' laèa wa'a, a lor Pitaè ba Jáêms, ker ba Joân, a woweèe a duê. E ká' a ce señ buu, mluè mi ce koo ye seê.	He took with him Peter, James, and John, and began to be greatly troubled and distressed.
AÈ ka' ba seè'ni aèmboè weèe aè rïìñ Nyúè na, káè seè'ni ce Nyúè aè rïìñ weèe na, weèe aè ker ce koèñ aè rkúti aèmbuèu byú' enjep ñgoèñ na njoká? Njáèá byú' anaè vi yu aè cicïì, a túr ñger ka'. Weèe ker ce koèñ aè rkúti ba bkwaèa neè byú' anaè njoká?	But now that you have come to know God, or rather to be known by God, why do you turn back again to the weak and miserable elemental principles, to which you desire to be in bondage all over again?
M ce laèa seè'ni na ba neè weèe ce weèe yu ye beèe enje jáá. M yu ñwáè ntuu ba neè beèe enje jáá. M ce loèr la rfaè' ca aè mcáâr ka',	For I speak to you who are Gentiles. Since then as I am an apostle to Gentiles, I glorify my ministry;
Ncïìndap Nyúè yïì entombïì a fyáp rsoèñ li. E ka' fyáp, a lor mghoèo ba mor ba bláá, a tarshi a ma' njep nsheè. Ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar efa nsheè aè sheê. Ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar efa bce aè she foñ, mjáá mi she wááwá.	The first sounded, and there followed hail and fire, mixed with blood, and they were thrown to the earth. One third of the earth was burnt up, and one third of the trees were burnt up, and all green grass was burnt up.
Kwaè'shi ka neè aèmboè ndoñ ce a ke fyáp, ker ba rluñ ce a ke bu', ce mi túr myoèñ ka'. Ñwáè ka' fyáp ndoñ aè nji, káè bu' rluñ aè nji áè, aède' ñwáè riñ yuu ce e fyáp, káè yuu ce e bu' aè njáâá ká?	Even things without life, giving a voice, whether pipe or harp, if they didn't give a distinction in the sounds, how would it be known what is piped or harped?
Woweèe a m rïìñ njáèá njïì ce Nyúè e ke geèe beèe a ba byáánïì ka', a ce gheèter aè rroèo ba nduunjïì yap aè rba byáánïì, a kani yap yu njïì yïì Nyúè.	For being ignorant of God's righteousness, and seeking to establish their own righteousness, they didn't subject themselves to the righteousness of God.
E ka' ker du bguèu a mbañruèñwáè moè' ce nduu yïì ku bii nteèe, baná e koo nduu ñwáè moè'. Nduu yi anaè aè ka' kwe baná e luèñ efa ncir. E ka' du bguèu a mbañruèñwáè moè' aè nfeè' anaè, baná e koo nduu ñwáè moè' ka'.	So then if, while the husband lives, she is joined to another man, she would be called an adulteress. But if the husband dies, she is free from the law, so that she is no adulteress, though she is joined to another man.
E ka' koo bráâd ca a ku fúú njepmbeè. AÈ m ba neètú'.	Therefore, having received that morsel, he went out immediately. It was night.
Jisoès aè m laèa ca neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu, beèe wááwá a ce yu'.	In the hearing of all the people, he said to his disciples,
Jisoès aè ciisïì neè vi ená vi fa suñ ñwáè ená e yu Muu Nyúè ka'.	He sternly warned them that they should not make him known.
Lǒ embe dìʼ ce à tɛɛ anà.	Get away from where you are standing.
Pailáèt aè m ce koèñ aè rmaè'shi Jisoès, a ker laa yuu neè woweèe.	Then Pilate spoke to them again, wanting to release Jesus,
Woweèe a ceeshïì bco' ce keñ e ke táá aègho njep múè roè, vi suu njep roè, a ker ba'shi bkúè ce a ke kur yuu ce a ke doèo keñ aègho. Woweèe a ka' geèe wa' mïìsi, a naa ma cáâ' báèbár ce yi m ba kuè cuâu keñ tá fu' yi bo koo njo, doèo keñ duè aègho.	Casting off the anchors, they left them in the sea, at the same time untying the rudder ropes. Hoisting up the foresail to the wind, they made for the beach.
Wèr e ke lɛ̀ kwâa ba mbe ndùŋ.	We usually keep our corn on the ceiling.
Ñgaâa ncïìñ njeèe a m kúti, a ce yoèñshi Nyúè, a ker ce kuè'si ye aè buu wááwá ce woweèe a m yu' a ker yá, njobeè' buu anaè aè m ku ba aèmboè ncïìndap Nyúè aè m suñ woweèe.	The shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen, just as it was told them.
Geewa'a, woweèe a m rïìñ yuu ce e m laèa anaè ka'. A m súèti mbuèu efa yuu ce e m laèa anaè ese woweèe faè dïì' woweèe a bo rïìñ yi ka'. Woweèe a wáp aè rbipshi yuu kuu yuu ce e m laèa anaè.	But they didn't understand this saying. It was concealed from them, that they should not perceive it, and they were afraid to ask him about this saying.
Muu zhì à mʉ yaŋ, e lo bkìlò a du mbà Lùʼ.	Her daughter was ill and she migrated and went to Luh.
A m seèesi yuu a kuu búè ba njo' beèe mo' ce a m ce bo'shi ená a yu ñgaâa rbyemïì. Beèe anaè a m la' kuèu a vú a weâr mú tá a bo yá ka njáèá njïì ce weèr ce geèe buu waèrwaèr njobeè' weèr Jisoès weèe yu aèbee naè. Woweèe a m koèñ ená mncir Jus vi kur weèr.	This was because of the false brothers secretly brought in, who stole in to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage;
E túr aè rba ñwáè ce beèe ce a yu ñgaâa cor ka' a be ce laèa yáánïì aèmboè ye foñ faè dïì' beèe a lo taèa ye, tá e kwe aè taa Sataèn ka'.	Moreover he must have good testimony from those who are outside, to avoid falling into reproach and the snare of the devil.
Misèe mgbaŋ mi yû?	Where is our salt?

Siŋ à jaʼ mbe tu ce.	The bird has perched at the tree top.
Weèe fa bu' ka'. Yuu yi ka' buu weèe, weèe loo yi ese Nyúè ker yoñshi ye aètu mo.	In nothing be anxious, but in everything, by prayer and petition with thanksgiving, let your requests be made known to God.
Nyúè aè m maè'shi ená nyaèa ce e m fúú enjep nsheè na, yoñse mbenduè blañ ca, fa ryoèñ aègho tá vi bo laèa. E m maè'shi ená blañ ca vi yúshi beèe ce a be gú'shi neè vi ka'. Beèe wááwá ce yaè Ta aè fa neè máè, a be vúè yá máè. Ñwáè ce e ka' vú yá máè, aède' m ke juu ñgaèñ ka',	All those who the Father gives me will come to me. Him who comes to me I will in no way throw out.
Mɛ̀ kupshi ntaʼ ca à njɛ̀ɛ enɛ̂.	I have made this chair like this.
Seèe táá tatap ba aè buu mini ce seèe aè yu' a byemi naè njobeè' seèe túr tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ce e yu ñgoèr, ce e cu mbe buèu a táá a seâe btuè. Ñwáè tañshïû ñgoèr ca yu Jisoès ce e yu muu Nyúè.	Having then a great high priest, who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold tightly to our confession.
Mɛ̀ dù e banì a du ntaa.	I went when he had already gone to market.
Baná aèmboè Nyúè aè m ghoèni Abraèham njobeè' e m byemi neè ye naè, e be ghoèni beèe wááwá ce a byemi neè ye foñ.	So then, those who are of faith are blessed with the faithful Abraham.
Jus anaè a laa enáê, “Yá neè aèmboè e m koèñ ye naè.”	"The Jews therefore said, ""See how much affection he had for him!"""
“Yá neè, Seèe ce duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, tá a du fa Muu Ñwáè mbaè mmbo beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir. Woweèe a be sa' ye, teni ená a yú ye,	"Behold, we are going up to Jerusalem, and the Son of Man will be delivered to the chief priests and scribes, and they will condemn him to death,
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	19	keèr loèr ye fa ye mbaè mmbo beèe enje jáá tá woweèe a bo coosi ye, lïìp ye neè byáánsoè, taa ye mbe kïìntaa, mnoèñ vi ba btaar, e fúú efa rkwe.”	and will hand him over to the Gentiles to mock, to scourge, and to crucify; and the third day he will be raised up."
Yi yu boèñboñ ená ñwáè so ñwáè aè mbeèp yïì ba aètu yuu boèñboñ. Cena yu yuu yáánïì aè nfeè' wááwá, káè yu aè nfeè' m yu a weâe mú áè, káè m yu a weâe mú ka' áè.	But it is always good to be zealous in a good cause, and not only when I am present with you.
Nyaèa ce máè m yá anaè aè m feese mbaa. Mkuèu efa gho mi feeseè mkuèu njáèá nyaèa moè' ce a ke too ená báêá, cuèu efa gho yi ba aèmboè yïû búrúè' wa'a. Nyaèa ce e m feese nyaèaroè naè aè fa nyaèa ca ñger ba kúú.	The beast which I saw was like a leopard, and his feet were like those of a bear, and his mouth like the mouth of a lion. The dragon gave him his power, his throne, and great authority.
Baná vúè aègee kaèbaèraè' Nyúè, ke' ce tarni ka', yá ntee boèñboñ ce e túr neè seèe, njobeè' a mbe dïì' ce Nyúè be koosimnse neè seèe, jaè' seèe aè nfeè' ce yi yu ená e ba jaè' seèe.	Let us therefore draw near with boldness to the throne of grace, that we may receive mercy, and may find grace for help in time of need.
Kò ntaʼ ca tɛr mbe ndàp.	Take this chair and keep in the house.
Yi yu tatap neè weèe aè rbyemi ená Nyúè e ke fúr beèe ce a kweñger efa rkwe njoká?	Why is it judged incredible with you, if God does raise the dead?
Ntaŋguu à kepti a ku bɛti ba à ŋgàŋŋgàr.	The stick got broken and remained but very little string.
Nyúè ce e m geèe ñgoèñ a ker gee buu enjep ñgoèñ na wááwá yu Nyúè ce e ce sa' mbe buèu ba njep nsheè. E ke cu mbe ndaèp Nyúè ce beèe a baè'ri neè mmbo ka'.	The God who made the world and all things in it, he, being Lord of heaven and earth, doesn't dwell in temples made with hands,
Tata aè beesïì enáê, “Le rbyemïì li ba ba múcaèr se aèmboè ñgúè mostaè, weèe aè ba laèa neè ma ce ca enáê, ‘Co'ti embe na táá njep rdip rgoèr,’ tá yi ku yu'ni neè weèe.	"The Lord said, ""If you had faith like a grain of mustard seed, you would tell this sycamore tree, 'Be uprooted, and be planted in the sea,' and it would obey you."
Weèe lá ntee aè rkoni bfee ce vi be geèe tá weèe ja' cor goèr, caa bfee mo'. Baná m be suñ weèe yuu ce yi caèa buu ca wááwá seè'ni.	But earnestly desire the best gifts. Moreover, I show a most excellent way to you.
Woweèe a m borni efa rloo neè Nyúè ce e yu ñwáè foèo a ker ba Nyúè ce e ke kwe ka', a ce loo ba neè blañ ce a soèp vi feeseè ñwáè ce e ke loè ku kwe, ba bsiñ ba mnyaèa ker ba buu ce vi túr mnyoâr ka'.	and traded the glory of the incorruptible God for the likeness of an image of corruptible man, and of birds, and four-footed animals, and creeping things.
Tá buu bbebep ce rla' ca li m geèe naè kúti mbe tu mo. Tá ñgá' ce a be fa neè rla' ca, caa yïì ce li m ce fa neè beèe naè ñkaèraè' baa. Loèr neè ndoñ ce rla' ca li m ce fa beèe mruè' njo ená a no naè fa li mruè' njo tá li no. Fa neè li ba mruè' ce mi tap a caa mruè' mi caè ñkaèraè' baa.	Return to her just as she returned, and repay her double as she did, and according to her works. In the cup which she mixed, mix to her double.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “A weèe beèe ce weèe ce duèñshi ená weèe yu beâe mini, geewa'a, Nyúè rïìñ yuu ce yi yu njep weâe mntee wááwá. Yuu ce beèe a loèr aè yuu goèr yu yuu ce Nyúè baèa.	"He said to them, ""You are those who justify yourselves in the sight of men, but God knows your hearts. For that which is exalted among men is an abomination in the sight of God."

Mor zhi bar a too muu.	The fire has sparked and burnt the child.

Mbeŋ e ce gwè à yɛshì bkaŋ.	When it is raining place pans to collect water.

Zhi tap à rbèʼ nfèʼ ce rkar mutù rli ce bèeŋger.	It is difficult to count the number of times the wheel of a car is turning.
Jisoès aè kútïì aè ñgoâñ Galeèle neè ñger Yú' Rara. Nsuñ aèmboè ye aè duè aè bdïì' wááwá aè ñgoèñ anaè.	Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee, and news about him spread through all the surrounding area.
Nfeè' ce Muu Ñwáè be vúè, be ba aèmboè nfeè' yïì Nowa aè m ba naè.	"As the days of Noah were, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	38	Tá nfeè' ce mbeèñ aè m gweè mdip mi ruu a cete ñgoèñ naè ka' gháá, beèe a m ce ye buu, a ce no buu, bbyeèñge a ce duè bguèu, mmbañruè a ce loèr bbyeèñge, a ku ce geèe wa'a caar a ba' nyúè ce Nowa aè m niñ mbe keñ ñgoèr.	For as in those days which were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noah entered into the ship,
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	39	Woweèe a riñ yuu ce yi be koni ka', caar mdip mi ruu aè ñgoèñ, a yúshi woweèe wááwá. A mboè yi be ba wa'a, aè nfeè' ce Muu Ñwáè ce vúè.	and they didn't know until the flood came, and took them all away, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	40	Mmbañruè aè baa a be ba aè mñkúè, tá a lor moè', maè'shi moè'.	Then two men will be in the field: one will be taken and one will be left;
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	41	Bbyeèñge a baa a be ce goè' baa, tá a lor moè', maè'shi moè'.	two women grinding at the mill, one will be taken and one will be left.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	42	Baná weèe ce ke'ni wee btu njobeè' weèe rïìñ noèñ ce yeè Tata be vúè ka'.	Watch therefore, for you don't know in what hour your Lord comes.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	43	Rïìñ neè ená ñwáè ndap aè ka' ba riñ nfeè' ce nyáèá be vúè neètú' yáèá yïì buu, e ba ce keè'se, keè' maè'shi tá nyáèá kep yïì ndap ka'.	But know this, that if the master of the house had known in what watch of the night the thief was coming, he would have watched, and would not have allowed his house to be broken into.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	44	Baná wee weèe aè ba tami nyor njobeè' Muu Ñwáè be vúè aè nfeè' ce weèe ce kwaè'shi ená e be vúè ka'.	Therefore also be ready, for in an hour that you don't expect, the Son of Man will come.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	45	“Ñwáè rfaè' ce e yu ñwáâ mini, a ba ñwáè bfee foñ yu nda? Mboè yu ñwáè ce yïì masaè be láè yïì ndap ená e ce fyá', ce fa byee neè yi ñgaâa mfaè' mo' njep nfeè' a?	Who then is the faithful and wise servant, whom his lord has set over his household, to give them their food in due season?"
Njeñwáè ce e m ba ñkúú embaè mbuèu ñgoèñ, be keè naèti táá aè noèñ mnsa', laèa ená ñgúè beèe yïû seè'ni na aè geèe yuu bebep njobeè' e m vúè yi ba aè njïìsaèp seê, aè ryu' blaèa bfee ce Solomúèn aè m ce laèa. Yá neè! Yuu mo' yi yu mbena seè'ni ce yi caèa Solomúèn.	The Queen of the South will rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation, and will condemn them: for she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and behold, one greater than Solomon is here.
A m ce loè kur ye mkoo ba mkuèu neè bkwaèñ, e ku ceeshi. Ñwáè moè' aè ker túr ñger aè rkoo ye kur ka'.	because he had been often bound with fetters and chains, and the chains had been torn apart by him, and the fetters broken in pieces. Nobody had the strength to tame him.
Ka' cu, ñgoèñ yi ci'tïì tatap seê, ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè suu embe buèu, a biñsi luèr embe ncuèu rsheè, a cu mbenduè mo.	Behold, there was a great earthquake, for an angel of the Lord descended from the sky, and came and rolled away the stone from the door, and sat on it.
“Ñwáè ce e ka' riñ aè rfyá' aè yuu ce yi yu múcaèr neè mini-ñwáè, baná aède' e fyá' aè yïû goèr neè mini-ñwáè foñ. Ñwáè ce e ka' riñ aè rfyá' aè yuu ce yi yu múcaèr ka', baná aède' e riñ aè rfyá' aè yïû goèr foñ ka'.	He who is faithful in a very little is faithful also in much. He who is dishonest in a very little is also dishonest in much.
Woweèe a m ce koèñ aè rkoo ye mbe keñ. A ka' keè', a ku yá ená woweèe a baè' neèñguu túè faèdïì' woweèe a m ce duè.	They were willing therefore to receive him into the boat. Immediately the boat was at the land where they were going.
Ñwáè aè ka' ce tarni aè rye njáèá byee mo', kúti ye byee anaè, baná Nyúè be taèa ye njobeè' e ce ye byee anaè wa'a, a byemi ená yi yu yáánïì neè ye aè rye ka'. Ñwáè aè ka' ce geèe yuu ce e byemi ená yi yu yáánïì ka', baná ñwáè anaè aè geèe yuu bebep.	But he who doubts is condemned if he eats, because it isn't of faith; and whatever is not of faith is sin.
Ñwáè msaèasïì moè' aè m vúè a yá Jisoès, a gú'shi njep yeâ tïìi, a loo ye, a laa enáê, “Wáè ka' koêñ, aè gee m ke'seè, ba nrara.”	"A leper came to him, begging him, kneeling down to him, and saying to him, ""If you want to, you can make me clean."""
Jisoès aè ka' rïìñ ená a ce cu mcúè tá a bo yú ye, a loâ aèfo. Beèe magoèr a m duè a yeâ mbuèu, e gee beèe wááwá ce a m ce yañ a ke'seè.	Jesus, perceiving that, withdrew from there. Great multitudes followed him; and he healed them all,
Buu wááwá aè geèe Nyúè, aè ba yïì buu. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' e m roèo ená beèe magoèr a koni fáñ aè rba boo vi, sa' foèo, yi m ba yáánïì ená e gee tá ñwáè ce e be múè' njïì naè yá ñgá', ghááte aè ñwáè ce aède' e gee woweèe a luêñ.	For it became him, for whom are all things, and through whom are all things, in bringing many children to glory, to make the author of their salvation perfect through sufferings.
Pailáèt aè bipshïì neè woweèe enáê, “Baná m be geèe má ká neè Jisoès ce a too ená Kraâis na?” Woweèe wááwá a beesïì enáê, “Taa yi mbe kïìntaa.”	"Pilate said to them, ""What then shall I do to Jesus, who is called Christ?"" They all said to him, ""Let him be crucified!"""
E m gweè njeptii Jisoès a yoñshi ye. Ñwáè anaè aè m ba ñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè.	He fell on his face at Jesus' feet, giving him thanks; and he was a Samaritan.
Woweèe a m ku cu mbe Ndaèp Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá a ce yoèñshi Nyúè.	and were continually in the temple, praising and blessing God. Amen.
Cena yi ka' mïì, máè yá mbe buèu. A ka' fyá' mbo, dïû' rara ce yi caèa ñger ce yi yu mbe Ndaèp Nyúè embe buèu naè yi ba too.	After these things I looked, and the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened.
AÈ ka' ba aè mbuèuñkuèr, Jisoès aè vú a yïì beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú.	When it was evening he came with the twelve.
E ka' kwaè'shi wa' wáá a ker laa enáê, ‘A yuu ce m be geèe na. M be saè'si wa bcaèñ, sáá vïû bgoèrgoèr, láè yaè kwaa ba yaè buu njo.	He said, 'This is what I will do. I will pull down my barns, and build bigger ones, and there I will store all my grain and my goods.
njobeè' woweèe a m be riñ aèmboè Jisoès aè m geèe, a ka' nyañ ku' beèe ca neè bráâd taê, ba nca baa ka'.	for they hadn't understood about the loaves, but their hearts were hardened.
E fèʼshi a lʉsi nè rloo.	He preached and concluded with a prayer.
Maataè aè m láè ntee ba aè rfáèr byee. E vú a laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Tataê, nfúraè aè maè'shi mfaè' wááwá ba mbe máâ mmboè, wáè ke' ce loèr aè yuu ka' a? Laèa neè ye ená e vú ja' máè.”	"But Martha was distracted with much serving, and she came up to him, and said, ""Lord, don't you care that my sister left me to serve alone? Ask her therefore to help me."""
Jus a ka' yu' blaèa ca, a kwá' bluèr tá a bo túúshi ye aègho tá e kwe.	Therefore Jews took up stones again to stone him.
Ñgá' ce weèr ce yá, ce e be cu njïìsaèp ka' naè, yu aèmboè yuu ce yi fáp wa'a, a ce geèe tá seèe bo ghááte aè rkoni foèo ce yi be cu nfeseè. Foèo anaè yi caèa ñgá' anaè goèr seê.	For our light affliction, which is for the moment, works for us more and more exceedingly an eternal weight of glory;
A ka' vú efa ntaa, a ku su'si mmbo wáá ka' ye yuu. Woweèe a ker túr ndeèe moè' foñ ce waêp bta a m kwe, a lá neè woweèe, aèmboè aède' woweèe a su'sïì mndoñ ba mkïìñ, ker ba bkañ aè njïû yáánïì.	They don't eat when they come from the marketplace, unless they bathe themselves, and there are many other things, which they have received to hold to: washings of cups, pitchers, bronze vessels, and couches.)
Malaʼ à dù bgùu mbà Tàakù a Ndì.	Malah has married at Taku to Ndi.
Geewa'a, beèe magoèr ce a m yu' yuu ce woweèe a m laèa a m byemi. Beèe ce a m byemi a m baè' seè'ni aèmboè ncúèkïì ta wa'a.	But many of those who heard the word believed, and the number of the men came to be about five thousand.
Ŋwɛ̀ kaʼ gee yuu bebep nè mɛ̀ banɛ m̀ be fòosi ye.	If someone does evil to me, therefore I will forgive him.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe fa keèr de'ñger ka'.	"Therefore Jesus answered them, ""Don't murmur among yourselves."
Yu'ni neè neè beèe ce a yu kuèntombïì neè weèe, gee yuu ce a ce laèa neè weèe. Woweèe a ce keè'ni me myoèñ, a ker ba foñ beèe ce a be keè táá aè bsii Nyúè, suñ aèmboè a m geèe rfaè' ca aè nfeè' ce woweèe a m ba njep ñgoèñ na. Seèe yu'ni neè woweèe tá woweèe a bo ce geèe lap rfaè' neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè, buwa'laèr woweèe a lo ce koosimnse, tá yuu anaè yi ja' weèe ka'.	Obey your leaders and submit to them, for they watch on behalf of your souls, as those who will give account, that they may do this with joy, and not with groaning, for that would be unprofitable for you.
Beèe wááwá embe kansuèr a ka' fyá' bsii Stáfaèn, a yá vi ba aèmboè bsii ncïìndap Nyúè wa'a.	All who sat in the council, fastening their eyes on him, saw his face like it was the face of an angel.
Woweèe a du mbe dïì' mo' ce a m ce too ená Gáètsámanïì. A ka' baè' mbo, Jisoès aè laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Cu neè mbena tá m gee rloo.”	"They came to a place which was named Gethsemane. He said to his disciples, ""Sit here, while I pray."""
Wɛ̀ vʉ̀ mʉcòŋ a?	Have you come for no bad reason?
E laa enáê, “Duè neè, muunje ca aè kwe kwe ka', e ce buumi buumi.” E ka' laèa wa'a, woweèe a vúshïì ye.	"he said to them, ""Make room, because the girl isn't dead, but sleeping."" They were ridiculing him."
Jus ce a woweèe a m ce cu rkwe mbe ndaèp naè a ka' yá aèmboè Máèári aè saè'ti a fúú njepmbeè, woweèe a du a yeâ mbuèu njobeè' a m ce kwaè' ená e ce duè aè rwar rkwe faèdïì' rsheè li m ba.	"Then the Jews who were with her in the house, and were consoling her, when they saw Mary, that she rose up quickly and went out, followed her, saying, ""She is going to the tomb to weep there."""
A mboè rbyemïì li ku ba wa'a. Ñwáè aè ka' byemi, ke' ce geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ ka' baná rbyemïì anaè li yu gúâú yuu.	Even so faith, if it has no works, is dead in itself.
AÈ yu ñwáè rboâñtu njobeè' wáè byemi ená yuu ce Tata aè laèa neè wáè yi be kuè ba aèmboè e laèa.”	"Blessed is she who believed, for there will be a fulfillment of the things which have been spoken to her from the Lord!"""
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ca ma Jisoès ba bfúr vi a vú a tááte njep ncúèúndúè', a ce ká' ye.	His mother and his brothers came, and standing outside, they sent to him, calling him.
Ka' cu, mmbañruè mo' beèe a mmbaa ce a m ba mnfeèp a cu aèwaâa nduunjïì. A ka' yu' ená Jisoès ce caèa, woweèe a waa, a laa enáê, “Tataê, Muu Dávïìd, koosimnse neè weèr.”	"Behold, two blind men sitting by the road, when they heard that Jesus was passing by, cried out, ""Lord, have mercy on us, you son of David!"""
M ce suñ weèe máná m be keèr ye ñkaè' ca ka', caar tá yuu ce ñkaè' ca yi táá aètu mo yi ke ghááte mbe rla' Nyúè embe buèu.”	"for I tell you, I will no longer by any means eat of it until it is fulfilled in the Kingdom of God."""
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Mboè weèe ce yá ndap ca a? M ce suñ weèe neè mini- ñwáè ená luèr moè' be cu nje Ndap Nyúè ca ka'. A be káèáshi vi wááwá.”	"But he answered them, ""You see all of these things, don't you? Most certainly I tell you, there will not be left here one stone on another, that will not be thrown down."""
Pol aè ka' baè' aè rla' Milátoès, a cep ntuu ená btu embe cor aè rla' Áfásoès a vú yá ye.	From Miletus he sent to Ephesus, and called to himself the elders of the assembly.
Bfúr waê, m ku ba ñwáè rkwe aè nfeè' wááwá. Máè laèa wa'a njo' naèatu ce m ce naèa neè weèe njobeè' seèe yu aèbee seèe Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yïìseèe Tataê.	I affirm, by the boasting in you which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord, I die daily.
njobeè' Tata Nyúè ce keè'ni beèe ce a ce geèe buu byáánïì, a ce yu' lap rloo, a ce fa ñgá' neè beèe ce a ce geèe buu bbebep.”	"For the eyes of the Lord are on the righteous, and his ears open to their prayer; but the face of the Lord is against those who do evil."""
Tu bsoogáè yïû goèr ca aè m koo Poêl, a laa ená a kur ye neè bshañ bbaa, a bipshi neè beèe ená Pol yu nda lá, a ker bipshi ená e geèe ba ká lá?	Then the commanding officer came near, arrested him, commanded him to be bound with two chains, and inquired who he was and what he had done.
Yá aèmboè Nyúè yu ñwáâ ñgoèr naè! Yá aèmboè e rïìñ buu, a túr bfee se naè! AÈde' ñwáè riñ aèmboè Nyúè ce kwaè'shi ka'. AÈde' ñwáè riñ aèmboè Nyúè ce geèe yïì buu ka'.	Oh the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and the knowledge of God! How unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past tracing out!
Taèr koèñ Muu, a ce duèñshi ye buu wááwá ce e ke geèe. E be duèñshi ye buu bghagha' ce e be geèe ce vi be caèa vïì ce weèe aè yá na, tá weèe yá, báèáñger seê.	For the Father has affection for the Son, and shows him all things that he himself does. He will show him greater works than these, that you may marvel.
Máèlkisidáèk ca aè m ba ñkúú aè to' Saláèm, a ba ñwáè tañshi tañshïì neè Nyúè embe buèu. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' moè' Abraèham aè ka' duè maè' bïìr a bkúú mo', a so woweèe. A ka' ce kúti, Máèlkisidáèk aè du a koni ye a ghoni ye.	For this Melchizedek, king of Salem, priest of God Most High, who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings and blessed him,
M rïìñ máná a m loèr mbañruèñwáè anaè a du aègho aè ñgoâñ Paraèdaêis. Káè e m duè neè yïì nyor áè, ká e m duè aègho ka' áè, m rïìñ ka'. Ñwáè ce e rïìñ ku ba Nyúè caè'caè'.	I know such a man (whether in the body, or outside of the body, I don't know; God knows),
Kwaè'shi ba aèmboè Jisoès ce e m byemi, a yá ñgá' mbaè mmbo beâe bbebep ce a m baèa ye, faè dïì' weèe lo koosi bsáè tá ntee yi lo kwe weèe ka'.	For consider him who has endured such contradiction of sinners against himself, that you don't grow weary, fainting in your souls.
Ñwáè Farïìsi moè' ce a m ce too ená Gaèmalïìyaèl, aè m naèti mbekïì. AÈ m ba ñwáè ce e m ce yá'ni beèe mncir Nyúè, aè ba ñwáè ce beèe wááwá a m ce yu'ni neè ye. E m laèa ená a fúr beèe ca njepmbeè tá a cu njo nfeè' múcaèr.	But one stood up in the council, a Pharisee named Gamaliel, a teacher of the law, honored by all the people, and commanded to put the apostles out for a little while.
Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa enáê, “Ñwáè wááwá ce e ka' byemi neè ye, baná e be coosi ñgaèñ ka'.”	"For the Scripture says, ""Whoever believes in him will not be disappointed."""
E m loèr mú ghaèrñwáè a tár mbe waâp mú, a koo ye nje nyoèr, a laa enáê,	He took a little child, and set him in the midst of them. Taking him in his arms, he said to them,
Nyúè aè m lapni ye njo' yuu bebep ce e m koèñ aè rgeèe anaè. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè, jaèaki' ce e ke laèa ka', aè laa aèmboè ñwáè wa'a, a gee ñwáè ntuu Nyúè ca aè ke' gee yuu ce yi m ba neè blúr-ñwáè ka'.	but he was rebuked for his own disobedience. A mute donkey spoke with a man's voice and stopped the madness of the prophet.
A ke làa yuu à lo bàp.	When something is said, act quickly.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' moè' e laa enáê, “Nyúè, m be suñ bfúr wa aèmboè njáèá ñwáè ce aè yu; m be táá aè múè yoè beèe, yoèp yáá, náèsi wáè.”	"saying, ""I will declare your name to my brothers. In the midst of the congregation I will sing your praise."""
Nyaèa ce e m ba nteèe, a bii nteèe seè'ni ka' naè yu ñkúú embenjïì bkúú saèambaê. E yu ñkúú embenjïì bkúú saèamba wa'a, a ku ba aè múè bkúú saèamba ca. Ku báti nfeè' múcaèr tá e nati du faèdïì' ce a be yú ye tá e kwe dúèdúè.	The beast that was, and is not, is himself also an eighth, and is of the seven; and he goes to destruction.
M ka' du ba' fa mbaèa ce a kuèu anaè neè woweèe, misi rfaè' anaè, tá m lá' caè'ni weèe ka' caèa duè aè to' Spáên.	When therefore I have accomplished this, and have sealed to them this fruit, I will go on by way of you to Spain.
Woweèe a ka' vúè baè', Pol aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe rïìñ njáèá njïì ce máè m cu a weâe mú káâ' aè noèñ ce máè m tár kuèu aè ñgoâñ Áshaè.	"When they had come to him, he said to them, ""You yourselves know, from the first day that I set foot in Asia, how I was with you all the time,"
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Yá buu, lo rbyemïì li geèe wáè, wáè ke'seè.”	"Jesus said to him, ""Receive your sight. Your faith has healed you."""
Pitaè aè fúú a du a yeâ mbuèu a ke' riñ ená yuu ce ncïìndap Nyúè aè m geèe anaè yi m ba mini ka'. E m kwaè'shi ená e ku yá yá.	And he went out and followed him. He didn't know that what was being done by the angel was real, but thought he saw a vision.
Joân aè m yar bcáè' ce a m ba' neè mnyoâr Kaèmáêl, a cúú ñguèp nyaèa njep mbuèu. Vi byee aè m ba mñguu ba bluè.	Now John himself wore clothing made of camel's hair, with a leather belt around his waist. His food was locusts and wild honey.
Nyúè aè m ka' tá koosimnse efa rfaèrshi mmba' ce mo' efa ce Oleèf yïû aè mñkúè ka', baná e be koosimnse efa rfaèrshi weèe foñ ka'.	for if God didn't spare the natural branches, neither will he spare you.
Bbyeèñge foñ a túr aè rba ba beèe ce a ce loèr buu aètáèr ka', ba ñgaâa mnsa'ni foñ ka'. A túr aè rba beèe ce a túr ntee bobor, ba foñ beèe ce a yu mini aè buu wááwá.	Their wives in the same way must be reverent, not slanderers, temperate, faithful in all things.
Woweèe a ka' suñ beèe aèmboè Jisoès, keèr feè'shi blaèa Tataê, a nati a kúti Jáèrusaláèm. Woweèe a ka' ce kúti a fe'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca aè ku' mla' magoèr aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè.	They therefore, when they had testified and spoken the word of the Lord, returned to Jerusalem, and preached the Good News to many villages of the Samaritans.
Kuè táá ba njep blaâa mini aèmboè Jisos Kraâis ce wáè m yu' ese máè naè. Geèe tá lo rbyemïì ba rkoèñ ce wáè koèñ beèe njo' Jisos Kraâis naè li yááti.	Hold the pattern of sound words which you have heard from me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
Bsoogáè a m ku gee aèmboè a m laèa neè woweèe, a lor Pol neètú', a du aègho a ba' aè rla' AÈntipaètidaè.	So the soldiers, carrying out their orders, took Paul and brought him by night to Antipatris.
“beèe a mmbaa a m duè mbe Ndaèp Nyúè aè rgeèe rloo, moè' aè ba ñwáè Farïìsïî, moè' aè ba ñwáè ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè'.	"Two men went up into the temple to pray; one was a Pharisee, and the other was a tax collector.
Luke	Luêk	18	11	Ñwáè Farïìsi aè táá, a loo neè yïì nyor, a laa enáê, ‘Nyúè, m ce yoèñshi wáè njobeè' m yu aèmboè beèe mo' ka'. M yu ñwer ka', a ba ñwáè nfïìp ka', a ce koo bbyeèñge beèe ka'. M ce yoèñshi wáè ená m yu aèmboè ñwáè ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' ca ka'.	The Pharisee stood and prayed to himself like this: 'God, I thank you, that I am not like the rest of men, extortioners, unrighteous, adulterers, or even like this tax collector.
Luke	Luêk	18	12	Máâ ke jïì mdip nfeè' baa njep ñgaèa, ce geèe rloo, ce fa ñgúè' moè'sir efa rúú efa yaè buu wááwá.’	I fast twice a week. I give tithes of all that I get.'
Luke	Luêk	18	13	Ñwáè ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' aè táá yi yu encaèñ, a naa yi yu mi mmir a ke' mbe buèu ka'. E m la' mi mbo mbe yeâ ntee a laa enáê, ‘Nyúè, koosimnse neè máè ce m yu ñwáè ñgeèe buu bbebep.’	But the tax collector, standing far away, wouldn't even lift up his eyes to heaven, but beat his breast, saying, 'God, be merciful to me, a sinner!'
Luke	Luêk	18	14	M ce suñ weèe ená ñwáè ce e m duè mbe yeâ ndaèp a ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè aè m ba ñwáè ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè', aè ke' ba ñwáè Farïìsi ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' naa yïì nyor mbekïì baná a be suèusi ye njep nsheè. Ñwáè ce e ka' suusi yïì nyor njep nsheè baná a be naèa ye mbekïì.”	I tell you, this man went down to his house justified rather than the other; for everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, but he who humbles himself will be exalted."
Muu ca à yàŋse a tɛɛ tàʼtàʼsê.	This child has learned how to stand very early.
Tá beèe a ku'si Nyúè aè nfeè' bsïìp. Yi yu wa'a.	to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.
M ̀ tʉr mbàʼ ntʉʉ rtaa kaʼ.	I donʼt have thread to knit a cap.
Ku ba Nyúè ce e fa ncir, a ker túr ñger aè rsa' beèe, ku ba ye ce e túr ñger aè rjaè' beèe, a ker túr ñger aè rbepsi beèe. A wáè nda, ka' ce sa' bfúr wo?	Only one is the lawgiver, who is able to save and to destroy. But who are you to judge another?
Ñwáè ce e m koo ncúèkïì moè'sir naè aè vú foñ, a laa enáê, ‘Masaè, máè m rïìñ máná aè yu ñwáâ ntatap seê. Wáâ ke kep yuu ce wáè m byeè ka', kap yuu ce wáè m ñwañ ka'.	"He also who had received the one talent came and said, 'Lord, I knew you that you are a hard man, reaping where you did not sow, and gathering where you did not scatter.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	25	25	Máè m wáp, a du a tuñ beè'teè a súti yo mbaèa njo. Yáê, a yo mbaèa na.’	I was afraid, and went away and hid your talent in the earth. Behold, you have what is yours.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	25	26	Yïì masaè aè laa neè ye enáê, ‘AÈ yu ñwáè rfaâ' mbembep, a ba mbor. Wáè m rïìñ wáná máâ ke kep yuu ce máè m byeè ka', kap yuu ce máè m ñwañ ka'.	But his lord answered him, 'You wicked and slothful servant. You knew that I reap where I didn't sow, and gather where I didn't scatter."
E vʉ̀ a suŋ wèr nè zhii cùu.	He came and told us himself.
M ce bipshi máná woweèe a m yu' nsuñ ca ka' lá? Yi yu mini wa' ka'. Yi yu enáê, “Beèe a yu' yaèp njeèndoñ aè bdïì' wááwá enjep ñgoèñ. Wap blaèa vi baè' aè mmbuu ñgoèñ wááwá.”	"But I say, didn't they hear? Yes, most certainly, ""Their sound went out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world."""
Ncïìndap Nyúè anaè aè vúê, a laa neè ye enáê, “Máè caè'ni wáè! Tata yu weèe ye, aè túr rboâñtu weèe Nyúè!”	"Having come in, the angel said to her, ""Rejoice, you highly favored one! The Lord is with you. Blessed are you among women!"""
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè beèe ce a máñni Jisoès, m túr ñger mo' aè rsa' woweèe ka'. Nyúè a ñwáè ce e ke sa' njáèá beèe ca. Yu ba yiseèe dïì' aè rsa' ñgaâa coêr, yá ená woweèe a geèe boèñboñ káè bebep lá. Yaè beèe, baná weèe gee aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè. A sañ mbo enáê, “Fúr neè ñwáâ mbembep efa weâe mú.” Máè túr yuu aè rlaèa aèmboè mnsa' ce weâe duè aègho mbe koêr.	"For what have I to do with also judging those who are outside? Don't you judge those who are within? But those who are outside, God judges. ""Put away the wicked man from among yourselves."""
Máèári ce aè rla' Makdalaè, ba Máèári moè' caè, a m cu aè ncuâu rsheè.	Mary Magdalene was there, and the other Mary, sitting opposite the tomb.
Ñwáè aè luèu ntaa a caa njeèe. Baná ncir yi byemi ená ñwáè gee yuu boèñboñ nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè.”	"Of how much more value then is a man than a sheep! Therefore it is lawful to do good on the Sabbath day."""
E ka' yu' ená Lasoèroès ce yañ, a ker cu faèdïì' ce e m ba naè aè mnoâñ bbaa.	When therefore he heard that he was sick, he stayed two days in the place where he was.
Ma yïì Jisoès, ba nfúr yïì maê, ba Máèári ce e m ba ñgwa Kïìlopaès ba Máèári ce aè rla' Makdalaè, a m táá aègee kïìntaa Jisoès.	But there were standing by the cross of Jesus his mother, and his mother's sister, Mary the wife of Clopas, and Mary Magdalene.
AÈnaèniyaès aè ka' yu', a gwe aè nsheè a kwe. Beèe ce a m yu' yuu ce yi m koni anaè, a m wáp seê.	Ananias, hearing these words, fell down and died. Great fear came on all who heard these things.
E beesïì enáê, “A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, ‘Ñwáè e ke cu nteèe ba njo' bráâd caè'caè' ka'. E ke cu ba njo' blaèa ce vi ke fúú ekuèèèè cuâu Nyúè.’ ”	"But he answered, ""It is written, 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds out of the mouth of God.'"""
Ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a m káè' a ce sár mnsár ená ñwáè efa waâp mú ce e yu ñwáâ ñgoèr a nda lá.	There arose an argument among them about which of them was the greatest.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè beèe ce a m ce aè btu embe cor naè, woweèe a m ker kyese yuu mo' mbenduè blaèa ce máè m ce feè'shi ka'. Ka' beèe ca a m ba btu wa'a, máè m loèr yap nta' anaè aè yuu goèr ka', njobeè' beèe wááwá a yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè.	But from those who were reputed to be important (whatever they were, it makes no difference to me; God doesn't show partiality to man)--they, I say, who were respected imparted nothing to me,
Jisoès aè fyá' ñgoèñ, a laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Yi yu tatap se neè ñgaâa mbaèa aè rniñ mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè.”	"Jesus looked around, and said to his disciples, ""How difficult it is for those who have riches to enter into the Kingdom of God!"""
Bfúr waê, weèe fa ce laèa bebep kuu beèe mo' ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' ce laèa bebep kuu nfúr yïì, ker ce sa' ye, baná e ce laèa bebep kuu ncir, a ker ce sa' ba yi. Weèe aè ka' ce sa' ncir baná weèe aè borni aè rláè ncir, a ká' a ce sa' yi sa'.	Don't speak against one another, brothers. He who speaks against a brother and judges his brother, speaks against the law and judges the law. But if you judge the law, you are not a doer of the law, but a judge.
Weèe aè m ba riñ mbuèu efa blaèa ce Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa enáê, ‘Yuu ce m ce koèñ yu ñkoosimnse, ke' ba tañshïì ka'’ naè, weèe aè m ba laèa weená ñwáè ce e geèe yuu bebep ka' yu ñwáè mbembep ka'.	But if you had known what this means, 'I desire mercy, and not sacrifice,' you would not have condemned the guiltless.
Pol aè baashïì ñguu a byá' mbe rkoo, a ka' ce toèo, nyo aè fúú enjo njobeè' mor yi m luèu goèr, a luu ye aè boè, a barni aègho.	But when Paul had gathered a bundle of sticks and laid them on the fire, a viper came out because of the heat, and fastened on his hand.
Ñwáè ka' laa yuu ba aè yi ñger, baná ñgaèñ ce roèo ená beèe a ku'si ba ye. Ñwáè aè ka' ce roèo ená beèe a ku'si ba ñwáè ce e tuu ye, seèe riñ seená ñgaèñ yu ñwáè mini, a túr faèa ka'.	He who speaks from himself seeks his own glory, but he who seeks the glory of him who sent him is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.
Nsuñ ce weèr aè yu' ese ye, a ce suñ weèe, yu ená Nyúè yu rraa, túè'nji yu njep ye ka',	This is the message which we have heard from him and announce to you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.
Beèe mo' a vú neè ñwáè moè' ce yïì ñgúè' nyor moè' aè m kwe, e noñ mbe keèñ. Jisoès aè ka' yá lap rbyemïì, a laa neè ñwáè ce yïì ñgúè' nyor moè' aè m kwe naè enáê, “Kur ntee muu waè, máè foèosi wáè efa yoè buu bbebep.”	"Behold, they brought to him a man who was paralyzed, lying on a bed. Jesus, seeing their faith, said to the paralytic, ""Son, cheer up! Your sins are forgiven you."""
Wɛ̀ ba ce dù.	You ought to be going.
Jisoès aè ka' ce duè rjáèr, ñwáè moè' aè cañ a vú a gú'shi njep yeâ tïìi, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïû mboèñmboñ, yuu ce aède' m gee ka' koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè a ká?”	"As he was going out into the way, one ran to him, knelt before him, and asked him, ""Good Teacher, what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life?"""
Ncïìndap Nyúè embenjïì mo aè fyáp rsoèñ li. E ka' fyáp, máè yu' njeèndoñ aèmboè e vúâ aè mmbur kyeèe embe dïì' rfa ce a m geèe neè guêl, yi táá kuèntombïì neè Nyúè naè.	The sixth angel sounded. I heard a voice from the horns of the golden altar which is before God,
E ka' duè múcaèr, a ker yá Jáêms, ba Joân ce a m ba boo Sábáèdi mbe keñ, a ce túúshi map mraa. E ká' woweèe.	Going on a little further from there, he saw James the son of Zebedee, and John, his brother, who were also in the boat mending the nets.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, weèr aè ke' ce láè mer mmir ba mbenduè buu ce beèe a ce yá neè mmir ka'. Weèr aè láè mer mmir ba mbenduè buu ce aède' ñwáè yá ka', njobeè' buu ce aède' ñwáè yá, vi be cu nfeseè ka'. Vïì ce vi be cu nfeseè yu vïì ce aède' ñwáè yá ka' naè.	while we don't look at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen. For the things which are seen are temporal, but the things which are not seen are eternal.
M ce kwaè'shi máná m ka vúê, seèe cu aè mú nfeè' moè', seemoè' aède' seèe ku cu nfeè' kïìntoèo mïî. E mïì wáá, weèe ja' máè m du faèdïì' m koèñ aè rduè.	But with you it may be that I will stay, or even winter, that you may send me on my journey wherever I go.
Weèe aè ka' ce luuni aèmboè mnyaèa, baná weèe lor nfeè' faè dïì' weèe yúshi wee btu ka'.	But if you bite and devour one another, be careful that you don't consume one another.
Buu bbebep beèe moè' vi ke yaèñse yááti, beèe aè riñ ená woweèe a be gweè mnsa'. Buu bbebep vi beèe moè' vi loè lor nfeè' seê, ka' yááti.	Some men's sins are evident, preceding them to judgment, and some also follow later.
Jisos Kraâis aè vúè wáá aè tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, a vú neè bghoènïì a fa neè seèe. E ce geèe li rfaè' ba mbe dïì' ce yi boèñ a caa dïû' rara ca njobeè' dïì' anaè yi yu yáánïì seê. Dïì' anaè aè m geèe ñwáè ka', baná yu yuu enjep ñgoèñ na ka'.	But Christ having come as a high priest of the coming good things, through the greater and more perfect tabernacle, not made with hands, that is to say, not of this creation,
Ñwáè ca be coosi wáè ce wáè geèe búè, a riñ mncir Nyúè ce a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè, a lá vi ka' naè.	Won't the uncircumcision which is by nature, if it fulfills the law, judge you, who with the letter and circumcision are a transgressor of the law?

E ka' mú' keèñ, ñwáè ceteè ka', e ka' cete, ñwáè mú' ka'.	To the angel of the assembly in Philadelphia write: He who is holy, he who is true, he who has the key of David, he who opens and no one can shut, and who shuts and no one opens, says these things:

E kòŋ à rsuŋ mɛ̀ kaʼ, mɛ̀ ku sor a rîŋ.	He didnʼt want to tell me, and I just insisted and understood it.
Baná be keè ba aè nfeè' ce beèe a fúú efa rkwe, tá njeñwáè ca ba ñgwa nda, aèmboè yi yu ená bfúr beèe nsaèamba ca wááwá a m ba bduu vi naè?”	"Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them will she be? For the seven had her as a wife."""
Ñwáè moè' yu aègho ce e m be du mbe buèu caa efa Muu Ñwáè ce e m loè embo a suu njep ñgoèñ na ka'.	No one has ascended into heaven, but he who descended out of heaven, the Son of Man, who is in heaven.
Abraèham aè m byemi ená Aisïìk aè ka' kwe, Nyúè ku túr ñger aè rgeèe tá e kúti nteèe. AÈde' seèe laa seená Aisïìk aè m ba aèmboè ñwáè ce e m kwe wáá, Nyúè aè fúr ye efa rkwe, yïì ta aè konïì lá ye wa'a.	concluding that God is able to raise up even from the dead. Figuratively speaking, he also did receive him back from the dead.
Máè laa mánáê, ‘M be geèe má ká Tataê?’ Tata aè beesïì enáê, ‘Naèti mbekïì du aè rla' Daèmaskoès. AÈ be baè' aèfo tá a suñ wáè buu wááwá ce Taèr aè ce ená aè geêe.’	I said, 'What shall I do, Lord?' The Lord said to me, 'Arise, and go into Damascus. There you will be told about all things which are appointed for you to do.'
E ka' laèa neè ye wa' wáá, a laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Ñwáè aè ka' ce koèñ aè rvúè a máâ mbuèu baná ñgaèñ kani yïì nyor, byá' yi kïìntaa vú a máâ mbuèu,	"Then Jesus said to his disciples, ""If anyone desires to come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me."
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a ce vúèshi ye foñ, a ce laèa a waâp mú enáê, “E m jaè' beèe mo' a moo aè rjaè' yi tu laèr.	"Likewise, also the chief priests mocking among themselves with the scribes said, ""He saved others. He can't save himself."
