Pastò kaʼ zhɛɛ yuu banɛ e coosi tu sê.	If a pastor steals then he has disgraced himself so much.
Mdip mi kʉ̀te àgho.	Water has poured on it.
Awá Saimún Pitaè ce e m túr saè', aè co' embaè ruèu, a tee tuè' maè' ese ñkwaèa ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì. A m ce too ñkwaèa anaè ená Markuès. Nyúè aè m tuu Muu yïì njep ñgoèñ ená e vú sa' beèe enjep ñgoèñ ka', e m tuu Muu yi ená woweèe a bo luèñ njo' ye.	For God didn't send his Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world should be saved through him.
A ke kupshi tamfar tɛ e bo tap e.	The father of twins is usually massaged so that he can become strong.
Baná ñwáè efa beèe a mntaar ca ce aè ce kwaè'shi ená e m ba nfúr neè ñwáè ce e m gweè mbe mmbo byáèá naè aè m ba nda?”	"Now which of these three do you think seemed to be a neighbor to him who fell among the robbers?"""
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè bcor Jisos Kraâis ce vi m ba aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè, a be riñ máè ka'.	I was still unknown by face to the assemblies of Judea which were in Christ,
Bɛr njàp ca zhi ku bii a?	Is some leftover soup remaining?
Rbyemïì li m geèe taèr ba ma yïì Musïìs a ka' bi Musïìs, a ke' yú ye ka', a súti mbe ndaèp aè mñwáá btaar. Woweèe a m yá ená muu waèp anaè boèñ seê, a ke' wáp yap yu aè rbú' ncir ñkúú ka'.	By faith, Moses, when he was born, was hidden for three months by his parents, because they saw that he was a beautiful child, and they were not afraid of the king's commandment.
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' li rkwe ce e m kwe naè, e ba seè'ni ba ñwáè ce e táá mbetar Nyúè ba ñwáè, a gee leâ' fi, tá beèe ce Nyúè aè ce a bo koni buu bboèñboñ ce Nyúè aè kaè' neè woweèe naè, túr buu anaè nfeseè. Li rkwe anaè li geèe beèe ce a m ce geèe buu bbebep aè nfeè' ce leè' entombïì yi m kur woweèe naè, a ce luèñ.	For this reason he is the mediator of a new covenant, since a death has occurred for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first covenant, that those who have been called may receive the promise of the eternal inheritance.
Ñwáè moè' ka' yá nfúr yïì e ce geèe yuu bebep ce aède' e gee e kwe ka', ñgaèñ loo tá Nyúè fa ye ryoèñ. M ce laèa ba aèmboè beèe ce a geèe buu bbebep ce aède' vi gee woweèe a kweñgeèr ka'. Yuu bebep ce e geèe ñwáè kwe yu aègho, geewa'a m ce laèa máná e loo aè yuu bebep anaè ka'.	If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin not leading to death, he shall ask, and God will give him life for those who sin not leading to death. There is a sin leading to death. I don't say that he should make a request concerning this.
Yïì beèe aè m baèa ye seê, a tuu beèe a yeâ mbuèu ená a du laa neè ñgaâa ghar kúú enáê, ‘Weèr ce koèñ ená ñwáè ca ba yeèr ñkúú ka'.’	But his citizens hated him, and sent an envoy after him, saying, 'We don't want this man to reign over us.'
AÈde' seèe laa seè'ni ená rraa ce li m ba njep rsa' rrúèú na li ker ce yááti aè yuu ka' njobeè' seèe ce jáèr seè'ni ba njep rsa' rfi ce li ce raa a caa ñger.	For most certainly that which has been made glorious has not been made glorious in this respect, by reason of the glory that surpasses.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a ker be'ti nyor a ce sañ yuu aè nsheè neè ntubo.	Again he stooped down, and with his finger wrote on the ground.
Jisoès aè múè' nduunjïû fi tá seèe bo niñ mbe dïì' anaè, koni ryoèñ. E múè' nduunjïì anaè neè yïì nyor. Cena yi yu aèmboè e tii lá ndaèñ ce a m teni rum enje mú naè aègho wa'a.	by the way which he dedicated for us, a new and living way, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh;
Nfeè' moè' be ba ce mdoñ rúú ce wáè yá, ba nyaèa caè a be baèa kwaèraè ca, faèp buu ese ye wááwá tá e kar mbuèuriñ. A be sáá nyaèa efa yeâ nyoèr ye, keèr loèr mor toèo ye aègho.”	The ten horns which you saw, and the beast, these will hate the prostitute, and will make her desolate, and will make her naked, and will eat her flesh, and will burn her utterly with fire.
Ka' ba ená weâe ke geèe búè nyúè mmbomntaa faè dïì' weèe bo bú' ncir Musïìs ka', weèe aè ka' ce bepsi ntee neè máè njobeè' máè geèe ñwáè aè luñ boèñboñ efa yi yañ nyúè mmbomntaa njoká?	If a boy receives circumcision on the Sabbath, that the law of Moses may not be broken, are you angry with me, because I made a man completely healthy on the Sabbath?
Mncir vi túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè rbyemïì ka'. Mncir vi laèa yi ená ñwáè yu'ni neè vi yu'ni. A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè aè ka' lá mncir wááwá, ñgaèñ ka' koni ryoèñ.”	"The law is not of faith, but, ""The man who does them will live by them."""
Bfúr waê, m be feè'ni yuu ce m ce laèa aè yuu ce beèe a ke geèe. Beèe a mmbaa a ka' ye leè', aède' moè' bú' leè' anaè ka'. AÈde' moè' ker kyese yuu mo' mbenduè leè' anaè ka', njobeè' a kur wáá.	Brothers, speaking of human terms, though it is only a man's covenant, yet when it has been confirmed, no one makes it void, or adds to it.

Mmisèe mi ku cu.	Everyone has sold beans.
Blaâa Nyúè vi yu bteèe, a túr ñger, vi cáp a caa sa' mbyáèráñ. Vi loè niñ njep ntee ñwáè ker niñ njep mi mkwaè'shïì caa aèmboè saè' mbyáèráñ e ke niñ nje yuu naè. Blaâa Nyúè ca vi ke geèe buu ce ñwáè ce kwaè'shi njep yeâ ntee vi yáátïì aèwañ. E be suñ weèe buu ce vi bii ka' ba.	However when he, the Spirit of truth, has come, he will guide you into all truth, for he will not speak from himself; but whatever he hears, he will speak. He will declare to you things that are coming.
John	Joân	16	14	Yú' anaè yi be kuè'si máè njobeè' buu ce yi be suñ weèe vi be loè ba ese máè.	He will glorify me, for he will take from what is mine, and will declare it to you.

John	Joân	16	16	Jisoès aè m ker laa enáê, “Nfeè' múcaèr tá weèe yá máè ka', e ba nfeè' múcaèr tá weèe yá máè.”	A little while, and you will not see me. Again a little while, and you will see me."
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ka' ce suñ máè ce suñ aèmboè ya tu wa'a, yuu ce m ce suñ yi yu yáánïì njobeè' máè rïìñ faèdïì' ce máè vúè, a riñ faèdïì' ce m ce duè. Ñwaè' ca ce sañ máâ Pol ce m yu ñwáè ntuu neè Jisos Kraêis. AÈ m ce ñwáè a ce máè ená m gee rfaè' ca ka'. Máè m koo ñger ese ñwáè moè' aè rgeèe rfaè' ca foñ ka'. AÈ m ce ba Jisos Kraâis ba Taèr Nyúè ce e m fúr Jisoès efa rkwe.	Paul, an apostle (not from men, neither through man, but through Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead),
Bo zhi tàte mɛ̀, mɛ̀ riŋ à rghashi ŋwàʼ ca kaʼ.	My hand is numb, I donʼt know how to handle this book.
Yá neè ená ñwáè wááwá ku gee ba yuu ce Nyúè aè fa ye ñger ená e geêe. Ñwáè wááwá ku ba aèmboè e m ba tá Tata Nyúè ka' ká' ye. A yuu ce m ce yá'ni aè bcor wááwá.	Only, as the Lord has distributed to each man, as God has called each, so let him walk. So I command in all the assemblies.
Baná ñwáè ce e ka' tá ye bráâd ca, ker ce no enjep ndoñ ca aè njïû yáánïì ka', baná ñgaèñ aè loèr nyor ba bláá Tata aè yuu cicïì.	Therefore whoever eats this bread or drinks the Lord's cup in a way unworthy of the Lord will be guilty of the body and the blood of the Lord.
M ̀ be fʉʉ laa ŋgwaʼ àyàŋsè.	I shall provide the society tomorrow.
Dù koni ye à rfàʼ.	Go and help him do the work.
Nlaèa anaè yi m beèeñger aè ñwáè ghup, a cu a weâr mú. Weèr aè m yá yi foèo ce yi m loè ba ese yïì Taê. Nyúè aè m fa njáèá foèo ca ba neè muu yïì ce e ku ba moè'sir. Weèr aè m yá rboâñ Nyúè ba mini Nyúè ba njep ye.	The Word became flesh, and lived among us. We saw his glory, such glory as of the one and only Son of the Father, full of grace and truth.
M ce koèñ máná weèe riñ Febeè ce e yu njar yïìseèe, ce e yu dikoèn embe cor aè rla' Keñkáèraè.	I commend to you Phoebe, our sister, who is a servant of the assembly that is at Cenchreae,
A m geèe bcuèu ñka' ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú anaè neè njáèá bluèr mo' ce a m ce too ená, “Páêl.” Bluèr anaè vi m ba ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú a ghááte aè bcuèu efa gho wááwá. A m geèe mnduunjïû aè rla' ca neè gul ce e m ce raañger aèmboè glaês.	The twelve gates were twelve pearls. Each one of the gates was made of one pearl. The street of the city was pure gold, like transparent glass.
Àdeʼ à beʼ ŋwàʼ à limbùm a?	Can you read in Limbum?
Wáè caèa yeèr ta Abraèham a? E m kwe. Ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè anaè a kweñgeèr foñ. Wáè ka' ce laèa yo ená a wáè nda?”	"Are you greater than our father, Abraham, who died? The prophets died. Who do you make yourself out to be?"""
Tata Jisoès be jaè' máè efa ñgá' wááwá, loèr máè duè aègho mbe buèu mbe dïì' ce e ce sa' yi kúú. Seèe ku'si ye aè nfeè' wááwá. Yi yu wa'a.	And the Lord will deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me for his heavenly Kingdom; to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.
Ñwáè aè ka' ce faè' neè Kraâis aè njáâá wa'a, baná Nyúè be yu' rboèñ neè ñgaèñ, tá beèe a vúse ye.	For he who serves Christ in these things is acceptable to God and approved by men.
M ce laèa neè weèe ená Kraâis aè m vúè aè ñwáè rfaè' neè Jus tá Nyúè bo geèe buu ce e m kaè' neè viseèe bta naè, duèñshi ená e yu ñwáè mini.	Now I say that Christ has been made a servant of the circumcision for the truth of God, that he might confirm the promises given to the fathers,
Saèkaèriyaè aè ka' ba mbo wa'a, ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè nyáá, a táá aè ñgúè' bo maè' dïû' ntoèo nráèá.	An angel of the Lord appeared to him, standing on the right side of the altar of incense.
Buu ca aè ba geèe tá see seèe foñ riñ ená seèe aè ba koèñ buu bbebep aèmboè viseèe bta a m koèñ naè ka'.	Now these things were our examples, to the intent we should not lust after evil things, as they also lusted.
Woowèe a tùr, a baʼri ndap.	They have managed and built a house.
Cena yi m ba wa'a, tá nlaèa ce Jisoès aè m laèa kuu njáèá rkwe ce e be kwe naè yi bo kuè ghááte njo.	that the word of Jesus might be fulfilled, which he spoke, signifying by what kind of death he should die.
Ndì à tàʼ zhi mbàa a yɛ.	Ndi searched for his money and found it.
E be geèe ku' buu goèr se tá e bo bo' beèe ce a ce bú aègho. Woweèe a ce bú njobeè' a m kani aè rkoèñ mini ce e m ba geèe tá woweèe a luêñ.	and with all deception of wickedness for those who are being lost, because they didn't receive the love of the truth, that they might be saved.
Kǎaŋkòʼ zhi gwɛɛ mbǔuŋgʉp sê.	Crows are too fond of eggs.
A m bipshi enáê, “Ñwáè Ryá'nïì, suñ weèr nfeè' ce buu ca be koni. Yuu ce yi be duèñshi ená nfeè' ce buu ca be koni aè gháá, yu ká?”	Tell us, when will these things be? What is the sign that these things are all about to be fulfilled?
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “A máè ye. Weèe be yá Muu Ñwáè aèmboè e cu aè bo maè' Nyúè ce e túr ñger wááwá, keèr yá foñ aèmboè e ce suèu aè múè mmbaè'.”	"Jesus said, ""I am. You will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of Power, and coming with the clouds of the sky."""
Nyúè aè m ka' ba gee Abraèham ba yáánïì njobeè' buu ce e m geèe, Abraèham aè m ba túr yuu ce aètaè e m ba naa nyor aègho. Geewa'a, e m túr yuu mo' aè rnaèanyor aègho aè bsii Nyúè ka',	For if Abraham was justified by works, he has something to boast about, but not toward God.
Weèe aè ka' loo ka' njáèá ká aè máâ rlii, m be geèe yi.	If you will ask anything in my name, I will do it.
Nyúè aè m koèñ beèe enjep ñgoèñ magoèr seê, a tuu Muu yïì ce e ku ba moè'sir ená ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè ye, e bo kwe ka', koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè.	For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
Ñgúè buu ce e m gweèñger aè múè msini naè, yu beèe ce a yu' nlaèa Nyúè,	Others are those who are sown among the thorns. These are those who have heard the word,
Weèr ce loèr buu bïìr ca ce siñsi bfee beèe enjep ñgoèñ na aègho, ker ba njáèá buu ce beèe a ce kwaè'shi, ce vi geèe woweèe a máñnïì bfee Nyúè. Weèr ce loèr vi ce so mkwaè'shïì beèe aègho tá woweèe a bo yu'ni neè Jisos Kraêis.	throwing down imaginations and every high thing that is exalted against the knowledge of God, and bringing every thought into captivity to the obedience of Christ;
“Yaè beèe, blaâa Nyúè vi be kuè ghááte aèmboè Yú' Rara yi m laèa njïì enjep Dávïìd, kuu Judaès ce e m duèñshi njïì neè beèe ce a m koo Jisoès.	"Brothers, it was necessary that this Scripture should be fulfilled, which the Holy Spirit spoke before by the mouth of David concerning Judas, who was guide to those who took Jesus.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	1	17	E m ba moè' efa seèe ce a m fa ye rfaè' ce seèe ce geèe na foñ.”	For he was numbered with us, and received his portion in this ministry.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	1	18	Judaès ca aè m loèr yi mbaèa bláá ce e m koni naè a yuu ñkúè aègho. E m gweè aè yeâ ñkúè anaè njep nshe neè bsii, rbúè li watïì, bto vi fúú aè mñkúè.	Now this man obtained a field with the reward for his wickedness, and falling headlong, his body burst open, and all his intestines gushed out.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	1	19	Beèe wááwá aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a m yu' yuu ce yi m koni Judaès. Woweèe a ka' yu', a too ñkúè anaè aè yaèp li ená AÈkádámaè. Mbuèu efa gho aè ba ená, “Ñkúè Bláá.”	It became known to everyone who lived in Jerusalem that in their language that field was called 'Akeldama,' that is, 'The field of blood.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	1	20	“A sañ mbe Ñwaè' Byáá enáê, ‘Tá yïì ndap ba mboèmmbo, tá ñwáè ke' cu mbo ka'.’ A ker sañ mbo foñ enáê, ‘Tá ñwáè moè' lor yi nta' rfaè'.’	For it is written in the book of Psalms, 'Let his habitation be made desolate. Let no one dwell therein;' and, 'Let another take his office.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	1	21-22	Baná seèe be ce ñwáè moè' tá e lor yi nta' rfaè' tá weèr woweèe bo suñ beèe ená weèr aè m yá Jisoès aè nfeè' ce e m fúú efa rkwe. Seèe ce ñwáè ce seèe woweèe aè m ba aè nfeè' ce Jisoès aè m ce kar seèe woweèe, ká' embe nfeè' ce Joân aè m ce baèptir beèe, du ba' mbe nfeè' ce Tata Nyúè aè m loèr ye a du aègho mbe buèu.”	Of the men therefore who have accompanied us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us, beginning from the baptism of John, to the day that he was received up from us, of these one must become a witness with us of his resurrection."""
Wèr be capshi mkuu efa mʉ̀ʉ kwâa.	We will sort beans from the maize.
Wèr à dù à mŋkʉ̀ʉ a kap ŋjàp gòr sê.	We have gone to the farm and harvested a lot of vegetables.
Njeñwáè anaè aè laa neè ye enáê, “Máè rïìñ máná Máèsayaè ce a too ená Kraâis naè be vúè. E be vúè tá e suñ seèe buu wááwá.”	"The woman said to him, ""I know that Messiah comes,"" (he who is called Christ). ""When he has come, he will declare to us all things."""
Rkwe li m vúè njep ñgoèñ na njo' yuu ce ñwáè moè'sir aè m geèe. Beèe a be keè fúú efa rkwe foñ njo' yuu ce ñwáè moè'sir aè m geèe.	For since death came by man, the resurrection of the dead also came by man.
Weèe ce weèe yu ñgaâa mbo'ni. AÈsayaè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m laèa yuu mini se a kuu weèe aè nfeè' ce e m ce cep ntuu Nyúè,	You hypocrites! Well did Isaiah prophesy of you, saying,
Mwɛɛ mi ce koʼni.	Cats are mating.
Yi m ku ba wa'a foñ neè njeñwáè saèkïì ce a m ce too ená Rahaèp. E m ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njobeè' e m súèti ñgaâa ñker ce beèe Isráèl a m tuu, a duñshi woweèe nduunjïì mo', woweèe a cañ a kúti.	In the same way, wasn't Rahab the prostitute also justified by works, in that she received the messengers, and sent them out another way?
Wèr à làa buu ce bvi kuu ye.	We have said things that concern him.
Woweèe a ker yop enáê, “AÈleèluyaè! Rla' ca li ce she, tá njemor yi ko' mbekïì, mïì aè nfeè' moè' ka'.”	"A second said, ""Hallelujah! Her smoke goes up forever and ever."""
Beèe wááwá a be keèe baèa weèe njo' máè. Geewa'a, ñwáè ce e ka' táá tatap du ba' aè lúèsimbuèu, ñgaèñ be luèñ.	You will be hated by all men for my name's sake, but he who endures to the end will be saved.
Weèe ka' niñ coêr, beèe ce a rïìñ aè rlaèa li ce woweèe a m be yá'ni ka', a ka' ba a weâe mú aèñgoo seê, woweèe a fa laèa bsïìp ka'. Beèe a mmbaa káè beèe a mntaar áè, efa woweèe a ka' laêa, yi ba yáánïì. Moè' e laèa mïìsi wáá, moè' ka' laêa, ker ba ená a ka' ce laèa, ñwáè moè' beesi blaèa anaè aè li ce aède' beèe a yu'.	If any man speaks in another language, let it be two, or at the most three, and in turn; and let one interpret.
Njeñwáè moè' efa múè bbyeèñge ca ce a m ce too ená Lidïìyaè a m yu' yuu ce weèr aè m laèa. AÈ m ba ñwáâ aè rla' Taèitiraè, a ba ñwáè ce e m ce fyeèni bcáè' ce vi m luèu ntaa. AÈ m ba njeñwáè ce e m ce loo neè Nyúè. Nyúè aè m múè' yi ntee, e byemïì blaâa Nyúè ce Pol aè m feè'shi.	A certain woman named Lydia, a seller of purple, of the city of Thyatira, one who worshiped God, heard us; whose heart the Lord opened to listen to the things which were spoken by Paul.
M be vʉ̀ wɛɛ à kaʼ dù.	I will come before you go.
Fáñ yi m loè a yááti mbe nfeè' ce Hároèd aè m ká' ñkaè' yi noèñ ce a m bi ye. E m be beâe bgoèrgoèr embe yeâ nto', ba bsoogáè ce bgoèrgoèr, ba boèo mlii mo' ce aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê.	Then a convenient day came, that Herod on his birthday made a supper for his nobles, the high officers, and the chief men of Galilee.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Fa neè buu ñkúú neè ñkúú, fa vïû Nyúè neè Nyúè.” Woweèe a ba neè rgha'nïì-ñwáè aè ryu' njáèá laèa ca.	"Jesus answered them, ""Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar's, and to God the things that are God's."" They marveled greatly at him."
Ka' cu, ñwáè moè' efa múè beèe anaè aè fuñ enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, m ce bu' mmbo neè wáè ená aè fyá' muu waè ca. Ku ba muu ce m túr caè'caè'.	"Behold, a man from the crowd called out, saying, ""Teacher, I beg you to look at my son, for he is my only child."
E beesïì a laa enáê, “Rtarnïì li yu njo ka', AÈlajaè be vúè wáá, geèe tá buu wááwá kúti aèmboè vi m ba. Baná a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená Muu Ñwáè be kuè yá ñgá' seê, tá beèe a jaasi ye njoká?	"He said to them, ""Elijah indeed comes first, and restores all things. How is it written about the Son of Man, that he should suffer many things and be despised?"
Jisoès aè laa enáê, “Saimúèn, m túr yuu aè rsuñ wáè.” E laa enáê, “Suñ laè máè, ñwáè ryá'nïì.”	"Jesus answered him, ""Simon, I have something to tell you."" He said, ""Teacher, say on."""
Mor anaè yi be keè liiti nyúè moè' ka'.	where their worm doesn't die, and the fire is not quenched.'
Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “Beèe mo' a ce laèa ená yu Joân ñwáè baèptir beèe, beèe mo' a ce laèa ená yu AÈlajaè, beèe mo' a ce laèa ená, ka' tá ba Jáèrïìmiyaè ka' baná yu ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè moè'.”	"They said, ""Some say John the Baptizer, some, Elijah, and others, Jeremiah, or one of the prophets."""
Beèe magoèr a m lapni ye ená e cu nyañ. E ker misi a waa seè'ni magoèr seê, a laa enáê, “Muu Dávïìd, koosimnse neè máè.”	"Many rebuked him, that he should be quiet, but he cried out much more, ""You son of David, have mercy on me!"""
Beèe a m cu a ce keè', a ce tarni ená Joân yu Kraâis anaè lá.	As the people were in expectation, and all men reasoned in their hearts concerning John, whether perhaps he was the Christ,
Pitaè aè ku ce kuèushi keèñ; woweèe a ka' múè', a yá ye, a bááñger seê.	But Peter continued knocking. When they had opened, they saw him, and were amazed.
Njeñwáè ca aè geèe yuu ce yi ghááte aè ndeèe yi ñger. E cuè'ni mgúr ca fa máâ nyoèr aè rkupshi yaè nyor tá a ka' tuñ.	She has done what she could. She has anointed my body beforehand for the burying.
Yú' Rara yi duèñshi seèe ená tañshïì ce e m geèe nfeè' moè'sir naè yi m ghááte. Yi káè' a laa enáê,	The Holy Spirit also testifies to us, for after saying,
Saimún Pitaè aè bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Tataê, aè ce duè ba fá?” Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “AÈde' aè du faèdïì' ce m ce duè na seè'ni ka'. AÈ be loè ka' vúè a máâ mbuèu.”	"Simon Peter said to him, ""Lord, where are you going?"" Jesus answered, ""Where I am going, you can't follow now, but you will follow afterwards."""
Mɛ̀ yɛ àmbò e ce dòo mutù, zhi ghaʼ mɛ̀ sê.	I have seen him driving a car and that has surprised me.
Wèe à lɛ̀ vi bkwàŋ ba fɛ?	Where have you kept his rods?
Mnoâñ bbaa ca vi ka' caèa, Jisoès aè natïì a ce duè aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê.	After the two days he went out from there and went into Galilee.
Mɛ̀ m̀ bee du kaʼ.	I have never gone.
E ka' loè embo ce duè, a ker yá beèe mo' a baa ce aè m ba Jáêms, ce e m ba muu yïì Sábáèdïî, ba nfúr yïì ce Joân. Woweèe a m ba mbe keñ a yaèp ta weèe a ce cúúshi map mraa. Jisoès aè ká' woweèe.	Going on from there, he saw two other brothers, James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, in the boat with Zebedee their father, mending their nets. He called them.

Máè m duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm tá m bo yá beèe ce a m ba ñgaâa ntuu neè Jisoès entombïì neè máè naè ka'. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce seèe aè m ce geèe buu bbebep, a ba aèmboè beèe ce a kweñger naè, Nyúè aè gee seèe aè kútïì bteèe seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe. Wèr à kumì nzhɛ̀ɛ anà nè bkʉ̀.	We have tied that thief with ropes.
AÈ m ba efa rkáè', Nlaèa yi ku ba. Yi m ba aèbee a Nyúè. Nlaèa anaè yi m ba Nyúè.	In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' Abraèham aè m gaèp buu bdïì' rúêú, lor dïû' mo'sir a fa neè Máèlkisidáèk naè, yi m ba aèmboè Lávïì ce boo vi a ke koo dïû' mo'sir efa buu rúú naè aè m lá fa foñ wa'a.	We can say that through Abraham even Levi, who receives tithes, has paid tithes,
Máè laèa wa'a njobeè' e ke ba aè nfeè' ce a ce ye byee, ñwáè ku ce ye vi byee, ke' ce kwaè'shi aèmboè beèe mo' ka'. Yi loè ba wa'a, njeè ce yañ beèe moè', beèe moè' a no mruè' mi koo woweèe.	For in your eating each one takes his own supper first. One is hungry, and another is drunken.
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená faèdïì' wááwá ce a ka' ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ njep ñgoèñ na, a be suñ yuu ce njeñwáè ca aè m geèe naè, keèr ce kuushi ye.”	"Most certainly I tell you, wherever this Good News may be preached throughout the whole world, that which this woman has done will also be spoken of for a memorial of her."""
Yer mbʉ zhi kweŋger wɛɛ.	Our goats are all dead.
Koʼshi nje ŋgʉʼndap.	Shift nearer the wall.
Sataèn aè lor ye a du aègho mbe tu rtuèu, a duñshi ye bto' wááwá enjep ñgoèñ na njaè' moè'sir,	The devil, leading him up on a high mountain, showed him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.

Sàʼ yòo ca cɛp a?	Is this your knife sharp?
Caè'ni neè Tïìrfánaè ba Tïìrfosaè ce yu bbyeèñge ce a ce faè' neè Tata naè. Caè'ni neè Pásïìs ce e yu ñkaraè a ba foñ njeñwáè moè' ce e faè' neè Tata tatap se naè.	Greet Tryphaena and Tryphosa, who labor in the Lord. Greet Persis, the beloved, who labored much in the Lord.
Nyúè a m laèa enáê, ‘Yu'ni neè yoè ta ba yoè maê.’ A ker laa enáê, ‘Ñwáè ce e ka' cáp yïì taê, káè yïì ma áè, baná a be yú ñgaèñ.’	For God commanded, 'Honor your father and your mother,' and, 'He who speaks evil of father or mother, let him be put to death.'
Wèr à zheŋger a yuʼ sê.	We have eaten and we are satisfied.
Ncïìndap Nyúè embenjïì mo aè fyáp rsoèñ li. E ka' fyáp, máè yá rkaèñsïì aèmboè li suèu embe buèu a gwe aè nsheè. A fa bki ce rkaèñsïì anaè li bo múè' cuèu rwee aègho. Rwee anaè li m coomi seê, lúèsimbuèu aè ba aègho ka'.	The fifth angel sounded, and I saw a star from the sky which had fallen to the earth. The key to the pit of the abyss was given to him.
Muunje anaè aè ku lo mbekïì a ce jáèshi. E m ba bfeè' ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú. Beèe a m báèáñger seê.	Immediately the girl rose up and walked, for she was twelve years old. They were amazed with great amazement.
Jisoès aè bipshïì neè woweèe enáê, “Waè' weèe aè yu' buu ca wááwá a?” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “ÁÈno.”	"Jesus said to them, ""Have you understood all these things?"" They answered him, ""Yes, Lord."""
Zhii yaŋ zhi yu sèʼni àndèe.	His sickness is better now.
Bjar vi a m cep ntuu neè ye enáê, “Tataê, ñwáè ce aè koèñ naè ce yañ.”	"The sisters therefore sent to him, saying, ""Lord, behold, he for whom you have great affection is sick."""
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ñwáè ce e ka' koni yaè ñwáè ntuu, baná ñgaèñ aè koni máè. Ñwáè ce e ka' koni máè, baná ñgaèñ aè koni ñwáè ce e m tuu máè.”	"Most certainly I tell you, he who receives whomever I send, receives me; and he who receives me, receives him who sent me."""
Atà m̀ ̀ zhe zhii yuu kaʼ njobèʼ wèr woowèe e ke jì.	I cannot eat something given by him because we abstain from each other.
E ka' yu' ená e yu ñwáâ aè ñgoèñ ce Hároèd ce sa', e tuusïì ye neè Hároèd ce e m ba aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè nfeè' anaè foñ.	When he found out that he was in Herod's jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who was also in Jerusalem during those days.
Bduu foñ a ba cu a wap bbyeèñge weèe neè bfee-ñwáè. Woweèe a ba rïìñ ená bbyeèñge a yu yap bwáèni, yu'ni neè woweèe. Woweèe a ba geèe wa'a njobeè' woweèe bsïìp a be koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè ce li loè ese Nyúè njo' yi ntee boèñboñ. Woweèe a ba geèe wa'a faè dïì' yuu mo' yi bo jepsi lap rloo ka'.	You husbands, in the same way, live with your wives according to knowledge, giving honor to the woman, as to the weaker vessel, as being also joint heirs of the grace of life; that your prayers may not be hindered.

Njáèá ñgeèe ca yi tá'shi weèe aèmboè yuu ce ñwáè maè' bïìr aè yar a tá'shi yïì ñguèñ aègho wa'a. A m ce loâ kur ye neè bshañ aè mkoo ker ba aè mkuèu ce keè'ni ye. Yi geèe wa'a, e ceeshïì bshañ anaè, nyúèrkaè' lor ye du aègho aè ntee rïìñ. Bbyeèñge mo' a m ba aèfo foñ, a táá aè njïìsaèp a ce fyá'. Máèári aè rla' Makdalaè, ba Máèári ce aè m ba ma yïì Jáms ce ñká' ba Joseès, a m ba aè múè bbyeèñge ca a Saèlomeè weèe. Maa bbàr koo ŋgoʼ.	Ignore the excrement in order to catch termites.
Ñgaâa fuèp a be kuè ba weèe woweèe aè nfeè' sïìp. AÈde' weèe ja' woweèe aè nfeè' weèe aè gwáá. Geewa'a, seèe be ba aè nfeè' sïìp ka'.	For you always have the poor with you, and whenever you want to, you can do them good; but you will not always have me.
A ke bʉsi ŋkʉʉ, cʉʉ ye koter mbà rkoo.	When a chief is buried, a magical vine is tied around the wrist.
Fu' yi ká' a ce caèa goèr seê, rdip li ce beèeñger ce ko' mbekïì, ce suèu.	The sea was tossed by a great wind blowing.
baná weèe ker ba beâe aè to' Isráèl wááwá, aè ba rïìñ ená ñwáè ca aè jáèr boèñboñ ba aè rlii Jisos Kraâis ce aè rla' Nasaráèt. Jisoès ca yu ñwáè ce weèe aè m taa mbe kïìntaa, Nyúè aè fúr ye efa rkwe naè.	be it known to you all, and to all the people of Israel, that in the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, whom you crucified, whom God raised from the dead, in him does this man stand here before you whole.

"He said to him the third time, ""Simon, son of Jonah, do you have affection for me?"" Peter was grieved because he asked him the third time, ""Do you have affection for me?"" He said to him, ""Lord, you know everything. You know that I have affection for you."" Jesus said to him, ""Feed my sheep."
Ka' máè laèa wa'a, ñwáè ka' lor ne ñgwa, baná e geèe yuu bebep ka'. Muu ñgoèñgoè ka' du bguèu baná e geèe yuu bebep ka'. Weèe aè rïìñ ená beèe wááwá ce a ke cu aè nduu a ñgwa a ke yá ñgá' njep ñgoèñ na seê. Máè yá ya máná ñwáè aè ba cu ñkúè faè dïì' e bo yá njáèá ñgá' ca ka'.	But if you marry, you have not sinned. Lòr bàa nè njàp ŋwɛ̀ vʉ àgho mbena.	Take the bag together with the vegetable and bring them here.

Nfur ce e mʉ tʉr nà ce ghɛ̀ʼ ɛ.	The wound he sustained is getting bigger.

M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená aède' ñwáè rfaè' caa yïì masaè ka'. AÈbaè ñwáè ntuu caa ñwáè ce e tuu ye ka'.	Most certainly I tell you, a servant is not greater than his lord, neither one who is sent greater than he who sent him.

Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	28	M ce laèa ya neè weèe ená ñwáè aè ka' yá njeñwáè ce kwaè'shi ená a ye a ba noèñ, baná e koo njeñwáè anaè wáá.	but I tell you that everyone who gazes at a woman to lust after her has committed adultery with her already in his heart.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	29	Lo rlir maè' li ka' gee wáè aè gee yuu bebep, aè so'nïì li enje tuè, ma'. Yi yu aèndeèe ená aè buu ñgúè' moè' efa wáâ nyoèr neè ce ená a ma' yoè nyor wááwá njep mor.	If your right eye causes you to stumble, pluck it out and throw it away from you. Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	30	Yo bo maè' yi ka' gee wáè aè gee yuu bebep, aè tee yi ma'. Yi yu aèndeèe ená aè buu ñgúè' moè' efa wáâ nyoèr neè ce ená yoè nyor wááwá du njep mor. AÈmboè Jisoès aè m ce yá'ni beèe mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, e lo a bipshi neè woweèe enáê, “Ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a laèa ená Kraâis anaè yu muu Dávïìd aè njáâá ká?	"Jesus responded, as he taught in the temple, ""How is it that the scribes say that the Christ is the son of David?"
AÈde' ñwáè moè' vú yá máè caa efa ená Taèr ce e m tuu máè aè geèe e vú a yá máè ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' vú yá máè baná m be geèe tá ñgaèñ fúú efa rkwe aè noèñ elúèsimbuèu.	No one can come to me unless the Father who sent me draws him, and I will raise him up in the last day.
Máè tami nyor aè rvúè caè'ni weèe. M ka' vú ca'ni weèe baná máè caè'ni weèe seè'ni nfeè' taar. M be vúè tá m ba ntáèr neè weèe ka' njobeè' yuu ce m ce roèo yu ba yeè buu ka', m ce roèo ba weèe. Yi yu ená boo a fyá' aè wap mma ba wap bta ka'. Yi yu ba ená mma ba btaèr a fyá' aè boo wap.	Behold, this is the third time I am ready to come to you, and I will not be a burden to you; for I seek not your possessions, but you. For the children ought not to save up for the parents, but the parents for the children.
ñkúè aè ba ñgoèñ ca, ñgúè buu bboèñboñ aè ba beèe ce Nyúè yu yaèp ñkúú, ñke' aè ba beèe ce a yu beèe Sataèn.	the field is the world; and the good seed, these are the children of the Kingdom; and the darnel weeds are the children of the evil one.

Joân aè ka' baèptir beèe wááwá, a baptir Jisoès foñ. Jisoès aè ka' ce geèe rloo, rbuu li mú'tïì.	Now it happened, when all the people were baptized, Jesus also had been baptized, and was praying. The sky was opened,
Beèe a ka' yá aèmboè blúr a ce laèa, beèe ce a m kepñger a ce jáèr, mntáèñ a ce jáèr boèñboñ, mnfeèp a ce yá buu, a bááñgeèr seê, a ku'si Nyúè beèe Isráèl.	so that the multitude wondered when they saw the mute speaking, injured whole, lame walking, and blind seeing--and they glorified the God of Israel.
ce weèe yu beèe ce weèe aè byemi, Nyúè aè ce keè'ni aè yi ñger, tá weèe bo koni rluèñ ce li be yááti aèwañ aè nfeè' elúèsimbuèu.	who by the power of God are guarded through faith for a salvation ready to be revealed in the last time.
Ñwáè aè ka' tá fa' ka', byemi ba neè Nyúè ená Nyúè a ñwáè ce e ke geèe beèe ce a geèe buu bbebep a ba byáánïì, baná Nyúè be loèr ñwáè anaè aèmboè ñwáâ nyáánïì neè mini-ñwáè, njobeè' e byemi neè ye.	But to him who doesn't work, but believes in him who justifies the ungodly, his faith is accounted for righteousness.

Noèñ entoèmbïì efa mnoèñ ce a m ce ye bráâd ce a láè yes njo ka' yi m gháá. Noèñ anaè aè m ba noèñ ce a m ce sháshi njeèe ce a be ye Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap aègho.	The day of unleavened bread came, on which the Passover must be sacrificed.
Weèe fa ba aèmboè Kán ce e m ba ñwáè Sataèn a yú nfúr yïì naè ka'. E m yú nfúr yïì ba njoká? Because his works were evil, and his brother's righteous.

njobeè' Yú' Rara yi m be suu mbe waâp nduè ka'. A m ku baptir woweèe ba aè rlii Tata Jisoès.	for as yet he had fallen on none of them. They had only been baptized in the name of Christ Jesus.

Mark	Maêk	4	5	Ñgúè buu moè' aè gweñgeèr mbenduè nshe ce e m ba mbenduè ryáá, nshe anaè aè ba mbo goèr ka'. E m yaèñse a fúú njobeè' e m niñ njep nsheè goèr ka'.	Others fell on the rocky ground, where it had little soil, and immediately it sprang up, because it had no depth of soil.
Mark	Maêk	4	6	Nyúè aè ka' sañ, a toêo, e yoprïì njobeè' mñgaèñ vi m niñ njep nsheè boèñboñ ka'.	When the sun had risen, it was scorched; and because it had no root, it withered away.
Mark	Maêk	4	7	Moè' aè m gweèñger aè múè msini. Msini anaè mi ku', a kur, e ke' gee ñgúè ka'.	Others fell among the thorns, and the thorns grew up, and choked it, and it yielded no fruit.
Mark	Maêk	4	8	Ñgúè buu moè' aè gweñgeèr mbe nshe mboèñmboñ a fúú, a ku' a gee ñgúè. Some brought forth thirty times, some sixty times, and some one hundred times as much."

Mluè mi koo ñkúú seê, aè ka' ba njobeè' e m ye leè' aè bsii beèe ce a m vúè ñkaè' naè, e moo aè rsheè laèr.	The king was exceedingly sorry, but for the sake of his oaths, and of his dinner guests, he didn't wish to refuse her.
M ̀ ce jʉ̀p mbàŋ.	I am cracking palm nuts.
Woowèe a ce wɛɛ nyàanjip.	They are hunting cutting- grass.
Mboè Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa ená Kraâis anaè be ba ñwáè embe ndúè' Dávïìd, ba ñwáâ aè rla' Bátáèláèhám ce yu rla' Dávïìd a?”	"Hasn't the Scripture said that the Christ comes of the seed of David, and from Bethlehem, the village where David was?"""
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè yá ku' buu bboèñboñ ce máè geèe aè rlii yaè Taê. Efa múè buu ca, weèe ce koèñ aè rtúúshi máè neè bluèr ba aètu yïì efá?”	"Jesus answered them, ""I have shown you many good works from my Father. For which of those works do you stone me?"""
Woweèe a ka' ba ñgaâa mfaè' neè Jisos Kraêis, baná máè gha' woweèe. (M ce laèa seè'ni aèmboè ñgaèabaa wa'a.) Máè faè' a caa woweèe, a du shañ a caa woweèe, beèe a lïìp máè a caa woweèe, rkwe li rúèú máè a nfyeènyú nfeè' aèñgoo.	Are they servants of Christ? (I speak as one beside himself) I am more so; in labors more abundantly, in prisons more abundantly, in stripes above measure, in deaths often.
Máè ka' loo wa'a, Tata aè beesïì enáê, “Ya ñger ce máè fa neè wáè yi ghááte yi ba aè rjaè' wáè tá aè cu neè yuu anaè nje nyoèr. Ya ñger yi ce yááti boèñboñ ba njep ñwáè ce e goè'si.” Baná m be yu' nyor neè wa bgoè'sïì neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè tá ñger Jisos Kraâis yi bo ba mbe máâ nduè.	"He has said to me, ""My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness."" Most gladly therefore I will rather glory in my weaknesses, that the power of Christ may rest on me."
Woweèe a byemïì yuu ce máè m suñ woweèe anaè. Ka' Taitoès ce weèr woweèe aè m vúè naè aè m ba ñwáâ aè to' Greâs wa'a, a m taèa ye ená e geèe búè ka'.	But not even Titus, who was with me, being a Greek, was compelled to be circumcised.
Nyo à luu mɛ̀ à bo ŋkòp.	A snake bit me on the left hand.
Máè m naèa tu neè Taitoès njo' weèe, weèe a ke' coosi máè ka'. AÈmboè yuu wááwá ce weèr aè m suñ weèe yi m ba mini naè, buu ce weèr ce naèa tu aègho neè Taitoès njo' weèe naè, aè yáátïì mini foñ.	For if in anything I have boasted to him on your behalf, I was not disappointed. But as we spoke all things to you in truth, so our glorying also which I made before Titus was found to be truth.
Nyaèa ce e m feese nyaèaroè naè aè du a táá aèwaâa rdip rgoèr.	nan
Buu wááwá ce wáè m yu' aèmboè m ce yá'ni beèe naè, loèr vi fa mbaè mmbo beèe ce wáè rïìñ ená a yu mini, a riñ foñ ená woweèe a ghááte aè ryá'ni beèe mo'.	The things which you have heard from me among many witnesses, commit the same to faithful men, who will be able to teach others also.
Beèe wááwá embe ndaèp rloo a ka' yu' wa'a, nyor aè bep woweèe seê.	They were all filled with wrath in the synagogue, as they heard these things.
E m duè foñ aè rla' Nasaráèt faèdïì' ce e m kuè'. AÈ ka' ba nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè, e du mbe ndaèp rloo aèmboè e m ce duè aè nfeè' wááwá naè. A ka' baè' mbo, a nati mbekïì aè rbeè' embe Ñwaâ' Nyúè.	He came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up. He entered, as was his custom, into the synagogue on the Sabbath day, and stood up to read.
“Wáâ yeèr Tata Nyúè, wáè ghááte aè ñwáè ce beèe a ba kuè'si wáè, náèsi wáè, a ker ghááte aè rtúr ñger wááwá, njobeè' a wáè ce wáè m geèe buu wááwá, a kwa'shi ená buu anaè ba aègho.”	Worthy are you, our Lord and God, the Holy One, to receive the glory, the honor, and the power, for you created all things, and because of your desire they existed, and were created!
Weèe ce geèe ba yuu ce yeè ta ce geèe.” Woweèe a laa neè ye enáê, “Weèr yu boo ce a bi aè bsaèkïì ka'. Yeèr ta ku ba Nyúè caè'caè'.”	"You do the works of your father."" They said to him, ""We were not born of sexual immorality. We have one Father, God."""

E m yɛʼni àmbò a ke baʼ ŋkàa ese mɛ̀.	She learned basket weaving from me.

a laa enáê, ‘Beèe ca a ku ce yu'ni neè máè ba neè cuèu, yap ntee yi ba aènjïìsaèp ese máè.	These people draw near to me with their mouth, and honor me with their lips; but their heart is far from me.

Ŋwɛ̀ ce e ke kɛ̀r mbèŋ e ke ba ŋwɛ̀ fii.	A person who causes rain to fall is a magician.
E ba ba ñwáè ce e yu mmbo mtoo, a ba ñwáè ce e koèñ ba yuu boèñboñ. E ba ñwáè ce e be kwaè'shi buu neè bfee-ñwáè, ba ñwáè nyáánïì, ba ñwáè nrara aè bsii Nyúè, ker ba ñwáè ce e maè'shi yïì nyor aèwaèa ka'.	but given to hospitality, a lover of good, sober minded, fair, holy, self-controlled;

Byèŋge bwer à dùse ŋwàʼ.	Our women have gone to school.
Nyúè e sañ aè mjáá, mi yuushi, fúèlawaè efa gho yi karnger, gwe aè nshe, li rboèñ li bú aè cicïì. A mboè yi yu neè ñwáè mbaèa wa'a; yi ntaè'teè e ce duè kuèntombïì, e kwe, bár buu anaè.	For the sun arises with the scorching wind, and withers the grass, and the flower in it falls, and the beauty of its appearance perishes. So also will the rich man fade away in his pursuits.
E yu ñwáè ce a sañ aèmboè ye mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, ‘Yáê, m be tuu yaè ñwáè ntuu tá e du entombïì neè wáè, duè kupshi nduunjïì neè wáè.’	This is he of whom it is written, 'Behold, I send my messenger before your face, who will prepare your way before you.'

M ce wáp máná m be vúè yá weèe, tá weèe ba jáá efa yuu ce m ce kwaè'shi, tá má máè ba jáá efa yuu ce weèe ce kwaè'shi. M ce wáp máná m be vúè baè' tá mlap ba ñko'ndoñ ba mshentee ba ñgaèpni ba mbepsi beèe, ba mnsa'ni, ba naèanyor ker ba bjep vi ba fa weâe mú.	For I am afraid that by any means, when I come, I might find you not the way I want to, and that I might be found by you as you don't desire; that by any means there would be strife, jealousy, outbursts of anger, factions, slander, whisperings, proud thoughts, riots;
Weèe rïìñ ená máè m buu efa rsuñ weèe yuu mo' ce aède' weèe aè m ba ye sá' enjo ka'. Máè m ce feè'shi, a ker ce yá'ni weèe aè múè beèe ker ba aè mndaèp.	how I didn't shrink from declaring to you anything that was profitable, teaching you publicly and from house to house,
Yi boèñ ená weèe aè ba yá weèr aèmboè ñgaâa mfaè' neè Jisos Kraêis. Weèe aè ba rïìñ ená Nyúè aè m loèr buu ce vi yu aè bsúèti a fa mba weâr mmboè ená weèr yá'ni beèe.	So let a man think of us as Christ's servants, and stewards of God's mysteries.
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Beèe enje jáá a ce bepsi rlii Nyúè njobeè' yuu ce weèe ce geèe.”	"For ""the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles because of you,"" just as it is written."

“Máè láè cumúnyañ neè weèe, m ce fa yaè cumúnyañ neè weèe. M ce fa ba aèmboè beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a ke fa ka'. Weèe fa maè'shi tá wee mntee vi ce fa weèe ñgá' ka'. Weèe fa wáp buu ka'. M ce kúsi ye ce e yu wa mntee neè wáè.	I am sending him back. Therefore receive him, that is, my own heart,
ce Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa aègho naè. Yi laèa enáê, “Yáê, m ce láè luèr aè rla' Sayoèn, ce e be geèe tá beèe a kote. Luèr anaè be geèe tá woweèe a gweñger. E m cu aè múè beâe bbebep ca, a ce yá buu bbebep ce woweèe a m ce geèe aè mnoèñ wááwá, a ker ce yu' buu bbebep ce woweèe a m ce laèa. Ntee yi m yañ ye se njobeè' e m ce geèe ñgeâe yáánïì.	(for that righteous man dwelling among them, was tormented in his righteous soul from day to day with seeing and hearing lawless deeds):
“Fa wáp neè ka', mú ya njeèe, njobeè' yeè Ta ce yu' rboèñ se aè rfa weèe kúú anaè.	Don't be afraid, little flock, for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the Kingdom.
E m loèr ñger nyaèa ce e m fúú enjep roè a túr nfur ce e m keè'se wáá naè a gee buu aègho aè rlii nyaèa anaè. E m geèe beèe enjep ñgoèñ wááwá a gú'shïì neè nyaèa anaè.	He exercises all the authority of the first beast in his presence. He makes the earth and those who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose fatal wound was healed.

Cena yi ce duèñshi ená yu boo wááwá ce Abraèham aè m bi ce a yu boo Nyúè ka'; yu ba boo ce a m bi njo' mñkaè'ni ce Nyúè aè m geèe neè Abraèham ce a ce beè' aè boo Abraèhaêm.	That is, it is not the children of the flesh who are children of God, but the children of the promise are counted as a seed.
Ñger mnyaèabaèraè' anaè yi m ba ku waâp cuèu, a ker ba aè wap mñkuèñ. Wap mñkuèñ vi m ba aèmboè mnyo, a túr btuè'. Vi tashïì beèe ba neè mñkuèñ anaè.	For the power of the horses is in their mouths, and in their tails. For their tails are like serpents, and have heads, and with them they harm.
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè entombïì ce a m too ená Adaèm naè aè m beèeñger aè yuu teèe.” Adaèm embenjïì ce yu Adaèm elúèsimbuèu yu yi ba yú' ce yi ke fa beèe ryoèñ.	"So also it is written, ""The first man, Adam, became a living soul."" The last Adam became a life-giving spirit."

Rjɛ̀r ca rli lɛʼsi mɛ̀.	This journey has surprised me.
Mɛ̀ dù a lor nè yaa bo.	I went and took it myself.
Ka' ba aè nfeè' ce mbañruèñwáè ce geèe rloo, ker ba aè nfeè' ce e ce cep ntuu Nyúè, e ka' sop rtaa mbe tuè baná e coosi Jisos Kraâis ce e yu tu neè ye.	Every man praying or prophesying, having his head covered, dishonors his head.

Ka' Maikáèl ce e yu tu neè bcïìndap naè, e m laèa bebep neè Sataèn aè nfeè' ce a ye a m ce sár mnsár aèmboè gúâú Musïìs naè ka'. E m laèa ba enáê, “Tá Nyúè lapni wáè.”	"But Michael, the archangel, when contending with the devil and arguing about the body of Moses, dared not bring against him an abusive condemnation, but said, ""May the Lord rebuke you!"""
Ñwáè moè' ka' laa enáê, “M koèñ Nyúè,” baa nfúr yïì, baná ñgaèñ yu ñwáè mnde' njobeè' ñwáè ka' baa nfúr yïì ce e ce yá, aède' e koñ Nyúè ce e ce yá ka' aè njáâá ká?	"If a man says, ""I love God,"" and hates his brother, he is a liar; for he who doesn't love his brother whom he has seen, how can he love God whom he has not seen?"
Jisoès aè ciisïì neè woweèe ená a fa suñ ñwáè ka'. E ka' cïìisi wa'a woweèe a misïì a suñ beèe goèr.	He commanded them that they should tell no one, but the more he commanded them, so much the more widely they proclaimed it.
Fa luu ye kaʼ.	Donʼt bite him.
Wowèe a gwè ncir toʼ.	They have violated the village law.
E be geèe tá weèe túr buu goèr aè nfeè' wááwá, ba mmbo mtoo a nfeè' wááwá tá beèe magoèr a bo yoèñshi Nyúè njo' le rfa ce woweèe a ce koo ese weèr.	you being enriched in everything to all liberality, which works through us thanksgiving to God.
Fa weèr byee aè mnoèñ wááwá.	Give us day by day our daily bread.
Jáásïì aè m bi ñkúú Dávïìd. Dávïìd aè bi Solomúèn ce yïì ma aè m ba ñgwa Yurïìyaè naè,	Jesse became the father of King David. David became the father of Solomon by her who had been the wife of Uriah.
Bee moʼ a ku koŋ yap ba à rnoŋger à mndap buu.	Some people prefer only to be drinking in drinking societies.
Buu bbebep aèmboè aè ryú ñwáè, koo ñgwa ñwáè moè' káè nduu ñwáè moè', bsaèkïì, byáèá, táá njïìnsa' mnaèñ, laa yuu bebep kuu ñwáè moè', yu buu ce beèe a ke kwaè'shi aè rgeèe ba enjep ntee.	For out of the heart come forth evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, sexual sins, thefts, false testimony, and blasphemies.
Baná aè tuu beèe aè rla' Jopaè tá woweèe a du vúè neè Saimúèn ce li rlii mo' li yu ená Pitaè naè. E ce cu mbe ndaèp mbe Saimúèn ñwáè yaati mñguâp nyaèa, ndap anaè aè ba aèwaâa rdip rgoèr.’	Send therefore to Joppa, and summon Simon, who is surnamed Peter. He lodges in the house of Simon a tanner, by the seaside. When he comes, he will speak to you.'
Nfeè' aè gháá ce woweèe a be duèñshi lap rshentee. Ñwáè ce e be túr ñger aè rjaè' yi tu a nda?”	"for the great day of his wrath has come; and who is able to stand?"""
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Baná ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a ce laèa ená AÈlajaè be vúè entoèmbïì njoká?”	"His disciples asked him, saying, ""Then why do the scribes say that Elijah must come first?"""
Mbuèu moè' aè m ker ba ená nyúè ce e ke sañ na ba ñwáá a sañ aè rla' anaè ka', njobeè' rraa Nyúè li m ce sañ aèfo, muu njeèe aè ba lam efa rla' anaè.	The city has no need for the sun, neither of the moon, to shine, for the very glory of God illuminated it, and its lamp is the Lamb.
Dávïìd aè ba muu Jáásïì, Jáásïì aè ba muu Obáèd, Obáèd aè ba muu Buwaès, Buwaès aè ba muu Salmoèn, Salmoèn aè ba muu Nashoèn,	the son of Jesse, the son of Obed, the son of Boaz, the son of Salmon, the son of Nahshon,
Beèe wááwá ce a m yu', a m báèáñger seê, a laa enáê, “Mboè ñwáè ca yu ñwáè ce e m ce gheèter aè ryúshi beèe ce a m ce loo neè Jisoès aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm naè a? Mboè e vúè aèfa tá e bo keèr koshi ñgaâa rloo ca kur duè aègho duè fa neè beèe ce a yu btu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì a?”	"All who heard him were amazed, and said, ""Isn't this he who in Jerusalem made havoc of those who called on this name? And he had come here intending to bring them bound before the chief priests!"""
Taanyʉ̀ à sɛpsi btotoʼ mbì.	Tanyu has divided the kola nut cotyledons.
E yaati mkuu mbe kwàrakwarà.	She dried beans on the mat.
Beèe a ce fa weèr ñgá', weèr aè ke' ba mer mñgi' ka'. Beèe a ce lïìp weèr, weèr aè ce gweèñger aè nsheè, a ke' ce kweñger ka'.	pursued, yet not forsaken; struck down, yet not destroyed;
Bfúr waê, yi boèñ ená beèe magoèr efa weâe mú a ba ñgaâa ryá'nïì ka', njobeè' Nyúè be keè sa' seèe ce seèe yu ñgaâa ryá'nïì tatap caèa beèe mo'.	Let not many of you be teachers, my brothers, knowing that we will receive heavier judgment.
E lamni muu enɛ e fa kèr koʼ mbe ce kaʼ.	He has warned the child not to climb up to the tree again.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Rraa li be kuè ba weèe woweèe ba aè nfeè' múcaècaèr. Ce jár neè seè'ni aèmboè rraa li bii aègho, faè dïì' túè'nji koni weèe ka'. Ñwáè ce e ke jáèr aè túè'nji e ke rïìñ faèdïì' ce e ce duè ka'.	"Jesus therefore said to them, ""Yet a little while the light is with you. Walk while you have the light, that darkness doesn't overtake you. He who walks in the darkness doesn't know where he is going."
E m laèa neè yïì nyor enáê, “M ka' ku joo ba yi cuèu cáè', m ku ke'se.”	"for she said within herself, ""If I just touch his garment, I will be made well."""
Baná weèe yu'ni neè woweèe, gee yuu ce woweèe a ce suñ weèe. Weèe fa geèe yuu ce woweèe a ce geèe ka' njobeè' woweèe a ke geèe yuu ce woweèe a ke feè'shi ka'.	All things therefore whatever they tell you to observe, observe and do, but don't do their works; for they say, and don't do.
E ke ba mbe nfeè' ce seèe ce yá njáèá ñgá' ca, seèe ce koosimnse, ke' ce lu'shi ka'. E ba embenjïì, beèe ce a yá'ni yuu efa njáèá ñgá' ca, a cu lap rcu neè rfúteè- ñwáè, gee ñgeâe yáánïì.	All chastening seems for the present to be not joyous but grievous; yet afterward it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness to those who have been exercised thereby.
E ka' ñwañshi wáá a laa enáê, “Cena yu ba bláá ce vi kur leè' ce Nyúè aè ye weèe woweèe, a laa ená weèe gee yuu ce leè' yi laèa naè.”	"saying, ""This is the blood of the covenant which God has commanded you."""
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè Soêl, e m ker misi a tap, a ce naèshi ená Jisoès aè m ba Kraâis anaè. Cena yi gee bfee vi jep Jus ce a m ce cu aè rla' Daèmaskoès.	But Saul increased more in strength, and confounded the Jews who lived at Damascus, proving that this is the Christ.
Bèe moʼ a ke yɛ njeŋwɛ̀ nè bàasòŋ ku laa enɛ e boŋ.	When some people see a woman with a gap between the upper teeth, they say she is beautiful.
E m ká' woweèe a beèe ce a m ce geèe njáèá ntaa anaè foñ aèbee, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Yaè beèe, weèe rïìñ ená see ke yeñger boèñboñ seê, njobeè' liseèe rfaè' ca.	"whom he gathered together, with the workmen of like occupation, and said, ""Sirs, you know that by this business we have our wealth."
Túè' aè ka' raa woweèe a suu embe rtuèu, ku' beèe a du aè ryá ye.	It happened on the next day, when they had come down from the mountain, that a great multitude met him.
Woweèe a ka' baè' mbe dïì' ce a m ce too ená Golgotaè, ce mbuèu efa rlii ca yu enáê, “Dïû' keèkeèp tu.”,	"They came to a place called ""Golgotha,"" that is to say, ""The place of a skull."""
AÈde' ñwáè moè' bipshïì enáê, “AÈde' beèe ce a kweñger a fúú efa rkwe aè njáâá ká? Woweèe a be fúú efa rkwe ba neè njáèá nyor ce e yu aè njáâá ká?”	"But someone will say, ""How are the dead raised?"" and, ""With what kind of body do they come?"""
Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yïìseèe Tata aè m geèe yuu boèñboñ neè máè seê. E m geèe máè byemïì neè ye, a ker koñ beèe foñ. Jisos Kraâis e ke fa rbyemïì ca ba rkoèñnïì neè beèe ce a woweèe a yu ñwáè moè'sir.	The grace of our Lord abounded exceedingly with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
Nyɛ̀ɛ à ghùp buu embe ndàp wɛɛwɛ.	The thief has carried everything from the house.
Beèe anaè a m báèá li ryá'nïì njobeè' li m ba aèmboè li ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir ka', li m túr ñger.	They were astonished at his teaching, for he taught them as having authority, and not as the scribes.
Máè laèa cena tá rïìtu yi bo koo weèe. Waè' ñwáè moè' ce e túr bfee yu a weâe mú ce mfúr moè' ka' túr mnsa' a nfúr moè', e sa' mnsa' anaè neè woweèe ka' a?	I say this to move you to shame. Isn't there even one wise man among you who would be able to decide between his brothers?
Weèe yu beèe ce weèr be naèa tu, keèr lu'shi aègho aè nfeè' anaè.	For you are our glory and our joy.
Baa cuŋ zhi ke gèe nyor luu wɛ̀.	Hot food makes you warm.
AÈde' ñwáè kanïì muu, ba a Taèr ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' byemi muu baná ñgaèñ yu aè Taèr foñ.	Whoever denies the Son, the same doesn't have the Father. He who confesses the Son has the Father also.
“Muu ñgoèñgoè be ba neè rbúè, bi muu mbañruè tá a fa li rlii ená ÁÈmanuèwáèl.”	"Behold, the virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son. They shall call his name Immanuel; which is, being interpreted, ""God with us."""
Jisoès yu ñwáè ce beèe a ba kuè'si ye caèa Musïìs, aèmboè beèe a ke kuè'si ñwáè ce e baè'ri ndap caa ndap ce e baè'ri naè.	For he has been counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who built the house has more honor than the house.
Baná weèe ce laa buu, ker ce gee ñgeèe ba aèmboè beèe ce Nyúè be keè sa' weèe neè ncir ce yi maè'shi ñwáè aèwaèa aè rgeèe buu ce e koèñ.	So speak, and so do, as men who are to be judged by a law of freedom.
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Bsïìi vi túr bto, bsiñ vi túr mndap, Muu Ñwáè aè ke' túr dïì' ce aède' e lá yi tu ka'.”	"Jesus said to him, ""The foxes have holes, and the birds of the sky have nests, but the Son of Man has nowhere to lay his head."""
Yuu ce nyor koèñ, a yuu ce Yú' Nyúè yi koèñ ka'. Yuu ce Yú' Nyúè yi koèñ, a yuu ce nyor ce koèñ ka'. Buâu bbaa ca vi yu aè yuu mo'sir ka'. A mbuèu ce aède' aè gee yuu ce wáâ koèñ aè rgeèe ka'.	For the flesh lusts against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; and these are contrary to one another, that you may not do the things that you desire.
Bjep ca vi ka' mïì, Pol aè ká' ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a laa buu neè woweèe, a fa woweèe ñger, a daasi woweèe, a nati a ce duè aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè.	After the uproar had ceased, Paul sent for the disciples, took leave of them, and departed to go into Macedonia.
Jisoès aè ká' ku' beèe ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè aè ka' ce koèñ aè rvúè fa máâ mbuèu, baná ñgaèñ kani yïì nyor, byá' yi kïìntaa, ce vú fa máâ mbuèu.	"He called the multitude to himself with his disciples, and said to them, ""Whoever wants to come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me."
Yuu ce m ce laèa yi yu ba ená ká? Waè' nyúè moè' enjep ñgoèñ na, káè byee ce a ke tañshi tañshïì aègho neè njáèá nyúè ca áè, e ke ba yuu goèr a?	What am I saying then? That a thing sacrificed to idols is anything, or that an idol is anything?
Jisoès aè ka' ce jáèr aèwaâa túè ce aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a yá beèe mo' a baa, Saimúèn ce li rlii mo' li m ba ená Pitaè, ba Andruè ce e m ba nfúr yïì. Woweèe a m ba ñgaâa ñkoo nca, a ce maè' rraa njep roè, tá a bo koo nca njo.	Walking by the sea of Galilee, he saw two brothers: Simon, who is called Peter, and Andrew, his brother, casting a net into the sea; for they were fishermen.
Be ba nyúè ce tu ñgaâa ncïìñ njeèe aè vúè tá weèe koni rtaa foèo ce aède' li ke kwe ncoèo ka'.	When the chief Shepherd is revealed, you will receive the crown of glory that doesn't fade away.
Beèe Farïìsi mo' ce a m ba aè múè ku' beèe ca, a laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, lapni ñgaâa yá'ni yoè buu ca.”	"Some of the Pharisees from the multitude said to him, ""Teacher, rebuke your disciples!"""
Ntee yi yañ yïì masaè, e fa ye mbe mmbo ñgaâa ñkeè'ni ñgaâa shañ ená a fa ye ñgá' caar tá e la' yi mbaèa wááwá.	His lord was angry, and delivered him to the tormentors, until he should pay all that was due to him.
Buu ca a buu ce vi ke geèe ñwáè, e ba jaèpri. AÈ rye yuu ke' su'si mmbo ka', a yuu ce aède' yi gee ñwáè e ba jaèpri ka'.”	"These are the things which defile the man; but to eat with unwashed hands doesn't defile the man."""
Fa mɛ̀ àmbò wɛ̀ gwɛɛ.	Give me as you please.
Beèe mo' a byá' ñwáè moè' mbe keèñ ce yïì ñgúè' nyor moè' aè m kwe, a gheter aè rniñ neè ye mbe ndaèp, láè njeptii Jisoès.	Behold, men brought a paralyzed man on a cot, and they sought to bring him in to lay before Jesus.
Beèe a suñ woweèe ená a ce yá'ni Jus ce a ce cu aè bto' beèe enje jáá ená woweèe a fa láè mncir Musïìs ka', a ce laèa neè woweèe ená woweèe a fa geèe búè ese boo ka', ma' lá ndeèe to' foñ.	They have been informed about you, that you teach all the Jews who are among the Gentiles to forsake Moses, telling them not to circumcise their children neither to walk after the customs.
Yi yu boèñboñ ená aè borni efa rye nyaèa, ker borni efa rno mruè', borni efa geèe njáèá yuu ce aède' yi gee nfúroè koteè.	It is good to not eat meat, drink wine, nor do anything by which your brother stumbles, is offended, or is made weak.
A mbuèu ce m ce gheèter, a ce faè' neè ñger wááwá ce Jisos Kraâis aè fa máè tá m bo mïìsi li rfaè' aègho.	for which I also labor, striving according to his working, which works in me mightily.
Woweèe a ce ye neè mce, a koo mbaèñ caè ese ye, a lip ye aègho mbe tuè.	They spat on him, and took the reed and struck him on the head.
aè vú a yá Pitaè aèmboè e ce yár mor. A fyá' ye ená ntuñ, a laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè m ba weèe Jisoès aè rla' Nasaráèt foñ.”	"and seeing Peter warming himself, she looked at him, and said, ""You were also with the Nazarene, Jesus!"""
Felep aè du a suñ Andruè, a ye a du a suñ Jisoès.	Philip came and told Andrew, and in turn, Andrew came with Philip, and they told Jesus.
Kwâa à fʉ yɛɛnì sê.	The corn has germinated very well.
Taèr, máè koèñ máná beèe ce wáè fa máè na, a ba weèr woweèe faèdïì' ce m be ba foñ, tá a bo yá wa bkuè' ce wáè m fa neè máè njobeè' wáè m koèñ máè tá a ka' keè geèe ñgoèñ, a ka' fa máè bkuè' anaè.	Father, I desire that they also whom you have given me be with me where I am, that they may see my glory, which you have given me, for you loved me before the foundation of the world.
Yi yu yáánïì ená soè yá ñgá'. Soè ce yá ñgá' njo' buu bbebep ce soè aè geèe, ñwáè ca aè geèe yi yu yuu mo' ka'.”	"And we indeed justly, for we receive the due reward for our deeds, but this man has done nothing wrong."""
E ka' yu' njeèndoñ Pitaè, rïìñ, a lu'shi seê, a mú' keèñ ka', a cañ a kúti ba mbe ndaèp, a laa enáê, “Pitaè táá njep ncuâu ñka'.”	When she recognized Peter's voice, she didn't open the gate for joy, but ran in, and reported that Peter was standing in front of the gate.
E ka' vúè, bár ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a suñ ye enáê, “Weèr aè yá Tataê.” Tomas aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ka' tá yá bdïì' efa mi mmbo ce a mú ta neè mmbaa naè, joèo neè ntubo, keèr joèo yïì mbeèp nyor neè bo ka', aède' m byemïì ka'.”	"The other disciples therefore said to him, ""We have seen the Lord!"" But he said to them, ""Unless I see in his hands the print of the nails, and put my hand into his side, I will not believe."""
Yi loè efa ká, ma yïì Tata yaè aè ka' vú aè rcaè'ni máè?	Why am I so favored, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?
Ñgúè buu moè' aè gweñgeèr mbe nshe mboèñmboñ, a fúú, a gee mbúè, moè' aè gee mbúè rjeèe, moè' mntuunfu, moè' mntaar.	Others fell on good soil, and yielded fruit: some one hundred times as much, some sixty, and some thirty.
Njeèndoñ aè laa neè ye enáê, “Pitaè, naèti mbekïì, sháshi, ye.”	"A voice came to him, ""Rise, Peter, kill and eat!"""
Byú' mnyúâmkaè' vi m fúse enjep beèe magoèr, a ce waani seê, a ce laèa enáê, “A wáè Muu Nyúè.” Jisoès aè waa byú' ca, a ke' fa vi njïì ená vi laa yuu ka' njobeè' vi m rïìñ ená e yu Kraâis anaè.	"Demons also came out from many, crying out, and saying, ""You are the Christ, the Son of God!"" Rebuking them, he didn't allow them to speak, because they knew that he was the Christ."
A woweèe a du neè Jisoès faèdïì' ce a m ce too ená Golgotaè. Mbuèu efa rlii ca yu enáê, “Dïû' keèkeèp tu.”	"They brought him to the place called Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, ""The place of a skull."""
Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèr ce koèñ aè rrïìñ yuu ce aè ce kwaè'shi njobeè' weèr rïìñ werná beèe wááwá a ce laèa bebep kuu njáèá nduunjïì ce aè yu njo na.”	"But we desire to hear from you what you think. For, as concerning this sect, it is known to us that everywhere it is spoken against."""
Ñwáè be keèr yu' aèmboè beèe a ce bu' mluñ, ce fyáp mdoñ ba msoèñ, káè ce yoèp byáá aèfo ka'. Beèe ce a ke fáèr buu enje mmboè a be keèr ba aèfo ka'. Ñwáè be keèr yu' aèmboè a ce goè' baa aèfo ka'.	The voice of harpists, minstrels, flute players, and trumpeters will be heard no more at all in you. No craftsman, of whatever craft, will be found any more at all in you. The sound of a mill will be heard no more at all in you.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè ye enáê, “Máè laèa buu aèwañ neè beèe wááwá. Máè m ce yá'ni beèe aè nfeè' wááwá aè mndap mloo, ba mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, ce yu bdïì' ce Jus a ke vúè ce tarte. Máè laèa yuu mo' aè bsúèti ka'.	"Jesus answered him, ""I spoke openly to the world. I always taught in synagogues, and in the temple, where the Jews always meet. I said nothing in secret."
“Yi yu ená aède' mbaèñ ce bebep yi yú mbe ce ce boèñboñ ka', a ker ba foñ ená aède' mbaèñ ce boèñboñ yi yú mbe ce ce bebep ka'.	For there is no good tree that brings forth rotten fruit; nor again a rotten tree that brings forth good fruit.
yïì masaè be vúè aè noâñ mo' ce e ce keè' ka', ker ba aè njáèá nfeè' ce e ba riñ ka', gwaète ye aè btete aè btete, fa ye dïì' ba aè múè beèe ce a byemi ka'.	then the lord of that servant will come in a day when he isn't expecting him, and in an hour that he doesn't know, and will cut him in two, and place his portion with the unfaithful.
Máè suñ weèe nfeè' aèñgoo, a ker ce suñ weèe seè'ni neè mñgoommir-ñwáè máná beèe magoèr a yu a weâe mú ce yaèp ndeèe ce duèñshi ená woweèe a baèa rkwe ce Jisos Kraâis aè m kwe mbe kïìntaa naè.	For many walk, of whom I told you often, and now tell you even weeping, as the enemies of the cross of Christ,
Rbuu li karñgeèr aèmboè ñwáè ce kar lá rwaèa wa'a, a bú, mtuèu wááwá ba njáèá ñgoèñ ce rdip li ke sïìr kaari tarte naè, yi ci'tïì a nati embe dïì' yi m ba.	The sky was removed like a scroll when it is rolled up. Every mountain and island were moved out of their places.
Bfee Yú' Nyúè yi ke yááti njep beèe aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá tá ñwáè bo loèr bfee anaè jaè' beèe Nyúè aègho.	But to each one is given the manifestation of the Spirit for the profit of all.
Woweèe a be kwe, bú njobeè' woweèe a koèñ buu ce aè nyoèr a caa Nyúè. A loèr yuu ce rïìtu yi ba koo woweèe aètu mo a beesi aè yuu naèatu, a lá yap ntee wááwá ba njep buu embe tunshe.	whose end is destruction, whose god is the belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who think about earthly things.
Taitoès ce kuushi aèmboè weèe wááwá aè m tami nyor aè ryu'nïì, ker ba njáèá njïì ce weèe aè m koni ye neè rwáp-ñwáè, cena yi gee e ker koñ weèe a caa aèmboè e m koèñ.	His affection is more abundantly toward you, while he remembers all of your obedience, how with fear and trembling you received him.
AÈ m ba ñwáè ce a yïì ndap aè m fa yaèp nyor neè Nyúè, a ker ce wáp ye foñ. E m ba mmbo mtoo neè beèe wááwá, a ce loo neè Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá.	a devout man, and one who feared God with all his house, who gave gifts for the needy generously to the people, and always prayed to God.
A láè njaèa njep mbuèu ce wáá. Ce ce yi ka' tá yú boèñboñ ka', baná a be gwaèr, maè' njep mor.	"Even now the axe lies at the root of the trees. Therefore, every tree that doesn't bring forth good fruit is cut down, and cast into the fire.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	3	11	M ce baèptir ya weèe neè mdip aè rduèñshi ená weèe aè kupse, a ma' yeè buu bbebep. Geewa'a, ñwáè ce e ce vúè embe máâ njïì naè yu ñwáè ce e túr ñger a caa máè. Máè ghááte aè ñwáè ce aède' m byá' vi blaba' ka'. E be baèptir weèe neè Yú' Rara, ba neè mor.	I indeed baptize you in water for repentance, but he who comes after me is mightier than I, whose shoes I am not worthy to carry. He will baptize you in the Holy Spirit.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	3	12	Yïì gúè yu mba yeâ boè tá e bo fyápshi mi msañ aègho, baashi láè njep koo, aè ka' ba yi aèmboè bbúèshïì efa gho, e be ghuèp toèo njep mor ce aède' yi liitïì ka'.”	His winnowing fork is in his hand, and he will thoroughly cleanse his threshing floor. He will gather his wheat into the barn, but the chaff he will burn up with unquenchable fire."
Nyúè aè m geèe wa'a tá seèe ce seèe ce geèe ñgeèe ba aèmboè ñwáè koèñ ka', a ce geèe ba aèmboè Yú' Nyúè yi ce koèñ, bo geèe ba buu byáánïì ce vi ghááte aèmboè mncir vi ce laèa.	that the ordinance of the law might be fulfilled in us, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.

M ku ce fa ca ba aèmboè ntañ, ke' ba ená a ncir ka'.	But this I say by way of concession, not of commandment.

Leè' entoèmbïì anaè yi m ba ghááte aè rgeèe tá beèe a ba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè, Nyúè aè m ba keèr ye leè' mo' ka'.	For if that first covenant had been faultless, then no place would have been sought for a second.

Ma ncïìndap Nyúè moè' aè lor luèr ce e m kuè' aèmboè ñgoè' baa wa'a, a ma' njep roè a laa enáê, “A be koo ma rla' ce a too ená Babiloèn na aè ñger, geèe tá li gwe wa'a, tá ñwáè ker yá rli ka'.	"A mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone and cast it into the sea, saying, ""Thus with violence will Babylon, the great city, be thrown down, and will be found no more at all."
Weèe ce laèa weená ñwáè aè ka' lor yuu ce e ba jaè' yïì ma ba yïì ta aègho, laa ená, ‘Yuu ce máè túr ce máè ba jaè' wáè aègho naè, yu Kobaèn’, ce yi yu enáê, ‘Máè fa neè Nyúè,’	"But you say, 'If a man tells his father or his mother, ""Whatever profit you might have received from me is Corban, that is to say, given to God;""'"
Weèe aè ka' ce geèe rloo, túr ñwáè moè' aè ntee bebep, weèe foosïì ye tá yeè Ta embe buèu bo foèosi weèe yeè buu bbebep foñ.	Whenever you stand praying, forgive, if you have anything against anyone; so that your Father, who is in heaven, may also forgive you your transgressions.
Ŋwɛ̀ kaʼ cwaʼ bkòʼ e ku zhe à nyaʼ.	If one pounds coco yams, he can eat it with garden eggs.
Cena a yuu ce Jowál ce ñwáè ntuu Nyúè aè m suñ beèe. E m suñ enáê,	But this is what has been spoken through the prophet Joel:

Sol aè m byemi ená a yú Stáfaèn. AÈ m ba aè noèñ anaè a ká' a ce fa ñgá' neè cor ce aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm seê. Yi ka' ba wa'a, ñgaâa rbyemïì a da'seè aè bdïì' wááwá aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè ba aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè. Beèe mo' efa waâp mú ce a m ku cu aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè m ku ba ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès.	Saul was consenting to his death. A great persecution arose against the assembly which was in Jerusalem in that day. They were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judea and Samaria, except for the apostles.
Jisoès aè m laèa buu ca aè nfeè' ce e m ce yá'ni beèe mbe ndaèp rloo aè rla' Kaèpanuèm.	He said these things in the synagogue, as he taught in Capernaum.
Ñwáè aè ka' ba mbe tu ndap, e fa suèu embo aè rloèr yuu ka' cañ ka'.	and let him who is on the housetop not go down, nor enter in, to take anything out of his house.
Zhi bòŋ à rsaŋ ŋwàʼ anà nè yoo bo.	It is good to write that letter yourself.
E be tuu bcïìndap aè bdïì' wááwá aè mmbuu ñgoèñ kyeèe tá a baashi yïì beèe ce e m ce naè ñgúè' moè'sir.	Then he will send out his angels, and will gather together his chosen ones from the four winds, from the ends of the earth to the ends of the sky.
AÈ ka' ba njo' bfee ce Nyúè aè fa máè, máè boo kuèundap aèmboè ñwáè ce e rïìñ aè rboo yuu seê. Beèe mo' a ce boo ndap mbe kuèundap anaè. Ñwáè wááwá ce e ce boo, lor nfeè'.	According to the grace of God which was given to me, as a wise master builder I laid a foundation, and another builds on it. But let each man be careful how he builds on it.
Mɛ̌ kòŋ à rno mdip fʉte-fʉtè.	I like to drink cold water.

Beèe ce a m ce caèa yap caèa a m ce koèr btu, a ce suè' ye neè mcáp, a ce laèa enáê, “AÈhaê! Wáè ce aède' aè sa'sïì Ndap Nyúè baè'ri aè mnoâñ btaar,	"Those who passed by blasphemed him, wagging their heads, and saying, ""Ha! You who destroy the temple, and build it in three days,"
Jisos Kraâis ye ye aè m ce yi tu aè ñwáè tañshi tañshïû ñgoèr ka'. Nyúè a ñwáè ce e m ce ye. Jisoès aè m duè a cu mbe ndaèp mbe Matïìyoè, a ce yeñger. Ku' ñgaâa ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè', ba ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep a vúê, a cute, a ce yeñger a Jisoès ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu weèe.	It happened as he sat in the house, behold, many tax collectors and sinners came and sat down with Jesus and his disciples.
Mbò wɛ̀ yɛ enɛ yuu anà zhi yu yɛɛnì a?	Have you not seen that the thing is nice?

Woweèe a ka' baè' a yá ñwáè moè' ce e m kepñger, ká' embe nfeè' ce a m bi ye. Ñwáè anaè aè m cu a cuâu ñka' ce a m beèe Ndap Nyúè aègho. A m ce too cuâu ñka' anaè ená Rboèñ. A certain man who was lame from his mother's womb was being carried, whom they laid daily at the door of the temple which is called Beautiful, to ask gifts for the needy of those who entered into the temple.

A mbuèu ce Jisos Kraâis aè m vúè njep ñgoèñ na a laa neè Nyúè enáê, “Wáè m koèñ btañshïì ba mfa ka'. Wáè m fa máè ba nyor tá m bo geèe yuu ce wáè koèñ aègho.	"Therefore when he comes into the world, he says, ""Sacrifice and offering you didn't desire, but you prepared a body for me;"
Beèe magoèr efa woweèe ce a m ba ñgaâa tú', a m vúè neè wap mñwaè' tú' a lá aèbee, a too aè bsii beèe wááwá. A ka' beè' mbaèa ce a m yuu mñwaè' anaè aègho a yá ená aè m ba mmalaèr mntaê.	Many of those who practiced magical arts brought their books together and burned them in the sight of all. They counted the price of them, and found it to be fifty thousand pieces of silver.

Máè faè' a tee rlïì', a sáê, mmirlo mi gaa máè mnoèñ aèñgoo. Njeè aè yañ máè, ntee yi yuushïì, máè konïì yuu ye ka' nfeè' aèñgoo. Mbáp aè m fúte máè, máè túr yuu yar foñ ka'.	in labor and travail, in watchings often, in hunger and thirst, in fastings often, and in cold and nakedness.

Yɛʼni boo woo àmbò a ke loo.	Teach your children how to pray.
Yú' ce seèe aè koni yu yú' enjep ñgoèñ na ka'. Yú' ce seèe aè koni yu yú' ce yi loè ese Nyúè. Yú' ca yi ke geèe seèe riñ buu ce Nyúè aè fa neè seèe.	But we received, not the spirit of the world, but the Spirit which is from God, that we might know the things that were freely given to us by God.
E naètïû aè ñgoâñ beèe Kaldïìyaè, a du a cu aè rla' Háraèn. Yïì ta aè ka' kwe, Nyúè aè fúr ye a vú aègho faèdïì' ce weèe ce cu na.	Then he came out of the land of the Chaldaeans, and lived in Haran. From there, when his father was dead, God moved him into this land, where you are now living.
M ce laèa ca ba aèmboè weèe wááwá ka'. M rïìñ beèe ce máè ce. Geewa'a, yuu ce Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi m laèa yi be kuè ghááte aèmboè a m sañ enáê, ‘Ñwáè ce weèr ye aè m ce ye byee aèbee, aè m kúti yaè ñwáè bbaèa.’	I don't speak concerning all of you. I know whom I have chosen. But that the Scripture may be fulfilled, 'He who eats bread with me has lifted up his heel against me.'
A mbuèu ce máè m kwaè'shi máná aède' m ker vú ca'ni weèe ka', faè dïì' m lo geèe tá nyor bep weèe ka'.	But I determined this for myself, that I would not come to you again in sorrow.
Stáfaèn aè beesïì enáê, “Bfúr wa ba wa btaê, yu' neè yuu ce m be laèa. Nyúè ce e yu ñwáè foèo aè m yááti neè Abraèham ce e m ba yeèr ta aè nfeè' ce e m ba aè ñgoâñ Máèsoèpoètámïìyaè ka' naètïû aèfo duè cu aè rla' Háraèn naè,	"He said, ""Brothers and fathers, listen. The God of glory appeared to our father Abraham, when he was in Mesopotamia, before he lived in Haran,"
Weèr aè ka' caèni aè ryá weèe goèr wa'a, a moo aè rcu laèr. Yi ka' ba wa'a, weèr aè kwa'shïì ená weèr be tuu Timotïì tá e vú yá weèe tá weèr ku di' boèñlaèr cu aè rla' Atáèn. Timotïì yu nfúr weèr ce weèr woweèe e ke faè' neè Nyúè. Ye ye e ke feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè Jisos Kraâis neè beèe. Weèr aè tuu ye ená e vú yá weèe tá e bo fa weèe ñger, geèe tá weèe táá tatap njep le rbyemïì,	Therefore, when we couldn't stand it any longer, we thought it good to be left behind at Athens alone,
E dù a lor nè zhii bo.	He went and took it himself.
Seèe rïìñ seená Nyúè aè geèe buu wááwá ce vi koni aè kútïì ba rboèñ neè beèe ce a koèñ ye, ce yu beèe ce e ká' aèmboè e m koèñ aè rgeèe efa rkáè'.	We know that all things work together for good for those who love God, to those who are called according to his purpose.
Nyúè aè m ce seèe tá e bo maè' ñgá' mbe seâe nduè ka'. E m ce seèe ená seèe bo koni rluèñ njïì enjep Tata Jisos Kraêis,	For God didn't appoint us to wrath, but to the obtaining of salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,

Sò be kèe dù haʼŋgàani.	We will go next year.

Fa kèr kèʼ mɛ̀ kaʼ.	Donʼt look at me again.

E ba laa enɛ e be vʉ̀ ntìni.	He said that he will come today.
Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, ba beèe Farïìsïî. Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	26	Weâe beèe Farïìsi ce weèe aè feèp, suè'si ndoñ ba enjep mú entoèmbïì tá e bo ba nrara embe nduè.	You blind Pharisee, first clean the inside of the cup and of the platter, that its outside may become clean also.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	27	Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, ba beèe Farïìsïî. Weèe yu ñgaâa mbo'ni njobeè' weèe yu aèmboè msheè ce a boo a yo' mi ce keè' mmboèñmboñ enjep mbeè, wá fyá' njep mú, mi ruu neè bvúp beèe ce a kweñger, ba buu ce vi yu bjaèpri.	Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you are like whitened tombs, which outwardly appear beautiful, but inwardly are full of dead men's bones, and of all uncleanness."
E ká' a ce laèa neè woweèe enáê, “AÈmboè máè beè' nlaâa Nyúè ca neè weèe ntïìni, weèe aè yu' na, yi ku ghááte njo.”	"He began to tell them, ""Today, this Scripture has been fulfilled in your hearing."""
E m naèti a du cárcár seê, a du a yá nfúr yïû Saimún Pitaè a laa neè ye enáê, “Weèr aè yá Máèsayaè.” Rlii ca li yu ená Kraêis (ñwáè ce a ghar).	"He first found his own brother, Simon, and said to him, ""We have found the Messiah!"" (which is, being interpreted, Christ)."
Ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè Muu baná ñgaèñ be koni ryoèñ. Ñwáè ce e ka' kani efa rbyemi neè Muu yïì baná ñgaèñ be koni ryoèñ ka'. Nyúè be cápshi nteèe neè ñwáè anaè nfeseè.”	"One who believes in the Son has eternal life, but one who disobeys the Son won't see life, but the wrath of God remains on him."""
a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Duè neè nje rla' enje weâe cuèu na. Weèe be duè niñ tá weèe ku yá muu jaèaki' ce ñwáè aè m be cu mbo ka' aèmboè a cúú. Wee yá, weèe fyáá vú aègho. Cete kèŋ fàdìʼ mbɛp bo fʉte wɛ̀ kaʼ.	Close the door so that you will not feel cool.
Sondɛ e ke ba mmbomntaa Nyʉ̀.	Sunday is Godʼs resting day.
Woweèe a ka' yu', a ku'si Nyúè, a laa neè Pol enáê, “Nfúêr, wáè yá aèmboè Jus ce a byemi a yu aè mncúèkïì aè mncúèkïì, woweèe wááwá a túr ntee aè rláè ncir seê. Pitaè aè laa neè ye enáê, “Tataê, aède' m du fa wáâ mbuèu seè'ni ka' njoká? M be kwe njo' wáè.”	"Peter said to him, ""Lord, why can't I follow you now? I will lay down my life for you."""
Nfeè' ce weèe aè m ce geèe buu ce beèe ce a rïìñ Nyúè ka' a ce geèe naè, aè gháá wa'a. Woweèe a ce geèe mnyáâr, a ce geèe yuu ce wap bláá vi ce luèute aè rgeèe. Woweèe a ce no buu vi ce koo woweèe, a ce geèe mñkaè' bghaa, a ce geèe mñkaè' no buu, a ce loo neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na ce Nyúè aè kani ená beèe a fa loo neè vi ka'.	For we have spent enough of our past time doing the desire of the Gentiles, and having walked in lewdness, lusts, drunken binges, orgies, carousings, and abominable idolatries.
Abraèham aè ka' kur ntee, ce bu' ka', a koni buu ce Nyúè aè m kaè' ená e be fa neè ye naè.	Thus, having patiently endured, he obtained the promise.
Buu bteèe ce kyeèe caè vi laa enáê, “Yi yu wa'a.” Vi ka' laèa wa'a, beâe bgoèrgoèr caè a gú'shïì neè woweèe.	"The four living creatures said, ""Amen!"" The elders fell down and worshiped."
Wɛ̀ mʉ laa enɛ à be vʉ̀, a diʼ a vʉ kaʼ njokɛ?	You said that you will come and finally did not come why?
AÈpoloès aè ka' taè' aè rduè aè ñgoâñ AÈkayaè, bfúr ce aè rla' Áfásoès a fa ye ñger, a ker sañ ñwaè' neè ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès ce a m ba aèfo ená woweèe a koni ye. E ka' baè', a ja' beèe ce a m byemi njobeè' Nyúè aè m túr woweèe aè ntee boèñboñ naè.	When he had determined to pass over into Achaia, the brothers encouraged him, and wrote to the disciples to receive him. When he had come, he greatly helped those who had believed through grace;
E byɛ̀ʼ ŋguu mbe mbɛ̀ʼ.	He has carried firewood on the shoulder.
Mɛ̀ ba yɛ ŋgàabaa mlùu mi koo mɛ̀ sê.	I saw the mad man and was full of fear.
Jisoès aè m ba mbaè njïì keñ, a lá yi tu mbe mbuu, a ce buumi. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a yáá ye, a laa neè ye enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, aè ce yá wáná weèr ce kweñger njep roè na ka' a?”	"He himself was in the stern, asleep on the cushion, and they woke him up, and told him, ""Teacher, don't you care that we are dying?"""
Jisoès aè ká'shïì woweèe aèbee, a laa enáê, “Weèe rïìñ weená ñgaâa rsa' beèe enje jáá a ke sa' yap beèe neè ñger-ñwáè seê, beâe bgoèrgoèr mo' a lor yap ñger, nyú' beèe aègho foñ.	"But Jesus summoned them, and said, ""You know that the rulers of the nations lord it over them, and their great ones exercise authority over them."
E m tuu beèe mo' entombïì. Woweèe a du a niñ aè rla' moâ' aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaèè tá a bo fyá' dïì', kupshi buu neè ye.	and sent messengers before his face. They went, and entered into a village of the Samaritans, so as to prepare for him.
