AÈde' ñwáè ce a ce yá'ni ye, caa ñwáè ryá'nïì ka'. Geewa'a, a ka' yá'ni ñwáè boèñboñ baná ñgaèñ be ba aèmboè ñwáè ce e yá'ni ye.	A disciple is not above his teacher, but everyone when he is fully trained will be like his teacher.
Beèe magoèr ce a yu entombïì seè'ni na, a be keè ba elúèsimbuèu, tá beèe magoèr ce a yu lúèsimbuèu seè'ni na, a ba entombïì.”	"But many who are first will be last; and the last first."""
Kuushi neè beèe ce a m ba btu neè wee, a fe'shi blaâa Nyúè neè weèe naè. Kwaè'shi neè aèmboè rcu beèe anaè li m ba, byemi neè Nyúè foñ aèmboè woweèe a m byemi naè.	Remember your leaders, men who spoke to you the word of God, and considering the results of their conduct, imitate their faith.
blaèa anaè vi ke' taa mñgaèñ njep ye ka', ku cu ba aè nfeè' múcaèr. E ba aè nfeè' ce beèe a ce fa ye ñgá', káè buu vi ba btatap neè ye njo' blaèa anaè, e ku kúti njïìnjïì.	yet he has no root in himself, but endures for a while. When oppression or persecution arises because of the word, immediately he stumbles.
“Yáê, m ce tuu weèe tá weèe du ba aèmboè njeèe aè múè bkuura. Baná weèe feese aèmboè mnyo, ba neè rbornïì-ñwáè aèmboè bbeèñ.	"Behold, I send you out as sheep in the midst of wolves. Therefore be wise as serpents, and harmless as doves.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	17	Loèr neè nfeè' weèe beèe weèe njobeè' woweèe a be loèr weèe du aègho aè bkansuèr, lïìp weèe neè mñgwaèa aè wap mndap mloo.	But beware of men: for they will deliver you up to councils, and in their synagogues they will scourge you.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	18	A be koo weèe duè aègho njeptii bgovanoè ba bkúú njo' máè, tá weèe bo suñ woweèe ker ba beèe enje jáá buu kuu máè.	Yes, and you will be brought before governors and kings for my sake, for a testimony to them and to the nations.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	19	A ka' lor weèe du aègho, mluè mi fa koo weèe ená weèe be laèa ba ká aè njáâá ká lá ka', njobeè' Nyúè be geèe tá weèe ku rïìñ yuu ce weèe be laèa aè nfeè' anaè.	But when they deliver you up, don't be anxious how or what you will say, for it will be given you in that hour what you will say.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	20	Be ba aè nfeè' anaè tá ce laèa weèe ka', be laèa ba Yú' yeè Ta neè weèe.	For it is not you who speak, but the Spirit of your Father who speaks in you.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	21	Ñwáè be keèe loèr nfúr yïì fa tá a yú, tá taèr lor muu yïì fa tá a yú. Boo a be keèe teèe btu neè waêp taê, ba waêp maê, loèr woweèe fa tá a yúshi.	Brother will deliver up brother to death, and the father his child. Children will rise up against parents, and cause them to be put to death."
Saèkiyoès aè natïì mbekïì a laa neè Tata enáê, “Tataê, yáê, m be to'ni yaè buu tïìtïìyáánïì, fa mbeèp moè' neè ñgaâa fuèp. Ka' ba ená máè m koo yuu ñwáè moè' aè ñger, baná m be laè' yi yuu ce máè m koo anaè bkaèñ kyeèe.”	"Zacchaeus stood and said to the Lord, ""Behold, Lord, half of my goods I give to the poor. If I have wrongfully exacted anything of anyone, I restore four times as much."""
Weèr aè maè' buu bbebep ce beèe a ke geèe aè bsúèti njo' rïìtu. Weèr ce bo' beèe ka', a ce kupse blaâa Nyúè ka'. Weèr ce feè'shi buu mini aèwañ, aè bsii Nyúè. Weèr ce geèe wa'a, ñwáè wááwá aè ce kwaè'shi boèñboñ aèmboè weèr.	But we have renounced the hidden things of shame, not walking in craftiness, nor handling the word of God deceitfully; but by the manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man's conscience in the sight of God.
Nyúè e ke so'niñgoèñ ka'.	For there is no partiality with God.
ÁÈliyuèr aè m bi ÁÈlisaè, ÁÈlisaè aè bi Mataèm, Mataèm aè bi Jakoèp,	Eliud became the father of Eleazar. Eleazar became the father of Matthan. Matthan became the father of Jacob.
Woweèe a du a yá muu jaèaki' aèmboè a cúú njep ncúèúndúè', aèwaâa nduunjïì. A ka' ce fyáèá muu jaèaki' ca,	They went away, and found a young donkey tied at the door outside in the open street, and they untied him.
Jisos Kraâis aè m yá ñgá' ca tá beèe enje jáá a bo koni efa bghoènïì ce Nyúè aè m fa neè Abraèhaêm, tá seèe ce seèe aè byemi neè Jisoès bo koni Yú' ce Nyúè aè m kaè' ená e be fa neè yïì beèe naè njo' ye.	that the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Christ Jesus; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè beèe ce a ghááte aè beèe ce a be keè fúú efa rkwe, cu aè ñgoèñ ce yi bii ka' ba naè, a be keèr loèr bbyeèñge káè guusi boo ka',	But those who are considered worthy to attain to that age and the resurrection from the dead, neither marry, nor are given in marriage.
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba bleebeèe, a tarteè mbe ndaèp mbe Kaifaès ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì,	Then the chief priests, the scribes, and the elders of the people were gathered together in the court of the high priest, who was called Caiaphas.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè beèe ce a m koni ye a ker byemi neè ye foñ naè, e fa ñger ená woweèe a beeñger ba boo Nyúè.	But as many as received him, to them he gave the right to become God's children, to those who believe in his name:
Yú' Rara yi ce laèa rara ená be keè ba aè nfeè' moè' tá beèe mo' a ma' yuu ce a m byemi, ce yu'ni ba neè byú' ce vi ke bo' beèe, keèr ce yu' ba buu ce mnyúâmkaè' vi ce yá'ni.	But the Spirit says expressly that in later times some will fall away from the faith, paying attention to seducing spirits and doctrines of demons,
M be cu aè rla' Áfásoès na baè' aè noèñ Ñkaâ' Pántikoès.	But I will stay at Ephesus until Pentecost,
Ñgaâa rbyemïì efa múè beèe ce a m geèe búè ce a m vúè a Pitaè weèe naè, a m báèáñger se njobeè' Nyúè aè m suèusi yi Yú' mbenduè beèe enje jáá foñ.	They of the circumcision who believed were amazed, as many as came with Peter, because the gift of the Holy Spirit was also poured out on the Gentiles.
Woowèe a màʼshi yàp ndap a du kù Nsòʼ.	They left their house and went to Nso.
Woweèe a ce geèe rloo neè máè ba aè cicïì, njobeè' a ce yá'ni beèe mncir ce aè láè beèe, aèmboè a lá mncir Nyúè wa'a.’ ”	"And in vain do they worship me, teaching as doctrine rules made by men.'"""
IÌrastoès aè m cu aè rla' Koreèn, máè ma'shïì Troâfimoès aè rla' Milátáèns njobeè' e m ce yañ.	Erastus remained at Corinth, but I left Trophimus at Miletus sick.
Ñwáè aè ka' sár yuu ce aè ce yá'ni, aè cep ye. E ka' tá yu' ka' aè ker cep ye. Wáè ka' cep ye nfeè' baa e ke' yu' ka', aè fa túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe weèe ye ka'.	Avoid a factious man after a first and second warning;
Baná weèe kwa'shi yuu yi mo'sir, koñni a weâe mú, túr cuâu mo'sir; wee geèe wa' naè, m bo mïìsi lu'shi.	make my joy full, by being like-minded, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind;
Beèe mo' aè laèa ená a túr njáèá bfee ca, a ka' ce laèa wa', a da' njïì rbyemïì. M ce loo máná Nyúè túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ.	which some professing have erred concerning the faith. Grace be with you. Amen.
“Loèr ñwaè', sañ buu ce wáè yá mbo, tuusi neè bcor ce aè rla' Áfásoès, ba Sïìmainaè, ba Págamoèm, ba Taèitiraè, ba Sadïìs, ba Fïìlaèdálfïìyaè ker ba aè rla' Laèodisïìyaè.”	"saying, ""What you see, write in a book and send to the seven assemblies: to Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, and to Laodicea."""
a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Muu Ñwáè be kuè yá ñgá' goèr seê, tá bleebeèe ba beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a kani ye, a be yú ye, mnoèñ vi ba btaar, tá e fúú efa rkwe.”	"saying, ""The Son of Man must suffer many things, and be rejected by the elders, chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and the third day be raised up."""
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Naèti mbekïì, lor lo rwaèa ce duê.”	"Jesus said to him, ""Arise, take up your mat, and walk."""
Ñkaraè, waè' wáè ka' ce sa' beèe ce a ce geèe njáèá buu ca, ker ce geèe vi foñ, waè' aède' Nyúè buu efa rsa' wáè a?	Do you think this, O man who judges those who practice such things, and do the same, that you will escape the judgment of God?
Sataèn aè ker lor ye a du aègho aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, a du neè ye mbe tu Ndap Nyúè ce yi saèp mbekïì seê, a laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè ka' ba Muu Nyúè, aè nyáá ka embe na cáá njep nsheè,	"He led him to Jerusalem, and set him on the pinnacle of the temple, and said to him, ""If you are the Son of God, cast yourself down from here,"
M ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ená weèe yu'ni neè njáèá beèe ce a yu aèmboè woweèe. Ker yu'ni neè beèe ce a woweèe a ce faè' aèbee.	that you also be in subjection to such, and to everyone who helps in the work and labors.
E dù kù làʼ.	She has gone up to the compound.
a laa enáê, “M be yu'shi wo mnsa' aè nfeè' ce beèe ce weèe woweèe aè m ce sa' mnsa' mbe kansuèr naè a vúè foñ.” E m laèa ená a lor Pol du aègho mbe nto' Hároèd ce ke'nïî.	I will hear you fully when your accusers also arrive. He commanded that he be kept in Herod's palace.
Bfúr waê, weèe fa sáè aè rgeèe yuu boèñboñ ka'.	But you, brothers, don't be weary in doing well.
Hálïì aè m ba muu Mataèr, Mataèr aè ba muu Lávïì, Lávïì aè ba muu Málákïì, Málákïì aè ba muu Jáènayïì, Jáènayïì aè ba muu Josáèf,	the son of Matthat, the son of Levi, the son of Melchi, the son of Jannai, the son of Joseph,
E làa enɛ muu ce e mʉ ce yaŋ nà à kwe lɛ?	Did he say that the child who was ill has died?
AÈ ka' keèr ba aè nfeè' moè' e duñshïì yïì nyor neè Jáêms, a ker lo a duñshi yïì nyor neè yi ñgaâa ntuu.	Then he appeared to James, then to all the apostles,
Joân aè fa ncep neè beèe aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá wa'a, a ce feè'shi ba Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè woweèe.	Then with many other exhortations he preached good news to the people,
[Weèe ka' tá foèosi beèe ce a geèe buu bbebep neè weèe ka', baná yeè Ta embe buèu be foèosi weèe yeè buu bbebep foñ ka'.”]	"But if you do not forgive, neither will your Father in heaven forgive your transgressions."""
Kèʼ mɛ̀ mbena tɛ m̀ vʉ̂.	Wait for me here till I come.
A yi wa' wáá ka'. Seè'ni na, seèe ce lu'shi njo' yuu ce Nyúè aè geèe neè seèe njo' rkwe yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraêis, aè ba ye ce e m geèe seèe Nyúè weèe aè kútïì aèbee.	Not only so, but we also rejoice in God through our Lord Jesus Christ, through whom we have now received the reconciliation.
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená e ka' roo yá, baná e be lu'shi aè njeèe yïû moè'sir ce e yá na, caèa yïû ncoèp-búè'ú-aè-mmbúè'ú ce yi daè' yi ka' naè.	If he finds it, most certainly I tell you, he rejoices over it more than over the ninety-nine which have not gone astray.
ka' byáèá áè, káè ñgaâa ñko'ndoñ áè, káè no ñkoo weèe áè, káè ñgaâa mcápni áè, káè ñgaâa faèpshi buu aè ñger áè, aède' a niñ mbo ka'.	nor thieves, nor covetous, nor drunkards, nor slanderers, nor extortioners, will inherit the Kingdom of God.
M ce loo neè Nyúè ce e yu Nyúè neè yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraâis a ker ba Taèr ce e yu ñwáè foèo, ená e fa weèe yi yú', tá weèe túr bfee, rïìñ njáèá ñwáè ce Nyúè yu neè mini-ñwáè.	that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give to you a spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him;
Muu ca ce kèʼ dʉ̀ʼni àmbò nzhɛ̀ɛ waʼa.	This child looks shabby like a thief.
Beèe mo' efa múè beèe ca yu Hïìminaès ba AÈláèksandaè. Máè fa woweèe mbaè mmbo Sataèn tá woweèe a bo yá ñgá', rïìñ buu, borni efa rbepsi rlii Nyúè.	of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I delivered to Satan, that they might be taught not to blaspheme.
Ñwáè moè' ce fuñ aè ntee rïìñ a ce laèa enáê, ‘Kupshi neè nduunjïì neè Tataê, nashi tá yi ba kuèyáá.’ ”	"The voice of one crying in the wilderness, 'Make ready the way of the Lord! Make his paths straight!'"""
Yáê, m ce vúè seè'ni seè'ni. M be vúè neè blaè' tá m bo laè' ñwáè wááwá aèmboè li rfaè' li yu.	"Behold, I come quickly. My reward is with me, to repay to each man according to his work.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	22	13	M yu Alfaè, a ba OÈmágaè. A máè ñwáè entoèmbïì, a ba ñwáè elúèsimbuèu. A máè ñwáè ce e m káè' buu wááwá, a ba ñwáè ce e be mïìsi buu anaè.	I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	22	14	Mboâñtu mi yu neè beèe ce a suè'si wap bcáè'. A be maè'shi tá woweèe a niñ aè rla' ca, ye mbaèñ ce ce yi ke fa ryoèñ.	Blessed are those who do his commandments, that they may have the right to the tree of life, and may enter in by the gates into the city.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	22	15	Beèe ce a ce geèe ñgeèe ñgwe, ba ñgaâa tú', ba beèe ce a ce saèki, ba beèe ce a ce yúshi beèe, ba beèe ce a ce gú'shi neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na, ba beèe ce a ce nya' mnde' a ce yu' rboèñ aè mnde' ce a ce nya' anaè, aède' ñwáè moè' efa beèe ca niñ aè rla' anaè ka'.	Outside are the dogs, the sorcerers, the sexually immoral, the murderers, the idolaters, and everyone who loves and practices falsehood.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	22	16	Ñwáè ce e tuusi yi ncïìndap ená e suñ weèe buu ca a tuusi máâ Jisoès, tá bcor vi bo rïìñ vi foñ. M yu ñwáè embe ndúè' Dávïìd, a ker ba mbeèr.	I, Jesus, have sent my angel to testify these things to you for the assemblies. I am the root and the offspring of David; the Bright and Morning Star."
Sataèn aè niñ njep Judaès ce a m ce too ená IÌskarïìyoèt, ce e m ba moè' efa beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú.	Satan entered into Judas, who was surnamed Iscariot, who was numbered with the twelve.
Baná m ce suñ wáè máná ku' njáèá rkoèñnïì ce e duèñshi neè máè na li ce duèñshi ená a foèosi ye efa ku' buu bbebep ce e m geèe. Ñwáè ce a foèosi yïì buu bbebep múcaèr ce duèñshi rkoèñnïì múcaèr.”	"Therefore I tell you, her sins, which are many, are forgiven, for she loved much. But to whom little is forgiven, the same loves little."""
Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì aè natïì mbekïì, a laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè túr yuu aè rbeèesi kuu buu ce beèe ca a laèa a kuu wáè na ka' a?”	"The high priest stood up, and said to him, ""Have you no answer? What is this that these testify against you?"""
Waè' Nyúè aè fa beèe wááwá bfee aè rgeèe tá ñgaâa byañ a ke'se a? Waè' beèe wááwá a ke laèa bli ce a be yá'ni ka' a? Waè' beèe wááwá a rïìñ aè rsuñ beèe buu ce beèe mo' a laèa aè bli ce a m be yá'ni ka' a?	Do all have gifts of healings? Do all speak with various languages? Do all interpret?
Beèe ca a beèe ce a vúè neè ñgaèpni aè múè beèe, a túr ba mntee beèe enjep ñgoèñ. Yú' Rara yi yu njep waâp mntee ka'.	These are they who cause divisions, and are sensual, not having the Spirit.
E m tapse beèe anaè wa'a njobeè' e m ba ñwáâ mboèñmboñ, a ruusi neè Yú' Rara, a byemi seê. Ku' beèe magoèr a m byemi neè Tataê.	For he was a good man, and full of the Holy Spirit and of faith, and many people were added to the Lord.
Máè ka' keè' a yá nyaèabaèraè', ncoèo efa gho aè ba jïìpri. A m ce too rlii ñwáè ce e m cu mbo ená Rkwe. Ñwáè ce a m ce too ená Mbaè Yir aè ce vúè mbe yeâ njïì. A m fa woweèe ñger mbenduè ñgúè' moè'sir efa bdïì' kyeèe efa beèe enjep ñgoèñ na, ená a yúshi woweèe neè kaèafaè', gee tá woweèe a kwe njeè, kwe byañ, vúè neè mnyaèa efa rïìñ a waâp mú.	And behold, a pale horse, and he who sat on it, his name was Death. Hades followed with him. Authority over one fourth of the earth, to kill with the sword, with famine, with death, and by the wild animals of the earth was given to him.
E ka' baè', a yá ñwáè mo' ce li rlii li m ba ená AÈniyaès. Yïì ñgúè' nyor moè' aè m kwe, e noñ njep keèñ yañ aè bfeè' waami.	There he found a certain man named Aeneas, who had been bedridden for eight years, because he was paralyzed.
Nyúè aè m ce máè ená m fe'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ anaè. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' e m túr ntee boèñboñ neè máè, e m loèr yi ñger a fa' njep máâ ntee, a fa máè rfaè' ca ená m geêe.	of which I was made a servant, according to the gift of that grace of God which was given me according to the working of his power.
E boo ndap ŋgòr.	He has built a big house.
E m laèa wa'a, a ku riñ ñwáè ce e be loè fyeèni ye. A mbuèu ce e m laèa enáê, “Ku ba weèe wááwá ce weèe ce raa ka'.”	"For he knew him who would betray him, therefore he said, ""You are not all clean."""
Baná weèe tapsi mkoo ce mi sáè naè, ke' ma'shi tá mkoo mi ce kaèñ weèe ka'	Therefore, lift up the hands that hang down and the feeble knees,
Ku' beèe a m táá njïìnsa' mnaèñ. Nlaèa ñwáè yi tarteè a yi moè' ka'.	For many gave false testimony against him, and their testimony didn't agree with each other.
njobeè' ñger Yú' ce yi vúè neè ryoèñ njo' Jisos Kraâis yi geèe máè luñ efa ñger buu bbebep ba rkwe.	For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus made me free from the law of sin and of death.
Jisoès aè ka' yá ená ñwáè anaè aè beèesi neè bfee-ñwá, a laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè yu njïìsaèp efa kúú Nyúè ka'.” Ká' embo naè ñwáè aè ker túr cuèu aè rbipshi yuu neè ye ka'.	"When Jesus saw that he answered wisely, he said to him, ""You are not far from the Kingdom of God."" No one dared ask him any question after that."
M rïìñ máná weèe yu ñgúè Abraèhaêm. Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèe ce roèo aè ryú máè, njobeè' yuu máè suñ weèe yi niñ weèe mbaè tuè' ka'.	I know that you are Abraham's seed, yet you seek to kill me, because my word finds no place in you.
Fùp à koo bèe sê.	There is too much poverty.
Nyúè aè m fa ye tá e bo ba aèmboè mbú tañshïì wa'a, tá li rkwe li bo geèe tá Nyúè foosi beèe ce a byemi neè ye. Nyúè aè m geèe wa'a, tá e bo duèñshi neè beèe ená e yu ñwáâ nyáánïì, njobeè' aè m ba entombïì, e kur ntee a fuse efa buu bbebep ce beèe a m ce geèe.	whom God set forth to be an atoning sacrifice, through faith in his blood, for a demonstration of his righteousness through the passing over of prior sins, in God's forbearance;
Yuu ce beèe a ce kwaè'shi ená yi yu blúr aè ñgúè' yïì Nyúè naè, bfee vi yu njo a caa bfee ce beèe a túr, yuu ce a kwaè'shi ená a bgoè'sïì aè ñgúè' yïì Nyúè naè, ñger yi yu njo a caa ñger ce beèe a túr.	Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men, and the weakness of God is stronger than men.
Boo, yu'ni neè neè weêe bta ba weêe mmaê. Yi yu yáánïì ená beèe ce a yu aèbee a Tata Jisoès weèe a gee wa'a.	Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.
njobeè' Hároèd aè m ce wáp Joân. E m yi ená Joân yu ñwáâ nyáánïì, a ker ba ñwáâ nrara, a ce tá'shi ye. Joân aè m ce laèa yuu, yi ce fa Hároèd ñgá' seê, geewa'a, e ku ce koèñ aè ryu' yuu ce e m ce laèa.	for Herod feared John, knowing that he was a righteous and holy man, and kept him safe. When he heard him, he did many things, and he heard him gladly.
Tata Nyúè beesi wee mntee tá weèe riñ njáèá rkoèñnïì ce e túr neè weèe, keèr rïìñ njáèá ñkur ntee ce Jisos Kraâis túr.	May the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God, and into the patience of Christ.
Ka' ba ená rsa' rrúèú ce li m ce geèe beèe a gwe mnsa' Nyúè naè li m ce duèñshi foèo Nyúè, baná rsa' rfi ce li ce geèe beèe a ba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè li caèa lïû rrúèú aè njáèá njïì ce e ce duèñshi foèo Nyúè.	For if the service of condemnation has glory, the service of righteousness exceeds much more in glory.
A m duè neè máè mbe kor aè nfeè' entoèmbïì, beèe wááwá a cañ a ma' máè, ñwáè ce e táá yaè njïìnsa' aè ke' ba ka'. M ce loo máná Nyúè fa baèa woweèe njobeè' woweèe a m geèe neè máè wa' ka'.	At my first defense, no one came to help me, but all left me. May it not be held against them.
njobeè' weèr aè yu' ená weèe aè láè ntee neè Jisos Kraêis, a ker koñ beèe Nyúè wááwá.	having heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which you have toward all the saints,
A m fa njeñwáè anaè bbaèp vi bbaa. Bbaèp anaè vi m feese bbaèp waèawa mñkuèr. A m fa ye bbaèp ca tá e bo fáñ aègho cañ du aè dïì' ce a m kupshi neè ye aè ntee rïìñ naè, faè dïì' nyo ca bo koo ye ka'. E fáñ baè' aèfo, tá a bo keè'ni ye aè bfeâ' btaar ba nto'.	Two wings of the great eagle were given to the woman, that she might fly into the wilderness to her place, so that she might be nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.
Jisoès weèe a m fúú embe Ndaèp Nyúè, a ka' kuè fúú wa'a, e lor Jáms ba Joân a woweèe a du mbe ndaèp mbe Saimúèn ba Andruè.	Immediately, when they had come out of the synagogue, they came into the house of Simon and Andrew, with James and John.
Boo woo a rìŋ buu sê.	Your children are very intelligent.
Njɛ̀ɛ ŋgèe anà zhi bòŋ kaʼ.	That kind of behaviour is not good.
Ka' dïû' rlúèshïì anaè yi m ba aègho wáá wa'a, Nyúè aè ku ker laa enáê, “AÈde' woweèe a ba' mbe ya dïû' rlúèshïì tá a bo lúèshi ka'.”	"and in this place again, ""They will not enter into my rest."""
E be naèa tu ená e caèa buu wááwá ce beèe a ce gú'shi aègho ená a Nyúè. E geèe wa'a, du niñ mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, cu mbo, lor yi tu ená a ye Nyúè.	he who opposes and exalts himself against all that is called God or that is worshiped; so that he sits as God in the temple of God, setting himself up as God.
Beèe ce a woweèe a m ce duè, a m táá, a túr yuu laèa ka'. Woweèe a m yu' aèmboè njeèndoñ ce laèa, a ke' ce yá ñwáè ka'.	The men who traveled with him stood speechless, hearing the sound, but seeing no one.

Waràgho anà yu ntùr.	That guava is unripe.
Beèe wááwá ce weèr woweèe yu aèfa a caè'ni wáè. Caè'ni beèe wááwá ce seèe woweèe aè byemi neè Jisos Kraêis, woweèe a koèñ weèr naè. M ce loo máná Nyúè túr weèe wááwá aè ntee boèñboñ.	All who are with me greet you. Greet those who love us in faith. Grace be with you all. Amen.

Beèe mo' efa múè beèe ce a m túr ba bfee ÁÈpáèkuraèn, ba beèe mo' ce a m túr ba bfee Stoyïìk, a m sár mnsár a Poêl. Beèe mo' efa waâp mú a laa yap enáê, “Ñwáè bu' cuèu ca ce roèo aè rlaèa ba ká?” Beèe mo' a laa yap enáê, “Yi ce yááti ená e ce laèa ba aèmboè mnyúè mo' ce seèe rïìñ ka'.” Woweèe a m laèa wa'a njobeè' Pol aè m ce feè'shi aèmboè Jisoès ba nfúú efa rkwe. Bfúr waê, máè loo weèe aè rlii yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraêis, ená weèe ba cuâu mo'sir. Weèe fa túr ñgaèpni a weâe mú ka'. Weèe ba aèbee aè yuu weèe ce kwaè'shi ker ba aè yuu weèe ce geèe.	Now I beg you, brothers, through the name of our Lord, Jesus Christ, that you all speak the same thing and that there be no divisions among you, but that you be perfected together in the same mind and in the same judgment.
Yi ba ba foñ ená weèr aè nya' mnde' a kuu Nyúè, njobeè' weèr aè suñ beèe ená Nyúè aè m fúr Jisos Kraâis efa rkwe.	Yes, we are found false witnesses of God, because we testified about God that he raised up Christ, whom he didn't raise up, if it is so that the dead are not raised.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, máâ suñ weèe máná buu wááwá ce weèe ka' bipshi neè Nyúè aè rloo, byemi weená weèe aè koni, baná Nyúè be fa neè weèe.	Therefore I tell you, all things whatever you pray and ask for, believe that you have received them, and you shall have them.

Pol aè ka' vúè, Jus ce a m vúâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm naè a vú a tááte, a sir ye a fa mbetar, a suñ ku' buu ce e m geèe. Geewa'a yuu mo' yi m ba ce yi m ce duèñshi ená buu anaè aè m ba mini ka'. Bfúr waê, ñwáè aè ka' laa ená e byemi neè Nyúè, ke' ce geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ ka', baná sá' efa gho yu ká? AÈde' rbyemïì anaè li gee ye e luñ a?	What good is it, my brothers, if a man says he has faith, but has no works? Can faith save him?
Máè m yá yap ñgaâa maè' bïìr ce a ke maè' bïìr yaèp cu ba mbe mnyaèabaèraè'. A m suñ máè ená woweèe a yu malaèr mjeâe mmbaa.	The number of the armies of the horsemen was two hundred million. I heard the number of them.

Blaèa ce enáê, “Nfeè' moè'sir caè'caè'”, vi ce duèñshi ená Nyúè be caè'si buu ce aède' vi ci'tïì, ce yu buu ce e m geèe naè, tá buu ce aède' vi ci'tïì ka' vi cu nfeseè.	"This phrase, ""Yet once more,"" signifies the removing of those things that are shaken, as of things that have been made, that those things which are not shaken may remain."
Zhi bòŋ à rtʉr bòŋàbee fa wěe mʉʉ.	It is good to have unity among yourselves.
“Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce weèe yu beâe aè rla' Koèrasïìn, ndoèo aè co' weèe ce weèe yu beâe aè rla' Báèrsaidaè njobeè' a m ba gee buu bghagha' ce a m geèe fa weâe mú naè ba aè rla' Tayaè, ker ba aè rla' Sidoèn beâe aèfo a m ba neè kupse e sese', a ma' bcáè' njïì rkwe, a yo' bú aè nyoèr, a cute aègho. Luke	Luêk	10	15	AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè weèe ce weèe yu beâe aè rla' Kaèpanuèm, waè' a be ko'si weèe mbe buèu a? Yi yu wa' ka'. A be duè neè weèe ba mbaè yir.	You, Capernaum, who are exalted to heaven, will be brought down to Hades.
Luke	Luêk	10	16	Ñwáè ce e ka' yu' yuu ce weèe ce laèa baná ñwáè anaè aè yu' ya nlaèa. Ñwáè ce e ka' kani baná ñgaèñ aè kani ya nlaèa. Ñwáè ce e ka' kani ya nlaèa baná ñgaèñ aè kani nlaèa ñwáè ce e m tuu máè.”	Whoever listens to you listens to me, and whoever rejects you rejects me. Whoever rejects me rejects him who sent me."
Wáè byemi ená m yu njep yaè Taê, yaè Ta aè ba njep máè a? Blaèa ce m ce laèa neè weèe na, m ce laèa ba aè ñger ya ka'. Yaè Ta ce e yu njep máè a ñwáè ce e ce geèe li rfaè'.	Don't you believe that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? The words that I tell you, I speak not from myself; but the Father who lives in me does his works.
Nduunjì anà zhi goni a sap sê.	That road is extremely long.
E m ce laèa neè beèe enáê, “Nfeè' aè gháá, kúú Nyúè yi yu aètútú seè'ni, kupse neè, ma' yeè buu bbebep, byemi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ.”	"and saying, ""The time is fulfilled, and the Kingdom of God is at hand! Repent, and believe in the Good News."""
Wèr à koo mbàa ese ye.	We have taken money from him.
Wèr à cʉʉshi yer mbʉ, wèe à maʼshì yee zhi zhe kwâa.	We tethered our goats but you allowed yours and they ate the corn.

Ñgaâa byañ wááwá ce a m joèo ye a m ke'seè. E m geèe wa'a yi duñshïì ená ñgeèe beèe enjep ñgoèñ na yi m ba bebep. Nyúè aè m loèr yi ye aèmboè ñwáâ nyáánïì, aèmboè e ke loèr ñwáè wááwá ce e ka' byemi neè ye. Nyúè aè fa seèe buu wááwá ce seèe aè ba túr, tá seèe bo cu rcu ryáánïì. E m geèe yi ba aètáèr wa'a njo' yi ñger ce yi yu jáá. Kúú Nyúè yu ba cuâu bu' ka', yu ba ñger.	For the Kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.

Yi ka' ba wa'a, beèe mo' ce a m ba beèe embe ndap rloo ce a m ce too ená ndap rloo beèe ce a bii faè' bkwaèa ka', ce aè m ba beâe aè rla' Saèiren ba aè rla' AÈláèksandaè ker ba beâe aè ñgoâñ Sïìlesïìyaè ba Áshaè a m ce sár mnsár a Stáfaèn weèe.	"But some of those who were of the synagogue called ""The Libertines,"" and of the Cyrenians, of the Alexandrians, and of those of Cilicia and Asia arose, disputing with Stephen."
Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca ka' ba neè beèe mo' aèmboè yuu ce a cete, baná e yu wa'a ba neè beèe ce a ce bú.	Even if our Good News is veiled, it is veiled in those who perish;
Wèe à fa ye mbàa gòr banɛ e be gàpni moʼ yuu cɛ̀ʼ àgho.	You have given him much money therefore he will reduce part of it and buy clothes with.
Ñwáè Nyúè aè ka' buu yuu, weèe túr yuu anaè, weèe fa ye. Koni neè beèe ce a niñ weèe, gá' neè woweèe boèñboñ.	contributing to the needs of the saints; given to hospitality.
Yèr ŋkòŋkò à koni wèr à nsuu ntìni.	Our helper helped us on the farm today.
tá weèe wááwá bo kuè'si Nyúè ce e yu Taèr neè yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraâis neè ntee e mo'sir ba cuâu moè'sir.	that with one accord you may with one mouth glorify the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Jisoès aè bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Lo rlii a nda?” E beesïì enáê, “La rlii a Ncúèkïì, njobeè' weèr yu aèñgoo.”	"He asked him, ""What is your name?"" He said to him, ""My name is Legion, for we are many."""
Bfúr waê, ñwáè moè' yu ce e ce yá ñgá' a? Ñgaèñ loo neè Nyúè. Ñwáè moè' yu ce e ce lu'shi a? Ñgaèñ yop yáá, nási Nyúè.	Is any among you suffering? Let him pray. Is any cheerful? Let him sing praises.
Jisoès aè ciisïì neè woweèe enáê, “Loèr neè nfeè' neè yis beèe Farïìsi ba yïì Hároèd.”	"He warned them, saying, ""Take heed: beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and the yeast of Herod."""
Mbañruèñwáè moè' ce bko' vi m koo ye aè táá njeptii Jisoès.	Behold, a certain man who had dropsy was in front of him.
M ce laèa wa'a njobeè' máè kar aè múè le rla' ca, a yá bdïì' ce weèe ce geèe mloo. Máè yá foñ dïû' rfa, a sañ mbe dïì' anaè enáê, ‘Neè Nyúè ce a rïìñ ka'.’ Baná Nyúè ce weèe ce loo neè ye, a riñ ye ka' anaè, a yïì ce m be suñ weèe aèmboè ye.	For as I passed along, and observed the objects of your worship, I found also an altar with this inscription: 'TO AN UNKNOWN GOD.' What therefore you worship in ignorance, this I announce to you.
Weèr aè rïìñ ená weèe aè túr njáèá ntee ca njobeè' weèe ce keè' ba buu ce Nyúè aè kupshi a lá neè weèe mbe buèu. AÈ m ba njobeè' nsuñ mboèñmboñ ce e yu mini ce a m feè'shi, weèe aè ka' riñ aèmboè buu ca.	because of the hope which is laid up for you in the heavens, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the Good News,
Yàa tarkʉ e ke no rkìŋndàmbàʼ.	My grand father smokes a pipe.
a waa, a laa enáê, “Masaè Jisoès, koosimnse neè weèr.”	"They lifted up their voices, saying, ""Jesus, Master, have mercy on us!"""
To zhi lʉ̀ʼʉ.	The hole has ended.
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' Nyúè aè m túr ntee boèñboñ neè máè, e gee máè ba njáèá ñwáè ce m yu seè'ni na. Yuu ce e m geèe neè máè anaè yi m bú aè cicïì ka' njobeè' máè m faè' a caa beèe wááwá ce a m ba ñgaâa ntuu neè Jisoès. Yi ke' ba ba ená máè m faè' neè ya ñger ka'. AÈ m ba njobeè' Nyúè aè m túr máè aè ntee boèñboñ, a ka' fa máè ñger anaè.	But by the grace of God I am what I am. His grace which was bestowed on me was not futile, but I worked more than all of them; yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.
E ka' laèa wa'a, Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè ye enáê, “Haba! Njeñwáè caê, lo rbyemïì li tap seê. Tá yi ba neè wáè aèmboè aè ce koèñ na.” Muu yïì aè ku ke'se aè nfeè' anaè.	"Then Jesus answered her, ""Woman, great is your faith! Be it done to you even as you desire."" And her daughter was healed from that hour."
E m rïìñ ená woweèe a m ce ko'ndoñ neè Jisoès, a ka' koo ye a vú aègho a fa neè ye.	For he knew that because of envy they had delivered him up.
Ncïìndap Nyúè aè laa neè ye enáê, “Kupshi wo bcáè', yar wo blaba'.” Pitaè aè gee wa'a. E ker laa neè ye enáê, “Yar wo mñgaèbúlaè, vú a máâ mbuèu.”	"The angel said to him, ""Get dressed and put on your sandals."" He did so. He said to him, ""Put on your cloak, and follow me."""
Yïìseèe beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ker ba ñgaâa rsa', a m koo ye a fa ye mbe mmbo govanoè tá a bo sa' ye, yú. A ka' sa', a taa ye mbe kïìntaa.	and how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him up to be condemned to death, and crucified him.
Jisoès aè du yi ba mbe rtuèu Oleèf.	but Jesus went to the Mount of Olives.
E túr aè rba no-ñkoo ka', ce geèe buu ba aè ñger ka'. E be ce geèe buu neè rbonïì- ñwáè. E túr aè rba ñwáè mntañshïì ka'. E fa roñ mbaèa ka'.	not a drinker, not violent, not greedy for money, but gentle, not quarrelsome, not covetous;
Ñwáè ce e ka' tá keè yu' yuu ce ñwáè ntuu Nyúè anaè be keè laèa, geèe yi ka', baná a be keè fúr ñgaèñ efa múè beèe, yú.’	It will be, that every soul that will not listen to that prophet will be utterly destroyed from among the people.'
Nyúè aè m kwaè'shi ená e be geèe yuu ce yi yu boèñboñ neè seèe ce seèe yu beâe seè'ni na, tá e bo geèe tá seèe beèe ca weèe ba aèbee, ba yáánïì a yeâ bsii.	God having provided some better thing concerning us, so that apart from us they should not be made perfect.
E cip àmnʉ.	He has boldly stopped crying.
Ñwáè ce e ke túr ñgwaguèu yu ba nduu. Ñkar nduu ka' táá ce yu' aèmboè nduu anaè ce laèa, baná e be lu'shi magoèr seê. A mboè yi ku ba neè máè wa'a. M ce lu'shi se njobeè' m yu ñkar nduu anaè.	He who has the bride is the bridegroom; but the friend of the bridegroom, who stands and hears him, rejoices greatly because of the bridegroom's voice. This, my joy, therefore is made full.

a laa neè ye enáê, “M be fa wáè ñger ba bkuè' ce aè bto' enjep ñgoèñ na wááwá. A m fa buu ca wááwá neè máè, aède' m fa neè ñwáè ce máè koèñ.	"The devil said to him, ""I will give you all this authority, and their glory, for it has been delivered to me; and I give it to whomever I want."
Bcàŋ ca a bwoo a?	Are these barns yours?

Ntaaŋguu ca ce shaŋger sê.	This log of wood is easy to split.

Fa fyèŋshi mkuu à mʉ̀mo kaʼ.	Donʼt mix it with beans.
máâ keèr vúè yá weèe, tá weèe bo yoèñshi Jisos Kraâis njo' máè.	that your rejoicing may abound in Christ Jesus in me through my presence with you again.
Jisoès aè m jáèr aè mla' mñgoèrñgoèr ba aè mla' mñká'ñká' a ce yá'ni beèe aè wap mndap mloo, a ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè kúú Nyúè, a ce geèe beèe ce a m ce yañ byañ njáèá jáá jáèá jáá, a ce keè'se.	Jesus went about all the cities and the villages, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the Good News of the Kingdom, and healing every disease and every sickness among the people.
AÈmboè a sañ enáê, “E m ko' mbekïì” na, baná yi yu ba ená ká? Yi yu ba ená e m káè' entombïì a suu embe dïì' ce e m ba, a ba'si njep nsheè.	"Now this, ""He ascended,"" what is it but that he also first descended into the lower parts of the earth?"
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè ñkúú Kayisaro OÈgostoè aè fa rsa' ená beèe wááwá a yeâ ñgoèñ a sañ mlii tá e bo beè' beèe.	Now it happened in those days, that a decree went out from Caesar Augustus that all the world should be enrolled.
M ce koèñ ená mmbañruè ce a yu aè bdïì' wááwá a loo. Woweèe a ce loo, a naa mmbo mrara mbekïì, ke' túr ntee yayañ neè beèe moè', káè ba ñgaâa mntañshïì ka'.	I desire therefore that the men in every place pray, lifting up holy hands without anger and doubting.
Weèe rïìñ aèmboè Nyúè ye ye rïìñ foñ naè ená yer ñgeèe ce weèr aè m ce geèe neè weèe ce weèe aè byemi, yi m ba yáánïì. Weèr aè m geèe yuu bebep ka'.	You are witnesses with God, how holy, righteously, and blamelessly we behaved ourselves toward you who believe.
Ryɛʼnì ca li yu àtɛ̀r kaʼ.	This lesson is not easy.
Fa là mɛ̀ mbàa ce wɛ̀ ba laa nà.	Give me the money, which you said.
Seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe ka' ba ñwáè moè'sir, káè ñwáè aè geèe búè áè, káè ñwáè aè geèe búè ka' áè, yi túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè liseèe rbyemïì ka'. Yuu tatap yi yu ená seèe byemi neè Jisos Kraêis, duñshi liseèe rbyemïì anaè aè liseèe rkoèñnïì.	For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision amounts to anything, nor uncircumcision, but faith working through love.
Ñwáè ce e ce yu' ncir Nyúè ce yi boèñ du misïî, aè ba ncir ce yi fa ñwáè fáñ aè rgeèe buu bboèñboñ, a ker lá ncir anaè boèñboñ aè nfeè' sïìp, Nyúè be ghoèni yuu wááwá ce e ce geèe, njobeè' ñwáè anaè ku ce yu' yu' ka', e ce yu' ce geèe.	But he who looks into the perfect law of freedom, and continues, not being a hearer who forgets, but a doer of the work, this man will be blessed in what he does.
Ŋgwe Nyaakò à càa mbena.	Nyakoʼs dog has passed here.
Beèe wááwá a m ce wáp seê, njobeè' ku' buu bbáèá ba mncoèo ce ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a m ce duèñshi aè ñger Nyúè.	Fear came on every soul, and many wonders and signs were done through the apostles.
Ñwáè aè ka' ba aèbee a Kraêis, baná e kúti ñwáâ nfi; buu brúèú aè mïì, aè ba ba buu bfi seè'ni.	Therefore if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old things have passed away. Behold, all things have become new.
Seèe ce Nyúè aè geèe seèe aè luêñ, seèe ce keè' nfeè' ce seèe be koni buu anaè. Ñwáè aè ka' yá yuu ce e ba ce keè', e ker ce keè' yi ka'. Waè' aède' ñwáè ker cu aè rkeè' yuu ce e yá wáá a?	For we were saved in hope, but hope that is seen is not hope. For who hopes for that which he sees?
Káè ñwáè aè geèe búè áè, káè ñwáè aè geèe búè ka' áè, yi túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè liseèe rbyemïì ka'. Yuu goèr yi yu ená Nyúè gee tá seèe ba beâe bfi.	For in Christ Jesus neither is circumcision anything, nor uncircumcision, but a new creation.
Tá Nyúè ka' keè geèe ñgoèñ, e m rïìñ war yuu ce e be geèe neè Kraêis. AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' elúèsimbuèu e geêe, e yáátïì aèwañ njo' weèe.	who was foreknown indeed before the foundation of the world, but was revealed at the end of times for your sake,
Wɛ̌ ke nyaŋshi bzhee waʼa njo kɛ?	Why do you look disapproving lat food like that?
Ñgúè mostaè ca ñwáási a caa ñgúè buu wááwá. Ka' yi yu wa'a, a ke byeè, e ku' caa buu wááwá ce a byeè aè mñkúè, ba seè'ni ba aè ce, bsiñ vi vú ba'ri mndap aè mnta' efa gho.”	"which indeed is smaller than all seeds. But when it is grown, it is greater than the herbs, and becomes a tree, so that the birds of the air come and lodge in its branches."""
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè', ñgaèñ yu'.”	"He said, ""Whoever has ears to hear, let him hear."""
Woweèe a ka' duè baè' aètútú rla' ce woweèe a m ce duè aèfo naè, Jisoès aè gee aèmboè e ce caèa rla' anaè caèa wa'a.	They drew near to the village, where they were going, and he acted like he would go further.
Weèr aè yu' werná beèe mo' a loâ efa weâr mú a jepsi weèe neè buu ce woweèe a m laèa, weèe aè riñ yuu ce weèe táá mbenduè mo ka'. Weèr aè m fa woweèe ñger aè rlaèa buu anaè ka'.	Because we have heard that some who went out from us have troubled you with words, unsettling your souls, saying, 'You must be circumcised and keep the law,' to whom we gave no commandment;
“Weèe ce weèe yu ñgaâa nteèetu, a ba mbáè'nsúèr aè mntee ker ba aè btuè', weâe ke kuâ reè bkoèr weèe Yú' Rara weèe aè nfeè' wááwá. Yuu ce wee bta a m geèe ku ba yuu ce weèe ce geèe.	"You stiff-necked and uncircumcised in heart and ears, you always resist the Holy Spirit! As your fathers did, so you do.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	52	Ñwáè ncep ntuu moè' ce wee bta a m buu efa rfa ñgá' neè ye ka', yu yïì efá? Woweèe a m yú beèe ce a m suñ beèe tá nfeè' ka' gháá, ená Ñwáâ Nyáánïì ce vúè naè. Yu ye ñwáâ Nyáánïì anaè ce weèe aè fyeèni a ker yú.	Which of the prophets didn't your fathers persecute? They killed those who foretold the coming of the Righteous One, of whom you have now become betrayers and murderers.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	53	Beèe ce a m koni mncir ce Nyúè aè m caèasi mbe mmbo yïì ncïìndap na aè m koni weèe. Geewa'a, weèe aè láè mncir anaè ka'.”	You received the law as it was ordained by angels, and didn't keep it!"
Weèr aè ka' yá wa'a, a loo Taitoès ce e m káè' rfaè' rjaè' ca ená e du neè rfaè' ca kuèntombïì, ja' weèe tá weèe misi rfaâ' rboèñboñ ce Nyúè aè fa weèe na.	So we urged Titus, that as he made a beginning before, so he would also complete in you this grace.
Noèñ ce Jisoès aè m topshi nshe a gee nfeèp anaè aè ce yá buu naè, aè m ba nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè.	It was a Sabbath when Jesus made the mud and opened his eyes.
Yuu ce m ce laèa neè weèe, m ce laèa neè beèe wááwá. Fa buumi neè ka'.”	"What I tell you, I tell all: Watch."""
Jisoès aè m ker du aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm. A ka' baè' a du mbe Ndaèp Nyúè a ce jáèr mbe dïì' mo' ce a m ce too ená njïì-baaki ñkúú Solomúèn.	It was winter, and Jesus was walking in the temple, in Solomon's porch.
Weâe yu' blaâa Nyúè anaè, weèe ce gee yuu ce yi suñ weèe ená weèe geêe. Weèe aè ka' ku ce yu' blaâa Nyúè yu', ke' ce geèe yuu ce vi laèa ka' baná weèe ce bo' wee btu.	But be doers of the word, and not only hearers, deluding your own selves.
Beèe ce a m ba yap mbe keñ naè, a gú'shïì neè ye, a laa enáê. “AÈ yu Muu Nyúè ghup.”	"Those who were in the boat came and worshiped him, saying, ""You are truly the Son of God!"""
M túr yuu aè rlaèa neè btu embe coêr. M ce laèa aèmboè tu foñ. M yu ñwáè ce máè m yá yuu ce a m geèe neè Kraâis aè nfeè' ce e m yá ñgá', a ba moè' efa múè beèe ce a be koni rboèñ ce Jisoès be keè vúè aègho naè.	I exhort the elders among you, as a fellow elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and who will also share in the glory that will be revealed.
Mluè mi be koo bbyeèñge ce a yu neè mmbúè ba bbyeèñge ce a ce nyoñsi boo. Mluè mi be ba neè beâe aè ñgoèñ ca, tá Nyúè bepsi ntee neè woweèe.	Woe to those who are pregnant and to those who nurse infants in those days! For there will be great distress in the land, and wrath to this people.
Mbeèr aè loè, túè' aè ká' a ce raa. Baná seèe ma' ñgeâe neètú', lor buu bïìr e neèmootïì, yar.	The night is far gone, and the day is near. Let's therefore throw off the works of darkness, and let's put on the armor of light.
Taa neè mñgaèñ njep ye, ku' njep ye, táá tatap aè rbyemïì ce a m yá'ni weèe naè, ker ce yoñshi Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá.	rooted and built up in him, and established in the faith, even as you were taught, abounding in it in thanksgiving.
Bbyeèñge ce a m loâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèle a du aèmbuèu Jisoès naè, a m duè a Josáèf weèe, a yá rsheè, a yá aèmboè a m láè gúâú ñwáè njo.	The women, who had come with him out of Galilee, followed after, and saw the tomb, and how his body was laid.
Nfò à cɛ̀ni mbe kùu.	Nfor has behaved like a woman.
Baná aède' beèe a war neè ye aè njáâá ká ce woweèe a ka' tá byemi neè ye ka'? AÈde' woweèe a byemïì neè ye aè njáâá ká ce woweèe a ka' tá yu' aèmboè ye ka'? AÈde' woweèe a yu' aèmboè ye aè njáâá ká ce ñwáè aè ka' tá feè'shi neè woweèe ka'?	How then will they call on him in whom they have not believed? How will they believe in him whom they have not heard? How will they hear without a preacher?
Caè'ni neè AÈndroènikoès ba Juènayaès ce weèr woweèe yu Juês, woweèe foñ a yá ñgá' mbe shañ aèmboè máè. Woweèe a yu boo mlii aè múè ñgaâa ntuu Jisos Kraêis. Woweèe a m ba ñgaâa rbyemïì entombïì neè máè.	Greet Andronicus and Junia, my relatives and my fellow prisoners, who are notable among the apostles, who also were in Christ before me.
A mbuèu ce m ce suñ buu neè woweèe ba aè mñgaèa. M ce geèe wa'a tá woweèe a ce keè' ce yá ka', a ce yu'shi, ce yu' ka', a riñ buu foñ ka'.	Therefore I speak to them in parables, because seeing they don't see, and hearing, they don't hear, neither do they understand.
AÈ ka' keèr ba aè nfeè' moè', e duñshïì yïì nyor neè beèe ce a m ce duè a yeâ mbuèu. Beèe anaè a m caèa beèe mjeèe taê. Beèe magoèr efa woweèe a cu bteèe, ka' beèe mo' a kweñger wa'.	Then he appeared to over five hundred brothers at once, most of whom remain until now, but some have also fallen asleep.
Seèe ka' laa ba seenáê, ‘Yi m loè ese ñwáè’, baná beèe a be baèa seèe njobeè' beèe wááwá a byemi ená Joân aè m ba ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè.”	"But if we say, 'From men,' we fear the multitude, for all hold John as a prophet."""
Woweèe a ce geèe yaèp buu, a ce wáp Nyúè ka'.”	There is no fear of God before their eyes.
Beèe ce a woweèe a m ce cu, ker ba yïì beèe, a ka' yu' ku' yuu boèñboñ ce Tata Nyúè aè m geèe neè ye na, a lu'shi a woweèe.	Her neighbors and her relatives heard that the Lord had magnified his mercy towards her, and they rejoiced with her.
AÈ ka' ba noèñ entombïì embe múè ñgaèa, aè mú ñgaèptú', ñgoèñ yi ku bii sii, Máèári ce aè rla' Makdalaè aè du faèdïì' rsheè li m ba naè. E ka' baè' a yá ená a m caè'si luèr ce a m cete ncuâu rsheè aègho naè.	Now on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene went early, while it was still dark, to the tomb, and saw the stone taken away from the tomb.
Ka' beèe mo' efa woweèe a m táá njep blaâa Nyúè anaè ka' wa'a, waè' yi yu ená Nyúè aè m buu efa rtáá njep yuu ce e m laèa a?	For what if some were without faith? Will their lack of faith nullify the faithfulness of God?
Jisoès aè laasïì beèe, a niñ mbe keñ a du aè ñgoâñ Magadaèn.	Then he sent away the multitudes, got into the boat, and came into the borders of Magdala.
E ma' yi cáè' njep nsheè, a nyáá mbekïì, a du a yá Jisoès.	He, casting away his cloak, sprang up, and came to Jesus.
Weèe fa maè'shi tá ñwáè moè' too weèe ená ñwáè ryá'nïì ka', njobeè' weèe ku túr ñwáè ryá'nïì moè'sir caè'caè', ce yu Kraâis anaè.	Neither be called masters, for one is your master, the Christ.
Ka' beèe ce a geèe búè wáá naè, a ce láè mncir wááwá ka'. Woweèe a ku koñ ená weèe gee búè tá a bo naèa tu ená weèe aè yu'ni neè woweèe.	For even they who receive circumcision don't keep the law themselves, but they desire to have you circumcised, that they may boast in your flesh.
Woweèe a laa enáê, “Weèr yu ñgúè Abraèhaêm. Weèr aè m be ba bkwaèa neè ñwáè moè' ka'. Wáè ka' ce laèa wáná aè be geèe tá weèr luñ aè njáâá ká?”	"They answered him, ""We are Abraham's seed, and have never been in bondage to anyone. How do you say, 'You will be made free?'"""
E ka' cu mbo ce duè, beèe aè co'nïì bcáè' a laashi njep nduunjïì.	As he went, they spread their cloaks in the way.
“Ñwáè ce e ka' koni mú ghaèrñwáè aèmboè ca fa máâ rlii, baná ñgaèñ aè koni máè. Ñwáè ce e ka' koni máè, baná e koni ba máè ka', e koni ba ñwáè ce e m tuu máè.”	Whoever receives one such little child in my name, receives me, and whoever receives me, doesn't receive me, but him who sent me.
A ka' fúr, e laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Yaè beèe Isráèl, loèr neè nfeè' aè yuu ce weèe ce koèñ aè rgeèe neè beèe ca.	"He said to them, ""You men of Israel, be careful concerning these men, what you are about to do."
a ja' seèe. E m jaè' seèe njo' buu bboèñboñ mo' ce seèe aè m geèe ka'. AÈ m ba njo' yïì ñkoosimnse. E m suè'si viseèe mntee vi ba brara, a fa seèe ryoâñ rfi, yi yú' yi gee seèe aè ba beâe bfi.	not by works of righteousness, which we did ourselves, but according to his mercy, he saved us, through the washing of regeneration and renewing by the Holy Spirit,
Waè' weèe aè gaèp Jisoès a? Waè' ñwáè ce a m taa mbe kïìntaa njo' weèe aè m ba Pol a? Waè' a m baèptir weèe aè rlii Pol a?	Is Christ divided? Was Paul crucified for you? Or were you baptized into the name of Paul?
Nyúè aè m ce máè njo' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca, ená m fe'shïî, ba ñwáè ntuu neè Jisoès, ker ba ñwáè ryá'nïì.	For this, I was appointed as a preacher, an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.
Nfò à yuu ba mrùʼ.	Nfor bought palm wine instead.
Jisoès aè ka' kuè fúú enjep roè, a yá aèmboè rbuu li mú'tïì, a ker yá aèmboè Yú' Rara yi ce suèu mbe yeâ nduè aèmboè beèñ wa'a.	Immediately coming up from the water, he saw the heavens parting, and the Spirit descending on him like a dove.
Jisoès aè ka' ce jáèr aèwaâa rdip rgoèr ce aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a yá Saimúèn ba nfúr yïì ce Andruè, ce a m ba ñgaèa ñkoo nca, aèmboè a ce maè' rraa njep roè.	Passing along by the sea of Galilee, he saw Simon and Andrew the brother of Simon casting a net into the sea, for they were fishermen.
Máè yá aèmboè ncïìndap Nyúè moè' ce suèu embe buèu, a túr ki ce a ke mú' rwee ce lúèsimbuèu yu aègho ka' naè aègho. E m túr ma shañ ñgoèr mbaè boè.	I saw an angel coming down out of heaven, having the key of the abyss and a great chain in his hand.
Wèr à ba zhʉshi nyo, geewaʼa e ku ce gʉ̀r.	We killed the snake but it is still shaking.
Yuu anaè yi ka' ce coèo wa'a, ku' beèe a kaarïì aèbee. Woweèe a m báèáñger seê, njobeè' ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a m ce laèa, ñwáè nsïìp aè ce yu' aè yïì lïî.	When this sound was heard, the multitude came together, and were bewildered, because everyone heard them speaking in his own language.
Beèe magoèr efa múè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ka' yu' yuu ce e m laèa na, a laa enáê, “Nlaèa ca yi tap seê. Ñwáè ce aède' e byemïì njáèá nlaèa ca a nda?”	"Therefore many of his disciples, when they heard this, said, ""This is a hard saying! Who can listen to it?"""
Baná aè nfeè' wááwá ce seèe aè ka' koni fáñ, seèe gee yuu boèñboñ neè beèe wááwá, lañlañ ñgaâa rbyemïì.	So then, as we have opportunity, let's do what is good toward all men, and especially toward those who are of the household of the faith.
M ka' ba ce kwaè'shi aè ryu' nyor, m ba lúr ka', njobeè' m be kuè ce laèa ba yuu ce yi yu mini. Ka' yi yu wa'a, m be yu' nyor ka' faè dïì' ñwáè moè' bo kwaè'shi aèmboè máè caèa buu ce m ce geèe, ker ba vïì ce m ce laèa na ka'.	For if I would desire to boast, I will not be foolish; for I will speak the truth. But I refrain, so that no man may think more of me than that which he sees in me, or hears from me.
Bkar waê, cena yu ñwaè' embenjïì ce máè sañ neè weèe. Máè sañ mñwaâ' bbaa ca a ce kuushi weèe buu ca tá weèe bo lá' efa mmirloè ce kwaè'shi buu Nyúè aè njïû yáánïì.	This is now, beloved, the second letter that I have written to you; and in both of them I stir up your sincere mind by reminding you;
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Mmbañruè enjep ñgoèñ na a ce loèr bbyeèñge, bbyeèñge a ce duèse bguèu.	"Jesus said to them, ""The children of this age marry, and are given in marriage."
Yi m ku ba efa rkáè' a Nyúè.	The same was in the beginning with God.
Ka' buu moè' yu goèr mbe buèu ba njep nsheè na ce beèe a ce too ená mnyúè wa'a, ker ce loèr buu anaè aèmboè vi yu lá btaèr neè woweèe wa'a,	"For though there are things that are called ""gods,"" whether in the heavens or on earth; as there are many ""gods"" and many ""lords;"""
A ke tuñ ñwáè, nyor ce keè' mboèñmboñ ka', túr ñger ka'. E fúú efa rkwe, yïì nyor ba mboèñmboñ, túr ñger.	It is sown in dishonor; it is raised in glory. It is sown in weakness; it is raised in power.
Pol aè ce Silaès, a ye a duê. Bfúr a m fa woweèe mbe mmbo Nyúè, tá Tata Nyúè bo keè'ni woweèe.	but Paul chose Silas, and went out, being commended by the brothers to the grace of God.
Fa cu neè aèmboè bkwaèa neè ñwáè moè' ka'. Weâe cu wa'a, weèe fa loèr njáèá rcu anaè tá' aè mmïìr, ce geèe buu bbebep ka'. Cu neè ba aèmboè beèe ce a yu bkwaèa neè Nyúè.	as free, and not using your freedom for a cloak of wickedness, but as bondservants of God.
M ̀ ce boo ndap.	I am building a house.
Msur ce mɛ̀ lɛ̀ mbena mi yû?	Where are the pepper that I kept here.
E ke ba wɛ̀ɛ sê.	She is always very slow.
Beèe mo' ce a m ce cïìñ yap njeèe a m ba aè rla' anaè a ba aè mñkúè, a ce cïìñ yap njeèe neètú'.	There were shepherds in the same country staying in the field, and keeping watch by night over their flock.
Jisoès aè laa enáê, “A sañ mbe ye ñwaè' mncir ená Nyúè aè m laèa enáê, ‘Weèe yu mnyúè.’	"Jesus answered them, ""Isn't it written in your law, 'I said, you are gods?'"
Ŋwɛ̀ tʉʼ à nyòʼ mɛ̀.	A witch has bewitched me.
Mmoo mi bɛti àgho a?	I have drank all of my wine.
Baná weèe koo ncúèkïì anaè ese ye, fa neè ñwáè ce e túr ncúèkïì rúú naè.	Take away therefore the talent from him, and give it to him who has the ten talents.
Ñwáè anaè aè m rïìñ ñwáè ce e m geèe ye e luñ efa yi yañ ka', njobeè' Jisoès aè m loè a bú aè múè kúr beèe ce a m ba aèfo.	But he who was healed didn't know who it was, for Jesus had withdrawn, a crowd being in the place.
Ñwáè aè ka' yá'ni yuu mo' jáá, ke' byemi blaèa ce Jisoès aè m laèa ker ba ryá'nïì ce li geèe beèe a ce rïìñ Tata Nyúè ka',	If anyone teaches a different doctrine, and doesn't consent to sound words, the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which is according to godliness,
“Rlir li yu aèmboè lam neè nyor. Me mmir mi ka' ba yáánïì, baná rraa li yu aè yeè nyoèr wááwá.	"The lamp of the body is the eye. If therefore your eye is sound, your whole body will be full of light.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	6	23	Me mmir mi ka' tá ba yáánïì ka', baná yeè nyor wááwá be ba aè túè'nji. Ka' ba ená rraa enjep weèe yu túè'nji, baná túè'nji anaè be sii aèmboè ká?	But if your eye is evil, your whole body will be full of darkness. If therefore the light that is in you is darkness, how great is the darkness!
Matthew	Matïìyoè	6	24	“AÈde' ñwáè fa' neè mmasaâ bbaa ka'. E ka' gee wa'a, baná e be baèa moè', koèñ moè', yu'ni neè moè', loèr moè' aè yuu ka'. AÈde' aè ce faè' neè Nyúè ker ce faè' neè mbaèa ka'.	No one can serve two masters, for either he will hate the one and love the other; or else he will be devoted to one and despise the other. You can't serve both God and Mammon."
a ká' a ce caè'ni ye, a ce laèa enáê, “Nyaèr, ñkwe Juês.”	"They began to salute him, ""Hail, King of the Jews!"""
Ñwáè ce e ce láè nlaèa Nyúè yu ñwáè ce e koèñ Nyúè a misïî. Cena a njïì ce aède' seèe ba seèe Nyúè weèe.	But whoever keeps his word, God's love has most certainly been perfected in him. This is how we know that we are in him:
“Yaè Taê, wáè ka' koêñ, geèe tá ndoñ ñgá' ca caa embe máâ tuè. Geewa'a, ke' ba ená m ce laèa máná aè gee ba aèmboè máè koèñ ka', geèe ba aèmboè wáè koèñ ená yi ba.”	"saying, ""Father, if you are willing, remove this cup from me. Nevertheless, not my will, but yours, be done."""
Ñwáè ce yi ntee yi ka' ku bii fa ye ñgá', ka' yá aèmboè wáè ce wáè túr bfee ce ye byee mbe ndaèp njáèá mnyúè ca, mboè cena yi be fa ye ñger aè rye byee anaè a?	For if a man sees you who have knowledge sitting in an idol's temple, won't his conscience, if he is weak, be emboldened to eat things sacrificed to idols?
Cɛ̀ʼ ca zhi lùu ntaa sê.	This cloth is very expensive.
Wáè ka' cu ba aèmboè ñwáè e ke koèñ, baná aè be kwe. Wáè ka' yú buu ce ñwáè e ke koèñ aè ñger Yú' Nyúè, baná aè be cu.	For if you live after the flesh, you must die; but if by the Spirit you put to death the deeds of the body, you will live.
a laa enáê, “Tataê, yaè ñwáè rfaè' noèñ aè laè', yïì ñgúè' nyor moè' aè kwe, e ce yu' ryañ seê.”	"and saying, ""Lord, my servant lies in the house paralyzed, grievously tormented."""
Woweèe a be keè laèa neè mtuâu mñgoèrñgoèr enáê, ‘Gweèñger neè mbe weâr nduè,’ laèa neè mtuâu mñká'ñká' enáê, ‘Gúèúshi neè weèr.’	Then they will begin to tell the mountains, 'Fall on us!' and tell the hills, 'Cover us.'
Mbʉ zhìsò à kwe.	Our goat is dead.
Beèe ce a be bo'shi ená a woweèe Kraêis, káè ená a woweèe ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, a be nyáá, duèñshi mncoèo, geèe buu bghagha' ce beèe a báêá, ená njïì yi ka' ba tá woweèe a bo bo' ka' neè beèe ce Nyúè aè m ce naè-ñwáè.	For there will arise false christs, and false prophets, and they will show great signs and wonders, so as to lead astray, if possible, even the chosen ones.
Ñgaâa mfaè' aè vúê, a laa neè ñwáè ñkúè ca enáê, ‘Masaè, mboè wáè m byeè ñgúè buu bboèñboñ a wáâ ñkúè a? Ñke' yi ka' lo yi ba efá?’	The servants of the householder came and said to him, 'Sir, didn't you sow good seed in your field? Where did this darnel come from?'
‘A máè Nyúè Abraèhaêm, a ba Nyúè Aisïìk, a ker ba Nyúè Jakoèp.’ E yu Nyúè bgúâú beèe ka', e yu ba Nyúè beèe ce a cu bteèe.”	"I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob?' God is not the God of the dead, but of the living."""
Jus a ku le' yap enáê, “Weèr túr ncir, aèmboè ncir anaè yi ce laèa, e be kuè kwe njobeè' e ce loèr yïì nyor ená e yu Muu Nyúè.”	"The Jews answered him, ""We have a law, and by our law he ought to die, because he made himself the Son of God."""
Ŋkar zhì e ke wɛp buu sê.	His friend fears a lot.
Máè m laèa cena a ke' ce laèa ba aèmboè beèe ce a máñni Jisoès ka'. Beèe ce a ke saèki, ce ko'ndoñ, ce yáèá, ker ce loo neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na, a ku ba seèe woweèe njep ñgoèñ na. Tá aè ka' buu efa rkar weèe njáèá beèe ca weèe, baná aè be fúú enjep ñgoèñ na duè faè mo'.	yet not at all meaning with the sexual sinners of this world, or with the covetous and extortioners, or with idolaters; for then you would have to leave the world.
AÈ m ba aè mnoèñ anaè, ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a loâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a du aè rla' Antïìyoèk.	Now in these days, prophets came down from Jerusalem to Antioch.
Woweèe a ka' ce yu'shi yuu ce Jisoès aè m laèa na, Jisoès aè ker ma' ñgaèa neè woweèe njobeè' e m baè' aètútú rla' Jáèrusaláèm, woweèe a ce kwaè'shi ená nfeè' be tuuse ka' tá kúú Nyúè yi ká'.	As they heard these things, he went on and told a parable, because he was near Jerusalem, and they supposed that the Kingdom of God would be revealed immediately.
Baènabaès aè m ce koèñ ená woweèe a du a Joèn Mak weèe.	Barnabas planned to take John, who was called Mark, with them also.
“Máè ka' kúti aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm ce geèe rloo mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, a yá njáèá rlo mo'.	"It happened that, when I had returned to Jerusalem, and while I prayed in the temple, I fell into a trance,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	22	18	Máè m yá aèmboè Tata ce laèa neè máè enáê, ‘Naèti cárcár fúú efa rla' Jáèrusaláèm njobeè' beâe aèfo a be yu' yuu ce aè ce suñ woweèe aèmboè máè ka'.’	and saw him saying to me, 'Hurry and get out of Jerusalem quickly, because they will not receive testimony concerning me from you.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	22	19	Máè laa mánáê, ‘Tataê, beèe ca a rïìñ ená máè m ce duè aè mndap mloo a ce koo beèe ce a byemi neè wáè a ce fa aè bshañ, a ce lïìp beèe mo' efa woweèe.	I said, 'Lord, they themselves know that I imprisoned and beat in every synagogue those who believed in you.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	22	20	AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' ce a m ce yú Stáfaèn ce e m ce suñ beèe aèmboè wáè, má máè aè táá aèfo a ce yu' rboèñ, a ce keè'ni bcáâ' beèe ce a m ce yú ye.’	When the blood of Stephen, your witness, was shed, I also was standing by, and consenting to his death, and guarding the cloaks of those who killed him.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	22	21	E laa neè máè enáê, ‘Kuè du njobeè' m be tuu wáè tá aè du aènjïìsaèp seê, duè yá beèe enje jáá.’ ”	He said to me, 'Depart, for I will send you out far from here to the Gentiles.'"""
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè ba ba mnfeèp, weèe aè ba ba ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep ka'. AÈmboè weèe ce laèa ená weèe ce yá buu, baná weèe ku cu ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep.”	"Jesus said to them, ""If you were blind, you would have no sin; but now you say, 'We see.' Therefore your sin remains."
E m laèa neè beèe ce a m ce fyeèni bbeèñ naè enáê, “Loèr neè buu anaè duse aègho. Weèe aè geèe ndap yaè Ta aè kútïì ndap ntaa njoká?”	"To those who sold the doves, he said, ""Take these things out of here! Don't make my Father's house a marketplace!"""
AÈmboè Taèr ce e yu nteèe aè tuu máè, máè cu nteèe njobeè' ye, baná ñwáè ce e ka' ye yaè nyor, e be cu nteèe njo' máè.	As the living Father sent me, and I live because of the Father; so he who feeds on me, he will also live because of me.
“Loèr neè nfeè' neè beèe ce a ce nya' mnde' ená a woweèe ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè. Woweèe a ce vúè aè ryá weèe, ma' ñguèp njeèe, wáâ fyá' njep mú, woweèe a ba aèmboè bkuura ce vi ce roèo yuu ye.	"Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly are ravening wolves.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	16	Weèe be rïìñ woweèe neè yaèp ndeèe. Waè' aède' beèe a kúú leèemú embe mnoèo a? Waè' aède' beèe a kúú piyaè embe msini a?	By their fruits you will know them. Do you gather grapes from thorns, or figs from thistles?
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	17	Yi ku ba foñ ená mbaâñ boèñboñ yi ke yú mbe ce boèñboñ, mbaâñ bebep yi yú mbe ce bebep.	Even so, every good tree produces good fruit; but the corrupt tree produces evil fruit.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	18	AÈde' mbaâñ bebep yi yú mbe ce boèñboñ ka', aède' mbaâñ boèñboñ yi yú mbe ce bebep ka'.	A good tree can't produce evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree produce good fruit.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	19	Ce ce yi ka' tá yú boèñboñ ka', baná a be gwaèr, maè' njep mor.	Every tree that doesn't grow good fruit is cut down, and thrown into the fire.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	20	Baná weèe be rïìñ ñgaâa nya' mnde' ca neè yaèp ndeèe.	Therefore, by their fruits you will know them.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	21	“Yu ñwáè wááwá ce e ce laèa neè máè enáê, Tataê, Tataê, ce e be keèe niñ mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè ka'. Ñwáè ce e be keèe niñ mbo yu ba ñwáè ce e ce geèe yuu ce yaè Ta embe buèu ce koèñ.	Not everyone who says to me, 'Lord, Lord,' will enter into the Kingdom of Heaven; but he who does the will of my Father who is in heaven.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	22	Be keèe ba aè noèñ anaè tá beèe magoèr a laa neè máè enáê, ‘Tataê, Tataê, mboè weèr aè m cep yo ntuu a wáâ rlii, a fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe, a gee buu bghagha' a wáâ rlii a?’	Many will tell me in that day, 'Lord, Lord, didn't we prophesy in your name, in your name cast out demons, and in your name do many mighty works?'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	23	Woweèe a laèa wa'a, tá m laa neè woweèe enáê, ‘Máè rïìñ weèe ka'. Loè neè efa máâ geñ, weèe ce weèe yu ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep.’	Then I will tell them, 'I never knew you. Depart from me, you who work iniquity.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	24	“Baná ñwáè ce e ka' yu' buu ce máè laèa na, gee vi, ñgaèñ yu aèmboè ñwáè bfee ce e m baè'ri yïì ndap mbenduè ryáá,	Everyone therefore who hears these words of mine, and does them, I will liken him to a wise man, who built his house on a rock."
Beèe mo' a laa yap enáê, “Ñwáè ca ce fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe ba aè ñger Básábuèl ce e yu ñkúú byú' mnyúâmkaè'.”	"But some of them said, ""He casts out demons by Beelzebul, the prince of the demons."""
E m̀ kàʼni mɛ̀ enɛ e be fa mɛ̀ mbàa.	He promised me that he is going to give me money.
Ka' ya yañ aè m ba yïì ce weèe aè m ba cañ efa máâ geñ wa'a, weèe aè m loèr máè aè yuu cicïì ka'. Weèe aè m gá' neè máè aèmboè weèe ce gá' lá ba neè ncïìndap Nyúè wa'a. Neè mini-ñwáè, weèe aè m gá' neè máè aèmboè weèe ce gá' lá ba neè Jisos Kraâis wa'a.	That which was a temptation to you in my flesh, you didn't despise nor reject; but you received me as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.
Jisoès aè m ce duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, a ka' ce duè, a lor ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú, a woweèe a lá'sïì nyor, e laa neè woweèe enáê,	As Jesus was going up to Jerusalem, he took the twelve disciples aside, and on the way he said to them,
Yi ka' ba wa'a, e koo kúr bsoogáè ba ñgaâa rkeè'ni Ndap Nyúè ese ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba Farïìsïî, a woweèe a ka' ce duè, a lor blam a cú', a bársi msuèsuèñ, a lor buu bïìr.	Judas then, having taken a detachment of soldiers and officers from the chief priests and the Pharisees, came there with lanterns, torches, and weapons.
a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weâe duè, weèe laa weená ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a vúè neètú' a yáá gúâú ñwáè, weèe aè ce lá buumi.	"saying, ""Say that his disciples came by night, and stole him away while we slept."
Mgʉr mi yu àgho a?	Is there any oil?
Pol aè m ce laèa beèe a ku ce yu'shi, e ka' ce laèa aèmboè beèe enje jáá, woweèe a ghaêa, a laa enáê, “Weèe fa maè'shi ye ka', yú neè ye.”	"They listened to him until he said that; then they lifted up their voice, and said, ""Rid the earth of this fellow, for he isn't fit to live!"""
Mboè weèe rïìñ ená ñwáè ka' lor yïì nyor gee e ba ñgúè' moè' efa nyor kwaèraè baná a ye a yu seè'ni ba ñwáè moè'sir a? A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Mbañruèñwáè ba njeñwáè ca a be ba nyor moè'sir.”	"Or don't you know that he who is joined to a prostitute is one body? For, ""The two,"" says he, ""will become one flesh."""
Cena yi ka' mïì, máè yá nyaèa moè' aèmboè e fúú enjep nsheè. Nyaèa anaè aè m túr mdoñ mbe tuè aèmbo mdoñ ya' ce yi ku bii ká'. Mdoñ anaè mi m ba mi mmbaa. Yïì njeèndoñ aè m feese njeèndoñ nyaèa ce e m feese nyaèaroè naè.	I saw another beast coming up out of the earth. He had two horns like a lamb, and he spoke like a dragon.
Joân aè beesïì enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' túr bcáâ' bbaa, e fa mo' neè ñwáè ce e túr ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' túr byee, e ku gee wa' foñ.”	"He answered them, ""He who has two coats, let him give to him who has none. He who has food, let him do likewise."""
Nfò e ke gèe rfàʼ àmbò zhìi tâa waʼa.	Nfor works like his father.
E ke bèenjì muu wàp ce e tèetu nà sê.	She usually backs that his junior brother who is very stubborn.
A m yá'ni Musïìs bfee beâe aè ñgoâñ Ijïìp wááwá, e ba ñwáâ ñgoèr aè vi blaèa ker ba yi ñgeèe.	Moses was instructed in all the wisdom of the Egyptians. He was mighty in his words and works.
Kuè táá tatap njep lo rbyemïì, lá yo ntee rara. Beèe mo' a kani yuu ce yap ntee yi ce suñ woweèe, a sa'si lap rbyemïì.	holding faith and a good conscience; which some having thrust away made a shipwreck concerning the faith;
Weèr aè vúè aèfa aè rsuñ weèe Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ená Nyúè aè fúr Jisoès efa rkwe. Baná yuu ce Nyúè aè m kaè' ená e be geèe neè viseèe bta naè,	We bring you good news of the promise made to the fathers,
Jus a túr sá' goèr seê. Yuu entombïì yi yu ená Jus a beèe ce Nyúè aè m fa vi blaèa mba waâp mmboè.	Much in every way! Because first of all, they were entrusted with the oracles of God.
Bár beèe a laa yap enáê, “Beè táá ka wa' láê; seèe yá ka ená waè' AÈlajaè be vúè jaè' ye lá.”	"The rest said, ""Let him be. Let's see whether Elijah comes to save him."""
“AÈ wáâ rkweê, yo ñger yi yuê? AÈ wáâ rkweê, yoè nsïìi yuê?”	Death, where is your sting? Hades, where is your victory?
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “A ker sañ enáê, ‘Fa moèoshi Tata ce e yu yoè Nyúè ka'.’ “	"Jesus said to him, ""Again, it is written, 'You shall not test the Lord, your God.'"""
Woweèe a m ce jáèr aè brïìñ ba aè mtuèu, a ce cu ba aè mmbúè' ba aè mntoèñ. Ñgoèñ ca yi m ba yáánïì neè woweèe aè rcu njo ka'.	(of whom the world was not worthy), wandering in deserts, mountains, caves, and the holes of the earth.
Wɛ̀ kʉʉ sàʼ anà e cɛp kaʼ.	You have filed that cutlass and it is not sharp.
Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir ba beèe Farïìsïî. Weèe yu ñgaâa mbo'ni njobeè' weèe ce jáèr aè mñgoèñ a ce jáèr aè bkeñ tá weèe bo geèe ka' ñwáè moè'sir áè, kupse byemi neè Nyúè. E ce kupse, weèe gee ye e misïì bep caa weèe ñkaèraè' baa.	Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! For you travel around by sea and land to make one proselyte; and when he becomes one, you make him twice as much of a son of Gehenna as yourselves.
doc soso nè yer kùu.	We will trek and go there ourselves.
Nyúè aè ce ba beèe ce beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a ce kwaè'shi ená a yu blúr tá rïìtu yi bo koo beèe ce a ce kwaè'shi ená a yu ñgaâa bfee. E m ce beèe ce beèe enjep ñgoèñ a kwaè'shi ená a yu bgoè'sïì tá rïìtu yi bo koo beèe ce a túr ñger.	but God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
Gheèter neè riñ buu ce vi boèñ Tata Jisoès.	proving what is well pleasing to the Lord.
Ñwáè anaè aè ma'shïì ená e laêa. Pol aè táá mbe dïì' ce e m ko' a táá naè, a naa bo mbekïì ená beèe a cu nyañ. Beèe a ka' cu nyañ, e laa neè woweèe aè li Hibruè enáê,	When he had given him permission, Paul, standing on the stairs, beckoned with his hand to the people. When there was a great silence, he spoke to them in the Hebrew language, saying,
Beèe wááwá a yá aèmboè e ce jáèr, a ce kuè'si Nyúè.	All the people saw him walking and praising God.
Geewa'a, yeèr nfeè' rduè aè ka' gháá, weèr aè natïì a ce duè. Woweèe wááwá ba wap bbyeèñge ba boo wap a m fúú efa lap rla' ca a du weèr woweèe. Weèr woweèe aè ka' baè' aèwaâa roè, a gú'shi neè mñkúúshi a loo,	When it happened that we had accomplished the days, we departed and went on our journey. They all, with wives and children, brought us on our way until we were out of the city. Kneeling down on the beach, we prayed.
Beèe mo' a ka' kani yuu ce e ce suñ woweèe, e lor nfeè' nashi neè woweèe njobeè' aède' Nyúè gee woweèe a kupseè yap ntee lo byemi yuu ce yi yu mini,	in gentleness correcting those who oppose him: perhaps God may give them repentance leading to a full knowledge of the truth,
Saimún Pitaè aè lap ye ená e bipshi neè Jisoès ená e ce laèa ba aèmboè nda lá.	"Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, and said to him, ""Tell us who it is of whom he speaks."""
Woweèe a koosimnse seê, a ká' a ce bipshi aè moè'sir aè moè'sir enáê, “Tataê, waè' a máè a?”	"They were exceedingly sorrowful, and each began to ask him, ""It isn't me, is it, Lord?"""
Pailáèt aè kútïì mbe nto' a ká' Jisoès a laa neè ye enáê, “A wáè ñkúú Jus a?”	"Pilate therefore entered again into the Praetorium, called Jesus, and said to him, ""Are you the King of the Jews?"""
A ka' laèa neè ye wa'a, e lá woweèe mbaè múè ndap embe shañ, a taa woweèe aè buè'.	who, having received such a command, threw them into the inner prison, and secured their feet in the stocks.
Mɛ̀ mʉ ce bii tàrà nè mbaʼ.	I danced ‘Tara’ with a rattle.
E m ker ma' ñgaèa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Ñwáè mbaèa moè' aè m ba a túr yïì ñwáè rfaè' moè', beèe a vú a suñ ye ená yïì ñwáè rfaè' anaè ce jarsi yïì buu.	"He also said to his disciples, ""There was a certain rich man who had a manager. An accusation was made to him that this man was wasting his possessions."
E yu Nyúè bgúâú beèe ka', e yu ba Nyúè beèe ce a cu bteèe. E rïìñ yi ená beèe wááwá a cu bteèe.”	"Now he is not the God of the dead, but of the living, for all are alive to him."""
Mkuu mmoo mi fʉʉ a?	Have your beans germinated.
Ñwáè ce e ka' ce boñshi li ryoèñ, baná e be bá li. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá boñshi li ryoèñ ka', baná e be koni li.	Whoever seeks to save his life loses it, but whoever loses his life preserves it.
Yi yu neè weèe wa' foñ. Weèe aè ka' ce laèa neè beèe ba aè li ce a rïìñ ka', aède' woweèe a yu' yuu ce weèe ce laèa aè njáâá ká? Yi ka' ba wa'a, baná weèe ce búsi yeè mbáp aè cicïì.	So also you, unless you uttered by the tongue words easy to understand, how would it be known what is spoken? For you would be speaking into the air.
Mɛ̀ koo mnjèe mbaa ba ntoʼ.	I have taken two hundred and half.
E ka' baè', beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba btu efa múè Jus a vúê, a yá ye a suñ ye buu ce Pol aè m geèe. Woweèe a m laèa neè ye tatap	Then the high priest and the principal men of the Jews informed him against Paul, and they begged him,
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce Nyúè aè m ba ená e be fa muu yïì ce aè m ba muu rñgoèo njep ñgoèñ, a laa enáê, “Tá bcïìndap Nyúè wááwá a gú'shi neè ye.”	"Again, when he brings in the firstborn into the world he says, ""Let all the angels of God worship him."""
Weèe wááwá aè koni bfee ese Nyúè. Baná weèe lor bfee anaè ja' wee mnyor aègho. Wee geèe wa'a baná weèe aè loèr yuu ce Nyúè aè m fa neè weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, a fa' aègho yáánïì.	As each has received a gift, employ it in serving one another, as good managers of the grace of God in its various forms.
Me ke kòŋ mnàŋ kaʼ.	I donʼt like jealousy.
E m geèe rfaè' ce Nyúè aè m ce ye ená e gee naè neè mini-ñwáè. E m ku gee rfaè' anaè neè mini-ñwáè aèmboè Musïìs ye ye aè m geèe neè beèe Nyúè naè.	who was faithful to him who appointed him, as also was Moses in all his house.
E ku fa mɛ̀ ba mʉcàr.	She has given me only very little.
Bkar waê, seèe koñni njobeè' rkoèñnïì li loè ese Nyúè. Ñwáè wááwá ce e koèñ beèe, yu muu Nyúè, a ker riñ Nyúè.	Beloved, let us love one another, for love is of God; and everyone who loves is born of God, and knows God.
keèr túr ñger aè rjuèu byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe.	and to have authority to heal sicknesses and to cast out demons:
E m bo' yïìseèe beèe, a jar neè viseèe btaê, a gee woweèe a fúr boo wap aèwañ, tá a bo kweñger.	The same took advantage of our race, and mistreated our fathers, and forced them to throw out their babies, so that they wouldn't stay alive.
Yi nlaèa yi yu ená seèe byemi neè Muu yïì ce Jisos Kraêis, ker koñni aèmboè e m laèa neè seèe.	This is his commandment, that we should believe in the name of his Son, Jesus Christ, and love one another, even as he commanded.
Ca a yaa bàa tàraʼmɛ̀.	This is my personal bag.
Woowèe a taŋ nsuu ese wèr, a fâp.	They fought for our farm and seized it.
A mbuèu ce a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená ñwáè ka' ce koèñ ená e naa nyor, baná e naa ba aè yuu ce Tata Nyúè aè geèe neè ye.	"that, according as it is written, ""He who boasts, let him boast in the Lord."""
Ñwáè aè ka' bepsi Ndap Nyúè baná Nyúè be bepsi ñgaèñ. Yi yu wa'a njobeè' Ndap Nyúè yu nrara, Ndap Nyúè anaè aè ba weèe.	If anyone destroys the temple of God, God will destroy him; for God's temple is holy, which you are.
Baná mboâñtu ce Jus a túr a caa beèe moè' yu ká? Waè' búè ce ñwáè aè geèe e túr sá' moè' neè ñgaèñ a?	Then what advantage does the Jew have? Or what is the profit of circumcision?
E ka' laèa wa'a, a karsi nyor a laa ca ba neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu caè'caè'. E m laèa neè woweèe aè bsúèti enáê, “Mboâñtu mi yu neè beèe ce a ce yá buu ce weèe ce yá na.	"Turning to the disciples, he said privately, ""Blessed are the eyes which see the things that you see,"
Geewa'a, máè geèe rloo neè wáè ená lo rbyemïì li fa mïì ka'. E ba aè nfeè' ce lo rbyemïì li kúti a ba rtatap, aè tapsi bfúr wo.”	"but I prayed for you, that your faith wouldn't fail. You, when once you have turned again, establish your brothers."""
Lávïì aè m geèe ma ñkaè' neè ye mbe yeâ ndaèp. Ku' ñgaâa ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' ker ba beèe mo' a m ba mbo foñ a cute a sir tábuèr a woweèe a ce yeñger.	Levi made a great feast for him in his house. There was a great crowd of tax collectors and others who were reclining with them.
AÈde' yi ba wa' ka' koo múcaèr. Yi ka' ba ba wa'a, e ka' sa' ñgoèñ aè njáâá ká?	May it never be! For then how will God judge the world?
Wáâ Timotïì, wáè rïìñ la ryá'nïì ba njáèá njïì ce m ce cu la rcu, a riñ yuu ce m ce koèñ aè rgeèe njep ñgoèñ na, a yá la rbyemïì, a yá njáèá njïì ce m ce kur ntee, a yá la rkoèñnïì, a yá foñ aèmboè máè táá tatap neè Jisoès,	But you did follow my teaching, conduct, purpose, faith, patience, love, steadfastness,
Muunje ce e m ke'ni ncúèúndúè' naè aè laa neè Pitaè enáê, “Mboè aè yu moè' efa ñgaâa yá'ni buu ñwáè ca lá?” E laa enáê, “M yu moè' ka'.”	"Then the maid who kept the door said to Peter, ""Are you also one of this man's disciples?"" He said, ""I am not."""
Pailáèt aè ka' yu' ená Jisoès aè ba kwe wáá, a tarni seê. A ká' ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè bsoogáè rjeèe caè. E ka' vúè, e bipshïì neè ye ená Jisoès aè ba kwe wáá lá.	Pilate marveled if he were already dead; and summoning the centurion, he asked him whether he had been dead long.
Jisoès aè ka' yá mbe dïì' ana, beè', a ceteè ñwaè', a kúsi neè ñwáè ce e ba koo ese ye, a cu aè nsheè. Beèe embe ndaèp rloo wááwá a m ku ce fyá' ba ye.	He closed the book, gave it back to the attendant, and sat down. The eyes of all in the synagogue were fastened on him.
Woweèe a yu beèe enjep ñgoèñ na ka', aèmboè má máè yu ñwáè enjep ñgoèñ na ka' naè.	They are not of the world even as I am not of the world.
Beèe ce Nyúè aè m rïìñ wáá ená a be ba yïì beèe naè, e m laèa ená e be geèe tá woweèe a feese muu yïì, tá muu yïì anaè bo ba muu nlee neè bfúr magoèr.	For whom he foreknew, he also predestined to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brothers.
Ñwáè ce e kwaè'shi ená e túr bfee aè rsuñ beèe buu ce Nyúè aè geèe e rïîñ, a ker ce kwaè'shi ená Yú' Nyúè yi fa ye bfee aè rgeèe buu mo' foñ, aè ba rïìñ ená buu ce máè suñ neè weèe na yu buu ce aè laèa Tata Jisoès ená seèe geêe.	If any man thinks himself to be a prophet, or spiritual, let him recognize the things which I write to you, that they are the commandment of the Lord.
Jisoès aè ka' loè embo ce duè, a yá ñwáè moè' ce a m ce too ená Matïìyoè aèmboè e cu mbe dïì' rfaè' ce e m ce koo mbaèa baèraè'. E laa neè ye enáê, “Vúè fa máâ mbuèu.” Matïìyoè aè ku nati a du a yeâ mbuèu.	"As Jesus passed by from there, he saw a man called Matthew sitting at the tax collection office. Nfúr ce e yu ñwáè fuèp aè ba ce lu'shi ená Nyúè aè naèa ye mbekïì,	But let the brother in humble circumstances glory in his high position;
njobeè' seèe túr rla' mo' njep ñgoèñ na ce li be cu nfeseè ka', seèe ce keè' ba rla' ce li bii ka' ba.	For we don't have here an enduring city, but we seek that which is to come.
Boote ŋwàʼ a be saŋ jamishon à ŋwɛɛ mbo.	School children will be writing examination next month.
Máè ke' rïìñ ya yu yuu bebep mo' ce máè geèe ka'. Yi ke' ba ená aède' m sa' mnsa' embe máâ tuè, teni ená máè so ka'. Ñwáè ce aède' e sa' wa mnsa' teni, a Tataê.	For I know nothing against myself. Yet I am not justified by this, but he who judges me is the Lord.
Yuu ce woweèe a m laèa yi m ku ba ba aèmboè mnsár ce a woweèe a m ce sár aèmboè njáèá njïì ce a woweèe a ke loo neè Nyúè, ker ba foñ aèmboè ñwáè moè' ce e m kwe, ce a m ce too ená Jisoès ce Pol aè m ce laèa ená e cu nteèe naè.	but had certain questions against him about their own religion, and about one Jesus, who was dead, whom Paul affirmed to be alive.
Weèe ja' beèe ce a buu yuu, neè ku' buu ce weèe túr seè'ni na, wee weèe aè ka' buu yuu, woweèe a túr, tá a bo jaè' weèe aègho foñ. Yi ba seè'ni ená ñwáè wááwá aè túr yuu ce e buu.	but for equality. Your abundance at this present time supplies their lack, that their abundance also may become a supply for your lack; that there may be equality.
Jisoès aè bipshïì neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe túr bráâd bsá'?” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “Weèr túr bráâd saèambaê.”	"He asked them, ""How many loaves do you have?"" They said, ""Seven."""
Ŋkar à goo sê.	My friend is very selfish.

A m kur bcïìndap bbebep ce a m ba kyeèe na a lá wa'a, woweèe a ce keè' ba nfeâ' aè noèñ anaè, embe ñwáá anaè, embe feè' anaè tá a bo geèe lap rfaè' aè nfeè' anaè. Wěr tàʼ enɛ sèe dû sèʼni na.	We intend that we should go immediately.
AÈ m ce ba aè ñkaè' ca, Pailáèt fúr ñwáè shañ moè'sir efa shañ. E m ce fúr ba ñwáè ce beèe a koèñ.	Now at the feast he used to release to them one prisoner, whom they asked of him.
Fa wèr mdip tɛ wèr lipnyʉ̀ àgho.	Give us water to quench our thirst with.
Cena foñ yi geèe beèe ce map mkwaè'shïì mi jep a ker riñ yuu mini ka', a ce sár mnsár. Mkaèñsïì mi be gweèñger embe buèu, tá buu ñger embe buèu bsïìp vi ci'tïî.	the stars will be falling from the sky, and the powers that are in the heavens will be shaken.
Máèári aè laa neè ncïìndap Nyúè anaè enáê, “Máè be riñ mbañruèñwáè ka'. Baná aètaè ca yi ba wa' aè njáâá ká?”	"Mary said to the angel, ""How can this be, seeing I am a virgin?"""
Máè ka' keè' a yá ma rdip mo' li ce raa, ce tose aèmboè glaâs wa'a. Li m ba kuèntombïì neè kaèbaèraè'. Buu bteèe vi m táá bdïì' kyeèe a kaari kaèbaèraè' anaè a tarte. Buu bteèe anaè vi m túr mmir aèñgoo seê. Mmir mo' mi m ba kuèntombïì, mmo' mi ba mbenjïì.	Before the throne was something like a sea of glass, similar to crystal. Woowèe a fàp zhii cɛ̀ʼ à ŋger.	They seized his cloth by force.
Ŋgàŋ e bàpsi mmir àmbò nzhɛ̀ɛ waʼa.	The man is blinking like a thief.
E m laèa wa'a njobeè' e m geèe ñgaâa byañ magoèr a ke'se, ñgaâa byañ mo' a ce gheèter aè rjoèo ye ená a bo keè'se foñ.	For he had healed many, so that as many as had diseases pressed on him that they might touch him.
njobeè' beèe wááwá a geèe buu bbebep, a sá efa foèo ce yi loè ese Nyúè.	for all have sinned, and fall short of the glory of God;
Beèe ce a ce geèe ba yuu ce yaèp nyor koèñ, a ku ce kwaè'shi ba aèmboè yaèp nyor. Beèe ce a ce geèe ba buu ce Yú' Nyúè yi koèñ, a ku ce kwaè'shi ba aèmboè buu Nyúè.	For those who live according to the flesh set their minds on the things of the flesh, but those who live according to the Spirit, the things of the Spirit.
Seèe ce seèe yu seè'ni aèmboè ñwáè ce Nyúè aè m boo neè nshe, seèe be keè ba aèmboè ñwáè ce e m suèu embe buèu aè noèñ mo'.	As we have borne the image of those made of dust, let's also bear the image of the heavenly.
aè lá lo rfa anaè mbe gee dïû' ntoèo rfa, be du yá ye tá weèe ye nashi bcuèu, tá aè ka' kúti fa lo rfa anaè.	leave your gift there before the altar, and go your way. First be reconciled to your brother, and then come and offer your gift.
Geewa'a, mbúè nyúè'tu embe tu moè' efa weèe be bú ka'.	And not a hair of your head will perish.
A ka' ce duè mbo Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Be ba neètú' e ntïìni na, tá weèe wááwá cañse ma' máè.
