E ku bii fàʼ nje Mbòr a?	Is he still working at Mbot?
E m geèe yuu ce e m ce yu' rboèñ aègho, a gee seèe aè riñ buu ce aède' seèe aè m ba riñ ka', ce yu buu ce e m kwaè'shi ená e be loèr Jisos Kraâis geèe aègho.	making known to us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he purposed in him
Sèe be bèesi ŋwàʼ Nyʉ̀ à Limbùm tɛ bèe a beʼ bòŋboŋ sê.	When we shall translate the Bible into Limbum, people will read it very well.
Yaa cùu zhi yu mbòmmbo.	My mouth is empty.
Ka' cu ñgoèñ yi ci'tïì, a ci' kuâu shañ foñ. Bkeèñ shañ vi mú'ñgeèr njaè' moè'sir, bkwaèñ vi gweñgeâr aè mkoo ñgaâa shañ wááwá.	Suddenly there was a great earthquake, so that the foundations of the prison were shaken; and immediately all the doors were opened, and everyone's bonds were loosened.
Nfò tʉr ŋger sê.	Nfor is very powerful.
Woowèe a ku ce tàa mɛ̀ enɛ m̀ fa woowèe yaa mbàa.	They are just forcing me to give them my money.
a fa ye mruè' ce a m fïìñshi neè ñgúè-cece' ená e no. E ka' yu'shi, a kani efa rno.	They gave him sour wine to drink mixed with gall. When he had tasted it, he would not drink.
Bfúr weêr, weèr rïìñ ená Nyúè aè koèñ weèe, a ce weèe.	We know, brothers loved by God, that you are chosen,
Pitaè aè du a yeâ mbuèu a ba yi encaèñ, a du a ba' mbe mambe ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì. E ka' baè' a cu njepmbeè a ce yár mor a beèe ce a m ce keè'ni Ndap Nyúè weèe.	Peter had followed him from a distance, until he came into the court of the high priest. He was sitting with the officers, and warming himself in the light of the fire.
Jisoès aè suusïì mñgoommir.	Jesus wept.
Beèe ce a m ce cïìñ ñkuânyaèm ca a ka' yá yuu ce yi m koni, a cañ a duê, a suñ yuu ce yi m koni na aè laè', a ker suñ neè beèe ce a m ba aè mñkúè.	When those who fed them saw what had happened, they fled, and told it in the city and in the country.
E m bipshi neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè m byemi wa'a, a koni Yú' Rara a?” Woweèe a beesïì neè ye enáê, “Weèr aè m be yu' yuu mo' aèmboè Yú' Rara ka'.”	"He said to them, ""Did you receive the Holy Spirit when you believed?"" They said to him, ""No, we haven't even heard that there is a Holy Spirit."""
E ka' kuè bii ce laèa, mmbaè' ce rraa li m ce fúú enjo vi vú a cete woweèe, njeèndoñ aè laa embe múè mmbaè' anaè enáê, “Cena yu muu waè, ce máè koèñ seê, a ce yu' rboèñ neè ye. Ce yu' neè yuu ce e ce laèa.”	"While he was still speaking, behold, a bright cloud overshadowed them. Behold, a voice came out of the cloud, saying, ""This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased. Listen to him."""
Nfeè' ce a be loèr Jisoès duè aègho mbe buèu aè ka' gháá, e kur ntee a nati a ce duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm.	It came to pass, when the days were near that he should be taken up, he intently set his face to go to Jerusalem,
Ñwáè ce e sañ ñwaè' ca aè sañ máâ Saimún Pitaè. M yu ñwáè rfaè' a ker ba ñwáè ntuu neè Jisos Kraêis. M ce sañ ñwaè' ca neè beèe ce a byemi neè Jisos Kraâis aèmboè wer weèr foñ aè byemi naè. Rbyemïì ca li boèñ a caa buu wááwá. Jisos Kraâis aè fa seèe njïì ená seèe byemi neè ye njobeè' e ke geèe buu aè njïû yáánïì. E yu Nyúè a ker ba yïìseèe ñwáè rjaè'.	Simon Peter, a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ, to those who have obtained a like precious faith with us in the righteousness of our God and Savior, Jesus Christ:
AÈmboè m ce sañ ñwaè' ca neè wáè seè'ni na, m ce kwaè'shi ená ku báti nfeè' múcaèr tá m vú yá wáè.	These things I write to you, hoping to come to you shortly;
Ŋgàa ŋgwaʼ a no mrùʼ a lɛ mmisò fɛ?	The meeting members drank wine and where is ours?
Jisoès aè m niñ mbe Ndaèp Nyúè a juu beèe wááwá ce a m ce fyeèni buu, ba beèe ce a m ce yuu buu mbo, a bute btábuèr ese beèe ce a m ce kupse mbaèa, a bute mnta' ese beèe ce a m ce fyeèni bbeèñ.	Jesus entered into the temple of God, and drove out all of those who sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the money changers' tables and the seats of those who sold the doves.
AÈ m ba aè noèñ ce beèe a m ce tami nyor aè noâñ mmbomntaa Nyúè.	It was the day of the Preparation, and the Sabbath was drawing near.
E bàʼ mbe tase na a jeŋte.	She arrived at this junction and was confused.
Pailáèt aè ker bipshi neè ye enáê, “AÈ túr yuu laèa ka' a? AÂ yu' ku' buu ce a ce laèa aèmboè wáè na lañ?”	"Pilate again asked him, ""Have you no answer? See how many things they testify against you!"""
Ka' yi yu wa'a, seèe ce koèñ ená nyor bep beèe ca neè seèe ka'. Duè mbaè roè, ma' yoè huk njep roè, nca ce wáè ka' koo entombïì, aè mú' cuèu efa gho. Wáâ múè', tá aè yá mbaèa koâo. Wáâ yá, aè fúr, la' mbaèa ya ba yo aègho.”	"But, lest we cause them to stumble, go to the sea, cast a hook, and take up the first fish that comes up. When you have opened its mouth, you will find a stater coin. Take that, and give it to them for me and you."""
E yá'nïì woweèe buu magoèr aè mñgaèa. E m laèa neè woweèe enáê,	He taught them many things in parables, and told them in his teaching,
Yi nyúè'tu yi m ce fúp aèmboè mmbaè', mi mmir mi ba aèmboè mcuèñ mor wa'a.	His head and his hair were white as white wool, like snow. His eyes were like a flame of fire.
Fa beè'ni neè buu ce beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a ce geèe ka'. Maè'shi neè tá Nyúè kupse me mkwaè'shïì tá weèe bo geèe ñgeâe fi. Weèe aè ka' gee wa'a, weèe riñ yuu ce Nyúè koèñ. Weèe be rïìñ yuu ce yi yu boèñboñ, aè ba yuu ce Nyúè ce yu' rboèñ aègho, a ba yáánïì.	Don't be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind, so that you may prove what is the good, well-pleasing, and perfect will of God.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a duñshi woweèe mi mmbo ba yïì mbeèp nyor. Ñgaèa yá'ni yïì buu a ka' yá Tataê, a lu'shi seê.	When he had said this, he showed them his hands and his side. The disciples therefore were glad when they saw the Lord.
Jisoès aè ku riñ yuu ce woweèe a m ce kwaè'shi, a laa neè ñwáè ce li rkoo li m kwe naè enáê, “Naèti mbekïì vú táá mbena.” E natïì a táá mbo.	"But he knew their thoughts; and he said to the man who had the withered hand, ""Rise up, and stand in the middle."" He arose and stood."
Wèr à zhe mkuu a bɛr mmee.	We ate beans and reserved yours.
AÈde' ñwáè lor mruâ' mfi foñ lá njep mñguèp mruè' vïû brúèú ka'. E ka' gee wa'a baná mruâ' mfi anaè mi be loè koo, to'shi mñguèp mruè' anaè, tá mruè' mi kúte aè nsheè tá ñguèp mruè' anaè bú aè cicïì.” Yi ke ba ená a lá mruâ' mfi ba njep mñguèp mruè' vïû bfi tá mi bo kúète ka', tá mñguèp mruè' vi to'ñger ka'.	"No one puts new wine into old wineskins, or else the new wine will burst the skins, and the wine pours out, and the skins will be destroyed; but they put new wine into fresh wineskins."""
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè Jus magoèr se a loâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a vú aè rcaè'ni Maataè ba Máèári njo' ndur yaèp ce e m kwe. Loâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm du ba' aè rla' Bátanïì yi yu saèsap ka'. Yi ku ba aèmboè bkïìlomátaè vïû btaar wa'a.	Now Bethany was near Jerusalem, about fifteen stadia away. Ŋkwaa à ràte, a tuu nje wàa rò.	The vine has crept and crossed the stream.
AÈde' aè laa wánáê, “Byee vi yu njo' rbúè, rbúè li ba njo' byee.” Ka' yi yu mini wa'a, Nyúè be geèe tá rbúè ba byee a lo mïì. AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè nyor, Nyúè aè m geèe nyor tá beèe a bo loèr ce saèki aègho ka'. Nyúè aè m geèe nyor tá ñwáè bo geèe rfaè' aègho neè Tata Jisos Kraêis. Tata Jisos Kraâis aè ce keè'ni nyor anaè.	Foods for the belly, and the belly for foods, but God will bring to nothing both it and them. But the body is not for sexual immorality, but for the Lord; and the Lord for the body.
Wɛ̀ kaʼ ce no buu gòr banɛ à be lò bèti ba à yuu cicì.	If you drink a lot, then you will become something useless.
Kwaè'shi neè aèmboè ndeèe beèe Isráèl. E ke ba aè nfeè' beèe mo' efa woweèe a ce ye byee ce a tañshi tañshïì aègho neè Nyúè, a Nyúè weèe a ba ñwáè moè'sir.	Consider Israel according to the flesh. Don't those who eat the sacrifices participate in the altar?
Muu zhìi à m kwe, e jep wàwà.	His child died and he was totally confused.
Máè fa kúú neè weèe aèmboè yaè Ta aè m fa neè máè naè,	I confer on you a kingdom, even as my Father conferred on me,
Beâe aè ñgoâñ Gaèláshaè, weèe yu blúr a? Ñwáè ce e roè' weèe aè roè' nda? Mboè weèr aè m suñ weèe mbuèu efa rkwe Jisos Kraâis embe kïìntaa rara se a?	Foolish Galatians, who has bewitched you not to obey the truth, before whose eyes Jesus Christ was openly set forth among you as crucified?
Baná be keèe ba aè nfeè' ce beèe a fúú efa rkwe, tá njeñwáè ca ba ñgwa nda, aèmboè yi yu ená bfúr beèe nsaèamba ca wááwá a m ba bduu vi naè?”	"In the resurrection therefore, whose wife will she be of the seven? For they all had her."""
Bfúr waê, m ce laèa neè weèe ce weèe wááwá rïìñ mncir. Weèe rïìñ ená mncir vi túr ñger mbenduè ñwáè ba aè nfeè' ce ñgaèñ bii nteèe.	Or don't you know, brothers (for I speak to men who know the law), that the law has dominion over a man for as long as he lives?
Ca yu ba yuu ce Tata Nyúè aè laèa neè weèr enáê, ‘Máè geèe wáè, wáè ba rraa neè beèe enje jáá, tá aè bo ba nduunjïû rluèñ neè ñgoèñ wááwá.’ ”	"For so has the Lord commanded us, saying, 'I have set you as a light for the Gentiles, that you should bring salvation to the uttermost parts of the earth.'"""
E m laèa neè tu neè bsoogáè rjeèe ená a ke'ni Poêl, a ker laa ená a keè'ni wa'a, a gee tá e ce koo mbáp, ma'shi tá bkar vi a ce vúè ce jaè' ye neè buu.	He ordered the centurion that Paul should be kept in custody, and should have some privileges, and not to forbid any of his friends to serve him or to visit him.
tá bár beèe ce yu beèe enje jáèá ce máè geèe woweèe a ba yaè beèe a bo roèo Tataê.	That the rest of men may seek after the Lord; All the Gentiles who are called by my name, Says the Lord, who does all these things.
Yi yu yáánïì ená m tuusi ñwáè shañ ce máè buu efa rsañ, suñ yuu ce e geèe ka'.”	"For it seems to me unreasonable, in sending a prisoner, not to also specify the charges against him."""
A m loèr mmbañruè mo' beèe a mbaa ce a m bú' ncir, a ce duè aègho a Jisoès weèe tá a bo duè taa mbe kïìntaa.	There were also others, two criminals, led with him to be put to death.
Pitaè aè laa neè ye enáê, “Suñ ka máè láê, waè' ca yu mbaèa nsuu ce weèe aè mú fyeni naè a?” E beesïì enáê, “ÁÈno, a yi.”	"Peter answered her, ""Tell me whether you sold the land for so much."" She said, ""Yes, for so much."""
AÈ ka' ba nyúè mmbomntaa, weèr aè fúú efa múè la' a ce du aèwaâa roè, a ce kwaè'shi ená weèr be yá dïì' rloo aèfo. Weèr aè ka' baè', a cu aè nsheè, a laa neè bbyeèñge ce a m vúè aè rgeèe rloo aèfo.	On the Sabbath day we went forth outside of the city by a riverside, where we supposed there was a place of prayer, and we sat down, and spoke to the women who had come together.
Ŋkʉʉ tʉr ŋger mbe ndùu běe à zhii toʼ.	A chief has authority over the people in his village.
Woweèe a ce ghaa, a co'ni wap bcáè' a ce maè'ri, ce dú'si nfúènfú mbekïì.	As they cried out, and threw off their cloaks, and threw dust into the air,
Ñkúú rïìñ buu ca. M ka' ce laèa neè ye m ker ce wáp yuu mo' ka'. Máè rïìñ neè mini-ñwáè ená e máñni mo' efa buu ca ka' njobeè' a m geèe vi ba aè bsúèti ka'.	For the king knows of these things, to whom also I speak freely. For I am persuaded that none of these things is hidden from him, for this has not been done in a corner.
Máè suñ weèe aèmboè buu enjep ñgoèñ na, weèe aè byemïì ka', m ka' suñ weèe aèmboè buu embe buèu, weèe gee wee ká ka' byemi?	If I told you earthly things and you don't believe, how will you believe if I tell you heavenly things?
Ka' seèe ce seèe ce ye efa byee anaè, seèe yu aèñgoo wa'a, ntu' bráâd ku ba moè'sir. Cena yi duèñshi ená seèe wááwá yu ñwáè moè'sir.	Because there is one loaf of bread, we, who are many, are one body; for we all partake of the one loaf of bread.
Yàa ma à ba tuu wɛ̀r kù Bàmɛndà, wɛ̀r à du a baʼ kǒo nèmootì.	My mother sent us to Bamenda, and we arrived there at noon.
A m caè'si luèr embe ncuâu rsheè. Jisoès aè ke' mbe buèu a laa enáê, “Taèr, m ce yoèñshi wáè njobeè' wáè yu' la rloo.	"So they took away the stone from the place where the dead man was lying. Jesus lifted up his eyes, and said, ""Father, I thank you that you listened to me."
Yi ku ba foñ aèmboè a ke maè' ñgaèa ená ñwáè jáá byeê, ñwáè jáá kep naè.	For in this the saying is true, 'One sows, and another reaps.'
Rbyemïì li m geèe Sáèra ce e m ba ma nleeñwáè a caase efa rbi muu, aè lo a yeeti. Cena yi m ba wa'a njobeè' e m byemi ená Nyúè yu ñwáâ mini, e be geèe yuu ce e kaè'.	By faith, even Sarah herself received power to conceive, and she bore a child when she was past age, since she counted him faithful who had promised.
Abraèham aè m bi Aisïìk, Aisïìk aè bi Jakoèp, Jakoèp aè bi Judaè ba bfúr vi.	Abraham became the father of Isaac. Isaac became the father of Jacob. Jacob became the father of Judah and his brothers.

Fa mɛ̀ cece tɛ m tii rgbaŋ àgho.	Give me a piece of stick to remove a jigger with.

Yuu goèr ce masaè e ke koèñ ese ñwáè rfaè' yi yu ená e ba mini neè ye.	Here, moreover, it is required of stewards, that they be found faithful.

Jisoès aè fyá' ye, a koñ ye. A laa neè ye enáê, “Yuu mo' yi báti ce aè túr aè rgeèe. Duè fyeni yoè buu wááwá, lor mbaèa efa gho gapshi neè ñgaâa fuèp, tá aè bo túr bkuè' mbe buèu. Wá geèe wa' wáá, aè vú fa máâ mbuèu.”	"Jesus looking at him loved him, and said to him, ""One thing you lack. M ce koèñ máná weèe riñ foñ yuu ce yi koni máè tá weèe bo rïìñ aèmboè m yu. Tikikoès be suñ weèe buu ca. E yu nfúr yïìseèe, seèe aè koñ ye seê. Zhìi tâ à m kàka gòr a bʉʼ zhii lɛʼ.	His father worried too much and broke his calabash.
ce Dávïìd ce laèa yi mbe Ñwaè' Byáá enáê, ‘Tata Nyúè aè m laèa neè Tata yaè enáê, “Cu aè la rkoo maè',	"David himself says in the book of Psalms, 'The Lord said to my Lord, ""Sit at my right hand,"
Moè' efa woweèe aè co' saè', a tee tuè' maè' ese ñwáè ce e m ba ñkwaèa neè ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì. Jisoès aè laa enáê, “Yi gháá wa'a.”	A certain one of them struck the servant of the high priest, and cut off his right ear.
Bfee Pitaè vi ka' kúti mbo, e laa enáê, “Máè rïìñ seè'ni neè mini-ñwáè ená Tata aè tuusi yïì ncïìndap e fúr máè embaè mmbo Hároèd, a ker fúr máè efa ñgá' ce Jus a m ce keè' ená e ba koni máè.”	"When Peter had come to himself, he said, ""Now I truly know that the Lord has sent out his angel and delivered me out of the hand of Herod, and from everything the Jewish people were expecting."""
AÈmboè ñwáè ce e ká' weèe yu ñwáâ nrara na, baná weèe ba rara aè buu wááwá ce weèe ce geèe,	but just as he who called you is holy, you yourselves also be holy in all of your behavior;
m ce koosimnse seê, ntee yi ce yañ máè aè nfeè' wááwá,	that I have great sorrow and unceasing pain in my heart.
Fa geèe tá yuu ce yi yu boèñboñ neè wáè, yi kúti ba yuu ce beèe a be laèa bebep aègho ka'.	Then don't let your good be slandered,
Kibay zhi toʼ noŋ ce a be cu bʉbʉ.	The sub chief has declared when the chiefʼs death shall be observed.
E m geèe wa'a tá yuu ce ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m laèa, yi bo ghááte njo. E m laèa enáê, “M be múè' ya cuèu, maè' mñgaèa. M be suñ buu ce Nyúè aè m súèti ese beèe káâ' aè nfeè' ce e m geèe ñgoèñ.”	"that it might be fulfilled which was spoken through the prophet, saying, ""I will open my mouth in parables; I will utter things hidden from the foundation of the world."""
Weèr aè yu' blaâa Nyúè ce a feè'shi neè weèr aèmboè woweèe foñ a m yu' naè. Weèr aè yá werná blaâa Nyúè ce a m yu' anaè vi m túr sá' neè woweèe ka' njobeè' woweèe a m yu' wa'a, a byemi ka'.	For indeed we have had good news preached to us, even as they also did, but the word they heard didn't profit them, because it wasn't mixed with faith by those who heard.
Yeè buu aè búète, nsá' yi ye weèe bcáè' wááwá.	Your riches are corrupted and your garments are moth-eaten.
Ŋgàlaʼ tap sê, njobèʼ e m koo mbaa.	Ngala is very strong because he caught a leopard.
Woweèe a m loâ aè rla' Jáèrikuè a ce duè, beèe magoèr a ce duè a yeâ mbuèu.	As they went out from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.
E m duè a caa aè ñgoâñ Sirïìyaè ba Sïìlesïìyaè, a ka' ce caèa a ce fa ñger neè bcoêr.	He went through Syria and Cilicia, strengthening the assemblies.
Ŋkar zhìi kaʼ fa ye cɛ̀ʼ banɛ e lùŋ efa mbɛp.	If his friend gives him a dress therefore he is save from cold.
Bfúr waê, m ce koèñ ená weèe riñ boèñboñ ená nsuñ mboèñmboñ ce máè m feè'shi neè weèe naè aè m ba nsuñ ñwáè ka'.	But I make known to you, brothers, concerning the Good News which was preached by me, that it is not according to man.
Seèe fa ce rúè'ñger aèmboè beèe mo' efa woweèe a m rúè'ñger naè ka'. Ncïìndap Nyúè ce e ke yúshi beèe naè aè m yúshi woweèe.	Neither grumble, as some of them also grumbled, and perished by the destroyer.
Woweèe a ka' yu' wa'a, a kwá' bluèr tá a bo túúshi ye aègho. Yi ka' ba wa'a, e bú a fúú yi yu embe Ndaèp Nyúè.	Therefore they took up stones to throw at him, but Jesus was hidden, and went out of the temple, having gone through the midst of them, and so passed by.
Weèe fa fa yeè njïì ka', táá neè njep yuu ce weèe aè byemi, riñ weená bfúr wee ce a yu aè bdïì' wááwá enjep ñgoèñ na, a ce yá njáèá ñgá' ce weèe ce yá na.	Withstand him steadfast in your faith, knowing that your brothers who are in the world are undergoing the same sufferings.
“Ñwáè moè' ce a m ce too ená AÈnaèniyaès aè m ba aè rla' anaè, aè ba ñwáè ce e m ce láè mncir yáánïì seê. Jus aèfo wááwá a m ce laèa boèñboñ aèmboè ye seê.	One Ananias, a devout man according to the law, well reported of by all the Jews who lived in Damascus,
Naètanïìyáèl aè bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Wáè rïìñ máè aè njáâá ká?” Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Tá Felep ka' ká' wáè, máè ba yá wáè aè nfeè' ce wáè ba cu njep mbuèu ce ce a too ená fik naè.”	"Nathanael said to him, ""How do you know me?"" Jesus answered him, ""Before Philip called you, when you were under the fig tree, I saw you."""
Suñ ka weèr. Ncir yi byemi ená seèe ma' mbaâa baèraè' neè ñkwe Rum káè seèe ma' ka' aè?”	"Is it lawful for us to pay taxes to Caesar, or not?"""
Baná e boèñ neè weèe ce weèe aè byemi. AÈ ka' ba yi neè beèe ce a byemi ka', “Luèr ce ñgaâa mboo mndap a m maè', aè kúti ba luèr rbuu ndap.”	"For you who believe therefore is the honor, but for those who are disobedient, ""The stone which the builders rejected, has become the chief cornerstone,"""
Ñgaèpni yi ka' ba aè to', aède' to' anaè yi táá ka'.	If a kingdom is divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.
A ka' maè'shi woweèe, woweèe a du a yá yaèp beèe a suñ woweèe buu wááwá ce beèe ce a m ba btu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba bleebeèe a m laèa neè woweèe.	Being let go, they came to their own company, and reported all that the chief priests and the elders had said to them.
Weèe rïìñ ená Nyúè aè gee weèe aè fúú efa rkwe weèe Jisoès Kraâis weèe, baná weèe lá ntee ba aè buu embe buèu, mbe dïì' Jisos Kraâis yu, a cu aè rkoo maè' Nyúè.	If then you were raised together with Christ, seek the things that are above, where Christ is, seated on the right hand of God.
Woowèe a kòŋ à rdù kaʼ.	They donʼt like to go.
Kúr beèe ca a m ce duè a yeâ mbuèu a ce ghaa a ce laèa enáê, “Yú neè ye!”	"for the multitude of the people followed after, crying out, ""Away with him!"""
Jisoès aè beesïì neè ye enáê, “Wáè be riñ yuu ce m ce geèe seè'ni ka'. AÈ be loè rïìñ ba embenjïì.”	"Jesus answered him, ""You don't know what I am doing now, but you will understand later."""
Kúr beèe ce a m ba aèfo a m niñ njep múè mo, a baa Pol weèe foñ. Ñgaâa nsa' mnsa' a m shaèshi bcáè' efa nyoèr Pol ba Silaès, a laa ená a lip woweèe neè mbaèñ.	The multitude rose up together against them, and the magistrates tore their clothes off of them, and commanded them to be beaten with rods.
Ñwáè ce e ka' yu' buu ce máè laèa na, ke' gee vi ka', baná ñgaèñ yu aèmboè lúr ce e m baè'ri yïì ndap mbenduè nsaruñ,	Everyone who hears these words of mine, and doesn't do them will be like a foolish man, who built his house on the sand.
E ka' yá aèmboè Jisoès ce caèa, a laa enáê, “Yá neè muu njeèe Nyúè.”	"and he looked at Jesus as he walked, and said, ""Behold, the Lamb of God!"""
AÈde' ñwáè mboo mkïìñ lor mboo, gee yuu ce e koèñ aègho. AÈde' e lor mboo embe dïû' mo'sir boo mkïìñ aègho mmbaa, rmo' li boñ du misïî, rmo' li ku ba ba aè rkïìñ.	Or hasn't the potter a right over the clay, from the same lump to make one part a vessel for honor, and another for dishonor?
Baná aède' seèe laa neè ntee-ñwáè enáê, “Nyúè yu ñwáè ce e ce jaè' máè, aède' ñwáè gee yuu mo' neè máè ka'.”	"So that with good courage we say, ""The Lord is my helper. I will not fear. What can man do to me?"""
Judaès ce e m fyeèni ye naè, ye ye aè m rïìñ dïì' anaè njobeè' Jisoès ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu weèe a m ce duè mbe dïì' anaè cá'cá'.	Now Judas, who betrayed him, also knew the place, for Jesus often met there with his disciples.
Loo rtaa rli gwè.	Your cap has fallen.
Máè riñ yuu ce aède' máè m ba gee kuu yuu ce a m ce sár mnsár aètu mo naè ka'. Yi ka' ba wa'a, máè laa neè ye máná e be koèñ aè rduè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm duè sa' vi mnsa' aèfo lá?	Being perplexed how to inquire concerning these things, I asked whether he was willing to go to Jerusalem and there be judged concerning these matters.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, baná weèe fa ce sa' beèe tá nfeè' mnsa' ka' gháá ka'. Be ba aè noèñ ce Tata Jisoès aè kúti, tá e gee buu ce beèe a geèe aè túè'nji vi yááti aèwañ. E be keè geèe tá mkwaè'shïì beèe mi yááti aèwañ foñ. Yu aè noèñ anaè ce Nyúè be keè yoèñshi ñwáè wááwá aèmboè a ba yoèñshi.	Therefore judge nothing before the time, until the Lord comes, who will both bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and reveal the counsels of the hearts. Then each man will get his praise from God.
Woweèe a ka' duè baè' aè rla' Saèlamïìs, a fe'shi blaâa Nyúè aè mndap rloo Juês. Joân aè m ba a woweèe, tá e bo ce jaè' woweèe.	When they were at Salamis, they proclaimed the word of God in the Jewish synagogues. They had also John as their attendant.
Jisoès aè m rïìñ buu ce vi be koni ye wááwá. A ka' rïìñ wa'a, a fúú a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weâe roèo ba nda?”	"Jesus therefore, knowing all the things that were happening to him, went forth, and said to them, ""Who are you looking for?"""
Musïìs aè m sañ mbe ñwaè' mncir ená a ka' koo njeñwáè a mbañruèñwáè, a túúshïì neè bluèr e kweê. Wáè laèa yo wá ká?”	"Now in our law, Moses commanded us to stone such. What then do you say about her?"""
Mɛ̌ kwàʼ enɛ e be vʉ̀.	I am expect that he will come.
Geewa'a, yi ku ba aèmboè máè m suñ weèe naè, weèe aè yá máè neè me mmir a ke' byemi neè máè ka'.	But I told you that you have seen me, and yet you don't believe.
E m ker laa neè ñwáè yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Yáê, a yoè ma na.” Káâ' aè nfeè' anaè, ñwáè yá'ni yïì buu aè lor yïì maê, a ye a du a ce cu a yeâ laè'.	"Then he said to the disciple, ""Behold, your mother!"" From that hour, the disciple took her to his own home."

E ba ba mbǎa a yuʼ nè zhii tùʼ.	He was there and heard it himself.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce Nyúè aè m geèe raèraâ Lávïì a ba ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì naè, e m fa mncir neè beâe aè to' Isráèl tá a bo rïìñ aè rloo neè ye. Rfaè' ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ca li m ka' ba ghááte aè rgeèe tá beèe a ba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè, mbuèu moè' aè m ba keèr ba ená seèe túr ñwáè tañshi tañshïì moè' ce e yu ba aèmboè Máèlkisidáèk ce e yu jáá efa Ároèn naè ka'.	Now if there was perfection through the Levitical priesthood (for under it the people have received the law), what further need was there for another priest to arise after the order of Melchizedek, and not be called after the order of Aaron?
Ku' beèe a du a yeâ mbuèu, a ka' baè' aèfo, e gee ñgaâa byañ a ke'seè.	Great multitudes followed him, and he healed them there.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè máè, m ka' cu mbe tunshe na m ku ce láè mmir ba mbenduè Jisos Kraâis. Máè ka' kwe, ba sá' neè máè.	For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.
Wěr ke ye baa nfèʼsìp.	We eat fufu every day.
Saèkiyoès aè suu embe ce anaè cárcár, a koni ye neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè.	He hurried, came down, and received him joyfully.
Yïìseèe ta Abraèham ca yu taèr neè beèe wááwá ce a geèe búè, a ke' ku geèe ba búè caè'caè' ka', a ce jáèr njep mi mkuèu, a byemi aèmboè e m byemi tá a ka' keè geèe ye búè naè.	He is the father of circumcision to those who not only are of the circumcision, but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham, which he had in uncircumcision.
A yaa cɛ̀ʼ na.	This is my cloth.
Ka' ba ená ñwáè rfaè' anaè yu ñwáâ mbembep, laa neè yïì nyor enáê, ‘Yi be loèr nfeè' seê, tá yaè masaè ka' vúè’,	But if that evil servant should say in his heart, 'My lord is delaying his coming,'
E ka' duè baè' mbe dïì' anaè, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Loo neè, faè dïì' weèe gwe rmoèoshïì ka'.”	"When he was at the place, he said to them, ""Pray that you don't enter into temptation."""
Njeñwáè anaè aè natïì foñ a cañ a du aè ntee rïìñ faèdïì' ce Nyúè aè m kupshi neè ye, aè ba dïì' ce e be cu tá a ke'ni ye aè mnoèñ ncúèkïì neè mnoèñ mjeèe-mmbaa ba mnoèñ mntuunfu.	The woman fled into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared by God, that there they may nourish her one thousand two hundred sixty days.
A ka' geèe wa' wáá, e laa neè yi ñgaâa mfaè' enáê, ‘Máè fáèr buu ñkaè' a misïî, beèe ce máè be a ghááteè aè beèe ce a ba vúè ñkaè' anaè ka'.	"Then he said to his servants, 'The wedding is ready, but those who were invited weren't worthy.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	22	9	Duè neè aè btase, be ñwáè wááwá ce weèe aè ka' yá.’	Go therefore to the intersections of the highways, and as many as you may find, invite to the marriage feast.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	22	10	Ñgaâa mfaè' anaè a fúú a jár aè mnduunjïì, a vú neè beèe wááwá ce a m yá. Woweèe a m vúè neè beâe bbebep, ba beâe bboèñboñ, ndap ñkaè' aè ruu neè beèe.	Those servants went out into the highways, and gathered together as many as they found, both bad and good. The wedding was filled with guests.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	22	11	“Ñkúú aè ka' niñ mbe ndaèp aè ryá ñgaâa ñkaè' ce e m be naè, a yá ñwáè moè' mbo ce e m yar cáè' ñkaè' ka'.	But when the king came in to see the guests, he saw there a man who didn't have on wedding clothing,
Matthew	Matïìyoè	22	12	E laa neè ye enáê, ‘Ñkaraè, wáè yar cáè' ñkaè' ka', a gee wáká a ka' niñ taâa?’ Ñwáè anaè aè túr yuu laèa ka'.	and he said to him, 'Friend, how did you come in here not wearing wedding clothing?' He was speechless.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	22	13	Ñkúú aè laa neè yi ñgaâa mfaè' enáê, ‘Kur neè ye mkoo ba mkuèu ma' aè dïì' ce ku ba ba túè'nji. Beèe a be keèe ce warse ce kúr msoèñ aèfo.’	Then the king said to the servants, 'Bind him hand and foot, take him away, and throw him into the outer darkness; there is where the weeping and grinding of teeth will be.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	22	14	Yi yu ená Nyúè aè ká' beèe magoèr, a ce ce ba beèe múcaèr.”	For many are called, but few chosen."
A ka' baè' mbo, a laa enáê, “Ñwáè ca ce koèñ aè rgeèe tá beèe a loo neè Nyúè aè njáèá njïì ce ncir yi byemi ka'.”	"saying, ""This man persuades men to worship God contrary to the law."""
Ka' cu, a ku yu' aèmboè yuu mo' yi ce vúè embe buèu, a ce coèo aèmboè fu' tatap wa'a. Yi m ce coèo aè bdïì' wááwá embe ndaèp ce woweèe a m ba.	Suddenly there came from the sky a sound like the rushing of a mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting.
E ker laa enáê, “A mbuèu ce máè m suñ weèe ená aède' ñwáè vú yá máè caa efa ená Taèr aè fa ye njïì ená e vú yá máè ka'.”	"He said, ""For this cause have I said to you that no one can come to me, unless it is given to him by my Father."""
Kúr beèe anaè a laa neè ye enáê, “Weèr aè m yu' embe Ñwaè' Mncir ená Kraâis anaè be cu nfeseè. Wáè ka' ce laèa wáná a be naèa Muu Ñwáè mbekïì njoká? Muu Ñwáè anaè yu nda seê?”	"The multitude answered him, ""We have heard out of the law that the Christ remains forever. How do you say, 'The Son of Man must be lifted up?' Who is this Son of Man?"""
Woweèe a vú a laa neè ye enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, weèr yi werná a wáè ñwáè mini ce wá ke loèr ñwáè moè' jáá ka'. Wá ke yá'ni nduunjïû Nyúè neè mini-ñwáè aèmboè yi yu. Suñ ka neè weèr láê, ncir yi byemi ená seèe ma' mbaâa baèraè' neè ñkwe Rum káè seèe ma' ka'?”	"When they had come, they asked him, ""Teacher, we know that you are honest, and don't defer to anyone; for you aren't partial to anyone, but truly teach the way of God. Is it lawful to pay taxes to Caesar, or not?"
“Má máè foñ aè m kwaè'shi máná máè ba geèe yuu wááwá ce aède' m geêe, aè rkani buu ce vi m ba kuu Jisoès aè rla' Nasaráèt.	"I myself most certainly thought that I ought to do many things contrary to the name of Jesus of Nazareth.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	10	A yuu ce máè m geèe aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm. Máè m loo njïì ese beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, a du a fa beèe Nyúè magoèr se aè shañ. Beèe a ka' ce yúshi woweèe, máè byemïì foñ.	This I also did in Jerusalem. I both shut up many of the saints in prisons, having received authority from the chief priests, and when they were put to death I gave my vote against them.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	11	Máè m duè aè mndap mloo aè nfeè' aèñgoo aè rfa ñgá' neè woweèe, a gheter aè rgeèe tá woweèe a kani ená a be keèr byemi neè Jisos Kraâis ka'. Ntee yi m bep máè neè woweèe seê, máè du a fa ñgá' neè woweèe caar a ba' aè mlaâ' aè bto' mo'.	Punishing them often in all the synagogues, I tried to make them blaspheme. Being exceedingly enraged against them, I persecuted them even to foreign cities.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	12	“AÈ ka' keèr ba aè nfeè' moè', máè ker nati a ce duè aè rla' Daèmaskoès, beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì a sañ ñwaè' a fa máè ñger ená m du koo woweèe.	Whereupon as I traveled to Damascus with the authority and commission from the chief priests,"
E kur mɛ̀ kur mɛ̀ a kaʼ dû.	He has complied to go according to his wish.
njobeè' e koèñ yiseèe to' seê, a ba'ri ndap rloo neè weèr.”	"for he loves our nation, and he built our synagogue for us."""
E beesïì enáê, “Káè e yu ñwáè ñgeèe buu bbebep áè, káè e yu ñwáè ñgeèe buu bbebep ka' áè, máè rïìñ ya yu ka'. Yuu ce m rïìñ yi ku ba ba ená máè m feèp, a ce yá buu seè'ni.”	"He therefore answered, ""I don't know if he is a sinner. One thing I do know: that though I was blind, now I see."""
A mboè rlee ñwáè li yu wa'a foñ. Li yu múcaèr wa'a a túr ñger seê. Kuè kwa'shi ka neè foñ aèmboè mú rcuèñ mor li ke toèo ma koèp láê.	So the tongue is also a little member, and boasts great things. See how a small fire can spread to a large forest!
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba aè rla' Listraè ce e m kepñger. E m ku ba wa'a ká' embe nfeè' ce a m bi ye. E m be jár ka'.	At Lystra a certain man sat, impotent in his feet, a cripple from his mother's womb, who never had walked.
M ce loo máná aè fúr woweèe enjep ñgoèñ ka'. M ce loo máná aè ke'ni woweèe faè dïì' Sataèn ce e yu ñwáâ mbebep gee yuu mo' neè woweèe ka'.	I pray not that you would take them from the world, but that you would keep them from the evil one.
E beesïì enáê, “Ñwáè ce a too ená Jisoès naè, aè topshi nshe a yo' máè nje mmïìr, a laa ená m du su'si mmir njep túâ Siloèm. Máè du a ka' suè'si mmir njo, a ká' a ce yá buu.”	"He answered, ""A man called Jesus made mud, anointed my eyes, and said to me, 'Go to the pool of Siloam, and wash.' So I went away and washed, and I received sight."""
Weèe ka' ce geèe ba njáèá ká, weèe gee neè ye ntee wááwá njobeè' weèe ce geèe yuu anaè ba neè ñwáè ka, weèe ce geèe ba neè Tata Jisoès.	And whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord, and not for men,
Ñgá' ce beèe magoèr efa weâe mú a fa neè ñgaèñ aè gháá.	Sufficient to such a one is this punishment which was inflicted by the many;
Cïìñ neè kúr njeâe Nyúè ce yi yu mba weâe mmboè naè, ciñ yi neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè aèmboè Nyúè ce koèñ ená weèe ciñ naè, ke' ba ba aèmboè a taèa lá weèe taèa wa' ka'. Weèe fa faè' njobeè' weèe aè roñ mbaèa ka', faè' neè ba njobeè' weèe ce lu'shi aè rfaè'.	Shepherd the flock of God which is among you, exercising the oversight, not under compulsion, but voluntarily, not for dishonest gain, but willingly;
Baná m ka' vúê, m fúú neè ye aèwañ, suñ ku' buu bbebep ce e laèa a kuu weèr. E ce sa' weèr neè bsaèrbuu-ñwáè. E geèe ca wa'a, yi gháá ye ka', e kani aè rkoni bfúr, a kani beèe ce a ce koèñ aè rgeèe wa'a foñ, a fúr woweèe embe coêr.	Therefore, if I come, I will call attention to his deeds which he does, unjustly accusing us with wicked words. Not content with this, neither does he himself receive the brothers, and those who would, he forbids and throws out of the assembly.
M ce loo máná Ta Nyúè, ba Tata Jisos Kraâis túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, ker fa weèe cumúnyañ.	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Beèe Farïìsi a m yu' aèmboè kúr beèe ca a ce cúèúni aèmboè Jisoès. Yi ka' ba wa'a, beèe Farïìsi ba beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì a tuu beèe ce a m ce keè'ni Ndap Nyúè ená a du koo ye.	The Pharisees heard the multitude murmuring these things concerning him, and the chief priests and the Pharisees sent officers to arrest him.
Fu' yi ke caèa, kashi aèmboè yi gwáá, aè yu' aèmboè yi coèo. Wáâ yu' wa', riñ faèdïì' yi loè káè faèdïì' ce yi ce duè ka'. Yi ku ba wa'a neè ñwáè ce Yú' yi bi ye.”	"The wind blows where it wants to, and you hear its sound, but don't know where it comes from and where it is going. So is everyone who is born of the Spirit."""
Nyaèa anaè aè m fa ñger ená a fa beèe wááwá ncoèo. Káè ñwáè aè m ba ñwáâ ñgoèr áè, káè e m ba ñwáâ ñká' áè, káè e m ba ñkwaèa káè muu áè, a m fa ye ncoèo. A m ka' tá fa ñwáè ncoèo ca aè rkoo maè' ka', a fa nje nsaèpsi.	He causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the slave, to be given marks on their right hands, or on their foreheads;
a vú aègho njep kañ, a fa neè muu anaè, e fa neè yïì maê.	and brought his head on a platter, and gave it to the young lady; and the young lady gave it to her mother.
AÈmboè yi yu na, yuu ce weèr túr nje tuè yi yu ená weèr fa' tá nyor boñ ye, káè weèr cu neè nyor ca njep ñgoèñ na áè, káè weèr aè fúú enjo áè.	Therefore also we make it our aim, whether at home or absent, to be well pleasing to him.
Beèe a m ce ye buu, a ce no buu, mmbañruè a ce loèr bbyeèñge, bbyeèñge a ce duèse bguèu, ku ce geèe wa' caar a ba' nyúè ce Nowa aè m niñ mbe keñ, mdip mi ruu aè ñgoèñ a yúshi woweèe wááwá naè.	They ate, they drank, they married, they were given in marriage, until the day that Noah entered into the ship, and the flood came, and destroyed them all.
Ntàràŋ à faa.	The inside roof pole does not fit.
Jisoès aè m rïìñ yuu ce woweèe a m ce laèa, a laa enáê, “Weèe ce fa njeñwáè ca ñgá' wa' njoká? E geèe ba yuu boèñboñ neè máè.	"However, knowing this, Jesus said to them, ""Why do you trouble the woman? Because she has done a good work for me."
Pitaè aè ka' laèa mïìsi, woweèe a ce beèe a mmbaa. A m ce Josáèf ce li rlii mo' li m ba ená Baèsabaès, rmo' li ba ená Jostoès, a ker ce Maètiyaès foñ.	They put forward two, Joseph called Barsabbas, who was surnamed Justus, and Matthias.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, m ce loèr la ryoèñ aèmboè ku' yuu mo' se ka', ku ba ba ená m du gee rfaè' ce Tata Jisoès aè m fa neè máè. Rfaè' anaè li yu ená m suñ beèe Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè ntee boèñboñ ce Nyúè túr neè beèe.	But these things don't count; nor do I hold my life dear to myself, so that I may finish my race with joy, and the ministry which I received from the Lord Jesus, to fully testify to the Good News of the grace of God.
Mú mnoèñ vi ka' tuuse, ñwáâ ñká' aè lor buu wááwá ce e m túr, a du aè to' mo' ce yi m ba aènjïìsaèp seê, a jarsi buu anaè aèfo aè buu bcicïì.	Not many days after, the younger son gathered all of this together and traveled into a far country. There he wasted his property with riotous living.
Mkaèñsïì mi gweñgeèr aè nsheè aèmboè piya ce fu' tatap yi ke caèa ceni embe ce mber naè wa'a.	The stars of the sky fell to the earth, like a fig tree dropping its unripe figs when it is shaken by a great wind.
Kʉʉsi zhii cɛ̀ʼ nè ye.	Return his cloth to him.
Ka' yi m ba wa'a, Jus a m barsi bbyeèñge ñgaâa mlii ce a m ce loo neè Nyúè ker ba mmbañruè ce a m ba beâe bgoèrgoâr aè rla' anaè, woweèe a fa ñgá' neè Pol ba Baènabaès, a juu woweèe efa yap ñgoèñ.	But the Jews stirred up the devout and prominent women and the chief men of the city, and stirred up a persecution against Paul and Barnabas, and threw them out of their borders.
Bkwaèa, yu'ni neè neè wee mmasaè enjep ñgoèñ na. Weèe fa kuè ce faè' ba aè nfeè' ce woweèe a ce yá weèe tá woweèe a bo yu' rboèñ neè weèe ka'. Faè' neè neè woweèe neè nteâe mo'sir njobeè' weèe ce wáp Tata Nyúè.	Servants, obey in all things those who are your masters according to the flesh, not just when they are looking, as men pleasers, but in singleness of heart, fearing God.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce Nyúè aè m loèr Abraèham aèmboè ñwáâ nyáánïì naè, Abraèham aè m banïì geèe búè a? Yi yu wa' ka', aè m ba aè nfeè' anaè e be gee búè ka'.	How then was it counted? When he was in circumcision, or in uncircumcision? Not in circumcision, but in uncircumcision.
E byemïì, a ká' a ce roèo nduunjïì aè rfyeèni Jisoès neè woweèe aè nfeè' ce beèe a yu aèfo ka'.	He consented, and sought an opportunity to deliver him to them in the absence of the multitude.
À kaʼ koŋ à rtʉr mbàa, banɛ à be fàʼ tatap.	If you want to be rich, then you should work hard.
E m feè'shi aè rlii Jisoès neè ntee-ñwáè. E m de' a Jus ce a m ce laèa li Greêk, a sár mnsár a woweèe. Woweèe a m ce roèo aè ryú ye.	preaching boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus. He spoke and disputed against the Hellenists, but they were seeking to kill him.
Nyúè aè m ye leè' ce ncoèo efa gho aè m ba búè ce Abraèham aè m geèe naè. Yi ka' ba wa'a, Abraèham aè bi Aisïìk, mnoèñ vi ka' ba waami, e gee ye búè. Aisïìk aè bi Jakoèp, Jakoèp aè bi btu mntáè' ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú.	He gave him the covenant of circumcision. So Abraham became the father of Isaac, and circumcised him the eighth day. Isaac became the father of Jacob, and Jacob became the father of the twelve patriarchs.
Baná wee weèe foñ aè ba yá wee mnyor aèmboè beèe ce a kweñger, yuu bebep yi ker ce geèe yuu mo' neè weèe ka', weèe aè ce cu seè'ni weèe Nyúè weèe njobeè' weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe yu aèbee.	Thus consider yourselves also to be dead to sin, but alive to God in Christ Jesus our Lord.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, e be káè' entombïì yá ñgá' goèr seê, tá ñgúè beâe seè'ni na a kani ye.	But first, he must suffer many things and be rejected by this generation.
Muu njar Pol aè yu' mncúè ce woweèe a m cúè na, a du a niñ mbe barakïì a suñ Poêl.	But Paul's sister's son heard of their lying in wait, and he came and entered into the barracks and told Paul.
AÈ ce geèe búè aè rduèñshi ená aè yu ñwáè Nyúè. Búè ce aè ce geèe anaè be ba neè sá'-ñwáè, ce aè ka' ce láè mncir Nyúè. Wáè ka' ce bú' mncir Nyúè, baná yi yu seè'ni aèmboè wáè geèe lá búè ka' wa'a.	For circumcision indeed profits, if you are a doer of the law, but if you are a transgressor of the law, your circumcision has become uncircumcision.
Caè'ni neè OÈbanuès ce e ce faè' neè Jisos Kraâis aèmboè weèr ce faè' foñ naè, ba Sïìtakïìs ce e yu ñkaraè se naè.	Greet Urbanus, our fellow worker in Christ, and Stachys, my beloved.
Weèe fa maè'shi tá beèe a too weèe ená Rabaèi ka', njobeè' weèe túr ñwáè ryá'nïì moè'sir caè'caè'. Weèe yu ba bfúr.	But don't you be called 'Rabbi,' for one is your teacher, the Christ, and all of you are brothers.
Pailáèt aè bipshïì neè woweèe enáê, “M taa ye mbe kïìntaa njoká? Yuu bebep ce ñwáè ca aè geèe seeseê, yu ba ká?” Woweèe a ku ce waani, a ce laèa enáê, “Taa lá ye mbe kïìntaa.”	"Pilate said to them, ""Why, what evil has he done?"" But they cried out exceedingly, ""Crucify him!"""
Máè yá neè mini-ñwáè aèmboè a ce jar neè yaè beèe aè to' Ijïìp, a yu' aèmboè woweèe a ce war, a suu tá m bo fúr woweèe efa ñgá'. Baná aè be tami nyor tá m tuu wáè aè to' Ijïìp.’	I have surely seen the affliction of my people that is in Egypt, and have heard their groaning. I have come down to deliver them. Now come, I will send you into Egypt.'
Yuu ce weèe aè m geèe njo' le rbyemïû neè Jisos Kraâis yi yu aèmboè tañshïì ce weèe aè geèe neè Nyúè. Máè ka' ba kwe, wa bláá vi misïì tañshïì anaè, m ku ce lu'shi lu'shi.	Yes, and if I am poured out on the sacrifice and service of your faith, I rejoice, and rejoice with you all.
Ñwáè ce e yu aè mñkúè, e fa keèr kúti aè rloèr yi cáè' ka' cañ ka'.	Let him who is in the field not return back to take his cloak.
Yïì ta ba yïì ma a m ce duè ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm njep feè' wááwá.	His parents went every year to Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover.
Pol aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Joân aè m ce baèptir beèe njobeè' woweèe a m kupse, a ma' yaèp buu bbebep.” E m ker ce suñ beèe ená woweèe a byemi neè ñwáè ce e be vúè embe yeâ njïì. Ñwáè ce e m ce laèa na aè m ba Jisoès.	"Paul said, ""John indeed baptized with the baptism of repentance, saying to the people that they should believe in the one who would come after him, that is, in Jesus."""
Weèe ce kwaè'shi ená mñwáá vi báti kyeèe tá a ka' kep kwaa efa mñkúè. M ce laèa neè weèe ená weèe naa me mmir fyá' aè mñkúè. Kwaa aè baèñ, nfeè' rkep aè ce gháá.	Don't you say, 'There are yet four months until the harvest?' Behold, I tell you, lift up your eyes, and look at the fields, that they are white for harvest already.
Ntàʼtè à koo mɛ̀.	I was held back by business.
Pailáèt aè bipshïì neè ye enáê, “A wáè ñkúú Jus a?” Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “AÈ laèa yo cuèu.”	"Pilate asked him, ""Are you the King of the Jews?"" He answered, ""So you say."""
Jisoès aè laa enáê, “Laèa neè tá beèe ca a cu aè nsheè.” Mjáá mi m ba mbe dïì' anaè. Mmbañruè ce a m cute aè nsheè a m ba aèmboè ncúèkïì taê.	"Jesus said, ""Have the people sit down."" Now there was much grass in that place. So the men sat down, in number about five thousand."
Woweèe a bááñgeèr seê, a yoñshi Nyúè, a ce wáp seê, a ce laèa enáê, “Weèr aè yá buu bghagha' ntïìni.”	"Amazement took hold on all, and they glorified God. They were filled with fear, saying, ""We have seen strange things today."""
Waè' Nyúè ku ba ba Nyúè Jus caè'caè' a? AÈmboè e yu Nyúè beèe enje jáá foñ a? ÁÈno, e yu Nyúè beèe enje jáá foñ,	Or is God the God of Jews only? Isn't he the God of Gentiles also? Yes, of Gentiles also,
Geewa'a, ñwáè ce e m baè'ri ndap neè ye aè m ba Solomúèn.	But Solomon built him a house.
Muu anà yu nɛŋ a?	It that child free of witchcraft?
Jisos Kraâis ku ba ntïìni aèmboè e mú ba neèñkuèr, kuè ba wa' foñ aèyaèñseè. AÈde' e kupseè aè nfeè' moè' ka'.	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Maè' neè rraa aè ñgúè' bo maè', weèe be koo yuu.” Woweèe a ma' rraa, a moo aè rsúèñ rraa enjep roè laèr, njobeè' nca yi m ba njep rraa anaè goèr seê.	"He said to them, ""Cast the net on the right side of the boat, and you will find some."" They cast it therefore, and now they weren't able to draw it in for the multitude of fish."
Weèr aè ka' yá keñ ce e m ce duè aè rla' Foènishaè, weèr aè niñ mbo a duê.	Having found a ship crossing over to Phoenicia, we went aboard, and set sail.
Beèe mo' efa weâr mú a ba du faèdïì' rsheè li yu, a ka' baè', a yá buu aè ku ba aèmboè bbyeèñge ca a suñ woweèe naè, a ke' yá ye ka'.”	"Some of us went to the tomb, and found it just like the women had said, but they didn't see him."""
Wèr à zhe ŋkeŋ tɛ wèr bo yɛ ŋwɛ̀ ce e ba zhɛɛ ntaʼ anà.	We have sworn so that we will see who stole that chair.
Máè m sañ yuu mo' neè coêr, geewa'a Daèyotráfáès ce e koèñ aè rba tu embe cor aè byemïì ka'.	I wrote to the assembly, but Diotrephes, who loves to be first among them, doesn't accept what we say.
tá weèe ker ba beèe Nyúè wááwá bo rïìñ ku' njáèá rkoèñnïì ce li báèr aè bke', a sap kuèyáá, a sap a ko' mbekïì, a coomi a caa ñger.	may be strengthened to comprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and height and depth,
Wáè ka' gee yuu bebep neè bfúr wo, tá yap ntee yi ce fa woweèe ñgá' wa'a, baná wáè geèe yuu bebep neè Jisos Kraêis.	Thus, sinning against the brothers, and wounding their conscience when it is weak, you sin against Christ.
Woweèe a ka' duè caèa rla' AÈmfipolïìs ba rla' AÈpoèlonïìyaè, a ba' aè rla' Táèsaèlonikaè. Ndap rloo Jus aè m ba aèfo.	Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia, they came to Thessalonica, where there was a Jewish synagogue.
M ce tuu wáè ená aè du mú' map mmir, gee tá woweèe a fúú efa túè'nji du aè rraa, lo enjeptii Sataèn du njeptii Nyúè, tá a bo foèosi woweèe efa yaèp buu bbebep, tá woweèe a koni dïì' aè múè beèe ce Nyúè aè geèe woweèe a ba brara njobeè' woweèe a byemi neè máè naè.’	to open their eyes, that they may turn from darkness to light and from the power of Satan to God, that they may receive remission of sins and an inheritance among those who are sanctified by faith in me.'
Máè laèa buu ca tá m bo jaè' weèe jaè'. Máè koèñ máná m lá weèe ba ntáèr mbenduè nyor ka'. Yuu máè koèñ yi yu ba ená weèe gee buu ce vi yu bboèñboñ a ba byáánïì tá yuu mo' yi bo ba ce aètaè yi jepsïì weèe efa rfaè' neè Tata ka'.	This I say for your own profit; not that I may ensnare you, but for that which is appropriate, and that you may attend to the Lord without distraction.
Weèe ce loèr beèe ce a loèr wap btu ená a yu ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès naè aè beèe ce a yuu jáá. Weèe aè ka' fe'ni máè weèr woweèe m kwa'shïì máná aède' m ba mbaè njïì ka'.	For I reckon that I am not at all behind the very best apostles.
Weèr yu aèmboè Musïìs ka'. Musïìs aè m ce loè cete vi bsii neè cáè' faè dïì' beèe Isráèl a bo yá aèmboè rraa efa yeâ bsii anaè li ce liiti ka'.	and not as Moses, who put a veil on his face, that the children of Israel wouldn't look steadfastly on the end of that which was passing away.
Jisoès a ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu weèe a m loè a du aèwaâa rdip rgoèr. Beèe magoèr a du fa waâp mbuèu. AÈ m ba beâe aè ñgoâñ Galeèle ba Juèdiyaè,	Jesus withdrew to the sea with his disciples, and a great multitude followed him from Galilee, from Judea,
Nyúè aè m ye leè' a yïì beèe aè nfeè' entombïì, a gee mncir ce vi m ba aèmboè aède' woweèe a loo neè ye. Dïì' mo' yi m ba ce a m ce loo neè Nyúè mbo.	Now indeed even the first covenant had ordinances of divine service, and an earthly sanctuary.
Yeè ndeèe aè ba ba aèmbo yïì Jisos Kraêis.	Have this in your mind, which was also in Christ Jesus,
Woweèe a ka' yu' nlaèa ca a nati a duse moè'sir moè'sir. Bleebeèe a m duè entombïì neè bghaèrbeèe, a ma'shi Jisoès a njeñwáè anaè mbo.	They, when they heard it, being convicted by their conscience, went out one by one, beginning from the oldest, even to the last. Jesus was left alone with the woman where she was, in the middle.
Beèe ca wááwá a gaèpni buu moè' efa ku' yaèp buu ce a túr, a fa rfa aègho, ñgwañkúñwáè ca ce e túr yuu ka' aè lor mú yuu wááwá ce e túr, aè ba yïì ce yi ba jaè' ye, a fa.”	"for all these put in gifts for God from their abundance, but she, out of her poverty, put in all that she had to live on."""
Weèe fa geèe rloo neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na aèmboè beèe moè' efa woweèe a m geèe naè ka'. A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Beèe a m cu aè nsheè a ye byee, a no buu, a nati mbekïì a bii bii neè blañ.”	"Neither be idolaters, as some of them were. As it is written, ""The people sat down to eat and drink, and rose up to play."""
AÈmboè yi yu wa' na, wáè ka' ce sa' nfúroè njoká? AÈ ce jaèasi nfúroè njoká? Seèe wááwá be keè táá kuèntombïì neè Nyúè tá e sa' seèe.	But you, why do you judge your brother? Or you again, why do you despise your brother? For we will all stand before the judgment seat of Christ.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè vúè aè rkoo máè a túr bsaè' ba mmbaèñ aèmboè m yu lá nyáèá wa'a njoká?	"Jesus answered them, ""Have you come out, as against a robber, with swords and clubs to seize me?"
Nyúè aè geèe Jisos Kraâis aè fúú efa rkwe. Bláá Jisoès a yuu ce yi m geèe leè' ce Nyúè aè m ye a ñwáè yi túr ñger nfeseè. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' rkwe Jisoès, Jisoès yu ñkúú gaèy ce e ce keè'ni yïì beèe.	Now may the God of peace, who brought again from the dead the great shepherd of the sheep with the blood of an eternal covenant, our Lord Jesus,
Ñgaâa yá'ni buu vi Joân ba beèe Farïìsi a ce jïì mdip, awá beèe a du a laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Ñgaâa yá'nïì buu vi Joân ba vïû beèe Farïìsi a ke jïì mdip, wo a ke' jïì yap ka' njoká?”	"John's disciples and the Pharisees were fasting, and they came and asked him, ""Why do John's disciples and the disciples of the Pharisees fast, but your disciples don't fast?"""
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “M ce suñ wáè neè mini-ñwáè ená tá nduñgúp ka' toñ neètú' e ntïìni na, aè be kani ñkaèraè' taar ená aè rïìñ máè ka'.”	"Jesus said to him, ""Most certainly I tell you that tonight, before the rooster crows, you will deny me three times."""
“Weèe fa ce kwaè'shi ená máè m vúè ba neè cumúnyañ njep ñgoèñ na ka'. Máè m vúè ba neè cumúnyañ ka'. Máè m vúè ba neè kaèafaè'.	"Don't think that I came to send peace on the earth. I didn't come to send peace, but a sword.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	35	Máè m vúè tá m bo geèe tá ñgaèpni yi ba mbetar muu mbañruè a yïì taê, ba muunje a yïì maê, ba ñgwa muu a maluâ.	For I came to set a man at odds against his father, and a daughter against her mother, and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	36	Beèe ce a be baèa ñwáè be kuè ba beèe embe yeâ ndaèp.	A man's foes will be those of his own household.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	37	“Ñwáè ce e ka' koñ yïì taê, káè yïì ma áè, caa máè, baná ñgaèñ aè ghááte aè rba yaè ñwáè ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' koñ muu yïì, baná ñgaèñ aè ghááte aè rba yaè ñwáè ka'.	He who loves father or mother more than me is not worthy of me; and he who loves son or daughter more than me isn't worthy of me.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	38	Ñwáè ce e ka' tá loèr yi kïìntaa vúè fa máâ mbuèu ka', baná ñgaèñ aè ghááte aè rba yaè ñwáè ka'.	He who doesn't take his cross and follow after me, isn't worthy of me.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	39	Ñwáè ce e ka' ce roèo ba li ryoèñ, baná e be bá li. Ñwáè ce e ka' bá li ryoèñ njo' máè baná e be koni li.	He who seeks his life will lose it; and he who loses his life for my sake will find it.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	40	“Ñwáè ce e ka' koni weèe baná e koni máè. Ñwáè ce e ka' koni máè, baná e koni ñwáè ce e m tuu máè.	He who receives you receives me, and he who receives me receives him who sent me.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	41	Ñwáè ce e ka' koni ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè njobeè' ñwáè anaè yu ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè baná ñgaèñ be koni blaè' ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè. Ñwáè ce e ka' koni ñwáâ nyáánïì njobeè' ñwáè anaè yu ñwáâ nyáánïì aè bsii Nyúè, baná ñgaèñ be koni blaè' ñwáè ce e yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè.	He who receives a prophet in the name of a prophet will receive a prophet's reward. He who receives a righteous man in the name of a righteous man will receive a righteous man's reward.

Máè m rïìñ máná a ye Kraâis anaè ka'. Geewa'a, mbuèu ce máè m vúè ya ce baèptir beèe aè to' Isráèl aè m ba ená woweèe a bo rïìñ ye.”	"I didn't know him, but for this reason I came baptizing in water: that he would be revealed to Israel."""
Jǒn à m baptir Jisòs.	John baptised Jesus.
Rcu enjep ngòŋ rli yu nè ŋgɛʼ ŋwɛ̀.	Life in the world is full of trouble.
“Haba! AÈde' a ke' ba fyeèni mgúr ca aè bbaâa mbaâa btaar, loèr mbaèa efa gho fa neè ñgaâa fuèp ka' njoká?”	Why wasn't this ointment sold for three hundred denarii, and given to the poor?
Geèe yuu ce aède' aè gee neè yo maê, neè bbyeèñge ce a yu bleebeèe, gee yuu ce aède' aè gee neè bjar wo neè bbyeèñge ce a yu bleebeèe ka' naè. Cu weèe woweèe aè njïû yáánïì.	the elder women as mothers; the younger as sisters, in all purity.
Cena a nsuñ ce weèe aè m yu' efa rkáè' ená seèe koñni.	For this is the message which you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another;
Máè tuu Tikikoès aè rla' Áfásoès.	But I sent Tychicus to Ephesus.
e ma'shïì neè woweèe a cañ a du mbuèuriñ.	but he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.
A ka' laèa wa'a, ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè túú ye neè yañ kaâñ moè'sir njobeè' e m kuè'si Nyúè ka'; mghoèghoè mi ye ye, e kweê.	Immediately an angel of the Lord struck him, because he didn't give God the glory, and he was eaten by worms and died.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce máè m ce feè'shi blaâa Nyúè neè weèe, máè m bipshi blaè' efa gho ka'. Máè m suèusi yaè nyor njep nsheè tá m bo naèa weèe mbekïì. Waè' máè m geèe wa'a, aè ba ba yuu bebep a?	Or did I commit a sin in humbling myself that you might be exalted, because I preached to you God's Good News free of charge?
Túè' aè ka' raa, woweèe a ce duè, a ka' baè' aètútú, Pitaè aè ko' mbe tu ndap aèmboè aè nyúè ncoèp-baa wa'a, aè rgeèe rloo.	Now on the next day as they were on their journey, and got close to the city, Peter went up on the housetop to pray at about noon.
E ka' baè' aè rla' Sisaèriyaè, a du Jáèrusaláèm a ca'ni cor yïû aèfo, a nati a kúti aè rla' Antïìyoèk.	When he had landed at Caesarea, he went up and greeted the assembly, and went down to Antioch.
Seemoè' aè be ce naèa tu enáê, “A m faèrshi mmba' mo' tá a bo bar máè njo.”	"You will say then, ""Branches were broken off, that I might be grafted in."""
E m ker laa foñ enáê, “A máè na, máè tami nyor aè rgeèe buu wááwá ce wáâ koèñ ená m geêe.” E m laèa wa'a baná e siñsi btañshïû rúèú ca a kúúsi ba yïû fi.	"then he has said, ""Behold, I have come to do your will."" He takes away the first, that he may establish the second,"
Máè yá fuè ñwaè' mbaè bo maè' ñwáè ce e m cu mbe kaèbaèraè' naè. A m sañ ñwaè' mbo mbeèp bsïìp, a kar aèmboè a ke kar rwaèa naè, a siñ bcuèu efa gho neè nlaèadoñ bdïì' saèambaê.	I saw, in the right hand of him who sat on the throne, a book written inside and outside, sealed shut with seven seals.
Beèe mo' a lo a koñ aè rkoo ye. Ka' yi m ba wa'a, ñwáè moè' aè m joèo ye neè bo ka'.	Some of them would have arrested him, but no one laid hands on him.
Seèe aè m bú' mncir Nyúè, seèe Nyúè weèe aè túr mnsa', Nyúè aè ca'sïì buu bbebep ca embe seâe tuè. E m caè'si wa'a, yi ba seè'ni ená e láè mbe tu Jisoès aè nfeè' ce a m taa ye mbe kïìntaa naè.	wiping out the handwriting in ordinances which was against us; and he has taken it out of the way, nailing it to the cross;
Geèe neè wa'a njobeè' njáèá beèe ca a ce faè' ba neè Kraâis ce e yu Tata neè seèe ka', woweèe a ce geèe ba yuu ce yi boèñ woweèe. Woweèe a ce bu' cuèu neè blaèa ce vi boèñ a ce foo seê, a ce bo' beèe ce a máñni buu.	For those who are such don't serve our Lord, Jesus Christ, but their own belly; and by their smooth and flattering speech, they deceive the hearts of the innocent.
Kyèse mbàa moʼ mboo kaʼ fa nè ye.	Add more money to it before giving him.
Musïìs aè m fa ncir ená weèe ce gee búè. (Ke' ba ená a ye ce e m káè' ka', aè m káè' ba wee btaê.) Musïìs aè ka' láè ncir wa'a weèe aè lo a ce geèe búè nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè.	Moses has given you circumcision (not that it is of Moses, but of the fathers), and on the Sabbath you circumcise a boy.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Loèr neè nca mo' ce weèe aè ku koo seè'ni naè, vú aègho.”	"Jesus said to them, ""Bring some of the fish which you have just caught."""
Baná weèe borni njáèá buu ce weèe aè m ce geèe aè nfeè' weèe aè m ce cu ba rcu enjep ñgoèñ na naè. Loèr neè buu anaè aèmboè buu ce vi kwe wa'a. Maè'shi neè bsaèkïì ba mká'ni, borni ñgeâe bebep wááwá, ba mkwaè'shïû mmbembep. Fa baèñ mmir aè buu ka', njobeè' aè ka' ce baèñ mmir aè buu baná wáè loèr buu anaè aèmboè yu Nyúè wa'a.	Put to death therefore your members which are on the earth: sexual immorality, uncleanness, depraved passion, evil desire, and covetousness, which is idolatry;
E m ker yá woweèe a ba jáá efa seèe ka'. E m geèe wap mntee vi ba brara foñ njo' lap rbyemïì.	He made no distinction between us and them, cleansing their hearts by faith.
Ka' ba ená m ce fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' ca wa'a, ntubo Nyúè ba njo, baná kúú Nyúè yi vúè neè weèe.	But if I by the finger of God cast out demons, then the Kingdom of God has come to you.
Woweèe a kur ye tá a bo lïìp, e laa neè ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè bsoogáè rjeèe enáê, “Waè' ncir yi byemi ená a lip ñwáè Rum ce a be sa' yïì nsa' ka' a?”	"When they had tied him up with thongs, Paul asked the centurion who stood by, ""Is it lawful for you to scourge a man who is a Roman, and not found guilty?"""

Woowèe a niŋ mbe ndàp.	They have entered into the house.
Weèe ce beâe aè rla' Fileèpaêi, weèe ku riñ yáánïì ená aè m ba aè nfeè' ce máè m naètïû aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè a ká' a ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ naè, cor moè' aè m ker ba ce weèr woweèe aè m ce tarte mmbo ker caa efa weèe ka'.	You yourselves also know, you Philippians, that in the beginning of the Good News, when I departed from Macedonia, no assembly shared with me in the matter of giving and receiving but you only.
M ka' tá rïìñ aè rlaèa yuu ka', m máñnïì yuu Nyúè ka'. Weèr aè geèe ca yi ba rara neè weèe aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá.	But though I am unskilled in speech, yet I am not unskilled in knowledge. No, in every way we have been revealed to you in all things.
Ncïìndap Nyúè ce e m laèa neè ye naè aè ka' duè, e ká' boo mfaè' embe yeâ ndaèp a baa ker ba ñwáè soogáè ce e m fa yïì nyor neè Nyúè, ce e m ba moè' efa beèe ce a m ce faè' neè ye.	When the angel who spoke to him had departed, Cornelius called two of his household servants and a devout soldier of those who waited on him continually.
Beèe a ce laèa buu bbebep neè weèr, weèr ce kúsi ba blaâa bboèñboñ neè woweèe. Beèe a ce loèr weèr aèmboè yuu cicïì ce ñgoèñ yi ker ce koèñ aè ryá ka'. A ku bii loèr weèr aèmboè bkuèp buu wa'a, vú ba' ntïìni.	Being defamed, we entreat. We are made as the filth of the world, the dirt wiped off by all, even until now.
Ka' yuu ce woweèe a m laèa foñ na yi m tarte a yi moè' ka'.	Even so, their testimony did not agree.
Woweèe a m suñ ñwáè ka', geewa'a, a ce tarni ená nfúú efa rkwe ca yu ba ká lá.	"They kept this saying to themselves, questioning what the ""rising from the dead"" meant."
Yi yu foñ ená aèmboè seèe Kraâis weèe aè kwe aèbee na, seèe aè byemi ená seèe be cu seèe Kraâis weèe foñ,	But if we died with Christ, we believe that we will also live with him;
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè máè, a be naèa máè mbekïì tá m súñ beèe wááwá aè yaè.”	"And I, if I am lifted up from the earth, will draw all people to myself."""
Tá beèe wááwá a bo yá rluèñ Nyúè.’ ”	"All flesh will see God's salvation.'"""
Wáè ba koni máè a baa máè nje nyoèr ka', ká' embe nfeè' máè ba niñ mbe ndaèp na njeñwáè ca aè be borni efa rnyoè'shi máè mkuèu ka'.	You gave me no kiss, but she, since the time I came in, has not ceased to kiss my feet.

Fa gèe mcɛ̌r wèe ŋgwe anà kaʼ.	Donʼt play with that dog.
Máè ker yá ncïìndap Nyúè moè'. AÈ m ba ncïìndap Nyúè ce e ke toèo mor mbe dïì' ce a ke fa rfa neè Nyúè. E vú embe dïì' rfa anaè a waa, a laa neè ncïìndap Nyúè moè' ca enáê, “Yáê, gráâp aè baèñ. Loèr yoè saè' anaè du ceni efa mñkwaa enjep ñgoèñ na.”	"Another angel came out from the altar, he who has power over fire, and he called with a great voice to him who had the sharp sickle, saying, ""Send forth your sharp sickle, and gather the clusters of the vine of the earth, for the earth's grapes are fully ripe!"""
Ñwáâ ñgoâr aè rla' anaè aè m túr ñkúè aètútú. A m ce too ye ená Puèbilïìyoès. E m koni weèr, a nyañ weèr boèñboñ se aè mnoâñ btaar.	Now in the neighborhood of that place were lands belonging to the chief man of the island, named Publius, who received us, and courteously entertained us for three days.
Mmbañruè, koèñ neè wee bbyeèñge aèmboè Kraâis ye ye aè m koèñ coêr, a fa yi tu aètu mo naè,	Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the assembly, and gave himself up for it;
Saimún Pitaè aè kútïì mbe keñ a súñ rraa a fúr mbe ñkúè. Nca goèrgoèr yi m ba njo seê. Yi m ba rjeèe neè ncoèp-taar-aè-mntaê. Ka' nca yi m ba njo goèr wa'a, rraa li m ceeñger ka'.	Simon Peter went up, and drew the net to land, full of great fish, one hundred fifty-three; and even though there were so many, the net wasn't torn.
Ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè laa neè Felep enáê, “Naèti du mbaè mbuèuñgoèñ, njep nduunjïì ce yi loâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a du aè rla' Gaasaè.” Yu nduunjïì ce yi yu aè rïìñ. E lip ye à ntàr.	He has beaten him out wickedness.
njobeè' aède' woweèe a ker kweñger ka'. Woweèe a be keè ba aèmboè bcïìndap Nyúè wa'a. Woweèe a be keè ba boo Nyúè njobeè' woweèe a fúú efa rkwe.	For they can't die any more, for they are like the angels, and are children of God, being children of the resurrection.
Muu anaè be keè ba ñwáâ ñgoèr, tá a too ye ená Muu Nyúè embe buèu. Tata Nyúè be fa kúú yïì ta Dávïìd neè ye.	He will be great, and will be called the Son of the Most High. The Lord God will give him the throne of his father, David,

E be bi muu mbañruè tá aè fa li rlii ená Jisoès, njobeè' e be geèe tá yïì beèe a luñ efa yaèp buu bbebep.”	"She shall bring forth a son. You shall call his name Jesus, for it is he who shall save his people from their sins."""
M ce loo máná Tata Jisos Kraâis túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ.	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
E m ker ma' ñgaèa moè' neè woweèe enáê, “Kúú Nyúè yi yu aèmboè yis ce njeñwáè aè m loèr, a fe' mkúâñ bráâd mñkaâa btaar, a top aègho caar mkúèñ anaè mi ko'.”	"He spoke another parable to them. ""The Kingdom of Heaven is like yeast, which a woman took, and hid in three measures of meal, until it was all leavened."""
Máè ka' loâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a du aè bdïì' mo' aè ñgoâñ Sirïìyaè ba aè ñgoâñ Sïìlesïìyaè.	Then I came to the regions of Syria and Cilicia.
Rkìŋ rlisò rli bʉʼtî.	Our pot is broken.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè mbañruèñwáè ce e fa kwaèñ neè muunje, mbañruèñwáè anaè ka' yá ená e be loèr muunje ca ka' njobeè' e koèñ aè rcu ñkúè tá e bo faè' neè Nyúè boèñboñ, yi bep ka'. E ka' moo aè rcu laèr njo' ntee njeñwáè yi ce loè ye, e ka' koñ e lor ñgwa yïì. E ka' gee wa'a, baná e geèe yuu bebep ka'.	But if any man thinks that he is behaving inappropriately toward his virgin, if she is past the flower of her age, and if need so requires, let him do what he desires. He doesn't sin. Let them marry.
Buu vi btaar anaè yu Yú' ba mdip, ker ba bláá. Buu ca vi ce laèa yuu yi mo'sir.	the Spirit, the water, and the blood; and the three agree as one.
Baná seèe fúú efa múè rla' du yá ye tá a coosi seèe woweèe aèbee,	Let us therefore go out to him outside of the camp, bearing his reproach.

M ce loo máná aèmboè weèe be ce yá'ni, rïìñ Nyúè boèñboñ, tá Nyúè túr ntee boèñboñ neè weèe, ker fa weèe cumúnyañ.	Grace to you and peace be multiplied in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord,
Woweèe a bipshïì neè yi enáê, “Ñwáè anaè yuê?” E beesïì enáê, “M rïìñ faèdïì' e yu ka'.”	"Then they asked him, ""Where is he?"" He said, ""I don't know."""
Ñkúú ba govanoè ba Báènïîs, ker ba bár beèe wááwá a natïì mbekïì.	The king rose up with the governor, and Bernice, and those who sat with them.
Weèr ce sañ ñwaè' ca neè ñgaâa cor ce a yu aè rla' Koreèn ce a Jisoès weèe a yu aè ñwáè moè'sir. Nyúè aè ce weèe efa múè beèe enjep ñgoèñ na tá weèe ba yïì beèe. Weèe yu aèbee weèe beèe Nyúè ce a yu aè bdïì' wááwá a ce loo neè yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraêis. E yu Tata neè woweèe aèmboè e yu neè seèe naè.	to the assembly of God which is at Corinth; those who are sanctified in Christ Jesus, called to be saints, with all who call on the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place, both theirs and ours:
Mmbañruè wááwá ce a m ye, a m ba aèmboè beèe ncúèkïì taê, ka' lor bbyeèñge ba bghaèrbeèe.	Those who ate were about five thousand men, besides women and children.
Zhi yu ghup a?	Is it true?
Luèr anaè aè m kuè' seê. Woweèe a ka' vúè baè' aèfo, a yá ená a ba biñsi luèr anaè embe nduè ncuèu rsheè wáá.	for it was very big. Looking up, they saw that the stone was rolled back.
Fálïìs ce e m rïìñ nduunjïì anaè boèñboñ seê, aè ku' mnsa', a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Lesaè ce e yu tu yïû goèr neè bsoogáè naè aè ka' vúê, m ka' teni wee mnsa' ca.”	"But Felix, having more exact knowledge concerning the Way, deferred them, saying, ""When Lysias, the commanding officer, comes down, I will decide your case."""
Jisoès aè ká' woweèe a laa buu neè woweèe aè mñgaèa enáê, “AÈde' Sataèn fúr Sataèn enjep ñwáè aè njáâá ká?	"He summoned them, and said to them in parables, ""How can Satan cast out Satan?"
Felep ye ye aè m yá Naètanïìyáèl a laa neè ye enáê, “Weèr aè yá ñwáè ce Musïìs aè m sañ aèmboè ye mbe ñwaè' mncir, ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a ker sañ aèmboè ye foñ naè. A ye Jisoès muu Josáèf ce aè rla' Nasaráèt.”	"Philip found Nathanael, and said to him, ""We have found him, of whom Moses in the law, and the prophets, wrote: Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph."""
Mɛ̀ kaʼ yɛ ye, ku ba enɛ mɛ̀ yɛ nfʉr zhìi.	If I see him, therefore I have seen his brother.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “A ke yu'ni neè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè bdïì' wááwá, geewa'a beèe efa yeâ laè', ba yïì ndap, a ke yu'ni neè ye ka'.”	"Jesus said to them, ""A prophet is not without honor, except in his own country, and among his own relatives, and in his own house."""
Judaès ba Silaès ce a m ba ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè foñ, a m laèa buu goèr se aè rfa woweèe ñger tá woweèe a bo tap.	Judas and Silas, also being prophets themselves, encouraged the brothers with many words, and strengthened them.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Nyúè aè ka' ba ba yeè Taê, weèe aè ba koèñ máè njobeè' máè loè ese Nyúè a ka' vú aèfa. Máè vúè ba aè ya ñger ka'; máè vúè ba aè ñger ñwáè ce e m tuu máè.	"Therefore Jesus said to them, ""If God were your father, you would love me, for I came out and have come from God. For I haven't come of myself, but he sent me."
Geewa'a, ndoèo aè co' weèe ce weèe yu ñgaâa mbaèa njobeè' weèe aè yu' le rboèñ wáá.	"But woe to you who are rich! For you have received your consolation.
Luke	Luêk	6	25	Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce weèe ce ye seè'ni na a ce yu', njobeè' njeè be keè yañ weèe. Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce weèe ce vúèshi seè'ni na, weèe be keè koosimnse ce warse.	Woe to you, you who are full now, for you will be hungry. Woe to you who laugh now, for you will mourn and weep.
Luke	Luêk	6	26	Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce beèe wááwá a ku ce suñ ba buu bboèñboñ aèmboè weèe. Waêp btarkú a m ku gee neè beèe ce a m ce nya' mnde' ená a woweèe ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè naè wa' foñ.	Woe, when men speak well of you, for their fathers did the same thing to the false prophets.
Luke	Luêk	6	27	“AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè weèe ce weèe ce yu' yuu ce m ce laèa, koèñ neè beèe ce a baèa weèe, gee buu bboèñboñ neè woweèe.	But I tell you who hear: love your enemies, do good to those who hate you,"
Nfɛ̀r yuu bòŋ nè ntambʉ.	Work is good with seriousness.
Muu ce e vʉ̀ mbena ntìni nà ce bèrep gòr.	That child who came here today behaves in a very fishy manner.
Jisoès aè laa neè Pitaè enáê, “Kúsi kaèafaè' mbaè ruèu. M fa no njep ndoñ ce Taèr aè fa neè máè na ka' a?”	"Jesus therefore said to Peter, ""Put the sword into its sheath. The cup which the Father has given me, shall I not surely drink it?"""
Solomúèn aè bi Rábuèwaèm, Rábuèwaèm aè bi AÈbijaè, AÈbijaè aè bi Asaè.	Solomon became the father of Rehoboam. Rehoboam became the father of Abijah. Abijah became the father of Asa.
AÈ sañ máâ Poêl, a sañ rcaè'ni ca neè ya bo. Kuushi neè yaè ñgá' ce m ce yá mbe shañ. M ce loo máná Nyúè túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ.	The salutation of me, Paul, with my own hand: remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen.
Pailáèt aè m sañ ñwaè' foñ a taa mbe tu kïìntaa. E m sañ enáê, “Jisoès ce aè rla' Nasaráèt, ñkúú Juês.”	"Pilate wrote a title also, and put it on the cross. There was written, ""JESUS OF NAZARETH, THE KING OF THE JEWS."""
Geèe neè wa'a neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè ba ryu'nïì, lá ye ntee rara, tá beèe a ka' ce cáp weèe, tá rïìtu yi bo koo woweèe njo' wap blaâa bbebep ce a ce laèa njo' ye ñgeâe boèñboñ ce weèe ce geèe njo' weèe yu beèe Jisos Kraêis.	having a good conscience; that, while you are spoken against as evildoers, they may be disappointed who curse your good way of life in Christ.
Woweèe a laa enáê, “Haba! Wá wáè foñ yu ñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèle a? Wáè ka' fyá' mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè aè yá ená ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè be vúâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèle ka'.”	"They answered him, ""Are you also from Galilee? Search, and see that no prophet has arisen out of Galilee."""
Kuushi neè yuu ce máè m suñ weèe ená aède' ñwáè rfaè' caa yïì masaè ka' naè. Woweèe a m ka' ba fa máè ñgá', baná a be fa weèe ñgá' foñ. Woweèe a m ka' ba yu'ni neè wa blaèa baná a be yu'ni neè wee blaèa foñ.	Remember the word that I said to you: 'A servant is not greater than his lord.' If they persecuted me, they will also persecute you. If they kept my word, they will keep yours also.

M ce loo máná Tata Jisoès túr ntee boèñboñ neè beèe Nyúè wááwá. Yi yu wa'a. Esclarecimento Trata-se de iniciativa particular, com os seguintes objetivos: (i) colaborar para divulgação dos diversos textos bíblicos disponíveis, e, (ii) facilitar o acesso a esses textos, inclusive por meio de download. Todo esforço em tornar a Palavra de Deus acessível a todos, em quaisquer localidades e falantes das mais diversas línguas, precisa ser um objetivo de todos os que são guiados pelo Espírito Santo. Ele inspirou o profeta Jeremias a dizer “não ensinará jamais cada um ao seu próximo, nem cada um ao seu irmão, dizendo: Conhece ao SENHOR, porque todos me conhecerão, desde o menor até ao maior deles, diz o SENHOR” (Jer. 31:34). Jesus, também, falou assim: “e será pregado este evangelho do reino por todo o mundo, para testemunho a todas as nações” (Mat. 24:14). Muitas organizações foram constituídas com o propósito de fazer a Bíblia disponível nas diversas línguas. Não é uma tarefa simples. Anos de trabalho, dedicação e entrega são necessários para esta tão extraordinária missão. O texto deste trabalho está disponível na internet, em páginas eletrônicas de organizações que produzem ou divulgam bíblias, sem acréscimos de notas ou comentários. Assim, reconhecendo e respeitando os direitos que possuem sobre seus trabalhos, incumbe a todos os que amam a Palavra de Deus, o esforço em contribuir para amplificar sua divulgação. Se possível, faça download do texto, para que sejamos, também, guardiões da Bíblia, e, com isso, preservando-a para as futuras gerações. Divulga a Palavra de Deus, ela mostra o Caminho e permite a todos, que se conheça Sua vontade, em todos os lugares e épocas. Marcel da Glória Pereira	The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with all the saints. Amen.
AÈ m ba kwa'shi ba máè ená m be feè'shi blaâa Nyúè neè beèe, máè m ba koo blaè' ese woweèe. Yi ke' ba wa'a ka'. M ku ce geèe ba rfaè' ce Nyúè aè m fa mba máâ mmboè.	For if I do this of my own will, I have a reward. But if not of my own will, I have a stewardship entrusted to me.

Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	16	AÈ ka' ba njobeè' weèe ku ba ye yu ba mbe btaar, a ke' ce luèu ka', a ce fúte ka', baná m be ce weèe eku máâ cuèu.	So, because you are lukewarm, and neither hot nor cold, I will vomit you out of my mouth.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	17	Weèe ce laèa weená ryúr li boèñ weèe, weèe aè ku' aè buu, a ke' buu yuu mo' ka'. AÈmboè weèe ce yá weená weèe yu ñgaâa ñgá' ce beèe a ba koosimnse neè weèe a? Weèe yu ñgaâa fuèp, a feêp, a ker ce kar mbuèuriñ.	Because you say, 'I am rich, and have gotten riches, and have need of nothing;' and don't know that you are the wretched one, miserable, poor, blind, and naked;
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	18	Ncep ce m ce fa neè weèe yu ená weèe vú yá máè, yuu gul ce a toèo mbaè mor a gee e raa, tá weèe bo kuè' aè buu. Weèe vú yuu bcáâ' bbúú ese máè yar aè nyoèr faè dïì' weèe bo keèr ce kar mbuèuriñ tá beèe a ce vúèshi weèe ka'. Weèe vú yuu mcáèp ese máè fa nje mmïìr tá weèe bo yá buu.	I counsel you to buy from me gold refined by fire, that you may become rich; and white garments, that you may clothe yourself, and that the shame of your nakedness may not be revealed; and eye salve to anoint your eyes, that you may see.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	19	Beèe ce máè koèñ a beèe ce má ke lapni woweèe, nashi woweèe. Baná weèe lor nfeè', kupse, vú a máâ mbuu neè ntee e mo'sir.	As many as I love, I reprove and chasten. Be zealous therefore, and repent.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	20	Yáê, máè táá kuè ncúèúndúè' a ce kuèushi keèñ. Ñwáè ce e ka' yu' yaè njeèndoñ, mú' keèñ, baná m be niñ mbe yeâ ndaèp tá weèr ye yeñger aèbee.	Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, then I will come in to him, and will dine with him, and he with me.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	21	Ñwáè ce e ka' táá tatap, caa rmoèoshïì baná m be maè'shi tá ñwáè anaè vú cu a máâ geñ mbe máâ kaèbaèraè' aèmboè má máè aè m caèa rmoèoshïì a cu weèr yaè Ta mbe yi kaèbaèraè' naè. E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Yu nda efa weâe mú ce e ka' túr njeèe, e gwe njep beè'teè nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè, e ke' koo enjo, fúr mbe ñkúè ka'?	"He said to them, ""What man is there among you, who has one sheep, and if this one falls into a pit on the Sabbath day, won't he grab on to it, and lift it out?"
Ŋwɛ̀ ce e ba vʉ àfa nà yû?	Where is that man who came here?
Rbyemïì li m geèe saèkïì ce a m ce too ená Rahaèp aè sútïì beèe Isráèl ce a m vúè aè rker ñgoèñ naè mbe yeâ ndaèp. AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' ce beèe ce a m teèe btu neè Nyúè aè m kweñger naè, e kwe ka'.	By faith, Rahab the prostitute, didn't perish with those who were disobedient, having received the spies in peace.
Máè m ba ñwáè ce máè m ce bepsi rlii Jisos Kraêis, a ce fa yïì beèe ñgá', a ce geèe bsaèrbuu neè beèe. Ka' máè m ba njáèá ñwáâ wa'a, Nyúè aè koosïìmnse neè máè njobeè' máè m ce geèe buu ca wa'a, a be byemi neè Jisos Kraâis ka', a riñ ená a buu bbebep ka'.	although I was before a blasphemer, a persecutor, and insolent. However, I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a waa mbekïì enáê, “Lasoèroès, fúú enjo!”	"When he had said this, he cried with a loud voice, ""Lazarus, come out!"""
Baná weèe aè m fúú a du ba aè ryá ká seê? Weèe aè m duè ba aè ryá ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè a? ÁÈno, m ce suñ weèe máná ñwáè ce weèe aè m yá anaè caèa ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè.	But what did you go out to see? A prophet? Yes, I tell you, and much more than a prophet.
Bfúr weêr, aèmboè yi yu wa' seè'ni na, weèr ka' ce yá ñgá' ce weèr ce yá na, ce yu' ryañ ce weèr ce yu' na, weèr ce yu' rboèñ neè weèe, ntee yi fúte weèr njobeè' weèe ku táá tatap njep le rbyemïì.	for this cause, brothers, we were comforted over you in all our distress and affliction through your faith.
Wɛ̀r à mʉ koo mkuu anà a lɛ̂ àmbommɛr.	We took the money and kept on our own.
Ku' beèe ce a m cute a Jisoès weèe naè, a m laèa neè ye enáê, “Yáê, yoè ma ba bfúr gho ba bjar gho a yu njepmbeè a ce roèo wáè.”	"A multitude was sitting around him, and they told him, ""Behold, your mother, your brothers, and your sisters are outside looking for you."""
Yïì ta ba yïì ma a ka' yá ye a bááñger seê. Yïì ma aè laa neè ye enáê, “Muu waè, wáè geèe neè weèr wa' njoká? Weèr yoè ta aè roèo wáè, tu yi korñgeèr weèr.”	"When they saw him, they were astonished, and his mother said to him, ""Son, why have you treated us this way? Behold, your father and I were anxiously looking for you."""
Seèe aè koni rboèñ ca njo' yuu mo' ce seèe aè geèe ka', faè dïì' ñwáè moè' bo naèa nyor ená e geèe yuu mo' a ka' koni ka'.	not of works, that no one would boast.
ce láè njeptii ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès, woweèe a ce loèr mbaèa anaè ce gaèpshi neè beèe ce a m túr yuu ka'.	and laid them at the apostles' feet, and distribution was made to each, according as anyone had need.
Ŋwɛ̀ mòʼ yu lùŋgà kaʼ.	No one is like the eternal one.
Jisoès aè m yu' ená a juèu ñwáè anaè embe ndaèp rloo. E ka' roèo ye yá, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Wáè byemi neè Muu Ñwáè a?”	"Jesus heard that they had thrown him out, and finding him, he said, ""Do you believe in the Son of God?"""
Bfúr waê, weèe fa ce rúè'ñger ka', faè dïì' a bo sa' weèe ka'. Ñwáè ce e be teni viseèe mnsa' yu aètútú.	Don't grumble, brothers, against one another, so that you won't be judged. Behold, the judge stands at the door.
AÈde' ñwáè moè' laa yi enáê, “Wáè túr rbyemïì, máè túr ndeâe mboèñmboñ.” M be beèesi neè ñwáè ce e laèa wa' mánáê, “Duèñshi ka máè lo rbyemïì ce li buu ndeâe mboèñmboñ, tá m duñshi wáè yaè ndeâe mboèñmboñ tá aè yá wáná máè túr rbyemïì.”	"Yes, a man will say, ""You have faith, and I have works."" Show me your faith without works, and I by my works will show you my faith."
E tose mbe tar ndap.	He has passed through the veranda.
Nfeè' aè ka' gháá, Jisoès ba yi ñgaâa ntuu a cuteè a sir tábuèr.	When the hour had come, he sat down with the twelve apostles.
E lá'si nyor, nfeè' múcaèr lese aèmboè li rfeese li ba ba.	for he sees himself, and goes away, and immediately forgets what kind of man he was.
A ka' yá woweèe ka', a koo Jasïìn ba bfúr mo', a súêñ, a du aègho a fa neè ñgaâa kansuèr, a laa mbekïì enáê, “Beèe ca ce a beèesi ñgoèñ tútúèñ na, a vúè a ba' aèfa foñ.	"When they didn't find them, they dragged Jason and certain brothers before the rulers of the city, crying, ""These who have turned the world upside down have come here also,"
E ba nyɛɛ à du ntaa.	She got up early and went to the market.
M ce suñ weèe máná ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè magoèr ba bkúú magoèr a m ce koèñ aè ryá buu ce weèe ce yá na, a yá ka', a koñ aè ryu' buu ce weèe ce yu' na, a yu' ka'.”	"for I tell you that many prophets and kings desired to see the things which you see, and didn't see them, and to hear the things which you hear, and didn't hear them."""
M be loo aè rlaèa mú laèa blúr. Baná weèe ku fa mú nfeè' moè' yu'shi blaèa anaè.	I wish that you would bear with me in a little foolishness, but indeed you do bear with me.
Weèr aè ka' tuu roâ aè ñgoâñ Sïìlesïìyaè ba aè ñgoâñ Paèmfilïìyaè a du a ba' aè rla' Miraè aè ñgoâñ Lishaè.	When we had sailed across the sea which is off Cilicia and Pamphylia, we came to Myra, a city of Lycia.
Rbì rler rli sɛɛ.	Our kola nut is slimy.
Btar boo, weèe fa geèe tá ntee yi ce yañ boo wee ka'. Weèe yá'ni woweèe, cep woweèe aè njáèá njïì ce Tata Jisoès koèñ.	You fathers, don't provoke your children to wrath, but nurture them in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
Wer à yɛ nè mer mmir.	We saw it ourselves.
A m maè'shi ená mñguu vi yú beèe ca ka'. A m laèa ená vi fa beèe ca ba ñgá' aè mñwáá taê. Ñgá' anaè aè m ba aèmboè njáèá ryañ ce ñwáè ce nyobsaa aè ta e ke yu' naè.	They were given power not to kill them, but to torment them for five months. Their torment was like the torment of a scorpion, when it strikes a person.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, buu ca wááwá vi koni tá yuu ce ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m sañ yi bo ghááte njo.” Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu wááwá a ma' ye, a cañse.	"But all this has happened, that the Scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled."" Then all the disciples left him, and fled."
AÈ ce kwaè'shi wáná aède' m ke' laa neè yaè Ta tá e ku tuusi máè vi bcïìndap bkúr aèñgoo ka' a?	Or do you think that I couldn't ask my Father, and he would even now send me more than twelve legions of angels?
Rboâñtu li be ba neè ñwáè rfaè' ce yïì masaè aè ka' kúti, yá aèmboè e ce geèe li rfaè' aè njáâá wa'a.	Blessed is that servant whom his lord finds doing so when he comes.
Nyor aè m ba ku ba rlir, ñwáè aè m ba ce yu' buu ba neè ká? Nyor aè m ba ku ba tuè', ñwáè aè m ba ce yu' rúèú yuu ba neè ká?	If the whole body were an eye, where would the hearing be? If the whole were hearing, where would the smelling be?
“Máè geèe yoè beèe ce wáè m fa mba máâ mmboè efa múè beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a riñ wáè. Beèe anaè aè m ba yoè beèe, wáè fa woweèe neè máè. Woweèe a yu'ni neè wo blaèa.	I revealed your name to the people whom you have given me out of the world. They were yours, and you have given them to me. They have kept your word.
Weèe rïìñ wáá aèmboè weèr a m yá ñgá', beèe a jar neè weèr aè rla' Fileèpaêi. Ka' yi m ba wa'a, weèr aè m kur ntee aè ñger yeèr Nyúè a suñ weèe Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ce e loè ba ese ye, ka' beèe aè m ker ku jepsi weèr se wa'a.	but having suffered before and been shamefully treated, as you know, at Philippi, we grew bold in our God to tell you the Good News of God in much conflict.
AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' máè m vúè yá weèe naè, weèe aè lu'shïì seê. Yuu ce yi koni seè'ni aè koni ká? Máè rïìñ máná aè m ba mbe nfeè' anaè, weèe aè koñ máè seê. A m ba laa mbe nfeè' anaè ená ñwáè co'ni mmir enje tuè fa neè máè, ñgaèñ aè m ba kuè geèe wa'a.	What was the blessing you enjoyed? For I testify to you that, if possible, you would have plucked out your eyes and given them to me.
Yuu ce aède' yi gee weèe riñ Yú' Nyúè yi yu ená, yú' wááwá ce yi byemi ená Jisos Kraâis aè m beèeñger aè ñwáè, a vú njep ñgoèñ, yi loè ese Nyúè.	By this you know the Spirit of God: every spirit who confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God,
