“Waè' viseèe mncir vi byemi ená a sa' mnsa' ñwáè, fa ñgaèñ aè shañ, ce a be ká' a yu' yuu ce ñgaèñ aè laèa ka' a?”	Does our law judge a man, unless it first hears from him personally and knows what he does?
Weèr aè natïì a ce duè, túè' aè ka' raa weèr aè ba' a ce yá rla' Kiyoès nje weâr cuèu. Túè' moè' aè ka' raa, weèr aè ba' aè rla' Samoès. Túè' moè' aè ka' keèr raa weèr aè ba' aè rla' Milátoès.	Sailing from there, we came the following day opposite Chios. The next day we touched at Samos and stayed at Trogyllium, and the day after we came to Miletus.
Mbuèu moè' ker ba aègho neè má aè rsañ neè weèe kuu rfa ce weèe aè ba fa tá a bo jaè' beèe Nyúè aègho naè ka'.	It is indeed unnecessary for me to write to you concerning the service to the saints,
Bzhee bvi yaa ye lùuni sê.	Her crops have produced much this year.
Mɛrì à yuu cɛ̀ fii zhi zhiʼ ye.	Mary bought a new dress but it could not fit her.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè keñ aè duè neè yi yu aènjïìsaèp seê, mdip mi ce ko' mbekïì ce suèu, a ce túú nyor nje keñ njobeè' fu' yi m ce caèa magoèr.	But the boat was now in the middle of the sea, distressed by the waves, for the wind was contrary.
E duê, a táá mbenduè njeñwáè anaè a laêa, mbáp anaè aè bornïì. Nfeè' aè ke' tuuse ka', njeñwáè anaè natïì mbekïì a fár byee a fa neè woweèe.	He stood over her, and rebuked the fever; and it left her. Immediately she rose up and served them.
Ndoèo aè co' ñgoèñ njobeè' buu yu njep ñgoèñ ce vi ke geèe beèe a ce geèe buu bbebep. Buu ca vi be kuè ce ba. Ka' yi yu wa'a, ndoèo be co' ñwáè ce buu ca vi be vúè njo' ye.	"Woe to the world because of occasions of stumbling! For it must be that the occasions come, but woe to that person through whom the occasion comes!
Matthew	Matïìyoè	18	8	Yo bo káè yo kuèu áè, yi ka' gee wáè, aè gee yuu bebep, aè tee ma'. Yi yu aèndeèe ená aè niñ mbe dïû' rcu ce nfeseè, buu bo káè kuèu áè, neè ce ená a ke koo wáè maè' njep mor ce aède' yi liitïì ka'.	If your hand or your foot causes you to stumble, cut it off, and cast it from you. It is better for you to enter into life maimed or crippled, rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into the eternal fire.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	18	9	Lo rlir li ka' gee wáè, aè gee yuu bebep, aè so'nïì enje tuè, ma'. Yi yu aèndeèe ená aè ba ntoè' rlir, niñ mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè neè ce ená aè túr mmir mmbaa, tá a ke koo wáè maè' njep beè'teè ñgá' mor.	If your eye causes you to stumble, pluck it out, and cast it from you. It is better for you to enter into life with one eye, rather than having two eyes to be cast into the Gehenna of fire.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	18	10	“Yá neè ená weèe fa loèr moè' efa boo bká' ca aè yuu cicïì ka'. M ce suñ weèe máná wap bcïìndap ce a yu mbe buèu, a ke kuâ ba aè bsii yaè Ta ce e yu mbe buèu aè nfeè' sïìp.	See that you don't despise one of these little ones, for I tell you that in heaven their angels always see the face of my Father who is in heaven.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	18	11	[Muu Ñwáè aè m vúè aè rgeèe tá beèe ce a m bú, a luêñ.]	For the Son of Man came to save that which was lost.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	18	12	Weèe ce kwaè'shi wee ká? Ñwáè aè ka' túr njeèe rjeèe, moè' da' bú, mboè e be maè'shi yïû ncoèp-búè'ú-aè-mmbúè'ú aè rtuèu duè roèo yïì ce e daè' na a?	What do you think? If a man has one hundred sheep, and one of them goes astray, doesn't he leave the ninety-nine, go to the mountains, and seek that which has gone astray?"
Baná ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè ye, e luèñ efa mnsa'. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá byemi neè ye ka', baná ñgaèñ aè gweè mnsa' njobeè' e kani efa rbyemi neè Muu yïì ce e ku ba moè'sir.	He who believes in him is not judged. He who doesn't believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the one and only Son of God.
Ñwáâ ñgoèr moè' aè m ba aè múè Juês, a too ye ená Nïìkoèdámoès. E m ba moè' efa múè beèe Farïìsïî.	Now there was a man of the Pharisees named Nicodemus, a ruler of the Jews.
AÈ ba neètú', Nyúè ce e túr máè, ce máâ ke loo neè ye, aè tuusïì yïì ncïìndap, e vú a táá a máâ geñ,	For there stood by me this night an angel, belonging to the God whose I am and whom I serve,
E ka' laèa wa'a, woweèe a doo bkeñ a du aègho aè waâa roè, a ma'shi buu wááwá a du a yeâ mbuèu.	When they had brought their boats to land, they left everything, and followed him.
Ñwáè e ke cep ntuu Nyúè, yi ja' beèe, fa beèe ñger, ker gee mntee beèe vi fúteè.	But he who prophesies speaks to men for their edification, exhortation, and consolation.
E ke toosi làa sê.	He twists his tongue too much.
M ̀ be kàa baa mbe ŋgòʼ.	I will grind corn roughly on the grinding stone.
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “AÈ laèa yo cuèu. M ce suñ weèe wááwá máná ká' e seè'ni na, weèe be yá Muu Ñwáè aèmboè e cu aè rkoo maè' Nyúè ce e túr ñger wááwá, keèr yá foñ aèmboè e ce suèu mbenduè mmbaè' embe buèu.”	"Jesus said to him, ""You have said it. Nevertheless, I tell you, after this you will see the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of Power, and coming on the clouds of the sky."""
Boo waê, m ce sañ ñwaè' ca neè weèe faè dïì' weèe bo geèe buu bbebep ka'. Geewa'a yi ka' koni ená ñwáè moè' aè geèe yuu bebep, weèe yi ená seèe túr ñwáè njaè' beèe aègee Taèr. Ñwáè anaè yu Jisos Kraâis ce yu ñwáâ nyáánïì.	My little children, I write these things to you so that you may not sin. If anyone sins, we have a Counselor with the Father, Jesus Christ, the righteous.
A ke rïìñ ce neè mbaèñ ce anaè. AÈde' ñwáè kú rbïì embe ráp ka', káè leèemú embe rgúè ka'.	For each tree is known by its own fruit. For people don't gather figs from thorns, nor do they gather grapes from a bramble bush.
Sáèra ye ye aè m ce yu'ni neè Abraèhaêm, a ce yoèñ ye ená yïì masaè. Weèe yu boo vi ce weèe aè ka' ce geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ, ke' ce wáp yuu mo' ka'.	as Sarah obeyed Abraham, calling him lord, whose children you now are, if you do well, and are not put in fear by any terror.
E m kwe mbe kïìntaa, a gee seèe Nyúè weèe aè kútïì aèbee. E m geèe mmbaèni anaè yi mïî,	and might reconcile them both in one body to God through the cross, having killed the hostility thereby.
Ca yi m geèe Pol ba Baènabaès a ba aè yuu yi mo'sir a woweèe ka' koo múcaèr, a sár nsár a woweèe. Yi ka' ba wa'a, ñgaâa cor a ce Pol ba Baènabaès, ba beèe mo', ená a du aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, yá ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès ba btu embe cor ená a woweèe a seesi yuu ce a be geèe.	Therefore when Paul and Barnabas had no small discord and discussion with them, they appointed Paul and Barnabas, and some others of them, to go up to Jerusalem to the apostles and elders about this question.
Weèr ce loo foñ ená Nyúè lor yi ñger ce yi caèa buu wááwá gee tá weèe túr ntee tatap, ka' aè ka' ba ba ká, tá weèe bo kur ntee, táá tatap keèr ce lu'shi,	strengthened with all power, according to the might of his glory, for all endurance and perseverance with joy;
Cena a ñgá' entombïì efa mñgá' ce vi be koni. Mñgá' ce vi bii ka' koni vi báti vi bbaa.	The first woe is past. Behold, there are still two woes coming after this.
Tee nyàa anà àgho.	Cut that meat with it.
M ka' ce yoèñshi Nyúè aè byee ce m ce ye, beèe mo' a laa bebep aèmboè máè aè njáâá ká?”	If I partake with thankfulness, why am I denounced for that for which I give thanks?
Buu ca vi m koni tá yi bo ghááte aèmboè a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “A be keè kep yi vúp mo' ka'.”	"For these things happened, that the Scripture might be fulfilled, ""A bone of him will not be broken."""
Ñwáè rfaè' ce e ka' riñ yuu ce yïì masaè ce koèñ, ke' tami nyor, gee yuu ce yïì masaè ce koèñ ka', baná a be lïìp ye neè mñgwaèa aèñgoo.	That servant, who knew his lord's will, and didn't prepare, nor do what he wanted, will be beaten with many stripes,
Pol aè ka' káè' ce suñ aèmboè ñgeâe yáánïì ba aèmboè aède' ñwáè kur ntee ker ba aèmboè noèñ mnsa' Nyúè, Fálïìs aè wáêp, a laa enáê, “Wáè laèa yi gháá seè'ni. Duè yo yu. M be koni fáñ tá m ka' keèr tuu beèe tá a vú neè wáè.”	"As he reasoned about righteousness, self-control, and the judgment to come, Felix was terrified, and answered, ""Go your way for this time, and when it is convenient for me, I will summon you."""
Jisoès aè laa enáê, “Wee weèe aè be riñ buu foñ ka' a?	"So Jesus said, ""Do you also still not understand?"
Nyúè aè m geèe ye e ba yáánïì seê, a ba seè'ni na ba ñwáè ce e ce fa ryoèñ ce nfeseè neè beèe ce a ce yu'ni neè ye.	Having been made perfect, he became to all of those who obey him the author of eternal salvation,
Joân aè beesïì a laa enáê, “AÈtaè ñwáè túr yuu mo' caa efa yïì ce Nyúè aè fa neè ye ka'.	"John answered, ""A man can receive nothing, unless it has been given him from heaven."
Beèe Farïìsi mo' a vú a mooshi ye, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Ncir yi byemi ená ñwáè juu ñgwa yïì ka' aètu ká a?”	"Pharisees came to him, testing him, and saying, ""Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife for any reason?"""
Weèe aè fa beèe ce a geèe faèa ka' aè ñgá', a yúshi woweèe, woweèe a ke' gee yuu mo' ka'.	You have condemned, you have murdered the righteous one. He doesn't resist you.
Anaès aè laêa, a lor ye aèmboè a m kur naè, a duè aègho, a yá Kaifaès ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì.	Annas sent him bound to Caiaphas, the high priest.
A m yuu weèe ba neè bláá Kraâis ce vi luèu ntaa seê, a ba aèmboè bláá fuâu njeèe tañshïì ce yi yu yáánïì, já' yi ba aègho ka'.	but with precious blood, as of a faultless and pure lamb, the blood of Christ;
Pol aè m cu mbe ndaèp aè bfeâ' bbaa a ce laè' ndap anaè. E m ce koni beèe wááwá ce a m ce vúè aè ryá ye.	Paul stayed two whole years in his own rented house, and received all who were coming to him,
Ncïìndap Nyúè anaè aè cenïì gráâp enjep ñgoèñ na wááwá neè saè', a ma' njep beè'teè tá a bo nyáèñ tá mdip mi fúú enjo. Rnyáèñ efa gho anaè li táá aètu rshentee Nyúè.	The angel thrust his sickle into the earth, and gathered the vintage of the earth, and threw it into the great winepress of the wrath of God.
AÈde' m ker naatu aè yuu jáá caa efa rfaè' ce máè geèe aè ñger Kraâis aè múè beèe enje jáá ka'. Woweèe a ce yu'ni neè Kraâis njo' buu ce máè laèa ker ba buu ce máè geèe.	For I will not dare to speak of any things except those which Christ worked through me, for the obedience of the Gentiles, by word and deed,
M ka' tá yu' li ce ñwáè ce laèa ka', baná ñgaèñ yu ñwáè nfuu neè máè, má máè aè ba ñwáè nfuu neè ye.	If then I don't know the meaning of the sound, I would be to him who speaks a foreigner, and he who speaks would be a foreigner to me.
Taantoʼ yu ŋkʉ̀.	Tanto is a bachelor.
E zhe lèʼ enɛ e be kèr gèe kaʼ.	He has vowed that he will not do it again.
Beèe magoèr a m vúè a yá ye aèfo, a ká' a ce laèa enáê, “Joân aè m geèe yuu mo' aè rduèñshi ená aè m tuu ba Nyúè a tuu ye ka'. Ka' yi yu wa'a, buu ce Joân aè m laèa aèmboè ñwáè ca vi yu mini.”	"Many came to him. They said, ""John indeed did no sign, but everything that John said about this man is true."""
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè buu ce beèe a be baè'ri ndap anaè aègho, beèe mo' a be baè'ri neè bco' ce a too ená guêl, ba bco' ce a too ená silvaè, ba bluèr ce vi luèu ntaa seê. Beèe mo' a be baè'ri yap neè mntaañguu ba bvúp msañ, ba bbuu.	But if anyone builds on the foundation with gold, silver, costly stones, wood, hay, or stubble;
Ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè máè aèmboè Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi laèa, baná mdip ce mi ke fa beèe ryoèñ mi be fúú enje yeâ nyoèr goèr seê.”	"He who believes in me, as the Scripture has said, from within him will flow rivers of living water."""
Yá ka neè aèmboè Nyúè ce geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ neè beèe mo', a ker ce jar neè beèe moè'. E ce jar neè beèe ce a gweè, a ce geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ neè weèe, ce weèe aè ka' ku ce jáèr ba njep yi nduunjïì. Yi ka' tá ba wa' ka' baná e be faèr weèe foñ.	See then the goodness and severity of God. Toward those who fell, severity; but toward you, goodness, if you continue in his goodness; otherwise you also will be cut off.
Laèa ba blaâa bboèñboñ ce aède' ñwáè moè' jaasïì ka', tá rïìtu yi bo koo beèe ce a kani liseèe rfaè'. Rïìtu yi be koo woweèe njobeè' woweèe a yá yuu bebep ce aède' a suñ aèmboè seèe ka'.	and soundness of speech that can't be condemned; that he who opposes you may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say about us.
E gwè embe ce a kwe kaʼ, seemòʼ e yu ŋwɛ̀ rbʉ̀.	She fell from the tree and didnʼt die, maybe she is a witch.
Beèe a m báèáñger seê, a ce laèa enáê, “E geèe buu wááwá yáánïì; e geèe mnfuñtuè' a ce yu' buu, blúr a ce laèa.”	"They were astonished beyond measure, saying, ""He has done all things well. He makes even the deaf hear, and the mute speak!"""
Ndàmbàʼ yu nè ye ba à ncʉʼ.	Tobacco to him is a strong habit.
Jisoès aè ka' laèa wa'a, bfúr a ká' a ce suñ ená ñwáè yá'ni yïì buu ce Jisoès aè m koèñ ye goèr naè be keè lá kwe ka'. Jisoès aè m banïì laa ba ená e be keè kwe ka' ka'. E m banïì laa ba enáê, “M ka' koñ ená e ku cu nteèe caar tá m ke kúti, yo enjo ba ká? Vúè yo ba fa máâ mbuèu.”	"This saying therefore went out among the brothers, that this disciple wouldn't die. Yet Jesus didn't say to him that he wouldn't die, but, ""If I desire that he stay until I come, what is that to you?"""
E lɛ̀ mbàa njep bàa.	He has put money in the bag.
Ŋgàa ncir a kaʼ koo wɛ̀, à borsì nyor tɛ a du nè wɛ̀ fàdìʼ ce woowèe a kòŋ.	If police men arrest you, calm down and let them take you where they want to.
Tetèr à barni mɛ̀ à cɛ̀ʼ.	A caterpillar has stuck on my dress.
A m fa ñger ená nyaèa ca ma' bïìr a beèe Nyúè, so woweèe. A m ker fa ñger ená e sa' beèe ce a ce laèa bli jáá jáèá jáá, a ce cu aè mntáè' ce vi yu aè bto' wááwá enjep ñgoèñ na.	It was given to him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them. Authority over every tribe, people, language, and nation was given to him.
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès ker ba btu embe cor ba cor wááwá, a yá ená yi yu boèñboñ aè rce beèe moè' efa waâp mú, tá a bo tuu woweèe a Pol weèe aè rla' Antïìyoèk. Woweèe a m ce Judaès ce li rlii mo' li m ba ená Baèsabaès, ker ba Silaès. Woweèe a m ba boo mlii aè mú bfúr.	Then it seemed good to the apostles and the elders, with the whole assembly, to choose men out of their company, and send them to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas: Judas called Barsabbas, and Silas, chief men among the brothers.
M ce suñ weèe ená AÈlajaè aè vúè wáá, beèe a rïìñ ye ka', a ku ce geèe buu ce a m ce koèñ aè rgeèe neè ye. Yi yu ená Muu Ñwáè ye ye be yá ñgá' mbe waâp mmboè.”	"but I tell you that Elijah has come already, and they didn't recognize him, but did to him whatever they wanted to. Even so the Son of Man will also suffer by them."""
Wáè geèe woweèe a ba beèe ce aè ce sa' woweèe aè yaèp ñkúú, a ker gee woweèe a ba ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì tá a bo faè' neè Nyúè. Woweèe a be sa' beèe enjep ñgoèñ na.”	"and made us kings and priests to our God, and we will reign on earth."""
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè mncir ce Musïìs aè m vúè aègho naè, ñwáè aè m ka' bú' mncir anaè, beèe a mntaar káè beèe a mmbaa áè, a m ka' táá njïìnsa' ená a yá ñgaèñ aè gee yuu ce ncir yi kani, baná a be koosimnse efa ryú ñwáè anaè ka'.	A man who disregards Moses' law dies without compassion on the word of two or three witnesses.
Ñwáè ce e ka' ce koèñ aè rgeèe ba yuu ce Nyúè ce koèñ, baná ñgaèñ be rïìñ ená yuu ce m ce yá'ni yi loè ba ese Nyúè, káè m ce laèa ba aè ya ñger lá.	If anyone desires to do his will, he will know about the teaching, whether it is from God, or if I am speaking from myself.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè seèe, Yú' Rara yi geèe seèe aè ce keè' ba ená Nyúè be loèr seèe aèmboè beâe byáánïì a yeâ bsii njobeè' seèe aè byemi neè Jisos Kraêis.	For we, through the Spirit, by faith wait for the hope of righteousness.
Joân aè m ba neè laa neè Hároèd enáê, “Ncir yi byemi ená aè fap ñgwa nfúroè, beesi aè yoè ka'.”	"For John said to him, ""It is not lawful for you to have her."""
Beèe ce a m yúshi yoè beèe a ker yúshi yo ñgaâa ncep ntuu, bláá vi láñ naè, a beèe ce wáè fa bláá neè woweèe ená a no. Yu beèe ce a ba no bláá anaè ghup.”	"For they poured out the blood of the saints and the prophets, and you have given them blood to drink. They deserve this."""
aèmboè aè bfeè' mjeèe kyeèe ba nto'. AÈ ka' ba embenjïì ca, e fa woweèe ñgaâa nsa' mnsa', woweèe a sa' caar a ba' mbe nfeè' yïì Saâmwáèl ce e m ba ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè.	After these things he gave them judges until Samuel the prophet.
Musïìs aè m geèe rfaè' neè beèe Nyúè neè mini-ñwáè. E m geèe rfaè' ca wa'a a ku ba ba ñwáè rfaè' neè Nyúè. Li rfaè' anaè li m táá ba aètu yuu ce Nyúè aè m bii ka' geèe tá beèe a rïîñ.	Moses indeed was faithful in all his house as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were afterward to be spoken,
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè neè ntee tú' wa'a, Pol ba Silaès a ce geèe rloo a ce yáá byáá neè Nyúè, ñgaâa shañ a cu a ce yu'shi.	But about midnight Paul and Silas were praying and singing hymns to God, and the prisoners were listening to them.
Weèr aè ka' ce yááti aèmboè beèe ce btu vi ce kar embo wa'a, baná weèr yu wa'a njo' Nyúè. Weèr aè ka' ba beèe ce yap tu yi yu mbo, baná weèr yu wa'a njo' weèe.	For if we are beside ourselves, it is for God. Or if we are of sober mind, it is for you.
E mɛ̀r ŋgar njoʼ e ba koŋ à rmà kaʼ.	He has set back the gun because he did not want to shoot.
E ba ba à rvʉ̀ kaʼ, e ku vʉ njobèʼ mɛ̀ làa enɛ e vʉ̂.	He wouldnʼt have come, he has just come because I said he should come.
a ce laèa enáê, “Yi yu wa'a. Nyúè a ñwáè ce beèe a ba yoèñshi, kuè'si. E yu ñwáè ce e túr bfee wááwá. Beèe a ba yoèñshi ye aè nfeè' wááwá, yu'ni neè ye, keèr rïìñ ená e túr ñger wááwá. Yi yu wa'a.”	"saying, ""Amen! Blessing, glory, wisdom, thanksgiving, honor, power, and might, be to our God forever and ever! Amen."""
Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè moè' yu ñwáâ nyáánïì aè bsii Nyúè ka', ka' ñwáè moè'sir.	"As it is written, ""There is no one righteous; no, not one."
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè máná ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè Nyúè, ke' ce tarni ka', e ka' laa neè rtuèu ca enáê, ‘Rtuèu caê, co'ti embo naè, du gwe njep rdip rgoèr’, baná yi be kuè ba wa'a.	For most certainly I tell you, whoever may tell this mountain, 'Be taken up and cast into the sea,' and doesn't doubt in his heart, but believes that what he says is happening; he shall have whatever he says.
Weèe aè ka' du niñ aè rla' mo', káè yu mbe lïû fá áè, beâe aèfo a ka' koni weèe, weèe ye yuu ce a ka' fa weèe.	Into whatever city you enter, and they receive you, eat the things that are set before you.
Ma kúr Jus a ka' yu' ená Jisoès yu aè rla' anaè, a natïì a vúê. Woweèe a m vúè tá a bo kuè yá ba Jisoès caè'caè' ka', a m koèñ foñ aè ryá Lasoèroès ce Jisoès aè m fúr efa rkwe naè.	A large crowd therefore of the Jews learned that he was there, and they came, not for Jesus' sake only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he had raised from the dead.
Nyúè aè ka' kuèu ñgoèñ, túè' aè sii caar a ba' aè nyúè taar.	It was now about the sixth hour, and darkness came over the whole land until the ninth hour.
Nyúè ce e yu Taèr neè beèe wááwá aè ba moè'sir foñ. Yu ye ce e túr ñger mbenduè beèe wááwá, aè ba ye ce e loèr beèe wááwá a ce geèe mi mfaè' aègho, a ker ba foñ njep beèe wááwá.	one God and Father of all, who is over all, and through all, and in us all.
Mboè bjar vi wááwá a ce cu aèfa seèe woweèe a? Baná ñwáè ca aè geèe bfee ca ba ñger ca efá?”	"Aren't all of his sisters with us? Where then did this man get all of these things?"""
“M ce koosimnse neè beèe ca seê, weèr woweèe aè cu aè mnoâñ btaar, woweèe a ke' koni yuu ye ka'.	"I have compassion on the multitude, because they have stayed with me now three days, and have nothing to eat.
Mark	Maêk	8	3	M ka' kúsi woweèe aè mlaè' neè njeè, woweèe a du gwe njeè aè nduunjïì. Weèe mo' efa waâp mú a vúè efa njïìsaèp seê.”	If I send them away fasting to their home, they will faint on the way, for some of them have come a long way."
Ñwáè wááwá be kuè fúú efa rkwe aè nfeè' ce Nyúè aè lá. Jisos Kraâis a ñwáè ce e m fúú efa rkwe entombïì. Be keè ba aè nfeè' ce Jisos Kraâis aè kúti naè, tá yïì beèe a fúú efa rkwe.	But each in his own order: Christ the first fruits, then those who are Christ's, at his coming.
Wèr à yɛ àmbò Nfò ce dòo mutù, wèr à ba nè rghaʼnì ŋwɛ̀.	When we saw Nfor driving a car, we were surprised.
Nyúè aè m túr ntee boèñboñ neè weèr, a fa weèr rfaè' ená weèr gee buu ca neè beèe. Yi ka' ba wa'a, weèr aè ce geèe li, a ke' ce koosi bsáè ka'.	Therefore seeing we have this ministry, even as we obtained mercy, we don't faint.
Weèe rïìñ weená byepkúú a m ba aè to' Isráèl aè nfeè' yïì AÈlajaè seê, mbe nfeè' ce mbeèñ aè m gweè ka' aè bfeâ' btaar ba nto', njeè aè koo aè bdïì' wááwá aè ñgoâñ Isráèl aè nfeè' anaè naè.	But truly I tell you, there were many widows in Israel in the days of Elijah, when the sky was shut up three years and six months, when a great famine came over all the land.
Ka' m yu ñwáâ ñká' efa múè beèe Nyúè wa'a, e fa máè rfaè' ca ená m fe'shi neè beèe enje jáá wááwá, suñ woweèe buu bboèñboñ ce vi loè ese Kraêis, ce yu buu ce aède' ñwáè riñ ka'.	To me, the very least of all saints, was this grace given, to preach to the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ,
a bipshi neè woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè ca yu muu weèe a? Yi yu mini ená e m feèp ká' embe nfeè' a m bi ye a? E geèe eká a ka' ce yá buu?”	"and asked them, ""Is this your son, who you say was born blind? How then does he now see?"""
Baná wáâ ñwáè ce aè ce sa' beèe mo', mboè wáè rïìñ wáná aède' aè fúr yo tu efa mnsa' Nyúè ka' a? Wáè ka' laèa ená woweèe a geèe buu bbebep, baná wáè ce sa' yoè nyor foñ njobeè' wáè ku ce geèe ba njáèá buu ce woweèe a ce geèe.	Therefore you are without excuse, O man, whoever you are who judge. For in that which you judge another, you condemn yourself. For you who judge practice the same things.
A yuu ce m ce suñ weèe yuu mini, weèe aè ce byemi neè máè ka'.	But because I tell the truth, you don't believe me.
E m fuñ wa' aè mnoèñ aèñgoo, ntee yi yañ Poêl, e karsïì nyor a ke' ye, a laa neè yú' ce yi m ba njep ye anaè enáê, “M ce laèa neè wáè aè rlii Jisos Kraâis ená aè fúú enjep ye.” E ka' laèa wa'a, yú' anaè yi ku fúú aè nfeè' anaè.	"She was doing this for many days. But Paul, becoming greatly annoyed, turned and said to the spirit, ""I command you in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her!"" It came out that very hour."
Bfúr weêr, baná weèe fúr mmbañruè saèambaê, efa weâe mú ce yap ñgeèe yi yu yáánïì, woweèe a ruusïì neè Yú' Rara, a ker riñ buu, tá weèr bo fa rfaè' ca mbe waâp mmboè,	Therefore select from among you, brothers, seven men of good report, full of the Holy Spirit and of wisdom, whom we may appoint over this business.
Túè' aè ka' raa, Joân aè yá aèmboè Jisoès ce vúè aè ryá ye, a laa enáê, “Yá neè Muu Njeèe Nyúè ce e be siñsi buu bbebep enjep ñgoèñ.	"The next day, he saw Jesus coming to him, and said, ""Behold, the Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world!"
Jus a vú a sir ye a kaari a tarte, a laa neè ye enáê, “Weèr be keè' duè baè' ba fá, tá aè ka' suñ weèr njáèá ñwáè ce aè yu? Wáè ka' ba Kraêis, ce yu ñwáè rjaè' ce Nyúè aè m kaè'ni ená e be tuu naè, aè suñ weèr rara.”	"The Jews therefore came around him and said to him, ""How long will you hold us in suspense? If you are the Christ, tell us plainly."""
E ka' ye, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Buu ca yu buu ce máè m suñ weèe aè nfeè' ce máè m ku bii weèe seèe naè. Máè m laèa máná buu wááwá ce a sañ aèmboè máè mbe ñwaâ' mncir Musïìs, ba mbe mñwaâ' ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, ker ba mbe mñwaâ' byáá vi be kuè ghááte njo.”	"He said to them, ""This is what I told you, while I was still with you, that all things which are written in the law of Moses, the prophets, and the psalms, concerning me must be fulfilled."""
E m geèe wa'a tá beèe a bo roèo ye, ce ghaèashi ená káè seemoè' a be yá ye lá. Geewa'a, Nyúè yu aènjïìsaèp ese ñwáè moè' efa seèe ka'.	that they should seek the Lord, if perhaps they might reach out for him and find him, though he is not far from each one of us.
Baná aè rgeèe tá weèe bo rïìñ ená Muu Ñwáè túr ñger njep ñgoèñ aè rfoèosi beèe efa yaèp buu bbebep.” E laa neè ñwáè yañ ca enáê, “Naèti mbekïì, lor yo keèñ, du aè laè'.”	"But that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins..."" (then he said to the paralytic), ""Get up, and take up your mat, and go up to your house."""
M ce loo máná Tata Jisos Kraâis túr weèe a ntee boèñboñ.	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
M ku ce koèñ aè rtuu bfúr ca neè weèe tá naèatu ce weèr ce naèa neè weèe naè bo bú aè cicïì ka'. M ce tuu woweèe tá weèe bo tami nyor aèmboè máè m laèa naè,	But I have sent the brothers that our boasting on your behalf may not be in vain in this respect, that, just as I said, you may be prepared,
Woweèe a suñ ñgaâa cor aèmboè lo rkoèñnïì. Be ba yuu boèñboñ ce wáè ka' daasi woweèe aè njáèá njïì ce e yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè.	They have testified about your love before the assembly. You will do well to send them forward on their journey in a way worthy of God,
Woweèe a naètïû aè ncuâu nsheè cárcár seê, neè bwáp-ñwáè ker ba neè rlu'shïì- ñwáè, a cañ a du aè rsuñ ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu.	They departed quickly from the tomb with fear and great joy, and ran to bring his disciples word.
Nyor aè bep Jisoès aè ryá njáèá nteèe-tu ca. E fyá' woweèe aè rshentee, a laa neè ñwáè yañ caè enáê, “Maè' lo rkoo kuèyáá.” E ma', li kútïì boèñboñ.	"When he had looked around at them with anger, being grieved at the hardening of their hearts, he said to the man, ""Stretch out your hand."" He stretched it out, and his hand was restored as healthy as the other."
E m ker laa neè woweèe enáê, “To' yi be maè' bïìr a to' mo', tá ñkúú moè' ma' bïìr a moè'.	"Then he said to them, ""Nation will rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom."
Weèr ce sañ neè weèe ce weèe yu beèe ce Nyúè aè ce, a ce cu aè rla' Koèlosïì, weèe Jisoès weèe aè ba aèbee, weèe aè ce duè a yeâ mbuèu neè ntee mo'sir. Weèr ce loo neè Nyúè ce e yu yeèr ta ená e túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, ker fa weèe cumúnyañ.	to the saints and faithful brothers in Christ at Colossae: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Mnoèñ vi ka' caèa ntuunfu, Jisoès aè lor Pitaè ba Jáêms, ker ba Joân, a ko' a woweèe mbe rtuâu rsaèsap, aè ku ba woweèe mbo caè'caè'. A m baè' mbo, Jisoès aè kupseè a ba aè njáâá jáá.	After six days Jesus took with him Peter, James, and John, and brought them up onto a high mountain privately by themselves, and he was changed into another form in front of them.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Wa byee yu ená m gee yuu ce Nyúè ce e m tuu máè koèñ, ker misi rfaè' ce e m fa neè máè.	"Jesus said to them, ""My food is to do the will of him who sent me, and to accomplish his work."
aè fe'shi blaâa Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá, káè yu aè nfeâ' mbembep áè, káè yu a nfeâ' mboèñmboñ áè, geèe tá woweèe a riñ yaèp buu bbebep, lapni woweèe, fa woweèe ñger, yá'ni woweèe neè ntee múfáèá.	preach the word; be urgent in season and out of season; reprove, rebuke, and exhort, with all patience and teaching.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “M yu byee ce e aè ryoèñ. Ñwáè ce e ka' vú yá máè, aède' njeè ker yañ ye ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè máè aède' ntee yi ker yuushi ye ka'.	"Jesus said to them, ""I am the bread of life. He who comes to me will not be hungry, and he who believes in me will never be thirsty."
Yú' anaè yi waa, e ker gwe kaè', yi fúú enjep ye, e noñ aèmboè gúèú ñwáè wa'a. Weèe mo' a ce laèa ená e kwe.	"Having cried out, and convulsed greatly, it came out of him. The boy became like one dead; so much that most of them said, ""He is dead."""
Buu moè' ce Jisoès aè m geèe vi yu goèr seê. A m ba sañ buu ca wááwá, m kwaè' máná ñgoèñ ca yi m ba túr dïì' aè rláè mñwaè' ce a sañ buu anaè mbo ka'.	There are also many other things which Jesus did, which if they would all be written, I suppose that even the world itself wouldn't have room for the books that would be written.
Ku' beèe ce a m ba aèfo ker ba ñgaâa kansuèr a ka' yu', ntee yi fúú woweèe.	The multitude and the rulers of the city were troubled when they heard these things.
Nyúè yu mini. Yu ye ce e ká' weèe ená weèe bo ba aèbee weèe muu yïì ce Jisos Kraâis ce e yu Tata neè seèe.	God is faithful, through whom you were called into the fellowship of his Son, Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Pol weèe a m loèr nfeè' a cu aèfo a ce feè'shi aèmboè Tataê, neè ntee-ñwáè. Tata aè m fa woweèe ñger, woweèe a duñshïì mncoèo, a gee buu bbáèá aè rduèñshi ená yuu ce woweèe a m ce feè'shi aèmboè rboâñ Nyúè yi yu mini.	Therefore they stayed there a long time, speaking boldly in the Lord, who testified to the word of his grace, granting signs and wonders to be done by their hands.
Máè yá máná aède' seèe be'nïì ñgá' ce seèe ce yá seè'ni na aè foèo ce seèe be keè sa' na ka'.	For I consider that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which will be revealed toward us.
Kwaè'shi ka neè ená waè' yi yu yáánïì ená njeñwáè gee rloo neè Nyúè ce e señ rtaa mbe tuè ka' lá.	Judge for yourselves. Is it appropriate that a woman pray to God unveiled?
Mɛ̀ ba ce kèʼ wɛ̀ tɛ sò bo dù.	I was waiting for you so that we can go together.
Beèe embe ntáè' moè'sir ce a m fa woweèe ncoèo anaè a m ba ncúèkïì-ncoèp- baa-aè-rrúèú. Mntáè' anaè vi m ba aè njáèá enáê: ntáè' Judaè, ntáè' Rubáèn, ntáè' Gaêd,	of the tribe of Judah were sealed twelve thousand, of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand, of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand,
Beèe ca a ce laèa bebep aèmboè buu ce woweèe a rïìñ ka'. Woweèe a ce geèe ñgeèe blúr a ba aèmboè mnyaâa aè rïìñ ce beèe a ke koo, yú naè. Woweèe a be bepsi beèe mo' wa'a, bep foñ njep múè njáèá ñgeèe anaè, loè kwe bú aè cicïì.	But these, as unreasoning creatures, born natural animals to be taken and destroyed, speaking evil in matters about which they are ignorant, will in their destroying surely be destroyed,
Ñwáè ca yu ñwáè ce AÈsayaè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m laèa yuu a kuu ye. E m laèa enáê, “Ñwáè moè' ce fuñ aè ntee rïìñ a ce laèa enáê, ‘Kupshi neè nduunjïì neè Tataê, nashi tá yi ba kuèyáá.’ ”	"For this is he who was spoken of by Isaiah the prophet, saying, ""The voice of one crying in the wilderness, make ready the way of the Lord. Make his paths straight."""
Máè ka' keèr fyá' a yá ku' beèe ce aède' ñwáè be' ka'. Beèe anaè aè m ba beèe efa bto' jáá jáèá jáá, ba mntáè' jáá jáèá jáá, ce a m ce laèa bli jáá jáèá jáá enjep ñgoèñ na wáá. Woweèe a m táá kuèntombïì neè kaèbaèraè' ba Muu Njeèe, a yar bcáâ' bbúú, a túr bbaèp mtáá aè mmboè.	After these things I looked, and behold, a great multitude, which no man could number, out of every nation and of all tribes, peoples, and languages, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, dressed in white robes, with palm branches in their hands.
Jus a laa neè ye enáê, “Weèr rïìñ seè'ni werná yú' nyúèrkaè' yi yu njep wáè. To Abraèham aè m kwe, ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a kweñgeèr foñ. Wáè ka' ce laèa ená ñwáè aè ka' yu' yuu ce aè ce laèa ce geèe yi, rkwe li ke' joo ye ka' aè njáâá ká?	"Then the Jews said to him, ""Now we know that you have a demon. Abraham died, and the prophets; and you say, 'If a man keeps my word, he will never taste of death.'"
Rboâñtu li yu neè ñwáè ce e ce tarni máè tarni ka'.”	"Blessed is he who is not offended by me."""
Ŋkar zhìi à sòrti efa mnsaʼ cà.	His friend is free from that case.
E lor ndoñ, a yoñshi Nyúè, a fa neè woweèe, a laa enáê, “Ñwáè wááwá no mruè' enjep ndoñ na.	"He took the cup, gave thanks, and gave to them, saying, ""All of you drink it,"
Wee weèe foñ aè ba jaè' aè rloo neè weèr. Weèe aè ka' loo, baná beèe magoèr a be yoèñshi Nyúè njo' yuu boèñboñ ce Nyúè aè yu' miseèe mloo, a geèe neè weèr.	you also helping together on our behalf by your supplication; that, for the gift bestowed on us by means of many, thanks may be given by many persons on your behalf.
Baná weèr aè riñ neè mini-ñwáè ená blaèa ce ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m feè'shi naè vi yu mini njobeè' buu ce weèr aè yá neè mer mmir. Weèe aè ba yu' blaèa ca boèñboñ, njobeè' vi yu aèmboè lam ce e raa neètú', ku raa du baè' aè nfeè' ce túè' be raa naè. Be ba aè nfeè' ce mbeèr aè loè naè, tá weèe yá rraa njep weâe mntee.	We have the more sure word of prophecy; and you do well that you heed it, as to a lamp shining in a dark place, until the day dawns, and the morning star arises in your hearts:
Boo waê, weèe fa maè'shi tá ñwáè moè' bo' weèe ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' ce geèe yuu yáánïì, baná ñgaèñ yu ñwáâ nyáánïì aèmboè Kraâis yu ñwáè nyáánïì.	Little children, let no one lead you astray. He who does righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
Weèe rïìñ nfeè' ce Nyúè aè m láè mncir a duñshi yi foèo. E m sañ mncir mbe luâr mbáèmbár a fa neè Musïìs. E ka' ce vúè neè mncir ca, rraa Nyúè li raa a yeâ bsii seê, ce aède' beèe Isráèl a m ba fyá' neè mmir ka'. Ka' rraa anaè li m loè a ker ce raa aèmboè li m ce raa naè ka' wa'a. AÈmboè yi yu seè'ni ená rsa' rrúèú ce li m ce vúè ba neè rkwe li m ce duèñshi foèo Nyúè na,	But if the service of death, written engraved on stones, came with glory, so that the children of Israel could not look steadfastly on the face of Moses for the glory of his face; which was passing away:
Nsuñ mboèñmboñ moè' ce e yu mini ker ba aègho caa efa yïì máè m suñ weèe naè ka'. Beèe mo' a ce jepsi weèe, a ce koèñ ená a ba kupse nsuñ mboèñmboñ ce e yu aèmboè Jisos Kraêis.	"and there isn't another ""good news."" Only there are some who trouble you, and want to pervert the Good News of Christ."
E nyòʼ ye njep nshè.	He has pressed him on the ground.
Kúr beèe mo' ce a m ba aèfo a m yu' njeèndoñ anaè a laa ená mbeèñ aè wañger. Beèe mo' a laa yap ená ncïìndap Nyúè aè laèa yuu neè ye.	"The multitude therefore, who stood by and heard it, said that it had thundered. Others said, ""An angel has spoken to him."""
yi laa enáê, ‘M be kúti mbe ndaèp ce máè m fúú embo naè.’ Yi ce kúti, yá ndap anaè ba mboèmmbo, a yáêr, kupshi, e ce raa.	Then he says, 'I will return into my house from which I came out,' and when he has come back, he finds it empty, swept, and put in order.
Tàta à m̀ A ba muuŋkʉ kɛʼ à muuŋkɛʼ.	Tata was an orphan from childhood.
E tuŋ nshe nè soo.	She has dug the ground with a hoe.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “To a máè ce máè ce weèe beèe ncoèp-baa-aè- rrúèú? Ka' yi yu wa'a, moè' efa weâe mú yu nyúèrkaè'.”	"Jesus answered them, ""Didn't I choose you, the twelve, and one of you is a devil?"""
a waa, a laa enáê, “Jisoès, Muu Nyúè embe buèu, yuu ce soè túr a ká? M ce loo wáè aè rlii Nyúè ená aè fa fa máè ñgá' ka'.”	"and crying out with a loud voice, he said, ""What have I to do with you, Jesus, you Son of the Most High God? I adjure you by God, don't torment me."""
Mɛ̀ laa enɛ laŋ, wee ye vʉ bsip.	I have said that the two of you should come.
“E laèa wa'a njoká? E bepsi rlii Nyúè. Ñwáè ce aède' e foosïì beèe efa buu bbebep caa efa Nyúè, a nda?”	Why does this man speak blasphemies like that? Who can forgive sins but God alone?
Máè ka' duè neè ye mbo, a yá máná e m geèe yuu mo' ce aède' a m ba yú ye káè fa ye mbe shañ ka'. Yuu ce a m ce laèa aèmboè ye aè m ba ba buu ce a m ce bipshi neè ye kuu yap ncir.	I found him to be accused about questions of their law, but not to be charged with anything worthy of death or of imprisonment.
Nfúraè, m ce loo wáè aè rlii Tata máná aè ja' máè, gee yuu boèñboñ ca neè máè. Geèe wa' njobeè' Jisos Kraêis, tá ya ntee yi bo keèr tap.	Yes, brother, let me have joy from you in the Lord. Refresh my heart in the Lord.
Mɛ̀ lɛ̀ mrùʼ njoo.	I have kept wine inside.
AÈ ba aè nfeè' ce máè ba yu' aèmboè wáè caè'ni máè naè, muu enjep máâ rbúè aè karsïì nyor neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè.	For behold, when the voice of your greeting came into my ears, the baby leaped in my womb for joy!
Wèr à dù ba à cùu yoo.	We have considered your suggestion.
Mmbòʼ mi ke zhʉ ba à mŋwɛ̀ɛ.	Pumpkins bear but on creeping stems.
Seèe rïìñ ená aède' ñwáè ce e yu muu Nyúè ku ce geèe yuu bebep ka', njobeè' Muu Nyúè ce keè'ni ye. AÈtaè Sataèn joo ñgaèñ ka'.	We know that whoever is born of God doesn't sin, but he who was born of God keeps himself, and the evil one doesn't touch him.
Geewa'a aè m ba efa rkáè' Nyúè aè boo mbañruèñwáè ba njeñwáè.	But from the beginning of the creation, God made them male and female.
Beèe a m laèa neè Jisoès enáê, “Ñgaâa yá'ni buu Joân ba ñgaâa yá'ni buu beèe Farïìsi, a ke jïì mdip, ce geèe rloo aè nfeè' wááwá, geewa'a ñgaâa yá'ni yoè buu a ce yeñger yap ker ce no buu.”	"They said to him, ""Why do John's disciples often fast and pray, likewise also the disciples of the Pharisees, but yours eat and drink?"""
E laa neè beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba beèe ce a m ba btu neè beèe ce a m ce keè'ni Ndap Nyúè, ba bleebeèe ce a woweèe a m vúè aè rkoo ye naè enáê, “Weèe aè vúè aè rkoo máè neè bsaè' ba mmbaèñ aèmboè m yu lá nyáèá wa'a njoká?	"Jesus said to the chief priests, captains of the temple, and elders, who had come against him, ""Have you come out as against a robber, with swords and clubs?"
Bfúr viseèe ca a so ye njo' bláá Muu Njeèe ker ba njobeè' blaâa Nyúè ce woweèe a m ce suñ beèe. Woweèe a m tami nyor ená aè ka' ba rkwe baná woweèe a be kwe njo' Jisos Kraêis.	They overcame him because of the Lamb's blood, and because of the word of their testimony. They didn't love their life, even to death.
Bkar waê, yuu ce m ce sañ neè weèe ená weèe gee na, yu yuu fi ka', yu yuu rúèú ce a m laèa neè weèe efa rkáè'. Yuu rúèú ca yu nlaèa ce weèe aè m yu' wáá.	Brothers, I write no new commandment to you, but an old commandment which you had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning.
Woweèe a m yu' aèmboè woweèe a ce laèa bli ce woweèe a m yá'ni ka', a ce ku'si Nyúè. Pitaè aè laêa enáê,	For they heard them speaking in other languages and magnifying God. Then Peter answered,
A mboè Nyúè aè m geèe buu ce e m kupshi a lá efa rkáè' wa'a, buu anaè aè geetïì aè nfeè' ce e m tuu Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yïìseèe Tataê.	according to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord;
Yuu mo' yi yu ce a tá'shi, ce yi be keè buu efa ryááti aèwañ ka'. Yuu mo' yi yu ce a súèti, ce beèe a be keè buu efa rrïìñ ka'.	But there is nothing covered up, that will not be revealed, nor hidden, that will not be known.
Mnoèñ vi ka' caâa btaar, e ká' beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè Jus ce aè rla' Ruêm. Woweèe a ka' vúè, e laa neè woweèe enáê, “Yaè beèe, ka' máè m geèe faèa moè' neè yïìseèe beèe káè ma' ndeèe to' ce viseèe btarkú a m láè neè seèe naè ka' wa'a, a ku koo máè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, a fa mbe mmbo beèe ñkwe Ruêm.	"It happened that after three days Paul called together those who were the leaders of the Jews. When they had come together, he said to them, ""I, brothers, though I had done nothing against the people, or the customs of our fathers, still was delivered prisoner from Jerusalem into the hands of the Romans,"
E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená Kraâis anaè be yá ñgá', mnoèñ vi ba btaar, tá e fúú efa rkwe,	"He said to them, ""Thus it is written, and thus it was necessary for the Christ to suffer and to rise from the dead the third day,"
Ñwáè nsuu aè ker tuu ñwáè rfaè' moè', woweèe a ker koo a lïîp, a to' tu, a koosi ye rïìtu.	Again, he sent another servant to them; and they threw stones at him, wounded him in the head, and sent him away shamefully treated.
Fa mɛ̀ ntaaŋguu tɛ m̀ tôo.	Give me firewood to burn.
Beèe ce a ka' fa' rfaè' bdikïìn ca boèñboñ, baná a be naèa woweèe mbekïì, woweèe a ce laèa aèmboè rbyemïì ce e neè Jisos Kraêis, laa neè ñger-ñwáè.	For those who have served well gain for themselves a good standing, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.
Yá neè aèmboè Máèlkisidáèk aè m ba ñwáâ ñgoèr. Abraèham ce e m ba taèr beâe aè to' Isráèl aè m loèr buu ce e m koo aè ñkúè bïìr a gaèp bdïì' rúêú, a lor dïû' mo'sir a fa neè Máèlkisidáèk.	Now consider how great this man was, to whom even Abraham, the patriarch, gave a tenth out of the best spoils.
Ñwáè fa kuè ce kwaè'shi ba aèmboè yi tu ka', ñwáè wááwá kwa'shi aèmboè beèe mo' foñ.	each of you not just looking to his own things, but each of you also to the things of others.
Ŋkaa à koʼ mbe ce.	The monkey has climbed on the tree.
Yàa taa e ke yɛ rlir.	My father is a witch person.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè beèe ce a foèosi ba neè mncir naè, ndoèo yu mbe waâp tuè, njobeè' a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' tá yu'ni neè mncir wááwá ce a sañ mbe ñwaè' mncir ka', baná ndoèo aè co' ye.”	"For as many as are of the works of the law are under a curse. For it is written, ""Cursed is everyone who doesn't continue in all things that are written in the book of the law, to do them."""
Baná weèe gee neè beèe moè' aèmboè weèe ce koèñ ená a gee neè weèe.	"As you would like people to do to you, do exactly so to them.
Luke	Luêk	6	32	Weèe ka' ku koñ ba beèe ce a koèñ weèe, a yoñshïì weèe aè njáâá ká? To ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep foñ a koèñ beèe ce a koèñ woweèe.	If you love those who love you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners love those who love them.
Luke	Luêk	6	33	Weèe ka' ku gee buu bboèñboñ ba neè beèe ce a ke geèe buu bboèñboñ neè weèe, a yoñshïì weèe aè njáâá ká? To ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep a ke geèe wa' foñ.	If you do good to those who do good to you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners do the same.
Luke	Luêk	6	34	Weèe ka' ku ce foèosi buu ba neè beèe ce weèe ce kwaè'shi ená a be kúsi buu anaè neè weèe, a yoñshïì weèe aè njáâá ká? To ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep a ke foèosi buu neè ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep, tá a bo fúú koo yaèp buu ce a m foèosi anaè.	If you lend to those from whom you hope to receive, what credit is that to you? Even sinners lend to sinners, to receive back as much.
Luke	Luêk	6	35	Weèe aè ba koñ yeè beèe ce a baèa weèe, geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ neè woweèe. Ñwáè aè ka' foosi yuu, e fa keèr ce keè' ená a be kúsi neè ye ka'. Weèe ka' gee wa' baná wee blaè' vi be ba goèr, tá weèe ba boo Nyúè embe buèu njobeè' e ke geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ neè beâe bbebep ker ba neè beèe ce a ke yoèñshi yap yu ñwáè ka'.	But love your enemies, and do good, and lend, expecting nothing back; and your reward will be great, and you will be children of the Most High; for he is kind toward the unthankful and evil.
Luke	Luêk	6	36	Koosi neè mnse neè beèe aèmboè yeè Ta Nyúè e ke koosi naè.	Therefore be merciful, even as your Father is also merciful.
Luke	Luêk	6	37	“Weèe fa sa' beèe mo' ka', tá a bo sa' weèe ka'. Weèe fa bepsi beèe mo' ka', tá a bo bepsi weèe ka'. Weèe foosi beèe mo' tá a bo foèosi weèe foñ.	Don't judge, and you won't be judged. Don't condemn, and you won't be condemned. Set free, and you will be set free.
Luke	Luêk	6	38	Weèe fa, tá a bo fa weèe foñ. A be feè' tá yi ruu boèñboñ, a ciishi tá yi ruu baèati tá a fa njep yo baèa. Yuu ce weèe ka' fe' buu njo, ku ba yi ce a be feè' njo kúsi neè weèe.”	Give, and it will be given to you: good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over, will be given to you. For with the same measure you measure it will be measured back to you."""
Weèe aè ka' ce bipshi buu neè weèr kuu yuu boèñboñ ce weèr aè geèe neè ñwáè ce e kepñger na, ená e geèe eká a ka' ce jáèr lá,	if we are examined today concerning a good deed done to a crippled man, by what means this man has been healed,
Joân aè laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Ñwáè Ryá'nïì, weèr aè mú yá ñwáè moè' e ce fúshi byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe fa wáâ rlii. Weèr aè laa neè ye ená e fa keèr geèe wa' ka' njobeè' e yu mo' efa seâe mú ka'.”	"John said to him, ""Teacher, we saw someone who doesn't follow us casting out demons in your name; and we forbade him, because he doesn't follow us."""
e laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñkoosimnse ce e yu njep máâ ntee yu ba yïì ce aède' e ku yú máè. Cu neè mbena tá seèe ce keè'ni.”	"Then he said to them, ""My soul is exceedingly sorrowful, even to death. Stay here, and watch with me."""
Beâe aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm ker ba beèe ce a ce sa' woweèe a rïìñ njáèá ñwáè ce Jisoès yu ka'. A m beè' blaâa Nyúè ce ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m sañ aè mmbomntaa Nyúè wááwá, woweèe a yu' a riñ vi ka'. AÈmboè yi yu wa' naè, yuu ce a m beè' anaè yi m ku ghááte mbe nfeè' ce a m sa' vi mnsa' a teni ená a yú ye naè.	For those who dwell in Jerusalem, and their rulers, because they didn't know him, nor the voices of the prophets which are read every Sabbath, fulfilled them by condemning him.
Woweèe a laa neè ye enáê, “Ncoèo ce aède' aè duñshïì tá weèr bo yá, byemi neè wáè yu ká?	"They said therefore to him, ""What then do you do for a sign, that we may see, and believe you? What work do you do?"
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè rkoèñnïì ce e neè nfúr moè' ce e byemi neè Jisoès, mbuèu moè' ker ba neè weèr aè rsañ neè weèe aèmboè li ka' njobeè' Nyúè aè yá'ni weèe njáèá rkoèñnïì ca wáá.	But concerning brotherly love, you have no need that one write to you. For you yourselves are taught by God to love one another,
Visò bkuu vi sàʼŋger e.	Our bed has scattered.
Mɛ̀ suŋ ye mɛnɛ m̀ be dù kaʼ.	I have told him that I will not go.
Ncïìndap Nyúè anaè aè laa neè máè enáê, “Mdip ce wáè yá ma kwaèraè caè aè cu mbetar mo naè, mi táá aètu ku' beâe aè mntáè' wááwá aè bto' wááwá ce a ce laèa bli jáá jáèá jáá.	"He said to me, ""The waters which you saw, where the prostitute sits, are peoples, multitudes, nations, and languages."
Ñwáè moè' ka' vú aè ryá weèe, ke' ce yá'ni ba njáèá ryá'nïì ca ka', weèe fa byemi tá e niñ mbe weâe ndaèp ka', fa fa neè ye bo foñ ka'.	If anyone comes to you, and doesn't bring this teaching, don't receive him into your house, and don't welcome him,
Jisoès aè m ce káè' li rfaè', a ba aèmboè bfeè' mntaar. Beèe a m ce kwaè'shi ená a ye muu Josáèf ce e m ba muu Hálïì.	Jesus himself, when he began to teach, was about thirty years old, being the son (as was supposed) of Joseph, the son of Heli,
Ñwáè ce e ka' koñ aè rfaè' neè máè, ñgaèñ vú fa máâ mbuèu. Faèdïì' ce m ka' ba, baná yaè ñwáè rfaè' be ba aèfo foñ. Ñwáè ce e ka' fa' neè máè baná yaè ta be naèa ye mbekïì.	If anyone serves me, let him follow me. Where I am, there will my servant also be. If anyone serves me, the Father will honor him.
Ca yi be caèa wáá, tá m kúti, baè'ri ndap Dávïìd ce e gweè. M be baè'ri ndap ce e saè'ñger na, geèe tá e ba aèmboè e m ba,	After these things I will return. I will again build the tabernacle of David, which has fallen. I will again build its ruins. I will set it up,
M ce kúti seè'ni duè yá ñwáè ce e m tuu máè. Ka' yi yu wa'a, moè' efa weèe aè be bipshi neè máè enáê, ‘AÈ ce duè ba fá lá?’ ka'.	But now I am going to him who sent me, and none of you asks me, 'Where are you going?'
Mbèŋ à ba gwè à mʉŋgàptʉʼ.	It rained early this morning.
Jisoès aè ku riñ yuu ce woweèe a m ce kwaè'shi, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “To' yi ka' gapni, ke' ba cuâu mo'sir ka', baná to' anaè yi be saè'ñger. Ndap ka' gapni, ke' ba cuâu mo'sir ka', baná ndap anaè be gweè.	"But he, knowing their thoughts, said to them, ""Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation. A house divided against itself falls."
Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir njobeè' weèe aè loèr ki ce a ke múè' ndap bfee, a du aègho. Weèe aè niñ mbo ka', a kani beèe ce a ce gheèter aè rniñ mbo naè efa rduè mbo.”	"Woe to you lawyers! For you took away the key of knowledge. You didn't enter in yourselves, and those who were entering in, you hindered."""
Woowèe a lii muu njep cɛ̀ʼ.	They have wrapped the baby in the cloth.
E lá' efa mmirloè, a waa fu', a laa neè rdip enáê, “Táá nyañ, fa cïì'ti ka'.” Fu' yi teetïì, ñgoèñ yi ba neè rfúteè-ñwáè.	"He awoke, and rebuked the wind, and said to the sea, ""Peace! Be still!"" The wind ceased, and there was a great calm."
Ŋgòŋ zhi bàŋ sèʼni njo fùp.	The world is now difficult because of poverty.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè seèe, beèe magoèr ca, ce a m byemi neè Nyúè na, a sïìr seèe a kaari a tarte a ce fyá' yuu ce seèe be geèe. Baná seèe ma' buu wááwá ce vi ce jepsi seèe, ker ba buu bbebep ce vi yu seèe njep bláá naè, kur ntee cañ mcañnïì ce Nyúè e koèñ ená seèe cañ naè.	Therefore let us also, seeing we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses, lay aside every weight and the sin which so easily entangles us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,
Máè laèa wa'a njobeè' beèe a ce laèa ená mñwaè' ce m ce sañ neè weèe vi tap, a ce' seê, máâ ba fa weâe mú, yááti aèmboè ñwáè ce e goè'si, la rfeè'shïì li túr ñger ka'.	"For, ""His letters,"" they say, ""are weighty and strong, but his bodily presence is weak, and his speech is despised."""
Máè ka' yu' njeèndoñ ca a karsi nyor tá m bo yá ñwáè ce e ce laèa. Máè ka' karsi nyor a yá mú njáèá btábuèr ce a ke tooshi blam mbo vi saèambaê. A m geèe mú btábuèr ca neè bco' ce a too ená guêl.	I turned to see the voice that spoke with me. Having turned, I saw seven golden lampstands.
Yi yu ená ñwáè ce e yu ñwáè Jus ghup yu ba ñwáè ce a ce yá ba neè mmir ka'. Búè ce yu búè mini aè bsii Nyúè yu ba yïì ce aè geèe ñwáè ka'.	For he is not a Jew who is one outwardly, neither is that circumcision which is outward in the flesh;
Beèe ce a m duè a Pol weèe aè m ba Soèpataè, muu yïì Pairuâs aè rla' Báèriyaè, ba AÈristakoès ba Sáèkunduâs aè rla' Táèsaèlonikaè, ba Gayoâs aè rla' Dábeè, ba Timotïì, ba Tikikoès a Troâfimoès ce a m ba beâe aè ñgoâñ Áshaè.	These accompanied him as far as Asia: Sopater of Beroea; Aristarchus and Secundus of the Thessalonians; Gaius of Derbe; Timothy; and Tychicus and Trophimus of Asia.
Tá Nyúè ce e geèe weèe aè lá mi mmir mbenduè buu ce vi bii ka' koni gee tá weèe ce lu'shi seê, cu neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè njobeè' weèe aè byemi neè ye. E geèe wa'a, tá weèe bo kuè ce láè mmir mbenduè buu anaè aè ñger Yú' Rara.	Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope, in the power of the Holy Spirit.
Bto' ce mdip mi sïìr a kaari a tarte ker ba mtuèu a m káèáñger, a bú.	Every island fled away, and the mountains were not found.
Ñwáè ce e ka' kani máè ker kani wa blaèa foñ, ñgaèñ túr yuu ce yi be sa' ye. Wa blaèa a yuu ce vi be sa' ñwáè anaè aè noèñ elúèsimbuèu.	He who rejects me, and doesn't receive my sayings, has one who judges him. The word that I spoke, the same will judge him in the last day.
A m geèe ye búè, e ba aèmboè ncoèo wa'a, ce e m ce duèñshi ená e yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njo' li rbyemïì, ka' a m be gee ye búè aè nfeè' anaè ka' wa'a. Yi ka' ba aè njáâá wa'a, Abraèham aè ba seè'ni taèr beèe wááwá ce a byemi, Nyúè aè ce yá woweèe aè beâe byáánïì, ka' woweèe a geèe búè ka' wa'a.	He received the sign of circumcision, a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had while he was in uncircumcision, that he might be the father of all those who believe, though they might be in uncircumcision, that righteousness might also be accounted to them.
E lo embo a du aè njïìsaèp ka', a gwe kúkúèp, a loo neè Nyúè ená yi ka' ba aètáèr e gee tá nfeè' ñgá' ce e ce vúè naè caa embe yeâ tuè.	He went forward a little, and fell on the ground, and prayed that, if it were possible, the hour might pass away from him.
Nárïì aè ba muu Málákïì, Málákïì aè ba muu Adïì, Adïì aè ba muu Kosaèm, Kosaèm aè ba muu ÁÈlimadaèm, ÁÈlimadaèm aè ba muu ÁÊr,	the son of Melchi, the son of Addi, the son of Cosam, the son of Elmodam, the son of Er,
Baná Jisoès a tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ce e ghááte neè seèe. E ghááte njobeè' e yu ñwáâ nrara a ce kwaè'shi káè a ce geèe faèa ka', a ba yi jáá efa beèe ce a ke geèe buu bbebep, Nyúè aè naa ye mbekïì.	For such a high priest was fitting for us: holy, guiltless, undefiled, separated from sinners, and made higher than the heavens;
Yuu ce ñwáè e ke ye, a yuu yi ke geèe ñwáè e bep aè bsii Nyúè ka'. Yuu ce yi ke geèe ñwáè e ba jaèpri e ke ba yuu ce yi ke fúú ekuè cuâu ñwáè.”	"That which enters into the mouth doesn't defile the man; but that which proceeds out of the mouth, this defiles the man."""
Ndoèo aè co' seèe wááwá njobeè' seèe aè láè mncir wááwá ka'. Jisos Kraâis aè tee seèe efa ndoèo ca. E m loèr yiseèe dïì', a kwe mbe ce, a lo a ba ñwáè ndoèo aè bsii Nyúè. Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè ce a ka' káti mbe ce baná ñgaèñ yu ñwáè ndoèo aè bsii Nyúè.”	"Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law, having become a curse for us. For it is written, ""Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree,"""
AÈ ka' ba seè'ni ce weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe yu aèbee na, baná weèe borni ñgeâe bebep. Fa ba ñwáè rshentee káè ñwáè ncápntee ka'. Fa kwaè'shi bebep aèmboè ñwáè moè' ka'. Fa ba ñwáè mnsa'ni ka'. Fa maè'shi tá blaâa bbebep vi fúú eku wáâ cuèu ka'.	but now you also put them all away: anger, wrath, malice, slander, and shameful speaking out of your mouth.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè ba riñ yuu ce Nyúè e ke fa neè beèe, ker riñ njáèá ñwáè ce e ce loo mdip ese wáè tá e bo no, aè ba loo ba wáè ená e fa wáè mdip ce mi ke mïì ka', tá e fa wáè mdip anaè.”	"Jesus answered her, ""If you knew the gift of God, and who it is who says to you, 'Give me a drink,' you would have asked him, and he would have given you living water."""
Rcaè'nïì ca aè sañ máâ Pol neè ya bo.	This greeting is by me, Paul, with my own hand.
A m duè neè Jisoès njeptii ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì. Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba bleebeèe, ker ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, a vú aèbee.	They led Jesus away to the high priest. All the chief priests, the elders, and the scribes came together with him.
Woweèe a laa yuu ka'. Jisoès aè koo ñwáè anaè a gee e ke'seè, a laa neè ye ená e duê.	But they were silent. He took him, and healed him, and let him go.
E kùʼsi nàʼ anà gòr.	He has fattened the cow so much.
Yuʼshi yuu ce yòo taa ce làa.	Listen to what your father is saying.
Fa sár mnsár blúr ka'. Fa caèasi nfeè' aè rbeè' braèraè beèe ce a m kweñger ka', fa ba ñwáè mlap ka', fa ce sár mnsár aèmboè mncir ce Nyúè aè m fa neè Musïìs naè ka'. Njáèá buu ca yu buu bcicïì, sá' aè ba njo ka'.	but shun foolish questionings, genealogies, strife, and disputes about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.
Weèr aè m naèti a jár seê, a vú a yá weèe a fe'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè Jisos Kraâis neè weèe. AÈmboè wee yu mbeèp mo' efa ler rfaè' na, weèr aè ka' ce naèa tu neè weèe baná weèr ce naèa tu a caa embe dïì' ce weèr aè ba naèa ka'. Weèr aè m ka' tá baè faè' fa weâe mú ka', weèr aè m ba naèa tu caèa embo.	For we don't stretch ourselves too much, as though we didn't reach to you. For we came even as far as to you with the Good News of Christ,
Ca yi m geèe beèe a byá' ñgaâa byañ foñ a vú aègho a lá mbe bkuu ba mbe mwaèa aèwaâa nduunjïì ená Pitaè ka' ce caèa tá li rleèñshi li bo caèa mbenduè beèe mo' efa waâp mú.	They even carried out the sick into the streets, and laid them on cots and mattresses, so that as Peter came by, at the least his shadow might overshadow some of them.
A m loèr ma nyaèa anaè a ma' njep ñgoèñ na. Ma nyaèa anaè foñ yu nyo eluâuñgoèñ ce a too li rlii ená ñwáè mnaèñ, too rmo' ená Sataèn. E yu ñwáè ce e ke bo' beèe enjep ñgoèñ na. A m maè' ye a vi bcïìndap weèe njep ñgoèñ na.	The great dragon was thrown down, the old serpent, he who is called the devil and Satan, the deceiver of the whole world. He was thrown down to the earth, and his angels were thrown down with him.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè seèe ce seèe ce cu seèe Tata Jisos Kraâis weèe, njeñwáè yu neè yi tu ka', mbañruèñwáè aè ba neè yi tu ka'.	Nevertheless, neither is the woman independent of the man, nor the man independent of the woman, in the Lord.
E niñ mbe ndaèp, a laa neè beèe anaè enáê, “Weèe ce warse ba ká, a ce koosimnse? Muu ca aè kwe kwe ka'. E ce buumi buumi.”	"When he had entered in, he said to them, ""Why do you make an uproar and weep? The child is not dead, but is asleep."""
Jisos Kraâis yu yi ba muu ce e túr ñger mbenduè beèe Nyúè aèmboè muu ñwáè ndap e ke túr ñger mbenduè buu yïì ta naè. E ce geèe rfaè' anaè neè mini-ñwáè. See seèe yu beèe Nyúè, ce seèe aè ka' ku táá tatap, lá mmir mbenduè buu ce Nyúè a kaè' neè seèe, ce yu' rboèñ aè rsuñ beèe buu anaè.	but Christ is faithful as a Son over his house; whose house we are, if we hold fast our confidence and the glorying of our hope firm to the end.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a laa neè ñwáè ce li rkoo li m kwe naè enáê, “Maè' lo rkoo kuèyáá.” E ma', li kútïì rboèñboñ, a ba aèmboè lïì ce li m kwe yi ka' naè.	"Then he told the man, ""Stretch out your hand."" He stretched it out; and it was restored whole, just like the other."
Bár yïì beèe ce rúú a ka' yu' yuu ce Jáms ba Joân a m laèa na, nyor aè bep woweèe seê.	When the ten heard it, they began to be indignant towards James and John.
“Weèe aè yu' ená a m laèa enáê, ‘Koèñ nfúroè, baa ñwáè ce e baèa wáè’.	"You have heard that it was said, 'You shall love your neighbor, and hate your enemy.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	44	M ce laèa ya neè weèe ená, koèñ neè beèe ce a baèa weèe, loo neè neè beèe ce a ce fa weèe ñgá',	But I tell you, love your enemies, bless those who curse you, do good to those who hate you, and pray for those who mistreat you and persecute you,
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	45	tá weèe bo ba boo yeè Ta ce e cu mbe buèu. E ke geèe nyúè sañ mbenduè beâe bbebep ba beâe bboèñboñ, gee mbeèñ gwe aè mnsuu beèe ce a cu rcu yáánïì ba beèe ce a cu rcu yáánïì ka'.	that you may be children of your Father who is in heaven. For he makes his sun to rise on the evil and the good, and sends rain on the just and the unjust.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	46	Weèe aè ka' ku koñ ba beèe ce a koèñ weèe, aède' weèe koo ba njáèá blaè' ká? Mboè ñgaâa ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' a ke geèe wa' foñ a?	For if you love those who love you, what reward do you have? Don't even the tax collectors do the same?
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	47	Weèe aè ka' ku ce caè'ni ba bfúr wee, baná yuu ce weèe aè geèe a caa beèe mo' yu ba ká? Mboè beèe enje jáá a ke geèe wa' foñ a?	If you only greet your friends, what more do you do than others? Don't even the tax collectors do the same?
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	48	Baná weèe ba yáánïì seê, aèmboè yeè Ta embe buèu yu yáánïì foñ naè.	Therefore you shall be perfect, just as your Father in heaven is perfect.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	6	1	“Loèr neè nfeè' faè dïì' weèe gee ñgeâe yáánïì aè bsii beèe tá a bo yá yuu ce weèe aè geèe ka'. Weèe aè ka' gee wa'a, baná aède' yeè Ta ce e yu mbe buèu la' weèe ka'.	Be careful that you don't do your charitable giving before men, to be seen by them, or else you have no reward from your Father who is in heaven."
Yi ke ba ená a lá mruâ' mfi ba njep mñguèp mruè' vïû bfi tá mi bo kúète ka', tá mñguèp mruè' vi to'ñger ka'.	But new wine must be put into fresh wineskins, and both are preserved.
Njeèndoñ ce máè m yu' e ce suèu embe buèu naè aè laa neè máè enáê, “Duè koo ñwaè' ce a búèr yi ba mbaè bo ncïìndap Nyúè ce e tár kuèu mbenduè rdip rgoèr, a tár mo' mbenduè nshe naè.”	"The voice which I heard from heaven, again speaking with me, said, ""Go, take the book which is open in the hand of the angel who stands on the sea and on the land."""
a laa enáê, “Byá ca aè m laèa ená aède' e ku sa'sïì Ndap Nyúè ca, ker ba'ri aè mnoâñ btaar.”	"and said, ""This man said, 'I am able to destroy the temple of God, and to build it in three days.'"""
Weèr aè m ce keè' yer ená a ye ñwáè ce e be tee beèe Isráèl efa ñgá'. Ku ba ca caè'caè' ka', mnoèñ vi yu seè'ni vi btaar káâ' nyúè ce buu ca aè m koni.	But we were hoping that it was he who would redeem Israel. Yes, and besides all this, it is now the third day since these things happened.
Ŋwɛ̀ ŋkʉ̀ʉ ka tɛ cop kwaa kaʼ, ŋwɛ̀ kep ye, banɛ ŋwɛ̀ anà be làʼ bcop kwâa.	If the landlord has not tasted the corn and someone harvest and eat, therefore that person will pay for unlawfully tasting the corn.
M ce suñ weèe máná yuu mo' ce yi caèa Nyúè yi yu mbena.	But I tell you that one greater than the temple is here.
Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè. A sañ mbo enáê, “AÈ ka' ba njobeè' weèe, beèe a taè' yúshi weèr aè mnoèñ wááwá, a ce loèr weèr aèmboè njeèe ce a ce duè aègho aè rsáá wa'a.”	"Even as it is written, ""For your sake we are killed all day long. We were accounted as sheep for the slaughter."""
Woweèe a ka' kúti, yá beèe caè, ñwáè moè' a vúê, a gú'shi njeptii Jisoès,	When they came to the multitude, a man came to him, kneeling down to him, saying,
a laa neè woweèe enáê, “A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, ‘Yaè ndap be ba ndap rloo. Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèe aè gee yaè ndap aè kútïì ba mbúè' byáèá.” ’	"saying to them, ""It is written, 'My house is a house of prayer,' but you have made it a 'den of robbers'!"""
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená masaè anaè be fa yïì buu wááwá mbe yeâ mmboè.	Truly I tell you, that he will set him over all that he has.
Beèe magoèr a ká' a ce laèa enáê, “Yú' nyúèrkaè' yi karsi ye tu, e ká' a ce baa. Seèe ce yu' yuu ce e ce laèa njoká seê?”	"Many of them said, ""He has a demon, and is insane! Why do you listen to him?"""
E m laèa ená yi boèñ ená a beèe Nyúè weèe a yá ñgá' aèbee caa ce ená e gee buu bbebep ce yu' rboèñ aègho aè mú nfeè' múcaèr.	choosing rather to share ill treatment with God's people, than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a time;
Agripaè aè laa neè Fástoès enáê, “Ñwáè ca aè ka' tá baè laèa ená ñkwe Rum a ñwáè ce e be sa' vi mnsa' ka', seèe aè ba maè'shi ye tá e duê.”	"Agrippa said to Festus, ""This man might have been set free if he had not appealed to Caesar."""
Ká' ese aè nfeè' anaè, Jisoès aè ká' a ce raasi neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ená e be kuè duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, yá ñgá' mbaè mmbo bleebeèe ba beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir goèr seê, tá a yú ye, mnoèñ vi ba btaar e fúú efa rkwe.	From that time, Jesus began to show his disciples that he must go to Jerusalem and suffer many things from the elders, chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and the third day be raised up.
Weèr woweèe aè ka' vúè aèfa, máè caasïì nfeè' ka'. Túè' aè ka' raa, máè niñ mbe kor aè rsa' mnsa', a laa máná a vú neè ñwáè anaè.	When therefore they had come together here, I didn't delay, but on the next day sat on the judgment seat, and commanded the man to be brought.
Awá Jisoès aè beesïì neè ye enáê, “Wáè yá ku' mndap bgoèrgoèr ca a? Luèr moè' be cu nje ndap ka'. A be káèáshi vi wááwá.”	"Jesus said to him, ""Do you see these great buildings? There will not be left here one stone on another, which will not be thrown down."""
E ka' ce yá ku' beèe, nse yi koo ye neè woweèe, njobeè' woweèe a m jep, a riñ yuu ce a ce geèe ka', aèmboè njeèe ce yi buu ñwáè ncïìñ njeèe wa'a.	But when he saw the multitudes, he was moved with compassion for them, because they were harassed and scattered, like sheep without a shepherd.
Ka' yi m ba wa'a, Jus ce a m byemi ka', a m barsi beèe enje jáá, a karsi wap btu, a gee woweèe a baa bfúr.	But the disbelieving Jews stirred up and embittered the souls of the Gentiles against the brothers.
Yi yu ená nsuñ kuu rkwe Jisos Kraâis embe kïìntaa yu blúr neè beèe ce a ce bú njep múè buu bbebep. AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè seèe ce seèe ce luèñ, nsuñ ca yu ñger Nyúè.	For the word of the cross is foolishness to those who are dying, but to us who are saved it is the power of God.
Muu wàp à kwe.	Their child is dead.
Ñwáâ mboèñmboñ e ke fúr buu bboèñboñ efa buu bboèñboñ ce vi yu njep yeâ ntee, ñwáâ mbembep fúr buu bbebep efa buu bbebep ce vi yu njep yeâ ntee. Yi yu wa'a njobeè' ñwáè e ke laèa ba efa ku' buu ce vi ruu njep yeâ ntee.	The good man out of the good treasure of his heart brings out that which is good, and the evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart brings out that which is evil, for out of the abundance of the heart, his mouth speaks.
Ñwáè embenjïì ñwáè embe yeâ njïì aè ker laasi ye, a kwe. Yi m ku koni neè woweèe wááwá wa'a, moè' efa woweèe aè bi boo a njeñwáè anaè ka'.	The third took her, and likewise the seven all left no children, and died.
M ce yá ñgá' njo' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca, a ka' ce yá wa'a, a ce koosi rïìtu ka' njobeè' m rïìñ ñwáè ce máè byemi neè ye, a riñ máná e be kupshi mfaè' ce e fa mba máâ mmboè naè láè duè baè' noèñ ce Jisoès be vúè.	For this cause I also suffer these things. Yet I am not ashamed, for I know him whom I have believed, and I am persuaded that he is able to guard that which I have committed to him against that day.
Jisoès aè ká'shïì woweèe aèbee, a laa neè woweèe wááwá enáê, “Weèe yi weená ñgaâa rsa' beèe enje jáá a ke sa' yap beèe neè ñger-ñwáè seê. Beâe bgoèrgoèr mo' a loèr yap ñger nyú' beèe agho foñ.	"Jesus summoned them, and said to them, ""You know that they who are recognized as rulers over the nations lord it over them, and their great ones exercise authority over them."
Ŋgǎa ntaa a daʼse e.	The business people have all gone away.
AÈmboè seèe rïìñ buu ca wa'a, baná seèe aè ba loèr blaèa ce seèe aè yu' aèmboè ye na tatap seê, faè dïì' seèe lo fúú enjo ka'.	Therefore we ought to pay greater attention to the things that were heard, lest perhaps we drift away.
Li rlòo li tap sê.	His/Her prayer is very strong.
Yuu ce e laèa na yi ghááte aè yuu ce ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m laèa. A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê,	This agrees with the words of the prophets. As it is written,
A ka' koo Jisoès ce duè aègho, muu nsuènsuè moè' ce e m ku wap ba cáè' aè nyoèr aè ce duè a yeâ mbuèu. Beèe ca a koo ye aè cáè',	A certain young man followed him, having a linen cloth thrown around himself, over his naked body. The young men grabbed him,
A mbuèu ce a ce too ñkúè anaè ená ñkúè bláá, caar ba' ntïìni na.	"Therefore that field was called ""The Field of Blood"" to this day."
Ku' buu ce rla' ca li m túr wááwá vi ku mi ba njaè' moè'sir.” Beèe ce a yu btu mfaè' neè beèe ce a ke faè' mbe bkeñ bgoèrgoèr, ba beèe wááwá ce a ke yeñger ba enjep roè, a m táá foñ aènjïìsaèp,	For in an hour such great riches are made desolate.' Every shipmaster, and everyone who sails anywhere, and mariners, and as many as gain their living by sea, stood far away,
E ka' laèa wa' mïìsi, a woweèe a gú'shïì neè mñkúúshi, e gee rloo.	When he had spoken these things, he knelt down and prayed with them all.
Ñwáè ntoèo nlaèa moè' aè m ba a ce too ye ená Dáèmitroès. E m ce geèe mú mndap nyúâ bká'ká' neè njáèá bco' mo' ce a m ce too ená Silvaè, vi feeseè ndap nyúè AÈtámïìs. Beèe ce a m ce faè' neè ye a m ce ye sá' enjep rfaè' anaè seê.	For a certain man named Demetrius, a silversmith, who made silver shrines of Artemis, brought no little business to the craftsmen,
Beèe ce a byemi a be geèe buu ghagha' ca. Woweèe a be fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe fa máâ rlii, laèa bli bfi,	These signs will accompany those who believe: in my name they will cast out demons; they will speak with new languages;
Ka' beèe ce a ce fa weèe ncep aè rcu aèmboè beèe Jisos Kraâis a yu goèr wa'a, yeè ta ku ba moè'sir. Yu ba máè ce máè m ba aèmboè taèr neè weèe njobeè' máè m feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè weèe tá weèe ka' keè ba beèe Jisoès Kraêis.	For though you have ten thousand tutors in Christ, yet not many fathers. For in Christ Jesus, I became your father through the Good News.
Ñwáè ce e ka' naa yïì nyor mbekïì baná a be suèusi ñgaèñ njep nsheè. Ñwáè ce e ka' suusi yïì nyor njep nsheè baná a be naèa ye mbekïì.	Whoever exalts himself will be humbled, and whoever humbles himself will be exalted.
E m ker laa neè máè enáê, “La rfaè' li mïì. M yu Alfaè, a ba OÈmágaè. A máè ñwáè ce e m káè' buu wááwá, a ba ñwáè ce e be mïìsi buu anaè. Ñ wáè ce ntee mdip yi ka' ce luèu ye, baná m be sáp mdip enjep rdip ryoèñ fa ye tá e no aè cicïì.	"He said to me, ""It is done! I am the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End. I will give freely to him who is thirsty from the spring of the water of life."
Yuu ce weèe aè ba geèe yi yu ená weèe aè ba cep wee btu faè dïì' ntee bebep anaè yi bo' ñwáè moè' tá e tee tu neè Nyúè ka'. Kuè ce gee neè wa'a aè mnoèñ wááwá aèmboè nfeè' ku bii aègho ntïìni na.	"but exhort one another day by day, so long as it is called ""today;"" lest any one of you be hardened by the deceitfulness of sin."
E m laèa ená a baptir woweèe aè rlii Jisos Kraêis. A ka' baèptir woweèe, woweèe a laa neè ye ená e cu a woweèe aè mú mnoâñ mo'.	He commanded them to be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ. Then they asked him to stay some days.
Baná weèe ku táá tatap weèe Tata weèe, bfúr waê. M koèñ weèe magoèr seê, bkar waê. Ya ntee yi ce luèu máè aè ryá weèe. Yu weèe ce weèe ce geèe m ce lu'shi, a ce naèa tu neè weèe.	Therefore, my brothers, beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand firm in the Lord, my beloved.
Weèr aè ka' baè' aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, bfúr ce a m ba aèfo a konïì weèr boèñboñ seê.	When we had come to Jerusalem, the brothers received us gladly.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “AÈsayaè ce ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m laèa yuu mini kuu weèe ce ñgaâa mbo'ni aèmboè a m sañ enáê, ‘Beèe ca a ku ce yu'ni neè máè ba neè cuèu. Yap mntee yi yu aènjïìsaèp ese máè.	"He answered them, ""Well did Isaiah prophesy of you hypocrites, as it is written, 'This people honors me with their lips, but their heart is far from me."
Saimún Pitaè aè ka' yá yuu ce yi m ba na, a gwe njeptii Jisoès, a laa enáê, “Tataê, naèti efa máâ geñ. M yu ñwáâ ñgeèe buu bbebep.”	"But Simon Peter, when he saw it, fell down at Jesus' knees, saying, ""Depart from me, for I am a sinful man, Lord."""
baná e m geèe wa'a tá e bo duèñshi rboèñ efa yi foèo neè beèe ce e m ce koosimnse neè woweèe, aè ba beèe ce e m kupshi tá woweèe a bo koni foèo anaè naè.	and that he might make known the riches of his glory on vessels of mercy, which he prepared beforehand for glory,
Beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a be yá dïì' ce a ce duè, njo' rraa anaè. Bkúú enjep ñgoèñ na a be loèr bkuè' ce a túr wááwá duè aègho aè rla' anaè.	The nations will walk in its light. The kings of the earth bring the glory and honor of the nations into it.
Vʉ̀ yɛ mɛ̀ tɛ sò bo dù.	Come and see me so that we will go.
E yu ñwáè ce e ke faè' mbe dïû' rara ce yi yu mbe dïì' ce a ke loo neè Nyúè. Dïû' rara ca aè m geèe ñwáè ka', aè m geèe ba Nyúè. Yu dïì' rloo ce yi yu yáánïì.	a servant of the sanctuary, and of the true tabernacle, which the Lord pitched, not man.
E ke làa buu à mŋgàa.	She/He speaks in parables.
A be káè' embe nfeè' ce a m yú Ábáèl duè ba' mbe nfeè' ce a m yú Saèkaèriyaè mbetar dïû' ntoèo rfa ba dïû' rara. ÁÈno, m ce suñ weèe máná ñgúè beâe seè'ni a be laèa yuu kuu buu ca.	from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zachariah, who perished between the altar and the sanctuary.' Yes, I tell you, it will be required of this generation.
E bàrshi kwâa a fa mɛ̀.	He has shelled part of corn from its cob and has given me.
Weèe fa leèse efa rkoni bkeèe ce a vúè aè rcaè'ni weèe ka', keè' neè woweèe boèñboñ. Beèe mo' a m koni bkeèe a ke' aè woweèe boèñboñ seê, a ke' riñ ená bkeèe anaè aè m ba bcïìndap Nyúè ka'.	Don't forget to show hospitality to strangers, for in doing so, some have entertained angels without knowing it.
Jisoès aè m ku riñ ená ñger mo' yi fúú ye enje nyoèr, a karsi nyor a laa enáê, “AÈ joèo nda wa bcáè'?”	"Immediately Jesus, perceiving in himself that the power had gone out from him, turned around in the crowd, and asked, ""Who touched my clothes?"""
Beèe ca a ce laèa wa'a, a ce geèe aèmboè a máñni ená aè m ba eluâuñgoèñ Nyúè aè laa ená rbuu li ba, tá ñgoèñ yi ba, buu ca aè ku ba ghup ka' wa'a. E m gaèpse nshe a mdip, a gee nshe neè mdip.	For this they willfully forget, that there were heavens from of old, and an earth formed out of water and amid water, by the word of God;
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená Abraèham aè m túr boo mmbañruè a baa. E m bi moè' a ñkwaèa, a bi moè' a njeñwáè ce e m ba ñkwaèa ka'.	For it is written that Abraham had two sons, one by the handmaid, and one by the free woman.
Ñwáè ce e ka' byemi yuu ce e laèa, baná ñgaèñ ce duèñshi ená yuu Nyúè aè laèa yi yu mini.	He who has received his witness has set his seal to this, that God is true.
E fa woowèe ntaŋ mbòŋmboŋ.	She has given them a good suggestion.
Njeè ku bii yañ weèr vú ba' seè'ni na, ntee-mdip yi ku bii luèu weèr, weèr aè ce yar ba bkaèkaâ cáè'. E ba aè nfeè' moè', a lip weèr. Weèr túr rla' ka'.	Even to this present hour we hunger, thirst, are naked, are beaten, and have no certain dwelling place.
Woweèe a m laèa neè Jisoès enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, weèr rïìñ werná aè ce laèa, ker ce yá'ni ba yuu ce yi yu yáánïì. Weèr rïìñ werná wáâ ke loèr ñwáè moè' jáá ka', a ce yá'ni beèe mnduunjïì Nyúè neè mini-ñwáè.	"They asked him, ""Teacher, we know that you say and teach what is right, and aren't partial to anyone, but truly teach the way of God."
A mbuèu ce m ce gúè'shi njeptii Taèr	For this cause, I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,
E ka' lá'si vúê, e fa yá weèe aè mmirloè ka'.	lest coming suddenly he might find you sleeping.
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès e Jáèrusaláèm a ka' yu' ená beâe aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè a yu' blaâa Nyúè a byemi, a tuu Pitaè ba Joân ená a du yá woweèe.	Now when the apostles who were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God, they sent Peter and John to them,
M ka' gee nyor bep weèe, ñwáè ce aède' e ka' gee nyor boñ máè ba nda, caa efa weèe ce máè geèe nyor aè bep weèe naè?	For if I make you sorry, then who will make me glad but he who is made sorry by me?
Yá neè mbúâ ñwaè' goèrgoèr ce m ce sañ neè ya bo na.	See with what large letters I write to you with my own hand.
Weèe fa ye byee ce a fa neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na ka'. Weèe fa no bláá ka'. Weèe fa ye mnyaèa ce a toosi mndoñ efa gho vi kweñgeèr ka', ker borni bsaèkïì. Weèe aè ka' borni buu ca, baná weèe aè geèe boèñboñ. Seèe aè bár.”	"that you abstain from things sacrificed to idols, from blood, from things strangled, and from sexual immorality, from which if you keep yourselves, it will be well with you. Farewell."""
E m yá ñgá' mbe mmbo ñgaâa mcáèp magoèr, a too mbaa seê, a ke' ke'se ka'. Yañ yi ku ce duè ba kuèntombïì.	and had suffered many things by many physicians, and had spent all that she had, and was no better, but rather grew worse,
Lo rlii a nda?	What is your name?
Beèe a lïìp weèr, a fa weèr aè shañ. E ba aè nfeè' moè' beèe a gañ weèr. E ba aè nfeè' moè' weèr fa' jorni, e ba aè nfeè' moè' weèr túr nfeè' aè rbuumïì ka', e ba aè nfeè' moè' weèr túr yuu ye ka'.	in beatings, in imprisonments, in riots, in labors, in watchings, in fastings;
Sèe be cuute àbee sèesi rfǎʼ a àyàŋsè.	We will meet and discuss about tomorrowʼs work together.
Jisoès aè ka' loè embo ce duè, mmbañruè mo' beèe a mbaa ce a m ba mnfeèp, a natïì, a du a yeâ mbuèu a ce waa enáê, “Muu Dávïìd, koosimnse neè weèr.”	"As Jesus passed by from there, two blind men followed him, calling out and saying, ""Have mercy on us, son of David!"""
E m vúè njïì embe njïì Jisoès, a joo cuâu cáè' ese ye, a ku ke'se mbe dïì'.	came behind him, and touched the fringe of his cloak, and immediately the flow of her blood stopped.
Jáms ba Joân ce boo Sábáèdi a vú a laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Ñwáè Ryá'nïì, weèr ce koèñ werná aè gee yuu mo' neè weèr.”	"James and John, the sons of Zebedee, came near to him, saying, ""Teacher, we want you to do for us whatever we will ask."""
Ñwáè ce e ce loèr ená noâñ mo' yi yu jáá ce geèe wa'a tá e bo yu'ni neè Tataê. Ñwáè ce e ce ye buu wááwá, ce geèe wa'a njobeè' e ce koèñ aè ryu'ni neè Tata foñ. E ce yoèñshi Nyúè aè byee anaè. Ñwáè ce e kani efa rye njáèá byee mo', ce geèe wa'a njobeè' e ce koèñ aè ryu'ni neè Tata foñ. Ye ye ce yoèñshi Nyúè.	He who observes the day, observes it to the Lord; and he who does not observe the day, to the Lord he does not observe it. He who eats, eats to the Lord, for he gives God thanks. He who doesn't eat, to the Lord he doesn't eat, and gives God thanks.
Ñwaè' ca ce sañ máâ Poêl, ce m yu mbe shañ aètu Jisos Kraêis. M ce sañ yi weèr Timotïì ce e yu nfúr yïìseèe. Weèr ce sañ neè wáè ce Fïìlemúèn ce weèr koèñ seê, seèe aè ce faè' aè yuu mo'sir, ba beèe Nyúè wááwá ce a ke tarshi mbe wáâ ndaèp.	Paul, a prisoner of Christ Jesus, and Timothy our brother, to Philemon, our beloved fellow worker,
M ce loo máná Tata Nyúè geèe tá Tata Jisos Kraâis koosimnse neè ye aè noèñ ce e ka' vúê. Wáè rïìñ ená e m jaè' máè aè to' Áfásoès aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá.	(the Lord grant to him to find the Lord's mercy in that day); and in how many things he served at Ephesus, you know very well.
A ka' ye yu', Jisoès aè laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Baashi neè bbábá' bráâd ce vi báti naè aèbee faè dïì' vi bú aè cicïì ka'.”	"When they were filled, he said to his disciples, ""Gather up the broken pieces which are left over, that nothing be lost."""
Baná seèe fa koosi bsáè, borni efa rgeèe yuu boèñboñ ka', njobeè' seèe ka' tá borni ka', nfeè' ka' gháá, seèe ye sá' efa liseèe rfaè' anaè.	Let us not be weary in doing good, for we will reap in due season, if we don't give up.
Buu wááwá ce a sañ mbe ñwaè' mncir ba mbe mñwaè' ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, vi táá ba mbenduè mncir bbaa ca.”	"The whole law and the prophets depend on these two commandments."""
Weèe aè ka' byemi wa'a, a ba rduèñshïì neè ñgaâa rbyemïì ce aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè ba aè ñgoâñ AÈkayaè.	so that you became an example to all who believe in Macedonia and in Achaia.
Yá neè ená buu ce weèe aè m yá'ni efa rkáè' vi cu njep weâe mntee. Buu ce weèe aè m yá'ni na vi ka' cu njep weâe mntee baná weèe be ba aèbee weèe muu ba Taèr.	Therefore, as for you, let that remain in you which you heard from the beginning. If that which you heard from the beginning remains in you, you also will remain in the Son, and in the Father.
Wáè ce aè ce naèa nyor ená aè riñ mncir Nyúè seê, waè' wáâ ke geèe beèe a ce laèa bebep aèmboè Nyúè njobeè' aè ce bú' mncir anaè a?	You who glory in the law, through your disobedience of the law do you dishonor God?
E m tuu bsoogáè mbe shañ, woweèe a du a tee tu ese Joân,	and he sent and beheaded John in the prison.
Weèe aè ka' ce so'niñgoèñ, baná weèe ce geèe ba yuu bebep, weèe aè bú' ncir Nyúè.	But if you show partiality, you commit sin, being convicted by the law as transgressors.
Yi ka' ba yáánïì ená má máè duê, weèr woweèe du bsïìp.	If it is appropriate for me to go also, they will go with me.
Waè' beèe ce aède' a fa', tar buu enjep mmboè ka' ce yeñger, ku ba weèr Baènabaès a?	Or have only Barnabas and I no right to not work?
Muu ca ce kwe mbɛp.	This child is suffering from cold.
E koni rfàʼ.	He has got a job.
Woweèe a m laèa enáê, “Mboè ñwáè ca a Jisoès muu Josáèf a? To seèe rïìñ yïì ta ba yïì maê. E ka' ce laèa enáê, ‘Máè suèu embe buèu’ njoká?”	"They said, ""Isn't this Jesus, the son of Joseph, whose father and mother we know? How then does he say, 'I have come down out of heaven?'"""
Ñwáè ce e yu weèr ye ku ba Luêk. Loèr Mak tá weèe ye vú tá e bo jaè' máè aè rfaè' ce m ce geèe.	Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with you, for he is useful to me for service.
Ka' yi m ba wa'a, Tata Jisoès aè ku ba weèr ye a fa máè ñger, tá m bo feè'shi buu Nyúè wááwá neè beèe enje jáá tá woweèe a yu'. Nyúè aè m fúr máè ekuè cuèu búrúè'.
