Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	27	njobeè' máè m buu efa rsuñ weèe buu wááwá ce Nyúè aè koèñ ená vi ba ka'.	for I didn't shrink from declaring to you the whole counsel of God.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	28	Keè'ni neè wee btu ker ke'ni njeèe ce Yú' Rara yi fa mba weâe mmboè. Fyá' neè aè cor Nyúè ce e m yuu neè bláá muu yïì.	Take heed, therefore, to yourselves, and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to shepherd the assembly of the Lord and God which he purchased with his own blood.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	29	Máè rïìñ máná m be duè wáá tá bkuura vi ñaa bcuèu niñ a weâe mú, fa ñgá' neè beèe Nyúè wááwá.	For I know that after my departure, vicious wolves will enter in among you, not sparing the flock.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	30	Beèe mo' efa weâe mú seeseê, a be toosi blaèa mini tá a bo súèñ beèe moè' efa ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès duè aègho aè mbeèp yaèp.	Men will arise from among your own selves, speaking perverse things, to draw away the disciples after them.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	31	Baná weèe lor nfeè', ker kuushi foñ ená máè m cep weèe neè mñgoommir- ñwáè, neètú' ker ba neèmootïì, aè bfeâ' btaar.”	Therefore watch, remembering that for a period of three years I didn't cease to admonish everyone night and day with tears.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	32	“Káâ' seè'ni na, máè láè weèe mbe mmbo Nyúè, a ker ma'shi weèe neè yi nlaèa aèmboè yi ntee boèñboñ. AÈde' nlaèa anaè yi gee weèe ce ba yáánïì, koni bti' weèe beèe wááwá ce Nyúè aè geèe a ba brara.	Now, brothers, I entrust you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build up, and to give you the inheritance among all those who are sanctified.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	33	Máè m gani mbaâa ñwáè moè' káè bcáâ' ñwáè moè' ka'.	I coveted no one's silver, or gold, or clothing.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	34	Wee weèe foñ rïìñ ená máè m faè' neè ma mmbo, a ja' ya tu, a ker ja' beèe ce weèr woweèe aè m ce faè'.	You yourselves know that these hands served my necessities, and those who were with me.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	20	35	Buu wááwá ce máè m geèe vi m ba aè rduèñshi weèe ená seèe fa' aè njáâá wa'a tá seèe bo ce jaè' beèe ce a buu ñger. Seâe geèe wa'a ce kuushi blaèa ce Tata Jisoès aè laèa.” E m laèa enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ce fa fa, yu ñwáè mboâñtu caa ñwáè ce e ce koo yi koo.”	In all things I gave you an example, that so laboring you ought to help the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, that he himself said, 'It is more blessed to give than to receive.'"
E ka' fúú, Jisoès aè laa enáê, “A kuè'si Muu Ñwáè seè'ni. A ku'si Nyúè njïì enjep ye.	"When he had gone out, Jesus said, ""Now the Son of Man has been glorified, and God has been glorified in him."
Beâe bgoèrgoèr ca a cepshïì beèe ená a laa tá Pailáèt fúr ba Baèrabaès fa neè woweèe.	But the chief priests stirred up the multitude, that he should release Barabbas to them instead.
ená buu wááwá ba beèe wááwá ce a yu mbe buèu, a ker ba mbe tunshe, ker ba beèe ce a yu mbaè yir a yu' rlii Jisoès bo gú'shi,	that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of those in heaven, those on earth, and those under the earth,
“Yi ku ba foñ ená aède' ñwáè niñ mbe ndaèp ñwáè ñger, kwá' yïì buu du aègho ka', ce yi ka' tá ba ená e kur ñwáè ñger anaè ka'. E ka' kur ye wáá, e ka' kwá' buu embe yeâ ndaèp.	But no one can enter into the house of the strong man to plunder, unless he first binds the strong man; and then he will plunder his house.
E tàŋte à ntaaŋguu.	She stumbled over a stick.
Weèe ce gee tá woweèe a yu' nsuñ ce e yu aèmboè ryoèñ ce nfeseè. Weèe gee wa'a tá m bo koni yuu ce m naatu aègho, aè noèñ ce Kraâis aè vúè, faè dïì' yi bo keè ba ená máè m yú nyor aè cicïì ka'.	holding up the word of life; that I may have something to boast in the day of Christ, that I didn't run in vain nor labor in vain.
Má máè ce gheèter aè rgeèe tá nyor boñ ñwáè wááwá aè buu wááwá ce m ce geèe. Má ke kwaè'shi ba aè yuu ce aètaè yi ja' ba máè caè'caè' ka'. Má ke kwaè'shi ba aèmboè yuu ce aètaè yi ja' beèe wááwá, tá woweèe a bo luèñ efa buu bbebep.	even as I also please all men in all things, not seeking my own profit, but the profit of the many, that they may be saved.
Woweèe a yop yáá fi enáê, “Wáè ghááte aè rloèr fuè ñwaè', naèa nlaèadoñ ce a sïìñ bcuèu efa gho aègho naè, njobeè' a m sáá wáè, wáè lor wo bláá a yuu beèe aègho neè Nyúè. Wáè yuu woweèe aè mntáè' wááwá, ce vi yu aè bto' wááwá a ce laèa bli jáá jáèá jáá.	"They sang a new song, saying, ""You are worthy to take the book, and to open its seals: for you were killed, and bought us for God with your blood, out of every tribe, language, people, and nation,"
Geewa'a ñwáè aè ka' ce jáèr neètú' baná ñgaèñ be kote njobeè' rraa li yu njep ye ka'.”	"But if a man walks in the night, he stumbles, because the light isn't in him."""
Baná weèe suusi yeè nyor njeptii Nyúè ce e túr ñger, nfeè' aè ka' gháá, tá e bo naèa weèe mbekïì.	Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time;
Weèr a yu' aèmboè e ce laèa ená Jisoès ce aè rla' Nasaráèt be saè'si dïì' ca keèr kupse ndeèe to' ce Musïìs aè m fa neè seèe.”	"For we have heard him say that this Jesus of Nazareth will destroy this place, and will change the customs which Moses delivered to us."""
Máè gheèter a cañ mcañnïì ce mmboèñmboñ a misïî, a táá ba njep mini a ba' aèlúèsimbuèu.	I have fought the good fight. I have finished the course. I have kept the faith.
Beèe moè' ce beèe Farïìsi a m tuu	The ones who had been sent were from the Pharisees.
Njeñwáè ka' fúú bguèu, e fa keèr yá nduu moè' ka'. Ka' ba ená e yá nduu moè', e kútïì ba a nduu yïì caè. Yi yu foñ ená mbañruèñwáè fa juèu ñgwa yïì ka'.	(but if she departs, let her remain unmarried, or else be reconciled to her husband), and that the husband not leave his wife.
Bkar waê, weèe fa byemi byú' bsïìp ka'. Weèe taase byú' aè ryá ená vi loè ese Nyúè lá, njobeè' beèe magoèr ce a bo'shi ená a yu ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, a yu aè ñgoèñ.	Beloved, don't believe every spirit, but test the spirits, whether they are of God, because many false prophets have gone out into the world.
E ka' kuè bii ce laèa, kúr beèe a vúê. Ñwáè ce a m ce too ená Judaès, ce e m ba moè' efa beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú naè, aè táá kuèntombïì neè woweèe. E m vúè a ba' aègee Jisoès tá e bo baa ye nje nyoèr.	While he was still speaking, behold, a multitude, and he who was called Judas, one of the twelve, was leading them. He came near to Jesus to kiss him.
A mbuèu ce woweèe a túr ñger aè rtáá kuèntombïì neè kaèbaèraè' Nyúè, ce faè' neè ye mbe yeâ ndaèp neètú' ba neèmootïì. Ñwáè ce e cu mbe kaèbaèraè' be ba a woweèe, súèti woweèe faè dïì' yuu mo' yi bo joèo woweèe ka'.	Therefore they are before the throne of God, they serve him day and night in his temple. He who sits on the throne will spread his tabernacle over them.
Yèr ŋkʉʉ tʉr bcìndap.	Our chief has messengers.
AÈde' ñgwa ñwáè cu neè yi tu ka'. Ñwáè ce e túr ñger mbe yeâ nduè yu nduu yïì. AÈde' nduu ñwáè cu neè yi tu ka'. Ñwáè ce e túr ñger mbe yeâ nduè yu ñgwa yïì.	The wife doesn't have authority over her own body, but the husband. Likewise also the husband doesn't have authority over his own body, but the wife.
Weèr aè byáè' rkwe Jisoès nje weâr mnyoèr aè nfeè' wááwá, tá li ryoèñ li bo yááti nje weâr mnyoèr foñ.	always carrying in the body the putting to death of the Lord Jesus, that the life of Jesus may also be revealed in our body.
E laa ená woweèe a laa tá beèe anaè a cute aè mjáá aè bkúr aè bkúr.	He commanded them that everyone should sit down in groups on the green grass.
“Buu wááwá ce weèe ce yá na, nfeè' moè' be keè ba tá luèr mo' cu nje Ndap Nyúè ca ka'. A be keè káèáshi vi wááwá.”	As for these things which you see, the days will come, in which there will not be left here one stone on another that will not be thrown down.
Jisoès aè ma'shïì ye ená e du mbe yeâ ndaèp, a laa neè ye ená e fa keèr duè aè múè la' ka'.	"He sent him away to his house, saying, ""Don't enter into the village, nor tell anyone in the village."""
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ñwáè aè ka' ce yu' yuu ce m ce laèa, ce geèe yi, baná rkwe li be joèo ye ka'.”	"Most certainly, I tell you, if a person keeps my word, he will never see death."""
E ka' kuè fúú enjep roè, Yú' yi ku lor ye a du aègho aè ntee rïìñ.	Immediately the Spirit drove him out into the wilderness.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' weèe aè m ku bii aè túè'nji, Sataèn aè m ce bo' weèe aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá, a gee weèe aè ce caè'ni mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na ce vi ke laèa ka'.	You know that when you were heathen, you were led away to those mute idols, however you might be led.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè woweèe enáê, “M be bipshi yuu mo'sir neè weèe. Weèe aè ka' beesïî, baná m suñ weèe ñwáè ce e fa máè ñger aè rgeèe buu ca.	"Jesus said to them, ""I will ask you one question. Answer me, and I will tell you by what authority I do these things."
Yuu ce aède' weèr kwa'shïì aègho, lu'shi aègho, ker naatu aègho kuèntombïì neè yïìseèe Tata Jisoès aè nfeè' ce e be vúè naè, yu ba ká caa efa weèe?	For what is our hope, or joy, or crown of rejoicing? Isn't it even you, before our Lord Jesus at his coming?
AÈ m ba efa rkáè' weèe aè ce geèe boèñboñ seê. AÈ geèe ba nda, weèe aè ka' borni efa rgeèe yuu mini?	You were running well! Who interfered with you that you should not obey the truth?
Wee weèe ce lu'shi, tá seèe lu'shi bsïìp.	In the same way, you also rejoice, and rejoice with me.
Wèr à koo kyɛŋ ŋgwe màna.	We caught a stray dog down there.
Ñwáè wááwá ce e byemi ená Jisoès yu Kraêis, ñgaèñ yu muu Nyúè. Ñwáè wááwá ce e koèñ tar muu, koèñ muu anaè foñ.	Whoever believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God. Whoever loves the Father also loves the child who is born of him.
Woweèe a ka' tuu neèñguu roè, a cúú keñ aèwaâa roè, a ba seè'ni ba aè ñgoâñ Gáènásaráèt.	When they had crossed over, they came to land at Gennesaret, and moored to the shore.
M ce lu'shi magoèr aèmboè ñwáè Tataê, njobeè' máè yá ená weèe aè ker kuushi a ja' máè aèmboè weèe aè m ce jaè' entoèmbïì naè. Weèe aè m ku ce ne kuushi máè, a ka' buu ba njïì aè rjaè' máè.	But I rejoice in the Lord greatly, that now at length you have revived your thought for me; in which you did indeed take thought, but you lacked opportunity.
Beèe wááwá aè ñgoâñ Gáèrasaè a m laèa ená Jisoès duê, njobeè' woweèe a m ce wáp magoèr seê. Yi ka' ba wa'a, e niñ mbe keñ tá e bo kúti.	All the people of the surrounding country of the Gadarenes asked him to depart from them, for they were very much afraid. He entered into the boat, and returned.
“M ce duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm seè'ni na aèmboè Yú' Rara yi laèa ená m duê, a ke' riñ yuu ce yi be duè koni máè aèfo ka'.	Now, behold, I go bound by the Spirit to Jerusalem, not knowing what will happen to me there;
AÈde' ñwáè ce a ce yá'ni ye caa yïì ñwáè ryá'nïì ka'. AÈde' ñwáè rfaè' caa yïì masaè ka'.	"A disciple is not above his teacher, nor a servant above his lord.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	25	Yi yu yáánïì ená ñwáè yá'ni buu ba aèmboè ñwáè ce e yá'ni ye buu anaè, tá ñwáè rfaè' ba aèmboè yïì masaè. A ka' too masaè ñwáè ndap ená Básábuèl (Sataèn), baná a be too beèe embe ndaèp yïì ená ká?”	It is enough for the disciple that he be like his teacher, and the servant like his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebul, how much more those of his household!
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	26	“Baná weèe fa wáp woweèe ka' njobeè' yuu mo' yi yu ce a tá'shi ce yi be keèe buu efa ryááti aèwañ ka', yuu mo' yi ba ce a súèti ce beèe a be keèe buu efa rrïìñ ka'.	Therefore don't be afraid of them, for there is nothing covered that will not be revealed; and hidden that will not be known.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	27	Buu ce m ce suñ weèe neètú', suñ neè aè mmir wañ. Buu ce a cúèúni neè weèe, suñ neè embe btu mndap.	What I tell you in the darkness, speak in the light; and what you hear whispered in the ear, proclaim on the housetops.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	28	Weèe fa wáp beèe ce a ke yú ñwáè wáá, moo aè ryú ryoèñ ñwáè laèr naè ka'. Wáp neè ba ñwáè ce aède' e yú ryoèñ ba nyor njep mor.	Don't be afraid of those who kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul. Rather, fear him who is able to destroy both soul and body in Gehenna.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	10	29	Mboè a ke fyeèni bbe' bbaa aè fraâñ mmbaa a? AÈde' moè' efa bbe' ca gwe aè nsheè ce yeè Ta aè buu efa rbyemïì ka'.	Aren't two sparrows sold for an assarion coin? Not one of them falls on the ground apart from your Father's will,"
M ce lu'shi njobeè' aède' m lá ntee njep weèe neè mini-ñwáè.	I rejoice that in everything I am confident concerning you.
Nyúè aè m koèñ ená e gee tá yïì beèe a yá ená rboèñ efa nsuñ ce e caèa buu wááwá na li yu neè beèe enje jáá foñ. Nsuñ ce e geèe seèe aè riñ na yu ená Jisos Kraâis yu njep weâe mntee, yi ka' ba wa'a, weèe aè riñ ená weèe be koni ñgúè' moè' efa foèo Nyúè.	to whom God was pleased to make known what are the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory;
Ñwáè aè ka' ce laèa ená e byemi neè Nyúè, ke' ghashi li rlee ka', baná e bo' yi tu. Li rbyemïì anaè li yu aè cicïì.	If anyone among you thinks himself to be religious while he doesn't bridle his tongue, but deceives his heart, this man's religion is worthless.
Máè m ba mbaè mmbo Yú' Rara, ncïìndap Nyúè aè lor máè a du aègho mbe tu ma rtuèu ce li m saèp seê. Weèr ye aè ka' baè' mbo, e duñshïì máè Jáèrusaláèm ce yu rla' rrara ce li m loè ese Nyúè, aèmboè li ce suèu embe buèu.	He carried me away in the Spirit to a great and high mountain, and showed me the holy city, Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God,
Jus a m byemi yap yu ená ñwáè anaè aè m be fep a ka' lo a ce yá buu ka', caar woweèe a ká' yïì ta ba yïì maê,	The Jews therefore did not believe concerning him, that he had been blind, and had received his sight, until they called the parents of him who had received his sight,
Wɛ̌ kwàʼshi enɛ mmir mmii mi ke yɛ buu kaʼ a?	Do you think that his own eyes do not see?
Pol aè ka' loè ená e ce laèa, Gaèliyoè aè laa enáê, “Yu' ka neè lá Juês! Weèe aè ka' ba ce laèa ená Pol aè geèe yuu mo' bebep káè e bú' ncir mo' tatap áè, máè ba loèr nfeè', yu' yuu ce weèe ce laèa.	"But when Paul was about to open his mouth, Gallio said to the Jews, ""If indeed it were a matter of wrong or of wicked crime, you Jews, it would be reasonable that I should bear with you;"
E m vúè a yá máè, a táá a máâ geñ a laa enáê, ‘Nfúraâ Soêl, yá buu.’ Máè yá buu aè nfeè' anaè, a yá ye aèmboè e táá.	came to me, and standing by me said to me, 'Brother Saul, receive your sight!' In that very hour I looked up at him.
Ntoʼ enje Mbòr yu ŋayaŋ.	Mbot palace is unenclosed.
Bkar waê, baná m ce laèa neè weèe ená weèe fa túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na ka'.	Therefore, my beloved, flee from idolatry.
[M ce loo máná tá yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraâis túr weèe wááwá aè ntee boèñboñ. Yi yu wa'a.]	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all! Amen.
Btu mntáè' ca a m ko'ndoñ neè Josáèf, a fyeni ye aè to' Ijïìp. Geewa'a Nyúè aè m ba a ye,	"The patriarchs, moved with jealousy against Joseph, sold him into Egypt. God was with him,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	10	a ja' ye efa yïì ñgá' wááwá, a gee Fároè ce e m ba ñkúú aè to' Ijïìp aè túr ye aè ntee boèñboñ, a gee e yáátïì ñwáè bfee a yeâ bsii. Yi ka' ba wa'a, e gee ye aè ñwáè rsa' aè to' Ijïìp ker ba mbe yeâ ndaèp.	and delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favor and wisdom before Pharaoh, king of Egypt. He made him governor over Egypt and all his house.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	11	“Njeè aè m koo aè ñgoâñ Ijïìp wááwá ba aè ñgoâñ Kánaèn foñ, ñgá' aè ba seê, viseèe bta a ke' túr yuu ye ka'.	Now a famine came over all the land of Egypt and Canaan, and great affliction. Our fathers found no food.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	12	Jakoèp aè ka' yu' ená byee vi yu aè to' Ijïìp, e tuu viseèe bta aè nfeè' entombïì.	But when Jacob heard that there was grain in Egypt, he sent out our fathers the first time.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	13	Woweèe a ka' kúti keèr duè aè nfeè' embenjïì, Josáèf aè gee woweèe a riñ ye, Fároè aè lo a riñ ndap Josáèf.	On the second time Joseph was made known to his brothers, and Joseph's race was revealed to Pharaoh.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	14	Josáèf aè tuu beèe ená a du vúè neè Jakoèp ce aè m ba yïì taê, ker ba beèe embe yeâ ndaèp ce a m ba beèe ncoèp-ta-aè-mnsaèambaê.	Joseph sent, and summoned Jacob, his father, and all his relatives, seventy-five souls.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	15	Jakoèp aè m duè aè to' Ijïìp. E m kwe, viseèe bta caè a kweñgeèr foñ.	Jacob went down into Egypt, and he died, himself and our fathers,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	16	Woweèe a ka' kweñger, a lor woweèe a kúti aègho aè rla' Shákïìm a tuñ njep rsheè ce Abraèham aè m yuu neè mbaèa ese boo Hamoèr.	and they were brought back to Shechem, and laid in the tomb that Abraham bought for a price in silver from the children of Hamor of Shechem.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	17	“Nfeè' mkaè'ni ce Nyúè aè m kaè' neè Abraèham naè aè ka' ce gháá, beèe ca a ku', a yaa aè ñgoâñ Ijïìp,	But as the time of the promise came close which God had sworn to Abraham, the people grew and multiplied in Egypt,"
M ce laa neè weèe ená ñwáè ce e ka' suñ aè bsii beèe ená e yu yaè ñwáè, baná Muu Ñwáè be suñ aèmboè ye foñ aè bsii bcïìndap Nyúè.	"I tell you, everyone who confesses me before men, him will the Son of Man also confess before the angels of God;
Luke	Luêk	12	9	Ñwáè ce e ka' máñni máè aè bsii beèe baná m be keè máñni ye aè bsii bcïìndap Nyúè foñ.	but he who denies me in the presence of men will be denied in the presence of the angels of God.
Luke	Luêk	12	10	Ñwáè aè ka' laa yuu mo' bebep kuu Muu Ñwáè baná a be foèosi ye. Geewa'a, ñwáè ce e ka' bepsi rlii Yú' Rara baná a be foèosi ñgaèñ ka'.	Everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven, but those who blaspheme against the Holy Spirit will not be forgiven.
Luke	Luêk	12	11	A ka' lor weèe du aègho aè mndap mloo, káè neè ñgaâa rsa' ce a túr ñger naè áè, weèe fa ce kwaè'shi ená weèe be duè beèesi káè laèa wee ká lá ka',	When they bring you before the synagogues, the rulers, and the authorities, don't be anxious how or what you will answer, or what you will say;
Luke	Luêk	12	12	njobeè' Yú' Rara yi be fa weèe blaèa ce yáánïì aè rlaèa aè nfeè' anaè.”	for the Holy Spirit will teach you in that same hour what you must say."
Yi yu ená seèe ja' viseèe mnyor. M be túr ñger njo' le rbyemïì tá weèe túr ñger njo' la rbyemïì.	that is, that I with you may be encouraged in you, each of us by the other's faith, both yours and mine.
E ba aè nfeè' moè' beèe a naa weèr, e ba aè nfeè' moè' a coosïì weèr. E ba aè nfeè' moè' beèe a laa buu bbebep aèmboè weèr, e ba aè nfeè' moè' a laa buu bboèñboñ. Beèe a loè lor weèr aèmboè ñgaâa mnde' wa'a, weèr ku ce laèa yer yu ba yuu mini.	by glory and dishonor, by evil report and good report; as deceivers, and yet true;
Bwee bvi yû.	We have gathered all the cups.
Woweèe a ku ce bipshi neè ye ená e laèa yi ená ká lá? E naa nyor mbekïì a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè moè' aè ka' ba a weâe mú ce e m be gee yuu bebep ka', baná ñgaèñ túú njeñwáè ca neè luèr entombïì.”	"But when they continued asking him, he looked up and said to them, ""He who is without sin among you, let him throw the first stone at her."""
Wèr à toosi kʉ̀.	We have twisted the rope.
“Yú' Tata yi yu weèr ye, njobeè' Nyúè aè ce máè ená m fe'shi nsuñ mboèñmboñ neè ñgaâa fuèp. E tuu máè ená m du suñ beèe ce a yu mbe shañ ená nfeè' aè gháá ce a be fúr woweèe efa shañ, tá beèe ce a feèp a yá buu, tá beèe ce beèe a ce jar neè woweèe a luñ efa ñgá',	"The Spirit of the Lord is on me, because he has anointed me to preach good news to the poor. He has sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to proclaim release to the captives, recovering of sight to the blind, to deliver those who are crushed,
Luke	Luêk	4	19	ker suñ aèmboè nfeè' ce Tata Nyúè be ghoèni yïì beèe.”	and to proclaim the acceptable year of the Lord."
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a beesïì neè ye enáê, “Bráâd yi be ka' loè efá aè ntee rïìñ ca, ce aède' yi ghááteè aè ryañ woweèe?”	"His disciples answered him, ""From where could one satisfy these people with bread here in a deserted place?"""
E ka' laèa neè yïì nyor wa' wáá, a nati a du a yá yïì taê. A ka' nyáá aènjïìsaèp, yïì ta aè yá ye, a koosimnse neè ye, a cañ a baa ye nje nyoèr, a nyo'shi ye.	"He arose, and came to his father. But while he was still far off, his father saw him, and was moved with compassion, and ran, and fell on his neck, and kissed him.
Luke	Luêk	15	21	Muu yïì ca aè laa neè ye enáê, ‘Yaè taê, máè geèe yuu bebep neè Nyúè, ba neè wáè foñ. M ker ghááte ce aède' aè too máè ená muu woè ka'.’	The son said to him, 'Father, I have sinned against heaven, and in your sight. I am no longer worthy to be called your son.'
Luke	Luêk	15	22	Taèr aè laa neè yi ñgaâa mfaè' enáê, ‘Duè neè cárcár du lor mñgaèbúlaè vïû bboèñboñ vú aègho ma' ye aè nyoèr, fa ye tee kuè ntubo, yarsi ye blaba' aè mkuèu.	But the father said to his servants, 'Bring out the best robe, and put it on him. Put a ring on his hand, and shoes on his feet."
E ye baa àmnsòŋ.	He has eaten food without soup.
E gwe aè nsheè a yu' aèmboè njeèndoñ ce laèa neè ye enáê, “Soêl, Soêl, aè ce jar neè máè njoká?”	"He fell on the earth, and heard a voice saying to him, ""Saul, Saul, why do you persecute me?"""
caar tá m gee tá aè tár mo mkuèu mbenduè beèe ce a baèa wáè.”’	"until I make your enemies the footstool of your feet.""'"
Yi yu aèmboè yes ce njeñwáè aè m loèr a fe' mkúèñ bráâd mñkaâa btaar, a top aègho caar mkúèñ anaè mi ko'.”	"It is like yeast, which a woman took and hid in three measures of flour, until it was all leavened."""
E m geèe buu ca tá beèe wááwá a bo yá buu boèñboñ ce e m geèe neè seèe ce seèe yu aèbee seèe Jisoès weèe, rïìñ yi ntee boèñboñ ce yi caèa ñger.	that in the ages to come he might show the exceeding riches of his grace in kindness toward us in Christ Jesus;
E ka' ce kwaè'shi aè rgeèe wa'a, a yá rlo aèmboè ncïìndap Tata Nyúè aè vúè a laa neè ye enáê, “Josáèf muu Dávïìd, fa wáp aè rloèr ñgwa woâ Máèári ka', njobeè' muu ce e yu njep yeâ rbúè naè aè loè ba ese Yú' Rara.	"But when he thought about these things, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared to him in a dream, saying, ""Joseph, son of David, don't be afraid to take to yourself Mary, your wife, for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Spirit."
Jisoès aè m laèa buu ca neè woweèe aè nfeè' ce e m ce yá'ni mbe Ndaèp Nyúè a ba ba mbe dïì' ce a m ce fa rfa. Ñwáè moè' aè m koo ye ka' njobeè' yïì nfeè' aè m be gháá ka'.	Jesus spoke these words in the treasury, as he taught in the temple. Yet no one arrested him, because his hour had not yet come.
Beè'teè anaè yi yu ba aè múè rla' ka'. A ka' nyáèñ gráâp anaè bláá vi fúú enjo. Bsaèp efa gho vi m ba bkïìlomátaè mjeèe mtaar, rcoomïì efa gho li ba aèmboè rkoo rmo'sir.	The winepress was trodden outside of the city, and blood came out from the winepress, even to the bridles of the horses, as far as one thousand six hundred stadia.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè Yú' Rara yi gee Jisoès aè ce lu'shi seê, a laa enáê, “Taèr, Tata ce e túr rbuu ba nshe, m ce yoèñshi wáè njobeè' wáè súèti buu ca ese ñgaâa bfee, ba beèe ce a rïìñ buu, a duñshi vi ba neè boo bká'. ÁÈno Taèr, ca yu ba yuu ce wáè m ce yu' rboèñ aè rgeèe.”	"In that same hour Jesus rejoiced in the Holy Spirit, and said, ""I thank you, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you have hidden these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to little children. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight."""
Jisoès aè loâ aèfo, a caa aèwaâa roâ aè ñgoèñ Galeèleê, a ko' mbe rtuèu, a cu aè nsheè.	Jesus departed there, and came near to the sea of Galilee; and he went up into the mountain, and sat there.
A mbuèu ce a m feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè beèe ce a m kweñger, tá woweèe a bo cu aè yú' aèmboè Nyúè ce cu naè. Woweèe a be cu wa'a, ka' a m sa' woweèe aè nfeè' ce woweèe a m ba njep ñgoèñ na, woweèe a kwe aèmboè beèe wááwá a ke kwe naè wa'a.	For to this end the Good News was preached even to the dead, that they might be judged indeed as men in the flesh, but live as to God in the spirit.
Ka' e m ba muu Nyúè wa'a, e m rïìñ aèmboè aède' e yu'nïì neè Nyúè ba njo' ñgá' ce e m loè a yá.	though he was a Son, yet learned obedience by the things which he suffered.
AÈ ka' ba aè noèñ mo', Pitaè ba Joân a du mbe Ndaèp Nyúè aè nyúè taar neèmootïì. AÈ m ba nfeè' ce a m ce duè mbo ce geèe rloo.	Peter and John were going up into the temple at the hour of prayer, the ninth hour.
Buu ca wááwá vi m ba wa'a tá yuu ce Tata Nyúè aè m laèa njïì enjep yïì ñwáè ncep ntuu yi bo ghááte njo. E m laèa enáê,	Now all this has happened, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the Lord through the prophet, saying,
Buu e ke caŋ ce loʼŋger.	When a squirrel is running, it dodges from one end to the other.
Fa kuè no ba mdip caè'caè' ka', no mú mruè' múcaèr tá mi bo jaè' wáè a rbúè ce li ce fa wáè ñgá', aè ce yañ cá'cá' se naè.	Be no longer a drinker of water only, but use a little wine for your stomach's sake and your frequent infirmities.
Weèr aè ka' cu aèfo aè mú mnoâñ mo', ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè ce a m ce too ená AÈgaboès aè vúâ aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè.	As we stayed there some days, a certain prophet named Agabus came down from Judea.
Shɛɛ e ke nìʼ sê.	Shey always delays.
E m laèa wa'a, aè rduèñshi njáèá rkwe ce Pitaè be keè kwe, kuè'si Nyúè aègho. Cena yi ka' mïì wáá, e laa neè ye enáê, “Vúè fa máâ mbuèu.”	"Now he said this, signifying by what kind of death he would glorify God. When he had said this, he said to him, ""Follow me."""
Woweèe a m vúè a yá bár ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu, ku' beèe a sir woweèe, ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a ce sár nsár a woweèe.	Coming to the disciples, he saw a great multitude around them, and scribes questioning them.
Saimúèn aè beesïì enáê, “Masaè, weèr aè faè' neètú' tatap seê, caar túè' aè raa, a ke' koo yuu ka'. Geewa'a, aèmboè wáè laèa na, baná m be maè' mraa njep roè.”	"Simon answered him, ""Master, we worked all night, and took nothing; but at your word I will let down the net."""
Jisoès aè ker du a ker loo aèmboè e ba loo naè.	Again he went away, and prayed, saying the same words.
E m ba du mbe dïû' rara nfeè' aèñgoo, e m ba yá ñgá' foñ nfeè' aèñgoo ká' embe nfeè' ce Nyúè aè m geèe ñgoèñ. E m geèe wa' ka'. E vúè ba nfeè' moè'sir aè nfeè' ce ñgoèñ yi ce mïì na, a lor yïì nyor a tañshi tañshïì aègho tá e bo siñsi buu bbebep ce beèe a geèe, nfeseè.	or else he must have suffered often since the foundation of the world. But now once at the end of the ages, he has been revealed to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself.
“M ce loo ba neè woweèe caè'caè' ka', m ce loo foñ neè beèe wááwá ce a be byemi neè máè njobeè' wap blaèa.	Not for these only do I pray, but for those also who believe in me through their word,
Máè suñ weèe buu ca tá nfeè' ka' gháá, vi koni, tá weèe bo kuushi ená máè m suñ weèe. “Máè m suñ weèe buu ca efa rkáè' ka' njobeè' seèe aè m ku ba.	But I have told you these things, so that when the time comes, you may remember that I told you about them. I didn't tell you these things from the beginning, because I was with you.
Yi boèñ ená seèe ce seèe yu bleebeèe aè buu Nyúè seèe túr njáèá mkwaè'shïì ca. Yuu mo' yi ka' ba aègho ce weèe ce kwaè'shi jáá baná Nyúè be naèshi yuu anaè neè weèe.	Let us therefore, as many as are perfect, think this way. If in anything you think otherwise, God will also reveal that to you.
AÈ ka' ba aè mú ñgaèptú' seê, Jisoès aè nyáá a du aè dïì' mo' ce beèe a m ba ka', a gee rloo aèfo.	Early in the morning, while it was still dark, he rose up and went out, and departed into a deserted place, and prayed there.
Caè'ni neè bfúr wee, baa woweèe nje nyoèr aè rlii Jisoès. Bcor wááwá vi caè'ni weèe.	Greet one another with a holy kiss. The assemblies of Christ greet you.
“Yú' bebep yi ke fúú enjep ñwáè kashi aè ñgoâñ yuur aè rroèo dïû' rlúèshïì. Yi ka' roo yá ka',	But the unclean spirit, when he is gone out of the man, passes through waterless places, seeking rest, and doesn't find it.
Pitaè aè m káè' a ce ye byee a beèe enje jáá weèe. Jáms aè ka' tuu Jus mo' ená a vú yá Pitaè, Pitaè aè bornïì efa rye byee a beèe enje jáá caè, a fúr yïì nyor efa múè woweèe. E m geèe wa'a njobeè' e m ce wáp Jus mo' ce a m ce laèa ená ñwáè aè ka' tá geèe búè ka', ñgaèñ ba ñwáè rbyemïì ka'.	For before some people came from James, he ate with the Gentiles. But when they came, he drew back and separated himself, fearing those who were of the circumcision.
Woowèe a koʼ kùna.	They have gone up there.
Ca yu yuu báèá ka', njobeè' Sataèn ye ye e ke loè yááti aèmboè ncïìndap Nyúè ce e yu ñwáè rraa.	And no wonder, for even Satan masquerades as an angel of light.
Ñwaè' ca ce sañ máâ Pol weèr Timotïì ce weèr yu ñgaâa mfaè' neè Jisos Kraêis. Weèr ce sañ neè weèe ce weèe yu beèe Nyúè aè rla' Fileèpaêi, ce weèe aè tarshi weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe, a ker ce sañ neè wee btu embe coêr, ker ba bdikïìn.	Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ; To all the saints in Christ Jesus who are at Philippi, with the overseers and servants:
Máè bú ghup. Ñwáè ce e be jaè' máè efa nyor ce e be geèe tá m kwe na yu nda?	What a wretched man I am! Who will deliver me out of the body of this death?
E m kwe a seâe btuè tá e bo fúr seèe efa buu bbebep, keèr geèe tá seèe ba brara enjep ntee, ba yïì beèe ce a ce lu'shi aè rgeèe ba buu bboèñboñ.	who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify for himself a people for his own possession, zealous for good works.
Buu ca vi be keè bú tá aè ku cu nfeseè. Vi be kúti brúèú aèmboè bcáè' wa'a.	They will perish, but you continue. They all will grow old like a garment does.
Siŋ cu mbe ce.	The bird is sitting up in the tree.
Jisoès aè riñ yuu ce woweèe a m ce kwaè'shi, a koo mú ghaèrñwáè a tár a yeâ geñ,	Jesus, perceiving the reasoning of their hearts, took a little child, and set him by his side,
Joân ñwáè baèptir beèe aè m nyáá aè ntee rïìñ, a ce feè'shi ená beèe a kupse, ma' yaèp buu bbebep tá a baptir woweèe, tá Nyúè bo foèosi woweèe.	John came baptizing in the wilderness and preaching the baptism of repentance for forgiveness of sins.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, Tata be vúè tá e búú beèe búèú aèmboè nyáèá wa'a. Be keè ba aè nfeè' anaè tá rbuu li coêo, ce barñger aèmboè mor wa'a, bú. Buu embe buèu wááwá vi be keè she, tá ñgoèñ foñ ba buu wááwá enjep ñgoèñ vi bú.	But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night; in which the heavens will pass away with a great noise, and the elements will be dissolved with fervent heat, and the earth and the works that are in it will be burned up.
AÈsayaè aè m ce laèa buu ca wa'a njobeè' e m yá foèo Jisoès, a ce laèa ba aèmboè ye.	Isaiah said these things when he saw his glory, and spoke of him.
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a baashïì bbábá' bráâd ba btete nca, vi ruu aè mñkaèa ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú.	They took up twelve baskets full of broken pieces and also of the fish.
Nyúè ce e yu yïìseèe Taê, ker ba Jisos Kraâis ce e yu Tata neè weèr foñ, túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, ker fa weèe cumúnyañ.	Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Ñwáè moè' efa seâe mú ce cu neè yi tu ka'. Ñwáè moè' efa seâe mú ce kwe neè yi tu ka'.	For none of us lives to himself, and none dies to himself.
Woweèe a ka' geèe buu wááwá ce a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená a be keè geèe neè ye naè, a suusi ye embe ce, a lá njep rsheè.	When they had fulfilled all things that were written about him, they took him down from the tree, and laid him in a tomb.
E túr aè rba ba ñwáè rbyemïû nfi ka', buwa'laèr e lo naatu, gwe mnsa' aèmboè Sataèn aè m gweè naè.	not a new convert, lest being puffed up he fall into the same condemnation as the devil.
A ka' ye ñkaè' baè' tïìtïìyáá, Jisoès aè du mbe Ndaèp Nyúè a ce yá'ni beèe mbo.	But when it was now the midst of the feast, Jesus went up into the temple and taught.
Bfúr waê, m ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ená weèe lor nfeè' neè beèe ce a ce vúè neè ñgaèpni a ker ce daè'si beèe foñ naè. Woweèe a ce geèe jáá efa yuu ce a yá'ni weèe. Sïìr neè njïì neè woweèe.	Now I beg you, brothers, look out for those who are causing the divisions and occasions of stumbling, contrary to the doctrine which you learned, and turn away from them.
M ce laèa wa'a njobeè' beèe ce a teèe btu a yu goèr seê, lañlañ beâe aè múè ñgaâa ñgeèe búè. Njáèá beèe ca a yu ñgaâa laèa buu bcicïì, a ce bo' beèe neè wap blaèa anaè.	For there are also many unruly men, vain talkers and deceivers, especially those of the circumcision,
E dù a cu tètè sê.	He has gone and stayed for a very long time.
Beèe Farïìsi a ka' ce vúè aèbee, Jisoès aè bipshïì neè woweèe enáê,	Now while the Pharisees were gathered together, Jesus asked them a question,
Govanoè aè ka' yá yuu ce yi koni, a byemi yuu ce Sol aè m laèa. E m báèá ryá'nïì ce a m yá'ni du kuu Tata na seê.	Then the proconsul, when he saw what was done, believed, being astonished at the teaching of the Lord.
Baná m ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ená weèe ye yuu. Weèe aè ka' tá ye yuu ka', weèe luñ ka'. Mbúè nyúè'tu embe tu ñwáè moè' efa weâe mú be duè aè yuu ka'.”	"Therefore I beg you to take some food, for this is for your safety; for not a hair will perish from any of your heads."""
Ñgaâa ntaa ca a m ce geèe ntaa neè buu ce a m geèe neè gul ba selvaè ba bluèr ce vi m ce laè'ñger. Ntaa bcáè' ce vi m túr ncoèo jáá jáèá jáá a luu ntaa se naè aè ker ba aègho ka'. Ntaa buu embe ndaèp ce a m geèe neè mntaañguu ce vi m ce rúèú bboèñboñ seê, ba vïì ce a m geèe neè msoèñ juè', ba vïì ce a m soèp, ba buu ce a m geèe neè bco' bboèñboñ ba bluèr, aè ba aègho ka'.	merchandise of gold, silver, precious stones, pearls, fine linen, purple, silk, scarlet, all expensive wood, every vessel of ivory, every vessel made of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble;
AÈ ka' ba nyúè moè', weèr aè ce duè aè rgeèe rloo. A tarte weèr muunje moè' ce e m ba ñkwaèa. Njáèá yú' mo' yi m ba njep ye, a ce geèe e ce suñ beèe buu ce vi bii ka' ba. E m ce kap ku' mbaèa neè beèe ce a m yuu ye seê, njobeè' e m ce suñ beèe buu anaè.	It happened, as we were going to prayer, that a certain girl having a spirit of divination met us, who brought her masters much gain by fortune telling.
Baná seèe aè ba ce koèñ beèe, ce laèa ba yuu ce yi yu mini, ce geèe yi, tá seèe bo kuè' ba aèmboè Jisos Kraâis ce e yu tu naè, aè mnjïì wááwá.	but speaking truth in love, we may grow up in all things into him, who is the head, Christ;
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Mboâñtu mi yu ba neè beèe ce a ce yu' blaâa Nyúè, ce geèe yuu ce Nyúè ce laèa.”	"But he said, ""On the contrary, blessed are those who hear the word of God, and keep it."""
Yú' wááwá ce yi ka' tá byemi wa' ka', baná yi loè ese Nyúè ka'. Yú' cena yu yú' ñwáè ce e baèa Kraâis ce weèe aè m yu' ená yi ce vúè. Yi yu war njep ñgoèñ seè'ni.	and every spirit who doesn't confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God, and this is the spirit of the Antichrist, of whom you have heard that it comes. Now it is in the world already.
njobeè' nfeè' ca be ba nfeè' ce Nyúè be kúsi mcucu' aètu buu bbebep ce beèe a m geèe, tá yuu ce a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi bo ghááte njo.	For these are days of vengeance, that all things which are written may be fulfilled.
M ce lu'shi njobeè' weèe, máná máè mú ba aèfo ka', tá weèe bo byemi neè máè. Baná seèe du yá ye.”	"I am glad for your sakes that I was not there, so that you may believe. Nevertheless, let's go to him."""
Máè m jáèr seê. Mdip mi sáni loèr máè, byáèá a fa máè ñgá', yaè beèe efa máâ to' a fa máè ñgá', beèe enje jáá a fa máè ñgá'. Máè m yá ñgá' aè múè la', a yá ñgá' aè rïìñ, a yá ñgá' njep rdip rgoèr, a ker yá ñgá' mbe mmbo beèe ce a bo' beèe ená a yu ñgaâa rbyemïì naè.	I have been in travels often, perils of rivers, perils of robbers, perils from my countrymen, perils from the Gentiles, perils in the city, perils in the wilderness, perils in the sea, perils among false brothers;
Wáè ka' byemi ená Nyúè aè kani wáè efa rgeèe buu ca ka', aè ma'shïì tá ku rïìñ ba wáè weèe Nyúè. Ñwáè ce e ka' riñ ená yuu ce e ce geèe yi yu yáánïì, yi ntee yi ce fa ye ñgá' aè yuu anaè ka', baná ñgaèñ yu ñwáè rboâñtu.	Do you have faith? Have it to yourself before God. Happy is he who doesn't judge himself in that which he approves.
Bbyeèñgeê, yu'ni neè neè bduu wee aèmboè beèe ce a ce duè aèmbuèu Tata Jisoès a ba geèe.	Wives, be in subjection to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord.
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “M be vúè geèe tá e ke'se.”	"Jesus said to him, ""I will come and heal him."""
Seèe ka' laa ená seèe woweèe yu aèbee, kúti ce jáèr aè túè'nji baná seèe ce nya' mnde', a ke' ce cu rcu ce li yu mini ka'.	If we say that we have fellowship with him and walk in the darkness, we lie, and don't tell the truth.
njobeè' a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ba neè brara njobeè' m yu nrara.”	"because it is written, ""You shall be holy; for I am holy."""
Blaâa Nyúè vi m duè kuèntombïì, ñgoo beèe ce a m ce duè aèmbuèu Jisoès aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè ku' seê. Ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ce a m yu' blaâa rbyemïì ca a byemi, a m ba goèr.	The word of God increased and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem exceedingly. A great company of the priests were obedient to the faith.
M ce yá ñgá' ca mbe shañ aèmboè ñwáè ce e bú' lá ncir wa'a njo' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ anaè. Ka' a kur máè neè bkwaèñ wa'a, aède' a kur blaâa Nyúè ka'.	in which I suffer hardship to the point of chains as a criminal. But God's word isn't chained.
Rjɛ̀r li kʉni.	The journey has been postponed.
A ka' vúè neè woweèe, a tár woweèe mbe múè kansuèr. Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì aè bipshïì buu neè woweèe.	When they had brought them, they set them before the council. The high priest questioned them,
Ñwáè ce e ka' baa nfúr yïì, baná ñgaèñ yu ñwáè nyú beèe. Weèe yi weená ñwáè nyú beèe aè koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè ka'.	Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life remaining in him.
Ñwáè ce e ka' túr yuu, baná a be fa ye buu moè'. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá túr yuu ka' baná a be koo ka' mú yïì ce e ce kwaè'shi ená e túr naè ese ye.”	"For whoever has, to him will more be given, and he who doesn't have, even that which he has will be taken away from him."""
Tu yïû goèr yi laa neè ye ená e duê. E duè e fa suñ ñwáè moè' yuu ce e suñ ye naè ka'.	"So the commanding officer let the young man go, charging him, ""Tell no one that you have revealed these things to me."""
Ñwáè ce e ka' túr yuu, baná a be keèr fa ye buu moè', tá e misi túr buu goèr. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá túr yuu ka', baná a be koo, ka' mú yïì ce e túr naè ese ye.	For whoever has, to him will be given, and he will have abundance, but whoever doesn't have, from him will be taken away even that which he has.
Buu ce m ce sañ na vi yu mini. Nyúè rïìñ ená m ce nya' ba mnde' ka'.	Now about the things which I write to you, behold, before God, I'm not lying.
Jisoès aè ka' ba a woweèe aè nfeè' anaè, a laa neè woweèe ená woweèe a fa loâ aè rlaè' Jáèrusaláèm ka'. E m laèa enáê, “Cu neè ce ke' yuu ce Nyúè Taèr aè m kaè' neè weèe aè ba yuu ce máè m suñ weèe foñ naè.	"Being assembled together with them, he commanded them, ""Don't depart from Jerusalem, but wait for the promise of the Father, which you heard from me."
Máè ka' yu' wa'a, a gwe njeptii ncïìndap Nyúè anaè ená m bo gú'shi neè ye. E laa neè máè enáê, “Fa geèe wa' ka'. M ku ba ñwáè ce m ce geèe rfaè' Nyúè aèmboè wáâ geèe foñ naè. M ku ba ñwáè rfaè' neè Nyúè aèmboè weèe bfúr wo weèe yu naè. M ku ba aèmboè beèe wááwá ce a táá tatap, a ce laèa ená Jisoès yu yaèp Tataê. Gú'shi neè ba neè Nyúè caè'caè'. Nsuñ Jisoès yu ntee efa ntuu Nyúè.”	"I fell down before his feet to worship him. He said to me, ""Look! Don't do it! I am a fellow bondservant with you and with your brothers who hold the testimony of Jesus. Worship God, for the testimony of Jesus is the Spirit of Prophecy."""
Kɛʼ e nyù ce Tantoʼ à m cɛp mɛ̀ nà bsɛ̀ bvi ke koo mɛ̀ à rcàʼni ye sê.	Since the day that Tantoh insulted me, I am always very reluctant to greet him.
Muu mòʼ à bipshi mɛ̀ a?	Has a certain child asked for me?
Máèári ce ndur yïû Lasoèroès aè m ce yañ na, aè m ba Máèári ce e m cu'ni mgúr aè mkuèu Tata Jisoès, a siñsi neè yi nyúè'tu naè.	It was that Mary who had anointed the Lord with ointment, and wiped his feet with her hair, whose brother, Lazarus, was sick.
AÈmboè m ce yá ñgá' a weâe btuè seè'ni na, m ce lu'shi. M ce yá ñgá' aèmboè Jisos Kraâis aè m yá aètu cor ce e yu yïì nyor naè. M ce yá ñgá' ca wa'a, ryañ ce m ce yu' li ce mïìsi ñgá' ce Jisoès aè m yá, e bátïì naè.	Now I rejoice in my sufferings for your sake, and fill up on my part that which is lacking of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body's sake, which is the assembly;
Jisoès neè yi tu nyor aè m be laa ená a ke yu'ni neè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè fa yeâ ñgoèñ ka'.	For Jesus himself testified that a prophet has no honor in his own country.
E cu aè nsheè, a ká' yïì beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' ce koèñ aè rba ñwáè e kuèntombïì, baná e be loèr yi tu aè ñwáè embaè lúèsimbuèu, ba aè ñwáè rfaè' neè beèe wááwá.”	"He sat down, and called the twelve; and he said to them, ""If any man wants to be first, he shall be last of all, and servant of all."""
Woweèe a ka' yá, a riñ ená a ñwáè ce e m ce cu njep cuâu ñka' ce a m ce too ená Rboèñ, ce loo buu ese beèe naè. Woweèe a bááñgeèr, a túr yuu laèa ka', njo' yuu ce yi m koni anaè.	They recognized him, that it was he who used to sit begging for gifts for the needy at the Beautiful Gate of the temple. They were filled with wonder and amazement at what had happened to him.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè byemi seè'ni a?	"Jesus answered them, ""Do you now believe?"
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “AÈ ka' ba njo' yuu ce wáè laèa na, yú' nyúèrkaè' ca yi fúú enjep muu ghoè. Duè yo yu.”	"He said to her, ""For this saying, go your way. The demon has gone out of your daughter."""
Yi ka' ba ená buu bbebep ce seèe ce geèe, ce geèe beèe a ce yá ená Nyúè yu ñwáâ nyáánïì, seèe ka' laa seená ká? Waè' aède' seèe laa ená Nyúè aè ka' fa seèe ñgá' njo' buu bbebep ce seèe aè geèe baná e geèe yuu yáánïì ka' a? (M ce laèa ba aèmboè ñwáè.)	But if our unrighteousness commends the righteousness of God, what will we say? Is God unrighteous who inflicts wrath? I speak like men do.
Ce ye baa.	Be eating the fufu.
Rraa anaè li ke raa aè túè'nji. Túè'nji aè m be liisi rraa anaè ka'.	The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness hasn't overcome it.
AÈmboè weèe yu brara njobeè' weèe aè yu'ni a gee buu mini, a koñ bfúr wee neè mini-ñwáè na, m ce laèa máná weèe koñni neè ye ntee-ñwáè.	Seeing you have purified your souls in your obedience to the truth through the Spirit in sincere brotherly affection, love one another from the heart fervently:
Woweèe a saa enjep rsheè a cañ, njobeè' woweèe a m ce wáp, a ker jep foñ. Woweèe a laa yuu neè ñwáè ka' njobeè' woweèe a m ce wáp.	They went out, and fled from the tomb, for trembling and astonishment had come on them. They said nothing to anyone; for they were afraid.
Beèe magoèr ce a m ba aè dïì' anaè a m byemi neè Jisoès.	Many believed in him there.

Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, and Timothy our brother, to the assembly of God which is at Corinth, with all the saints who are in the whole of Achaia:
Ŋgàʼ à m yuʼ nsuŋ anà a vʉ a be mɛ̀ foŋ.	Ngah heard the news and also consulted me.
AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' embenjïì, e duñshïì yïì nyor neè beèe a mmbaa ce a m ce duè aè rla' mo', a yááti aè mmïìr aè njáâá jáá.	After these things he was revealed in another form to two of them, as they walked, on their way into the country.
Woweèe a natïì, a du cárcár seê, a du a yá Máèári ba Josáèf, a yá muu aèmboè e noèñ njep rghii.	They came with haste, and found both Mary and Joseph, and the baby was lying in the feeding trough.
AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na ce Jisos Kraâis ce e geèe seèe aè luêñ, aè vúè na, buu ca aè yáátïì aèwañ. Jisos Kraâis ca aè m so rkwe a vú neè ryoèñ ce aètaè li ke mi ka'. Seèe yi buu ca njo' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ce a ce feè'shi.	but has now been revealed by the appearing of our Savior, Christ Jesus, who abolished death, and brought life and immortality to light through the Good News.
Ñwáè ce e m kwe na aè natïì mbekïì, a ká' a ce laèa. Jisoès aè koo ye a fa neè yïì maê.	He who was dead sat up, and began to speak. And he gave him to his mother.
Beèe magoèr a be vúè a máâ rlii ce laèa enáê, ‘A máè Kraâis anaè’, bo' beèe magoèr tá a da'.	For many will come in my name, saying, 'I am the Christ,' and will lead many astray.
Weèr ce laèa wa'a, njobeè' weèr aè yu' ená beèe moè' efa weèe a yu bbor. Woweèe a koèñ aè rfaè' ka' a ce kar a ce jepsi ba ntaè'teè beèe moè'.	For we hear of some who walk among you in rebellion, who don't work at all, but are busybodies.
M ̀ kaʼ bipshi nè wɛ̀ banɛ à be bèesi.	If I ask you, therefore you will answer.
Dávïìd ye ye aè m laèa enáê, “Geèe tá yuu ce woweèe a ce yu' rboèñ aègho naè, yi kúti ba taa ce yi be koo woweèe. Geèe tá woweèe a tañte, keèr kote aè yuu anaè, yá ñgá' njo' yap yuu ce a geèe anaè.	"David says, ""Let their table be made a snare, and a trap, a stumbling block, and a retribution to them."
Buu bteèe ce vi m ba kyeèe anaè vi m túr bbaèp ntuunfu ntuunfu, mmir mi ba aègho aèñgoo seê. Mmo' mi m ba mbenduè bbaèp, mmo' mi ba nje múè bbaèp. Vi m ce yoèp yáá a ce buumi aè nfeè' moè' ka', káè neètú' áè, káè neèmootïì áè. Vi m ce yoèp enáê, “Nyúè yu nrara, Nyúè yu nrara, Nyúè yu nrara, ñger wááwá yi yu mbaè mmbo Tata Nyúè. E m ba, a ba aègho seè'ni na, aè ku ba ye ce e be vúè.”	"The four living creatures, each one of them having six wings, are full of eyes around and within. They have no rest day and night, saying, ""Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God, the Almighty, who was and who is and who is to come!"""
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Fa neè woweèe yuu tá a ye.” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “Baná weèr lor baèa mbaâa bbaa, du yuu bráâd aègho neè woweèe a?”	"But he answered them, ""You give them something to eat."" They asked him, ""Shall we go and buy two hundred denarii worth of bread, and give them something to eat?"""
Zhi yu àtɛ̀r enɛ mbʉ maʼ mmbùu kaʼ.	It is not possible for a goat to lay eggs.
Wɛwɛ̀ be fʉʉ du yɛ nè mo mmir.	You shall go and see it yourself.
E m laèa enáê, “Rbuu ba nshe a ka' ba ce tarte, m buu efa rghoèni wáè keèr geèe tá yoè ñgúè yaa ka'.”	"saying, ""Surely blessing I will bless you, and multiplying I will multiply you."""
E ka' bi, baná e be kep njobeè' nfeè' rkep aè gháá.”	"But when the fruit is ripe, immediately he puts forth the sickle, because the harvest has come."""
Mɛ̀ yɛ àmbò Tàta ce lùŋge nè ma bǎa kwâa.	I have seen Tata struggling with a big bag of corn.
Yá neè yuu ce Nyúè aè m geèe neè vi bcïìndap mo' ce a m geèe buu bbebep naè. Nyúè aè m buu efa rfa woweèe ñgá' ka'. E m maè' woweèe njep mor. Woweèe a noèñ njep ma beè'teè ce yi coomi neè bshañ aè mkoo. Njo yi ce sii mbïûñ mbïûñ. Woweèe a be cu njo duè baè' aè nfeè' ce Nyúè be sa' ñgoèñ.	For if God didn't spare angels when they sinned, but cast them down to Tartarus, and committed them to pits of darkness, to be reserved for judgment;
Mbèŋ à gwè ntìni sê.	The rain has fallen today heavily.
AÈmboè aè be laèa neè ye ba enáê, ‘Fáèr máè byee, yar cáâ' rfaè' caasi byee neè máè tá m ye no yuu, máâ mïìsi wáá, wá wáè ka' ye yuu, ker no yuu’ a?	and will not rather tell him, 'Prepare my supper, clothe yourself properly, and serve me, while I eat and drink. Afterward you shall eat and drink'?
Ñwáè ka' ce loo neè Nyúè aè njáèá li anaè baná ñgaèñ ku ce loo ba enjep ntee, a ke' riñ yuu ce e ce loo ka'.	For if I pray in another language, my spirit prays, but my understanding is unfruitful.
Máè koèñ máná buu moè' ba ce vi be fa weèe ñgá' ka'. Ñwáè ce e cu ñkúè e ke kwaè'shi aèmboè buu ce Tata Jisoès aè koèñ ená e gee tá nyor boñ ye.	But I desire to have you to be free from cares. He who is unmarried is concerned for the things of the Lord, how he may please the Lord;
Wáè maè'shi ntaañguu nje rlïìr nje wáè, a ce fyá' ba ñkúè' ce ce yi yu nfúroè nje rlïìr njoká?	Why do you see the speck of chaff that is in your brother's eye, but don't consider the beam that is in your own eye?
E ká' beèe ce a m ba aèfo, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Yu'shi neè boèñboñ.	"He summoned the multitude, and said to them, ""Hear, and understand."
E beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “Wee weèe aè be riñ buu foñ ka' a? Mboè weèe yi weená aède' yuu ce yi ke niñ njep ñwáè yi gee ñwáè e bep aè bsii Nyúè ka' ka' a?	"He said to them, ""Are you thus without understanding also? Don't you perceive that whatever goes into the man from outside can't defile him,"
Ñgaâa yá'ni buu Joân a ka' naèti ce duè, Jisoès aè ká' a ce suñ ku' kúr beèe ca buu kuu Joân. E m laèa enáê, “Weèe aè m fúú a du aè ntee rïìñ ba aè ryá ká? Weèe aè m duè aè ryá aèmboè fu' yi ce cïì' ñke' a?	"As these went their way, Jesus began to say to the multitudes concerning John, ""What did you go out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken by the wind?"
AÈmboè seèe aè rïìñ seená Nyúè e ke kupse mi mkaè'ni ka' naè, aède' viseèe mntee vi ker bu' ka'. Baná seèe aè tii ndaèñ a niñ mbe dïû' rara embe Ndaèp Nyúè.	This hope we have as an anchor of the soul, a hope both sure and steadfast and entering into that which is within the veil;
Baná weèe lor nfeè', njobeè' máè suñ weèe buu ca tá nfeè' ka' gháá.	"But you watch. ""Behold, I have told you all things beforehand."
Yi ka' ba wa'a, baná yi be ba aè njáâá ká neè ñwáè ce e nyúè' muu Nyúè, a loèr bláá ce a m ye leè' aègho aè ba bláá ce vi geèe ye e ba nrara naè aè yuu cicïì, a ker cáp Yú' Nyúè ce yi ke vúè neè bghoènïì naè?	How much worse punishment, do you think, will he be judged worthy of, who has trodden under foot the Son of God, and has counted the blood of the covenant with which he was sanctified an unholy thing, and has insulted the Spirit of grace?
E ke geèe wa'a njobeè' cor yu yïì nyor. Seèe ce seèe yu ñgaâa coêr, seèe yu mñgúè' mo' efa yïì nyor.)	because we are members of his body, of his flesh and bones.
Máè yá ya máná e ka' cu neè yi tu, e yu' rboèñ seê. Máè byemi máná yuu máè laèa na, yi vúè ba ese Yú' Nyúè.	But she is happier if she stays as she is, in my judgment, and I think that I also have God's Spirit.
E be dù kaʼ.	She will not go.
Sò à mʉ kàʼni enɛ sò be tarte à cii Ntaalaʼ laŋ.	We promised that we were going to meet on Ntala, didnʼt we?
Mbʉ e ke luuti ce war ker ce cɛ̀ni gòr.	When a goat is in labour it cries and urinates much.
Buu ca vi ce koni wa'a, tá a lo yá aèmboè Muu Ñwáè ce vúè mbe múè mmbaè' neè ñger-ñwáè ba neè foèo-ñwáè.	Then they will see the Son of Man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.
Ŋwɛ̀ kaʼ lip wɛ̀ à fa kʉʉsi zhii kaʼ.	If a person beats you, don’t back it.
Weèe aè be riñ buu ka' a? Mboè weèe ce kuushi bráâd ta ce a m nyañ beèe ncúèkïì ta aègho ker ba mñkaèa ce weèe aè m baashi bbábá' aègho naè ka' a?	Don't you yet perceive, neither remember the five loaves for the five thousand, and how many baskets you took up?
Yi ba ba wa'a, yi ba ba ená beèe ce a m byemi neè Jisos Kraâis foñ, a kweñger naè a bú aè cicïì.	Then they also who are fallen asleep in Christ have perished.
Túè' aè ka' ce raa, Jisoès aè táá aèwaâa roè. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ke' riñ ená a Jisoès ka'.	But when day had already come, Jesus stood on the beach, yet the disciples didn't know that it was Jesus.
Máè rïìñ máná woweèe a m ku fa ba aèmboè aède' woweèe a m ba fa ka', woweèe a m fa a caa embo. AÈ m laèa ba ñwáè neè woweèe ená woweèe a fa wa' ka', aè m ku kwa'shi ba woweèe a fa wa'a.	For according to their power, I testify, yes and beyond their power, they gave of their own accord,
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Mboè máè ba suñ wáè ená aè be yá ñger Nyúè ce wáè ka' byemi a?”	"Jesus said to her, ""Didn't I tell you that if you believed, you would see God's glory?"""
Seèe aè ka' laa seená ñger anaè yi m loè ese ñwáè, baná beèe wááwá a be túúshi seèe neè bluèr, njobeè' woweèe a byemi ená Joân aè m ba ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyú.”	"But if we say, 'From men,' all the people will stone us, for they are persuaded that John was a prophet."""
E du a koo ye aè boè, a naa mbekïì, mbáp caè aè bornïì, e ká' a ce fáèr byee neè woweèe.	He came and took her by the hand, and raised her up. The fever left her, and she served them.
Baná Muu Nyúè aè ka' gee weèe luêñ, baná weèe aè luèñ neè mini-ñwáè ghup.	If therefore the Son makes you free, you will be free indeed.
Ndeèe beèe ca aè boñ a caa ndeèe beèe embe ndaèp rloo ce aè rla' Táèsaèlonikaè, njobeè' woweèe a m koèñ aè ryu'shi blaâa Nyúè seê, a ce beè' Ñwaâ' Nyúè aè mnoèñ wááwá tá a bo yá ená yuu ce Pol aè m ce laèa yi m ba mini lá.	Now these were more noble than those in Thessalonica, in that they received the word with all readiness of the mind, examining the Scriptures daily to see whether these things were so.
Beèe ce a ce geèe yuu ce e laèa, a ce cu njep ye, ye ye ce cu njep woweèe. Yuu ce yi geèe seèe aè yi ená e cu seèe woweèe yu Yú' ce e fa neè seèe.	He who keeps his commandments remains in him, and he in him. By this we know that he remains in us, by the Spirit which he gave us.
Muu wòo ca tèetu sê.	This (your) child of yours is very obstinate.
Laèa neè neè AÈkiboès ená e ce gee rfaè' ce Nyúè aè fa neè ye ená e gee naè.	"Tell Archippus, ""Take heed to the ministry which you have received in the Lord, that you fulfill it."""
“A m yu' njeèndoñ ñwáè aè rla' Ramaè, ñgaèñ aè ce war a ce koosimnse magoèr seê, Racáèl aè ce war njo' boo vi, a kani ená e be cip ka' njobeè' boo vi a m kweñger wááwá.”	A voice was heard in Ramah, lamentation, weeping and great mourning, Rachel weeping for her children; she wouldn't be comforted, because they are no more.
Yi yu ená weèr be vúè loèr ba ñger ka' suñ weèe yuu ce weèe byemi ka', njobeè' weèe aè táá tatap njep le rbyemïì. Ler rfaè' li yu ba ená weèr ja' weèe tá weèe bo yu' rboèñ.	Not that we have lordship over your faith, but are fellow workers with you for your joy. For you stand firm in faith.
tuusi Kraâis ce a láè neè weèe. Jisoès ca yu Kraâis anaè.	and that he may send Christ Jesus, who was ordained for you before,
Sataèn aè lor ye a du aègho aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm ce yu rla' rrara, a ko' neè ye a tár mbe tu Nyúè ce yi m saèp mbekïì seê, a laa neè ye enáê,	Then the devil took him into the holy city. He set him on the pinnacle of the temple,
Pitaè ba Joân a ke' ye mbe mmïìr. Pitaè aè laa enáê, “Keè' weèr!”	"Peter, fastening his eyes on him, with John, said, ""Look at us."""
Woweèe wááwá a ce yoèp mbekïì a ce laèa enáê, “Rluèñ li loè ese Nyúè ce e cu mbe kaèbaèraè', ker ba ese Muu Njeèe.”	"They cried with a loud voice, saying, ""Salvation be to our God, who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb!"""
Wap bbyèŋge a ke fàʼ sê.	Their wives work very hard.
Woweèe a laa enáê, “AÈde' seèe ker ce roèo beèe mo' ená a vú táá njïìnsa' aè njáâá ká? To seèe aè yu' yuu ce e laèa neè yi cuèu.”	"They said, ""Why do we need any more witness? For we ourselves have heard from his own mouth!"""
Saèkaèriyaè aè m cu mbe Ndaèp Nyúè anaè teèteè seê. Beèe ce a m cu ce keè' ye naè a ce tarni ená aè koni ba ká lá.	The people were waiting for Zacharias, and they marveled that he delayed in the temple.
A mbuèu ce wer ke laèa neè bcor mo', ce naèa tu neè weèe njobeè' beèe a ke nyúè' weèe, ker fa weèe ñgá', weèe ku táá tatap, byemi ba neè Nyúè.	so that we ourselves boast about you in the assemblies of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and in the afflictions which you endure.
Pitaè aè kuushïì yuu ce Jisoès aè m laèa neè ye enáê, “Tá nduñgúp ka' toñ, aè be kani ñkaèraè' taar ená aè rïìñ máè ka'.” E ka' kuushi wa'a, a fúú njep mbeè, a bú' rwar.	"Peter remembered the word which Jesus had said to him, ""Before the rooster crows, you will deny me three times."" He went out and wept bitterly."
Njeèndoñ aè laa embe buèu enáê, “A wáè muu waè ce m koèñ seê. M ce yu' rboèñ neè wáè seê.”	"A voice came out of the sky, ""You are my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased."""
Nyúè ce koèñ ená weèe gee boèñboñ wa'a tá blúr ce a máñni buu naè a bo yá, baate yap cuèu.	For this is the will of God, that by well-doing you should put to silence the ignorance of foolish men:
Waè' seèe be laèa seená yi m loè ba ese beèe a?” Woweèe a m wáp beèe njobeè' ñwáè nsïìp aè m byemi ená Joân aè m ba ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè ghup.	"If we should say, 'From men'""--they feared the people, for all held John to really be a prophet."
Blaâa Nyúè vi m duè kuèntombïì, beèe magoèr aè yu' a byemi.	But the word of God grew and multiplied.
E be bɛɛ nduunjì nè soo.	He will slant the (sides of the) road with a hoe.
“Ñwáè ryá'nïì, Musïìs aè m sañ ncir neè seèe ená ñwáè aè ka' lor ñgwa, a ye a bi boo ka', ñgaèñ kwe, baná nfúr yïì be laasi ye tá a ye a bi boo neè nfúr yïì ce e kwe naè.	"Teacher, Moses wrote to us, 'If a man's brother dies, and leaves a wife behind him, and leaves no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up offspring for his brother.'
Mark	Maêk	12	20	Bfúr mo' a m ba beèe nsaèambaê, ñwáâ nlee aè lor ñgwa, a bi boo a ye ka', a kwe.	There were seven brothers. The first took a wife, and dying left no offspring.
Mark	Maêk	12	21	Ñwáè embe yeâ njïì aè laasïì ye, a ke' bi muu a ye ka', a kwe. Ñwáè embe njïì ñwáè embe yeâ njïì aè ku gee wa'a foñ.	The second took her, and died, leaving no children behind him. The third likewise;
Mark	Maêk	12	22	Woweèe beèe nsaèamba anaè wááwá a m bi muu a njeñwáè ca ka'. AÈ ka' ba aèlúèsimbuèu njeñwáè ca aè kwe foñ.	and the seven took her and left no children. Last of all the woman also died.
Mark	Maêk	12	23	Baná be keè ba aè nfeè' ce beèe a fúú efa rkwe, tá njeñwáè ca ba ñgwa nda, aèmboè yi yu ená bfúr beèe nsaèamba ca wááwá aè m ba bduu vi naè?”	In the resurrection, when they rise, whose wife will she be of them? For the seven had her as a wife."
Weèr aè du a yá ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès aèfo a cu weèr woweèe aè mnoèñ saèambaê. Woweèe a m laèa neè Pol aè ñger Yú' Rara ená e fa duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm ka'.	Having found disciples, we stayed there seven days. These said to Paul through the Spirit, that he should not go up to Jerusalem.
Beèe Saduèsi ce a ce kani ená aède' ñwáè kwe ker fúú efa rkwe ka' naè, a vú a yá ye nyúè anaè, a bipshi neè ye enáê,	On that day Sadducees (those who say that there is no resurrection) came to him. They asked him,
Geewa'a, woweèe a m koni nduunjïì ka' njobeè' beèe wááwá a m ku ce yu' ba yuu ce e m ce laèa.	They couldn't find what they might do, for all the people hung on to every word that he said.
Ca yi ka' ba wa'a, yuu ce Jáèrïìmiyaè, ñwáè ncep ntuu aè m laèa naè yi ghááteè njo. E m laèa enáê, “Woweèe a m loèr mbaèa mntaar ce aè m ba mbaèa ce beèe Isráèl a m byemi ená a be laè' yi tu aègho,	"Then that which was spoken through Jeremiah the prophet was fulfilled, saying, ""They took the thirty pieces of silver, the price of him upon whom a price had been set, whom some of the children of Israel priced,"
E m vúè tá e bo suñ beèe aèmboè rraa anaè tá beèe a bo byemi njobeè' e suñ woweèe.	The same came as a witness, that he might testify about the light, that all might believe through him.
Ñka' mbyeè buu yi m ba faèdïì' ce a m taa Jisoès mbe kïìntaa anaè. Rsheâ rfi li m ba mbo ce a m be tuñ ñwáè njo ka'.	Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden. In the garden was a new tomb in which no man had ever yet been laid.
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Ya kúú yu yïì enjep ñgoèñ na ka'. Ya kúú aè ba ba yïì enjep ñgoèñ na, yaè beèe a ba beèe yaè njïì, reè bkoèr faè dïì' a fa máè mbaè mmbo Jus ka'. Yi yu ená ya kúú yi loè ba enjep ñgoèñ na ka'.”	"Jesus answered, ""My Kingdom is not of this world. If my Kingdom were of this world, then my servants would fight, that I wouldn't be delivered to the Jews. But now my Kingdom is not from here."""
Cena yi ce duèñshi ená woweèe ker ba Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yiseèe tu, a yu aèbee ka'. Ku ba ba beèe ce a yu aèbee a Jisos Kraâis weèe, ce a yu aèbee aè nyor moè'sir, a koni byee, a ce kuè' aèmboè Nyúè ce koèñ.	and not holding firmly to the Head, from whom all the body, being supplied and knit together through the joints and ligaments, grows with God's growth.
Waè' weèe túr buu wááwá a? Waè' weèe yu ñgaâa mbaèa a? Weèr yu yer yu bkúú ka', weèe aè lor wee btu aèmboè bkúú. M ce koèñ máná weèe aè ba ba bkúú ghup tá seèe bo sa' bsïìp?	You are already filled. You have already become rich. You have come to reign without us. Yes, and I wish that you did reign, that we also might reign with you.
Weèe fa ba aè njáâá wa' ka'. Yi yu ba ená ñwáâ ñgoèr se efa weâe mú ba aèmboè muu ñká'. Ñwáè ce e yu tu neè beèe ba aèmboè ñwáè rfaè'.	But not so with you. But one who is the greater among you, let him become as the younger, and one who is governing, as one who serves.
Zhìi ncòo cɛ̀ʼ ca bòŋ sê.	The colour of this her dress is very nice.
M rïìñ mbuèu ce m ce geèe buu ce m ce geèe na ka', m ce geèe ba buu ce ya ntee yi ce koèñ aè rgeèe ka'. M ce geèe ba buu ce máè baèa.	For I don't know what I am doing. For I don't practice what I desire to do; but what I hate, that I do.
Mboè weèe rïìñ ená weêe mnyor yu ndap Yú' Rara a? Yú' Rara anaè yi vúè ese Nyúè a ce cu njep weèe. Mnyor ce weèe túr yu weêe mnyor ka'.	Or don't you know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit which is in you, which you have from God? You are not your own,
Woweèe a ka' ye byee yu' boèñboñ, a fúshi msañ ce mi m ba mbe keñ a ma' njep roè tá keñ bo fáp.	When they had eaten enough, they lightened the ship, throwing out the wheat into the sea.
Tá Nyúè fa cumúnyañ, ker koosimnse neè beèe ce a ce cu aèmboè beâe bfi, a ba beèe Isráèl mini ce a yu beèe Nyúè.	As many as walk by this rule, peace and mercy be on them, and on God's Israel.
Buu ca vi m ba aèmboè rleèñshi ce li m ce duèñshi beèe yuu ce yi be keè ba. Yuu ce buu ca vi m ce duèñshi anaè aè ba Jisos Kraêis.	which are a shadow of the things to come; but the body is Christ's.
Baná weèe tami nyor, ke'ni wee btu, ce ke' ba rboâñntee Nyúè ce weèe be koni aè nfeè' ce Jisos Kraâis aè vúè.	Therefore, prepare your minds for action, be sober and set your hope fully on the grace that will be brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ--
E suñ woweèe buu magoèr aè mñgaèa. E m laèa enáê, “Ñwáè moè' aè m duè aè rbyeè buu,	"He spoke to them many things in parables, saying, ""Behold, a farmer went out to sow."
Saimún Pitaè a laa neè ye enáê, “Tataê, baná aè fa kuè suè'si ba ma mkuèu caè'caè' ka', suè'si ma mmbo ba ya tu foñ.”	"Simon Peter said to him, ""Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head!"""
Yi ka' ba wa'a, Pitaè aè laa enáê, “AÈnaèniyaès, Sataèn aè ruusi yo ntee, a gee wáè nya' mnde' neè Yú' Nyúè, a gapni mbaèa nsuu ce wáè mú fyeni njoká?	"But Peter said, ""Ananias, why has Satan filled your heart to lie to the Holy Spirit, and to keep back part of the price of the land?"
a ka' yá mo' ce e luèu ntaa seê, a du a fyeni yïì buu wááwá a yuu aègho.	who having found one pearl of great price, he went and sold all that he had, and bought it.
Ñwáè ca ce faè' ba neè Nyúè tá e bo jaè' wáè. Wáè ka' gee yuu bebep, aè wáp ye, njobeè' ñger ce a fa ye anaè yi yu aè cicïì ka'. Nyúè aè fa ye ñger aè rkúsi mcucu' neè beèe ce a ce geèe buu bbebep.	for he is a servant of God to you for good. But if you do that which is evil, be afraid, for he doesn't bear the sword in vain; for he is a servant of God, an avenger for wrath to him who does evil.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “Musïìs aè m laèa neè weèe ená ká?”	"He answered, ""What did Moses command you?"""
Mɛ̀ dù bkèʼsè.	I went expecting drinks or food.
Be keèe ba aè nfeè' ce beèe a fúú efa rkwe tá beèe a ker loèr bbyeèñge, káè guèusi boo ka'. Beèe a be keèe ba aèmboè bcïìndap Nyúè embe buèu.	For in the resurrection they neither marry, nor are given in marriage, but are like God's angels in heaven.
Jáms ba Pitaè ba Joân ce a m ba aèmboè btu btatap embe coêr, a ka' yá ená Nyúè aè fa máè njáèá rfaè' ca ghup, weèr woweèe ba Baènabaès aè fanïì mmbo aè rduèñshi ená weèr ce faè' aèbee. Weèr woweèe aè m byemi aèbee ená weèr Baènabaès du fe'shi yer ba neè beèe enje jáá, tá woweèe a fe'shi yap ba neè Juês.	and when they perceived the grace that was given to me, James and Cephas and John, they who were reputed to be pillars, gave to me and Barnabas the right hand of fellowship, that we should go to the Gentiles, and they to the circumcision.
Ñwáè Farïìsi anaè aè ka' yá ená Jisoès aè ba su'si mmbo a ka' ká' a ce yeñger ka', e bááñgeèr seê.	When the Pharisee saw it, he marveled that he had not first washed himself before dinner.
M ce laèa ená aè gee buu ce máè laèa na, ke' co' mo' embo ka'. Geèe vi yáánïì caar du ba' aè nfeè' ce Tata Jisos Kraâis be vúè.	that you keep the commandment without spot, blameless, until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ;
Kaʼ ba enɛ wɛ̀ yɛ ye kaʼ banɛ wèe ye à bàase à nduunjì.	If you have not see him, therefore you have bypassed each other on the way.
Ncɛ̀p à càa, mɛ̀ du àmbùu mo.	A juju passed and I followed it.
Tá weèr ka' baè' aè rla' Ruêm, bfúr ce aè rla' anaè a m banïì yu' ená weèr yu aè nduunjïì. Woweèe a vú caar a ba' aè ntaa yïû aè rla' AÈpiyoè, beèe mo' a ba' faèdïì' bhoètál vi m ba vi btaar, tá a bo koni weèr. Pol aè ka' yá woweèe, a yoñshi Nyúè, ñger yi vú ye nje nyoèr.	From there the brothers, when they heard of us, came to meet us as far as The Market of Appius and The Three Taverns. When Paul saw them, he thanked God, and took courage.
Weèe fa koèñ ñgoèñ ka'. Weèe fa koèñ buu enjep ñgoèñ ka'. Ñwáè ka' koñ ñgoèñ aètaè ñgaèñ koñ Taèr ka',	Don't love the world, neither the things that are in the world. If anyone loves the world, the Father's love isn't in him.
Weèr aè m ba mbe keñ anaè wááwá beèe mjeâe mbaa neè ncoèp-ntuunfu-aè- mnsaèambaê.	In all, we were two hundred seventy-six souls on the ship.
E coo wɛ̀ a?	Good afternoon or evening! coo3 [tʃóː] v.
M ce loo máná Tata Jisoès túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ.	The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na, Nyúè aè geèe beèe a riñ njáèá njïì ce aède' ñwáè ba yáánïì a yeâ bsii. Njïì anaè túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè mncir ka'. Ñwaè' mncir Nyúè ba ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m laèa aèmboè njïì anaè.	But now apart from the law, a righteousness of God has been revealed, being testified by the law and the prophets;
AÈ rloo wa'a yu yuu boèñboñ, aè ba yuu ce Nyúè ce e yu yïìseèe ñwáè rjaè' e ke yu' rboèñ aègho.	For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Savior;
Weèe aè yu' aèmboè e bepsi rlii Nyúè. Weèe aè laèa wee ká?” Beèe wááwá a laa ená a yú ye.	"You have heard the blasphemy! What do you think?"" They all condemned him to be worthy of death."
AÈmboè a ke baashi ñke' too neè mor naè, yi be keèe ba wa'a aè nfeè' ce ñgoèñ yi ce mïì.	As therefore the darnel weeds are gathered up and burned with fire; so will it be at the end of this age.
M be tɛr yàa ntaaŋguu ca mbena.	I will put this my stick here.
Nyúè be keè sa' beèe tá e kani efa rkoosimnse neè beèe ce a m buu efa rkoosimnse neè beèe mo'. Baná beèe ce a m ce koosimnse neè beèe mo' a be wáp mnsa' anaè ka'.	For judgment is without mercy to him who has shown no mercy. Mercy triumphs over judgment.
Seèe ku'si Nyúè ce e ku ba moè'sir caè'caè', moè' aè ker ba ka'. Yu ye ce e geèe seèe aè luñ njïì enjep Tata Jisos Kraêis. Tá beèe a yu'ni neè ye, ker ku'si ye. Tá e ba ñkúú ce e be sa' seèe, ká' efa rkáè' vú ba' seè'ni na, ker ba aè nfeè' wááwá. Yi yu wa'a.	to God our Savior, who alone is wise, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and forever. Amen.
ce beèe embe buèu ba beèe enjep nsheè wááwá a yu aègho njo' ye.	from whom every family in heaven and on earth is named,
E gaèpni a yuu bebep, baná e be keèr cu li rcu enjep ñgoèñ na, ce geèe ba buu bbebep ce vi bláá vi ce luèute aè rgeèe ka'. E be cu ce geèe ba yuu ce Nyúè ce koèñ.	that you no longer should live the rest of your time in the flesh for the lusts of men, but for the will of God.
Woweèe a beèesi neè ye enáê, “Beèe mo' a ce laèa ená aè yu Joân ñwáè baèptir beèe, beèe mo' ená aè yu AÈlajaè, beèe mo' ená aè yu moè' efa ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè.”	"They told him, ""John the Baptizer, and others say Elijah, but others: one of the prophets."""
Weèe ce loo, ce too Nyúè ená yeè Taê. E yu ñwáè ce e ke so'ni ñgoèñ ka', ce sa' beèe ba aè buu ce woweèe a geèe, baná aèmboè weèe ce cu njep ñgoèñ na aèmboè bkïìloè na, weèe ce wáp ye.	If you call on him as Father, who without respect of persons judges according to each man's work, pass the time of your living as foreigners here in reverent fear:
Beèe mo' efa woweèe aè m ba Máèári ce aè rla' Makdalaè, ba Máèári ce e m ba ma yïì Jáêms ba Josáèf, ker ba ma boo vïû Sábáèdïî.	Among them were Mary Magdalene, Mary the mother of James and Joses, and the mother of the sons of Zebedee.
Gheèter neè cu ba rcu ce li yu yáánïì. Ñwáè fa ce fúèúshi cuèu aè buu beèe moè' ka'. Ñwáè wááwá ce fa' yuu ce yi be jaè' ye. Weèr aè m suñ weèe wáá ená weèe gee wa'a.	and that you make it your ambition to lead a quiet life, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, even as we instructed you;
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè beèe anaè enáê, “M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená aède' Muu gee yuu neè yi tu ka'. AÈde' e gee ba yuu ce e yá Taèr aè ce geèe. Yuu ce yïì Ta e ke geèe, a yuu ce ye ye e ke geèe.	"Jesus therefore answered them, ""Most certainly, I tell you, the Son can do nothing of himself, but what he sees the Father doing. For whatever things he does, these the Son also does likewise."
Jisoès aè ka' ba aè ñgoâñ Galeèle wa'a, a ker du aè rla' Kánaè faèdïì' ce e m beèesi mdip mi kútïì mruè' naè. Ñwáâ ñgoèr moè' aè m ba aèfo ce muu yïì aè m ce yañ aè rla' ce a m ce too ená Kaèpanuèm.	Jesus came therefore again to Cana of Galilee, where he made the water into wine. There was a certain nobleman whose son was sick at Capernaum.
E m loèr bráêd, a yoñshi Nyúè, a bá'shi, a fa neè woweèe, a laa enáê, “Ca yu yaè nyor ce máè fa a weâe btuè. Ce gee neè aèmboè seèe ce geèe na tá weèe bo ce kuushi máè.”	"He took bread, and when he had given thanks, he broke it, and gave to them, saying, ""This is my body which is given for you. Do this in memory of me."""
Máè yu' aèmboè njeèndoñ aè laèa embe dïì' rfa enáê, “Yi yu mini. Wáâ Nyúè ce aè yu yeèr taê, ñger wááwá yi yu mba wáâ mmboè. Wáè teni mnsa' aè njïû yáánïì.”	"I heard the altar saying, ""Yes, Lord God, the Almighty, true and righteous are your judgments."""
E ba aè nfeè' moè' beèe a lor weèr aè buu bcicïì, geewa'a, beèe a rïìñ weèr aè bdïì' wááwá. E ba aè nfeè' moè' a yá weèr aèmboè bgúâú beèe wa'a, geewa'a weèr ku ba bteèe. Beèe a fa weèr ñgá', a ke' yú ne weèr ka'.	as unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and behold, we live; as punished, and not killed;
M ce duè njobeè' ñgaâa rbyemïì ce a yu aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè ba ñgoâñ AÈkayaè a m kwaè'shi ená woweèe a be kuèu mbaèa tá a bo jaè' ñgaâa fuèp ce a yu aè mú beèe Nyúè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm.	For it has been the good pleasure of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor among the saints who are at Jerusalem.
Beèe Farïìsi a ka' yá, a ku fúú, a du a yá beèe ñkúú Hároèd moè', a woweèe a ká' a ce seèesi aèmboè a be koo Jisoès yú.	The Pharisees went out, and immediately conspired with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
Yi yu yi ká aèmboè beèe ncoèp-waami-aè-rrúèú ce ma ñgúè' ndap moè' ce e Siloèm aè m káèáti a yúshi naè? Waè' weèe ce kwaè'shi ená woweèe a m ba yap ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep a caa beèe wááwá aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a?	Or those eighteen, on whom the tower in Siloam fell, and killed them; do you think that they were worse offenders than all the men who dwell in Jerusalem?
E laa neè ye enáê, “ÁÈno, Tataê, máè byemi máná aè yu Kraêis, Muu Nyúè ce e m ba ená e be vúè njep ñgoèñ naè.”	"She said to him, ""Yes, Lord. I have come to believe that you are the Christ, God's Son, he who comes into the world."""
AÈ ka' ba aè mbuèuñkuèr, e cu a yïì beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú, tá a bo ye byee.	Now when evening had come, he was reclining at the table with the twelve disciples.
aè rbaèñ mmir aè buu, bsaèrbuu, mbo'ni, ndeâe mbembep, ñko'ndoñ, mnsa'ni, naèanyor ba blúr.	covetings, wickedness, deceit, lustful desires, an evil eye, blasphemy, pride, and foolishness.
baná rsa' rfi ce li vúè yi ba neè Yú' Rara, li caèa lïû rrúèú aè njáèá njïì ce e ce duèñshi foèo Nyúè.	won't service of the Spirit be with much more glory?
Jisoès aè laa enáê, “Seèe be kuè cu seè'ni ba nfeè' múcaèr tá m kúti duè yá ñwáè ce e m tuu máè.	"Then Jesus said, ""I will be with you a little while longer, then I go to him who sent me."
Hároèd ce e m ce sa' ñgoâñ Galeèleê, aè m yu' buu ce vi m ce koni na bfee vi jep ye seê, njobeè' beèe mo' a m ce laèa ená Joân aè fúú efa rkwe,	Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him; and he was very perplexed, because it was said by some that John had risen from the dead,
Woweèe a waa enáê, “AÈi', fa fúr ba ye ka'. Fúr ba Baèrabaès fa neè weèr.” Baèrabaès ca aè m ba ñkep.	"Then they all shouted again, saying, ""Not this man, but Barabbas!"" Now Barabbas was a robber."
Seèe ce maè' bïìr ca ba seèe beèe weèe ka'. Seèe ce maè' ba seèe byú' bbebep wááwá ce vi túr ñger mbekïì. Byú' bbebep ca yu byú' ce vi ce sa', a túr ñger, a tap njep ñgoèñ ce yi yu aè túè'nji na.	For our wrestling is not against flesh and blood, but against the principalities, against the powers, against the world's rulers of the darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly places.
AÈ nfeè' máè m bá'shi mtu' bráâd taê, a fa neè beèe ncúèkïì ta naè, woweèe a m ye, weèe a kwá' bbábá' aè mñkaâa bsá'?” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “Weèr aè m kwáè' aè mñkaèa ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú.”	"When I broke the five loaves among the five thousand, how many baskets full of broken pieces did you take up?"" They told him, ""Twelve."""
Máâ cu weèr beèe ce map mkwaè'shïì mi ku bii fa woweèe ñgá', m ku ba aèmboè woweèe wa'a tá m bo so woweèe neè Jisos Kraêis. Máâ loè ku gee yaè nyor aèmboè beèe a yu, tá m bo gheèter aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá, geèe tá woweèe a luêñ.	To the weak I became as weak, that I might gain the weak. I have become all things to all men, that I may by all means save some.
Baná Sataèn ka' ce reè bkoèr a yïì nyor, ñgaèpni yi ba, baná e be táá ka', tá ba yi wa' wáá.	If Satan has risen up against himself, and is divided, he can't stand, but has an end.
Ñwáè ka' ce loo ce yoèñshi Nyúè aè njáèá li ce e m be yá'ni ka', aède' ñwáè ce e rïìñ buu Nyúè boèñboñ ka' gee eká ka' byemi aè yuu ce e laèa, laa enáê, “Yi yu wa'a”, ce aèmboè e ce yu' yuu ce ñgaèñ aè laèa ka'.	"Otherwise if you bless with the spirit, how will he who fills the place of the unlearned say the ""Amen"" at your giving of thanks, seeing he doesn't know what you say?"
Ñwaè' ca ce sañ máâ Poêl, ba Silaès ba Timotïì neè ñgaâa cor ce a yu aè rla' Táèsaèlonikaè. Beèe ca yu beèe Nyúè Taèr, a ker ba beèe Jisos Kraâis foñ. M ce loo máná Nyúè túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ, fa weèe cumúnyañ.	Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the assembly of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Yi yu wa'a njobeè' bfee enjep ñgoèñ na yu ba blúr aè bsii Nyúè. Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Nyúè e ke loèr bfee ñgaâa bfee, koo ñgaâa bfee anaè aègho.”	"For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written, ""He has taken the wise in their craftiness."""
E laa foñ neè beèe ce a m ba aèfo naè enáê, “Weâe ke yá aèmboè mmbaè' vi ko' embaè mbuèuntii weèe ku laa weená mbeèñ be gweè, mbeèñ ku gwe ghup.	"He said to the multitudes also, ""When you see a cloud rising from the west, immediately you say, 'A shower is coming,' and so it happens."
ker ba mnsa' njobeè' ñkúú enjep ñgoèñ na aè gweè mnsa'.	about judgment, because the prince of this world has been judged.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè weèe, bfúr waê, weèe yu beèe ce weèe ce cu aè túè'nji tá noèñ anaè yi bo búèú weèe aèmboè nyáèá e ke búèú ñwáè naè ka'.	But you, brothers, aren't in darkness, that the day should overtake you like a thief.

Wèr be ghèter làa nè yer cùu.	We will try and say it ourselves.

Yuu ce yi geèe weèr aè túr rtarnïì aè rbipshi yuu neè ye ka' yi yu ená weèr ka' loo ka' ká ce e koèñ ese ye, e be yu' weèr.	This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
Satàn à m bèeŋger à nyo a boʼ Êf.	Satan transformed into a snake and deceived Eve.
Beèe mo' a mooshïì ye, a laa neè ye ená e duñshi woweèe ncoèo embe buèu.	Others, testing him, sought from him a sign from heaven.
Bfúr waê, aè m ba mbe nfeè' ce máè m vúè yá weèe tá m bo feè'shi buu ce Nyúè aè m geèe weèr aè riñ kuu Jisos Kraâis naè, máè vú a ke' ce laa ba blaèa ce beèe bo vúse ka' káè feè'shi ba neè bfee ñwáè tá weèe ka' byemi ka'.	When I came to you, brothers, I didn't come with excellence of speech or of wisdom, proclaiming to you the testimony of God.
Máè rïìñ ya ye, njobeè' máè m vúè ese ye, aè ba ye ce e m tuu máè.”	"I know him, because I am from him, and he sent me."""

Woweèe a ka' yá ye, a laa a waâp mú enáê, ‘A ñwáè ce e be ye bti' na. Seèe koo yú, tá vi bti' bo ba viseèe.’	"But when the farmers saw him, they reasoned among themselves, saying, 'This is the heir. Come, let's kill him, that the inheritance may be ours.'
Luke	Luêk	20	15	Woweèe a koo ye a fúr embe múè nsuu, a yú. Baná yuu ce aède' ñwáè nsuu gee neè woweèe yu ba ká?	They threw him out of the vineyard, and killed him. What therefore will the lord of the vineyard do to them?
Luke	Luêk	20	16	E be vúè yúshi woweèe, láè nsuu anaè neè beâe jáá.” Beèe a ka' yu' ca, a laa enáê, “Yuu mo' yi fa keè koni wa' ka'.”	He will come and destroy these farmers, and will give the vineyard to others. When they heard it, they said, ""May it never be!"""
Ka' Jisoès aè m duèñshi ku' mncoèo a waâp bsii wa'a, woweèe a m byemi yap yu neè ye ka'.	But though he had done so many signs before them, yet they didn't believe in him,
A m sañ mlii beèe a mmbaa ca ená a bo co' ñwáè ce e be loèr dïì' Judaès. A ka' geèe wa'a, rlii ce li fúú entoèmbïì aè ba li Maètiyaès. Li ka' fúú, a lor ye a fa mbe múè ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès ce a m ba beèe ncoèp-moè'sir-aè-rrúèú naè.	They drew lots for them, and the lot fell on Matthias, and he was numbered with the eleven apostles.
Máè lo a yá ma yuu mo' aèmboè yi yááti mbe buèu. AÈ m ba yuu báèá. Njeñwáè moè' aè m yááti mbo. E m maè' nyúè ce e ke sañ na aè nyoèr, a táá mbenduè ñwáá, a yar rtaa kúú ce a m geèe neè mkaèñsïì ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú.	A great sign was seen in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.
Nduunjì zhi zhiʼse.	The path is narrow.
Yi yu wa'a njobeè' mntee beèe ca vi tap seê. Btuè' vi lo' woweèe, woweèe a ker kaashi map mmir, buwa'laèr woweèe a ba yá buu neè map mmir, yu' buu neè wap btuè', beèeñger, vúè aè mbeèp yaè, tá m gee woweèe a luêñ.”’	For this people's heart has grown callous. Their ears are dull of hearing. Their eyes they have closed. Lest they should see with their eyes, hear with their ears, understand with their heart, and would turn again, and I would heal them.'
AÈ m ba nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè, Jisoès aè ce yá'ni mbe ndaèp rloo moè'.	He was teaching in one of the synagogues on the Sabbath day.
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba ce a m ce too ená Josáèf. E m ba ñwáâ aè rla' Jus ce a m too ená AÈrimaètiyaè. E m ba moè' efa beèe ce a m ce sa' Kansuèr, a ba ñwáâ mboèñmboñ, a ker ba ñwáâ nyáánïì.	Behold, a man named Joseph, who was a member of the council, a good and righteous man
Lòr nè ndoŋ anà-ŋwɛ̀ vʉ àgho.	Bring it together with that cup.
