M yu ñwáâ ñká' efa múè beèe wááwá ce a yu ñgaâa ntuu neè Jisoès. Máè ghááte aè njáèá ñwáè ce aède' beèe a ba loèr máè ená m yu ñwáè ntuu neè Jisoès ka' njobeè' máè m fa ñgá' neè ñgaâa coêr.	For I am the least of the apostles, who is not worthy to be called an apostle, because I persecuted the assembly of God.
M be tuusi beèe a mmbaa tá a du suñ wa blaèa neè beèe. Woweèe a be yar bcáâ' njïì rkwe. M be fa woweèe ñger tá a cep ya ntuu aè mnoèñ ncúèkïì neè mnoèñ mjeèe-mmbaa ba mnoèñ mntuunfu.”	"I will give power to my two witnesses, and they will prophesy one thousand two hundred sixty days, clothed in sackcloth."""
Beèe a m ce suñ aèmboè Jisoès goèr, ñkúú Hároèd aè yu'. Beèe moè' a m ce laèa ená a Joân ñwáè baèptir beèe ce e fúú efa rkwe, a mbuèu ce e túr ñger aè rgeèe njáèá buu bghagha' ca wa'a.	"King Herod heard this, for his name had become known, and he said, ""John the Baptizer has risen from the dead, and therefore these powers are at work in him."""
Rkùʼsi rli ba nè Nyʉ embe bùu.	Glory be to God in Heaven.
E ka' natïì embe dïì' ce e ba ce geèe rloo naè, kúti, a yá ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu aèmboè a ce buumi njobeè' woweèe a m koosimnse goèr a sáê.	When he rose up from his prayer, he came to the disciples, and found them sleeping because of grief,
Blaèa ce a sañ enáê, “A m yá ye aè ñwáâ nyáánïì” naè, a m ku sañ ba njo' Abraèham caè'caè' ka',	Now it was not written that it was accounted to him for his sake alone,
Beèe wááwá a m báèáñger seê, a laa enáê, “Waè' ñwáè ca yu Muu Dávïìd a?”	"All the multitudes were amazed, and said, ""Can this be the son of David?"""
Beèe a m loèr bbishïîr, ba bcáè' mfaè' ce vi m joèo Poêl, a duè joèo beèe ce a m ce yañse aègho, woweèe a luñ efa waâp byañ, byú' bbebep vi fúú enjep woweèe.	so that even handkerchiefs or aprons were carried away from his body to the sick, and the evil spirits went out.
Beèe mo' a ká' a ce ce ye neè mce, a cete ye mmir, a túshi ye neè bdúè' a laa neè ye enáê, “To' ka' ñwáè ce e túshi wáè neè bdúè'.” Beèe ce a m ce keè'ni Ndap Nyúè a koo ye, a lïîp.	"Some began to spit on him, and to cover his face, and to beat him with fists, and to tell him, ""Prophesy!"" The officers struck him with the palms of their hands."
Baná weèe fúr yuu bebep ca efa weâe mú tá weèe bo ba brara. Yi yu mini ená weèe yu war brara njobeè' a m tañshi tañshïì neè Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yïìseèe njeèe tañshïì.	Purge out the old yeast, that you may be a new lump, even as you are unleavened. For indeed Christ, our Passover, has been sacrificed in our place.
Wèr à bɛ̀ɛ ŋkaa anà njobèʼ e kùʼ sê.	We were astonished at that monkey because it is very big.
Pailáèt aè ka' yu' wa'a, a bipshi enáê, “Ñwáè ca yu ñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèle a?”	But when Pilate heard Galilee mentioned, he asked if the man was a Galilean.
Wáè yá mkaèñsïì ce m túr mbaè bo maè' a ker yá mú btábuèr saèamba ce a ke tooshi blam mbo naè. M be suñ wáè mbuèu efa buu ca. Mkaèñsïì saèamba ca mi táá aètu bcïìndap saèamba ce a ce keè'ni bcor saèambaê, mú btábuèr saèamba ca aè ba bcor saèambaê.”	the mystery of the seven stars which you saw in my right hand, and the seven golden lampstands. The seven stars are the angels of the seven assemblies. The seven lampstands are seven assemblies.
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a m kúti a yá ye, a suñ ye buu ce woweèe a m geèe, ker ba buu ce woweèe a m duè a yá'ni beèe.	The apostles gathered themselves together to Jesus, and they told him all things, whatever they had done, and whatever they had taught.
Pitaè aè kuushïì yuu ce yi mú ba, a laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Rabaèi, yá ce ce wáè mú cáp naè aèmboè yi yuushi.”	"Peter, remembering, said to him, ""Rabbi, look! The fig tree which you cursed has withered away."""
Ghee mo' yi m táá aèfo, mruâ' mcece' mi ba njo jiñ. A m lor kúèsha a fúú njep múè mruè' anaè a kur aè mbaèñ a naa mbekïì, a túr ye aègee cuèu.	Now a vessel full of vinegar was set there; so they put a sponge full of the vinegar on hyssop, and held it at his mouth.
Beèe mo' a m ba aèfo aè nfeè' ce Jisoès aè m ce laèa neè kúr beèe anaè, a suñ Jisoès aèmboè beèe moâ' aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, ce Pailáèt aè m yúshi, wap bláá vi fiñshïì nyor aè múè bláá mnyaèa ce woweèe a m vúè aègho, a tañshïì tañshïì aègho neè woweèe.	Now there were some present at the same time who told him about the Galileans, whose blood Pilate had mixed with their sacrifices.
E m ká' yi ñgaâa mfaè' beèe nrúêú, a fa woweèe ncúèkïì moè'sir, moè'sir, a laa enáê, ‘Geèe neè ntaa neè mbaèa ca caar tá m ke kúti.’	He called ten servants of his, and gave them ten mina coins, and told them, 'Conduct business until I come.'
E ka' duè baè' yá rboèñ Nyúè a waâp mú, a lu'shi, a tapse woweèe, a laa neè woweèe neè ñger-ñwáè ená woweèe a ku ce yu'ni neè Tata neè nteâe mo'sir.	who, when he had come, and had seen the grace of God, was glad. He exhorted them all, that with purpose of heart they should remain near to the Lord.
Weèe gee wa'a njobeè' laèa ce enáê, “Koèñ nfúroè aèmboè wáè koèñ yoè nyor” naè, yi kur mncir wááwá.	"For the whole law is fulfilled in one word, in this: ""You shall love your neighbor as yourself."""
Ñwáè ce e geèe wáè aè ñwáâ ñgoèr aè geèe nda? Yuu ce aè túr ce wáè koni ba ese Nyúè ka', yu ká? Nyúè aè ka' fa wáè buu ca, wáè ka' ce naèa tu aèmboè wáè túr lá buu ca ba aè yo ñger wa'a njoká?	For who makes you different? And what do you have that you didn't receive? But if you did receive it, why do you boast as if you had not received it?
Yi ka' ba wa'a, beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì a seesïì aèmboè a be yú Lasoèroès,	But the chief priests conspired to put Lazarus to death also,
Yuu ce yi geèe seèe riñ ená beèe a yu boo Nyúè káè a yu boo Sataèn áè, yu ená ñwáè ce e ka' ce geèe yáánïì ka' baná ñgaèñ yu muu Nyúè ka'. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá koèñ nfúr yïì ka' baná ñgaèñ yu muu Nyúè foñ ka'.	In this the children of God are revealed, and the children of the devil. Whoever doesn't do righteousness is not of God, neither is he who doesn't love his brother.
Jisoès aè ka' maè' mñgaèa ca neè woweèe mïìsi, a loâ aèfo,	It happened that when Jesus had finished these parables, he departed from there.
Mbuèu moè' aè m ker ba aègho ená a suñ ye aèmboè ñwáè ka', njobeè' e m rïìñ buu ce beèe a ce kwaè'shi wáá.	and because he didn't need for anyone to testify concerning man; for he himself knew what was in man.
Tomas aè beesïì neè ye enáê, “Yaè Tata ba yaè Nyúè.”	"Thomas answered him, ""My Lord and my God!"""
Njáèá mncir ca vi loè gee beèe a yu'nïì aègho, lor wap mnyor njep nsheè ker fa ñgá' neè yaèp nyor. E ba aè nfeè' ce beèe a káè' ce láè mncir anaè yi yáátïì aèmboè vi geèe beèe a túr lá bfee wa'a, vi banïì túr ñger aè rjaè' ñwáè tá e borni yuu ce yïì nyor ce koèñ ená e gee ka'.	Which things indeed appear like wisdom in self-imposed worship, and humility, and severity to the body; but aren't of any value against the indulgence of the flesh.
Fa bepsi neè ntee cárcár ka'. Ñwáè moè' ka' gee yuu bebep neè weèe, weèe foosïì ye. Tata Jisoès aè foèosi weèe efa yeè buu bbebep, baná weèe foosi beèe mo' foñ.	bearing with one another, and forgiving each other, if any man has a complaint against any; even as Christ forgave you, so you also do.
Mncir vi m ce naèshi seèe tá Jisos Kraâis ka' vúè, tá seèe ce seèe aè byemi neè ye naè bo ba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè.	So that the law has become our tutor to bring us to Christ, that we might be justified by faith.
Ntukùu anà yu deŋrì sê.	That toe is very thin.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè beèe Isráèl, AÈsayaè aè m sañ yuu ce Nyúè aè m laèa enáê, “Máè maè' ma mmbo neè yaè beèe, káâ' aè ñgaèptú' du ba' aè mbuèuñkuèr, woweèe a tee btu, a yu'ni neè máè ka'.”	"But as to Israel he says, ""All day long I stretched out my hands to a disobedient and contrary people."""
Túè' aè ka' káè' ce raa, Pol aè bu' mmbo neè woweèe wááwá ená woweèe a ye yuu. E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè yá mluè, a cu neè njeè aè mnoèñ ncoèp-kyeèe-aè-rrúèú, a joo yuu kuè cuèu ka'.	"While the day was coming on, Paul begged them all to take some food, saying, ""This day is the fourteenth day that you wait and continue fasting, having taken nothing."
Ñgaâa ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' ba ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep a m ce vúè aètútú neè Jisoès aè ryu' buu ce e m ce yá'ni.	Now all the tax collectors and sinners were coming close to him to hear him.
Baná wáè ka' tá rïìñ aè rfyá' aè bkuè' ce vi bep na neè mini-ñwáè ka', aède' fa nda bkuè' mini neè wáè.	If therefore you have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon, who will commit to your trust the true riches?
M ker ce laèa ená ñwáè moè' fa kwaè'shi ená m yu lúr ka'. Weèe ka' ce kwaè'shi ená m yu lúr, weèe ku ma'shi tá m laa nlaâa nyu' nyor aèmboè aède' lúr laêa.	I say again, let no one think me foolish. But if so, yet receive me as foolish, that I also may boast a little.
Ñwáè moè' embe ntáè' Lávïì ye ye aè ka' vúè baè' mbo yá ye, a lá' a caa a duê.	In the same way a Levite also, when he came to the place, and saw him, passed by on the other side.
AÈmboè máè ce m yu Tataê, a ker ba Ñwáè Ryá'nïì, máè ka' su'si me mkuèu, baná weèe ce su'si mkuâu bfúr wee foñ.	If I then, the Lord and the Teacher, have washed your feet, you also ought to wash one another's feet.
E bʉ̀r làa ce wèr ye à ba tʉr nà nè bèe moʼ.	He has disclosed the discussion I had with him to other people.
E lɛʼ nè rsii rbebep àmbò mutù à tʉʉ ye na.	He got up with ill luck as a car has knocked him.
Jisoès aè táá, a laa enáê, “Ká' neè ye.” Woweèe a laa neè nfeèp anaè enáê, “Kur ntee, nati mbekïì, e ce ká' wáè.”	"Jesus stood still, and said, ""Call him."" They called the blind man, saying to him, ""Cheer up! Get up. He is calling you!"""
Weâe mïìsi wáá, vú neè naè' ce e ruusi, sáá, tá seèe ye ce lu'shi,	Bring the fattened calf, kill it, and let us eat, and celebrate;
Ŋwɛ̀ mboro à cwaʼshi ye nè sàʼ.	The Bororo man has pierced him with a knife repeatedly.
E m laèa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ená woweèe a niñ mbe keñ, tuu neèñguu roè entombïì, tá e laasi beèe anaè.	Immediately Jesus made the disciples get into the boat, and to go ahead of him to the other side, while he sent the multitudes away.
E m túr bsii wañ a Nyúè, a loo ená Nyúè fa ye njïì tá e ba'ri ndap neè Nyúè Jakoèp.	who found favor in the sight of God, and asked to find a habitation for the God of Jacob.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Musïìs aè m maè'shi ená weèe juu wee bbyeèñge njobeè' weèe teèe btu seê. Yi m ba wa'a efa rkáè' ka'.	"He said to them, ""Moses, because of the hardness of your hearts, allowed you to divorce your wives, but from the beginning it has not been so."
Túè' aè ka' raa, e ká' ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu, a ce beèe ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú efa waâp mú, a too woweèe ená ñgaâa ntuu.	When it was day, he called his disciples, and from them he chose twelve, whom he also named apostles:
Woweèe a lo a tuu beèe Farïìsi mo' ba beèe vi ñkúú Hároèd ená a vú bipshi buu neè Jisoès tá a bo roèo njïì ce a be geèe tá e ka' faèa nlaèa.	They sent some of the Pharisees and of the Herodians to him, that they might trap him with words.
Ñwáè ce e m kwe na aè fúú aèmboè a m kur mi mkoo ba mi mkuèu neè bcáè', a boo vi bsii neè bcáè' naè. Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Baè'shi neè bcáè' tá e duê.”	"He who was dead came out, bound hand and foot with wrappings, and his face was wrapped around with a cloth. Jesus said to them, ""Free him, and let him go."""
Ka' yi yu wa'a, beèe wááwá a byemi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca ka'. AÈsayaè aè m laèa enáê, “Tataê, ñwáè moè' yu ce e byemi yuu ce weèr aè laèa ka'.”	"But they didn't all listen to the glad news. For Isaiah says, ""Lord, who has believed our report?"""
Anaès ba Kaifaès a m ba btu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì neè Nyúè.	in the high priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas, the word of God came to John, the son of Zacharias, in the wilderness.
Naètanïìyáèl aè laa neè ye enáê, “Rabaèi, a wáè Muu Nyúè. A wáè ñkúú aè to' Isráèl.”	"Nathanael answered him, ""Rabbi, you are the Son of God! You are King of Israel!"""
Woweèe a laa neè ye enáê, “Musïìs aè m ka' ba laa ená mbañruèñwáè fa ñwaè' neè njeñwáè aè rduèñshi ená e saè'si guèu, ka' juu ye njoká?”	"They asked him, ""Why then did Moses command us to give her a bill of divorce, and divorce her?"""
E ke ba aè nfeè' seèe ce ye byee Nyúè, see loo, yoñshi ye aè ndoñ mruè' ce see ke no. Seâe ce no enjep ndoñ anaè yi ce duèñshi ená seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe yu aèbee njo' vi bláá. Seâe ce bá'shi byee, yi ce duèñshi foñ ená seèe woweèe yu aèbee njo' yïì nyor. Mboè yi yu wa' a?	The cup of blessing which we bless, isn't it a sharing of the blood of Christ? The bread which we break, isn't it a sharing of the body of Christ?
Zhii ŋgèe zhi gaa mɛ̀ njobèʼ e ke lìp boo vii sê.	His character repels me because he beats his children too much.
Yá neè, e ce laèa buu aèwañ, ñwáè aè ke' ce laèa yuu neè ye ka'. Seemoè' beâe bgoèrgoèr a yá ená e yu Kraâis anaè.	Behold, he speaks openly, and they say nothing to him. Can it be that the rulers indeed know that this is truly the Christ?
E ka' ce loo, vi bsii vi kupseè a ba aè njáâá jáá, vi bcáè' vi fúp a ce laè'ñger.	As he was praying, the appearance of his face was altered, and his clothing became white and dazzling.
M ce loo neè wáè aè mnoèñ wááwá, a ce yoèñshi Nyúè ce m ce faè' neè ye neè ntee rara aèmboè wa bta a m ce faè' naè.	I thank God, whom I serve as my forefathers did, with a pure conscience. How unceasing is my memory of you in my petitions, night and day
E ka' laèa wa'a, woweèe a bááñgeèr seê, a laa fa waâp mú enáê, “Baná ñwáè ce aède' e luñ yu ba nda?”	"They were exceedingly astonished, saying to him, ""Then who can be saved?"""
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè weèe aè ce geèe ñgeèe ce beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a ce geèe, a ker ce yu'ni ba neè ñkúú embe dïì' ce byú' bbebep vi ce cu, aè ba dïì' ce yi yu ba mbekïì. Ñkúú ca yu yú' ce yi ce faè' njep mntee beèe ce a teèe btu neè Nyúè.	in which you once walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit who now works in the children of disobedience;
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a m geèe ku' buu bbáèá ba buu bghagha' aè múè beèe. Ñgaâa rbyemïì wááwá a m ce vúè aèbee mbe njïì baaki ñkúú Solomúèn.	By the hands of the apostles many signs and wonders were done among the people. They were all with one accord in Solomon's porch.
A m bi máè aè ñwáè Isráèl mbe ntáè' Bánjamáèn, yaè ta ba yaè ma a ba beèe Hibruès ce mini, máè ka' baè' ñgaèa moè'sir, a gee máè búè. AÈ ka' ba aèmboè mncir ce a láè, máè m ba ñwáè Farïìsïî.	circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews; concerning the law, a Pharisee;
Seèe ce laèa seená woweèe a yu ñgaâa Mboâñtu njobeè' woweèe a m táá tatap aè nfeè' ñgá'. Weèe aè m yu' aèmboè Jup ce e m kur ntee aè nfeè' ce rmoèoshïì li m vúè neè ye, a ka' loè embenjïì mo, Nyúè aè fa ye ku' buu. Baná weèe riñ ená Taèr Nyúè boèñ ñgeèe, a ba ñwáè ñkoosimnse seê.	Behold, we call them blessed who endured. You have heard of the patience of Job, and have seen the Lord in the outcome, and how the Lord is full of compassion and mercy.
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a m ce roèo mú njáèá nduunjïì mo' aè ryú Jisoès njobeè' woweèe a m ce wáp beèe.	The chief priests and the scribes sought how they might put him to death, for they feared the people.
Nyúè ce e túr ku' buu bboèñboñ be fa weèe buu wááwá ce weèe buu. E be caèasi buu anaè mbe bo Jisos Kraêis.	My God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
Ká' embe nfeè' anaè, beèe magoèr efa ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ma'shïì ye, a ker ce kar a ye ka'.	At this, many of his disciples went back, and walked no more with him.
E cɛ̀ŋ mbàa banɛ m be kèr fa ye moʼ kaʼ.	He has underestimated the amount, therefore I will not give him more.
Bkar waê, aè ka' ba yi aèmboè weèe, weèe gheter ja' weêe mnyor tá weèe bo táá aè buu Nyúè ce weèe aè byemi, ce vi boèñ aè misïî. Ce loo neè aè ñger Yú' Rara aè nfeè' wááwá.	But you, beloved, keep building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit.
Nteèendúñ anaè aè koo aè keñ, keñ aè moo aè rduè laèr, weèr aè boñlaèr a ma'shïî, e lor keñ a ce duè aègho.	When the ship was caught, and couldn't face the wind, we gave way to it, and were driven along.
Yàa taa yu ŋwɛ̀ coʼ ŋgàŋ.	My father castes demons.
Laèa neè neè beèe ce a ce laèa ená ndoèo co' weèe naè ená Nyúè ghoni woweèe, ker loo foñ neè beèe ce a ce fa ñgá' neè weèe.	bless those who curse you, and pray for those who mistreat you.
Jisoès a ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu weèe a m duè ba' aè ñgoèñ beèe Gáèrasaè ce yi m ba neèñguu rdip rgoèr.	They came to the other side of the sea, into the country of the Gadarenes.
E ku cu à rgèe mcɛ̌r.	He is still playing games.
A faèdïì' ce a m taa Jisoès mbe kïìntaa. A m taa beèe mo' a baa mbe bkïìntaa foñ. Moè' aè m ba aè bo ñkoèp Jisoès moè' aè ba yi aè bo maè', Jisoès aè ba yi mbetar.	where they crucified him, and with him two others, on either side one, and Jesus in the middle.
A ka' yá muu ca, a suñ Josáèf ba Máèári yuu ce ncïìndap Nyúè aè suñ woweèe aèmboè muu anaè.	When they saw it, they publicized widely the saying which was spoken to them about this child.
Baná njáèá ñgá' ce weèe ce yá na yu ba njïì ce Nyúè ce yá'ni weèe. Cena yi duèñshi ená Nyúè aè loèr weèe aèmboè boo vi. Waè' muu moè' aè m be ba ce e ka' gee yuu bebep, taèr ke' lip ka' a?	It is for discipline that you endure. God deals with you as with children, for what son is there whom his father doesn't discipline?
AÈmboè m ce geèe ba buu ce m ce koèñ aè rgeèe ka' na, ce geèe ba máè ka', ce geèe ba buu bbebep ce vi yu njep máâ ntee.	But if what I don't desire, that I do, it is no more I that do it, but sin which dwells in me.
Woweèe a du embenjïì a cepshi beèe mo' ená woweèe a nya' mnde' mbe tu Stáfaèn. Woweèe a ká' a laa enáê, “Weèr aè yu' aèmboè e ce nya' mnde' a ce bepsi rlii Musïìs ba Nyúè.”	"Then they secretly induced men to say, ""We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses and God."""
AÈ ka' ba yi neè beèe ce Nyúè aè ká', káè yu Jus áè, káè yu Greâk áè, woweèe a rïìñ ená ñger Nyúè yi yááti, bfee Nyúè vi yáátïì foñ embenjïì Jisoès Kraêis.	but to those who are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ is the power of God and the wisdom of God.
Be ba aè mñwáá ta anaè tá woweèe a roo rkwe, yá ka'. Woweèe a be koèñ aè rkwe tá rkwe li táá woweèe.	In those days people will seek death, and will in no way find it. They will desire to die, and death will flee from them.
Weèr yu aèmboè beèe ce a ce koosimnse wa'a, geewa'a weèr ce lu'shi aè nfeè' wááwá. Weèr yu aèmboè ñgaâa fuèp wa'a, geewa'a weèr ce geèe beèe magoèr a ce koni bkuè'. Weèr yu aèmboè beèe ce a túr buu ka' wa'a, geewa'a weèr a túr buu wááwá.	as sorrowful, yet always rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
Saimún Pitaè aè ka' tose yi a ku niñ ba njep rsheè, a yá bcáè' ce vi m noèñ njo,	Then Simon Peter came, following him, and entered into the tomb. He saw the linen cloths lying,
Bfúr waê, m ce koèñ máná weèe riñ yuu ce beèe a m be riñ ka', faè dïì' weèe bo ce kwaè'shi ená weèe túr bfee se ka'. Yi yu ená beèe Isráèl a be kuè cip btuè' nfeseè ka'. A be kuè cip btuè' caar duè baè' aè nfeè' ce beèe wááwá efa múè beèe enje jáá ce a ba byemi, a byemi naè.	For I don't desire you to be ignorant, brothers, of this mystery, so that you won't be wise in your own conceits, that a partial hardening has happened to Israel, until the fullness of the Gentiles has come in,
Mɛ̀ dù kù ntaa, yaa ŋguu zhi cir.	I went to the market and my firewood was not sold.
Woweèe a m ce koèñ aè rgeèe ba yuu ce vúse Nyúè vúse woweèe ka'. Woweèe a m ce koèñ aè rgeèe ba yuu ce ku'si ba beèe kuè'si woweèe.	for they loved men's praise more than God's praise.
Bfúr waê, m rïìñ neè mini-ñwáè ená weèe yu beâe bboèñboñ seê, a riñ buu seê, a riñ aè rcep weèe btu.	I myself am also persuaded about you, my brothers, that you yourselves are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge, able also to admonish others.
Ñwáè rbyeè ba ñwáè rñwañshi neè mdip a ku ba yáánïì. Nyúè be laè' ñwáè wááwá aè rfaè' ce ñgaèñ aè geèe.	Now he who plants and he who waters are the same, but each will receive his own reward according to his own labor.
Yuu ce máè m geèe neè bcor mo' a ke' gee neè weèe ka', yu ká? Yuu ce máè m geèe neè weèe ka' ku ba ba ená máè m ba ntáèr neè weèe ka'. Máè geèe faèa. Foèosi neè máè.	For what is there in which you were made inferior to the rest of the assemblies, unless it is that I myself was not a burden to you? Forgive me this wrong.
Bfúr waê, wee weèe aè rïìñ ená rcaè'nïì ce weèr aè m vúè ca'ni weèe naè li m ba aè cicïì ka'.	For you yourselves know, brothers, our visit to you wasn't in vain,
Weèe aè láè yi nlaèa njep weâe mntee ka' njobeè' weèe aè byemi neè ñwáè ce e m tuu naè ka'.	You don't have his word living in you; because you don't believe him whom he sent.
Beèe Farïìsi ba beèe mo' efa waâp mú ce a m ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a rú'ñgeèr, a laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès enáê, “Weèe ce yeñger a ce noñger weèe ñgaâa ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' weèe ker ba ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep njoká?”	"Their scribes and the Pharisees murmured against his disciples, saying, ""Why do you eat and drink with the tax collectors and sinners?"""
Woowèe a ba ku du nè yap kùu.	They just went there themselves.
Ñwáè moè' efa waâp mú ce a m ce too ená Kïìlopaès, aè bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Waè' ku ba ba wáè efa múè beèe wááwá ce a vúè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm ce e rïìñ buu ce vi koni aèfo aè mnoèñ ca ka' a?”	"One of them, named Cleopas, answered him, ""Are you the only stranger in Jerusalem who doesn't know the things which have happened there in these days?"""
Jus a ká' a ce laèa a waâp mú enáê, “Ñwáè ca ce roèo aè rduè ba fá, a ka' ce laèa ená seèe be yá ye ka'? E ce roèo aè rduè yá yïìseèe beèe ce a yu aè bto' mo' tá e bo cu a woweèe, yá'ni beâe aè to' anaè a?	"The Jews therefore said among themselves, ""Where will this man go that we won't find him? Will he go to the Dispersion among the Greeks, and teach the Greeks?"
Beèe embe ndaèp rloo a ka' beè' embe ñwaâ' mncir keèr beè' embe ñwaâ' ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, beèe ce a m ba btu embe ndaèp rloo a tuu ñwáè ená e laa neè woweèe enáê, “Bfúr weêr, weèe aè ka' túr ncep moè' aè rfa neè beèe, weèe fa.”	"After the reading of the law and the prophets, the rulers of the synagogue sent to them, saying, ""Brothers, if you have any word of exhortation for the people, speak."""
Weèr aè m cu aè rla' ca aè mñwáá btaar a ka' co'ti a ce duè mbe keñ yïû aè rla' AÈláèksandaè ce a m ce too ená Mfar Mnyúè. E m táá aè rla' ca njep múè roè káâ' aè cuèu saa caar saa aè mïî.	"After three months, we set sail in a ship of Alexandria which had wintered in the island, whose sign was ""The Twin Brothers."""
AÈ ce laèa wáná aède' aè yá'ni blúr, ker yá'ni foñ beèe ce a rïìñ buu ka', njobeè' mncir vi fa wáè bfee, a gee wáè riñ yuu mini.	a corrector of the foolish, a teacher of babies, having in the law the form of knowledge and of the truth.
Doktà à mʉ baasi ye mnsur.	The doctor has forbidden him (to eat) pepper.
Koo ŋwàʼ ca ghashi nè mɛ̀.	Take this book and hold for me.
A máè Joân ce m yu nfúr weèe, seèe aè ba aèbee aètu Jisos Kraêis. Seèe yu aèbee aè ñgá' ce seèe ce yá. Jisos Kraâis yu yïìseèe ñkúú. Seèe ce yá ñgá' ca wa'a, a ke' ce sáè ka'. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' moè', a koo máè a du aègho aè dïì' mo' ce a m ce too ená Patmoès ce rdip rgoèr li m sïìr a kaari a tarte. Máèári aè ka' yu', a sa'ti mbekïì a du a koni ye.	When she heard this, she arose quickly, and went to him.
Máè laèa buu ca neè weèe tá weèe bo lu'shi foñ aèmboè máè, tá le rlu'shïì anaè li bo mïìsi.	I have spoken these things to you, that my joy may remain in you, and that your joy may be made full.
Baná weèe fa káè' ce tarni ka' njobeè' beèe ce a ka' táá tatap ba' aè lúèsimbuèu, baná Nyúè be laè' woweèe boèñboñ seê.	Therefore don't throw away your boldness, which has a great reward.
Njeè be keèr yañ woweèe ka'. Ntee mdip yi be keèr luèu woweèe ka'. Nyúè ce e ke sañ na be toèo woweèe ka'.	They will never be hungry, neither thirsty any more; neither will the sun beat on them, nor any heat;
Weèe aè geèe wa' ka'. Yuu weèe aè geèe ye, yi yu ená ñwáè moè' ce geèe faèa neè moè', moè' aè ce fïìp moè', ka' weèe wááwá yu bfúr wa'a.	No, but you yourselves do wrong, and defraud, and that against your brothers.
Yi yu wa'a, tá woweèe a ce keè' keèr keè', yá ka', a ce yu'shi ce yu' ka', faè dïì' a bo kupse, maè' yaèp buu bbebep tá Nyúè foosi woweèe ka'.”	"that 'seeing they may see, and not perceive; and hearing they may hear, and not understand; lest perhaps they should turn again, and their sins should be forgiven them.'"""

Govanoè aè ka' yu' nsuñ ca, weèr yá ye nashi neè ye, faè dïì' weèe niñ aè ñgá' ka'.”	"If this comes to the governor's ears, we will persuade him and make you free of worry."""
AÈmboè seèe túr yïìseèe ñwáè tañshi tañshïû ñgoèr ce e yu mbenduè beèe Nyúè na,	and having a great priest over the house of God,
Yi geèe mnsa' ka'. Káè woweèe aè ce feè'shi ba aè ntee bebep áè, káè a ce geèe ba aè ntee boèñboñ áè, beèe a ce yu' aèmboè Jisos Kraêis. A yuu ce yi geèe m ku ce lu'shi.	What does it matter? Only that in every way, whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is proclaimed. I rejoice in this, yes, and will rejoice.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, tá Nyúè bo lu'shi aè rfa weèe fáñ tá weèe bo niñ mbe nto' Tata Jisos Kraâis ce e yu yïìseèe ñwáè rjaè', tá seèe woweèe bo cu mbo nfeseè.	For thus you will be richly supplied with the entrance into the eternal Kingdom of our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ.
Nyúè aè ka' tá fa weèe ñgá' njo' yuu bebep ce weèe aè geèe aèmboè e ke geèe neè boo vi wááwá naè ka', baná weèe yu boo bsuu.	But if you are without discipline, of which all have been made partakers, then are you illegitimate, and not children.
Nfeè' moè' aè m ba ce máè m rïìñ mncir ka', a ku ba nteèe. Mncir vi ka' vúè, yuu bebep yi ba teèe,	I was alive apart from the law once, but when the commandment came, sin revived, and I died.

Seèe fa ce saèki aèmboè beèe mo' efa woweèe a m saèki naè ka'. Woweèe a m saèki wa'a, beèe ncúèkïì-ncoèp-taar-aè-mmbaa a kweñgeèr aè noâñ mo'sir.	Neither let us commit sexual immorality, as some of them committed, and in one day twenty-three thousand fell.

Nlo aè ye ye mbaèa; nlo ca be keè fa weèe aè ñgá', ye weèe ba aèmboè mor ce yi toèo ñwáè wa'a. Weèe aè baashi ye mbaèa a lá aè nfeè' ce ñgoèñ yi ce mïì. Ŋwɛɛ Saa [ŋwɛ̄ː sáː] cn 7.	month of October.

Máè rïìñ seè'ni máná blaè' ce a kupshi a lá neè máè njo' ya ñgeâe yáánïì vi yu aègho. Ñwáè ce e be keè fa máè blaè' anaè be keè fa Tata Jisoès ce e ke sa' vi mnsa' yáánïì. E be keè fa máè blaè' ca aè noèñ ce e vúè. E be keè fa ba neè máè caè' ka. E be keè fa neè beèe wááwá ce a ce nyaèñnyañ aè ryá noèñ ce e be vúè anaè.	From now on, there is stored up for me the crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, will give to me on that day; and not to me only, but also to all those who have loved his appearing.
