Ñwáè aè ka' lor yi tu ená e yu ñwáè, ce e yu ñwáè ka', baná ñgaèñ ce bo' yi tu.	For if a man thinks himself to be something when he is nothing, he deceives himself.
Baná mkaè'ni anaè mi yu ba neè beèe ce a byemi. Yi yu wa'a tá yi bo ba rara ená e ce fa buu ce e m kaè' anaè neè seèe njo' yi ntee boèñboñ, tá buu anaè bo ba aègho neè ñgúè Abraèham wááwá, keè' kuè ba ba neè beèe ce a ce láè mncir ka', vi bo ba aègho neè beèe ce a byemi neè Nyúè aèmboè Abraèham aè m byemi naè foñ. Abraèham yu taèr neè seèe wááwá.	For this cause it is of faith, that it may be according to grace, to the end that the promise may be sure to all the seed, not to that only which is of the law, but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham, who is the father of us all.
A lor bcáâ' bbúú a fa woweèe e mo'sir mo'sir, a laa neè woweèe ená woweèe a táá nfeè' múcaèr njobeè' beèe mo' efa beèe Nyúè ce a be mïìsi yúshi aèmboè a m yúshi woweèe naè a ku báti.	A long white robe was given to each of them. They were told that they should rest yet for a while, until their fellow servants and their brothers, who would also be killed even as they were, should complete their course.
AÈde' ñkwaèa yi cu mbe ndaèp ñwáè nfeseè ka'. Ñwáè ce e ke cu mbo nfeseè a muu ñwáè ndaèp anaè.	A bondservant doesn't live in the house forever. A son remains forever.
E ka' yá ce fik aèmboè yi táá aè njïìsaèp, a túr ku' bfuè seê, e du a fyá' ená yi yú lá. A ka' baè', a yá yuu mbo caa efa bfuè caè'caè' ka', njobeè' nfeè' fik e ke yú aè m gháá ka'.	Seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves, he came to see if perhaps he might find anything on it. When he came to it, he found nothing but leaves, for it was not the season for figs.
Jisoès aè karsïì nyor, a laa enáê, “Bbyeèñgeâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, weèe fa war neè máè ka', war neè ba neè wee btu, ker ba neè boo wee,	"But Jesus, turning to them, said, ""Daughters of Jerusalem, don't weep for me, but weep for yourselves and for your children."
Ncïìndap Nyúè anaè aè laa neè máè enáê, “Fa geèe wa' ka'. M ku ba ñwáè ce m ce geèe rfaè' Nyúè aèmboè wáâ geèe foñ naè. M ku ba aèmboè wáè ba bfúr wo ce a yu ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè, a ker ba aèmboè beèe wááwá ce a ce geèe buu ce a sañ mbe ñwaè' ca. Gú'shi ba neè Nyúè.”	"He said to me, ""See you don't do it! I am a fellow bondservant with you and with your brothers, the prophets, and with those who keep the words of this book. Worship God."""
Ñgwañkúñwáè aè ka' tá caèa bfeè' mntuunfu keèr ba foñ ba njeñwáè ce e m ku túr nduu moè'sir ka', weèe fa sañ li rlii aè múè mlii byepkúú ka'.	Let no one be enrolled as a widow under sixty years old, having been the wife of one man,
Mo' foñ yi yu ená seèe ce lu'shi aè ñgá' ce seèe ce yá njobeè' seèe rïìñ seená ñgá' e ke geèe ñwáè e kur ntee;	Not only this, but we also rejoice in our sufferings, knowing that suffering works perseverance;
Sañ buu ce wáè yá na mbe ñwaè'. Sañ buu ce vi be koni seè'ni ker ba buu ce vi bii ka' koni.	Write therefore the things which you have seen, and the things which are, and the things which will happen hereafter;
Beèe mo' a yu ce weèe aè ba fúr enjep mor, tá woweèe a luêñ. Beèe mo' a yu ce weèe aè ba koosi mnse neè woweèe, keèr ce wáp; káè yu wap bcáè' ce vi ce sii njobeè' yap ñgeâe bebep ce a ce geèe anaè áè, weèe fa joèo neè bo ka'.	and some save, snatching them out of the fire with fear, hating even the clothing stained by the flesh.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe yi mbuèu efa ñgaèa ca ka' a? Weèe aè ka' tá yi ka', baná aède' weèe gee wee ká ka' yi mbuèu efa mñgaèa wááwá?	"He said to them, ""Don't you understand this parable? How will you understand all of the parables?"
“Yaè beèe Isráèl, yu' neè yuu ce m be laèa na. Jisoès ce aè rla' Nasaráèt aè m ba ñwáè ce Nyúè aè m duèñshi ená e m ce ye. E m duèñshi wa'a neè buu bghagha' ce Jisoès aè m geèe, ba mncoèo ce e m duèñshi a weâe mú aè ñger Nyúè. Wee weèe rïìñ buu ca boèñboñ.	"Men of Israel, hear these words! Jesus of Nazareth, a man approved by God to you by mighty works and wonders and signs which God did by him in the midst of you, even as you yourselves know,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	2	23	Nyúè aè m maè'shi Jisoès mbe weâe mmboè aèmboè e m láè, a yi wáá ená yi be ba. Weèe aè fa ye neè ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep, a taa ye mbe kïìntaa, e kweê.	him, being delivered up by the determined counsel and foreknowledge of God, you have taken by the hand of lawless men, crucified and killed;
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	2	24	Ka' e m kwe wa'a, Nyúè aè m fúr ye efa rkwe, a gee e luñ efa mluâ rkwe, njobeè' rkwe li m túr ñger aè rláè ye mbaè yir ka'.	whom God raised up, having freed him from the agony of death, because it was not possible that he should be held by it.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	2	25	Dávïìd aè m laèa yuu a kuu ye enáê, ‘Máè m yá ená Tata ku ba weèr ye aè nfeè' wááwá. E yu aè la rkoo maè', aède' yuu mo' yi ci' máè ka'.	For David says concerning him, 'I saw the Lord always before my face, For he is on my right hand, that I should not be moved.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	2	26	A mbuèu ce ya ntee yi m lu'shi, la rlee li ce yoèp neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè. Yi yu foñ ená m be cu ce keè' yuu ce Nyúè be geèe neè máè,	Therefore my heart was glad, and my tongue rejoiced. Moreover my flesh also will dwell in hope;
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	2	27	njobeè' m rïìñ máná aè be maè'shi tá m cu mbaè yir ka'. AÈ be maè'shi tá yoè muu rfaâ' nrara kwe, búète ka'.	because you will not leave my soul in Hades, neither will you allow your Holy One to see decay.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	2	28	Wáè duèñshi máè mnduunjïû ryoèñ. AÈ be geèe tá m lu'shi seê, njobeè' aè ku ba weèe soè.’	You made known to me the ways of life. You will make me full of gladness with your presence.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	2	29	“Bfúr waê, yi yu rara ená Dávïìd ce e m ba yïìseèe tarkú naè aè m kwe, a tuñ ye, li rsheè li ku bii aègho caar gháá ntïìni.	Brothers, I may tell you freely of the patriarch David, that he both died and was buried, and his tomb is with us to this day."
E ka' suñ woweèe buu wááwá, a tuu woweèe aè rla' Jopaè.	Having explained everything to them, he sent them to Joppa.
Weâe ke yá aè nfeè' ce bce anaè vi káè' a ce top, weèe ku riñ weená nfeè' mbeèñ yu aètútú.	When they are already budding, you see it and know by your own selves that the summer is already near.
E m co' seèe aè li rkoèñ, a laa yïì nlaèayá, a gee seèe aè ba boo vi, tá seèe bo ba entombïì neè buu wááwá ce e m boo naè.	Of his own will he brought us forth by the word of truth, that we should be a kind of first fruits of his creatures.
Ñwáè ce rïìtu yi ce koo ye neè máè, ker ba neè wa blaèa embe njáèá nfeè' e seè'ni ce beèe a ce kani Nyúè, a ker ce geèe buu bebep na, baná rïìtu yi be keè koo Muu Ñwáè neè ye foñ mbe nfeè' ce e be keè vúè a bcïìndap Nyúè ce brara weèe neè foèo yïì Taê.”	"For whoever will be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation, the Son of Man also will be ashamed of him, when he comes in the glory of his Father with the holy angels."""
Kraâis aè m niñ ba mbe dïû' rara ce aè m kupshi ba beèe ka'. Dïì' ce aè m kupshi ba beèe anaè yi táá ba aètu dïì' ce Nyúè yu. E m niñ mbe buèu mbe dïì' ce Nyúè yu, tá e bo táá a seâe btuè aè bsii Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá.	For Christ hasn't entered into holy places made with hands, which are representations of the true, but into heaven itself, now to appear in the presence of God for us;
Jisoès a beesïì enáê, “M ce suñ weèe máná beèe ca a ka' cumúnyañ, bluèr ca vi ku yoêp.”	"He answered them, ""I tell you that if these were silent, the stones would cry out."""
Jisoès aè ka' laèa buu ca mïìsi, a laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê,	It happened, when Jesus had finished all these words, that he said to his disciples,
Yi yu ená a ker bi weèe, weèe aè ke' ba boo beèe ce a ke loè ku kweñger naè ka'. Weèe yu ba boo ñwáè ce aède' e ke kwe ka'. Yu Nlaèa Nyúè ce yi yu teèe, a túr ñger nfeseè, ce yi geèe weèe aè ka' ba boo vi.	having been born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, through the word of God, which lives and remains forever.
Ñgúè buu ce e m gweèñger mbenduè ryáá naè táá aètu beèe ce a yu' blaâa Nyúè, yu' rboèñ aègho seê, geewa'a, blaèa anaè vi ke' taa mñgaèñ njep woweèe ka'. Woweèe aè loè ku byemi ba aè mú nfeè' moè', e ba aè nfeè' ce rmoèoshïì li vúè neè woweèe, woweèe a ku kúti njïìnjïì.	Those on the rock are they who, when they hear, receive the word with joy; but these have no root, who believe for a while, then fall away in time of temptation.
Be ba aè nfeè' ce ncïìndap Nyúè yïì elúèsimbuèu (yïì embenjïì bcïìndap ntuunfu) aè fyáp rsoèñ li naè, tá rfaè' Nyúè li mïî, tá buu Nyúè ce vi m ba aè bsúèti naè vi yááti aèwañ, tá yi bo kuè ba aèmboè e m suñ yi ñgaâa ncep ntuu.”	but in the days of the voice of the seventh angel, when he is about to sound, then the mystery of God is finished, as he declared to his servants, the prophets.
Nfeè' ntee msini anaè aè ka' gháá, ñwáè ca aè tuu yïì ñwáè rfaè' moè' ená e du yá beèe ce e m láè nsuu neè woweèe naè, koo msini mi.	When it was time, he sent a servant to the farmer to get from the farmer his share of the fruit of the vineyard.
A mboè mnsa' anaè vi yu aè njáèá enáê: Rraa li vúè njep ñgoèñ, beèe a koñ ba túè'nji a caa rraa njobeè' woweèe a ce geèe buu bbebep.	This is the judgment, that the light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the light; for their works were evil.
Woweèe a ka' yu' wa'a, túè' aè ka' ce raa, woweèe a du mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, a yá'ni beèe. Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba yïì beèe a m ká' bleebeèe embe kansuèr wááwá, a tuu beèe ená a du fúr woweèe embe shañ vú aègho.	When they heard this, they entered into the temple about daybreak, and taught. But the high priest came, and those who were with him, and called the council together, and all the senate of the children of Israel, and sent to the prison to have them brought.
E ka' niñ mbe ndaèp, mmbañruè ca a vú a yá ye. E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè byemi ená aède' m gee weèe yá buu a?” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “ÁÈno, Tataê.”	"When he had come into the house, the blind men came to him. Jesus said to them, ""Do you believe that I am able to do this?"" They told him, ""Yes, Lord."""
Jisoès aè waa tatap seê, a laa enáê, “Yaè Taê, máè fa la ryoèñ mbe wáâ mmboè.” E ka' laèa wa'a, a ko'si ryoèñ, a kwe.	"Jesus, crying with a loud voice, said, ""Father, into your hands I commit my spirit!"" Having said this, he breathed his last."
Tá beèe wááwá ce a ce yá'ni woweèe buu Nyúè a fa buu moè' efa buu bboèñboñ ce a túr neè ñwáè ce e ce yá'ni woweèe.	But let him who is taught in the word share all good things with him who teaches.
Nyúè aè m geèe wa'a tá e bo tee beèe ce mncir vi m kur woweèe naè, tá seèe bo ba boo Nyúè.	that he might redeem those who were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of children.
Woweèe a ka' caèa bsoogáè ce a m táá entoèmbïì ker ba beèe embenjïì mo, a ba' aè cuèu ñka' bkwaèñ ce a caèa mbo niñ ba aè múè la', yi mú'tïì neè yi bo, woweèe a fúêú, a ka' ce jáèr njep nduunjïì mo', ncïìndap Nyúè aè ma'shïì ye kaâñ mo'sir, a duê.	When they were past the first and the second guard, they came to the iron gate that leads into the city, which opened to them by itself. They went out, and went down one street, and immediately the angel departed from him.
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè ce e rïìñ aèmboè Tata e ke kwaè'shi yu nda? Ñwáè ce aède' e cep ye yu nda?”	For who has known the mind of the Lord? Or who has been his counselor?
Yap ñgeèe yi ce duèñshi ená mncir Nyúè anaè vi yu njep waâp ntee ghup. Wap bfee vi ce geèe woweèe a riñ wa'a foñ njobeè' woweèe a geèe yuu boèñboñ, ku rïîñ, a geèe yuu bebep, ku rïîñ.	in that they show the work of the law written in their hearts, their conscience testifying with them, and their thoughts among themselves accusing or else excusing them)
Jisoès aè du a ye, ku' beèe moè' foñ a du a yeâ mbuèu, a ce nyoèrni, a fate ye.	He went with him, and a great multitude followed him, and they pressed upon him on all sides.
Baná a mbuèu ce m ce sañ buu ca neè weèe ka' loè vúè caè'ni weèe. M ce sañ wa'a faè dïì' m bo loèr ñger ce Tata Nyúè aè fa máè, ghashi weèe ba neè mmbo mtatap aè nfeè' ce m ka' vú ka'. Nyúè aè m fa máè ñger anaè tá m bo tapsi weèe aègho, ke' ba ba ená m sáási weèe aègho ka'.	For this cause I write these things while absent, that I may not deal sharply when present, according to the authority which the Lord gave me for building up, and not for tearing down.
E gee beèe magoèr ce a m ce yañ byañ njáèá jáá jáèá jáá, a ke'seè, a ker fúshi byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe magoèr. E m sheè ená byú' anaè vi fa laèa yuu ka' njobeè' vi m rïìñ njáèá ñwáè ce e yu.	He healed many who were sick with various diseases, and cast out many demons. He didn't allow the demons to speak, because they knew him.
Jisoès aè ker duê, a loo a laa enáê, “Yaè Taê, yi ka' ba ená aède' ndoñ ca caa embe máâ tuè ka', baná aè gee tá yuu ce aè ce koèñ yi geetïî.”	"Again, a second time he went away, and prayed, saying, ""My Father, if this cup can't pass away from me unless I drink it, your desire be done."""
E ka' kúti, a ker yá woweèe a ce buumi, mmirloè mi ku ce duè neè woweèe duè.	He came again and found them sleeping, for their eyes were heavy.
A ka' ce tuu, e buumïì. Ka' cu, fu' mo' yi vú neè ñger-ñwáè seê, mdip mi ká' a ce niñ mbe keñ, yi ba bebep neè woweèe.	But as they sailed, he fell asleep. A wind storm came down on the lake, and they were taking on dangerous amounts of water.
Beèe enje jáá a ka' yu' ca, a lu'shi seê, a ku'si Tata aè vi blaèa. Beèe ce Nyúè aè m ce ená a bo koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè a m byemi.	As the Gentiles heard this, they were glad, and glorified the word of God. As many as were appointed to eternal life believed.
E ka' geèe wa' wáá, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Moè' efa weèe aè ka' túr muu mbañruè káè naè' áè, e gwe njep rwee nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè, aède' e caasïì nfeè' efa rfúr enjo a?”	"He answered them, ""Which of you, if your son or an ox fell into a well, wouldn't immediately pull him out on a Sabbath day?"""
Yá neè ená ñwáè fa kúsi yuu bebep neè yuu bebep ka'. Gheèter neè aè rgeèe ba buu bboèñboñ. Geèe neè buu bboèñboñ ca neè ñwáè wááwá ce e yu a weâe mú ker ba beèe enjepmbeè foñ.	See that no one returns evil for evil to anyone, but always follow after that which is good, for one another, and for all.
Bfúr waê, m koèñ máná weèe aè ba kuushi buu ce vi m koni viseèe bta aè nfeè' ce woweèe a m ce daè' aè rïìñ naè boèñboñ. Mmbaè' vi m ce keè'ni woweèe. Woweèe a m tuu ma rdip mo' ce a m ce too ená rdip rbeer neè mkuèu.	Now I would not have you ignorant, brothers, that our fathers were all under the cloud, and all passed through the sea;
Wáè ka' laèa eku wáâ cuèu ená Jisos yu Tataê, byemi enjep wáâ ntee ená Nyúè aè m fúr ye efa rkwe, baná aè be luèñ.	that if you will confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord, and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
Ncïìndap Nyúè moè' aè ker vúê, a laa enáê, “Li gweè. Ma rla' rgoèr ce a too ená Babiloèn naè li gweè. AÈ m ba rla' ce li m geèe bto' wááwá vi no mi mruè' ce yu saèkïì, a ce saèki foñ aèmboè woweèe.”	"Another, a second angel, followed, saying, ""Babylon the great has fallen, which has made all the nations to drink of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality."""
Seèe rïìñ ená ñwáè tañshi tañshïì e ke ce yi tu tá beèe a bo ce yu'ni neè ye ka'. Nyúè a ñwáè ce e ke ce ñwáè tañshi tañshïì aèmboè e m ce Ároèn naè.	Nobody takes this honor on himself, but he is called by God, just like Aaron was.
Wɛ̌ yeŋger à baatè cùu.	Close your mouth when eating.
Woweèe a vú neè mbúè mbaèa a fa neè ye, e bipshïì enáê, “Tu ñwáè embo na a yi nda, rlii ce a sañ mbo na aè ba rlii nda?” Woweèe a beèesi neè ye enáê, “Tu embo a yïû ñkwe Ruêm, rlii embo aè ba li foñ.”	"They brought it. He said to them, ""Whose is this image and inscription?"" They said to him, ""Caesar's."""
E m maè' ñgaèa neè woweèe aè ryá'ni woweèe ená woweèe a ba ce loo aè nfeè' wááwá, keè' ce koosi bsáè aè nfeè' moè' ka'.	He also spoke a parable to them that they must always pray, and not give up,
M ce suñ weèe ená be keè ba neètú' anaè, tá beèe a mmbaa a noñ mbe bkuu, tá a lor moè', ma'shi moè'.	I tell you, in that night there will be two people in one bed. The one will be taken, and the other will be left.
A m fa nyaèa ca ñger ená e naatu, cáp Nyúè. A m fa ye ñger ená e gee yuu ce e koèñ aègho aè mñwáá ncoèp-baa-aè-mkyeèe.	A mouth speaking great things and blasphemy was given to him. Authority to make war for forty-two months was given to him.
Weèe ce too máè ená Ñwáè Ryá'nïì, a ker ce too máè ená Tataê. Weèe ce too yáánïì njobeè' m yu wa'a.	You call me, 'Teacher' and 'Lord.' You say so correctly, for so I am.
Ma boo vi Sábáèdi aè m vúè a boo vi weèe, a yá Jisoès. E m gweè njep yeâ tïìi, a laa ená e gee yuu neè ye.	Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee came to him with her sons, kneeling and asking a certain thing of him.
Ntee yi ka' ce yañ nfúroè njobeè' aè ce ye njáèá byee mo', baná aè ker ce koèñ ye ka'. Fa maè'shi tá byee vi kúti ba yuu ce yi be geèe tá ñwáè ce Kraâis aè m kwe a yeâ tuè gwe ka'.	Yet if because of food your brother is grieved, you walk no longer in love. Don't destroy with your food him for whom Christ died.
Mboè a ye kapintaè ce muu Máèári a? Mboè e yu nfúr Jáêms, ba Joseès, ba Jud ker ba Saimúèn a? Mboè bjar vi a yu seèe woweèe aèfa a?” A ka' laèa wa'a, a kani ye.	"Isn't this the carpenter, the son of Mary, and brother of James, Joses, Judah, and Simon? Aren't his sisters here with us?"" They were offended at him."
AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' ce Nyúè Taèr aè m fa ñger ba foèo neè Jisos Kraâis naè, njeèndoñ Nyúè ce e túr foèo ce vi caèa ñger aè m laèa enáê, “Muu ca a muu waè ce máè koèñ seê. M ce yu' rboèñ neè ye.”	"For he received from God the Father honor and glory, when the voice came to him from the Majestic Glory, ""This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased."""
Ñwáè aè ka' túr bfee aè rfeè'shi blaâa Nyúè, tapsi beèe aègho, baná ñgaèñ fe'shïî. Nyúè aè ka' gee ñwáè riñ aè rfa beèe buu, baná ñgaèñ fa mmbo mtoo. Ñwáè ka' túr bfee aè rba tu neè beèe, e sa' beèe neè yi ntee-ñwáè. Ñwáè aè ka' túr bfee aè rjaè' beèe, ñgaèñ ja' neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè.	or he who exhorts, to his exhorting: he who gives, let him do it with liberality; he who rules, with diligence; he who shows mercy, with cheerfulness.
Yá neè ená cumúnyañ ce e loè ese Jisos Kraâis ba njep weâe mntee aè buu wááwá ce weèe ce geèe, njobeè' Nyúè aè ká' weèe ená weèe ba aèbee aèmboè ñwáè moè'sir, neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè. Ce yoñshi neè Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá.	And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to which also you were called in one body; and be thankful.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè máè, aède' m naatu aè yuu mo' caa efa rkwe ce Tata Jisos Kraâis aè m kwe mbe kïìntaa naè ka'. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' li rkwe anaè, buu enjep ñgoèñ na aè kúti buu bcicïì neè máè. Buu anaè yu neè máè aèmboè bgúâú buu wa'a, má máè aè ba aèmboè gúâú yuu wa'a, neè buu anaè.	But far be it from me to boast, except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.
Woweèe a m feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aè rla' anaè, a gee beèe magoèr a byemïì, a ba ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès. A ka' mïìsi, a kúti a caa rla' Listraè ba IÌkonïìyoèm, a ba' aè rla' Antïìyoèk aè ñgoâñ Pïìsidïìyaè.	When they had preached the Good News to that city, and had made many disciples, they returned to Lystra, Iconium, and Antioch,
Judaès ce e m fyeèni ye naè aè m suñ woweèe wáá enáê, “Ñwáè ce m ka' baa nje nyoèr baná a ye. Koo neè ye du aègho, ke'ni boèñboñ faè dïì' e cañ ka'.”	"Now he who betrayed him had given them a sign, saying, ""Whoever I will kiss, that is he. Seize him, and lead him away safely."""
Weèe kwa'shi wa'a njobeè' weèe aè m kwe, le ryoèñ li ba njep Jisos Kraâis ce e yu a Nyúè, Nyúè aè kupshïì ryoèñ anaè a lá neè weèe.	For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “Máè suñ weèe wáá ená a máè ye. Yi ka' ba ená weèe ce roèo ba máè, weèe ma'shïì tá beèe ca a duse.”	"Jesus answered, ""I told you that I am he. If therefore you seek me, let these go their way,"""
To wáè byemi ená Nyúè ku ba moè'sir. Wáè geèe yáánïì. Kuushi wáná byú' mnyúâmkaè' vi ku byemi wa' foñ, a ce wáp a ce kaèñ.	You believe that God is one. You do well. The demons also believe, and shudder.
Ñwáè fa loèr posaè, káè baèa, káè blaba' ka'. Ñwáè fa caè'ni ñwáè aè nduunjïì ka'.	Carry no purse, nor wallet, nor sandals. Greet no one on the way.
AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' ce Gaèliyoè aè m ba govanoâ aè ñgoâñ AÈkayaè, Jus a m tar cuèu, a koo Pol a du aègho mbe koêr.	But when Gallio was proconsul of Achaia, the Jews with one accord rose up against Paul and brought him before the judgment seat,
Ca yu yuu ce Nyúè aè m laa aèmboè rfúú ce yi m ba ená e be keè fúú efa kwe keèr duè mbaè yir búète ka' naè. E m laèa enáê, ‘M be fa wáè buu brara ce máè m kaè' neè Dávïìd, rtarnïì li ba njo ka' naè.’	"Concerning that he raised him up from the dead, now no more to return to corruption, he has spoken thus: 'I will give you the holy and sure blessings of David.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	13	35	E ker laa mbe dïì' mo' foñ enáê, ‘AÈde' aè ma'shïì yoè ñwáè rfaâ' nrara, e kwe búète ka'.’	Therefore he says also in another psalm, 'You will not allow your Holy One to see decay.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	13	36	Dávïìd aè m geèe buu ce Nyúè aè m koèñ ená e gee mbe nfeè' yïì. A ka' geèe, a kwe. A m tuñ ye aègee vi btarkú, e búteè.	For David, after he had in his own generation served the counsel of God, fell asleep, and was laid with his fathers, and saw decay.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	13	37	Ñwáè ce Nyúè aè m fúr efa rkwe naè, aè m búète yi ka'.	But he whom God raised up saw no decay.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	13	38	Baná aèmboè yi yu wa' na, bfúr waê, weèe aè ba rïìñ ená yu ba njo' ñwáè anaè ce a ce feè'shi neè weèe ená aède' Nyúè foosïì buu bbebep ñwáè.	Be it known to you therefore, brothers, that through this man is proclaimed to you remission of sins,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	13	39	Weèe aè ba rïìñ ená ñwáè wááwá ce e ka' byemi neè ye baná ñgaèñ be luèñ efa buu wááwá ce aède' ncir Musïìs yi m ba gee ñwáè e luñ efa gho ka'.	and by him everyone who believes is justified from all things, from which you could not be justified by the law of Moses.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	13	40	Loèr neè nfeè' faè dïì' yuu ce ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè a m laèa, yi lo koni weèe ka'.	Beware therefore, lest that come on you which is spoken in the prophets:
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	13	41	Woweèe a m laèa enáê, ‘Yáê, weèe ce weèe ce jaèasi buu Nyúè, báèáñger neè, kweñger, njobeè' m be geèe rfaâ' mo' aè nfeè' yeè, tá ba rfaè' ce ñwáè moè' aè m ka' suñ weèe, weèe byemïì ka'.’ ”	Behold, you scoffers, and wonder, and perish; for I work a work in your days, a work which you will in no way believe, if one declares it to you.'"
“Máè m ba aè rla' Jopaè a ce geèe rloo a yá njáèá rlo mo'. Máè m yá aèmboè yuu mo' yi ce suèu embe buèu aèmboè ma cáâ' báèbár wa'a, a ghashïì aè bcuèu kyeèe efa gho a suusi njep nsheè. Yi m suèu a máâ geñ.	"I was in the city of Joppa praying, and in a trance I saw a vision: a certain container descending, like it was a great sheet let down from heaven by four corners. It came as far as me.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	6	Máè ka' fyá' njo boèñboñ, a yá mnyaâa aè laè' ba mnyaâa aè rïìñ, ker ba buu moè' aèmboè mnyo ba bbar, ba bsiñ.	When I had looked intently at it, I considered, and saw the four-footed animals of the earth, wild animals, creeping things, and birds of the sky.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	7	Máè yu' aèmboè njeèndoñ moè' aè laèa neè máè enáê, ‘Pitaè, naèti mbekïì, sháshi, ye.’	I also heard a voice saying to me, 'Rise, Peter, kill and eat!'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	8	Máè laa ya yu mánáê, ‘Tataê, máè ka', yuu ce ncir yi kani beèe efa rye yi m be niñ ku máâ cuèu ka'.’	But I said, 'Not so, Lord, for nothing unholy or unclean has ever entered into my mouth.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	9	Njeèndoñ ca aè ker laa embe buèu enáê, ‘Nyúè aè ka' gee yuu yi ba rara, aè fa loèr yuu anaè aèmboè yuu ce yi raa ka' ka'.’	But a voice answered me the second time out of heaven, 'What God has cleansed, don't you call unclean.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	10	Ca yi m koni nfeè' taar, a súñ buu anaè wááwá a ko' aègho mbe buèu.	This was done three times, and all were drawn up again into heaven.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	11	AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' anaè seeseê, beèe a mntaar ce a m tuu aè rla' Sisaèriyaè ená a vú yá máè, a vú a ba' mbe ndaèp ce máè m ce cu mbo.	Behold, immediately three men stood before the house where I was, having been sent from Caesarea to me.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	12	Yú' Rara yi laa neè máè ená m fa wáp aè rduè weèr woweèe ka'. Bfúr beèe ntuunfu ca a m duè weèr woweèe, weèr woweèe aè ka' baè', a niñ mbe ndaèp ñwáè anaè.	The Spirit told me to go with them, without discriminating. These six brothers also accompanied me, and we entered into the man's house.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	13	E suñ weèr aèmboè e m yá ncïìndap Nyúè a vú a niñ mbe ndaèp a laa enáê, ‘Tuu beèe a rla' Jopaè tá woweèe a du vúè neè Saimúèn ce li rlii mo' li yu ená Pitaè naè.	He told us how he had seen the angel standing in his house, and saying to him, 'Send to Joppa, and get Simon, whose surname is Peter,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	14	E be suñ wáè nsuñ ce e be geèe tá wáè ker ba beèe embe wáâ ndaèp wááwá a luêñ.’	who will speak to you words by which you will be saved, you and all your house.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	15	Máè ka' káè' ce laèa neè beèe embe ndaèp anaè, Yú' Rara yi suu mbe waâp nduè aèmboè yi m suèu mbe seâe nduè efa rkáè' naè.	As I began to speak, the Holy Spirit fell on them, even as on us at the beginning.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	16	Máè kuushïì nlaèa ce Tata aè m laèa enáê, ‘Joân aè m baèptir beèe neè mdip, geewa'a, a be baèptir weèe ba neè Yú' Rara.’	I remembered the word of the Lord, how he said, 'John indeed baptized in water, but you will be baptized in the Holy Spirit.'
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	11	17	Nyúè aè m ka' ba fa rfa ce e m fa neè seèe mbe nfeè' ce seèe aè m byemi neè Tata Jisos Kraâis naè neè woweèe foñ, máè m ba nda ka' sáni weèr ye?”	If then God gave to them the same gift as us, when we believed in the Lord Jesus Christ, who was I, that I could withstand God?"
Jus a roèo aè ryá ncoèo ka' byemi yuu ce beèe a laèa, Greâk a ce roèo yap ba bfee.	For Jews ask for signs, Greeks seek after wisdom,
Naèti táá mbekïì, njobeè' máè vúè tá m bo ce wáè aè yaè ñwáè rfaè', ker ba aè ñwáè ce aè be ce suñ beèe buu ce wáè yá ese máè ntïìni na, ker ba vïì ce m be loè duèñshi wáè.	But arise, and stand on your feet, for I have appeared to you for this purpose: to appoint you a servant and a witness both of the things which you have seen, and of the things which I will reveal to you;
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Wáè ka' ce koèñ aè rba yáánïì se aè bsii Nyúè, aè du fyeni yoè buu wááwá, lor mbaèa efa gho, gapshi neè ñgaâa fuèp, tá aè bo túr bkuè' mbe buèu. Wáâ geèe wa' wáá, vú a máâ mbuèu.”	"Jesus said to him, ""If you want to be perfect, go, sell what you have, and give to the poor, and you will have treasure in heaven; and come, follow me."""
Woweèe a ce cu aè túè'nji, a túr ka' mú bábá' efa ryoèñ ce li loè ese Nyúè ka', njobeè' woweèe a teèe btu, a riñ yuu ka'.	being darkened in their understanding, alienated from the life of God, because of the ignorance that is in them, because of the hardening of their hearts;
Njùʼ à làa enɛ Taantoʼ a ndur zhìi.	Njuh has said that Tantoh is her brother.
Gwàgwaʼ e ke fɛŋ àmbo siŋ waʼa.	A duck flies like a bird.
Máâ cu weèr Jus weèe, gee ñgeèe aèmboè woweèe wa'a, tá m bo so woweèe neè Jisos Kraêis. Ka' mncir Musïìs vi kur máè ka' wa'a, máâ cu weèr beèe ce mncir ca vi kur woweèe, gee ñgeèe aèmboè mncir ca vi kur lá máè foñ wa'a. M ce geèe wa'a, tá m bo so beèe anaè neè Jisos Kraêis.	To the Jews I became as a Jew, that I might gain Jews; to those who are under the law, as under the law, that I might gain those who are under the law;
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè njïì ce aède' ñwáè ba yáánïì njo' rbyemïì, e laa enáê, “Fa laèa njep wáâ ntee enáê, ‘AÈde' ko' nda mbe buèu lá?’ ka' (ce yi yu ená, Be suèu nda neè Kraâis embe buèu lá?).	"But the righteousness which is of faith says this, ""Don't say in your heart, 'Who will ascend into heaven?' (that is, to bring Christ down);"
A ba ce bèʼ bèe ce a be dù a tiisi Nfò.	When they were counting those who were to go, Nfor was omitted.
Njeñwáè anaè aè laa enáê, “Yi yu mini wa'a, Tataê, to ñgwe yi ke kuè ce ye mkúè' baa ce mi gweèñger embe tábuèr yaèp ta foñ.”	"But she said, ""Yes, Lord, but even the dogs eat the crumbs which fall from their masters' table."""
Káè yu ba njáèá sá' ká ce máè m túr enjep múè buu anaè áè, máè yá seè'ni máná buu anaè wááwá vi m ce búsi máè búsi, a ma'shi vi wááwá tá m bo duè ba aèmbuèu Jisos Kraêis.	However, what things were gain to me, these have I counted loss for Christ.
Ñger Nyúè yi m ba a woweèe, beèe magoèr a byemïì neè Tataê, a kupse, a ma' yaèp buu bbebep.	The hand of the Lord was with them, and a great number believed and turned to the Lord.
Bfúr waê, m ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ená weèe koo ncep ca mmbo mmbaa. Ñwaè' ce máè sañ neè weèe na yi saèp ka'.	But I exhort you, brothers, endure the word of exhortation, for I have written to you in few words.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a lá mi mmbo mbe yeâ nduè, e ku naa nyor mbekïì, a yoñshi Nyúè.	He laid his hands on her, and immediately she stood up straight, and glorified God.
Seèe rïìñ ñwáè ce e m laèa enáê, “Ku ba máè ce m be kúúsi mcucu', m be laè' woweèe.” E m ker laèa foñ enáê, “Tata Nyúè be sa' yïì beèe.”	"For we know him who said, ""Vengeance belongs to me,"" says the Lord, ""I will repay."" Again, ""The Lord will judge his people."""
Geewa'a ñwáè ca aè duê, a ká' a ce suñ yuu anaè neè beèe aè bdïì' wááwá. Nsuñ ca aè m geèe Jisoès aè ker ce fúú aè múè beèe ka'. E m ce cu aè rïìñ, beèe a ce vúâ aè bdïì' wááwá, a ce yá ye aèfo.	But he went out, and began to proclaim it much, and to spread about the matter, so that Jesus could no more openly enter into a city, but was outside in desert places: and they came to him from everywhere.
E m maè' ñgaèa neè woweèe enáê, “Fyá' neè ce fïîk, ker ba bce wááwá.	"He told them a parable. ""See the fig tree, and all the trees."
Mñwaè' ce weèr aè sañ neè weèe naè, buu embo wááwá vi yu brara, a ba kuèyáá. Weèe aè be riñ weèr seè'ni na boèñboñ ka'. Baná m ce kwaè'shi máná weèe be loè rïìñ weèr boèñboñ tá weèe bo loè naèa tu neè weèr aèmboè weèr be loè naèa neè weèe foñ aè noèñ ce Tata Jisoès be vúè.	For we write no other things to you, than what you read or even acknowledge, and I hope you will acknowledge to the end; as also you acknowledged us in part, that we are your boasting, even as you also are ours, in the day of our Lord Jesus.
Weèr ce suñ nsuñ mini aè nfeè' wááwá, a ce geèe buu ba aè ñger Nyúè. Yer ñgeâe yáánïì yi yu aèmboè buu bïìr ce weèr bo maè' bïìr aègho neè Nyúè, keèr tá'shi yeèr nyor aègho.	in the word of truth, in the power of God; by the armor of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,
E ka' laèa wa'a, a laa neè njeñwáè ca enáê, “Máè foèosi wáè efa yoè buu bbebep.”	"He said to her, ""Your sins are forgiven."""
Loo neè neè weèr tá weèr bo koni njïì aè rsuñ nsuñ ce e m ba aè bsúèti aèmboè Jisos Kraâis naè, neè beèe. M yu mbe shañ seè'ni na njobeè' máè m ce suñ nsuñ anaè neè beèe.	praying together for us also, that God may open to us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds;
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce weèe yu ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir foñ njobeè' wee ke láè mntáèr ce vi ce rïìr seê, mbenduè beèe moè'. Weâe ke naèa ntubo la' woweèe aè mntáèr anaè ka'.	"He said, ""Woe to you lawyers also! For you load men with burdens that are difficult to carry, and you yourselves won't even lift one finger to help carry those burdens."
Mfaè' ñwáè wááwá mi be keè yááti aèwañ njobeè' be keè ba aè noèñ mnsa' tá a mooshi mfaè' ñwáè wááwá. Mor yi be keè ce káti aè noèñ anaè, geèe tá a riñ njáèá mfaè' ce ñwáè wááwá aè m ce geèe.	each man's work will be revealed. For the Day will declare it, because it is revealed in fire; and the fire itself will test what sort of work each man's work is.
Rlii rli yû?	You have eaten all the kola nuts.
Máè m ba mbaè mmbo Yú' Nyúè, ncïìndap Nyúè aè lor máè a du aègho aè ntee rïìñ. Máè ka' baè' aèfo a yá njeñwáè aèmboè e cu mbenduè nyaâa mbembep, nyaèa anaè aè ba mbeer. A m sañ mlii aè nyor nyaèa anaè wááwá, aè ba ba mlii ce a m ce cáp ba Nyúè aègho. Nyaèa anaè aè m túr btu saèambaê, a túr mdoñ rúêú.	He carried me away in the Spirit into a wilderness. I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet-colored animal, full of blasphemous names, having seven heads and ten horns.
Bfúr waê, weèe ku bii ce kuushi njáèá mfaè' ce weèr aè m ce geèe aè nfeè' seèe aè m ba weèr aè ce suñ Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè weèe naè. Weèr aè m ce faè' neètú' ba neèmootïì faè dïì' weèr bo ba ntáèr neè ñwáè moè' ka'.	For you remember, brothers, our labor and travail; for working night and day, that we might not burden any of you, we preached to you the Good News of God.
Yu ba embe ndúè' ñwáè ca ce Nyúè aè fúr ñwáè ce e be geèe beèe a luêñ, a fa neè beèe Isráèl aèmboè e m kaè' woweèe. Ñwáè rluèñ ca yu Jisoès.	From this man's seed, God has brought salvation to Israel according to his promise,
Yi yu yáánïì ená ñgaèpni yi ba a weâe mú, njobeè' e ke ba ne aè nfeè' ce ñgaèpni yi niñ wa'a, weèe ka' yá beèe ce a yuu beâe mini.	For there also must be factions among you, that those who are approved may be revealed among you.
Yi yu wa'a, faè dïì' ñwáè moè' bo naèa nyor aè bsii Nyúè ka'.	that no flesh should boast before God.
E ka' ce niñ aè mú rla' mo', ñgaâa yañ msaèasïì beèe nrúêú a vú aè ryá ye. A ka' vúè, a táá encaèñ seê,	As he entered into a certain village, ten men who were lepers met him, who stood at a distance.
Jisoès aè m ker niñ mbe keñ, a tuu neèñguu roè. A ka' baè' njo, ku' beèe a vú a kaari aèwaâa roèo.	When Jesus had crossed back over in the boat to the other side, a great multitude was gathered to him; and he was by the sea.
Woweèe a ka' ce duè, a yá rdip mo', ñwáâ nsoèñ ca a laa enáê, “Yáê, a rdip na. Yuu ce aède' yi jepsïì wáè efa rbaèptir máè yu ká?”	"As they went on the way, they came to some water, and the eunuch said, ""Behold, here is water. What is keeping me from being baptized?"""
Woweèe a du mcúè, a seesi enáê, “Seèe aè ka' laa seená yi ñger anaè yi m loè ese Nyúè, baná e be bipshi neè seèe enáê, ‘Weèe aè m ka' ba byemi yuu ce e m laèa ka' njoká?’	"They reasoned with themselves, saying, ""If we should say, 'From heaven;' he will say, 'Why then did you not believe him?'"
Tá nfeè' ka' gháá, weèe fa maè'shi tá mntee vi ce bu' weèe tá weèe ce kwaè'shi ená weèe be duè laèa wee ká lá ka',	Settle it therefore in your hearts not to meditate beforehand how to answer,
Weèe aè ka' riñ wa'a, baná weèe be túr ndeèe ce beèe Tata Jisoès a ba túr, geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá, keèr rïìñ buu ce yu vi Nyúè goèr.	that you may walk worthily of the Lord, to please him in all respects, bearing fruit in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
ker loo neè máè ená Nyúè fa máè blaèa ce vi yu yáánïì aè nfeè' ce m ka' ce suñ beèe buu ce aède' beèe aè m ba riñ ka' kuu nsuñ mboèñmboñ. Loo neè ená m ka' ce suñ beèe buu ca, m suñ neè ñger-ñwáè.	on my behalf, that utterance may be given to me in opening my mouth, to make known with boldness the mystery of the Good News,
Kuushi neè ená ñwáè ce e ka' bye múcaèr baná ñgaèñ be kep múcaèr, tá ñwáè ce e byeè goèr kep goèr.	Remember this: he who sows sparingly will also reap sparingly. He who sows bountifully will also reap bountifully.
Ñwáè fa loèr baèa káè bcáâ' bbaa, káè blaba' káè mbaèñ ka', njobeè' yi yu yáánïì ená a la' ñwáè rfaè'.	Take no bag for your journey, neither two coats, nor shoes, nor staff: for the laborer is worthy of his food.
Weèr aè byemi yuu ce wáè geèe na aè bdïì' wááwá ba aè nfeè' wááwá, a ce yoèñshi wáè magoèr seê.	we accept it in all ways and in all places, most excellent Felix, with all thankfulness.
E m yá ce fik aèwaâa nduunjïì, a du a fyá' mbo, a yá yuu mo' mbo caa efa bfuè caè'caè' ka'. E laa neè yi enáê, “AÈde' aè ke yú mbaèñ aè nfeè' moè' ka'.” Ce fik anaè yi ku yopri.	"Seeing a fig tree by the road, he came to it, and found nothing on it but leaves. He said to it, ""Let there be no fruit from you forever!"" Immediately the fig tree withered away."
Ñwáè ce e ka' gee yuu ce yaè Ta ce e yu mbe buèu ce koèñ, baná ñgaèñ yu nfúraè, a ba njar yaè, a ba yaè maê.”	"For whoever does the will of my Father who is in heaven, he is my brother, and sister, and mother."""
Beèe wááwá ce a m ce cu aè rla' Lidaè ba mbo' Sharoèn wááwá, a m yá ye, a beeñger a byemi neè Tata Jisoès.	All who lived at Lydda and in Sharon saw him, and they turned to the Lord.
“Ñwáè moè' aè m ce duè aè rbyeè yïì buu, a ka' ce byeè, ñgúè buu moè' aè gweñgeèr aèwaâa nduunjïì, beèe a ka' caèa a nyáñshi neè mkuèu, bsiñ vi vú a ye.	"The farmer went out to sow his seed. As he sowed, some fell along the road, and it was trampled under foot, and the birds of the sky devoured it.
Luke	Luêk	8	6	Ñgúè buu moè' aè gweñgeèr ba mbenduè ryáá, a ka' fúú, a yopri, njobeè' nshe anaè aè m ba ncoèñ se ka'.	Other seed fell on the rock, and as soon as it grew, it withered away, because it had no moisture.
Luke	Luêk	8	7	Ñgúè buu moè' aè gweñgeèr aè múè msini, a ka' kuè' aè múè mo, msini mi kur.	Other fell amid the thorns, and the thorns grew with it, and choked it.
Luke	Luêk	8	8	Ñgúè buu moè' aè gweñgeèr yi ba mbe nshe yïû mboèñmboñ, a fúú, a ku' boèñboñ, mbúè yuu wááwá ce a m byeè aè geèe moè' rjeèe.” Jisoès aè ka' laèa buu ca mïìsi, a waa enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè', ñgaèñ yu'.”	Other fell into the good ground, and grew, and brought forth fruit one hundred times. As he said these things, he called out, ""He who has ears to hear, let him hear!"""
Ñwáè ce e m yá buu ca a ñwáè ce e suñ vi. Yuu ce e laèa yi yu mini. Ye ye rïìñ foñ ená yuu ce e ce laèa yi yu mini. E ce suñ weèe buu ca tá weèe bo byemi foñ.	He who has seen has testified, and his testimony is true. He knows that he tells the truth, that you may believe.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, beèe mo' a fa máè njep ñkaèa, a torsi njïû aè wenduè a suusi njepmbeè, máè cañ a duê.	Through a window I was let down in a basket by the wall, and escaped his hands.
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès ba btu embe cor a m cute, tá a bo seèesi yuu ce a be geèe.	The apostles and the elders were gathered together to see about this matter.
Weèe ka' ce fa yuu neè beèe ce a buu, weèe fa maè'shi tá ye bo ñkoèp yi riñ yuu ce ye bo maè' yi ce geèe ka',	But when you do merciful deeds, don't let your left hand know what your right hand does,
Mñwaè' ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè wááwá ba ñwaè' mncir vi m suñ aèmboè buu ce vi be ka' ba caar a ba' aè nfeè' yïì Joân.	For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John.
Weèe aè rïìñ boèñboñ ená noèñ ce Tata Jisoès be vúè yi be keè ba aèmboè nyáèá ce e ke búèú ñwáè neètú' naè.	For you yourselves know well that the day of the Lord comes like a thief in the night.
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès ca a m ku ce suñ neè ñger-ñwáè aèmboè nfúú efa rkwe Tata Jisoès. Nyúè aè m geèe woweèe wááwá a túr ntee boèñboñ a waâp mú.	With great power, the apostles gave their testimony of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus. Great grace was on them all.
Nyúè aè fa beèe embe cor bfee jáá jáèá jáá ená a gee rfaè' aègho. Rfaè' entombïì ce e fa neè beèe mo' li yu ená woweèe a ba ñgaâa ntuu Jisos Kraêis, lïì embenjïì li ba ená beèe mo' a ba ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè. Lïì embenjïì mo li ba ená beèe mo' a yá'ni vi blaèa neè beèe, rmo' li ba ená beèe mo' a gee buu bbáèá, rmo' li ba ená beèe mo' a gee tá ñgaâa byañ a ke'se, rmo' li ba ená beèe mo' a ja' beèe, rmo' li ba ená beèe mo' a sa' beèe, rmo' li ba ená beèe mo' a laa bli ce woweèe a m be yá'ni ka'.	God has set some in the assembly: first apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then miracle workers, then gifts of healings, helps, governments, and various kinds of languages.
Woowèe a be kù dù, kaʼ àyàŋsè.	They will go, even tomorrow.
Rbyemïì yu ba ená ká? Rbyemïì yu ená seèe aè rïìñ rara ená yuu ce seèe ce keè', seèe be koni. Rbyemïì yu ba ená seèe aè rïìñ ená yuu yi yu aègho neè mini-ñwáè, a ka' be yá yuu anaè neè mmir ka'.	Now faith is assurance of things hoped for, proof of things not seen.
Jisoès aè ka' laèa buu ca wa'a, njeñwáè moè' aè laa efa múè ku' beèe ca enáê, “Rboâñtu li yu neè ñwáè ce e m bi wáè, a nyoñsi wáè.”	"It came to pass, as he said these things, a certain woman out of the multitude lifted up her voice, and said to him, ""Blessed is the womb that bore you, and the breasts which nursed you!"""
Weèe aè ka' niñ aè rla', káè yu ba lïû fá, a ka' tá koni weèe ka', weèe du aè btase aè múè mla' anaè laa enáê,	But into whatever city you enter, and they don't receive you, go out into its streets and say,
Pitaè ba Joân a ka' kuè bii ce laèa neè beèe, ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè beèe ce a m ce keè'ni Ndap Nyúè, ker ba beèe Saduèsïî, a vúseè.	As they spoke to the people, the priests and the captain of the temple and the Sadducees came to them,
tá m bo yá máná aède' m gee yaè beèe aè ko'ndoñ tá beèe mo' efa woweèe a bo luèñ lá.	if by any means I may provoke to jealousy those who are my flesh, and may save some of them.
Wèr à kaʼ ce làa waʼa e ku tose àcùu anà.	As we were talking, he just appeared at that moment.
Ka' nyúè'tu ce yi yu mbe weâe tuè áè, e beè' yi wááwá. Baná weèe fa wáp ka' njobeè' weèe luèu ntaa aè bsii Nyúè, a caa bbe' aèñgoo.	But the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Therefore don't be afraid. You are of more value than many sparrows.
Jisoès aè m ker niñ mbe ndap rloo. Ñwáè moè' aè m ba mbo ce li rkoo li m kwe.	He entered again into the synagogue, and there was a man there who had his hand withered.
A mbuèu ce máè ba kwa'shi máná máè ghááte aè rvúè yá wáè ka'. Kuè laèa ba mbúè nlaèa moè'sir tá yaè ñwáè rfaè' ke'se.	Therefore I didn't even think myself worthy to come to you; but say the word, and my servant will be healed.
“Wáè ka' ba Muu Nyúè, aè nyáá ka embe na cáá aè nsheè, njobeè' a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, ‘Nyúè be laèa tá vi bcïìndap a ke'ni wáè, yaè wáè mbe mmboè faè dïì' aè láá yo kuèu aè luèr ka'.’ ”	"and said to him, ""If you are the Son of God, throw yourself down, for it is written, 'He will put his angels in charge of you.' and, 'On their hands they will bear you up, so that you don't dash your foot against a stone.'"""
Yu' neè, bfúr wa ce máè koèñ seê, mboè Nyúè aè m ce ñgaâa fuèp enjep ñgoèñ na ená woweèe a byemi neè Jisos Kraêis, koni sá' goèr, ye bti' embe dïû' kúú Nyúè ce e m kaè' neè beèe ce a koèñ ye a?	Listen, my beloved brothers. Didn't God choose those who are poor in this world to be rich in faith, and heirs of the Kingdom which he promised to those who love him?
Fa geèe tá ntee yi yañ Yú' Rara ce yu Yú' Nyúè naè ka'. Nyúè aè fa yi neè weèe aèmboè ncoèo, yi ce duèñshi ená be ba aè noèñ mo' tá Nyúè tee weèe efa ñgá'.	Don't grieve the Holy Spirit of God, in whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.
E m fúú efa waâp mú a du mbe dïì' ce ñwáè aè m ka' ba ma' luèr e ku ba', a gú'shi neè mñkúúshi, a gee rloo, a laa enáê,	He was withdrawn from them about a stone's throw, and he knelt down and prayed,
Beèe wááwá a m báèáñger seê, aè ryá ku' ñger Nyúè ca. Woweèe a ka' ce báèáñger wa'a, Jisoès aè laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê,	They were all astonished at the majesty of God. But while all were marveling at all the things which Jesus did, he said to his disciples,
Mnoèñ ce a be ye Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap vi ka' báti ntuunfu, Jisoès aè natïì a du aè rla' Bátanïì. Rla' Bátanïì ca yu faèdïì' ce Lasoèroès ce Jisoès aè m fúr efa rkwe naè aè m ce cu.	Then six days before the Passover, Jesus came to Bethany, where Lazarus was, who had been dead, whom he raised from the dead.
Muu wàa ku nyòo nyòo.	My child is emaciating continuously.
Vi bcáè' vi beetïì bbúú, a ce laè'ñger seê, a fúp ce aède' ñwáè aè m ba su'si vi fúp wa' ka'.	His clothing became glistening, exceedingly white, like snow, such as no launderer on earth can whiten them.
Woweèe wááwá a ye a yu'. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a baashïì bbábá' ce vi m báti, vi ruu aè mñkaèa ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú.	They all ate, and were filled. They took up twelve baskets full of that which remained left over from the broken pieces.
E m ce buu ce beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a jaèasi a lor aè yuu cicïì, tá e bo suèusi mkwaè'shïì ce beèe a túr aè buu wááwá ce a kwaè'shi ená vi yu btatap se naè njep nsheè.	and God chose the lowly things of the world, and the things that are despised, and the things that are not, that he might bring to nothing the things that are:
Ñwáè bsaèrbuu anaè be vúè neè ñger ce yi loè ese Sataèn, geèe ku' mncoèo ba buu bbáèá ce bo' beèe aègho ená a ku'si ye.	even he whose coming is according to the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders,
Seèe aè ka' ba boo baná seèe yu beèe ce seèe be ye bti'. Seèe yu ñgaâa ye bti' Nyúè. Seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe be ye bti' anaè aèbee. Seèe ka' yá ñgá' seèe Jisoès weèe baná seèe woweèe be keè sa' foèo.	and if children, then heirs; heirs of God, and joint heirs with Christ; if indeed we suffer with him, that we may also be glorified with him.
Yuu anaè yi yu ená beèe enje jáá a be koni bghoènïì ce Jus a koni naè foñ. Woweèe foñ a yu ñgúè' moè' efa nyor Jisos Kraêis. Woweèe a be koni buu ce Nyúè aè m kaè' neè yïì beèe ce a yu aèbee a Jisos Kraâis weèe. Yuu ce yi geèe beèe aè ka' riñ buu ca yu Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè Jisos Kraêis.	that the Gentiles are fellow heirs, and fellow members of the body, and fellow partakers of his promise in Christ Jesus through the Good News,
Bfeè' vi ka' caâa bbaa, Poshoè Fástoès aè lor dïû' Fálïìs, a ba aè govanoè. Fálïìs aè m ce koèñ ená e gee tá nyor boñ Juês. E ka' koèñ wa'a, a ku lá Pol mbe shañ.	But when two years were fulfilled, Felix was succeeded by Porcius Festus, and desiring to gain favor with the Jews, Felix left Paul in bonds.
Rkòŋnì a yuu entòmbì enjep ŋgòŋ na.	Love is the first thing in this world.
Tata aè ka' yá ye, nse yi koo ye neè ye seê, e laa enáê, “Fa war ka'.”	"When the Lord saw her, he had compassion on her, and said to her, ""Don't cry."""
M ce koèñ aè ryá weèe seê, tá m bo koni bghoènïì ce aè yú', táá tatap.	For I long to see you, that I may impart to you some spiritual gift, to the end that you may be established;
aè ba ye ce e geèe ndap anaè aè táá yáánïì, a ku', a ba ndap nrara.	in whom the whole building, fitted together, grows into a holy temple in the Lord;
Weèr túr ntee njep weèe seê, a riñ neè mini-ñwáè ená aèmboè weèe ce yá ñgá' aèmboè wer weèr ce yá na, weèe be koni ñger ce weèr aè koni foñ naè ese Nyúè.	Our hope for you is steadfast, knowing that, since you are partakers of the sufferings, so also are you of the comfort.
Fyá' neè ma mmbo ba ma mkuèu tá weèe bo rïìñ ená ku ba máè seeseê. Joèo neè máè, fyá' máè, njobeè' nyir e ke túr nyaèa nyor ba bvúp aèmboè weèe aè yá máè túr na ka'.”	"See my hands and my feet, that it is truly me. Touch me and see, for a spirit doesn't have flesh and bones, as you see that I have."""
Nfò à ba tòo bo zhi bubrè mbe dìʼ.	Nfor burnt his hand and it got swollen on the spot.
Ñwáè e ke laè' rkwe, baná beèe a be yá ená ñgaèñ aè kwe wáá tá a ka' geèe buu ce ñwáè anaè aè m laèa.	For where a last will and testament is, there must of necessity be the death of him who made it.
A m̀ lɛɛsi ye tɛ muu kaʼ fʉʉ.	She had her baby through an operation.
E beesïì a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Kúti neè du suñ Joân buu ce weèe aè yá a ker yu'. Beèe ce a feèp a ce yá buu, mntáèñ a ce jáèshi yáánïì, ñgaâa msaèasïì a ce ke'seè, ce ba brara, mnfuñ-tuè' a ce yu' buu, beèe ce a m kweñger a ce kúti bteèe, ñgaâa fuèp a ce suñ Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ.	"Jesus answered them, ""Go and tell John the things which you have seen and heard: that the blind receive their sight, the lame walk, the lepers are cleansed, the deaf hear, the dead are raised up, and the poor have good news preached to them."
A láè njaèa njep mbuèu ce wáá. Ce ce yi ka' tá yú boèñboñ ka', baná a be gwaèr, maè' njep mor.”	"Even now the axe also lies at the root of the trees. Every tree therefore that doesn't bring forth good fruit is cut down, and thrown into the fire."""
Beèe Farïìsi mo' a ku vú aè nfeè' anaè a yá Jisoès a laa neè ye enáê, “Loâ aèfa du aè dïû' jáá njobeè' ñkúú Hároèd ce taè' aè ryú wáè.”	"On that same day, some Pharisees came, saying to him, ""Get out of here, and go away, for Herod wants to kill you."""
AÈ be kashi buu ca aèmboè a ke kashi cáè' naè. Vi be kupse aèmboè cáè' yi ke kwe ncoèo, kupse naè. AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè wáè, aè be kupse ka', aède' aè ke kwe ka'.”	"As a mantle, you will roll them up, and they will be changed; but you are the same. Your years will not fail."""
Jisoès aè m laèa cena wa'a, a ce laèa ba aèmboè Yú' ce beèe ce a byemi neè ye a be koni. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè, beèe a be koni Yú' anaè ka', njobeè' Nyúè aè m bii ka' kuè'si Jisoès.	But he said this about the Spirit, which those believing in him were to receive. For the Holy Spirit was not yet given, because Jesus wasn't yet glorified.
E m laèa neè máè enáê, “Fa súèti blaèa ce a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè na ese beèe ka'. Geèe tá beèe wááwá a yu', njobeè' nfeè' ce buu ca be koni yu aètútú.	"He said to me, ""Don't seal up the words of the prophecy of this book, for the time is at hand."
Ka' yi yu wa'a, m be fúú efa rkwe duè aè ñgoâñ Galeèle tá weèe vú koni máè aèfo.”	"But after I am raised up, I will go before you into Galilee."""
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè máná, mbúè kwaa aè ka' tá gweè aè nsheè kwe ka', baná e be kuè cu moè'sir aèmboè e m ba. E ka' gwe aè nsheè, rlir li fúú, kwaa kwe, baná e be kuè', geèe mbúè kwaa aèñgoo.	Most certainly I tell you, unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies, it remains by itself alone. But if it dies, it bears much fruit.
Pol aè ka' laèa buu ca neè woweèe mïìsi, a lor bráêd, a loo a yoñshi Nyúè aè waâp bsii, a bá' a ká' a ce ye.	When he had said this, and had taken bread, he gave thanks to God in the presence of all, and he broke it, and began to eat.
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Ndap ca aè luèñ ntïìni njobeè' ñwáè ca ye ye yu muu Abraèham foñ.	"Jesus said to him, ""Today, salvation has come to this house, because he also is a son of Abraham."
Ŋkar yàa à nyɛɛ mbekì.	My friend jumped up.
Yi m ba ba aè ndeèe neè woweèe ce woweèe a m ka' ba riñ nduunjïû yáánïì ka', neè yïì ce ená woweèe a riñ nduunjïì anaè wáá, keèr loè borni efa rláè mncir ce Jisoès aè m fa neè woweèe.	For it would be better for them not to have known the way of righteousness, than, after knowing it, to turn back from the holy commandment delivered to them.
Mbàp yu mbà to.	The rat is down in the hole.
Seèe ka' laa ená seèe aè geèe yuu bebep ka', baná seèe ce loèr Nyúè aè ñwáè mnde', a buu yi nlaèa.	If we say that we haven't sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.
Túè' aè ka' raa, bleebeèe efa múè Juês, ba beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, a cuteè mbe kansuèr, a lor Jisoès a vú aègho mbo, a laa neè ye enáê,	As soon as it was day, the assembly of the elders of the people was gathered together, both chief priests and scribes, and they led him away into their council, saying,
Beèe Saduèsi ce a kani ená aède' ñwáè kwe ker fúú efa rkwe ka' a vú a bipshi neè Jisoès enáê,	There came to him Sadducees, who say that there is no resurrection. They asked him, saying,
Mmbañruè ce a m ye byee anaè a m ba beèe ncúèkïì taê.	Those who ate the loaves were five thousand men.
Joân a ñwáè ce e m suñ beèe aèmboè ye. E m laèa enáê, “Ñwáè ca yu ñwáè ce máè m suñ weèe ená e bii ka' vúè naè. Máè m suñ weèe ená nta' ñwáè anaè yi caèa ya, njobeè' tá a ka' keè bi máè, e m ku ba.”	"John testified about him. He cried out, saying, ""This was he of whom I said, 'He who comes after me has surpassed me, for he was before me.'"""
Wèr tʉr nfèʼ à rbàashi nsuu kaʼ, wer be kù fàʼ zhi àlɛŋ.	We donʼt have the time to make ridges on this farm, we will just till it without ridges.
E ba aè nfeè' ce yuu ce wáè byeè anaè yi fúú, a ku', yi ba jáá efa ñgúè yuu ce wáè byeè, káè yu ñgúè kwaa áè, káè ñgúè ká áè.	That which you sow, you don't sow the body that will be, but a bare grain, maybe of wheat, or of some other kind.
A mbuèu ce wer ke loo neè weèe aè nfeè' wááwá ená Nyúè gee tá weèe cu njáèá rcu ce e koèñ ená yïì beèe a cu. Tá yïìseèe Nyúè gee aè yi ñger tá buu bboèñboñ ce weèe ce kwaè'shi aè rgeèe vi geetïî, ker gee tá mfaè' ce weèe ce geèe njo' le rbyemïì mi geetïî.	To this end we also pray always for you, that our God may count you worthy of your calling, and fulfill every desire of goodness and work of faith, with power;
A m be Jisoès ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu aè ñkaè' ca foñ.	Jesus also was invited, with his disciples, to the marriage.
Beèe a be keè ce ye mcúè mbe btu beèe moè', ce geèe buu aèwaèa, ce naèa nyor, koèñ aè rye ñgoèñ, keè' koèñ Nyúè ka'.	traitors, headstrong, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God;
“Weèe aè ka' niñ aè rla' rgoèr, káè aè rla' rká' áè, weèe fyá' ñwáè ce e yu ñwáè nyáánïì aèfo, cu weèe ñwáè anaè weèe caar tá yeè nfeè' ce weèe be loâ aè rla' anaè du gháá.”	Into whatever city or village you enter, find out who in it is worthy; and stay there until you go on.
Beèe ce a m láè nsuu neè woweèe na, a ka' yá ye, a laa fa waâp mú enáê, ‘A ñwáè ce e be ye bti' na. Seèe koo yú, tá vi bti' vi bo ba viseèe.’	But those farmers said among themselves, 'This is the heir. Come, let's kill him, and the inheritance will be ours.'
E ka' kuè bii mïìsi efa cuèu, Judaès ce e m ba moè' efa beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè- rrúèú, aè toseè. E m ba a ku' beèe ce beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba bleebeèe a m tuu. Woweèe a m túr bsaè' ba mmbaèñ.	While he was still speaking, behold, Judas, one of the twelve, came, and with him a great multitude with swords and clubs, from the chief priest and elders of the people.
Ñwáè nsuu aè laa seè'ni enáê, ‘M be geèe máká? M be tuu muu waè ce máè koèñ se na. Seemoè' woweèe a be yu'ni neè ye.’	The lord of the vineyard said, 'What shall I do? I will send my beloved son. It may be that seeing him, they will respect him.'
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ce laèa neè weèe seè'ni na ená ñwáè ce e ka' túr posaè káè baèa áè, e loêr. Ñwáè aè ka' tá túr kaèafaè' ka', ñgaèñ fyenïì yi cáè', yuu yïì.	"Then he said to them, ""But now, whoever has a purse, let him take it, and likewise a wallet. Whoever has none, let him sell his cloak, and buy a sword."
Máè ka' cu mbe tunshe na m gee rfaè' ce li be jaè' beèe. Yi ka' ba wa' máè ke' riñ yïì ce m co' ka'.	But if I live on in the flesh, this will bring fruit from my work; yet I don't know what I will choose.
Seèe ka' táá tatap du ba' aèlúèsimbuèu, seèe Jisoès weèe ke sa' aèbee. Seèe ka' kani ye, ye ye ke kani seèe.	If we endure, we will also reign with him. If we deny him, he also will deny us.
Hároèd aè ka' roèo ye yá ka', a bipshi neè bsoogáè ce a m ce keè'ni ye naè. E ka' bipshi riñ dïì' e yu ka', a laa ená a yúshi woweèe. E ka' laèa wa'a, a natïû aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè a du aè rla' Sisaèriyaè, a cu aèfo.	When Herod had sought for him, and didn't find him, he examined the guards, and commanded that they should be put to death. He went down from Judea to Caesarea, and stayed there.
Woweèe a m laèa wa'a njobeè' a m yá Troâfimoès ce aè rla' Áfásoès a Pol weèe aè rla' anaè, a ce kwaè'shi ená Pol aè m loèr ye a du aègho mbe Ndaèp Nyúè.	For they had seen Trophimus, the Ephesian, with him in the city, and they supposed that Paul had brought him into the temple.
Woweèe a kútïì a beesi enáê, “Weèr rïìñ ka'.”	They answered that they didn't know where it was from.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè nye byee ce beèe a ce geèe tañshïì aègho neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na naè, seèe aè rïìñ ená njáèá mnyúè anaè yu buu bcicïì njobeè' vi túr myoèñ ka'. Seèe rïìñ yiseèe ená Nyúè ku ba moè'sir caè'caè'.	Therefore concerning the eating of things sacrificed to idols, we know that no idol is anything in the world, and that there is no other God but one.
Yi yu foñ ená ñwáè aè ka' no mruè' ce mi koo, e ker koñ aè rno msáâñ mruè' ka' njobeè' e ka' no baná e be laèa enáê, ‘Mruè' ce mi koo mi yu aèndeèe neè msáâñ mruè'.’ ”	"No man having drunk old wine immediately desires new, for he says, 'The old is better.'"""
A mbuèu ce máè m sañ ñwaè' anaè neè weèe, faè dïì' m ka' vú ca'ni weèe tá yi lo ba ená beèe ce m ce kwaè'shi máná woweèe a ba geèe nyor boñ máè, a lo ba ba beèe ce a be geèe tá m lo yu' ba ryañ ka'. M rïìñ máná m ka' ce yu' rboèñ baná weèe ce yu' rboèñ foñ.	And I wrote this very thing to you, so that, when I came, I wouldn't have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice; having confidence in you all, that my joy would be shared by all of you.
Seèe ce seèe túr yuu boèñboñ ca, seèe yu aèmboè mkïìñ nshe. Seèe yu wa'a tá yi bo duèñshi ená njáèá ñger ce yi caèa ñger na, yu yiseèe ñger ka'. Ñger anaè yu ba ñger Nyúè.	But we have this treasure in clay vessels, that the exceeding greatness of the power may be of God, and not from ourselves.
Pailáèt aè bipshïì neè ye enáê, “A wáè ñkúú Jus a?” Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè ye enáê, “AÈ laèa wáè wa'a.”	"Pilate asked him, ""Are you the King of the Jews?"" He answered him, ""So you say."""
Bsoogáè vïû govanoè, a lor Jisoès a du aègho mbe dïì' mnsa' embe nto' ce govanoè aè m ce cu mbo, bár bsoogáè wááwá a niñ mbo, a sir ye a tarte,	Then the governor's soldiers took Jesus into the Praetorium, and gathered the whole garrison together against him.
Woweèe a ka' cu aèfo aè mú nfeè' moè', bfúr a daasïì woweèe ená woweèe a du boèñboñ, du yá beèe ce a m tuu woweèe.	After they had spent some time there, they were sent back with greetings from the brothers to the apostles.
Kù gee nè nè yee bo.	Just do it yourselves.
M ̀ be diʼ vʉ̌ mbenjì.	I will come afterwards.
Ñwáè ce e ka' ye yaè nyor, ker no wa bláá baná ñgaèñ be cu njep máè tá má máè cu njep ye.	He who eats my flesh and drinks my blood lives in me, and I in him.
Njeèndoñ anaè aè ka' laèa wa'a, mbeèñ aè bapñgeèr, a rúúñger, a wañger, nshe aè ci'tïì. Ká' embe nfeè' ce beèe a m káè' ba njep ñgoèñ na, ñgoèñ yi m be ci'ti wa' ka'.	There were lightnings, sounds, and thunders; and there was a great earthquake, such as was not since there were men on the earth, so great an earthquake, so mighty.
Baná seèe gee buu bbebep tá rboèñ li bo fúú enjo a? Beèe moè' a ce bepsi la rlii, a ce laèa ená máè laèa lá wa'a. Nyúè be fa njáèá beèe ca ñgá' ce e be ghááte aè yuu ce woweèe a laèa.	"Why not (as we are slanderously reported, and as some affirm that we say), ""Let us do evil, that good may come?"" Those who say so are justly condemned."
Geewa'a, ñwáè ce e be fyeèni máè ce yeñger weèr ye mbe tábuèr na.	But behold, the hand of him who betrays me is with me on the table.
Bbyeèñgeê, yu'ni neè neè bduu wee aèmboè weèe ce yu'ni neè Tata Jisoès naè.	Wives, be subject to your own husbands, as to the Lord.
Máè ka' laa aèmboè máè laèa na, m ku riñ máná weèe aè geèe yáánïì seê, aè rjaè' máè seè'ni ce m yu aè ñgá' na.	However you did well that you shared in my affliction.
Weèr aè m ka' baè koèñ weèe wa'a, a ke' koñ ená weèr ku suñ weèe ba Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ce e loè ese Nyúè ka', weèr aè m koèñ aè rfa wer mnyor neè weèe foñ, njobeè' weèr aè m koèñ weèe seê.	Even so, affectionately longing for you, we were well pleased to impart to you, not the Good News of God only, but also our own souls, because you had become very dear to us.
Beèe ce a m túr ñkwaèa ca a ka' yá ená njïì moè' ker ba aègho neè woweèe aè rkap mbaèa ka', woweèe a koo Pol ba Silaès a súñ a du aègho aè ntaa, a fa woweèe neè ñgaâa sa' to'.	But when her masters saw that the hope of their gain was gone, they seized Paul and Silas, and dragged them into the marketplace before the rulers.
E zhɛ̀ɛ mbàa a lop mɛ̀ àgho.	He has stolen money and tricked me with it.
Weèe ce loo neè Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá. Wee loo, weèe ce kwa'shi ba aè yuu ce weèe ce loo anaè, ce yoñshi ye aè buu wááwá ce e geèe neè weèe.	Continue steadfastly in prayer, watching therein with thanksgiving;
Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa keè'ni Ndap Nyúè naè, ker ba yïì beèe, a m duè a vú neè woweèe. A m koo woweèe aè ñger ka', njobeè' ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì a m ce wáp ená a ka' koo woweèe aè ñger, seemoè' beèe a túúshïì woweèe neè bluèr.	Then the captain went with the officers, and brought them without violence, for they were afraid that the people might stone them.
laa neè ñwáè ndap enáê, ‘Ñwáè ryá'nïì aè laèa ená weèr bipshi neè wáè ená dïì' ce e be ye byee Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap mbo a ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu weèe yu ba fá lá?’	"Tell the master of the house, 'The Teacher says to you, ""Where is the guest room, where I may eat the Passover with my disciples?""'"
maè' njep mor ce beèe a be keèe ce warse ce kúr msoèñ njo.	and will cast them into the furnace of fire. There will be weeping and the gnashing of teeth.
E ke fa seèe ñger aè nfeè' wááwá ce seèe ka' ce yá ñgá'. E ke geèe wa'a ená ñwáè moè' foñ aè ka' ce yá ñgá', seèe bo fa ñgaèñ ñger neè ñger ce seèe aè koni ese ye.	who comforts us in all our affliction, that we may be able to comfort those who are in any affliction, through the comfort with which we ourselves are comforted by God.
Njemor yi tar mbe dïì' Nyúè anaè. Njemor anaè yi m vúè ese ñger ker ba foèo Nyúè. Ñwáè moè' aè m ba ce aède' e m ba du mbe dïì' Nyúè anaè ka'. AÈde' ñwáè aè m ba ku du mbo ba aè nfeè' ce mñgá' saèamba ce bcïìndap Nyúè a vúè aègho naè vi mïì.	The temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power. No one was able to enter into the temple, until the seven plagues of the seven angels would be finished.
Weèe yi ená ñwáè ce e m laèa enáê, “Fa koo ñgwa ñwáè moè' káè nduu ñwáè moè' ka',” ku ba ye ce e m laèa foñ enáê, “Fa yú ñwáè ka'.” Wáè ka' tá koo ñgwa ñwáè moè' káè nduu ñwáè moè' ka', yú ñwáè, yi ku ba ená wáè bú' mncir wááwá.	"For he who said, ""Do not commit adultery,"" also said, ""Do not commit murder."" Now if you do not commit adultery, but murder, you have become a transgressor of the law."
Máè m tá baè vúè laèa yuu neè woweèe ka', a m ba taèa woweèe aè yuu bebep ka'. AÈmboè máè vúè seè'ni na, yuu mo' yi yu ce aède' yi ker tá'shi yaèp buu bbebep ka'.	If I had not come and spoken to them, they would not have had sin; but now they have no excuse for their sin.
Bsoogáè a ceeshïì bkúè efa keñ ñká', e ce duè mbaè roè.	Then the soldiers cut away the ropes of the boat, and let it fall off.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè ye enáê, “Koèñ Tata ce e yu yoè Nyúè neè yo ntee- ñwáè, ba neè lo ryoèñ-ñwáè, ker ba neè wo bfee-ñwáè.	"Jesus said to him, ""'You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your mind.'"
Beèe ce a ce laèa wa'a a geèe yi ba rara ená a roo ba rla' mo' ce be ba rlap.	For those who say such things make it clear that they are seeking a country of their own.
Ncir ca yu ncir ce goèr, aè ba ncir ce entombïì.	This is the first and great commandment.
Jisoès ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a m ko' mbe rtuèu, a ka' baè' mbo a cu aè nsheè.	Jesus went up into the mountain, and he sat there with his disciples.
Woweèe a ka' yu' wa'a, a byemi, a baptïìr woweèe aè rlii Tata Jisoès.	When they heard this, they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus.
E ji mdip aè mnoèñ mñkyeèe, njeè aè ká' a ce yañ ye.	When he had fasted forty days and forty nights, he was hungry afterward.
Abraèham aè m ba aè nfeè' anaè aèmboè bfeè' rjeèe. E m rïìñ ená e yu gúâú ñwáè, a riñ ená Sáèra yu kar. Ka' e m rïìñ wa'a, e m ku byemi a sá ka'.	Without being weakened in faith, he didn't consider his own body, already having been worn out, (he being about a hundred years old), and the deadness of Sarah's womb.
Ñwáè moè' aè laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Yoè ma ba bfúr wo a táá njepmbeè a ce koèñ aè ryá wáè.”	"It was told him by some saying, ""Your mother and your brothers stand outside, desiring to see you."""
“Yi ka' ba wa'a, ñkúú Agripaè, máè kani efa rgeèe yuu ce Nyúè aè m suñ máè aè njáèá rlo mo' naè ka'.	"Therefore, King Agrippa, I was not disobedient to the heavenly vision,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	20	Máè m káè' a fe'shi neè beâe aè rla' Daèmaskoès entoèmbïì, a ka' du a fe'shi aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm ba aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè, a ker fe'shi neè beèe enje jáá foñ ená woweèe a kupse, ma' yaèp buu bbebep, kúti aè mbeèp yïì Nyúè, gee buu ce vi ce duèñshi ená woweèe a kupse ghup.	but declared first to them of Damascus, at Jerusalem, and throughout all the country of Judea, and also to the Gentiles, that they should repent and turn to God, doing works worthy of repentance.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	21	A mbuèu ce Jus a m koo máè mbe Ndaèp Nyúè a ce roèo aè ryú máè.	For this reason the Jews seized me in the temple, and tried to kill me.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	22	Nyúè aè jaè' máè a ba' ntïìni na, máè táá taâa a ce feè'shi neè beâe bká'ká' ba beâe bgoèrgoèr. M ce laèa yuu mo' jáá caa efa yïì ce ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè ba Musïìs a m laèa ená yi be keè ba ka'.	Having therefore obtained the help that is from God, I stand to this day testifying both to small and great, saying nothing but what the prophets and Moses said would happen,
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	26	23	Woweèe a m laèa ená Kraâis anaè be keè yá ñgá', ba ñwáè entoèmbïì aè rfúú efa rkwe, suñ neè yïì beèe ba beèe enje jáá aèmboè rraa ce li raa.”	how the Christ must suffer, and how, by the resurrection of the dead, he would be first to proclaim light both to these people and to the Gentiles."
Nyʉ̀ fɛɛsi ye efa ndò anà.	May God keep him safe from that bad situation.
Ca a zhìi sàʼ.	This is his cutlass.
Yú' anaè ba viseèe mntee a ce duèñshi ená seèe yu boo Nyúè.	The Spirit himself testifies with our spirit that we are children of God;
Ka' bcïìndap Nyúè ce a caèa ñgaâa ryá'nïì ce a yu ñgaâa mnde' naè a ke laèa bebep aèmboè woweèe aè bsii Nyúè ka'.	whereas angels, though greater in might and power, don't bring a railing judgment against them before the Lord.
Máè vúè aè rká' beâe byáánïì ka'. Máè vúè aè rká' ba ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep tá woweèe a bo kupse, maè' yaèp buu bbebep anaè.”	"I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance."""
Ñwáè nsïìp ce e cu ce keè' ye, ce lá yi ntee rara aèmboè Kraâis ye ye yu nrara naè.	Everyone who has this hope set on him purifies himself, even as he is pure.
Máè ba ba a weâe mú, máè ba rïìñ yuu ce m be laèa. Njáèá yuu ce weèe aè geèe na, yi geèe bfee vi bú máè.	but I could wish to be present with you now, and to change my tone, for I am perplexed about you.
Beèe a m vúè neè ñwáè moè' ce e m feèp, a ba lúr, yú' nyúèrkaè' yi ba njep ye. Jisoès aè gee e ke'seè, a ká' a ce laèa, a ce yá buu foñ.	Then one possessed by a demon, blind and mute, was brought to him and he healed him, so that the blind and mute man both spoke and saw.
Yuu ce ñwáè aè baè'ri ndap anaè aègho yi ka' tá she ka' baná ñgaèñ be koo blaè'.	If any man's work remains which he built on it, he will receive a reward.
M ce geèe yuu boèñboñ ce m ce koèñ aè rgeèe na ka', a ce geèe ba yuu bebep ce m ce koèñ aè rgeèe ka' naè.	For the good which I desire, I don't do; but the evil which I don't desire, that I practice.
Jisoès aè ka' kuè bii ce laèa neè beèe, yïì ma ba bfúr vi a vúê, a táá njepmbeè a ce koèñ aè rlaèa yuu neè ye.	While he was yet speaking to the multitudes, behold, his mother and his brothers stood outside, seeking to speak to him.
E siʼsi mmbo mbe tù.	He has rubbed his hands on the head.
Pitaè aè laa neè ye enáê, “Saèr mbuèu efa ñgaèa ca neè weèr.”	"Peter answered him, ""Explain the parable to us."""
E bipshïì neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Weèe ce sár ba ká weèe woweèe?”	"He asked the scribes, ""What are you asking them?"""
Yi yu foñ ená ku' ñgaâa msaèasïì a m ba aè to' Isráèl aè nfeè' yïì ÁÈleshaè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè. Geewa'a, Nyúè aè m geèe moè' efa woweèe aè ke'seè ka'. Ñwáè ce Nyúè aè m geèe e ke'seè aè m ku ba Namaèn ce aè m ba ñwáâ aè to' Sirïìyaè.”	"There were many lepers in Israel in the time of Elisha the prophet, yet not one of them was cleansed, except Naaman, the Syrian."""
Yi yu ená beèe ce a yu entoèmbïì a be keèe ba elúèsimbuèu, tá beèe ce a yu elúèsimbuèu a ba entombïì.”	"So the last will be first, and the first last. For many are called, but few are chosen."""
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ka' yu' wa'a, a bááñger seê, a laa enáê, “Baná ñwáè ce aède' e luêñ, yu ba nda?”	"When the disciples heard it, they were exceedingly astonished, saying, ""Who then can be saved?"""
Beèe ce a m ce keè'ni Jisoès, a m vúèshi ye, a lip ye.	The men who held Jesus mocked him and beat him.
E ka' bipshi wa'a, a fyá' woweèe wááwá a kaari a tarte, a laa neè ñwáè yañ anaè enáê “Maè' lo rkoo kuèyáá.” E gee wa'a, li rkoo li boêñ, a kúti aèmboè li m ba.	"He looked around at them all, and said to the man, ""Stretch out your hand."" He did, and his hand was restored as sound as the other."
Seèe rïìñ ená Nyúè e ke yu' mloo ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep ka'. E ke yu' ba rloo ñwáè nsïìp ce e ke wáp ye, ce geèe yuu ce e koèñ.	We know that God doesn't listen to sinners, but if anyone is a worshipper of God, and does his will, he listens to him.
Pailáèt aè laa neè ye enáê, “Mini anaè yu ká seê?” E ka' laèa wa'a, a ker fúú embe nto' a yá Juês, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Máè yá yuu bebep moè' ce ñwáè ca aè geèe ka'.	"Pilate said to him, ""What is truth?"" When he had said this, he went out again to the Jews, and said to them, ""I find no basis for a charge against him."
Beèe Farïìsi a m naèti a du a cu mcúè aèmboè a be geèe tá Jisoès ka' faèa nlaèa.	Then the Pharisees went and took counsel how they might entrap him in his talk.
Muu ca à ghaʼ zhì tâa.	This child is stubborn to his father.
E duê, a ka' baè', beèe anaè a koo ye a lïîp, e kútïì mboèmmbo.	They took him, beat him, and sent him away empty.
Beèe ce a m ye leè' ca a m caèa beèe mkyeèe.	There were more than forty people who had made this conspiracy.
Yuu ghagha' ce Jisoès aè m geèe aè rla' Kánaè aè ñgoâñ Galeèle na, aè m ba ncoèo entombïì ce e m duèñshi njáèá foèo ce e túr. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ka' yá, a byemi neè ye.	This beginning of his signs Jesus did in Cana of Galilee, and revealed his glory; and his disciples believed in him.
Tata ce seèe ce laèa na yu Yú'. Faè dïì' wááwá ce Yú' Tata yi ka' ba, baná beèe anaè a luèñ.	Now the Lord is the Spirit and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, seèe aè rïîñ, a byemi rkoèñnïì ce Nyúè aè túr neè seèe. Nyúè yu rkoèñnïì. Ñwáè ce e ka' cu njep rkoèñnïì, baná e cu njep Nyúè, Nyúè aè cu njep ye.	We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
Wáè ka' ce loo aè njáèá li anaè, ce yoèñshi Nyúè aèmboè ká, aède' yïì anaè yi ja' ñwáè moè' ka'.	For you most certainly give thanks well, but the other person is not built up.
Woweèe a niñ mbe ndaèp, a yá muu a yïì ma ce Máèári, a gú'shi neè ye. A ka' gú'shi neè ye wáá, a mú' waêp bbaèa, a fúr bco' mo' ce a too ená guêl, ba nráèá, ker ba njáèá mgúr mo' ce mi m ce rúèú boèñboñ seê, a fa neè ye.	They came into the house and saw the young child with Mary, his mother, and they fell down and worshiped him. Opening their treasures, they offered to him gifts: gold, frankincense, and myrrh.
Ñwáè wááwá ce e ke koèñ aè rcañ, e ke yá'ni aè rcañ boèñboñ seê. E loè gee wa'a tá e bo koo blaè' ce vi ke cu nfeseè ka'. Blaè' viseèe aè ba blaè' ce vi be cu nfeseè.	Every man who strives in the games exercises self-control in all things. Now they do it to receive a corruptible crown, but we an incorruptible.
Ntee zhi ce yaŋ ye njobèʼ zhìi tâ à lìp ye.	He is angry because his father beat him.
Ŋkàr à niŋ à rkwe Nfò sê.	Many baskets of corn were brought to Nforʼs funeral ceremony.
E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe túr njïì bfee aè rkani mncir Nyúè tá weèe bo loèr yeè ndeèe to'.	"He said to them, ""Full well do you reject the commandment of God, that you may keep your tradition."
Nyúè ce e ke fyá' viseèe mntee wááwá rïìñ yuu ce Yú' yi ce kwaè'shi, njobeè' yú' yi ce bu' mmbo aètu beèe Nyúè aè buu ce Nyúè koèñ.	He who searches the hearts knows what is on the Spirit's mind, because he makes intercession for the saints according to God.
Awá Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê “Láè neè ye nyañ. Weèe ce fa ye ñgá' njoká? E geèe ba yuu boèñboñ neè máè.	"But Jesus said, ""Leave her alone. Why do you trouble her? She has done a good work for me."
AÈmboè yi yu wa'a, baná mñgúè' nyor wááwá vi ku ce fa' aèbee njobeè' mñgúè' nyor wááwá ku túr yuu aè rgeèe neè ñgúè' nyor moè'.	that there should be no division in the body, but that the members should have the same care for one another.
