Jisoès aè joo bo ese ye, tu anaè yi tetïì, e natïì mbekïì, a fár buu neè ye.	He touched her hand, and the fever left her. She got up and served him.
Dávïìd aè m yá yuu ce yi be keè ba, a suñ aèmboè nfúú efa rkwe Kraâis enáê, ‘Nyúè aè m maè'shi ená e cu mbaè yir ka', a ma'shi ená yïì nyor búte ka'.’	he foreseeing this spoke about the resurrection of the Christ, that neither was his soul left in Hades, nor did his flesh see decay.
Nfeè' aè m káè' a ce gháá ce a be ye ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap. Beèe a m loâ aè bbu' mla' wááwá a du aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm. Woweèe aè m koèñ aè rgeèe wap mnyor tá vi ba brara aè bsii Nyúè, tá nfeè' ñkaè' ka' gháá.	Now the Passover of the Jews was at hand. Many went up from the country to Jerusalem before the Passover, to purify themselves.
Ryoâñ ñwáè li caèa byee, nyor ñwáè aè caa bcáè'.	Life is more than food, and the body is more than clothing.
Nyúè aè m ce koèñ ená m naatu neè ku' buu bbáèá ce e m múè' ma mmir máè yá naè ka'. E m fa máè yuu mo' nje nyoèr, yi ba aèmboè msini wa'a, aè ba yuu ce aè m tuusi Sataèn. Yuu anaè yi m ce yañ máè tá m bo ce naèa tu ka'.	By reason of the exceeding greatness of the revelations, that I should not be exalted excessively, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh, a messenger of Satan to torment me, that I should not be exalted excessively.
E du a ce cu a ñwáè moâ' aè to' anaè, ñwáè anaè aè tuu ye ená e du aè mñkúè du ce nyañ yi ñkuânyaèm.	He went and joined himself to one of the citizens of that country, and he sent him into his fields to feed pigs.
Yuu ce yi m ba efa rkáè' ce weèr aè yu', a yá neè mer mmir, a ke'shïî, a ker joo neè mer mmbo yu nlaèa ce e ce fa ryoèñ.	That which was from the beginning, that which we have heard, that which we have seen with our eyes, that which we saw, and our hands touched, concerning the Word of life
E m yɛ̀ɛ cɛ̌ʼ Nfò a caŋ a du kù Nsòʼ.	He stole Nfor’s clothe and escaped to Nso.
Ca yi be keè koni, tá beèe Isráèl wááwá a luêñ. A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè ce e be fúr beèe efa ñgá' be vúè efa rla' Sayoèn, fúr ñgeâe bebep embe ndúè' Jakoèp.	"and so all Israel will be saved. Even as it is written, ""There will come out of Zion the Deliverer, and he will turn away ungodliness from Jacob."
Jisoès aè naa mmir a yá aèmboè ñgaâa mbaèa a ce fa rfa njep ñkuèp rfa embe Ndaèp Nyúè.	He looked up, and saw the rich people who were putting their gifts into the treasury.
E ce laèa ba buu ce e m yá neè mi mmir, a yu' neè vi btuè'. Geewa'a beèe a byemi yuu ce e ce laèa ka'.	What he has seen and heard, of that he testifies; and no one receives his witness.
Yi ka' lo ba ese Nyúè, aède' weèe jepsïì woweèe ka'. Weèe ka' jepsi woweèe, seemoè' yi lo ba ená weèe ce maè' bïìr weèe Nyúè weèe.”	"But if it is of God, you will not be able to overthrow it, and you would be found even to be fighting against God!"""
Beèe mo' a m ce suñ buu aèmboè Ndap Nyúè, a ce laèa ená a baè'ri ndap anaè neè bluâr bboèñboñ, buu ce beèe a m fa neè Nyúè a susi ndap anaè aègho vi boñ foñ seê. Jisoès aè laa enáê,	As some were talking about the temple and how it was decorated with beautiful stones and gifts, he said,
E m ku tañshi ba tañshïì e mo'sir, a gee ená beèe ce e geèe woweèe a ba brara naè a ba byáánïì nfeseè.	For by one offering he has perfected forever those who are being sanctified.
Bfúr waê, weèe aè ka' yá aèmboè ñwáè aè geèe yuu bebep, weèe ce weèe ce geèe buu aè ñger Yú' Nyúè naè, weèe ja' ye tá e bo kúti njep nduunjïû yáánïì. Wee ce jaè' ñwáè anaè, weèe fa ce naèa tu ka'. Weèe fyá' weêe mnyor boèñboñ faè dïì' weèe lo gweè rmoèoshïì foñ ka'.	Brothers, even if a man is caught in some fault, you who are spiritual must restore such a one in a spirit of gentleness; looking to yourself so that you also aren't tempted.
E m fa ye ñgúè' moè' efa ñgoèñ ca káè mú bábá' efa gho ka'. Geewa'a, e m ye leè' ená e be loè fa ñgoèñ anaè neè ye, ker ba boo vi, ka' aè m ba mbe nfeè' anaè e túr muu ka' wa'a.	He gave him no inheritance in it, no, not so much as to set his foot on. He promised that he would give it to him for a possession, and to his seed after him, when he still had no child.
Ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a vúê, aè ku ba Jisoès a woweèe, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Weèr aè ba moo aè rfúr yú' anaè laèr njoká?”	"Then the disciples came to Jesus privately, and said, ""Why weren't we able to cast it out?"""
Mo mmir waŋwaŋ, mi nyaa jìʼjìʼ.	Your eyes should be clear, those of the animals should be dark.
AÈde' ñwáè ce e ce geèe ñgeâe boèñboñ wáp ñwáè ce e ce sa' beèe ka'. Ñwáè ce aède' e wáp ye, yu ba ñwáè ce e ce geèe ñgeâe bebep. Wáè ka' ce koèñ aè rwáp ñwáè ce e ce sa' beèe ka', aè gee ñgeâe boèñboñ tá e bo yoèñshi wáè.	For rulers are not a terror to the good work, but to the evil. Do you desire to have no fear of the authority? Do that which is good, and you will have praise from the same,
Tata aè laa neè ye enáê, “Beèe Farïìsi caê, weâe ke suè'si mndoñ ba bkañ embe nduè, a fyá' weèe enjep mú, wee mntee vi ruu neè mkwaè'shïì ce ená weèe aè ba ce koo buu ese beèe aè ñger, ker ba bsaèrbuu.	"The Lord said to him, ""Now you Pharisees cleanse the outside of the cup and of the platter, but your inward part is full of extortion and wickedness."
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Haba! Weâe beèe e luèuni ce weèe buu rbyemïì! M be cu weèe seèe duè baè' fá? M be kur ntee neè weèe duè baè' fá? Vúè neè muu anaè fa neè máè.”	"He answered him, ""Unbelieving generation, how long shall I be with you? How long shall I bear with you? Bring him to me."""
Rfaè' ce ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ca a ce geèe li táá ba aètu yuu ce yi yu mbe buèu. Seèe rïìñ wa'a njobeè' aè m ba aè nfeè' ce Musïìs aè m ce tami nyor aè rbaè'ri taèp neè bcáè' naè, Nyúè aè laa neè ye enáê, “Loèr nfeè' ba'ri taèp ca tá yi ku ba aèmboè máè m suñ wáè mbe rtuèu Sinaèi ená aè ba'ri naè.”	"who serve a copy and shadow of the heavenly things, even as Moses was warned by God when he was about to make the tabernacle, for he said, ""See, you shall make everything according to the pattern that was shown to you on the mountain."""
E ka' tose, a ko'shi aègee Jisoès, a laa neè ye enáê, “Máè caè'ni wáè, Rabaèi.” E ka' laèa wa'a, a baa ye nje nyoèr.	"Immediately he came to Jesus, and said, ""Hail, Rabbi!"" and kissed him."
Rlaa rli yû?	Have you finished eating the kola?
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Yu' neè, m ce láè luèr rbuu ndap aè rla' Sayoèn. AÈ co' máè luèr anaè, e boñ neè máè seê. Ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè ye, aède' rïìtu yi ke koo ñgaèñ ka'.”	"Because it is contained in Scripture, ""Behold, I lay in Zion a chief cornerstone, chosen, and precious: He who believes in him will not be disappointed."""
E ker fa ye ŋguu moʼ.	He has again given him some firewood.
Yi m ba ená e be kwe ba aètu to' ca caè'caè' ka'. Yi m ba ená e be kwe aètu beèe Nyúè ce a yu aè bto' wááwá tá e bo vúè neè woweèe aèbee tá woweèe a ba ñwáè moè'sir.	and not for the nation only, but that he might also gather together into one the children of God who are scattered abroad.
Bfúr waê, káâ' aè nfeè' weèr aè m vúè ca'ni weèe, seèe aè lo a gaèpni naè, nfeè' aè be du se ka. Seèe aè m gaèpni ba enjep ntee ka, seèe aè m ku gapni ba efa nyoèr. Weèr aè canïì efa ryá weèe, a ce koèñ se ená weèr aè ba vúè tá seèe ker yáni.	But we, brothers, being bereaved of you for a short season, in presence, not in heart, tried even harder to see your face with great desire,
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce a m baèptir weèe, yi duñshïì ená a tuñ weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe aèbee. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè foñ Nyúè aè fúr weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe efa rkwe. E m geèe wa'a njobeè' weèe aè m byemi ená Nyúè ce e m fúr Jisos Kraâis efa rkwe, túr ñger aè rfúr weèe efa rkwe foñ.	having been buried with him in baptism, in which you were also raised with him through faith in the working of God, who raised him from the dead.
Mboè a wáè ñwáâ aè to' Ijïìp ce e m káè' ñgá', a lor ñgaâa nyúshi beèe ncúèkïì kyeèe aè nfeè' moè' a du aègho aè ntee rïìñ naè a?”	"Aren't you then the Egyptian, who before these days stirred up to sedition and led out into the wilderness the four thousand men of the Assassins?"""
Njáèá beèe ce a maè'shi nduunjïû yáánïì na a yu aèmboè mntoèñ mdip ce vi yuushi wa'a, a ker ba aèmboè mmbaè' ce fu' yi ke caèa, lor naè. Nyúè aè kupshi dïì' mo' neè woweèe; faè dïì' anaè aè ku ba ba túè'nji.	These are wells without water, clouds driven by a storm; for whom the blackness of darkness has been reserved forever.
Nfèʼ yu kɛ sèʼni?	What is the time now?

Fyɛʼ kù cùu mo, à ku yɛ ye.	Look at its front (lit.
Jisoès aè karsïì nyor a lapni woweèe,	"But he turned and rebuked them, ""You don't know of what kind of spirit you are."
Joân aè m yar bcáè' ce a m ba' neè mnyoâr kaèmáêl, a cúú ñguèp nyaèa njep mbuèu. Vi byee aè ba mñguu ba bluè.	John was clothed with camel's hair and a leather belt around his waist. He ate locusts and wild honey.
Ka' aèmboè weèr aè yá ñwáè ka' na, weèr aè yá Jisoès. AÈ m ba aè mú nfeè' moè' Nyúè aè gee nta' Jisoès yi sáteè embe nta' bcïìndap Nyúè. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' ñgá' ce Jisoès aè m yá, a kwe, Nyúè aè lo a fa ye nta' kúú, a gee ená beèe a yu'ni neè ye. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' Nyúè aè m túr ntee boèñboñ, yi ba ená Jisoès aè kwe aètu beèe wááwá.	But we see him who has been made a little lower than the angels, Jesus, because of the suffering of death crowned with glory and honor, that by the grace of God he should taste of death for everyone.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “M rïìñ máná weèe be maè' ñgaèa ca neè máè, ‘Ñwáè mcáèp báèá mo mcáèp luêñ. Geèe laè njáèá buu ce weèr aè m yu' ená wáè m geèe aè rla' Kaèpanuèm naè fa wáâ laè' na foñ.’ ”	"He said to them, ""Doubtless you will tell me this parable, 'Physician, heal yourself! a ka' gee yuu anaè neè seèe aè njïì ce aède' ñwáè laa ka'. E m túr bfee, a riñ buu wááwá, a ka' gee wa'a.	which he made to abound toward us in all wisdom and prudence,
M ce kwaè'shi ená dïì' ce Nyúè aè fa neè weèr ce weèr yu ñgaâa ntuu, yu dïì' elúèsimbuèu. Weèr yu aèmboè beèe ce mnsa' mi koo woweèe, yi ka' táá seè'ni ená a be yú woweèe, a lor woweèe a tár aèwañ tá bcïìndap Nyúè ba beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a bo kaari ce fyá'.	For, I think that God has displayed us, the apostles, last of all, like men sentenced to death. For we are made a spectacle to the world, both to angels and men.
A tɛɛ nè ye a zhʉ.	They went as far as killing him.
Jisoès aè ka' laèa blaèa ca, beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè Jus a ká' a ce kwaè'shi jáá jáèá jáá njo' blaèa anaè.	Therefore a division arose again among the Jews because of these words.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, seèe laa neè woweèe ená a fa keèr laèa yuu mo' neè ñwáè moè' aè rlii Jisoès ka', faè dïì' ryá'nïì ca li bo keèr duè ntombïì ka'.”	"But so that this spreads no further among the people, let's threaten them, that from now on they don't speak to anyone in this name."""
Túè' aè ka' keèr raa, Joân aè táá a beèe a mmbaa ce e m ce yá'ni woweèe.	Again, the next day, John was standing with two of his disciples,
Bfúr waê, aè ka' ba yi aèmboè máè, yi yu rara ená m ker bii feè'shi ená beèe ce a byemi neè Jisos Kraâis a gee búè ka'. Máè ka' ba ce feè'shi wa'a, beèe a ba keèr ce fa máè ñgá' ka'. Yi ka' ba ba mini wa'a, yuu ce m ce feè'shi ená Jisos Kraâis aè m kwe mbe kïìntaa na yi ba geèe tá beèe a bepsi ntee neè máè ka'.	But I, brothers, if I still preach circumcision, why am I still persecuted? Then the stumbling block of the cross has been removed.
AÈmboè weèr ce cu neè nyor ca njep ñgoèñ na, weèr ce cu ba njobeè' weèr aè láè ntee neè ye, ke' ba njobeè' weèr aè yá ye ka'.	for we walk by faith, not by sight.
E ke taŋshi nlàa lùprì lùprì àmbò nzhɛ̀ɛ waʼa.	He speaks too fast like a thief.
Weèr aè m niñ mbe keñ ñgoèr ce aè m ba yïû aè dïì' ce a m ce too ená AÈdamituèm. Keñ anaè aè m táá aè rco'ti duè, ce táátá aè mla' moâ' aèwaâa roè aè ñgoâñ Áshaè. Weèr aè niñ mbo a ce duè. AÈristakoès ce aè m ba ñwáâ aè rla' Táèsaèlonikaâ aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè aè m ba weèr woweèe.	Embarking in a ship of Adramyttium, which was about to sail to places on the coast of Asia, we put to sea; Aristarchus, a Macedonian of Thessalonica, being with us.
E ce lìp bèe ànfor.	He is beating people indiscriminately.
Ñgá' ce woweèe a m yá, aè m moèoshi woweèe seê. Geewa'a woweèe a m ce lu'shi seê, a ba mmbo mtoo seê, ka' fuèp aè m koo woweèe se wa'a.	how that in much proof of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded to the riches of their liberality.

Muu à bɛr njàp tɛ e bo lò ye nè mootì.	The child has kept some soup so that he can eat it in the afternoon.
AÈde' yi ba wa' ka' koo múcaèr. Seèe yu aèmboè bgúâú beèe ce aède' buu bbebep ker gee yuu mo' neè seèe ka'. AÈde' seèe ker ce geèe buu bbebep aè njáâá ká?	May it never be! We who died to sin, how could we live in it any longer?
Ñwáè aè ka' ce koèñ ená weèe ye sa' mnsa', koo cáè' ese wáè, aè ma'shïì tá e koo yoè kur foñ.	If anyone sues you to take away your coat, let him have your cloak also.
Ñwáè aè ka' laa ená aè fa ye yuu, aè fa ñgaèñ yuu anaè. Ñwáè aè ka' ce koèñ aè rfoèo yuu ese wáè, aè fa sheè ka'.	Give to him who asks you, and don't turn away him who desires to borrow from you.
Pol aè m cu a woweèe aè feè' bïìi ba nto' a ce yá'ni woweèe blaâa Nyúè.	He lived there a year and six months, teaching the word of God among them.
E laêa, a woweèe a niñ mbe ndaèp a noêñ. Túè' aè ka' raa, e natïì a du a woweèe, bfúr moâ' aè rla' Jopaè a du a yeâ mbuèu.	So he called them in and lodged them. On the next day Peter arose and went out with them, and some of the brothers from Joppa accompanied him.
Cena yi yu ba ená ká? Yi yu ená beèe enje jáá ce a m ce gheèter aè rba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè ka', a yu seè'ni byáánïì njobeè' lap rbyemïì.	What shall we say then? That the Gentiles, who didn't follow after righteousness, attained to righteousness, even the righteousness which is of faith;

a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Ñger ce aè ce geèe buu ca aègho li loè efá? Ñwáè ce e fa wáè ñger ca aè fa nda?”	"and they began saying to him, ""By what authority do you do these things? Or who gave you this authority to do these things?"""
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè wáè, yuu wááwá ce wáè ka' ce geèe, aè gee ba yuu boèñboñ tá beèe mo' a bo yá beè'ni. Yá'ni beèe neè mini-ñwáè, fa geèe ñkáèrbuu neè lo ryá'nïì ka'.	in all things showing yourself an example of good works; in your teaching showing integrity, seriousness, incorruptibility,
Beèe ce a ce koèñ aè ryááti boèñboñ aè bsii beèe naè, a beèe ce a ce taèa weèe ená weèe gee búè. Woweèe a ce geèe wa'a faè dïì' beèe a bo fa woweèe ñgá' njobeè' woweèe a ce feè'shi aèmboè rkwe ce Jisos Kraâis aè m kwe mbe kïìntaa ka'.	As many as desire to look good in the flesh, they compel you to be circumcised; only that they may not be persecuted for the cross of Christ.
Yi yu aèndeèe ená aè yá ñgá' njo' yuu boèñboñ ce aè ce geèe ce Nyúè ka' koñ ená yi ba wa'a, neè ce ená aè yá ñgá' njo' yuu bebep.	For it is better, if it is God's will, that you suffer for doing well than for doing evil.

Asoèr aè m bi Sadoèk, Sadoèk aè bi Akïìm, Akïìm aè bi ÁÈliyuèr.	Azor became the father of Sadoc. Sadoc became the father of Achim. Achim became the father of Eliud.

Yuu anaè yi ka' she, baná ñgaèñ be bú aè cicïì, koni yuu ka'. Geewa'a, ñgaèñ be luèñ, kuè luèñ ba aèmboè ñwáè ce e cañ mor, a coo njep mncuèñ mor a tose.	If any man's work is burned, he will suffer loss, but he himself will be saved, but as through fire.
Bfúr waê, aèmboè yi yu wa' naè, m ce laèa neè weèe ená weèe kur ntee du ba' aè nfeè' ce yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraâis be keè vúè. Kwaè'shi ka neè aèmboè ñgaâa nfaè' mnsuu a ke kur ntee ce keè' mbeèñ kwaêa, ker keè' nfeè' ce kwaa be bi tá a ka' kep naè.	Be patient therefore, brothers, until the coming of the Lord. Behold, the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the earth, being patient over it, until it receives the early and late rain.
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe ce laèa wa'a, a ce faèa faèa njobeè' weèe rïìñ yuu ce Ñwaâ' Nyúè yi ce laèa ka', a riñ ñger Nyúè foñ ka'.	"But Jesus answered them, ""You are mistaken, not knowing the Scriptures, nor the power of God."
Mboè m túr ñger aè rgeèe yuu ce m ce koèñ neè ya mbaèa a? Káè aè ce ko'ndoñ njobeè' m yu mmbo-mtoo láê?’	Isn't it lawful for me to do what I want to with what I own? Or is your eye evil, because I am good?'
Ñwáè ce aède' e ye yuu yu ba nleeñwáè. A ñwáè ce e yá'ni, a lááte a riñ yuu boèñboñ ba yuu bebep.	But solid food is for those who are full grown, who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern good and evil.
Yuu ce m ce laèa yi yu ená Nyúè aè m ye leè' a Abraèham wa'a, bfeè' mjeèe- kyeèe-ba-bfeè'-mntaar vi ka' caèa, e ka' fa mncir neè Juês. Mncir anaè vi túr ñger aè rbú' leè' tá yuu ce Nyúè aè m kaè' yi kúti aè yuu cicïì ka'.	Now I say this. A covenant confirmed beforehand by God in Christ, the law, which came four hundred thirty years after, does not annul, so as to make the promise of no effect.
Yoo boŋwàʼ zhi boŋ mɛ̀ sê.	I like your handwriting too much.
Weèr rïìñ werná yeèr nyor ce weèr ce cu aègho njep ñgoèñ na yu aèmboè taèp ce weèr ce cu mbo wa'a. A ka' sa'si taèp anaè, seèe ku riñ seená ndap yu mbe buèu ce aè baè'ri ba ñwáè ka'. Ndap anaè aè baè'ri Nyúè, aè ba ndap ce e be cu nfeseè.	For we know that if the earthly house of our tent is dissolved, we have a building from God, a house not made with hands, eternal, in the heavens.
E m laèa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Be keè ba aè nfeè' moè' tá weèe ja'ni mnyor weená weèe aè ba yá noèñ mo' efa mnoèñ ce Muu Ñwáè be keè vúè neè ñger-ñwáè, keè' yá ka'. Wɛ̌ fʉʉ à yàŋse vʉ tɛ sò dû.	You should come early in the morning so that we go.

Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	7	30	“Bfeè' vi ka' caèa mñkyeèe, ncïìndap Nyúè a nyáá aè rïìñ embe rtuèu Sinaèi nje múè mcuèñ mor ce mi m ce she mbe mú ce mo'. Musïìs aè yáê.	When forty years were fulfilled, an angel of the Lord appeared to him in the wilderness of Mount Sinai, in a flame of fire in a bush."

Byú' anaè vi ka' fúú enjep ñwáè anaè, a niñ njep kúr ñkuânyaèm caè, yi káátïì a cañ a du mbaè baa, a gweñger njep túè, a no mdip, a kweñger.	The demons came out from the man, and entered into the pigs, and the herd rushed down the steep bank into the lake, and were drowned.
E ka' jarsi buu anaè wáá, njeè aè koo aè to' anaè seê, e ke' túr yuu ye ka'.	When he had spent all of it, there arose a severe famine in that country, and he began to be in need.
E m ker du aè rla' Kaèpanuèm aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a yá'ni beèe nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè.	He came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee. He was teaching them on the Sabbath day,
Seèe rïìñ seená aède' mncir vi gee ñwáè e ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè ka', njobeè' a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Ñwáè ce e yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njobeè' e byemi neè ye, ñgaèñ be luèñ.”	"Now that no man is justified by the law before God is evident, for, ""The righteous will live by faith."""
Ncïìndap Nyúè embenjïì mo aè fyáp rsoèñ li. E ka' fyáp, yuu mo' yi kuu nyúè, ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar efa gho aè sii, a ke' ker sañ ka', a kuu ñwáá, ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar efa gho aè sii, a ke' ker sañ ka', a kuu mkaèñsïì, ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar efa gho aè sii, a ke' ker raa ka'. Ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar e neèmootïì ba ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar e neètú' a ke' ker raa ka'.	The fourth angel sounded, and one third of the sun was struck, and one third of the moon, and one third of the stars; so that one third of them would be darkened, and the day wouldn't shine for one third of it, and the night in the same way.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè weèr ce weèr yu Jus seese naè, weèr yu aèmboè beèe enje jáá ce a ke láè yap yu mncir Nyúè ka' naè ka'.	"We, being Jews by nature, and not Gentile sinners,
Galatians	Gaèláshaè	2	16	Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèr rïìñ war ená Nyúè e ke loèr ñwáè aè ñwáâ nyáánïì njobeè' ñgaèñ ce láè mncir ka'. Yuu ce yi ke geèe ñwáè e ba nyáánïì aè bsii Nyúè, ku ba rbyemïû neè Jisos Kraâis caè'caè'. Weèr ce weèr yu Juês, aè byemi neè Jisoès foñ tá Nyúè bo loèr weèr aè beâe byáánïì, ke' ba njo' mncir ce weèr ce láè ka'. Yi ku ba aèmboè a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè. A m sañ enáê, “AÈde' ñwáè ba nyáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njobeè' ñgaèñ ce láè mncir ka'.”	yet knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law but through faith in Jesus Christ, even we believed in Christ Jesus, that we might be justified by faith in Christ, and not by the works of the law, because no flesh will be justified by the works of the law.
Galatians	Gaèláshaè	2	17	AÈde' ñwáè moè' laa ená seèe ce seèe ce koèñ aè rba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njo' rfaè' Jisos Kraêis, ku bii ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep njobeè' seèe ce láè mncir ka'. Ñwáè aè ka' laa wa'a, baná e ce laèa ená Jisos Kraâis ce fa beèe ñger aè rgeèe buu bbebep. Yi yu wa' ka' koo múcaèr.	But if, while we sought to be justified in Christ, we ourselves also were found sinners, is Christ a servant of sin? Certainly not!
Galatians	Gaèláshaè	2	18	M ka' ker ce baè'ri yuu ce máè m saè'si, baná m yu ñwáè bú'shi mncir.	For if I build up again those things which I destroyed, I prove myself a law-breaker.
Galatians	Gaèláshaè	2	19	Mncir vi m geèe máè riñ máná njïì moè' yu aègho neè ñwáè aè rba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njobeè' e ce láè mncir ka'. Yi ka' ba wa'a, máè ba seè'ni aèmboè gúèú ñwáè ce aède' mncir vi ker gee yuu aègho ka' wa'a, tá m bo cu ba rcu ce Nyúè koèñ.	For I, through the law, died to the law, that I might live to God.
Galatians	Gaèláshaè	2	20	AÈde' m laa máná a m taa weèr Jisos Kraâis mbe kïìntaa weèr ye aè kwe aèbee. A mbuèu ce ryoèñ ce m túr seè'ni na yu la ka'. Ryoèñ anaè yu ba li Jisos Kraâis ce e yu njep máâ nteèe. Rcu ce m ce cu njep ñgoèñ seè'ni na yu ba rcu rbyemïì ce li geèe máè ce láè ya ntee ba neè Muu Nyúè ce e m koèñ máè, a fa li ryoèñ njo' máè.	I have been crucified with Christ, and it is no longer I that live, but Christ living in me. That life which I now live in the flesh, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself up for me.
Galatians	Gaèláshaè	2	21	Yi m ba ba ená aède' ñwáè ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè njobeè' e lá mncir, yi ba ba ená rkwe Jisos Kraâis li yu aè cicïì. AÈde' m lor ntee boèñboñ ce Nyúè túr neè seèe na aè yuu cicïì ka'.	I don't make void the grace of God. For if righteousness is through the law, then Christ died for nothing!"

"In his teaching he said to them, ""Beware of the scribes, who like to walk in long robes, and to get greetings in the marketplaces,"

AÈ ka' ba aèmboè rfaè' ce Jisoès ce geèe, li caèa rfaè' ce ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì mo' ca a ce geèe. Yi yu wa'a njobeè' Nyúè aè kaè' seèe buu ce vi boèñ a caa vïì ce vi m ba njo' leè' anaè.	But now he has obtained a more excellent ministry, by so much as he is also the mediator of a better covenant, which on better promises has been given as law.
Máè ce ya tu, a lá rara njo' woweèe, tá aè bo ce woweèe foñ, láè rara neè yoè mini.	For their sakes I sanctify myself, that they themselves also may be sanctified in truth.
Ku ba ye ce aède' e kwe ka', a ce cu ba aè rraa ce aède' ñwáè ba' aètútú efa gho ka'. Ñwáè aè m be yá ye ka', aède' ñwáè yá ye ka'. Tá beèe a yu'ni neè ye, tá yi ñger yi cu nfeseè. Yi yu wa'a.	who alone has immortality, dwelling in unapproachable light; whom no man has seen, nor can see: to whom be honor and eternal power. Amen.
Woweèe a bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, buu ca vi be ba ba aè se'ká? Yuu ce yi be duèñshi ená nfeè' ce buu ca be koni aè gháá, be ba ká?”	"They asked him, ""Teacher, so when will these things be? What is the sign that these things are about to happen?"""
Pitaè aè laa enáê, “Tataê, aè ce maè' ñgaèa ca ba neè weèr káè neè beèe wááwá?”	"Peter said to him, ""Lord, are you telling this parable to us, or to everybody?"""
Baná weèe aè ka' ke yá aèmboè buu ca vi ce koni, weèe riñ weená nfeè' kúú Nyúè aè gháá.	Even so you also, when you see these things happening, know that the Kingdom of God is near.
Seèe aè ka' túr bcáè' ba byee, seèe ma'shïì tá vi ghááte seèe.	But having food and clothing, we will be content with that.
A m koo beèe ce a m sañ map mlii mbe ñwaâ' ryoèñ ka', a ma' njep ma mor anaè.	If anyone was not found written in the book of life, he was cast into the lake of fire.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a yoñse mbe waâp nduè a laa enáê, “Koo neè Yú' Rara.	"When he had said this, he breathed on them, and said to them, ""Receive the Holy Spirit!"
Jisoès aè beesïì a laa enáê, “Haba! Weâe beèe eluèuni ce weèe buu rbyemïì, a beesi mini tútúèñ na. M be cu weèe seèe duè baè' fá? M be kur ntee neè weèe duè baè' fá? Vúè neè muu anaè fa neè máè mbena.”	"Jesus answered, ""Faithless and perverse generation! How long will I be with you? How long will I bear with you? Bring him here to me."""
nan	but now is revealed, and by the Scriptures of the prophets, according to the commandment of the eternal God, is made known for obedience of faith to all the nations;

"A great clamor arose, and some of the scribes of the Pharisees part stood up, and contended, saying, ""We find no evil in this man. But if a spirit or angel has spoken to him, let's not fight against God!"""
Beâe aè rla' Nenávïì a be keè naèti táá aè noâñ mnsa', laèa ená a ñgúè beèe yïû seè'ni aè geèe yuu bebep njobeè' Jonaè aè m feè'shi blaâa Nyúè neè woweèe, woweèe a kupse a ma' yaèp buu bbebep. Yá neè! Yuu mo' yi yu mbena seè'ni na ce yi caèa Jonaè.	The men of Nineveh will stand up in the judgment with this generation, and will condemn it: for they repented at the preaching of Jonah, and behold, one greater than Jonah is here.
mbeèñ aè gweê, mdip mi ruu, fu' yi caa a ci' ndap anaè seê, e ke' gwe ka' njobeè' a m boo kuèu efa gho mbenduè ryáá.	The rain came down, the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat on that house; and it didn't fall, for it was founded on the rock.
Weèr aè ka' yu' wa'a, weèr beâe aè rla' anaè weèe aè bu' mmbo neè ye ená e fa duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm ka'.	When we heard these things, both we and they of that place begged him not to go up to Jerusalem.
Weèr aè rïìñ seè'ni na ená aè rïìñ buu wááwá. Mbuèu moè' ker ba aègho neè ñwáè aè rbipshi yuu mo' neè wáè ka'. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' cena, weèr a byemi ená wáè loè ese Nyúè.”	"Now we know that you know all things, and don't need for anyone to question you. By this we believe that you came forth from God."""
Ñwáè moè' efa waâp mú aè ke' ker buu yuu mo' ka'. Beèe ce a m túr mñkúè, káè mndap áè, a m ce fyeèni, ce vúè neè mbaèa efa gho,	For neither was there among them any who lacked, for as many as were owners of lands or houses sold them, and brought the proceeds of the things that were sold,

You became imitators of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Spirit,

But as it is, I wrote to you not to associate with anyone who is called a brother who is a sexual sinner, or covetous, or an idolater, or a slanderer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner. Ntaa kwâa à sùu.	The price of corn has reduced.
Máè m ce faè' neè Tataê, a ce naèa tu ka', a ce faè' neè mñgoommir-ñwáè, ker ba mmoèoshïì ce mi m vúè neè máè njo' mncúè ce Jus a m cúè máè.	serving the Lord with all humility, with many tears, and with trials which happened to me by the plots of the Jews;

a bipshi enáê, “Muu ce a bi ye aè ñkúú Jus naè yuê? Weèr aè yá li rkaèñsïì kuè mbuèuntii, a vú aè rgú'shi neè ye.”	Where is he who is born King of the Jews? For we saw his star in the east, and have come to worship him.

Luke	Luêk	16	20	Ñwáè fuèp moè' ce a m ce too ená Lasoèroès aè m noèñ aè yi cuèu ñka', bkoètá vi koo ye aè nyor nsïìp.	A certain beggar, named Lazarus, was laid at his gate, full of sores,
Luke	Luêk	16	21	E m ce koèñ aè rye mkúâ' buu ce mi m ce gweèñger embe tábuèr ñwáè mbaèa anaè. Ñgwe yi m ce vúè ce báèñshi vi mnfur.	and desiring to be fed with the crumbs that fell from the rich man's table. Yes, even the dogs came and licked his sores.
Luke	Luêk	16	22	Ñwáè fuèp ca aè m loè a kwe, bcïìndap Nyúè vi lor ye a du aègho a lá mbe mmbo Abraèhaêm. Ñwáè mbaèa aè m loè a kwe foñ, a tuñ ye.	It happened that the beggar died, and that he was carried away by the angels to Abraham's bosom. The rich man also died, and was buried.
Luke	Luêk	16	23	E m duè njep mor a ce yá mluè njo. A ka' naèa mmir fyá' mbekïì a yá Abraèham aènjïìsaèp seê, a yá aèmboè Lasoèroès cu a yeâ geñ.	In Hades, he lifted up his eyes, being in torment, and saw Abraham far off, and Lazarus at his bosom.
Luke	Luêk	16	24	E ká' Abraèham a laa neè ye enáê, ‘Ta Abraèhaêm, koosimnse neè máè, tuu Lasoèroès tá e fúú ntubo njep mdip, cáási máè mbe rlee, tá li fúte, njobeè' m ce yá mluè njep mor na seê.’	He cried and said, 'Father Abraham, have mercy on me, and send Lazarus, that he may dip the tip of his finger in water, and cool my tongue! For I am in anguish in this flame.'
Luke	Luêk	16	25	Abraèham aè beesïì enáê, ‘Muu waè, kuushi ená wáè m koni ku' yoè buu bboèñboñ aè nfeè' ce wáè m ba njep ñgoèñ. Lasoèroès aè konïì yi ba buu bbebep, aè ka' ba seè'ni na Lasoèroès aè cu neè rfúteè-ñwáè, wáè ce yá ñgá'.	But Abraham said, 'Son, remember that you, in your lifetime, received your good things, and Lazarus, in the same way, bad things. But now here he is comforted and you are in anguish."
Ñwáè ka' ce laèa njáèá li ce e m be yá'ni ka', baná e ce laèa ba neè beèe ka', e ce laèa ba neè Nyúè njobeè' aède' ñwáè moè' yu' yuu e ce laèa ka'. E ce laèa buu ce aè bsúèti aè ñger Yú' Nyúè.	For he who speaks in another language speaks not to men, but to God; for no one understands; but in the Spirit he speaks mysteries.

A ke màʼ bliŋgar à nfè ce a ke suŋ mghàghar.	We say riddles when we are telling tales.

Bfúr waê, Nyúè aè ká' weèe faè dïì' weèe bo keèr ce faè' bkwaèa neè mncir ka'. AÈmboè weèe ker bii ce faè' bkwaèa neè mncir ka' naè, weèe fa laèa weená aède' weèe ku gee yuu ce weèe koèñ ka'. Yuu ce weèe aè ba geèe yi yu ená weèe koñ bfúr mo', ce fa' neè woweèe.	For you, brothers, were called for freedom. Only don't use your freedom for gain to the flesh, but through love be servants to one another.

Beèe a ba kwaè'shi aèmboè yuu ca boèñboñ seê, neè bfee-ñwáè. Ñwáè ce e ka' túr bfee baná ñgaèñ riñ yuu ce nombaè ca táá aètu mo. Nombaè ca táá aètu ñwáè. Nombaè anaè yu mjeèe ntuunfu neè ncoèp-ntuunfu-aè-mntuunfu.	Here is wisdom. He who has understanding, let him calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. Rkar mutù rli fyɛ̀pte.	The wheel has gone flat.
Beèe enjep ñgoèñ wááwá a ku ba aèmboè ñwáè entombïì ce a m boo neè nshe, beèe embe buèu a ku ba aèmboè ñwáè ce e m suèu embe buèu.	As is the one made of dust, such are those who are also made of dust; and as is the heavenly, such are they also that are heavenly.
Ñwáè Jus moè' ce a m ce too ená AÈpoloès aè m vúâ aè rla' Áfásoès. A m bi ye aè rla' AÈláèksandaè. AÈ m ba ñwáè ce e m rïìñ aè rlaèa yuu, a riñ Ñwaâ' Nyúè boèñboñ foñ seê.	Now a certain Jew named Apollos, an Alexandrian by race, an eloquent man, came to Ephesus. He was mighty in the Scriptures.
Woweèe a ka' baè' a ko' mbe rum ndap yïû mbekïì, mbe dïì' ce woweèe a m ce cu. Beèe ce a m ba mbo aè m ba Pitaè ba Joân ba Jáêms, ker ba Andruè ba Feleêp, ker ba Tomas ba Baètoèlomïì ba Matïìyoè ba Jáms muu Alfïìyoès ba Saimúèn ce e m ba moè' efa múè beèe Siloèt ba Judaès muu Jáêms. Mboè yu woweèe ce a ce bepsi rlii rboèñboñ ce Jisoès aè m fa neè weèe na a?	Don't they blaspheme the honorable name by which you are called?

Ñwáè bbaèa ce elúèsimbuèu ce Nyúè be keè so, yu rkwe.	The last enemy that will be abolished is death.
E m ba neè rbúè. A ka' káè' ce luuti, a ce war, njobeè' e m ce yu' ryañ.	She was with child. She cried out in pain, laboring to give birth.
Fa neè li ñgá', gee tá li koosimnse. Geèe neè tá ñgá' ba ñkoosimnse rla' anaè ku ba goèr foñ aèmboè ku' foèo ba ku' buu ce li m túr naè. Fa neè li ñgá' njobeè' li ce naèa tu ená li yu ñkúú. Li ce laèa ená li yu ñgwañkúñwáè ka', aède' li war aè nfeè' moè' ka'.	However much she glorified herself, and grew wanton, so much give her of torment and mourning. Yi ku ba neè seèe wa' foñ. AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' ce seèe aè m be riñ buu Nyúè boèñboñ ka' naè, seèe aè ce faè' bkwaèa neè byú' enjep ñgoèñ na.	So we also, when we were children, were held in bondage under the elemental principles of the world.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ce bip ca neè weèe. Yiseèe ncir yi byemi ená seèe gee ba yuu boèñboñ nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè káè yuu bebep? Fa túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè mghaèghar cicïì ka'. Mi túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè Nyúè ka'. Yá'ni yoè nyor aè rcu ba rcu ce Nyúè koèñ.	But refuse profane and old wives' fables. Exercise yourself toward godliness.

ba beâe aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, ba beâe aè ñgoâñ IÌdumïìyaè ba mla' mo' ce mi m ba aèñguu rdip Jodaèn, ker ba Tayaè ba Sidoèn. Bfúr waê, m ce mïìsi ya ñwaè' ca a ce laèa neè weèe ená weèe cu boèñboñ. Gheèter neè kupse, ba yáánïì. Yu' neè yuu ce m ce laèa. Túr neè ntee e mo'sir, cu neè neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè. Yi yu foñ ená aè m ba aè nfeè' seèe aè m ce cu naè, máè m ka' ba buu yuu, m ke' ba ntáèr neè ñwáè moè' ka'. Beèe ce a m vúè embe cor aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè a m fa máè buu ce máè m túr ka'. Fu' yi loè ce ko' embaè mbuèuñgoèñ, weèe laa weená ñgoèñ yi be luèu seê, yi ku luu ghup.	When a south wind blows, you say, 'There will be a scorching heat,' and it happens.
Ñwáè ka' túr buu enjep ñgoèñ na, yá ená nfúr yïì buu yuu, tee mmbo, aètaè rkoèñnïì Nyúè li ba njep ye aè njáâá ká?	But whoever has the world's goods, and sees his brother in need, and closes his heart of compassion against him, how does the love of God remain in him?
Wáè m ka' ba ba ñkwaèa aè nfeè' ce Nyúè aè m ká' wáè, aè fa bu' ka', ka' ba ne ená wáè koni fáñ aè rfúú efa bkwaèa, aè fúú yo yu.	Were you called being a bondservant? Don't let that bother you, but if you get an opportunity to become free, use it.
“Kúú Nyúè yi yu aèmboè ñwáè moè' ce e m fúú aè mú ñgaèptú' moè' a du a roèo beèe tá a bo faè' yi nsuu.	"For the Kingdom of Heaven is like a man who was the master of a household, who went out early in the morning to hire laborers for his vineyard.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	2	A woweèe a m kapni ntaa rfaè', a byemïì ená e be laè' woweèe mbúè mbaèa aè noèñ, e tuu woweèe ená a du fa' yi nsuu.	When he had agreed with the laborers for a denarius a day, he sent them into his vineyard.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	3	AÈ ka' ba aèmboè nyúè búè'ú wa'a, e ker fúú a duê, a yá beèe mo' a tááteè aè ntaa, a túr yuu geèe ka',	He went out about the third hour, and saw others standing idle in the marketplace.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	4	e laa neè woweèe enáê, ‘Duè neè foñ du fa' ya nsuu tá m la' weèe aè ntaa yáánïì.’	To them he said, 'You also go into the vineyard, and whatever is right I will give you.' So they went their way.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	5	E ka' laèa wa'a, woweèe a duê. AÈ ka' ba aè nyúè ncoèp-baa ker ba aè nyúè taar, e ker duê, a yá beèe mo', a ker laa neè woweèe wa'a.	Again he went out about the sixth and the ninth hour, and did likewise.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	6	AÈ ka' ba aèmboè aè nyúè ta wa'a, e ker fúú a duê, a ker yá beèe mo' aèmboè a tááte aè ntaa, e laa neè woweèe enáê, ‘Weèe ku tááte mbena, nyúè aè ce coo, a ce geèe yuu ka' njoká?’	About the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle. He said to them, 'Why do you stand here all day idle?'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	7	Woweèe a beesïì enáê, ‘Ñwáè moè' aè loèr weèr aè rfaè' ka'.’ E laa neè woweèe enáê, ‘Duè neè foñ du fa' ya nsuu.’	They said to him, 'Because no one has hired us.' ""He said to them, 'You also go into the vineyard, and you will receive whatever is right.'"
A mbuèu ce Nyúè aè naèa ye mbekïì, a fa ye rlii ce li caèa mlii wááwá,	Therefore God also highly exalted him, and gave to him the name which is above every name;
Baná aède' rlir li laa neè bo enáê, “M túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè wáè ka'” ka'. AÈde' tu foñ yi laa neè mkuèu enáê, “M túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè weèe ka'” ka'.	"The eye can't tell the hand, ""I have no need for you,"" or again the head to the feet, ""I have no need for you."""

Jisoès aè ka' laèa buu ca neè beèe anaè mïìsi, a du aè rla' Kaèpanuèm.	After he had finished speaking in the hearing of the people, he entered into Capernaum.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, Nyúè aè fúr yïì ñwáè rfaè' efa weâe mú, a tuu ye neè weèe entombïì, tá e bo ghoèni weèe, geèe tá weèe kupse, maè' wee bsaèrbuu.”	"God, having raised up his servant, Jesus, sent him to you first, to bless you, in turning away everyone of you from your wickedness."""
Yuu mo'sir ce m ce roèo, a ce keè' máná yi koni neè máè yi yu ená m fa keè geèe yuu ce yi be koosi máè rïìtu ka'. Yi yu ená m túr ba ntee tatap seè'ni aèmboè máè m ku túr naè aè nfeè' sïìp tá m bo kuè fa rlii rgoèr neè Jisos Kraâis neè yaè nyor. Káè m be cu nteèe áè, káè m be kwe áè, m ku ce roèo ba aè rfa rlii rgoèr neè ye.	according to my earnest expectation and hope, that I will in no way be disappointed, but with all boldness, as always, now also Christ will be magnified in my body, whether by life, or by death.

Woowèe a dù à ryɛ yàp ŋwɛ̀.	They have gone to see their person.

E m tuu woweèe ená woweèe a du fe'shi aèmboè kúú Nyúè, ker gee tá ñgaâa byañ a ke'se.	He sent them forth to preach the Kingdom of God, and to heal the sick.
Cena yi ka' mïì wáá, Jisoès aè riñ seè'ni ená li rfaè' li mïì. E m laèa enáê, “Ntee yi ce yuushi máè.” E m laèa wa'a tá yi bo ghááte aèmboè a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè.	"After this, Jesus, seeing that all things were now finished, that the Scripture might be fulfilled, said, ""I am thirsty."""
E ka' laèa wa'a, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a riñ seè'ni ená e ba ce laèa neè woweèe ená AÈlajaè aè vúè wáá wa'a, a ce laèa ba aèmboè Joân ñwáè baèptir beèe.	Then the disciples understood that he spoke to them of John the Baptizer.
Weèe aè ka' ce kaè' aè rgeèe yuu, weèe aè ba laèa ba enáê, “Tata ka' byemi baná seèe be geèe ca ba ca.”	"For you ought to say, ""If the Lord wills, we will both live, and do this or that."""
Ñwáè moè' ce e m ba ñwáè yá'ni yïì buu foñ, aè laa neè ye enáê, “Tataê, maè'shi tá m du tuñ yaè ta wáá.”	"Another of his disciples said to him, ""Lord, allow me first to go and bury my father."""
Seèe ku lá miseèe mmir ba mbenduè Jisoès ce e m múè' njïì ená seèe lá ntee njep ye, aè ku ba ye ce e be keè loèr seèe duè aègho mbe buèu aèlúèsimbuèu. E m byemi a kwe rkwe rïìtu mbe kïìntaa. E m loèr rïìtu anaè aè yuu ka', tá e bo túr njáèá rlu'shïì ce Nyúè aè m kupshi a lá neè ye. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' e m geèe wa'a, e cu seè'ni aè bo maè' kaèbaèraè' yïû Nyúè.	looking to Jesus, the author and perfecter of faith, who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising its shame, and has sat down at the right hand of the throne of God.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' moè' weèe aè ba aènjïìsaèp ese Nyúè, a ba ñgaâa bbaèa neè ye, njobeè' weèe aè m ce kwaè'shi buu bbebep, a ce geèe buu bbebep.	You, being in past times alienated and enemies in your mind in your evil works,
Beèe moè' a ce loèr ená noâñ mo' yu noâñ goèr a caa mnoèñ wááwá, beèe mo' a lor yap ená mnoèñ wááwá vi ku ba yáánïì. Ñwáè wááwá aè ba kwaè'shi, rïìñ neè mini-ñwáè ená yuu ce e ce kwaè'shi yi yu yáánïì.	One man esteems one day as more important. Another esteems every day alike. Let each man be fully assured in his own mind.
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba beèe Farïìsi a ka' yu' mñgaèa ce e maè', a riñ ená e maè' mñgaèa anaè ba aèmboè woweèe.	When the chief priests and the Pharisees heard his parables, they perceived that he spoke about them.
Jodaè aè ba muu Joanaèm, Joanaèm aè ba muu Rásaè, Rásaè aè ba muu Sáèrobabáèr, Sáèrobabáèr aè ba muu Shálatáèr, Shálatáèr aè ba muu Nárïì,	the son of Joanan, the son of Rhesa, the son of Zerubbabel, the son of Shealtiel, the son of Neri,
Pitaè aè suu a yá woweèe, a laa enáê, “A máè ñwáè ce weèe ce roèo naè. Weèe aè vúè aè rroèo máè ená ká?”	"Peter went down to the men, and said, ""Behold, I am he whom you seek. Why have you come?"""
AÈ m ba entoèmbïì, weèe aè tee btu neè Nyúè, aè ka' ba seè'ni, Nyúè aè koosïìmnse neè weèe njobeè' nteèetu beèe Isráèl.	For as you in time past were disobedient to God, but now have obtained mercy by their disobedience,
Nyúè e ke fa woweèe njáèá ñger ca njobeè' e koèñ bjep ka'. E koèñ beèe ce a túr cumúnyañ. AÈmboè yi yu aè bcor wááwá, baná wee bbyeèñge a ka' niñ coêr, a fa laèa yuu ka', njobeè' ncir Nyúè yi byemi ená woweèe a ka' niñ coêr, a lor yaèp nyor njep nsheè aèmboè ncir Nyúè yi laèa.	for God is not a God of confusion, but of peace. As in all the assemblies of the saints, let your wives keep silent in the assemblies, for it has not been permitted for them to speak; but let them be in subjection, as the law also says.
A ka' laèa wa'a, a ce ye neè mce nje mmïìr, a túúshi ye neè bdúè'. Beèe mo' a lip ye neè mmbo,	Then they spit in his face and beat him with their fists, and some slapped him,
Zhisèe ŋgʉp zhi kweŋger e.	Our fowls are dead.
Yu njo' Jisoès ce seèe wááwá aè túr yú' e mo'sir, a koni fáñ aè rtáá aè bsii Taèr.	For through him we both have our access in one Spirit to the Father.
E beesïì enáê, “Yi boèñ ená a lor byee boo ma' neè ñgwe ka'.”	"But he answered, ""It is not appropriate to take the children's bread and throw it to the dogs."""
Beèe ncoèp-baa-aè-msaèamba caè a du a kúti neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè a laa enáê, “Tataê, mnyúâmkaè' foñ a yu'ni neè weèr njo' lo rlii.”	"The seventy returned with joy, saying, ""Lord, even the demons are subject to us in your name!"""
Nyúè Taèr aè m rïìñ weèe wáá, a ka' ce weèe, yi yú' yi gee weèe aè ba brara, tá weèe bo yu'ni neè Jisos Kraêis, tá Nyúè ñwañshi weèe neè bláá Jisoès. M ce loo máná Nyúè túr ntee boèñboñ neè weèe seê, ker gee tá weèe cu neè rfúteè-ñwáè boèñboñ seê.	according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, in sanctification of the Spirit, that you may obey Jesus Christ and be sprinkled with his blood: Grace to you and peace be multiplied.
AÈ ka ba njobeè' weèe aè túr ba ñgeâe fi seè'ni na, jáá jáèá jáá ker ba fa weâe mú ka'. Jus a yu jáá efa beèe enje jáá ka'. Beèe ce a geèe búè a yu jáá efa beèe ce a yu mbáè'nsúèr ka'. Ñwáâ aè rïìñ yu jáá ka'. Nfuu bkaè' a yu jáá ka. Jáá jáèá jáá yu aègho mbetar bkwaèa ba boo ka'. Woweèe wááwá a ku ba byáánïì njobeè' a ce yá seè'ni ba Jisos Kraêis, aè ba ye ce e túr beèe wááwá.	where there can't be Greek and Jew, circumcision and uncircumcision, barbarian, Scythian, bondservant, freeman; but Christ is all, and in all.
Beèe ce a m ba yap entombïì naè, a lapnïì ye a laa ená e cu nyañ. E ker misi yi yu a waa goèr a laa enáê, “Muu Dávïìd, koosimnse neè máè.”	"Those who led the way rebuked him, that he should be quiet; but he cried out all the more, ""You son of David, have mercy on me!"""
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Weèe yi yuu ce weèe ce bipshi ka'. AÈde' weèe no enjep ndoñ ce m be no enjo a?” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “AÈde' weèr no enjo.”	"But Jesus answered, ""You don't know what you are asking. Are you able to drink the cup that I am about to drink, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with?"" They said to him, ""We are able."""
E m ba njep ñgoèñ. Ñgoèñ ca aè m geèe ye aè ñger Nyúè. Ñgoèñ yi m rïìñ ye ka'.	He was in the world, and the world was made through him, and the world didn't recognize him.
E be keè vúè aè noèñ anaè tá yïì beèe ce a byemi neè ye a ku'si ye keèr vúse ye. Weèe be keè ba aè múè beèe ca njobeè' weèe aè byemi blaâa Nyúè ce weèr aè m feè'shi neè weèe.	when he comes to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired among all those who have believed (because our testimony to you was believed) in that day.
Buu bïìr ce weèr ce maè' bïìr aègho yu ba buu bïìr enjep ñgoèñ na ka'. Weèr ce maè' ba neè buu bïìr vïû Nyúè ce vi túr ñger, a ce saè'si bdïì' ce yer ñgaâa bbaèa a cu.	for the weapons of our warfare are not of the flesh, but mighty before God to the throwing down of strongholds,
Rïìñ neè ená Jisos Kraâis ce e yu ñwáè, yu yáánïì a Nyúè aè buu wááwá.	For in him all the fullness of the Godhead dwells bodily,
E m yi yuu ce e laa ka' njobeè' woweèe a m ce wáp seê.	For he didn't know what to say, for they were very afraid.
E ròo zhii mbàa cà, a yɛ.	She searched for her money and found it.
Beèe ñkwe Rum ca a m bipshi buu neè máè, a koñ aè rmaè'shi máè njobeè' máè m geèe yuu mo' ce a m ba yú máè aètu mo ka'.	who, when they had examined me, desired to set me free, because there was no cause of death in me.
“Kúú Nyúè yi yu foñ aèmboè rraa ce a m maè' njep roè, a koo nca njo njáèá jáá jáèá jáá.	"Again, the Kingdom of Heaven is like a dragnet, that was cast into the sea, and gathered some fish of every kind,
Matthew	Matïìyoè	13	48	Yi ka' ruu njo, ñgaâa ñkoo nca a súñ a ko'si mbe ñkúè, a cu aè nsheè, a capshi nca yïû boèñboñ a lá aè mñkaèa, a lor yïû bebep a ma'.	which, when it was filled, they drew up on the beach. They sat down, and gathered the good into containers, but the bad they threw away.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	13	49	A mboè yi be keèe ba wa'a aè nfeè' ce ñgoèñ yi ce mïì. Bcïìndap Nyúè a be keèe vúè, fúshi beâe bbebep efa múè beèe ce a yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè,	So will it be in the end of the world. The angels will come forth, and separate the wicked from among the righteous,
Matthew	Matïìyoè	13	50	maè' woweèe njep mor ce beèe a be keèe ce warse ce kúr msoèñ njo.”	and will cast them into the furnace of fire. There will be the weeping and the gnashing of teeth."
Nyúè aè túr woweèe aè ntee boèñboñ, a gee woweèe aè ba byáánïì a yeâ bsii. E m geèe wa'a neè woweèe aè cicïì. Jisoès Kraâis a ñwáè ce e m geèe ená yi ba wa'a, a tee seèe efa ñgá'.	being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus;
Noèñ elúèsimbuèu efa ñkaè' anaè aè m ba noâñ goèr. AÈ ka' ba aè noèñ anaè, Jisoès aè natïì mbekïì a laa neè ñger-ñwáè enáê, “Ntee yi ka' ce yuushi ñwáè, ñgaèñ vú yá máè, no yuu.	"Now on the last and greatest day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried out, ""If anyone is thirsty, let him come to me and drink!"
Ñger wááwá yi yu mbaè mmbo Nyúè ce e yu yïìseèe Taê. E yu seè'ni na. E m ba, aè ku ba ye ce e be keè vúè. E m laèa enáê, “A máè Alfaè a ker ba OÈmágaè.”	"I am the Alpha and the Omega, says the Lord God, ""who is and who was and who is to come, the Almighty."""
Weèe rïìñ ñwáè ce weâe ke loo neè ye ka'. Weèr rïìñ ñwáè ce wer ke loo neè ye njobeè' rluèñ li ke loè ba ese Juês.	You worship that which you don't know. We worship that which we know; for salvation is from the Jews.
Beèe mo' efa ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ká' a ce laèa a waâp mú enáê, “Yuu ce e laèa neè seèe na yi yu ba ená ká? E laèa enáê, ‘Nfeè' múcaèr tá weèe yá máè ka', e ba nfeè' múcaèr tá weèe yá máè’, a ker laa foñ enáê, ‘Njobeè' m ce duè aè ryá Taèr’ njoká?”	"Some of his disciples therefore said to one another, ""What is this that he says to us, 'A little while, and you won't see me, and again a little while, and you will see me;' and, 'Because I go to the Father?'"""
Ca a yoo bàa tàraʼwɛ̀ a?	Is this your personal bag?
Bcïìndap Nyúè saèamba ce a m vúè neè mñgá' saèamba naè a fúú embe dïì' Nyúè anaè. Woweèe a m yar bcáâ' bbúú ce vi m ce fúp seê. Woweèe a m cúú kúè cáè' ce a geèe neè gul nje ñguèñ.	The seven angels who had the seven plagues came out, clothed with pure, bright linen, and wearing golden sashes around their breasts.
E laa neè ye enáê, “Vúè.” Pitaè aè fúú embe keñ a jár mbenduè rdip a ce duè aè ryá Jisoès.	"He said, ""Come!"" Peter stepped down from the boat, and walked on the waters to come to Jesus."
Woweèe a ka' ce duè, a tarte a ñwáè moâ' aè rla' Saèireên, ce a m ce too ená Saimúèn. A koo ye aè ñger ená e byá' kïìntaa.	As they came out, they found a man of Cyrene, Simon by name, and they compelled him to go with them, that he might carry his cross.
Mfaè' ce beèe a ke geèe mi ku ba jáá jáèá jáá foñ. Ka' yi yu wa'a, Tata Jisoès ce a ce faè' neè ye ku ba moè'sir.	There are various kinds of service, and the same Lord.
Woweèe a ka' yá ená weèe ker ce geèe ku' njáèá buu bbebep ce weèe woweèe aè m ce geèe naè ka', a bááñger, a ce cáp weèe.	They think it is strange that you don't run with them into the same excess of riot, blaspheming:
Fa báèáñger njobeè' máè laèa neè wáè ená a be kuè keèr bi ñwáè nfeè' baa ka'.	Don't marvel that I said to you, 'You must be born anew.'
AÈde' beèe a du fe'shi aè njáâá ká ce a ka' tá tuu woweèe ka'? Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè. A sañ mbo enáê, “Mkuèu beèe ce a vúè a ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ mi boèñ aèmboè ká wa'a!”	"And how will they preach unless they are sent? As it is written: ""How beautiful are the feet of those who preach the Good News of peace, who bring glad tidings of good things!"""
Yi ka' ba wa'a, Baènabaès aè natïì a du aè rla' Tasoès aè rroèo Soêl.	Barnabas went out to Tarsus to look for Saul.
Loo neè neè weèr. Weèr rïìñ neè mini-ñwáè ená yer ntee yi yu rara.	Pray for us, for we are persuaded that we have a good conscience, desiring to live honorably in all things.
E m yɛ yuu ŋkar zhì a gani.	She saw her friendʼs property and coveted it.
Jisoès aè ka' duè mbe ndaèp mbe Pitaè, a yá aèmboè malu yïì Pitaè noèñ, tu yi ce luu ye.	When Jesus came into Peter's house, he saw his wife's mother lying sick with a fever.
E ka' yá aèmboè beèe ce a m be naè a ce tañni aè rcu ba mbe mnta' bboèñboñ, e ma' ñgaèa neè woweèe enáê,	He spoke a parable to those who were invited, when he noticed how they chose the best seats, and said to them,
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' ñger ce Nyúè aè fa neè máè njo' yi ntee boèñboñ, m ce laèa neè weèe wááwá ená ñwáè fa kwaè'shi aèmboè yi tu, caèa embe dïì' ce e ba kwaè'shi ka'. Kwaè'shi aèmboè yo tu ba aè njïû yáánïì. Ñwáè wááwá ku kwa'shi aèmboè yi tu ba aèndeèe rbyemïì ce Nyúè aè fa ye.	For I say, through the grace that was given me, to every man who is among you, not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but to think reasonably, as God has apportioned to each person a measure of faith.
Beèe a m vúè neè bghaèrbeèe ená Jisoès bo joèo woweèe, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a lapnïì beèe anaè.	They were bringing to him little children, that he should touch them, but the disciples rebuked those who were bringing them.
Bfúr weêr, weèr ce koèñ ená weèe riñ yuu ce yi be loè koni beèe ce a kweñger wáá naè, faè dïì' weèe bo ce koosimnse aèmboè beèe ce a ke keè' rcu ce nfeseè ka' naè ka'.	But we don't want you to be ignorant, brothers, concerning those who have fallen asleep, so that you don't grieve like the rest, who have no hope.
Nfúraè, njáèá rkoèñnïì ce aè túr neè beèe Nyúè li geèe máè ce lu'shi, a ker tapsi máè. Wáè koèñ woweèe wa'a, a gee wap mntee vi fúteè.	For we have much joy and comfort in your love, because the hearts of the saints have been refreshed through you, brother.
Woweèe a be keè laèa yuu kuèu yuu ce woweèe a ce geèe na neè ñwáè ce e tami nyor aè rsa' beèe ce a cu bteèe ker ba beèe ce a kweñger.	who will give account to him who is ready to judge the living and the dead.
AÈ m ba nyúè moè' Jisoès aè táá aèwaâa ma túâ Gáènásaráèt, kúr beèe a sir ye a kaari a tarte tá a bo yu' blaâa Nyúè.	Now it happened, while the multitude pressed on him and heard the word of God, that he was standing by the lake of Gennesaret.
Ncïìndap Nyúè ce e m ce laèa neè máè naè aè m túr mú co' saèsap ce a m geèe neè guêl. AÈ m ba co' ce a m ce feè' buu aègho. E m túr co' anaè tá e bo feè' rla' ca, feè' ñka' ce a boo a sir rla' ca aègho, keèr feè' bcuèu ñka' anaè.	He who spoke with me had for a measure, a golden reed, to measure the city, its gates, and its walls.
Weèe aè ka' ce sa' mnsa', weèe fa fyá' mmir beèe ka', weèe sa' teni yáánïì.”	"Don't judge according to appearance, but judge righteous judgment."""
Ŋwàʼ zhi nòŋ njeptii kìdàŋ.	The book is lying under the bench.
Seèe aè ka' gee wa'a, baná yi be geèe tá seèe yi ená seèe yu ñgaâa mini, keèr tapsi viseèe mntee aè bsii Nyúè	And by this we know that we are of the truth, and persuade our hearts before him,
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Wee weèe e ke fúú enjep mncir Nyúè njo' ndeèe weêe bta njoká?	"He answered them, ""Why do you also disobey the commandment of God because of your tradition?"
Nyúè aè ka' coo, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a du a yá ye, a laa neè ye enáê, “Seèe yu aènjïìsaèp efa mla', nyúè aè ce coo. Laèa tá beèe ca a duse aè mlaè' tá a bo duè yuu byee, ye.”	"When evening had come, his disciples came to him, saying, ""This place is deserted, and the hour is already late. Send the multitudes away, that they may go into the villages, and buy themselves food."""
Jisoès aè ka' ce niñ mbe keñ, ñwáè ce byú' mnyúâmkaè' vi m fúú enjep ye naè aè loo ená e be duè a ye.	As he was entering into the boat, he who had been possessed by demons begged him that he might be with him.
ÁÈpafraès ce weèr ye aè niñ shañ bsïìp aètu Jisos Kraêis, aè caè'ni wáè.	Epaphras, my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus, greets you,
Caè'ni neè AÈmplatoès ce e yu ñkaraè ce wa mntee, ce weèr ye yu aèbee weèr Tata weèe naè.	Greet Amplias, my beloved in the Lord.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè wáè ce aè yu ñwáè Nyúè, cañ efa gee buu ca. Láè ntee ce gee ba ñgeâe yáánïì, cu ba rcu ce Nyúè koèñ, lá ntee neè Nyúè, koñ beèe, táá tatap, ba múfáèá aè yo ñgeèe.	But you, man of God, flee these things, and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, and gentleness.
Woweèe a m fúr ye efa múè rla' a túúshi neè bluèr. Beèe ce a m táá njïìnsa' mbe kansuèr naè a m láè wap bcáè' njeptii mbañruèñwáè moè' ce a m ce too ená Soêl.	They threw him out of the city, and stoned him. The witnesses placed their garments at the feet of a young man named Saul.
Yáê, m be duè tá m tuusi yuu ce yaè Ta aè m kaè'ni naè neè weèe. Baná weèe cu aè rla' ca, caar tá ñger embe buèu yi suu mbe weâe nduè.”	"Behold, I send forth the promise of my Father on you. But wait in the city of Jerusalem until you are clothed with power from on high."""
Jisoès aè natïì a du aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè, a ker du aè ñgoâñ neèñguu rdip Jodaèn. Ku' beèe a ker vúse aè ryá ye, e yá'ni woweèe aèmboè e m ku ce yá'ni beèe naè.	He arose from there and came into the borders of Judea and beyond the Jordan. Multitudes came together to him again. As he usually did, he was again teaching them.
Yi m ba yáánïì ená e beeñger ba aèmboè bfúr vi aè mnduunjïì wááwá, tá e bo ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ce e be faè' neè Nyúè neè mini-ñwáè, koosimnse neè beèe, tá e bo maa yaèp buu bbebep.	Therefore he was obligated in all things to be made like his brothers, that he might become a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make atonement for the sins of the people.
Tanyʉ̀ à fʉr muu embe ŋwàʼ.	Tanyu has removed the child from school.
A ker ba foñ, “Luèr ce beèe a ce kote aègho, a ce gweèñger.” Woweèe a ce kote aègho njobeè' woweèe a byemi Nlaâa Nyúè ka'. Nyúè aè m geèe ená yi ba wa'a.	"and, ""a stone of stumbling, and a rock of offense."" For they stumble at the word, being disobedient, to which also they were appointed."
Gheèter vú ghaèagheèr vú yá máè,	Be diligent to come to me soon,
E ka' ye, baná wáè ce wáè túr bfee naè, wáè bepsi nfúroè ce Jisos Kraâis aè m kwe neè ye.	And through your knowledge, he who is weak perishes, the brother for whose sake Christ died.
M ce koèñ máná m caasi yoè nfeè' ka', a ce bu' mmbo neè wáè ená aè fa mú nfeè' moè', yu' yuu ce weèr be suñ wáè.	But, that I don't delay you, I entreat you to bear with us and hear a few words.
E m ker laa neè woweèe foñ enáê, “AÈde' ñwáè cú' laêm, lor ghee kúpshi aègho, káè tár mbaè kaèasi a? AÈmboè e be tár ba mbe dïì' ce lam e ke táá a?	"He said to them, ""Is the lamp brought to be put under a basket or under a bed? Isn't it put on a stand?"
E beesïì a laa neè ñwáè anaè enáê, “Yaè ma yu nda, bfúr wa aè ba weèe ká?”	"But he answered him who spoke to him, ""Who is my mother? Who are my brothers?"""
M rïìñ máná yuu boèñboñ mo' yi yu njep máâ ntee ka', m ce laèa ba buu ce m ce koèñ aèmboè ñwáè. Ntee aè rgeèe yuu boèñboñ yi yu njep rbúè, mmbo aè rgeèe yuu anaè mi ba ka'.	For I know that in me, that is, in my flesh, dwells no good thing. For desire is present with me, but I don't find it doing that which is good.
Ñwáè moè' e ke rïìñ yuu ce ñwáè moè' ce kwaè'shi ka'. E ke kuâ rïìñ ñwáè yuu ce yi yu njep yeâ ntee. Yi ku ba foñ ená aède' ñwáè moè' riñ yuu ce Nyúè ce kwaè'shi ka'. Ku ba ba Yú' Nyúè ce yi rïìñ yuu ce Nyúè ce kwaè'shi.	For who among men knows the things of a man, except the spirit of the man, which is in him? Even so, no one knows the things of God, except God's Spirit.
Woweèe a beesïì ka', njobeè' woweèe a m ce sár ená ñwáè ce e yu ñwáâ ñgoèr efa woweèe a nda lá?	But they were silent, for they had disputed one with another on the way about who was the greatest.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce Jakoèp aè m ce kwe, rbyemïì li m geèe e ghonïì boo mmbañruè a baa ce Josáèf aè m túr. AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' anaè e too nyor aè mbaèñ a gú'shi neè Nyúè.	By faith, Jacob, when he was dying, blessed each of the sons of Joseph, and worshiped, leaning on the top of his staff.
Yi yu boèñboñ ená weèe kur ntee tá weèe bo geèe yuu ce Nyúè koèñ, koni yuu ce e kaè' ená e be fa weèe naè.	For you need endurance so that, having done the will of God, you may receive the promise.
Jisos Kraâis ce e yu Muu Nyúè, yu ñwáè ce e ke byemi ker kani ka'. Yu ye ce weèr Timotïì ba Silaès aè m ce feè'shi aèmboè ye aè nfeè' ce weèr aè m ba a weâe mú naè. E yu ñwáè ce e ce duèñshi ená Nyúè e ke laèa ená áèno, ku táá ba njo,	"For the Son of God, Jesus Christ, who was preached among you by us, by me, Silvanus, and Timothy, was not ""Yes and no,"" but in him is ""Yes."""
Yuu ce m ce laèa yi yu ená weèe ma'shi tá Yú' Nyúè yi ke'ni weèe faè dïì' weèe bo geèe ba yuu ce yeè nyor ce koèñ ka'.	But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you won't fulfill the lust of the flesh.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe aè m ba aèbee naè, Nyúè aè fa weèe njáèá ncoèo moè' ce e ce duèñshi ená weèe yu yïì beèe. Ncoèo anaè yu ba búè ce a geèe neè mmbo aèmboè Jus a ce geèe naè ka', yu ba njáèá ncoèo yïì Jisos Kraêis. Njáèá ncoèo ca yu ba ncoèo enjep ntee, ce e yu ená weèe bii geèe buu bbebep aèmboè weèe aè m ce geèe naè ka'.	in whom you were also circumcised with a circumcision not made with hands, in the putting off of the body of the sins of the flesh, in the circumcision of Christ;
Tá yi ñger yi cu nfeseè. Yi yu wa'a.	To him be the glory and the power forever and ever. Amen.
Máâ Poêl, m ce bu' mmbo neè weèe. Beèe a ce laèa ená má ke ba a weâe mú ce wáp, e ba aè nfeè' m yu aèfo ka', m sañ ñwaè' tatap neè weèe. M ce loo neè weèe aè rlii Jisoès ce e túr rbonïì, a ba múnyañ ená,	Now I Paul, myself, entreat you by the humility and gentleness of Christ; I who in your presence am lowly among you, but being absent am bold toward you.
Weèe fa kuè ce faè' ba aè nfeè' ce woweèe a ce yá weèe tá woweèe a bo yu' rboèñ neè weèe ka'. Weèe aè ba kuushi ba ená weèe yu ñgaâa mfaè' neè Kraêis, loèr ye ntee wááwá geèe ba yuu ce Nyúè koèñ.	not in the way of service only when eyes are on you, as men pleasers; but as servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;
Mɛ̀ bip muunje anà e byemì mɛ̀.	I requested that girl (for marriage) (and) she accepted.
To' Sodoèm ba to' Goèmoraè foñ, ker ba mla' ce mi m ba aègee bto' ca a m ce geèe bsaèrbuu, a ce geèe mnyáâr seê. Woweèe a ce yá ñgá' njep mor ce aède' yi liitïì aè nfeè' moè' ka'. Cena yi ce duèñshi seèe yuu ce yi be koni neè beèe ce a ce geèe njáèá ñgeèe anaè foñ.	Even as Sodom and Gomorrah, and the cities around them, having, in the same way as these, given themselves over to sexual immorality and gone after strange flesh, are set forth as an example, suffering the punishment of eternal fire.
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Wáná aè be kwe njo' máè lá! M ce suñ wáè neè mini- ñwáè ená tá nduñgúp ka' toñ, aè be kani ená aè rïìñ máè ka' ñkaèraè' taar.	"Jesus answered him, ""Will you lay down your life for me? Most certainly I tell you, the rooster won't crow until you have denied me three times."
“AÈde' ñwáè cú' laêm, ker lor ghee kúpshi aègho káè tár mbaè kaèasi ka'. Ñwáè aè ka' cú' laêm, baná ñgaèñ be tár ba mbe tábuèr, tá beèe ce a ce niñ mbe ndaèp a bo yá rraa.	"No one, when he has lit a lamp, covers it with a container, or puts it under a bed; but puts it on a stand, that those who enter in may see the light.
Luke	Luêk	8	17	Yi yu foñ ená yuu mo' yi yu ce a súèti ce yi be keè buu efa ryááti aèwañ ka'. Yuu mo' yi yu ce a tá'shi ce a be keè buu efa rrïìñ tá yi yááti aèwañ ka'.	For nothing is hidden, that will not be revealed; nor anything secret, that will not be known and come to light.
Luke	Luêk	8	18	Baná weèe lor nfeè' aè njáèá njïì ce weèe ce yu' buu. Ñwáè ce e ka' túr yuu baná a be fa ye buu moè'. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá túr yuu ka', baná a be koo ka' mú yïì ce e ce kwaè'shi ená e túr naè ese ye.”	Be careful therefore how you hear. For whoever has, to him will be given; and whoever doesn't have, from him will be taken away even that which he thinks he has."
Beèe mo' efa ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoâs aè rla' Sisaèriyaè anaè a du weèr woweèe, a lor weèr a du aègho mbe ndaèp Nasïìn ce e m ba ñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Saiproès. A ñwáè ce weèr aè m ce duè aè rcu weèr woweèe. E m ba moè' efa beèe entombïì ce a m byemi neè Jisoès.	Some of the disciples from Caesarea also went with us, bringing one Mnason of Cyprus, an early disciple, with whom we would stay.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe fa woweèe yuu tá a ye.” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “Weèr ku túr ba mntu' bráâd vi taê, ba nca yi baa. Baná weèr du yuu byee neè ku' beèe ca wááwá a?”	"But he said to them, ""You give them something to eat."" They said, ""We have no more than five loaves and two fish, unless we should go and buy food for all these people."""
moè' aè ba Joèanaè ce e m ba ñgwa Kusaè ce e m ba tu rfaè' embe ndaèp Hároèd. Suèsanaè aè ba moè' foñ, ker ba bbyeèñge mo' aèñgoo. Bbyeèñge ca a m jaè' Jisoès weèe neè yap mbaèa ba yaèp buu ce a m túr.	and Joanna, the wife of Chuzas, Herod's steward; Susanna; and many others; who served them from their possessions.
Nteèendúñ ca aè ku ce caèa, a ce fa weèr ñgá' seê. Túè' aè ka' raa, woweèe a ká' a ce fúshi buu embe keñ a ce maè'ri njep roè.	As we labored exceedingly with the storm, the next day they began to throw things overboard.
máè kwe. Máè yá máná mncir ce a m fa tá beèe a bo koni ryoèñ naè, vi geèe máè kwe kwe.	The commandment, which was for life, this I found to be for death;
AÈmboè weèe aè rïìñ buu ca wáá na, weèe ku ce gee boèñboñ aèmboè weèe ce geèe naè. Ñwáè wááwá efa weâe mú fa ñger neè nfúr moè', ja' nfúr moè' tá e táá tatap.	Therefore exhort one another, and build each other up, even as you also do.
Ka' seèe rïìñ wa'a, ñwáè lor nfeè' faè dïì' njáèá ñger ce Nyúè aè m fa neè ye ená e ye buu naè, yi lo geèe tá bfúr mo' ce map mkwaè'shïì mi ce fa woweèe ñgá' naè, a lo gweè ka'.	But be careful that by no means does this liberty of yours become a stumbling block to the weak.
Yáê, nfeè' ce gháá, e gháá wáá, ce weèe be da'se, tá ñwáè wááwá kúti fa yeâ laè', maè'shi máè mamñgi'. M be ba mamñgi' ka', njobeè' Taèr ku ba weèr ye.	Behold, the time is coming, yes, and has now come, that you will be scattered, everyone to his own place, and you will leave me alone. Yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.
“Múè' neè wee btuè', yu' yuu ce m ce suñ weèe na boèñboñ. A be loèr Muu Ñwáè fa mbaè mmbo beèe.”	Let these words sink into your ears, for the Son of Man will be delivered up into the hands of men.
Mbèŋ be kù gwè àbnòŋ ca.	It will rain one of these days.
Yi yu aètáèr neè kaèmál aè rtose nje rlir nsaèraè' neè ñwáè mbaèa aè rniñ mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè.”	"For it is easier for a camel to enter in through a needle's eye, than for a rich man to enter into the Kingdom of God."""
Caè'ni Prïûskaè ba AÈkwilaè ker ba beèe embe ndaèp OÈnisiforoès.	Greet Prisca and Aquila, and the house of Onesiphorus.
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè ce aè yu ñwáè ryá'nïû aè to' Isráèl, wáè rïìñ buu ca ka' a?”	"Jesus answered him, ""Are you the teacher of Israel, and don't understand these things?"
Geewa'a, yi yu aètáèr neè rbuu ba nshe aè rmïì, neè yïì ce ená a co' mbúè nlaèa moè' embe Ñwaè' Mncir.	But it is easier for heaven and earth to pass away, than for one tiny stroke of a pen in the law to fall.
E fa vi njo' bee ce a ce saèki, ba mmbañruè ce a ce noèñ a mmbañruè mo', ba beèe ce a ce yáèá beèe ce fyeèni aè bkwaèa, ba ñgaâa nya' mnde', ker ba ñgaâa ntáá njïìnsa' mnaèñ, ker ba njáèá ñgeèe wááwá ce beèe a ce geèe yi ba jáá efa ryá'nïì mini.	for the sexually immoral, for homosexuals, for slave-traders, for liars, for perjurers, and for any other thing contrary to the sound doctrine;
Woweèe a ce laèa wa'a, ñkúú beesi neè woweèe enáê, ‘M ce suñ weèe neè mini- ñwáè ená aèmboè weèe aè m geèe buu ca neè ñwáâ ñká' efa múè bfúr wa ca na, weèe aè m geèe ba neè máè.’	"The King will answer them, 'Most certainly I tell you, inasmuch as you did it to one of the least of these my brothers, you did it to me.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	25	41	E laèa wa' mïìsi, laa neè beâe aè bo ñkoèp enáê, ‘Ndoèo aè co' weèe, loè neè efa máâ geñ, du njep mor ce aède' yi liitïì ka', ce a toèo neè Sataèn ba vi bcïìndap,	Then he will say also to those on the left hand, 'Depart from me, you cursed, into the eternal fire which is prepared for the devil and his angels;
Matthew	Matïìyoè	25	42	njobeè' njeè aè m ce yañ máè, weèe aè fa máè byee ka'. Ntee yi m ce yuushi máè, weèe aè fa máè yuu no ka'.	for I was hungry, and you didn't give me food to eat; I was thirsty, and you gave me no drink;
Matthew	Matïìyoè	25	43	Máè m ba kïìloè, weèe aè konïì máè ka', a ba mbuèuriñ, weèe aè fa máè bcáè' ka', a ce yañ a ker ba mbe shañ, weèe aè ca'nïì máè ka'.’	I was a stranger, and you didn't take me in; naked, and you didn't clothe me; sick, and in prison, and you didn't visit me.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	25	44	E laèa wa'a, woweèe a bipshi neè ye enáê, ‘Tataê, weèr aè m yá wáè aè se'ká, njeè aè ce yañ wáè, káè ntee yi ce yuushi wáè, káè wáè ba kïìloè, káè wáè ba mbuèuriñ, káè wáè ba mbe shañ áè, a ke' ja' wáè ka'?’	Then they will also answer, saying, 'Lord, when did we see you hungry, or thirsty, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and didn't help you?'"
M ce wɛp enɛ m̀ be gwè njep rò.	I am afraid that I will fall into the stream.
Woweèe a m yu' ncep ce e m fa, a ka' ká' ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès, a lip woweèe, a laa neè woweèe ená woweèe a fa keèr laèa yuu mo' aè rlii Jisoès ka'. A ka' laèa wa'a, a ma'shi woweèe ená woweèe a duê.	They agreed with him. Summoning the apostles, they beat them and commanded them not to speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.
Bfúr waê, m ce koèñ máná weèe riñ ená yu nfeè' magoèr ce má ke loè kwa'shi ená m vú yá weèe. caar ba' ntïìni na, máâ kwaè'shi wa'a, yuu mo' yi ku jepsi máè. M ce koèñ aè rgeèe tá beèe a byemi neè Jisoès tá la rfaè' li ba neè sá'-ñwáè a weâe mú aèmboè li yu neè beèe enje jáá foñ naè.	Now I don't desire to have you unaware, brothers, that I often planned to come to you, and was hindered so far, that I might have some fruit among you also, even as among the rest of the Gentiles.
Ñwáè moè' aè m be yá Nyúè ka'. Seèe ka' koñni, Nyúè cu njep seèe, seèe koñnïì seê, du misïî.	No one has seen God at any time. If we love one another, God remains in us, and his love has been perfected in us.
A be ruusi mntoèñ wááwá, káèáshi mtuèu wááwá tá mi kúti mmbo'. A be naèshi mnduunjïì ce vi gooñger tá vi ba kuèyáá, kupshi vïì ce vi yu koteè-koteè tá vi ba nfáâñ.	Every valley will be filled. Every mountain and hill will be brought low. The crooked will become straight, and the rough ways smooth.
Njè à koo mɛ̀ banɛ m̀ be dù boŋ bzhee.	I am starving, so I will go and beg food.
Ñwáè wááwá efa weâe mú cep yi tu tá e bo geèe ba yuu ce Nyúè koèñ ená e gee neè yïì nyor, aè ba yuu ce beèe wááwá a ce yu' rboèñ aègho.	that each one of you know how to possess himself of his own vessel in sanctification and honor,
Ñwáè ce e m cu mbe kaèbaèraè' naè aè laa enáê, “Yáê, m be geèe ba buu bfi seè'ni.” E m ker laa enáê, “Sañ blaèa ca njobeè' yu blaèa ce aède' vi caa aè cicïì ka', vi yu mini.”	"He who sits on the throne said, ""Behold, I am making all things new."" He said, ""Write, for these words of God are faithful and true."""
Ñwáè bbaèa ce e m byeè yi ba ñke' naè aè ba Sataèn. Nfeè' ntee msañ yu nfeè' ce ñgoèñ yi ce mïì, ñgaâa rtee a ba bcïìndap Nyúè.	The enemy who sowed them is the devil. The harvest is the end of the age, and the reapers are angels.
Máâ ke gheèter aè nfeè' wááwá aè rfeè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ anaè aè bdïì' ce beèe a m be yu' rlii Kraâis ka'. Máâ ke geèe wa'a, faè dïì' m bo baè'ri mbenduè kuèundap ce ñwáè moè' aè boo ka'.	yes, making it my aim to preach the Good News, not where Christ was already named, that I might not build on another's foundation.
Seâe yoèñshi Nyúè aè ku' li rfa ce aède' seèe túr cuèu aè rsuñ ka' naè.	Now thanks be to God for his unspeakable gift!
E nyáá mbekïì a táá, a ká' a ce jáèr, a du mbe Ndaèp Nyúè a woweèe, a ka' baè' mbo e ce jáèr mbo, a ce nyáshi mbekïì, a ce kuè'si Nyúè.	Leaping up, he stood, and began to walk. He entered with them into the temple, walking, leaping, and praising God.
Msañ mi ka' kuè', buèr, ñke' caè yi yáátïì seè'ni aè ñke'.	But when the blade sprang up and brought forth fruit, then the darnel weeds appeared also.
Yïì beèe a ka' yu' wa'a, a du aè rkoo ye njobeè' woweèe a m ce kwaè'shi ená tu yi ce kar ye.	"When his friends heard it, they went out to seize him: for they said, ""He is insane."""
Le ryoèñ yu Jisos Kraêis. Be keè ba aè nfeè' ce e nyáá, tá weèe woweèe ba aèbee, tá weèe túr ñgúè' moè' efa foèo ce Nyúè aè fa neè ye.	When Christ, our life, is revealed, then you will also be revealed with him in glory.
Seèe rïìñ ená Nyúè aè m loèr nfaèñ njeñwáè a boo mbañruèñwáè aègho ka'. E m loèr nfaèñ mbañruèñwáè a boo njeñwáè aègho.	For man is not from woman, but woman from man;
Ca yi geèe weèe aè ce lu'shi seê, ka' weèe be yu' ryañ seè'ni na njo' rmoèoshïì ce li be vúè neè weèe aè mú nfeè' moè', aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá wa'a.	Wherein you greatly rejoice, though now for a little while, if need be, you have been put to grief in various trials,
Weèr aè m ce kwaè'shi ená weèr aè kweñger wáá. Geewa'a, ñgá' ca aè m koni weèr tá weèr bo kuè láè buu wááwá mbe mmbo Nyúè ce e ke fúr beèe efa rkwe, ke' ba mbe weâr mmboè ka'.	Yes, we ourselves have had the sentence of death within ourselves, that we should not trust in ourselves, but in God who raises the dead,
Bfúr weêr, aè ka' ba aèmboè rvúè Tata Jisos Kraêis, ker ba nfeè' ce seèe Jisoès weèe be tarte, weèr ce laèa neè weèe ená,	Now, brothers, concerning the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and our gathering together to him, we ask you
Buu bbebep aè m ku ba njep ñgoèñ tá Nyúè ka' keè fa vi mncir. Mncir vi ka' tá ba aègho ka', aède' a be' buu bbebep ce ñwáè aè geèe ka'.	For until the law, sin was in the world; but sin is not charged when there is no law.
Ñwáè moè' aè vú a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Yáê! Beèe ce weèe aè mú li' mbe shañ naè, a yu mbe Ndaèp Nyúè, a ce yá'ni beèe mbo.”	"One came and told them, ""Behold, the men whom you put in prison are in the temple, standing and teaching the people."""
Bgúâú beèe anaè vi be noèñ aè nduunjïì aè múè rla' Nyúè anaè, aè ba rla' ce li yu rgoèr, aè ba rla' ce a m taa yaèp ñkúú aèfo mbe kïìntaa naè. A m fa mlii mo' neè rla' anaè aè rduèñshi njáèá njïì ce li m ba. Rmo' li m ba ená Sodoèm, rmo' li ba ená Ijïìp.	Their dead bodies will be in the street of the great city, which spiritually is called Sodom and Egypt, where also their Lord was crucified.
Weèe aè ba ba beèe enjep ñgoèñ na, woweèe a ba koèñ weèe njobeè' weèe yu yaèp beèe. Geewa'a weèe yu ye beèe enjep ñgoèñ na ka'. Máè ce weèe efa múè beèe enjep ñgoèñ na. A mbuèu ce woweèe a baèa weèe.	If you were of the world, the world would love its own. But because you are not of the world, since I chose you out of the world, therefore the world hates you.
Àdeʼ seesèe foŋ ku gêe.	We too can do it.
E ta mbʉ nè ŋgar.	He shot the goat with a gun.
Nyúè aè m geèe buu bbáèá, a duñshi yi ñger aè mnduunjïì jáá jáèá jáá, a ker lor ñger ce yi ke vúè ese yi Yú' Rara, a gapshi neè beèe aèmboè e m koèñ, tá beèe a bo rïìñ foñ ená blaèa ca vi yu mini. Ŋgwe ce waa.	The dog is barking.
Geewa'a, mncir vi ce geèe yi, ntee yi ce bep Nyúè neè beèe bep. Mncir vi ka' tá ba ka', ñwáè bú' mncir ka'.	For the law works wrath, for where there is no law, neither is there disobedience.
Woweèe a ker túr rïìtu ka'. Woweèe a niñ njep múè bsaèrbuu, a koñ aè rgeèe vi aè nfeè' wááwá.	who having become callous gave themselves up to lust, to work all uncleanness with greediness.
Ñwáè yá'ni buu Jisoès ce e m vúè a ba' aè ncuâu rsheè entombïì naè aè m niñ njo foñ a yá, a byemi.	So then the other disciple who came first to the tomb also entered in, and he saw and believed.
Nàʼ zhi ce zheŋger nje rtùu.	The cattle are grazing across the hill.
AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' ce beèe a m rïìñ yuu ce a m ce geèe ka' naè, Nyúè aè ce fuse. AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na, Nyúè aè ce laèa neè beâe aè bdïì' wááwá ená woweèe a kupse, ma' yaèp buu bbebep,	The times of ignorance therefore God overlooked. But now he commands that all people everywhere should repent,
Ncïìndap Nyúè yïì embenjïì mo aè cu' ñgá' ce e m ba njep ghee yi njep rdip rgoèr. E ka' cuè', rdip rgoèr li ghuptïì a ba aèmboè bláá gúâú ñwáè wa'a. Buu bteèe ce vi m ba njo vi kweñgeèr wááwá.	The second angel poured out his bowl into the sea, and it became blood as of a dead man. Every living thing in the sea died.
E m fyeèni yïì ñkúè moè', a lor mbaèa efa gho a lá njeptii ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès.	having a field, sold it, and brought the money and laid it at the apostles' feet.
Caè'ni neè ñwáè wááwá ce e yu aèbee a Jisos Kraêis. Bfúr ce a yu weèr woweèe aèfa a caè'ni weèe.	Greet every saint in Christ Jesus. The brothers who are with me greet you.
Kúr ñkuânyaèm mo' goèr seê, yi m ba aèfo a ce yeñger, a ba aè njïìsaèp ka'.	Now there was a herd of many pigs feeding far away from them.
Beèe magoèr a be kúti njïìnjïì, baèa wap btu, fyeèni wap btu,	Then many will stumble, and will deliver up one another, and will hate one another.
Ñgaâa fuèp a ku ba weèe woweèe aè nfeè' wááwá, aè ka' ba aèmboè máè yi, seèe be ba aè nfeè' wááwá ka'.”	"For you always have the poor with you, but you don't always have me."""
Ya njeèe yi ke yu' yaè njeèndoñ, rïîñ. Máè rïìñ yi foñ, yi ce vúè a máâ mbuèu.	My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me.
a yá ñgá' ce beèe a m ce fa neè máè, a yá mluè ce máè m ce yá. Wáè m yá yuu ce yi m koni máè aè rla' Antïìyoèk ba aè rla' IÌkonïìyoèm ker ba aè rla' Listraè. Beèe a m fa má ñgá' seê, máè ku táá tatap, Tata Jisos aè ja' má efa ñgá' anaè wááwá.	persecutions, and sufferings: those things that happened to me at Antioch, Iconium, and Lystra. I endured those persecutions. Out of them all the Lord delivered me.
Sataèn yu yeè taê. Weèe ce koèñ aè rgeèe ba buu ce e koèñ. E m ku ba ñwáè nyúshi beèe efa rkáè'. AÈde' e táá aè yuu mini ka', njobeè' e yu ñwáè mini ka'. E ke nya' mnde', ku nya' aèmboè yi ñgeèe yi yu naè njobeè' e yu ñwáè mnde', a ba taèr mnde'.	You are of your father, the devil, and you want to do the desires of your father. He was a murderer from the beginning, and doesn't stand in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaks a lie, he speaks on his own; for he is a liar, and its father.
Wèr à tuŋ bbeʼ mbàŋ bvi tâ.	We have dug five game holes.

Matthew	Matïìyoè	22	4	E ker tuu ñgaâa mfaè' moè', a laa neè woweèe enáê, ‘Duè neè suñ beèe ce máè be naè ená máè fáèr buu ñkaè' wáá. tá ñwáè bsaèrbuu ca yááti aèwañ. E yááti aèwañ tá Tata Jisos Kraâis lo vúè neè ñger-ñwáè, fyáp ye neè mbáp, tá e kwe, mïìsi bú aè noèñ anaè.	Then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord will kill with the breath of his mouth, and destroy by the manifestation of his coming;
