Luke	Luêk	19	17	E laa neè ye enáê, ‘Yaè ñwáè rfaè' ce mboèñmboñ, wáè geèe yáánïì. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' wáè fyá' aè yuu ce yi yu múcaèr boèñboñ seê, baná máè fa wáè ñger aè rsa' mla' rúêú.’	He said to him, 'Well done, you good servant! Because you were found faithful with very little, you shall have authority over ten cities.'"
Ñwáè anaè aè beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ba gee máè luñ efa ya yañ aè ba laa neè máè ená m lor la rwaèa ce duê.”	"He answered them, ""He who made me well, the same said to me, 'Take up your mat, and walk.'"""
Jisoès aè m ker ma' ñgaèa neè beèe mo' ce a m rïìñ yap ená woweèe a yu beâe byáánïì, a ce fyá' beèe mo' aè yuu ka' enáê,	He spoke also this parable to certain people who were convinced of their own righteousness, and who despised all others.
Ñgwañkúñwáè ce e ka' ce ye yi ba rboèñ enjep ñgoèñ na, baná ka' e yu nteèe wa'a, e kwe.	But she who gives herself to pleasure is dead while she lives.
Nyúè aè ka' fa ñwáè bfee ce aède' e fa' neè beèe, baná ñwáè anaè fa' neè beèe. Ñwáè aè ka' túr bfee aè ryá'nïì, ñgaèñ yá'nïì beèe.	or service, let us give ourselves to service; or he who teaches, to his teaching;
Baná ñwáè ka' ce laèa buu neè beèe aè njáèá li ce e m be yá'ni ka', ñgaèñ loo ená Yú' Nyúè yi fa ye bfee aè rbeèesi buu anaè aè li ce aède' beèe a yu'.	Therefore let him who speaks in another language pray that he may interpret.
E be kúti keèr cu weèe ye seè'ni ba aèmboè ñkwaèa ka', e gha' ñkwaèa seè'ni. E be cu weèe ye seè'ni ba aèmboè nfúr ce weèe ye koèñni. E yu yuu goèr neè máè seê. E ka' ba neè máè wa'a, yi ka' ba yi ká aèmboè wáè ce e yu yoè ñwáè rfaè' a ker ba nfúroè ce weèe ye yu beèe Tataê?	no longer as a slave, but more than a slave, a beloved brother, especially to me, but how much rather to you, both in the flesh and in the Lord.
Ñwáè ce e yu muu Nyúè e ke geèe yuu bebep ka' njobeè' Nyúè yu njep ye. AÈtaè e gee yuu bebep ka' njobeè' e yu muu Nyúè.	Whoever is born of God doesn't commit sin, because his seed remains in him; and he can't sin, because he is born of God.
Woweèe a m ce kar aèmbuèu Jisoès a ce jaè' ye aè nfeè' e m ba aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê. Ku' bbyeèñge mo' foñ ce a m vúè a Jisoès weâe aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a m ba aèfo.	who, when he was in Galilee, followed him, and served him; and many other women who came up with him to Jerusalem.
E m ká' beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú ce e m ce naè, a tuu woweèe a baa a baa, a fa woweèe ñger ená woweèe a ce fúr byú' bbebep enjep beèe.	He called to himself the twelve, and began to send them out two by two; and he gave them authority over the unclean spirits.
A mbuèu ce máè láè ntee aè rfeè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè weèe ce weèe yu aè rla' Rum foñ.	So, as much as is in me, I am eager to preach the Good News to you also who are in Rome.
Ŋwɛɛ zhi mʉ saŋ nè tʉʼ.	The moon shone in the night.
Baná ñwáè ce e ka' lor yïì nyor njep nsheè aèmboè muu ñká' ca, ñgaèñ yu ñwáâ ñgoèr se mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè.	Whoever therefore humbles himself as this little child, the same is the greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven.
E m laèa neè woweèe ená a ku lor ba mbaèñ, a fa loèr byee, ba baèa ba mbaèa ka'.	He commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey, except a staff only: no bread, no wallet, no money in their purse,
AÈmboè seèe ce cu aè ñger Yú' Nyúè na, baná seèe ce gee buu aè ñger Yú' Nyúè.	If we live by the Spirit, let's also walk by the Spirit.
Brɛ̀rɛŋ byuur bvi car mbà ŋkaa ana sê.	There are so many dry bamboos down that bush.
Nyúè Abraèham ce e yu Nyúè Aisïìk a ba Nyúè Jakoèp a ker ba Nyúè viseèe btarkú wááwá, aè kuè'si Jisoès ce e yu yïì ñwáè rfaè'. Weèe aè m fa ye neè beèe ce a m ce sa' weèe, a máñni ye aè bsii Pailáèt, ka' Pailáèt aè m ce koèñ aè rmaè'shi ye wa'a.	The God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, the God of our fathers, has glorified his Servant Jesus, whom you delivered up, and denied in the presence of Pilate, when he had determined to release him.
Rshentee muu anà rli bep sê.	That childʼs anger is very bad.
njobeè' seèe rïìñ seená aèmboè Nyúè aè m fúr Kraâis efa rkwe naè, aède' e ker kwe ka'. Rkwe li ker túr ñger mbe yeâ nduè ka'.	knowing that Christ, being raised from the dead, dies no more. Death no more has dominion over him!
Weèr túr buu magoèr se aè rlaèa aèmboè ñwáè tañshi tañshïì ca, geewa'a weèr aè rïìñ aèmboè aède' weèr nashïì vi neè weèe ka' njobeè' weèr ka' nashi weèe yu' ka'.	About him we have many words to say, and hard to interpret, seeing you have become dull of hearing.
Wee bta a m ye manaè aè rïìñ a ku lo a kweñger.	Your fathers ate the manna in the wilderness, and they died.
Nyúè ce geèe wa'a, tá mnsa' mi bo koo beèe ce a byemi yuu mini ka', a ce yu' yap rboèñ ba neè bsaèrbuu.	that they all might be judged who didn't believe the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness.
E m kwaè'shi ená e be geèe buu ca ce nfeè' aè ka' gháá, vúè neè buu embe buèu ba buu enjep nsheè wááwá tarshi aèbee, láè njeptii Jisos Kraêis.	to an administration of the fullness of the times, to sum up all things in Christ, the things in the heavens, and the things on the earth, in him;
(Ñwáè aè m be baa yïì nyor ka'. Ñwáè e loè nyañ yi tu, ker fyá' aè yïì nyor aèmboè Kraâis e ke geèe neè cor naè.	For no man ever hated his own flesh; but nourishes and cherishes it, even as the Lord also does the assembly;
A ka' vúè neè ye, e laa enáê, “Ñkúú Agripaè ker ba beèe wááwá ce weèr woweèe yu taâa, yá neè ñwáè ce Jus wááwá a m tuu beèe ená a vú yá máè, suñ buu ce e geèe. Woweèe a vú a yá máè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, ker ba aèfa, a ce waani, a ce laèa ená e yu ñwáè ce e ba keèr cu nteèe ka'.	"Festus said, ""King Agrippa, and all men who are here present with us, you see this man, about whom all the multitude of the Jews petitioned me, both at Jerusalem and here, crying that he ought not to live any longer."
Weèe ka' cu weèe beèe ce a yu ñgaâa rbyemïì ka', weèe cu neè bfee-ñwá. Weèe fa maè'shi tá nfeè' ce weèe yu weèe woweèe anaè bú aè cicïì ka'.	Walk in wisdom toward those who are outside, redeeming the time.
Baná aè fa koosi rïìtu aè rsuñ beèe aèmboè yïìseèe Tata Jisoès, káè koosi rïìtu njo' máè ce m yu mbe shañ njo' ye ka'. Yá ñgá' njo' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aè ñger Nyúè.	Therefore don't be ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner; but endure hardship for the Good News according to the power of God,
Seèe be geèe seeká seè'ni? Waè' seèe be ce geèe buu bbebep njobeè' seèe ker bii njeptii mncir ka', a ba ba njeptii rboâñntee Nyúè a? AÈde' yi ba wa' ka' koo múcaèr.	What then? Shall we sin, because we are not under law, but under grace? May it never be!
[Jisoès aè ka' fúú efa rkwe aè noèñ entombïì embe múè ñgaèa, a duñshi yïì nyor entombïì neè Máèári e aè rla' Makdalaè ce e m fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' saèamba enjep ye naè.	Now when he had risen early on the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, from whom he had cast out seven demons.
Seèe rïìñ ená mncir Nyúè vi yu bboèñboñ ce ñwáè aè ka' gee rfaè' ce a ba geèe aègho.	But we know that the law is good, if a man uses it lawfully,

Njeñwáè ye ye ka' ce geèe rloo, káè ce cep ntuu Nyúè áè, ke' señ rtaa mbe tuè ka' baná e coosi mbañruèñwáè ce e yu tu neè ye. Weèr ce suñ ñwáè wááwá aèmboè Jisoès ca. ÁÈliyakïìm aè ba muu Málïìyaè, Málïìyaè aè ba muu Mánaè, Mánaè aè ba muu Maètataè, Maètataè aè ba muu Nataèn, Nataèn aè ba muu Dávïìd,	the son of Melea, the son of Menan, the son of Mattatha, the son of Nathan, the son of David,
Bkar waê, aè ka' ba yi aèmboè weèe, weèe aè rïìñ buu ca war. Baná weèe lor nfeè' faè dïì' beèe ce a ce yu'ni neè Nyúè ka' a lo bo' weèe tá weèe lo kúti ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep, gweè embe dïû' boèñboñ ce weèe yu na ka'.	You therefore, beloved, knowing these things beforehand, beware, lest being carried away with the error of the wicked, you fall from your own steadfastness.
Woweèe a rïìñ ená Nyúè ce laèa ená beèe ce a ce geèe njáèá buu ca a ghááte aè rkweñgeèr. Ka' woweèe a rïìñ wa'a, woweèe a ku ce geèe yap yu buu ca. Yuu ce yi bep seê, yi yu ená woweèe a ce laèa ená beèe ce a ce geèe njáèá buu ca a geèe yáánïì.	who, knowing the ordinance of God, that those who practice such things are worthy of death, not only do the same, but also approve of those who practice them.
A ka' ye ñkaè' mïìsi, Jisoès ba yïì ma ba bfúr vi ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a natïì a du aè rla' Kaèpanuèm a cu aèfo aè mú mnoèñ mo'.	After this, he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, his brothers, and his disciples; and they stayed there a few days.
Weèe ce bsaèkïì, mboè weèe yi weená ñwáè ce e ka' koo ñkar a ñgoèñ, baná ñwáè anaè yu ñwáè bbaèa neè Nyúè a? Baná ñwáè ce e ka' koèñ aè rkoo ñkar a ñgoèñ baná e geèe yi tu aè ñwáè bbaèa neè Nyúè.	You adulterers and adulteresses, don't you know that friendship with the world is enmity with God? Whoever therefore wants to be a friend of the world makes himself an enemy of God.

But Jesus said to them, ""A prophet is not without honor, except in his own country, and in his own house."""

Ñwáè ce e ce ye njáèá buu wááwá fa jaèasi ñwáè ce e kani efa rye njáèá byee mo' naè ka', ñwáè ce e ce ye njáèá byee mo' ka' naè fa laèa ená ñwáè ce e ye njáèá byee wááwá aè geèe yuu bebep ka', njobeè' Nyúè aè koo ñwáè anaè aè yïì ñwáè.	Don't let him who eats despise him who doesn't eat. Don't let him who doesn't eat judge him who eats, for God has accepted him.

Fyá' ka neè bsiñ. Vi ke byeè buu káè kep buu káè lá aè bcaèñ ka'. Ka' yi yu wa'a, yeè Ta embe buèu ku ce nyañ woweèe. Mboè yeè ntaa luèu seê, a caa yïì bsiñ a?	See the birds of the sky, that they don't sow, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns. Your heavenly Father feeds them. Aren't you of much more value than they?

Wèe à zhe kwâa nè ŋgʉ̀ ŋwɛ̀ ànjɛ̌ɛ kɛ?	How can you consume maize together with the seedlings.
Máè yu' máná beèe ce a m fa woweèe ncoèo nje nsaèpsi naè a m ba ncúèkïì- rjeèe-neè-ncúèkïì-ncoèp-kyeèe-aè-mñkyeèe. Beèe ca a m ba beèe efa mntáè' beèe Isráèl wááwá.	I heard the number of those who were sealed, one hundred forty-four thousand, sealed out of every tribe of the children of Israel:
Blaèa wááwá ce vi yu mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè, vi loè ese Nyúè, a túr sá' seê. Vi yu aè ryá'ni beèe, a ba aè rlapni beèe ce a ce yá'nïì ryá'nïì mnde', a ba aè rnaèshi beèe, a ker ba aè rcep beèe tá a bo cu rcu ryáánïì,	Every Scripture is God-breathed and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for instruction in righteousness,
AÈmboè Jonaè aè m cu njep rbúâ nca ce e m kuè' seê, aè mnoâñ btaar naè, Muu Ñwáè ye ye be cu njep múè nshe aè mnoâñ btaar.	For as Jonah was three days and three nights in the belly of the whale, so will the Son of Man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Nfeè' aè gháá ce a be kuè'si Muu Ñwáè.	"Jesus answered them, ""The time has come for the Son of Man to be glorified."
A ye ce e ce vúè embe máâ njïì. Yi nta' yi caèa ya. Máè ghááte aè ñwáè ce aède' m co'ni vi blaba' ka'.”	"He is the one who comes after me, who is preferred before me, whose sandal strap I'm not worthy to loosen."""
Bli vi yu njep ñgoèñ na jáá jáèá jáá, li moè' aè ke' ba ce ñwáè buu efa ryu' ka'.	There are, it may be, so many kinds of sounds in the world, and none of them is without meaning.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèe fa loèr ne ye aè ñwáè bbaèa ka'. Cep neè ye ba aèmboè nfúr weèe.	Don't count him as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.
M ce loo máná Tata Nyúè ke'ni lo ryoèñ, túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ.	The Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.
Máè yá muu njeèe aègee kaèbaèraè' ca. Buu bteèe caè ba beâe bgoèrgoèr caè a sir njeèe anaè a kaari a tarte. Njeèe anaè aè m ce yááti aèmboè yïì ce a sáá wa'a. E m túr mndoñ saèambaê, a túr mmir saèambaê. Mndoñ ba mmir ca mi táá aètu byú' Nyúè ce vi yu saèambaê, a tuusïì vi aè bdïì' wááwá enjep ñgoèñ na naè.	I saw in the midst of the throne and of the four living creatures, and in the midst of the elders, a Lamb standing, as though it had been slain, having seven horns, and seven eyes, which are the seven Spirits of God, sent out into all the earth.
Kìdàŋ ca zhi foo sê.	This bench is very shiny.
Ñwáè ce e m ce keè'ni shañ aè ka' lá' efa mmirloè yá ená bkeèñ shañ vi múè'ñger, e co' kaèafaè' ená e bo yú yïì nyor aègho njobeè' e m ce kwaè'shi ená ñgaâa shañ a fúúse embe shañ a cañ a duse.	The jailer, being roused out of sleep and seeing the prison doors open, drew his sword and was about to kill himself, supposing that the prisoners had escaped.
A be koo Nyúèrkaè' ce e m bo' beèe anaè naè, maè' njep ma mor ce mkaèñ mi m ce she njo. A dïì' ce nyaèa ce e m fúú enjep roè naè ba ñwáè ce e m ce nya' mnde' ená e yu ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè naè a yu. Woweèe a be cu njo, yá mluè neètú' ba neèmootïì, kuè yá wa'a nfeseè.	The devil who deceived them was thrown into the lake of fire and sulfur, where the beast and the false prophet are also. They will be tormented day and night forever and ever.
Geewa'a, Nyúè aè m fa weèr ñger aèmboè e ke fa neè beèe ce a sáè. E m fa weèr ñger ca aè nfeè' ce Taitoès aè m vúè.	Nevertheless, he who comforts the lowly, God, comforted us by the coming of Titus;
Woweèe a fúú efa seâe mú njobeè' woweèe a m ba aè ñgúè' yïìseèe ka'. Woweèe a m ba ba aè ñgúè' yïìseèe, a m ba cu seèe woweèe. Woweèe a fúú efa seâe mú tá yi bo ba rara ená woweèe wááwá a m ba aè ñgúè' yïìseèe ka'.	They went out from us, but they didn't belong to us; for if they had belonged to us, they would have continued with us. But they left, that they might be revealed that none of them belong to us.
Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì na aè m bipshi buu neè Jisoès a kuu ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu, ker ba li ryá'nïì.	The high priest therefore asked Jesus about his disciples, and about his teaching.
Ñwáè ce a loèr e ce jaè' yi jaè' naè e lo cañ njobeè' njeèe yu yi ka'; e túr yi yu nfeè' aègho ka'.	The hired hand flees because he is a hired hand, and doesn't care for the sheep.
Fa maè'shi tá ñwáè moè' lor wáè aètáèr njobeè' aè yu ghaèrñwáè ka'. Ba rduèñshïì neè beèe ce a byemi, aè wo blaèa, ba a yo ñgeèe, ba aè lo rkoèñnïì, ba a lo rbyemïì, ker ba aè lo rcu rrara.	Let no man despise your youth; but be an example to those who believe, in word, in your way of life, in love, in spirit, in faith, and in purity.
tá e bo teni mnsa' beèe wááwá. Beèe wááwá ce a ce yu'ni neè Nyúè ka', a ce geèe buu bbebep, a ce laèa buu aè njïû mbembep a kuu Nyúè, a be gweè mnsa' Nyúè.”	"to execute judgment on all, and to convict all the ungodly of all their works of ungodliness which they have done in an ungodly way, and of all the hard things which ungodly sinners have spoken against him."""
Woweèe a laêa, beèe anaè a cuteè aè bkúr aè bkúr. Bkúr mo' beèe rjeèe rjeèe; bkúr mo' beèe mta mtaê.	They sat down in ranks, by hundreds and by fifties.
Baná seèe yoñshi Nyúè njobeè' seèe aè ka' ce duè ba fá, e ku táá kuèntombïì neè seèe. E táá wa'a, seèe ce jáèr aèmboè beèe ce a ce jáèr mbe ñgoo beèe Jisoès, Jisoès aè táá entombïì a ce vúni. Nyúè aè loèr seèe a gee nsuñ aèmboè Jisoès aè du aè bdïì' wááwá aèmboè nráèá ce a too e rúú boèñboñ seê, a du aè bdïì' wááwá.	Now thanks be to God, who always leads us in triumph in Christ, and reveals through us the sweet aroma of his knowledge in every place.
E geèe seèe aè ba beèe ce e ce sa' seèe aèmboè ñkúú, a ker gee seèe aè ba ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì neè Nyúè ce e yu yïì Taê. Tá foèo yi ba neè Jisoès, tá ñger yi ba neè ye foñ aè nfeè' sïìp. Yi yu wa'a.	and he made us to be a Kingdom, priests to his God and Father; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever. Amen.
Túè' aè ka' raa, weèr aè natïì a du a ba' aè rla' Sisaèriyaè, a niñ mbe ndaèp Felep ce e m ba ñwáè rfeè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ, a cu weèr woweèe. E m ba moè' efa beèe nsaèamba ce cor aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè m ce naè.	On the next day, we, who were Paul's companions, departed, and came to Caesarea. We entered into the house of Philip the evangelist, who was one of the seven, and stayed with him.
Mi mkuèu mi m ce laè'ñger aèmboè bco' ce ñgaâa ntoèo nlaèa a kupshi wa'a. Yïì njeèndoñ aè m ba aèmboè njeèndoñ rdip ce li ke gweè aè rkoñ wa'a.	His feet were like burnished brass, as if it had been refined in a furnace. His voice was like the voice of many waters.
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè nfeè' anaè a ce too ená Simïìyoèn. E m ba ñwáè nyáánïì, a ce wáp Nyúè foñ, a cu a ce keè' nfeè' ce Nyúè be geèe tá beèe Isráèl a túr rfúteè. Yú' Rara yi m ba a ye.	Behold, there was a man in Jerusalem whose name was Simeon. This man was righteous and devout, looking for the consolation of Israel, and the Holy Spirit was on him.
Ñwáè moè' aè cañ a du a fúú kúèsha njep múè njáèá mruè' mo' ce mi m ce bañshi, a fapte aè ñke', a fa neè Jisoès ená e bo nyoñ. E ka' fa, a laa enáê, “Seèe yá ka ená waè' AÈlajaè be vúè suèusi ye embe kïìntaa na lá.”	"One ran, and filling a sponge full of vinegar, put it on a reed, and gave it to him to drink, saying, ""Let him be. Let's see whether Elijah comes to take him down."""
Ncir yïì embenjïì mo yi yu aèmboè yi foñ. Yi yu enáê, ‘Koèñ nfúroè aèmboè aè koèñ yoè nyor.’	A second likewise is this, 'You shall love your neighbor as yourself.'
Nyor yu mɛ̀ làrlàr.	I am feeling sick.
Ñgaâa cïìñ ñkuânyaèm ca a m cañ, a du a suñ beèe aè laè', a ker suñ neè beèe ce a m ba aè mñkúè, awá beèe a duseè aè ryá yuu ce yi m koni.	Those who fed them fled, and told it in the city and in the country. The people came to see what it was that had happened.
M ce suñ wee máná AÈlajaè aè vúè war, beèe a gee buu ce a m ce koèñ aè rgeèe neè ye, aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè.”	"But I tell you that Elijah has come, and they have also done to him whatever they wanted to, even as it is written about him."""
Ka' yi m ba wa'a, Nyúè aè m túr ntee boèñboñ neè máè, a ce máè tá yaè ma ka' keè bi máè.	But when it was the good pleasure of God, who separated me from my mother's womb, and called me through his grace,
Woweèe a lor ñwáè ce e m ba nfeèp naè, a woweèe a du a yá beèe Farïìsïî.	They brought him who had been blind to the Pharisees.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè beèe ce a ce jepsi weèe naè, maè'shi neè tá woweèe a soñ wap mnyor.	I wish that those who disturb you would cut themselves off.
Baná weèe gee rfaè' ca misïî. Weèe gee li neè ntee boèñboñ aèmboè weèe aè m káè' neè ntee boèñboñ foñ naè. Geèe neè li neè yuu ce weèe aè túr.	But now complete the doing also, that as there was the readiness to be willing, so there may be the completion also out of your ability.
Duè neè du gee tá beâe aè bto' wááwá a ba ñgaâa yá'ni yaè buu. Baèptir neè woweèe aè rlii Taèr, ba Muu, ba Yú' Rara,	Go, and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit,
A mbuèu ce káâ' aè noèñ ce weèr aè m yu' buu ca, weèr aè be borni efa rloo neè weèe aè nfeè' moè' ka'. Weèr ce loo neè Nyúè ená e gee tá weèe koni bfee ce vi loè ese yi Yú', rïìñ buu ce yu vi wááwá, tá weèe bo rïìñ buu ce e koèñ boèñboñ.	For this cause, we also, since the day we heard this, don't cease praying and making requests for you, that you may be filled with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding,
Ñwáè rfaè' ca aè laa neè yïì nyor enáê, ‘Yaè masaè be fúr máè efa rfaè'. M be geèe má ká? M túr ñger aè rfaè' nsuu ka', rïìtu yi ce koo máè aè rloo buu. M be geèe má ká?	"The manager said within himself, 'What will I do, seeing that my lord is taking away the management position from me? I don't have strength to dig. I am ashamed to beg.
Luke	Luêk	16	4	M rïìñ yuu ce m be geèe tá beèe a bo koni máè a waâp mndaèp aè nfeè' a ka' fúr máè efa rfaè'.’	I know what I will do, so that when I am removed from management, they may receive me into their houses.'
Luke	Luêk	16	5	E ka' laèa neè yïì nyor wa' wáá, a ká' beèe wááwá ce a m túr mkaa a yïì masaè. E m ká' woweèe moè'sir moè'sir, a bipshi neè ñwáè entombïì enáê, ‘Weèe yaè masaè yu neè rkaa ba aè ká?’	Calling each one of his lord's debtors to him, he said to the first, 'How much do you owe to my lord?'
Luke	Luêk	16	6	E beesïì enáê, ‘Weèr ye yu neè rkaa aè bgaloèn mgúr mjeèe waami.’ E laa neè ye enáê, ‘Koè yo ñwaè' cu aè nsheè cárcár sañ mbo ba ená bgaloèn mjeèe kyeèe.’	He said, 'A hundred batos of oil.' He said to him, 'Take your bill, and sit down quickly and write fifty.'
Luke	Luêk	16	7	E ká' ñwáè embenjïì a laa neè ye enáê, ‘Weèe yaè masaè foñ yu neè rkaa ba aè ká?’ E beesïì enáê, ‘Weèr ye yu neè rkaa aè ñkaèa msañ ncúèkïì.’ E laa neè ye enáê, ‘Koè yo ñwaè' sañ mbo ená mñkaèa mjeèe waami.’	Then he said to another, 'How much do you owe?' He said, 'A hundred cors of wheat.' He said to him, 'Take your bill, and write eighty.'
Luke	Luêk	16	8	Masaè ñwáè rfaè' ce e m ba ñwáâ mini ka' naè aè yoèñshi ye aè yuu ce e m geèe neè bfee-ñwáè naè. A mboè beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a geèe buu neè yaèp beèe neè bfee-ñwáè wa'a, caa beèe ce a yu aè rraa.	His lord commended the dishonest manager because he had done wisely, for the children of this world are, in their own generation, wiser than the children of the light."
AÈ ker ce keè' ba ká seè'ni? Naèti mbekïì, ká' li rlii, tá a baptir wáè, suè'si yoè buu bebep.’	Now why do you wait? Arise, be baptized, and wash away your sins, calling on the name of the Lord.'
To máè m ku ba weèe seèe mbe Ndaèp Nyúè aè mnoèñ wááwá, weèe aè m be naa bo joo máè aègho ka'. Geewa'a, nfeè' ca yu yeè nfeè', nfeè' ce túè'nji be túr ñger.”	"When I was with you in the temple daily, you didn't stretch out your hands against me. But this is your hour, and the power of darkness."""
Yú' Nyúè yi ke fa beèe mo' bfee aè rfa beèe ncep mboèñmboñ, ker fa beèe mo' bfee aè rfeè'shi blaâa Nyúè aè njáèá njïì ce aède' beèe a riñ Nyúè boèñboñ. Yú' ca yi ku ba yi mo'sir.	For to one is given through the Spirit the word of wisdom, and to another the word of knowledge, according to the same Spirit;
Cena yi ka' mïì, Jisoès aè tuu neèñguu túâ Galeèle ce a too foñ ená Tïìbárïìyaès.	After these things, Jesus went away to the other side of the sea of Galilee, which is also called the Sea of Tiberias.
Ñwáè ce e ka' byemi ená Jisoès yu Muu Nyúè, baná Nyúè cu njep ye, ye ye aè cu njep Nyúè.	Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God remains in him, and he in God.
Joèsayaè aè m bi Jáèkonaèr ba bfúr vi aè nfeè' ce a m ce koo beèe Judaè aè rkoèñ ce du aègho aè to' Babiloèn naè.	Josiah became the father of Jechoniah and his brothers, at the time of the exile to Babylon.
AÈde' ñwáè saa cáâ' fi tar mbenduè cáâ' rúèú ka'. E ka' gee wa'a baná cáâ' fi caè yi be saèa yïû rúèú tá toto raa caèa yïì entombïì naè.	No one sews a piece of unshrunk cloth on an old garment, or else the patch shrinks and the new tears away from the old, and a worse hole is made.
Mluè mi ka' ce koo ye seê, e gee rloo neè yi ntee-ñwáè, mlïì' mi suu ye efa nyoèr aèmboè bláá wa'a, a cáácá aè nsheè.	Being in agony he prayed more earnestly. His sweat became like great drops of blood falling down on the ground.
Rbipshì anà rli tap sê.	That question is very difficult.
Woweèe a ka' ce suèu embe rtuèu, Jisoès aè ciisïì neè woweèe ená a fa suñ ñwáè yuu ce woweèe a yá naè ka', caar tá Muu Ñwáè ke fúú efa rkwe.	As they were coming down from the mountain, he commanded them that they should tell no one what things they had seen, until after the Son of Man had risen from the dead.
Yú' Rara yi m geèe Dávïìd aè laèa enáê, ‘Tata Nyúè aè m laèa neè Tata yaè enáê, “Cu aè la rkoo maè' caar tá m gee tá aè tár mo mkuèu mbenduè beèe ce a baèa wáè.” ’	"For David himself said in the Holy Spirit, 'The Lord said to my Lord, ""Sit at my right hand, until I make your enemies the footstool of your feet.""'"
Rïìñ neè ená Tata be laè' ñwáè wááwá aè yuu boèñboñ ce e geèe, káè ñgaèñ yu ñkwaèa áè, káè e yu ñkwaèa ka' áè.	knowing that whatever good thing each one does, he will receive the same again from the Lord, whether he is bound or free.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “Byemi neè Nyúè.	"Jesus answered them, ""Have faith in God."
Woweèe a m be nya' mnde' ka'. Yuu bebep mo' yi yu ce aède' ñwáè laa ená woweèe a geèe ka'.	In their mouth was found no lie, for they are blameless.
Woweèe a susi nyor ba neè mfaâ' mmboèñmboñ, ce yu mfaè' ce mi ghááte neè bbyeèñge ce a ce laèa ená woweèe a rïìñ Nyúè.	but (which becomes women professing godliness) with good works.
AÈmboè njeñwáè ca aè m kúti aè laè' naè, ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès ca a laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Rabaèi, ye yuu seè'ni.”	"In the meanwhile, the disciples urged him, saying, ""Rabbi, eat."""
Nyúè e ke geèe buu aè njïû yáánïì. E be maè' weèe ka'. E be leèse rfaè' ce weèe aè geèe, káè leèse njáèá rjaè' ce weèe aè m jaè' yïì beèe a ku bii jaè' naè ka'. Weèe aè m jaè' woweèe njobeè' weèe koèñ Nyúè.	For God is not unrighteous, so as to forget your work and the labor of love which you showed toward his name, in that you served the saints, and still do serve them.
Ñwáè wááwá aè m duè fa yeâ laè' aè rsañ li rlii aèfo.	All went to enroll themselves, everyone to his own city.
Ku' buu bbebep anaè aè kuè' a ba aèmboè rtuèu ce li saèp a ba' mbe buèu wa'a. Nyúè aè kuushïì buu bbebep anaè.	for her sins have reached to the sky, and God has remembered her iniquities.
Máè yá ma kaèbaèraâ' búú, a yá ñwáè ce e m cu mbo. Ñwáè ca aè ka' nyáá, nshe ba rbuu a da' a bú, a ker yááti ka'.	I saw a great white throne, and him who sat on it, from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away. There was found no place for them.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè be be' yuu ce Dávïìd aè m geèe aè nfeè' ce njeè aè m ce yañ ye ker ba beèe ce a woweèe a m ba naè ka' a?	"But he said to them, ""Haven't you read what David did, when he was hungry, and those who were with him;"
Ñgwañkúñwáè ce e m ba ñwáè fuèp aè vú a fa mbaèa njo baa. Mbaèa baa ca yi yu aèmboè bfraâñ ta wa'a.	A poor widow came, and she cast in two small brass coins, which equal a quadrans coin.
Waè' yi yu boèñboñ ená ñwáè rbyemïì ka' túr mnsa' a ñwáè rbyemïì moè', e lor ye du aègho mbe kor ená beèe ce a yu byáánïì ka' a sa' a? Mboè weèe aè ba sa' wee mnsa' a weâe mú aèmboè beèe Nyúè a?	Dare any of you, having a matter against his neighbor, go to law before the unrighteous, and not before the saints?
M ce faè' ce duè kuèntombïì máná m bo duè koni blaè' embe buèu ce Nyúè aè ká' máè ená e bo fa máè njo' yuu ce Jisos Kraâis aè m geèe.	I press on toward the goal for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
Weèe ka' kani, baná weèe aè ba rïìñ ená blaâa Nyúè vi ku ká' ba neè weèe káè mi neè weèe ka'.	What? Was it from you that the word of God went out? Or did it come to you alone?
Fu' tatap yi ká' a ce caèa, a doo mdip, mi niñ mbe keñ a sáni ruu mbo.	A big wind storm arose, and the waves beat into the boat, so much that the boat was already filled.
Ñwáè wááwá aè ye, a yu'.	They all ate, and were filled.
Li m ce caèa mbe ntoèñ nduunjïì efa rla' anaè. Bce ce mbaèñ efa gho yi ke fa ryoèñ vi m táá aèwaâa rdip anaè, mo' aè bo ñkoèp, mo' aè bo maè'. Mbaèñ yi m ce yú mbo aè mñwáá ncoèp-baa enjep feè'. Bfuè efa gho aè m ba mcáèp. A m ce jaè' beâe aè bto' wááwá ce a m ce yañ aègho.	in the middle of its street. On this side of the river and on that was the tree of life, bearing twelve kinds of fruits, yielding its fruit every month. The leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' e m byemi, e du a cu aèmboè kïìloè wa'a faèdïì' ce Nyúè aè m kaè' ená e be fa neè ye naè. E m cu ba aè btaèp ce a m baè'ri ba neè bcáè' a muu yïû Aisïìk ker ba muu muu yïû Jakoèp ce Nyúè aè m kaè' neè woweèe wááwá ená e be fa woweèe ñgoèñ anaè.	By faith, he lived as an alien in the land of promise, as in a land not his own, dwelling in tents, with Isaac and Jacob, the heirs with him of the same promise.
Yá neè ená blaâa Jisoès vi cu njep weâe mntee aè nfeè' wááwá. Loèr bfee ce Nyúè aè fa weèe, yá'ni ker cep aègho. Ku'si Nyúè neè byáá njáèá jáá jáèá jáá. Wee yoèp wa'a, weèe ce yoñshi Nyúè enjep ntee.	Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly; in all wisdom teaching and admonishing one another with psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your heart to the Lord.
Zhìi mâ à màʼshi nèŋkùr.	His mother died yesterday.
Nfeè' rbi aè ka' gháá, ÁÈlisabáèt aè bi muu mbañruè.	Now the time that Elizabeth should give birth was fulfilled, and she brought forth a son.
Famáè wááwá ce e yu boèñboñ, a ba yáánïì, e ke vúè embe buèu ese Nyúè ce e m boo mraa wááwá ce mi ke raa embe buèu. Nyúè yu ñwáè ce e ke kupse yïì ndeèe, ma'shi yïì beèe aè túè'njïì ka'.	Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights, with whom can be no variation, nor turning shadow.
Pitaè aè ka' duè Jáèrusaláèm, beèe ce a m ce laèa ená ñwáè gee búè ka' ba ñwáè rbyemïì naè, a lapnïì Pitaè,	When Peter had come up to Jerusalem, those who were of the circumcision contended with him,
E be vúè beèesi bjaèprïì nyor viseèe ca tá vi ba aèmboè ku' yïì nyor mboèñmboñ ce e m túr aè nfeè' ce e m fúú efa rkwe naè. Ñger ce e be geèe yuu ca aègho ku ba ñger ce aède' e loêr, beesi buu wááwá ce aè ñgoèñ na tá vi ba njep yeâ tïìi.	who will change the body of our humiliation to be conformed to the body of his glory, according to the working by which he is able even to subject all things to himself.
Pol aè m ce koèñ ená e du niñ mbe múè beèe anaè, ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a kanïì.	When Paul wanted to enter in to the people, the disciples didn't allow him.
Muŋkàʼ ba Ndukòŋ a caŋse.	Munkah and Ndukong have escaped.
Fa laèa njep wáâ ntee enáê, ‘AÈde' ñwáè du mbaè yir lá?’ ka'” (ce yi yu ená be vúè nda neè Kraâis embaè yir? lá).	"or, 'Who will descend into the abyss?' (that is, to bring Christ up from the dead.)"""
Ñwáè moè' be koo la ryoèñ ese máè ka'. Ce fa ba máè aè la rkoèñ. M túr ñger aè rfa la ryoèñ, a ker túr ñger aè rkoo li. Cena yu ba yuu ce yaè Ta aè laèa ená m geêe.”	"No one takes it away from me, but I lay it down by myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. I received this commandment from my Father."""
Yi m ba ba ená beèe ce a ce láè mncir a beèe ce a be koni buu ce Nyúè aè m kaè', yi ba ba ená rbyemïì li túr sá' ka', tá mkaè'ni anaè mi ba foñ aè cicïì.	For if those who are of the law are heirs, faith is made void, and the promise is made of no effect.
Pitaè aè ka' karsi nyor a yá ñwáè yá'ni buu Jisoès moè' ce Jisoès aè m koèñ se naè aèmboè e ce vúè a waâp mbuèu. A ye ce e m káèr nyor aègee Jisoès aè nfeè' woweèe a m ce ye byee, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Tataê, ñwáè ce e be fyeèni wáè a nda?” naè.	"Then Peter, turning around, saw a disciple following. This was the disciple whom Jesus sincerely loved, the one who had also leaned on Jesus' breast at the supper and asked, ""Lord, who is going to betray You?"""
Njeñwáè anaè aè laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Haba! Mboè a wáè ñwáè Jus a? Yi loè efaè ká, wáè ka' ce loo mdip ese máè ce m yu njeñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè?” Jus ba beèe aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè a ke geèe buu aèbee ka'. è	"The Samaritan woman therefore said to him, ""How is it that you, being a Jew, ask for a drink from me, a Samaritan woman?"" (For Jews have no dealings with Samaritans.)"
E beesïì enáê, “Tataê, a wáè nda?” E laa enáê, “A máè Jisoès ce aè ce jar neè máè naè.	"He said, ""Who are you, Lord?"" The Lord said, ""I am Jesus, whom you are persecuting."
Wɛr à cu shùumà mnoŋ btaar.	We have fasted for three days.
Yi yu boèñboñ ená mbañruèñwáè sop rtaa mbe tuè ka', njobeè' e yu rfeese Nyúè, a ba foâo Nyúè, njeñwáè aè ba foâo mbañruèñwáè.	For a man indeed ought not to have his head covered, because he is the image and glory of God, but the woman is the glory of the man.
Buu bbebep ca bsïìp vi ke fúú enjep ñwáè, gee ye e ba jaèpri aè bsii Nyúè.”	"All these evil things come from within, and defile the man."""
Rluutì rli ke gèe ŋwɛ̀ yuʼ ryaŋ sê.	Labour makes one to go through a lot of pain.
À kaʼ faʼ tatap à ku koni yuu wɛ̌ ròo.	If you work hard you will get what you want.
See ce tá'shi wa'a, ma'shi mñgúè' nyor bboèñboñ vi yáátïì aèwañ. Yi yu wa'a njobeè' Nyúè aè m geèe viseèe mnyor aè njáâá ená mñgúè' nyor ce vi ke yááti aè vïû bcicïì naè, vi ba vïì ce a be gá' aègho seê.	whereas our presentable parts have no such need. But God composed the body together, giving more abundant honor to the inferior part,
“Ñwáè efa weâe mú ce e ka' túr njeèe rjeèe, moè' efa gho bú, e ke' ma'shïì njeèe yïû ncoèp-búè'ú-aè-mmbúè'ú aè rtuèu duè roèo yïì ce e bú naè, caar yá ka', a nda?	"Which of you men, if you had one hundred sheep, and lost one of them, wouldn't leave the ninety-nine in the wilderness, and go after the one that was lost, until he found it?
Luke	Luêk	15	5	E ka' yá, baná e be lu'shi seê, koo, byáè' mbe ntuèumbáè' kúti aègho.	When he has found it, he carries it on his shoulders, rejoicing.
Luke	Luêk	15	6	E duè ba' aègho aè laè' baná e be ká' bkar vi, ba beèe ce a woweèe a ce cu mbe dïû' mo'sir, laèa neè woweèe enáê, ‘Seèe lu'shi njobeè' máè yá yaè njeèe ce e m bú naè.’	When he comes home, he calls together his friends and his neighbors, saying to them, 'Rejoice with me, for I have found my sheep which was lost!'
Luke	Luêk	15	7	M ce suñ weèe máná rlu'shïì li be ba mbe buèu wa'a njo' ñwáè moè'sir ce e kupse a ma' yïì buu bbebep, caa beèe ncoèp-búè'ú-aè-mmbúè'ú ce a yu yap beâe byáánïì, mbuèu moè' aè ker ba aègho neè woweèe aè rkupseè ka' naè.	I tell you that even so there will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents, than over ninety-nine righteous people who need no repentance.
Luke	Luêk	15	8	“Yu ba njáèá njeñwáè ká ce e ka' túr mbaèa rúêú, búsi mbúè mbaèa, e ke' cú' laêm, yáèr yïì ndap, tambú roèo caar yá ka'?	Or what woman, if she had ten drachma coins, if she lost one drachma coin, wouldn't light a lamp, sweep the house, and seek diligently until she found it?
Luke	Luêk	15	9	E ka' yá, baná e be ká' bkar vi, ba beèe ce a woweèe a ce cu mbe dïû' mo'sir, laèa neè woweèe enáê, ‘Seèe lu'shi njobeè' máè yá yaè mbúè mbaèa ce e m bú naè.’	When she has found it, she calls together her friends and neighbors, saying, 'Rejoice with me, for I have found the drachma which I had lost.'
Luke	Luêk	15	10	M ce suñ weèe máná bcïìndap Nyúè embe buèu a ke lu'shi wa' foñ, ka' neè ñwáâ ñgeèe buu bbebep moè'sir ce e kupse, a ma' yïì buu bbebep.”	Even so, I tell you, there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner repenting."
Yi ka' ba wa'a, Nyúè aè lá nfeè' moè' ce beèe a be lúèshi ce yu nfeè' e seè'ni na. Bfeè' vi ka' caèa aèñgoo seê, Nyúè aè laa njïì enjep Dávïìd. E m ku laa ba blaèa ce weèr aè sañ neè weèe wáá naè. E m laèa enáê, “Wáè ka' yu' njeèndoñ Nyúè ntïìni na, aè fa teèe tu ka'.”	"he again defines a certain day, today, saying through David so long a time afterward (just as has been said), ""Today if you will hear his voice, don't harden your hearts."""
Yoèp byáá njáèá jáá jáèá jáá, laa buu neè beèe neè byáá ca. Yoèp byáá, ku'si Tata Jisoès neè yo ntee wááwá.	speaking to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs; singing, and making melody in your heart to the Lord;
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Muu waè, lo rbyemïì li geèe wáè ke'seè. Duè yo yu neè rfúteè-ñwáè.”	"He said to her, ""Daughter, cheer up. Your faith has made you well. Go in peace."""
E ka' beèesi wa'a, a laêa, mutuè caè aè táá. E ka' táá, Felep ba ñwáâ nsoèñ anaè a suu njep roè, Felep aè baptïìr ye.	He commanded the chariot to stand still, and they both went down into the water, both Philip and the eunuch, and he baptized him.
E ka' ghoèni woweèe, a ma'shi woweèe, Nyúè aè lor ye a du aègho mbe buèu.	It happened, while he blessed them, that he withdrew from them, and was carried up into heaven.
Baná ñwáè ce e ka' lor mú ncir efa mncir ca aètáèr, yá'ni beèe mo' foñ ená a gee wa'a, baná ñgaèñ be keèe ba ñwáâ ñká' mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè. Ñwáè ce e ka' lá mncir ca, ce yá'ni beèe vi, baná ñgaèñ be ba ñwáâ ñgoèr mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè.	Whoever, therefore, shall break one of these least commandments, and teach others to do so, shall be called least in the Kingdom of Heaven; but whoever shall do and teach them shall be called great in the Kingdom of Heaven.
Woweèe a ker laa tatap enáê, “E karsi btu beâe aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè wááwá neè li ryá'nïì káè' efa ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a daa aègho a ba' aèfa.”	"But they insisted, saying, ""He stirs up the people, teaching throughout all Judea, beginning from Galilee even to this place."""
‘M ce suñ weèe máná ñwáè ce e ka' túr yuu, baná a be keèr fa ye buu moè'. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá túr yuu ka', baná a be koo ka' mú yïì ce e túr naè ese ye.	For I tell you that to everyone who has, will more be given; but from him who doesn't have, even that which he has will be taken away from him.
Máè suñ weèe ená weèe be kwe neè yeè buu bbebep, njobeè' weèe aè ka' tá byemi ená m yu ñwáè ce m yu ka', baná weèe be kwe neè yeè buu bbebep.”	"I said therefore to you that you will die in your sins; for unless you believe that I am he, you will die in your sins."""
Seèe be ka' laèa seeká seè'ni aè? Waè' seèe be laèa seená mncir yu yuu bebep a? AÈde' yi ba wa' ka' koo múcaèr. Yuu ce yi m geèe m ka' riñ yuu bebep, aè m ba mncir. Ncir yi m ka' tá baè laèa enáê, “Fa gani ka'” ka', máè m ba rïìñ ená ñwáè e ke gani yuu, baná ñgaèñ aè geèe yuu bebep ka'.	"What shall we say then? Is the law sin? May it never be! However, I wouldn't have known sin, except through the law. For I wouldn't have known coveting, unless the law had said, ""You shall not covet."""
Nfò wèe a vʉ̀.	Nfor and the others (his friends) have come.
Ncïìndap Nyúè ca aè laa neè máè enáê, “AÈde' blaèa ca vi caa aè cici ka', vi yu mini. Taèr Nyúè ce e ke fa yi yú' neè yi ñgaâa ncep ntuu, a ñwáè ce e tuu yïì ncïìndap ená e vú yá beèe ce a ce faè' neè ye, duñshi woweèe buu ce ku báti nfeè' múcaèr tá vi koni.”	"He said to me, ""These words are faithful and true. The Lord God of the spirits of the prophets sent his angel to show to his bondservants the things which must happen soon."""
Yi yu mini ená e m yañ, a ku táá yïû ñkwe, Nyúè aè ke' byemïì ka'. Nyúè aè ka' kani wa'a, a koosi ba mnse neè ye, a koosi neè máè foñ, njobeè' e m ba kwe kwe, yaè ñgá' aè ba báèr.	For indeed he was sick, nearly to death, but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, that I might not have sorrow on sorrow.
Haba! Wɛ̀ ku kʉti wɛɛ a?	What! Have you already returned?
Mɛ̀ teeshi yuʼ anà à bkeŋ a kaʼ baŋsi.	I cut the banana bunch into smaller bunches before keeping it to get ripe.
E ghashïì ye aè rkoo a ye a fúú efa laè' anaè. A ka' duè baè', a ce ye neè mce nje mmïìr, a la' mmbo mbe yeâ nduè, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “AÈ ce yá buu seè'ni a?”	He took hold of the blind man by the hand, and brought him out of the village. When he had spit on his eyes, and laid his hands on him, he asked him if he saw anything.
AÈmboè weèr ce faè' aèbee weèr Nyúè weèe na, weèr ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ená weèe fa maè'shi tá rboèñ Nyúè ce weèe aè koni na li bú aè cicïì ka'.	Working together, we entreat also that you not receive the grace of God in vain,
Nduunjì zhi lɛŋ sê.	This road is very smooth.
Njeèndoñ aè laa embe buèu enáê, “Cena yu muu waè ce máè koèñ seê, a ce yu' rboèñ neè ye.”	"Behold, a voice out of the heavens said, ""This is my beloved Son, with whom I am well pleased."""
Koni neè ye boèñboñ neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè aèmboè nfúr weèe ce weèe woweèe yu aèbee weèe Tata Jisoès weèe. Yi boèñ ená weèe gú'shi neè njáèá ñwáè aèmboè ye anaè.	Receive him therefore in the Lord with all joy, and hold such in honor,
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè seèe, liseèe rla' li yu ba mbe buèu mbe dïì' ce seèe ce keè' seená yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraâis be vúè embo, geèe tá seèe luêñ.	For our citizenship is in heaven, from where we also wait for a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ;
Mnoèñ vi m báti bbaa tá a ka' ye Ñkaâ' caèasi mndap, ba ñkaè' ce a ke ye bráâd ce a láè yis njo ka'. Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a ce roèo njïì tá a bo koo Jisoès aè bfee, yú.	It was now two days before the feast of the Passover and the unleavened bread, and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might seize him by deception, and kill him.
tá ñgúè beâe seè'ni a bo laèa yuu kuèu ñgaâa ntuu Nyúè ce a m yúshi, ká' embe nfeè' ce a m geèe ñgoèñ ca.	that the blood of all the prophets, which was shed from the foundation of the world, may be required of this generation;
Máè m bu' mmbo neè Taitoès ená e vú yá weèe, a laa neè nfúr moè' ená e du a ye. Waè' Taitoès aè m bo' weèe a koshi buu ese weèe a? Weèr Taitoès ku ba ñwáè moè'sir, a ce geèe yeèr buu neè ntee e mo'sir.	I exhorted Titus, and I sent the brother with him. Did Titus take any advantage of you? Didn't we walk in the same spirit? Didn't we walk in the same steps?
Lap rkìŋ rli yu nè wèr.	Their pot is in our keeping.
Pailáèt aè beesïì enáê, “Yuu ce máè sañ, a yuu ce máè sañ.”	"Pilate answered, ""What I have written, I have written."""
Lùr anà tèe sê.	That stone is very hard.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, m ka' ba niñ coêr, m koñ máná m laa mbúè laèa ta aè li ce beèe a rïìñ, tá m bo yá'ni beèe, neè ce ená m laa mmbúè laèa ncúèkïì aè li ce aède' ñwáè yu' ka'.	However in the assembly I would rather speak five words with my understanding, that I might instruct others also, than ten thousand words in another language.
Vʉ̀ ka sò deʼ ɛ.	Please come and lets talk.
M ce laèa ya neè weèe ená ñwáè aè ka' juu ñgwa yïì, ke' ba njobeè' ñgwa yïì anaè aè noèñ a mbañruèñwáèè moè' ka', baná e geèe ñgwa yïì anaè aè noñ a nduu ñwáè moè'. Ñwáè ce e ka' lor njeñwáè ce e fúú bguèu, baná e koo ñgwa ñwáè moè'.	but I tell you that whoever puts away his wife, except for the cause of sexual immorality, makes her an adulteress; and whoever marries her when she is put away commits adultery.
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a laa enáê, “ÁÈháê! AÈ ce laèa seè'ni rara, aè ker ce maè' ba ñgaèa ka'.	"His disciples said to him, ""Behold, now you speak plainly, and speak no figures of speech."
Máâ cu weèr beèe ce mncir vi kur woweèe ka', gee ñgeèe aèmboè woweèe wa'a, tá m bo so woweèe neè Jisos Kraêis. M ce geèe wa'a, ke' ba ená máè loèr mncir ce Nyúè aè m fa aètáèr ka'. M ce yu'ni neè mncir Jisos Kraâis seê.	to those who are without law, as without law (not being without law toward God, but under law toward Christ), that I might win those who are without law.
Njàa zhìi à m bʉ.	His axe got missing.
E duèñshi yi ñger, a da'si ñgaâa naèatu.	He has shown strength with his arm. He has scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.
Woweèe a m loèr beèe ca a tár njeptii ñgaâa ntuu, woweèe a loo, a lá map mmbo mbe waâp nduè.	whom they set before the apostles. When they had prayed, they laid their hands on them.
M ce suñ weèe buu ca faè dïì' ñwáè moè' bo bo' wee neè cuèu ka'.	Now this I say that no one may delude you with persuasiveness of speech.
Beèe ce a m tuu anaè a ka' kúti baè' mbe ndaèp, a yá ená ñwáè rfaè' anaè aè keè'se wáá.	Those who were sent, returning to the house, found that the servant who had been sick was well.
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ñwáè ce e ka' tá koo kúú Nyúè aèmboè muu ñká' ka' baná aède' ñgaèñ niñ mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè anaè ka'.”	"Most certainly, I tell you, whoever doesn't receive the Kingdom of God like a little child, he will in no way enter into it."""
Nfeè' ce vúè, nfeè' anaè aè ghááte seè'ni na, ce ñgaâa rloo ce mini a be loo neè Taèr aè yú' ker ba aè mini. A njáèá ñgaâa rloo ce Taèr e koèñ.	But the hour comes, and now is, when the true worshippers will worship the Father in spirit and truth, for the Father seeks such to be his worshippers.
E m túr mú ñwaè' mo' ce a búèr wáá mba yeâ boè. E m tár yi kuâu maè' mbenduè rdip rgoèr, a tár yi kuâu ñkoèp mbenduè nshe, a waa,	He had in his hand a little open book. He set his right foot on the sea, and his left on the land.
Weèr táá aètu Kraêis, a ce laèa buu ca aèmboè ce laèa lá ba Nyúè seese neè weèe wa'a. Weèr ce bu' mmbo neè weèe aètu Kraâis ená weèe kúti aèbee weèe Nyúè weèe.	We are therefore ambassadors on behalf of Christ, as though God were entreating by us: we beg you on behalf of Christ, be reconciled to God.
Bkúú enjep ñgoèñ a m ba'shi nyor, a ñgaâa sa' to' weèe a vúseè aèbee aè rmaè' bïìr a Tata Nyúè, ker ba yïì Kraêis.’	The kings of the earth take a stand, and the rulers take council together, against the Lord, and against his Christ.'
AÈde' ñwáè lor mruâ' mfi lá njep mñguèp mruè' vïû brúèú ka'. E ka' gee wa'a baná mruâ' mfi anaè mi be loè koo, to'shi mñguèp mruè' anaè, tá mruè' mi kúte aè nsheè, tá mñguèp mruè' anaè vi bú aè cicïì.	No one puts new wine into old wineskins, or else the new wine will burst the skins, and it will be spilled, and the skins will be destroyed.
Nfò yu yaa ràrà.	Nfor is my relative.
E ka' laèa wa' wáá, a laa neè Tomas enáê, “Vúè neè yoè ntubo, yu'shi mbena, naèa yo bo joo yaè mbeèp nyor aègho. Fa keèr tarni ka', byemi.”	"Then he said to Thomas, ""Reach here your finger, and see my hands. Reach here your hand, and put it into my side. Don't be unbelieving, but believing."""
Yu njo' rlii Kraâis ce ená woweèe a m fúú aè mbeè a ke' ce koo yuu mo' ese beèe ce a máñni Nyúè ka'.	because for the sake of the Name they went out, taking nothing from the Gentiles.
Jisoès aè m yi yuu ce woweèe a ce laèa. A laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe ce laèa fa weâe mú ená weèe túr bráâd ka' njoká? Weèe aè be riñ buu ka' a? Waè' weèe aè be riñ mbuèu efa gho ka' a? Waè' ku ba nteèe-tu a?	"Jesus, perceiving it, said to them, ""Why do you reason that it's because you have no bread? Don't you perceive yet, neither understand? Is your heart still hardened?"
Jisoès aè ka' yu', a laa enáê, “Beèe ce a ke roèo ñwáè mcáèp e ke ba ñgaâa byañ, ke' ba beâe btatap ka'.	"When Jesus heard it, he said to them, ""Those who are healthy have no need for a physician, but those who are sick do."
‘Duè yá beèe ca laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe be yu' keèr yu', yu' ka'. Weèe be keè' keèr keè', yá ka'.	saying, 'Go to this people, and say, in hearing, you will hear, but will in no way understand. In seeing, you will see, but will in no way perceive.
ba Jáms ce e m ba muu yïì Sábáèdïî, ba nfúr yïì Joân ce Jisoès aè m too woweèe ená Boanárgáès, ce mbuèu efa gho yu ená “Boo sa'mbeèñ”,	James the son of Zebedee; John, the brother of James, and he surnamed them Boanerges, which means, Sons of Thunder;
Máè yá máná aè yu ñwáè ntee sii, yo ñgeâe bebep yi kur wáè.”	"For I see that you are in the gall of bitterness and in the bondage of iniquity."""
AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' ce Nyúè aè m taase Abraèhaêm, a laa ená e lor Aisïìk ce aè m ku ba muu yïì ce e m túr caè'caè' tañshi tañshïì aègho neè ye naè, aè m ku ba ba rbyemïì ce li m geèe, Abraèham aè ka' yu'ni. E m tami nyor aè rtañshi tañshïì neè Aisïìk, ka' Nyúè aè m kaè' neè ye ená yïì ñgúè be yaa se wa'a.	By faith, Abraham, being tested, offered up Isaac. Yes, he who had gladly received the promises was offering up his one and only son;
E m kwe wa'a, a ker kwe ka', tá yuu bebep yi ker geèe yuu mo' neè ye ka'. Li rcu ce e ce cu seè'ni na, e ce cu a Nyúè.	For the death that he died, he died to sin one time; but the life that he lives, he lives to God.
A mbuèu ce m ce ke' máná a ka' teni mnsa' m riñ aèmboè buu yu, m ka' tuu ye tá e vú yá weèe.	Therefore I hope to send him at once, as soon as I see how it will go with me.
Jisoès aè ka' ba bfeè' ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú, a woweèe a du ñkaè' ce a m ce duè njep feè' njep feè' naè.	When he was twelve years old, they went up to Jerusalem according to the custom of the feast,
E bipshïì enáê, “AÈ koni ká?” Woweèe a laa neè ye enáê, “Buu ce vi koni yu buu ce vi kuèu Jisoâs aè rla' Nasaráèt ce e m ba ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè ce e m ce laèa, ce geèe buu bghagha', a ba ñwáâ ñgoèr aè bsii Nyúè ba beèe.	"He said to them, ""What things?"" They said to him, ""The things concerning Jesus, the Nazarene, who was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people;"
Tee ntaaŋguu anà bkʉ̀kʉ̌ bbaa.	Cut that stick into two halves.
A mɛ̀ tu embe ŋgwaʼ.	I am the leader of the meeting.
Wee kaari wáá, lor ñwáè anaè fa mbaè mmbo Sataèn aè ñger Tata Jisoès, tá e bo yá ñgá', tá Nyúè bo jaè' li ryoèñ aè noèñ ce Tata Jisos kraâis be kúti njep ñgoèñ na.	are to deliver such a one to Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.
Duèñshi neè neè beèe ca ená weèe aè koèñ woweèe neè mini-ñwáè. Weèe ka' gee wa'a, baná bcor wááwá a be yu', rïìñ ená naèatu ce weèr aè m naèa neè weèe naè, aè m ba naèatu mini.	Therefore show the proof of your love to them in front of the assemblies, and of our boasting on your behalf.
Weèe aè ka' ker túr yuu mo' ce weèe aè ba laèa, weèe laa ba mbe rcuteè ce beèe ce a ce sa' rla' a ká'.	But if you seek anything about other matters, it will be settled in the regular assembly.
Ncïìndap Nyúè moè' aè cu' ñgá' ce e m ba njep ghee yi njep roè ba mdip ce mi ce fúú enjep nsheè. Mdip anaè mi beeñgeèr aè bláá.	The third poured out his bowl into the rivers and springs of water, and they became blood.
Woweèe a m loèr muu nsuènsuè ca nteèe a du aègho, yap ntee yi fúteè seê.	They brought the boy in alive, and were greatly comforted.
Ka' woweèe a m laèa buu ca wa'a, woweèe a m loèr nfeè' se aè rgeèe ená beèe ca a borni efa rtañshi tañshïì neè woweèe.	Even saying these things, they hardly stopped the multitudes from making a sacrifice to them.
Nsuu yer zhi ki sê.	Our farm has overgrown.
E laa enáê, “Vúè neè aègho fa neè máè.”	"He said, ""Bring them here to me."""
Jisoès aè ker ma' ñgaèa moè' neè woweèe enáê, “Kúú Nyúè embe buèu yi yu aèmboè ñwáè ce e m byeè ñgúè buu bboèñboñ aè mñkúè.	"He set another parable before them, saying, ""The Kingdom of Heaven is like a man who sowed good seed in his field,"
Woweèe a m kúti aè laè', a kupshi mgúr mo' tá a bo yo' gúâú ñwáè aègho. AÈ m ba nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè, woweèe a lúshïì aèmboè ncir yi m laèa.	They returned, and prepared spices and ointments. On the Sabbath they rested according to the commandment.
Ŋgwe zhisèe zhi ke waa kaʼ.	Our dogs donʼt bark.
Nfeè' aè ka' gháá, e gee máè riñ muu yïì tá m bo suñ beèe enje jáá aèmboè muu yïì anaè. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè máè ke' cu máná ñwáè moè' suñ máè yuu ce m gee ka'.	to reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the Gentiles, I didn't immediately confer with flesh and blood,
E suŋ wèr rghàghar àmbò ŋgwe ba ŋkaa.	He told us a story about a dog and a monkey.
Baná aè rmïìsïì, bfúr waê, weèe lu'shi njobeè' weèe yu weèe Tata weèe. Yi geèe mnsa' neè máè aè ker sañ buu ca neè weèe ka'. Buu anaè be jaè' weèe tá weèe ke' bo lá'ti ka'.	Finally, my brothers, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed is not tiresome, but for you it is safe.
Yuu ce m be fa weèe ncep aègho na yu ba yuu ce m be yoèñshi weèe aègho yoèñshi ka'. E ke ba aè nfeè' weèe aè vúè aèbee aè rgeèe rloo neè Nyúè, weèe ce geèe ba ñgeâe bebep caa ñgeâe boèñboñ.	But in giving you this command, I don't praise you, that you come together not for the better but for the worse.
A m̀ ̀ ba haʼŋgàani wèr à yɛ woowèe.	Last year we saw them.
“Habai, Jisoès ce aè rla' Nasaráèt, yuu ce aè ce roèo ese weèr yu ba ká? Wáè vúè aè ryúshi weèr a? M rïìñ njáèá ñwáè ce aè yu. AÈ yu ñwáâ nrara ce e loè ese Nyúè.”	"saying, ""Ha! What do we have to do with you, Jesus, you Nazarene? Have you come to destroy us? I know you who you are: the Holy One of God!"""
AÈde' beèe a laa enáê, ‘A yi mbena’ na, káè enáê, ‘A yi njena’ na ka', njobeè' kúú Nyúè yi yu fa weâe mú.”	"neither will they say, 'Look, here!' or, 'Look, there!' for behold, the Kingdom of God is within you."""
AÈ m ba entombïì, beèe mo' efa weèe a ce geèe njáèá ñgeèe ca. AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na, Tata Nyúè aè su'sïì weèe, a ker gee weèe aè ba jáá, a ba byáánïì aè ñger Jisoès Kraâis ker ba aè ñger Yú' yïìseèe Nyúè.	Such were some of you, but you were washed. But you were sanctified. But you were justified in the name of the Lord Jesus, and in the Spirit of our God.
M ce laèa neè weèe aè rlii Tata Jisoès ená weèe be' ñwaè' ca neè bfúr wááwá.	I solemnly command you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the holy brothers.
Jisoès aè waa yú' anaè enáê, “Cu nyañ, fúú enjep ye.” Yi nyár ñgaèñ a ma' aè nsheè a waâp bsii, a fúú enjep ye, a ke' báási ye ka'.	"Jesus rebuked him, saying, ""Be silent, and come out of him!"" When the demon had thrown him down in their midst, he came out of him, having done him no harm."
Kèŋ anà zhi yu too a?	Is that door open?
Kuushi neè ená weèe aè m túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè Kraâis ka'. Weèe aè m ba ñgúè beèe Isráèl ce Nyúè aè m ce naè ka'. Weèe aè m túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe neè leè' ce Nyúè aè m ye a yi beèe njo' mkaè'ni ce e m geèe a woweèe naè ka'. Weèe aè m ce cu le rcu enjep ñgoèñ na, a túr yuu mo' ce aède' weèe lá mmir mbenduè mo ka', a riñ Nyúè ka'.	that you were at that time separate from Christ, alienated from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of the promise, having no hope and without God in the world.
AÈmboè yaè ta koèñ máè, má máè aè koñ ye naè. Máè tami nyor aè rkwe njo' yi.	even as the Father knows me, and I know the Father. I lay down my life for the sheep.
Woweèe a ka' ce duè, ñwáè moè' aè yá Jisoès a laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè ka' ce duè ba fá, baná m be kuè ba fa wáâ mbuèu.”	"As they went on the way, a certain man said to him, ""I want to follow you wherever you go, Lord."""
To' yi be maè' bïìr a to' mo', ñkúú ma' bïìr a ñkúú moè'. Njeè be koo, tá ñgoèñ yi ci'ti aè bdïì' jáá jáèá jáá.	For nation will rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom; and there will be famines, plagues, and earthquakes in various places.
Woweèe a m vúè a ba' aè rlaè' Báètsaidaè, beèe mo' a vú neè nfeèp ená Jisoès joo ye neè bo tá e ke'se.	He came to Bethsaida. They brought a blind man to him, and begged him to touch him.
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba ce Nyúè aè m tuu. Li rlii li m ba ená Joân.	There came a man, sent from God, whose name was John.
“M ce suñ wáè neè mini-ñwáè ená weèr ce laèa ba buu ce weèr rïìñ, a ce suñ weèe ba buu ce weèr aè yá neè mer mmir. Weèr aè ka' ce suñ weèe buu ca, weèe aè ke' byemïì ka'.	Most certainly I tell you, we speak that which we know, and testify of that which we have seen, and you don't receive our witness.
Jisoès aè ka' fúr yú' nyúèrkaè' anaè, ñwáè anaè aè ká' a ce laèa. Beèe ce a m ba aèfo a bááñgeèr seê, a laa enáê, “Njáèá yuu ca yi m be koni aè ñgoèñ Isráèl ka'.”	"When the demon was cast out, the mute man spoke. The multitudes marveled, saying, ""Nothing like this has ever been seen in Israel!"""
Beèe aè mmbaa ca a yu bce Oleâf bbaa ce a m sañ aèmboè vi naè, a ker ba mú btábuèr blam bbaa ce vi táá kuèntombïì neè Nyúè ce e túr ñgoèñ wááwá naè.	These are the two olive trees and the two lampstands, standing before the Lord of the earth.
Weèe aè yá aèmboè Nyúè aè fa weèe yi Yú', a ker ce geèe buu bbáèá a weâe mú njïì enjep Yú' anaè. Nyúè ce geèe buu ca njobeè' weèe ce láè mncir, káè njobeè' weèe aè yu' nsuñ mboèñmboñ, a byemi?	He therefore who supplies the Spirit to you, and works miracles among you, does he do it by the works of the law, or by hearing of faith?
M ce loo máná Nyúè aè ka' byemi, e fa máè fáñ seè'ni tá m vú yá weèe.	requesting, if by any means now at last I may be prospered by the will of God to come to you.
Nsïìi rkwe yu buu bbebep, ñger buu bbebep aè ba mncir.	The sting of death is sin, and the power of sin is the law.
Beèe ce a m byemi neè Jisoès aè rla' Antïìyoèk a m ku lu'shi seê, a ruu neè Yú' Rara.	The disciples were filled with joy with the Holy Spirit.
Duè neè yá ba njeèe embe ndúè' Isráèl ce yi m bú naè.	Rather, go to the lost sheep of the house of Israel.
Buu ce weèr aè m suñ weèe aèmboè rvúè Jisos Kraâis ce e m vúè neè ñger Nyúè naè aè m ba ba mghaèghar ce beèe a sañ neè wap bfee naè ka'. Weèr aè m yá yi ñger neè mer mmir.	For we did not follow cunningly devised fables, when we made known to you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but we were eyewitnesses of his majesty.
Blaâa Nyúè ba rloo vi geèe buu ca vi ba byáánïì aè bsii Nyúè.	For it is sanctified through the word of God and prayer.
Yi yu aèndeèe ená a loèr ñgoè' luèr cúú ye kuè ndoñ, lor ye ma' njep rdip rgoèr, neè yïì ce ená e gee moè' efa boo bká'ká' ca tá e gee yuu bebep.	It would be better for him if a millstone were hung around his neck, and he were thrown into the sea, rather than that he should cause one of these little ones to stumble.
Mɛ̀ fuse à rfàʼ anà sê.	I am very inattentive to that work.
Mak ba AÈristakoès, Demaès, ker ba Lukas ce weèr woweèe ce faè', a caè'ni wáè foñ.	as do Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, and Luke, my fellow workers.
Bfúr waê, m ce koèñ neè ya ntee-ñwáè, a ker ce loo neè Nyúè ená beèe Isráèl a luêñ.	Brothers, my heart's desire and my prayer to God is for Israel, that they may be saved.
Nyúè aè m geèe buu bghagha' ce vi m ba jáá se njïì enjep Poêl.	God worked special miracles by the hands of Paul,
AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na, seèe aè luñ efa mncir. Seèe aè kweñger, yuu ce yi m kur seèe naè, yi ker túr ñger mbe seâe nduè ka'. Seèe ce faè' neè Nyúè seè'ni na, a ce láè mncir vïû brúèú ce a sañ naè ka'. Seèe ce faè' neè Nyúè ba aè njïû nfi, ce Yú' yi ce duèñshi seèe.	But now we have been discharged from the law, having died to that in which we were held; so that we serve in newness of the spirit, and not in oldness of the letter.
Noèñ anaè yi be ba tá m fa ya yú' neè ya ñgaâa mfaè' wááwá, mmbañruè ba bbyeèñge, tá woweèe a cep ya ntuu neè beèe.	Yes, and on my servants and on my handmaidens in those days, I will pour out my Spirit, and they will prophesy.
Buu ca vi m ku koni aèmboè AÈsayaè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè aè m sañ naè. E m sañ enáê, “Tataê, waè' ñwáè moè' yu ce e byemi blaâa Nyúè ce weèr aè feè'shi na a? Waè' ñwáè moè' yu ce e rïìñ yo ñger a?”	"that the word of Isaiah the prophet might be fulfilled, which he spoke, ""Lord, who has believed our report? To whom has the arm of the Lord been revealed?"""
Ŋwɛ̀ bepntee e ke sʉ̀ti yuu kaʼ.	An ill-tempered person doesnʼt hide anything.
Nyúè ce e ce sañ na be keè liiti, tá ñwáá yi bañ aèmboè bláá. Tá noèñ yïû Tata ce yi be keè ba goèr keèr ba jáá se naè yi ka' gháá.	The sun will be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood, before the great and glorious day of the Lord comes.
Woweèe a bipshïì neè ye enáê, “E ba gee eká neè wáè? E ba gee aè njáâá ká wáè ka' ce yá buu?”	"They said to him again, ""What did he do to you? How did he open your eyes?"""
Yïì anaè yi ka' mïì, máè ka' naèa mmir fyá' mbekïì, a yá aèmboè ncúèúndúè' embe buèu yi múè'ti. Máè ker yu' njeèndoñ ce e m laèa neè máè a ba aèmboè rsoèñ li ke laèa naè. Ñwáè anaè aè laa neè máè enáê, “Vúè mbena tá m duñshi wáè buu ce vi bii ka' koni.”	"After these things I looked and saw a door opened in heaven, and the first voice that I heard, like a trumpet speaking with me, was one saying, ""Come up here, and I will show you the things which must happen after this."""
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' Jisos Kraâis aè m niñ mbe dïì' anaè, e m duè a ba' mbe dïû' rara ce yi caèa ñger naè nfeè' moè'sir, yi ku mi wa'a. E m duè mbo ba neè bláá mbú káè bláá muu naè' ka'. E m duè ba neè vi bláá. E m loèr vi bláá anaè a tee seèe efa ñgá' ce seèe aè m ce yá njo' buu bbebep ce seèe aè m ce geèe naè nfeseè.	nor yet through the blood of goats and calves, but through his own blood, entered in once for all into the Holy Place, having obtained eternal redemption.
Woowèe a zhe baa mâpŋgiʼ.	They have eaten fufu alone.
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' ncir anaè, yuu bebep yi konïì fáñ a gee máè ce gani buu njáèá jáá jáèá jáá. Mncir vi ka' tá ba aègho ka', buu bbebep yáátïì ka'.	But sin, finding occasion through the commandment, produced in me all kinds of coveting. For apart from the law, sin is dead.
Bfúr waê, tá m kuushi weèe aèmboè Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ce máè m feè'shi neè weèe naè. Nsuñ ca yu nsuñ ce weèe aè m yu' a byemi, a táá njo.	Now I declare to you, brothers, the Good News which I preached to you, which also you received, in which you also stand,
Pol ba beèe ce a woweèe a m ce jáèr, a m naètïû aè rla' Pafoès a niñ mbe keñ a du aè rla' Págaè aè ñgoâñ Paèmfilïìyaè. A ka' baè', Joân aè ma'shïì woweèe a kúti aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm.	Now Paul and his company set sail from Paphos, and came to Perga in Pamphylia. John departed from them and returned to Jerusalem.
E m duè a ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca aè mndap mloo wááwá ce vi m ba aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè.	He was preaching in the synagogues of Galilee.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, yi yu boèñboñ ená m kuushi weèe buu ca aè nfeè' wááwá aèmboè m ku bii nteèe na, tá m bo doèoshi weèe aègho.	I think it right, as long as I am in this tent, to stir you up by reminding you;
E laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Tataê, máè byemi neè wáè.” E ka' laèa wa'a, a gú'shi neè ye.	"He said, ""Lord, I believe!"" and he worshiped him."
Jus a m lïìp máè neè ñgwaèa ce woweèe a ke lïìp beèe aègho ñkaèraè' ncoèp- búè'ú-aè-mntaar naè, nfeè' taê.	Five times from the Jews I received forty stripes minus one.
E gheʼ mɛ̀, mɛ̀ riŋ à rkasi ŋkòŋ laa baa àgho kaʼ.	He has inconvenient me and I donʼt know how to turn the stick with which I am stirring fufu.
E ce jɛ̀r àbtɛŋ.	He is walking with his feet sideward.
Bfʉr bvii a ke zhɛ̀ɛ sê, ŋgɛʼni moʼ ŋwɛ̌ nlee.	His brothers steal a lot, especially the oldest one.
Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa keè'ni Ndap Nyúè, ker ba beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, a ka' yu', bfee vi jep woweèe, woweèe a ká' a ce tarni yuu ce aède' yi lo ba.	Now when the high priest, the captain of the temple, and the chief priests heard these words, they were very perplexed about them and what might become of this.
Jisoès aè laa neè ñwáè ce rkoo li m kwe ye anaè enáê, “Naèti vú mbena!”	"He said to the man who had his hand withered, ""Stand up."""
E m ye leè', a laa enáê, “Wáè ka' bipshi ka' njáèá ká, m ku fa neè wáè, ka' nto'nïì efa ya ñgoèñ.”	"He swore to her, ""Whatever you shall ask of me, I will give you, up to half of my kingdom."""
A ka' nyáá neè yuu aè rraa, baná yuu anaè yi yááti aèwañ.	But all things, when they are reproved, are revealed by the light, for everything that reveals is light.
M be duèñshi weèe máná Muu Ñwáè túr ñger njep ñgoèñ na aè rfoèosi beèe efa yaèp buu bbebep.”	"But that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins""--he said to the paralytic--"
E geèe seèe aè luêñ, a ká' seèe ená seèe cu rcu rrara, aè ke' ba njo' rfaè' mo' ce seèe aè geèe neè ye ka'. E m ká' seèe ba aèmboè e m láè ená yi ba, ker ba njobeè' Jisos Kraêis. E m kwaè'shi buu ca tá ñgoèñ yi ka' keè ba.	who saved us and called us with a holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given to us in Christ Jesus before times eternal,
Du àmbùu Emma suŋ ye enɛ m̀ ce kɛʼ ye.	Follow Emma and tell him that I am calling for him.
Jisoès aè ká' a ce suñ woweèe enáê, “Lor neè nfeè' faè dïì' ñwáè moè' bo' weèe ka'.	"Jesus, answering, began to tell them, ""Be careful that no one leads you astray."
Nyúè aè m kaè' Abraèham ker ba ñgúè Abraèham ená e be fa ñgoèñ neè woweèe. Nyúè aè m kaè' neè Abraèham wa'a njobeè' e m ce láè mncir ka'. E m kaè' wa'a njobeè' Abraèham aè m byemi neè ye a ba yáánïì a yeâ bsii.	For the promise to Abraham and to his seed that he should be heir of the world wasn't through the law, but through the righteousness of faith.
Nyúè aè ka' káè' ce coo, beèe ce ncoèp-baa-aè-rrúèú a vú a yá ye, a laa neè ye enáê, “Laèa tá beèe ca a duse aè mla' ce mi yu aètútú, ker ba aè mla' ce mi yu aè mñkúè, yá ená aède' aè konïì dïì' rnoèñ, ker koni yuu ye foñ lá, njobeè' seèe yu aènjïìsaèp efa mla'.”	"The day began to wear away; and the twelve came, and said to him, ""Send the multitude away, that they may go into the surrounding villages and farms, and lodge, and get food, for we are here in a deserted place."""
E be keè sa' mbe ndúè' Jakoèp aè nfeè' wááwá, tá yi kúú yi mi ka'.”	"and he will reign over the house of Jacob forever. There will be no end to his Kingdom."""
Faèdïì' ce beèe a ka' tá koni weèe ka', weèe kashïì nfúènfú efa weâe mkuèu aè nfeè' ce weèe ce loè, aè rduèñshi ená woweèe a geèe yuu bebep.”	"As many as don't receive you, when you depart from that city, shake off even the dust from your feet for a testimony against them."""
E ka' laèa buu ca wa'a, a ce mce aè nsheè, a top nshe aègho a yo' nfeèp anaè aègho nje mmïìr,	When he had said this, he spat on the ground, made mud with the saliva, anointed the blind man's eyes with the mud,
Nyúè aè ka' suèusi ye embe kúú, a ce Dávïìd aè yaèp ñkúú. E m laèa yuu a kuu ye enáê, ‘Máè yá Dávïìd muu Jásïì e ba ñwáè ce e ghááte aè ñwáè ce e be geèe buu wááwá ce m koèñ.’	When he had removed him, he raised up David to be their king, to whom he also testified, 'I have found David the son of Jesse, a man after my heart, who will do all my will.'
À ce dù ba fɛ?	Where are you going?
Noèñ anaè aè m ba noèñ ce a m ce tami nyor aè rye Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap. Nyúè aè m káè' a ce kuèu ñgoèñ aè nfeè' anaè. Pailáèt aè laa neè beèe enáê, “A yeè ñkúú na.”	"Now it was the Preparation Day of the Passover, at about the sixth hour. He said to the Jews, ""Behold, your King!"""
Sɛʼ efa rjɛ̀r anà à ba ba enɛ mɛ̀ yɛ ŋkar àa.	The advantage of the journey was that I saw my friend.
Jisoès aè lapnïì yú' nyúèrkaè' anaè, yi fúú enjep muu anaè, e ku ke'seè aè nfeè' anaè.	Jesus rebuked him, the demon went out of him, and the boy was cured from that hour.
Ñwáè moè' ce a m ce too ená Jairoès, ce aè m ba ñwáâ ñgoèr moè' embe ndaèp rloo, aè vúê, a ka' yá Jisoès, a gwe njep yeâ tïìi,	Behold, one of the rulers of the synagogue, Jairus by name, came; and seeing him, he fell at his feet,

Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	12	Ñwáè ce e ka' táá tatap, caa rmoèoshïì baná m be geèe tá ñgaèñ ba aèmboè rkïì wa'a, mbe ndap yaè Taê. E be ba aèmboè rkïì ce li be táá mbo nfeseè. Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	3	14	Ñwáè ce máè m yá naè aè laa neè máè enáê, “Sañ ñwaè' neè ncïìndap embe cor aè rla' Laèodisïìyaè enáê, ‘Cena yu blaèa ce vi loè ese ñwáè ce a too ená AÈmáèn. E m cu a ce keè' nfeè' ce kúú Nyúè yi be káè'. E m byemi yuu ce a m geèe neè Jisoès na ka'.	(he had not consented to their counsel and deed), from Arimathaea, a city of the Jews, who was also waiting for the Kingdom of God:
Yu' neè seè'ni, weèe ce weèe cu ce kaè' buu ce weèe be geèe, ce laèa enáê, “Weèr be loè ntïìni, buwa'laèr weèr lo aèyaèñseè duè cu aè to' mo' aèmboè feè', tá weèr bo geèe ntaa, koni mbaèa.”	"Come now, you who say, ""Today or tomorrow let's go into this city, and spend a year there, trade, and make a profit."""
Bkar waê, weèr ce báá weèe wa'a a ku riñ werná weèe ce jáèr ba njep nduunjïû yáánïì, a ce luèñ.	But, beloved, we are persuaded of better things for you, and things that accompany salvation, even though we speak like this.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Vúè neè yá.” Woweèe a du a yá faèdïì' e m ce cu, a cu a Jisoès weèe, ká' embe nfeè' nyúè aè m káè' a ce coo.	"He said to them, ""Come, and see."" They came and saw where he was staying, and they stayed with him that day. It was about the tenth hour."
AÈmboè yi yu na baná ñwáè moè' fa keèr kuèu ñguèñ njo' ñwáè moè' ka'. Buu wááwá yu yeè buu.	Therefore let no one boast in men. For all things are yours,
Ku' beèe a ka' vúè goèr, e laa neè woweèe enáê, “Ñgúè beèe ca yu ñgúè bsaèrbuu. Woweèe a ce roèo ená a duñshi woweèe ncoèo, geewa'a, a be duèñshi woweèe ncoèo moè' caèa efa yïì Jonaè ka'.	"When the multitudes were gathering together to him, he began to say, ""This is an evil generation. It seeks after a sign. No sign will be given to it but the sign of Jonah, the prophet."
Fa maè'shi tá yuu bebep yi so wáè ka'; so yuu bebep neè yuu boèñboñ.	Don't be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
Woweèe a ma'shïì ku' beèe ce a woweèe aè m ba naè, a niñ mbe keñ ce Jisoès aè m ba mbo, a woweèe a ce tuu. Bkeñ mo' vi m ce tuu foñ.	Leaving the multitude, they took him with them, even as he was, in the boat. Other small boats were also with him.
Ñwáè fii anaè ce a m ce too aè li Greâk ená Álemaès, aè jepsïì woweèe, a koñ ená govanoè byemi blaèa ce woweèe a m feè'shi aèmboè Jisoès naè ka'.	But Elymas the sorcerer (for so is his name by interpretation) withstood them, seeking to turn aside the proconsul from the faith.
A mbuèu ce beèe magoèr a weâe mú a sáè, beèe mo' a ce yañ, beèe mo' a kweñgeèr.	For this cause many among you are weak and sickly, and not a few sleep.
Awá ncïìndap Nyúè embe buèu aè yáátïì, a fa ye ñger.	An angel from heaven appeared to him, strengthening him.
Lòr tu cɛ̀ʼ anà sìp vʉ àgho.	Take that piece of cloth as a whole and bring along.
Ñwáè moè' aè m ba aèfo ce e m yañ aè bfeè' ncoèp-waami-aè-mntaar.	A certain man was there, who had been sick for thirty-eight years.
Woweèe a ka' yá aèmboè li táá, a lu'shi magoèr seê.	When they saw the star, they rejoiced with exceedingly great joy.
Abraèham ye ye aè lor buu ce e m koo aè ñkúè bïìr a gap bdïì' rúêú, a lor dïû' mo'sir a fa neè Máèlkisidáèk. Mbuèu efa rlii Máèlkisidáèk ca yu enáê, “Ñkúú ce e ke geèe ñgeâe yáánïì.” Mbuèu efa rlii yi to' yu enáê, “Cumúnyañ” Baná li rlii li yu foñ enáê, “Ñkúú cumúnyañ”	to whom also Abraham divided a tenth part of all (being first, by interpretation, king of righteousness, and then also king of Salem, which is king of peace;

Fa cɛ̀ʼ yaa nè ye.	Give my dress to him.

Wěr ke no mdip nfèʼwɛɛwɛ.	We drink water every time.

Ñwáè aè ka' ku ce geèe ba buu bbebep wa'a, baná ñgaèñ aè ba káè' ce wáp njobeè' e be gweè mnsa' Nyúè. Ma njáèá mor mo' yi yu ce yi be keè yáèr beèe wááwá ce a teèe tuè neè Nyúè.	but a certain fearful expectation of judgment, and a fierceness of fire which will devour the adversaries.

Woweèe a m ce laèa enáê, “AÈ rlii Jisoès ce Pol e ke feè'shi naè, fúú neè duê.”	"But some of the itinerant Jews, exorcists, took on themselves to invoke over those who had the evil spirits the name of the Lord Jesus, saying, ""We adjure you by Jesus whom Paul preaches."""
Woweèe a bipshïì neè ye enáê, “Wáè geèe wá ká a ka' ce yá buu?”	"They therefore were asking him, ""How were your eyes opened?"""
E m ce feè'shi aèmboè kúú Nyúè, a ce yá'ni beèe buu kuu Tata Jisos Kraêis. E m geèe wa'a neè ñger-ñwáè, ñwáè aè ce jepsi ye ka'.	preaching the Kingdom of God, and teaching the things concerning the Lord Jesus Christ with all boldness, without hindrance.
keèr geèe tá buu ce woweèe a m ce súèti njep ntee naè vi yááti aèwañ, tá woweèe a gú'shi, yoèñshi Nyúè, laèa neè yap cuèu enáê, “Nyúè yu a weâe mú neè mini-ñwáè.”	And thus the secrets of his heart are revealed. So he will fall down on his face and worship God, declaring that God is among you indeed.
Mboè weèe rïìñ ená seèe be keè sa' bcïìndap Nyúè a? Yi ka' ba wa'a, yi ka' ba eká aèmboè buu ce vi kuèu liseèe rcu enjep ñgoèñ.	Don't you know that we will judge angels? How much more, things that pertain to this life?
Pailáèt aè ker laa neè woweèe enáê, “Yuu bebep ce ñwáè ca aè geèe seeseê, yu ba ká? Máè yá yuu mo' ce e geèe ce aède' a yú ye aètu mo ka'. Baná a be lïìp ye tá m ma'shi ye.”	"He said to them the third time, ""Why? What evil has this man done? I have found no capital crime in him. I will therefore chastise him and release him."""
Pol aè fúú efa waâp mú, a duê.	Thus Paul went out from among them.
Waè' aède' mdip mmboèñmboñ mi fúú embe dïû' mo'sir a mdip mmbembep a?	Does a spring send out from the same opening fresh and bitter water?
Mboâñtu mi yu neè weèe ce beèe a ka' baa weèe, beesi njïì neè weèe, cáp weèe, bepsi me mlii njobeè' Muu Ñwáè.	Blessed are you when men shall hate you, and when they shall exclude and mock you, and throw out your name as evil, for the Son of Man's sake.
Yi ba ba mini ená beèe ce a kweñger a be fúú efa rkwe ka', a ka' ce baèptir beèe aètu beèe ce a m kweñger njoká?	Or else what will they do who are baptized for the dead? If the dead aren't raised at all, why then are they baptized for the dead?

M ce sañ neè weèe boo waê, njobeè' weèe rïìñ Taèr. M ce sañ neè weâe btaèr njobeè' weèe rïìñ ñwáè ce e m ba efa rkáè'. M ce sañ neè weâe mnsuènsuè njobeè' weèe yu btatap, nlaèa Nyúè yi niñ weèe njep bláá, weèe aè so Sataèn.	I have written to you, fathers, because you know him who is from the beginning. E cu tàtà sê.	He has stayed for so long.

ŋgùŋ2 [ŋgȕŋ] n 1a.	shrub whose stem is sliced and used to make baskets and mats.
Nlaèa ca yu nlaâa mini. M ce koèñ ená aè laa buu ca tatap seê, tá beèe ce a byemi neè Nyúè a bo loèr nfeè' ce geèe ba buu bboèñboñ. Buu ca vi yu byáánïì, sá' aè ba njo neè ñwáè wááwá.	This saying is faithful, and concerning these things I desire that you affirm confidently, so that those who have believed God may be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable to men;

Luke	Luêk	21	35	Noèñ anaè yi be keè ba neè beèe wááwá enjep ñgoèñ na.	For it will come like a snare on all those who dwell on the surface of all the earth.
Luke	Luêk	21	36	Ce ke'ni neè aè nfeè' wááwá, ce loo ená Nyúè fa weèe ñger, buu ca vi loè koni bo joèo weèe ka', tá weèe bo táá njeptii Muu Ñwáè.”	Therefore be watchful all the time, praying that you may be counted worthy to escape all these things that will happen, and to stand before the Son of Man."
E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè ka' du niñ ka' mbe ndaèp yïû fá áè, weèe ku cu ba mbo caar, ba' aè nfeè' ce weèe be fúú efa rla' anaè.	"He said to them, ""Wherever you enter into a house, stay there until you depart from there."

AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè máè, a ka' ce sa' máè, káè ce sa' weèe áè, káè ce sa' ba kor áè, m lor ya yu yïì anaè aè yuu ka'. Ka' máè foñ, máâ ke sa' ya tu ka'.	But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged by you, or by man's judgment. Yes, I don't judge my own self.

Bfee ce vi vúè ba ese Nyúè vi ke geèe ñwáè, e ce geèe ñgeâe rara. Vi ke geèe ñwáè, e cu neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè, ba neè rbonïì-ñwáè, ker túr ntee aè ryu' yuu ce beèe mo' a ce laèa. But the wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceful, gentle, reasonable, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.

Ñwáè moè' aè m ba mbo ce li rkoo mo' li m kwe. "And behold there was a man with a withered hand. They asked him, ""Is it lawful to heal on the Sabbath day?"" that they might accuse him."
Woowèe a ba laa nè yap cùu enɛ a be fʉʉ vʉ̀.	They themselves said that they would come.
Kuushi beèe ená woweèe a yu'ni neè beèe ce a ce sa' woweèe ba beèe ce a yu btu mnta' neè woweèe. Woweèe a yu'ni neè beèe ca ker tami nyor aè rgeèe njáèá rfaè' ce li ka' ba yáánïì.	Remind them to be in subjection to rulers and to authorities, to be obedient, to be ready for every good work,
Nyúè aè geèe yuu ce mncir vi túr ñger aè rgeèe ka', njobeè' ñwáè aè moèo aè rláè mncir laèr. E m tuu muu yïì, e beeñgeèr aè ñwáè aèmboè seèe ce seèe yu ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep, tá e bo geèe tá buu bbebep mïî. A mboè e m so buu bbebep enjep seâe mntee aè njáâá wa'a.	For what the law couldn't do, in that it was weak through the flesh, God did, sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh and for sin, he condemned sin in the flesh;
“Weèe aè yu' ená a m laèa neè beèe eluâuñgoèñ enáê, ‘Fa yú ka', ñwáè ce e ka' yú ñwáè baná a be loèr ye aè mnsa'.’	"You have heard that it was said to the ancient ones, 'You shall not murder;' and 'Whoever shall murder shall be in danger of the judgment.'
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	22	M ce laèa ya neè weèe máná ntee yi ka' yañ ñwáè neè nfúr yïì, baná a be loèr ñgaèñ aè mnsa'. Ñwáè ce e ka' laa neè nfúr yïì enáê, ‘AÈ yu yuu cicïì’ baná a be loèr ñgaèñ aè mnsa'. Ñwáè ce e ka' laa neè ñwáè enáê, ‘AÈ yu lúr’, baná aède' ñgaèñ ke du njep dïû' ñgá' ce mor yi yu njo.	But I tell you, that everyone who is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment; and whoever shall say to his brother, 'Raca!' shall be in danger of the council; and whoever shall say, 'You fool!' shall be in danger of the fire of Gehenna.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	5	23	Baná wáè ka' ce duè neè rfa mbe dïû' ntoèo rfa, kuushi ená nfúroè túr wáè aè ntee bebep,	If therefore you are offering your gift at the altar, and there remember that your brother has anything against you,"

E lor Pitaè ba boo Sábáèdi a baa, a du a woweèe. E m káè' a ce señ buu, mluè mi ce koo ye seê,	He took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be sorrowful and severely troubled.
Baná seèe fa keèr sa' viseèe mnyor ka'. Yuu ce weèe aè ba geèe yi yu ená weèe kani ená weèe be keè geèe yuu mo' ce aède' yi gee nfúr yeè moè' kote káè gwe ka'. Ncïìndap Nyúè ca aè m ku fe' aèmboè beèe a m ce feè'. E m feè' bsaèp embekïì efa ñka' anaè vi ba mmátaè ncoèp-ta-aè-msaèambaê.	Its wall is one hundred forty-four cubits, by the measure of a man, that is, of an angel.
Yi yu mini wa'a. A m faèrshi woweèe njobeè' woweèe a m byemi ka'. Weèe yu ñgúè' moè' efa ce anaè njo' le rbyemïì caè'caè'. Baná weèe fa naèa tu ka', weèe lor nfeè'.	True; by their unbelief they were broken off, and you stand by your faith. Don't be conceited, but fear;
