E ka' yá'ni mïìsi, a laa neè Saimúèn enáê, “Doèo neè keñ du aègho mbe dïì' ce yi coomi, ma' me mraa njep roè, koo nca.”	"When he had finished speaking, he said to Simon, ""Put out into the deep, and let down your nets for a catch."""
Tʉ̀ʼshi tɛ sò cu.	Shift a bit so that we can sit.
Ñwáè aè ka' koñ nfúr yïì, e ker gee yu bebep neè ye ka'. Ñwáè aè ka' koñ ñwáè baná e láè mncir wááwá.	Love doesn't harm a neighbor. Love therefore is the fulfillment of the law.
Wèr ye à kupse mntaʼ.	We have exchanged seats.
Jisoès aè lapnïì yú' anaè enáê, “Cu nyañ! Fúú enjep ye!”	"Jesus rebuked him, saying, ""Be quiet, and come out of him!"""
Weèe aè ka' foosi ñwáè, baná máè foèosi ye foñ. Yi ka' ba ená ñwáè aè geèe yuu ce m foosi ye, m foosïì ye aè bsii Kraâis njo' weèe,	Now I also forgive whomever you forgive anything. For if indeed I have forgiven anything, I have forgiven that one for your sakes in the presence of Christ,
Beèe ce Nyúè aè geèe woweèe a ba byáánïì a yeâ bsii yu beèe ce a ce yu' mncir ba neè btuè' caè'caè' ka', yu beèe ce a ce láè mncir.	For it isn't the hearers of the law who are righteous before God, but the doers of the law will be justified
Baná weèe lor blaèa ca, gee tá mntee beèe efa weâe mú vi fúte.	Therefore comfort one another with these words.
Mo' foñ yi yu ená aè láè ntee neè Tata Jisoès, tá ntee ce wáè láè anaè yi ba aèmboè byáá bïìr, tá mjáá Sataèn ce mor yi yu aè cuèu mo mi bo koo njo.	above all, taking up the shield of faith, with which you will be able to quench all the fiery darts of the evil one.
E be toʼsi yuu ce e ba laa nà.	He will release what he said.
Woweèe a fa cwaèr mmbo ka'. Woweèe a fa' neè wap mmasaè neè ntee mo'sir aè nfeè' wááwá tá yap ñgeèe yi bo geèe tá beèe a vúse buu ce seèe ce yá'ni aèmboè Nyúè ce e yu yïìseèe ñwáè rjaè'.	not stealing, but showing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God, our Savior, in all things.
Ñgaâa rbyemïì ca wááwá a m ku túr nteâe mo'sir ba rkwaè'shïû rmo'sir. Ñwáè moè' aè ke' ce laèa ená buu ce e túr ku ba vi caè'caè' ka'. Woweèe a m ku túr yaèp buu aèbee.	The multitude of those who believed were of one heart and soul. Not one of them claimed that anything of the things which he possessed was his own, but they had all things in common.
“Beèe a ba kwaè'shi aèmboè buu ca boèñboñ se neè bfee-ñwáè. Btu saèamba ca yu mtuèu saèamba ce njeñwáè ca cu mbenduè mo. Btu anaè vi táá aètu bkúú saèambaê.	Here is the mind that has wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sits.
Seèe aè ka' ba aèbee seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe aè li rkwe, baná seèe be keè ba aèbee seèe woweèe, fúú efa rkwe aèmboè e m fúú naè.	For if we have become united with him in the likeness of his death, we will also be part of his resurrection;
Bsoogáè a fa ntañ ená a be yúshi ñgaâa shañ ce a m ba mbe keñ anaè wááwá faè dïì' moè' efa woweèe bo coo njep roè bu' rdip, fúú nje waa ñkúè cañ ka'.	The soldiers' counsel was to kill the prisoners, so that none of them would swim out and escape.
Beèe mo' a m vúè neè bghaèrbeèe ená Jisoès bo la' mmbo mbe waâp nduè, loo neè woweèe. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a lapnïì beèe anaè.	Then little children were brought to him, that he should lay his hands on them and pray; and the disciples rebuked them.
Jisoès aè ker la' ye mmbo nje mmïìr, e tuñsïì mmir, a misi a yá buu seè'ni boèñboñ.	Then again he laid his hands on his eyes. He looked intently, and was restored, and saw everyone clearly.
Muu Nfò cipbtù sê.	Nforʼs child is very stubborn.
Mɛ̀ mʉ yuu yàa làŋlàŋ enje Nàjeryà.	I bought my traditional cloth from Nigeria.
Seèe yu bo rfaâ' Nyúè. E geèe seèe Jisos Kraâis weèe aè ba aèbee tá seèe bo geèe mfaâ' mmboèñmboñ ce Nyúè aè m láè ená seèe geêe.	For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared before that we would walk in them.
aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Mncir Tata enáê, “A be fa boo rñgoèo ce yu boo mmbañruè wááwá neè Nyúè.”	"(as it is written in the law of the Lord, ""Every male who opens the womb shall be called holy to the Lord""),"
njobeè' ñkaraè moè' ce e ce caèa caèa a niñ máè, máè túr yuu ce m tar ye aègho ka',’	for a friend of mine has come to me from a journey, and I have nothing to set before him,'
Njeñwáè ka' kani aè rseñ rtaa mbe tuè baná e ba boèñlaèr koo tu anaè koo. AÈ ka' ba ená yu rïìtu neè njeñwáè aè rkwaèa tu káè koo tu áè, baná njeñwáè señ rtaa mbe tuè.	For if a woman is not covered, let her also be shorn. But if it is shameful for a woman to be shorn or shaved, let her be covered.
E m duè aè yú', a du a fe'shi Nlaèa Nyúè neè byú' ce vi m ba mbe shañ,	in which he also went and preached to the spirits in prison,
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “Yi yu ba ená ñwáè ca káè yïì ta ba yïì ma a m geèe buu bbebep ka'. A m bi ye e ku ba nfeèp tá beèe a bo yá rfaè' Nyúè njep yuu ce a be geèe neè ye.	"Jesus answered, ""Neither did this man sin, nor his parents; but, that the works of God might be revealed in him."
Boo ce a bi ba aèmboè a ke bi boo naè ka'. Yu ba boo ce a bi ba aèmboè Nyúè koèñ.	who were born not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.
Njeèndoñ anaè aè laa neè ncïìndap Nyúè ce e m túr rsoèñ naè enáê, “Baè'shi neè bcïìndap bbebep ce a m kur a lá aèwaâa roè ce a too ená Yufrátïìs naè efa bkúè.”	"saying to the sixth angel who had one trumpet, ""Free the four angels who are bound at the great river Euphrates!"""
E lor bsoogáè mo' ba btu mo' a woweèe a cañ a du a yá ku' kúr beèe anaè. Woweèe a ka' yá a bsoogáè weèe, a borni efa rlïìp Poêl.	Immediately he took soldiers and centurions, and ran down to them. They, when they saw the chief captain and the soldiers, stopped beating Paul.
Tu yïû goèr yi du a yá Poêl, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Suñ ka máè láê, aè yu ñwáè Rum a?” E beesïì ená áèno.	"The commanding officer came and asked him, ""Tell me, are you a Roman?"" He said, ""Yes."""
E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, ‘A be too yaè ndap ená ndap rloo.’ Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèe aè geèe yaè ndap aè kútïì ba aè mbúè' byáèá.”	"He said to them, ""It is written, 'My house shall be called a house of prayer,' but you have made it a den of robbers!"""
Jus a laa enáê, “E laèa ená e ce duè faèdïì' ce aède' seèe vú ka' wa'a, baná e be yú yïì nyor a?”	"The Jews therefore said, ""Will he kill himself, that he says, 'Where I am going, you can't come?'"""
Nyúè ce e ká' weèe, yu ñwáâ mini. E be geèe tá yi ba wa'a.	He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
Woweèe a ke kur mntáèr ce vi ce rïìr seê, lá mbe mkáâámbáè' beèe, ke' koñ aè rnaèa ntubo jaè' woweèe aègho ka'.	For they bind heavy burdens that are grievous to be borne, and lay them on men's shoulders; but they themselves will not lift a finger to help them.
Bàràʼ à m kɛ̀ʼ a vʉ àfa bèe a ce wɛp woowèe sê.	When civilised people first came here many people were afraid of them.

Ku' beèe magoèr a m ce duè a yeâ mbuèu. Bbyeèñge a m ba a waâp mú, a ce koosimnse a ce warse njo' ñgá' ce Jisoès aè m ce yá.	A great multitude of the people followed him, including women who also mourned and lamented him.
Pailáèt aè m koèñ aè rgeèe tá nyor boñ kúr beèe anaè. E fúr Baèrabaès embe shañ a fa neè woweèe, a laa ená a lip Jisoès. A ka' lïìp ye neè byáánsoè wáá, a fa ye tá a bo duè taa mbe kïìntaa. Lávïì aè natïì, a ma'shi yïì buu wááwá, a du a yeâ mbuèu.	He left everything, and rose up and followed him.
Túè' aè ka' raa, beèe ce a m ce sa' to' ba bleebeèe, ker ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir, a vúseè aèbee aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm.	It happened in the morning, that their rulers, elders, and scribes were gathered together in Jerusalem.
Weèe aè ka' táá tatap baná weèe be so me myoèñ.	"By your endurance you will win your lives.
Luke	Luêk	21	20	“Weèe aè ka' yá aèmboè bsoogáè a sïìr Jáèrusaláèm a fa mbetar, weèe riñ weená nfeè' ce a be saè'si rla' anaè ce gháá.	But when you see Jerusalem surrounded by armies, then know that its desolation is at hand."
Wɛ̀ bèeŋger efa dìʼ ce wɛ̀ mʉ du a?	Have you returned from where you went?
Ñwáè ce e m ba nyáèá borni byáèá, ce fa' neè mi mmbo aè njïû yáánïì, tá e bo koni yuu ce aède' e ja' ñgaâa fuèp aègho.	Let him who stole steal no more; but rather let him labor, working with his hands the thing that is good, that he may have something to give to him who has need.
Ñwáè ce li rbyemïì li ka' ba wáèni, weèe koo ñgaèñ a weâe mú. Weèe ñwáè anaè weèe fa sár ba mnsár aèmboè yuu ce e byemi ená e ba geèe ka'.	Now accept one who is weak in faith, but not for disputes over opinions.
a co'ni ye bcáè' efa nyoèr, a lor cáâ' beer a yarsi ye aè nyoèr,	They stripped him, and put a scarlet robe on him.

Nsuŋ anà ku bii àbbìi.	That information is still a secret.
Bfúr waê, aède' mmbïì mi yú mbe ce fer a? AÈde' fer yi yú mbe rtáá a? Yi yu foñ ená aède' aè tu' mdip mmboèñmboñ enjep dïì' ce mdip mgwañ mi ce fúú ka'.	Can a fig tree, my brothers, yield olives, or a vine figs? Thus no spring yields both salt water and fresh water.

John	Joân	15	13	Njáèá rkoèñnïì mo' li yu aègho a ker caa ce ená ñwáè kwe aètu bkar vi ka'.	Greater love has no one than this, that someone lay down his life for his friends.
John	Joân	15	14	Weèe aè ka' gee yuu ce máè laèa neè weèe, baná weèe yu bkar wa.	You are my friends, if you do whatever I command you.
John	Joân	15	15	AÈde' m ker too weèe ená ñgaâa mfaè' ka' njobeè' aède' ñwáè rfaè' riñ buu wááwá ce yïì masaè e ke geèe ka'. M ce too weèe ba máná bkar wa. Cena yi yu wa'a njobeè' máè suñ weèe buu wááwá ce máè yu' ese yaè Taê.	No longer do I call you servants, for the servant doesn't know what his lord does. John	Joân	15	16	AÈ m ce weèe a ce máè ka'. AÈ m ce máè a ce weèe, a tuu weèe tá weèe bo duè yú mbaèñ, tá mbaèñ anaè yi bo cu. Weèe aè ka' gee wa'a, weèe aè ka' loo ka' njáâá ká ese yaè Ta fa máâ rlii, e be fa yuu anaè neè weèe.	You didn't choose me, but I chose you, and appointed you, that you should go and bear fruit, and that your fruit should remain; that whatever you will ask of the Father in my name, he may give it to you.
John	Joân	15	17	Yuu ce m ce laèa neè weèe yi yu ená weèe koñni.	I command these things to you, that you may love one another."
Saèkaèriyaè aè laa neè mmbo ená a fa ye ñwaè'. A ka' fa ye ñwaè', e sañ mbo enáê, “Li rlii li yu ená Joân.” Beèe wááwá a bááñgeèr seê.	"He asked for a writing tablet, and wrote, ""His name is John."" They all marveled."

Mbɛp à fʉ mɛ̀.	I have been affected by cold.
Waè' mncir vi jepsi leè' ce Nyúè aè m ye naè a? Yi yu wa' ka'. Mncir vi m ka' ba túr ñger aè rfa ñwáè ryoèñ ce nfeseè, aè ba kuè ba vi ce vi m ba geèe tá beèe a ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè.	Is the law then against the promises of God? Certainly not! For if there had been a law given which could make alive, most certainly righteousness would have been of the law.
Nyor wááwá aè m ba ku ba ñgúè' nyor moè'sir, yïì anaè aè ba ba nyor ka'.	If they were all one member, where would the body be?

Woowèe a ke sɛr nsɛr sê.	They argue a lot.
Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a ka' kúti a suñ ye buu wááwá ce woweèe a geèe. E lor woweèe a woweèe a lá'sïì nyor a du aè rla' mo' ce a ce too ená Báèrsaidaè. Ca yi m fa woweèe ñger, woweèe a waseè, a ye yuu.	Then they all cheered up, and they also took food.
Máè vúè njep ñgoèñ na aèmboè rraa tá ñwáè ce e ka' byemi neè máè, e bo keèr cu aè túè'nji ka'.	I have come as a light into the world, that whoever believes in me may not remain in the darkness.
Yáê, máè suñ weèe buu ca tá nfeè' ka' gháá.	"Behold, I have told you beforehand.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	26	Baná woweèe a ka' laa neè weèe enáê, ‘Yáê, e yu aè ntee rïìñ’, weèe fa duè aèfo ka'. Woweèe a ka' laa enáê, ‘Yáê, e yu mbaè múè ndap’, weèe fa byemi ka'.	If therefore they tell you, 'Behold, he is in the wilderness,' don't go out; 'Behold, he is in the inner rooms,' don't believe it.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	27	AÈmboè mbeèñ e ke baèp ekuè mbuèuntii ñgoèñ yi raa ba' mbaè mbuèuntii naè, a mboè Muu Ñwáè be vúè aè njáâá wa'a.	For as the lightning flashes from the east, and is seen even to the west, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	28	E ke ba faèdïì' ce gúâú yuu yi yu, baná bjïìkaawaè vi be kaari aèfo.	For wherever the carcass is, there is where the vultures gather together.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	29	“Ñgá' aè mnoèñ anaè be caèa tá nfeè' tuuse ka', tá nyúè liiti, tá ñwáá yi ker sañ ka', tá mkaèñsïì mi gweñger embe buèu, tá buu ñger embe buèu ci'tïî.	But immediately after the oppression of those days, the sun will be darkened, the moon will not give its light, the stars will fall from the sky, and the powers of the heavens will be shaken;
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	30	Vi cïì'ti wa'a, tá ncoèo ce e ce duèñshi ená Muu Ñwáè ce vúè yááti mbe buèu tá bto' enjep ñgoèñ na wááwá vi warse. Woweèe a be yá Muu Ñwáè aèmboè e ce vúè mbe múè mmbaè' embe buèu neè ñger-ñwáè, ker ba neè ku' foèo-ñwáè.	and then the sign of the Son of Man will appear in the sky. Then all the tribes of the earth will mourn, and they will see the Son of Man coming on the clouds of the sky with power and great glory.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	31	Ma rsoèñ li be laèa, tá e tuu vi bcïìndap aè mmbuu ñgoèñ kyeèe tá woweèe a baashi yïì beèe ce e m ce efa bdïì' wááwá.	He will send out his angels with a great sound of a trumpet, and they will gather together his chosen ones from the four winds, from one end of the sky to the other.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	24	32	“Yá'ni neè yuu efa ce fïîk. E ke baè' aè nfeè' ce yi ka' karñger, top, weèe riñ weená nfeè' mbeèñ yu aètútú.	Now from the fig tree learn this parable. When its branch has now become tender, and puts forth its leaves, you know that the summer is near."
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Ñwáè moè' aè m ce geèe ma njáèá ñkaè' mo' goèr, a be ku' beèe seê.	"But he said to him, ""A certain man made a great supper, and he invited many people."
Bsii ñwáè anaè vi m ce laè'ñger aèmboè kwakwa' wa'a, a ce baèñ aèmboè nloèp wa'a. Ghuèghumbeèñ yi m kaari kaèbaèraè' anaè a tarte, ncoèo efa gho aè ba aèmboè ncoèo kaèkar wa'a.	that looked like a jasper stone and a sardius. There was a rainbow around the throne, like an emerald to look at.
Seèe aè koèñni a du a misi wa'a, tá seèe bo keè wáp yuu mo' aè noèñ mnsa' ka', njobeè' seèe cu njep ñgoèñ na, a ba aèmboè ye.	In this love has been made perfect among us, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment, because as he is, even so are we in this world.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè seèe, seèe yu aèmboè njáèá beèe ce a be kúti njïìnjïì loè bú ka'. Seèe be byemi ba neè Nyúè, luèñ.	But we are not of those who shrink back to destruction, but of those who have faith to the saving of the soul.
E ka' vúê, weèe koni ye aèmboè beèe Tata Nyúè a ba koni ñwáè rbyemïì. Fa neè ye yuu ce e ka' buu, njobeè' e jaè' beèe magoèr seê, a ja' máè foñ.	that you receive her in the Lord, in a way worthy of the saints, and that you assist her in whatever matter she may need from you, for she herself also has been a helper of many, and of my own self.
Wáè ka' tá fyá' aè yuu ce yu yïû ñwáè moè' boèñboñ ka', aède' fa nda wáè yuu ce yu yoè neè ñwáè?	If you have not been faithful in that which is another's, who will give you that which is your own?
Ŋwàʼ ca a kìloʼ.	This book is poorly made thing.

Tɛ̀ŋ à to lɛʼ.	The calabash has a hole.

Ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès a ka' ba a Jisoès weèe, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Tataê, waè' aè be kúsi ñger neè beèe Isráèl seè'ni na a?”	"Therefore, when they had come together, they asked him, ""Lord, are you now restoring the kingdom to Israel?"""
Woweèe a gú'shïì neè ye, a nati a kúti aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm neè rlu'shïì-ñwáè seê.	They worshiped him, and returned to Jerusalem with great joy,
Abraèham ce yu yeè ta aè m lu'shi ená e be yá nfeè' yaè. E m yá, a lu'shi.”	"Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day. He saw it, and was glad."""
Ñgúè buu ce e m gweèñger yi ba mbe nshe mboèñmboñ naè táá aètu ñwáè ce e yu' blaâa Nyúè, yu' boèñboñ seê, gee ñgúè, moè' ba rjeèe, moè' ba mntuunfu, moè' ba mntaar.”	"What was sown on the good ground, this is he who hears the word, and understands it, who most certainly bears fruit, and brings forth, some one hundred times as much, some sixty, and some thirty."""
Máèári aè ka' yá ye, a du a suñ beèe ce a m ce ba a Jisoès weèe. Woweèe a m ce cu rkwe, a ce warse.	She went and told those who had been with him, as they mourned and wept.
E ku yop dìʼ anà wɛɛwɛ.	She has occupied that entire place.
Cu neè neè rkoèñnïì-ñwáè aèmboè Jisos Kraâis ye ye aè m koèñ seèe, a fa li ryoèñ a seâe btuè naè. Li ryoèñ ce e m fa na, li m ba aèmboè rfa ce a fa, Nyúè aè yu' rboèñ aègho seê.	Walk in love, even as Christ also loved you, and gave himself up for us, an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling fragrance.
Beèe Farïìsi a m vúè, a ce taase Jisoès. Woweèe a m ce roèo aè rmoèoshi ye, awá a laa neè ye ená e duñshi woweèe ncoèo embe buèu.	The Pharisees came out and began to question him, seeking from him a sign from heaven, and testing him.
Weêe bta ba weêe mmaê, ba bfúr wee ba beèe ce weèe woweèe aè raète, ba bkar wee, a be fyeèni weèe, tá a yúshi beèe mo' efa weèe.	You will be handed over even by parents, brothers, relatives, and friends. They will cause some of you to be put to death.
E m ce kwaè'shi foñ ená Pol be yuni ye. E ka' ce kwaè'shi wa'a, a ce ká' Pol aèfo aèfo a ce de' a ye.	Meanwhile, he also hoped that money would be given to him by Paul, that he might release him. Therefore also he sent for him more often, and talked with him.
E tii ŋkùp, a yɛ bcɛ̀ʼ njo.	He opened the box partly and saw clothes inside.
Beèe ce a m yu' njeèndoñ Nyúè a tee btu neè Nyúè aè m ba weèe ká? AÈ m ba beèe ce Musïìs aè m fúr efa bkwaèa aè to' Ijïìp eluâuñgoèñ naè.	For who, when they heard, rebelled? No, didn't all those who came out of Egypt by Moses?
M yu njep woweèe aèmboè aè yu njep máè foñ naè, tá woweèe a bo ba ñwáè moè'sir neè mini-ñwáè, tá ñgoèñ yi bo rïìñ ená wáè m tuu máè, keèr rïìñ foñ ená wáè m koèñ woweèe aèmboè wáè m koèñ máè foñ naè. Woweèe a be suñ beèe blaâa Nyúè mïìsi, tá nyaâa ntatap ce e m fúú enjep rwee ce lúèsimbuèu yu aègho ka' naè, ma' bïìr a woweèe. E maè' bïìr a woweèe wa'a, so woweèe, yúshi woweèe.	When they have finished their testimony, the beast that comes up out of the abyss will make war with them, and overcome them, and kill them.
Yòo tâ kaʼ tuu wɛ̀, à shê, banɛ a ntèetu.	If your father sends you and you refuse, that is stubbornness.
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' weèr rïìñ buu ca, weèr ce suñ beèe buu Nyúè rara seê, a ke' ce súèti yuu mo' ka'.	Having therefore such a hope, we use great boldness of speech,
Yu njo' ntee boèñboñ ca ce weèe aè m luèñ efa rkwe aè nfeè' ce weèe aè m byemi neè Jisoès. Cena yi m loè ba ese weèe ka'. Nyúè aè m fa neè weèe aè cicïì.	for by grace you have been saved through faith, and that not of yourselves; it is the gift of God,
Woweèe a lo koèñ ba aè rcu aè cicïì, ce kar aè mndap beèe mo' foñ. Yi ka' ba wa'a, woweèe a lo káè' mnsa'ni, keèr ce jepsi ntaè'teè beèe mo', ce laèa buu ce woweèe a ba laèa ka'.	Besides, they also learn to be idle, going about from house to house. Not only idle, but also gossips and busybodies, saying things which they ought not.
AÈ m ba eluâuñgoèñ, beèe ce a m ce laèa ená a ce cep ntuu Nyúè, a ba ba ñgaâa mnde' naè, a m ku ba aè múè beèe Nyúè. Ñgaâa ryá'nïì ce a yu ñgaâa mnde' a be loè ba a weâe mú foñ aèmboè ñgaâa mnde' a m ba aè múè beèe Nyúè eluâuñgoèñ naè. Woweèe a be vúè neè ryá'nïû rbebep, bo' beèe, bepsi woweèe aègho. Woweèe a be kani yaèp masaè Kraâis ce e m tee woweèe efa bkwaèa naè. Yuu ce woweèe a be geèe na yi be geèe tá woweèe a bú aè cicïì cárcár. Ŋkʉʉ e ke bʉ banɛ a be ghar mòʼ.	When a chief dies another one is crowned.

John	Joân	15	3	A kupshi wee weèe foñ, weèe aè raa njobeè' blaèa ce máè laèa neè weèe.	You are already pruned clean because of the word which I have spoken to you.
John	Joân	15	4	Cu neè njep máè tá m cu njep weèe. AÈmboè aède' mba' fartïì enje msini, ker yú ka' naè, weèe aè ka' tá cu njep máè foñ ka', aède' weèe gee yuu mo' ka'.	Remain in me, and I in you. John	Joân	15	5	M yu msini, weèe aè ba mmba'. Ñwáè ce e ka' cu njep máè, má máè cu njep ye, baná ñgaèñ be yú mbaèñ goèr seê. Weèe aè ka' tá cu njep máè ka' aède' weèe gee yuu mo' ka'.	I am the vine. You are the branches. He who remains in me, and I in him, the same bears much fruit, for apart from me you can do nothing.
John	Joân	15	6	Ñwáè aè ka' tá cu njep máè ka', baná a be maè' ñgaèñ aèmboè mba' msini, tá e yuushi. A ke baashi njáèá mmba' anaè, ma' njep mor vi she.	If a man doesn't remain in me, he is thrown out as a branch, and is withered; and they gather them, throw them into the fire, and they are burned.
John	Joân	15	7	Weèe aè ka' cu njep máè, wa blaèa vi cu njep weèe, weèe aè ka' loo ka' njáèá ká ce weèe koèñ ese máè, m be fa yuu anaè neè weèe.	If you remain in me, and my words remain in you, you will ask whatever you desire, and it will be done for you.
John	Joân	15	8	Yuu ce aède' a ku'sïì yaè Ta aègho yi yu ená weèe yú mbaèñ goèr. Cena yi be duèñshi ená weèe yu ñgaâa yá'ni yaè buu.	In this is my Father glorified, that you bear much fruit; and so you will be my disciples."

Ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir ce a m vúâ aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a m laèa ená Básábuèl yu njep ye, a ker ce laèa ená e ce fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' aè ñger ñkúú mnyúâmkaè'.	"The scribes who came down from Jerusalem said, ""He has Beelzebul,"" and, ""By the prince of the demons he casts out the demons."""

Pure religion and undefiled before our God and Father is this: to visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep oneself unstained by the world.
E ka' cu aèfo aè mú nfeè' moè', a nati a jár aè ñgoâñ Gaèláshaè ba Frijïìyaè, a ce fa ñger neè ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès ce a m ba aè bdïì' anaè wááwá.	Having spent some time there, he departed, and went through the region of Galatia, and Phrygia, in order, establishing all the disciples.

E fa ba ñwáè ce e ce geèe buu ba aè mntee ka'. E fa ba ñwáè roñ mbaèa ka'. káè yu ba vïì embe buèu áè, káè yu ba vïì enjep múè nshe áè, káè yu ba yuu mo' efa buu ce Nyúè aè m geèe áè, yuu mo' yi yu ce aède' yi gapnïì seèe efa rkoèñnïì ce Nyúè koèñ seèe njo' Jisos Kraâis ce e yu Tata neè seèe naè ka'.	nor height, nor depth, nor any other created thing, will be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
a du bipshi neè ye enáê, “A wáè ñwáè ce yi m ba ená e be vúè naè káè weèr cu ce ke' ba ñwáâ jáá?”	"and said to him, ""Are you he who comes, or should we look for another?"""

Cena yi ka' mïì, máè ker yá ma ncïìndap Nyúè moè' aèmboè e ce suèu embe buèu. Mmbaè' vi m cete ye aèmboè cáè' ce ñwáè aè maè' aè nyor wa'a, ghuèghumbeèñ yi ba mbe yeâ tuè. Vi bsii vi m ce raa aèmboè nyúè ce e ke sañ na, mi mkuèu mi ba aèmboè mntiti mor wa'a.	I saw a mighty angel coming down out of the sky, clothed with a cloud. A rainbow was on his head. Weèr aè yá, a ce suñ beèe ená Taèr aè m tuu Muu yïì ená e ba ñwáè ce e be geèe tá ñgoèñ yi luêñ.	We have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son as the Savior of the world.

E m naèa wa'a, a ye leè' aè rlii Nyúè ce e ce cu aè nfeè' wááwá, aè ba ye ce e m geèe rbuu ba buu wááwá ce vi yu mbo, a gee ñgoèñ ba buu wááwá ce vi yu njo, a ker gee mdip ba buu wááwá ce vi yu njo. E m ye leè' enáê, “A be keèr caèasi nfeè' ka'.	and swore by him who lives forever and ever, who created heaven and the things that are in it, the earth and the things that are in it, and the sea and the things that are in it, that there will no longer be delay,
A m yá'ni ye buu kuu Tata Jisoès. E m laèa neè ntee-ñwáè, a yá'ni beèe buu aèmboè Jisoès yáánïì seê. Ka' yi m ba wa'a, e m ku riñ yi ba baptïìr yïì Joân caè'caè'.	This man had been instructed in the way of the Lord; and being fervent in spirit, he spoke and taught accurately the things concerning Jesus, although he knew only the baptism of John.
Beèe ce a m loèr woweèe aè rfaè' aèmboè aè nyúè ta naè, a vúê, a la' ñwáè wááwá mbúè mbaèa.	"When those who were hired at about the eleventh hour came, they each received a denarius.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	20	10	Beèe ce a m loèr woweèe aè rfaè' entombïì naè, a ka' vúè, a ce kwaè'shi ená a be laè' woweèe goèr caèa beèe wááwá, a ku la' woweèe foñ ba mbúè mbaèa aèmboè a m laè' bár beèe naè. Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	8	Yi yu wa' njobeè' ñwáè wááwá ce e ka' ce loo, baná e be koni. Ñwáè ce e ka' ce roèo, baná e be yá. Ñwáè ce e ka' ce kuèushi, baná a be múè' keèñ neè ye.	For everyone who asks receives. He who seeks finds. To him who knocks it will be opened.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	9	Ñwáè efa weâe mú ce muu yïì aè ka' loo bráêd, e fa ye ba luèr yu nda?	Or who is there among you, who, if his son asks him for bread, will give him a stone?

Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	12	Baná yuu ce weèe ka' ce koèñ ená beèe mo' a gee neè weèe, weèe gee yuu anaè neè beèe mo' foñ, njobeè' yi yu mbe ñwaâ' mncir ba mñwaâ' ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè wa'a.	Therefore whatever you desire for men to do to you, you shall also do to them; for this is the law and the prophets.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	7	13	“Niñ njïû aè cuâu ñka' ce yi yu yi'seè, njobeè' cuâu ñka' ce yi yu báèbár ba nduunjïì ce yi yu báèbár yi ce duè ba aè dïì' rkwe ce nfeseè, beèe ce a ce niñ aè cuâu ñka' anaè a ba goèr. AÈ ka' keèr ba nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè moè', Jisoès aè du mbe ndaèp rloo, a ce yá'ni beèe mbo. Ñwáè moè' aè m ba mbo, li rkoo maè' li m kwe.	It also happened on another Sabbath that he entered into the synagogue and taught. There was a man there, and his right hand was withered.

"If anyone comes to me, and doesn't disregard his own father, mother, wife, children, brothers, and sisters, yes, and his own life also, he can't be my disciple.
Luke	Luêk	14	27	Ñwáè ce e ka' tá byáè' yi kïìntaa, vúè fa máâ mbuèu ka', baná aède' ñgaèñ ba ñwáè yá'ni yaè buu ka'.	Whoever doesn't bear his own cross, and come after me, can't be my disciple.
Luke	Luêk	14	28	Ñwáè moè' efa weâe mú ka' ce koèñ aè rbaè'ri ndap ce e saèp mbekïì seê, baná e be cu aè nsheè, kwaè'shi aèmboè mbaèa ce aède' e ba'rïì ndap anaè aègho tá e bo yá ená e túr buu ce aède' e ba'ri ndap anaè aègho misi lá,	For which of you, desiring to build a tower, doesn't first sit down and count the cost, to see if he has enough to complete it?
Luke	Luêk	14	29	buwa'laèr, e ka' boo kuâu ndap, lo moo aè rbaè'ri ndap mïìsi laèr, baná beèe ce a ka' yá ndap anaè a be vúèshi ye ce laèa enáê,	Or perhaps, when he has laid a foundation, and is not able to finish, everyone who sees begins to mock him,
Luke	Luêk	14	30	‘Ñwáè ca aè m káè' a ce baè'ri ndap a moo aè rmïìsi laèr.’	saying, 'This man began to build, and wasn't able to finish.'
Luke	Luêk	14	31	Yi yu foñ ená ñkúú aè ka' ce duè aè rmaè' bïìr, túr bsoogáè ncúèkïì rúêú, ñkúú ce a ye a be maè' bïìr túr yi bsoogáè ncúèkïì mmbaa, baná e be káè' entombïì cu aè nsheè, kwaè'shi ená yi ñger yi ghááte aè rmaè' bïìr a ñkúú anaè lá.	Or what king, as he goes to encounter another king in war, will not sit down first and consider whether he is able with ten thousand to meet him who comes against him with twenty thousand?
Luke	Luêk	14	32	E ka' yá ená e túr ñger aè rmaè' bïìr a ye ka', baná e be tuu beèe tá a du yá ñkúú anaè aè nfeè' ce e ku bii aènjïìsaèp, laèa neè ye ená a ye a seesi seèesi ba cuâu mo'sir, borni bïìr.	Or else, while the other is yet a great way off, he sends an envoy, and asks for conditions of peace.
Luke	Luêk	14	33	Yi ku ba wa' foñ neè weèe. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá maè'shi yïì buu wááwá ce e túr ka', baná aède' ñgaèñ ba ñwáè yá'ni yaè buu ka'.	So therefore whoever of you who doesn't renounce all that he has, he can't be my disciple.
Luke	Luêk	14	34	“Mgwañ mi boèñ, geewa'a, mi ka' cir, aède' a gee eká mi ka' ker leêe?	Salt is good, but if the salt becomes flat and tasteless, with what do you season it?
Luke	Luêk	14	35	Mi ka' cir, baná mi be keèr túr rfaè' mo' neè nshe káè neè maènyo ka'. A be loèr mi maè'. Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè', ñgaèñ yu'.”	It is fit neither for the soil nor for the manure pile. It is thrown out. He who has ears to hear, let him hear."
Nǒŋtʉʼ ce sò be dù zhi ghɛɛte a?	Has the day that we have to go come?
E yu mbena ka'. E fúú efa rkwe. Kuushi neè yuu ce e m laèa neè weèe aè nfeè' ce e m ba aè ñgoâñ Galeèle enáê,	He isn't here, but is risen. Remember what he told you when he was still in Galilee,
Yi ka' ba wa'a, máè ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ená weèe fa sáè njo' ñgá' ce m ce yá fa weâe btuè na ka'. Weèe be koni sá' efa ñgá' anaè.	Therefore I ask that you may not lose heart at my troubles for you, which are your glory.
Ku ba yuu yi mo'sir ca ce máè rïìñ máná máè m laèa mbe kansuèr: Máè m laèa mánáê, “Máè táá mbe kansuèr ntïìni na njobeè' máè byemi máná beèe ce a kweñger a be keè fúú efa rkwe.”	"unless it is for this one thing that I cried standing among them, 'Concerning the resurrection of the dead I am being judged before you today!'"""
Yuu máè rïìñ caè'caè' yi yu ená Yú' Rara yi ce suñ máè aè bbu' mla' wááwá ce m ce duè ená m be duè shañ, keèr yá ñgá'.	except that the Holy Spirit testifies in every city, saying that bonds and afflictions wait for me.
Nyor ku ba moè'sir, a túr mñgúè' nyor jáá jáèá jáá, ñgúè' nyor wááwá aè túr li rfaè'.	For even as we have many members in one body, and all the members don't have the same function,
Beèe Farïìsi a laa yap enáê, “E ce fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe ba aè ñger ñkúú mnyúâmkaè'.”	"But the Pharisees said, ""By the prince of the demons, he casts out demons."""
Ku' ñgaâa byañ a m noèñte aè btaèp anaè. Beèe mo' efa woweèe a m feèp, beèe mo' a ba mntáèñ, mñgúè' nyor mmo' vi kweñgeèr beèe mo'. [Woweèe a m cu a ce keè' nfeè' ce túè be káè' ce bañti.	In these lay a great multitude of those who were sick, blind, lame, or paralyzed, waiting for the moving of the water;
AÈ ka' ba njo' ku' li rboèñ, seèe wááwá aè konïì bghoènïì ese ye ñkaèraè' aèñgoo.	From his fullness we all received grace upon grace.
ntáè' Simïìyoèn, ntáè' Lávïì, ntáè' Esakaè,	of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand, of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand, of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand,
Njáèá yuu ce yi koni weèe na yu ba njáèá ká? Mboè weèe túr mndap ce wee ke fúú embo weèe aè banïì yeñger, a ker noñger a? Yi yu boèñboñ ená weèe lor cor Nyúè aè yuu cicïì ker gee tá rïìtu yi koo beèe ce a buu byee ba buu mno ka'. Yuu ce m be laèa neè weèe yu ká? Waè' m be yoèñshi weèe a? Ka', aède' m yoñshïì weèe ka'.	What, don't you have houses to eat and to drink in? Or do you despise God's assembly, and put them to shame who don't have? What shall I tell you? Shall I praise you? In this I don't praise you.
Yi nta' yi be kuè ce duè entombïì, tá ya yi ce kúti njïìnjïì.	He must increase, but I must decrease.
Nfò à ŋaʼ cùu enɛ à rlàa yuu mɛ̀ cir ye.	Nfor opened his mouth to say something and I hindered him from speaking.
njobeè' aède' bláá naè' ba bláá mbú vi siñsïì buu bbebep anaè ka'.	For it is impossible that the blood of bulls and goats should take away sins.
AÈde' ñwáè ncápshi nyor gee yuu ce yi yu yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè ka'.	for the anger of man doesn't produce the righteousness of God.
Túè' aè ka' raa, e fúr mbaèa baa, a fa neè ñwáè ce e m ce faè' mbo, a laa neè ye enáê, ‘Keè'ni ye boèñboñ, ka' ba ená mbaèa ca yi sáè, wáè kyeseè mbaèa mo', baná m be kúti tá m kúúsi yi neè wáè.’	On the next day, when he departed, he took out two denarii, and gave them to the host, and said to him, 'Take care of him. Whatever you spend beyond that, I will repay you when I return.'
A ka' vúè, a ko'shi aègee Jisoès, a laa enáê, “Rabaèi”, a baa ye nje nyoèr.	"When he had come, immediately he came to him, and said, ""Rabbi! Rabbi!"" and kissed him."
Bfúr mo' a m ba beèe nsaèambaê. Ñwáâ nlee aè loèr ñgwa a bi boo a ye ka', a kwe.	There were therefore seven brothers. The first took a wife, and died childless.
Ka' yi yu wa'a, máè yá yuu mo' ce e geèe ce máè ba sañ suñ Tata ka'. A mbuèu ce máè vúè neè ye njep weâe tïìi, lañlañ njeptii wáè ce ñkúú Agripaè, tá seâe ce fyá' nje múè mnsa' ca tá m bo túr yuu ce m sañ.	Of whom I have no certain thing to write to my lord. Therefore I have brought him forth before you, and especially before you, King Agrippa, that, after examination, I may have something to write.
Baná seèe táá tatap, lá mmir ba mbenduè buu ce seèe aè byemi wáá ená vi be koni naè. Seèe fa tarni ka' njobeè' aède' Nyúè buu efa rgeèe yuu ce e m kaè' ka'.	let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering; for he who promised is faithful.
AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' a m vúè neè muu mbe Ndaèp Nyúè anaè, ye ye aè ku tose foñ, a yoñshi Nyúè, a laa aèmboè muu ca neè beèe wááwá ce a m ce keè' ená Nyúè fúr rla' Jáèrusaláèm efa ñgá'.	Coming up at that very hour, she gave thanks to the Lord, and spoke of him to all those who were looking for redemption in Jerusalem.
njobeè' a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, ‘Nyúè be laèa tá vi bcïìndap a ke'ni wáè.’	for it is written, 'He will put his angels in charge of you, to guard you;'
Saimúèn ye ye aè m byemi, a ka' baèptir ye, e ku ce kar a Feleêp. E ka' yá mncoèo ba buu bghagha' ce Felep aè m geèe, e bááñgeèr seê.	Simon himself also believed. Being baptized, he continued with Philip. Seeing signs and great miracles occurring, he was amazed.
Wáè ce aè ce naèa nyor ená a wáè ñwáè Juês, aè ce laèa ená aè yu yáánïì njobeè' aè rïìñ mncir, a ce naèa nyor ená aè rïìñ Nyúè jáá,	Indeed you bear the name of a Jew, and rest on the law, and glory in God,
Jisoès aè naa bo a joo ye aègho, a laa enáê, “M ce koèñ wa'a, keè'se, ba nrara.” E ka' laèa wa'a, msaèasïì mi ku lo yeâ aè nyoèr.	"He stretched out his hand, and touched him, saying, ""I want to. Be made clean."" Immediately the leprosy left him."
Beèe mo' efa waâp mú a lo la' kuèu du aè mndap beèe mo', bo' bbyeèñge ce a yu blúr a ce wáp buu njo' yaèp buu bbebep ce woweèe a jep njep múè mo.	For some of these are people who creep into houses, and take captive gullible women loaded down with sins, led away by various lusts,
Máè rïìñ dïì' ce weèe ce cu, aè dïì' ce Sataèn cu mbe kaèbaèraè'. Weèe aè kani máè efa rba yeè ñkúú ka'. A m yú Antipaès ce e m byemi neè máè njobeè' e m suñ beèe ená e ce duè a máâ mbuèu. Ka' a m yú ye ba faèdïì' weèe ce cu, aè ba dïì' ce Sataèn ye ye ce cu wa'a, weèe aè ku túr ntee njep máè.	"I know your works and where you dwell, where Satan's throne is. Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	14	Ka' weèe ku túr ntee njep máè wa'a, weèe ce geèe buu moè', aè ba buu ce máè koèñ ka'. Beèe mo' a yu a weâe mú ce a ce geèe ba buu ce Balaèm aè m yá'ni beèe ená a geêe. E m yá'ni Balaèk ená e bo' beâe aè to' Isráèl tá a ye byee ce a fa neè mnyúè enjep ñgoèñ na ker ce sakïî.	But I have a few things against you, because you have there some who hold the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to throw a stumbling block before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed to idols, and to commit sexual immorality.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	15	Beèe mo' a yu a weâe mú foñ ce a ce duè ba aèmbuèu ryá'nïì li Nikoèlaès.	So you also have some who hold to the teaching of the Nicolaitans likewise.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	16	Baná weèe kupse, ma' yeè buu bbebep buwa'laèr m vú nfeè' múcaèr seê, lor saè' mbyáèráñ ce m túr kuè cuèu, seèe ma' bïìr.	Repent therefore, or else I am coming to you quickly, and I will make war against them with the sword of my mouth.
Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	17	Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè' ñgaèñ yu' yuu ce Yú' Nyúè yi ce laèa neè bcor wááwá. M be fa ye luâr mbúú ce a sañ rlii rfi mbo, aè ba ba rlii ce be kuè rïìñ ñwáè ce e túr luèr anaè.’ ”	He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. Revelation	Kuu Buu Ce Vi Be Keè Koni	2	18	Ñwáè ce máè m yá naè aè laa neè máè enáê, “Sañ ñwaè' neè ncïìndap embe cor aè rla' Taèitiraè enáê, ‘Cena yu blaèa ce vi loè ese muu Nyúè ce mi mmir mi ce raa aèmboè mcuèñ mor, mi mkuu mi ce laè'ñger aèmboè co' ce ñgaâa ntoèo nlaèa a kupshi wa'a. Fuu à niŋ njer tar mtaaŋguu.	The mouse has entered within the logs.

Wer bta a m vúè aègho aèfa aè nfeè' ce Joshuèwaè aè m ba yap tu, woweèe a vú a so yap ñgoèñ, Nyúè aè juu beèe enje jáá ce a m ba aèfo a waâp bsii naè. Yi m cu neè woweèe caar a ba' mbe nfeè' yïì Dávïìd.	which also our fathers, in their turn, brought in with Joshua when they entered into the possession of the nations, whom God drove out before the face of our fathers, to the days of David,

AÈde' ñwáè soogáâ mboèñmboñ cu aèmboè beâe aè laè' a ke cu naè ka', njobeè' yi yu ená e gee ba yuu ce yi boèñ yïì ñwáâ ñgoèr.	No soldier on duty entangles himself in the affairs of life, that he may please him who enrolled him as a soldier.

Mɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛ ncàʼ à cɛ̀ʼ.	I have smeared my cloth with mud.
Woweèe a m ce ye byee aè mbuèuñkuèr, Sataèn aè banïì gee Judaès ce muu Saimún IÌskarïìyoèt aè ká' a ce kwaè'shi ená e be fyeèni Jisoès.	During supper, the devil having already put into the heart of Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, to betray him,
Ncïìndap Nyúè embenjïì mo aè fyáp rsoèñ li. E ka' fyáp, ma rkaèñsïì ce li m ce káti aèmboè rsuèsuèñ wa'a, li gwe embe buèu. Li m gweè mbenduè ñgúè' moè'sir efa ñgúè' taar efa mdip ker ba faèdïì' mdip mi ke fúú.	The third angel sounded, and a great star fell from the sky, burning like a torch, and it fell on one third of the rivers, and on the springs of the waters.
Yu ye ce e geèe seèe aè ce cu neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè. E m geèe beèe ce a yu Juês, ker ba beèe ce a yu Jus ka' a ba ñwáè moè'sir. E m loèr yïì nyor a ca'si buu ce vi m gaèpni seèe, a gee seèe aè banïì naè, aègho.	For he is our peace, who made both one, and broke down the middle wall of partition,
Baná weèe kuushi buu ce a yá'ni weèe, weèe aè byemïì naè. Geèe neè buu anaè, ker kupse ye ntee, buwa'laèr m lo búú weèe búèú aèmboè nyáèá wa'a. Weèe be rïìñ nfeè' ce m be vúè ka'.	Remember therefore how you have received and heard. Keep it, and repent. If therefore you won't watch, I will come as a thief, and you won't know what hour I will come upon you.
Muu wàa à kɛ̀ʼ a ce coʼ kùu.	My child has begun to walk.
a ka' ce kúti, a cu mbe yïì mutuè ce aè m ce súèñ ba mnyaèabaèraè', a ce beè' ñwaâ' AÈsayaè ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè.	He was returning and sitting in his chariot, and was reading the prophet Isaiah.

Then he said to them, ""Give therefore to Caesar the things that are Caesar's, and to God the things that are God's."""
Wèr à mʉ tee msaŋ nèŋkùr.	We harvested rice yesterday.

Woowèe a kùʼsi nsuŋ anà.	They have exaggerated that information.

Tee mɛ̀ à ncùu.	Assist me in playing the drum.
Nduu yu tu neè ñgwa aèmboè Kraâis ye ye yu tu neè cor naè. Yu ye ce e geèe cor aè luêñ, cor ca aè ba yïì nyor.	For the husband is the head of the wife, and Christ also is the head of the assembly, being himself the savior of the body.
Jisoès aè ka' laèa buu ca, a naa mmir a ke' mbe buèu a laa enáê, “Taèr, nfeè' aè gháá. Kuè'si muu woè, tá muu woè ye ye bo kuè'si wáè.	"Jesus said these things, and lifting up his eyes to heaven, he said, ""Father, the time has come. Glorify your Son, that your Son may also glorify you;"
Ka' ba ená aède' weèe gee yuu ce yi ku ba múcaèr aèmboè yïì anaè ka', mluè mi ka' ce koo weèe aè bár buu mo' caè njoká?	If then you aren't able to do even the least things, why are you anxious about the rest?
Beèe ce a kweñger a ka' tá keè fúú efa rkwe ka', baná Nyúè aè m fúr Jisos Kraâis efa rkwe foñ ka'.	For if the dead aren't raised, neither has Christ been raised.
E ka' bii ce laèa, beèe mo' embe ndaèp Jairoès a vú neè ntuu ená muu yïì aè lá kwe, e fa keèr fa lá Jisoès ñgá' tá e vú aè cicïì ka'.	"While he was still speaking, people came from the synagogue ruler's house saying, ""Your daughter is dead. Why bother the Teacher any more?"""
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Baná a m baèptir weèe ba aè njáâá ká?” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “A m baèptir weèr ba neè baèptir yïì Joân.”	"He said, ""Into what then were you baptized?"" They said, ""Into John's baptism."""
Rumàn kʉ̀kʉ̀ ntuufu, ŋgoo baa, à làa enɛ .	.
Woweèe a m laèa a waâp mú enáê, “Seèe fa saèa cáè' ca ka', seèe ma' kaèñ tá seèe bo yá ñwáè ce saèaro ca be duè neè ye.” Cena yi m koni tá yi bo ghááte aèmboè a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “A m gaèp wa bcáè' a waâp mú, a ker ma' kaèñ tá a bo yá ñwáè ce yaè saèaro be duè neè ye.” Bsoogáè a m ku gee aèmboè a m sañ.	"Then they said to one another, ""Let's not tear it, but cast lots for it to decide whose it will be,"" that the Scripture might be fulfilled, which says, ""They parted my garments among them. For my cloak they cast lots."" Therefore the soldiers did these things."
Bfúr waê, m ka' vú aè rcaè'ni weèe, laa neè weèe ba aè li ce máè m be yá'ni ka', waè' aède' yïì anaè yi ja' weèe a? Ka' ba ená máè vúè a suñ weèe yuu mo' fi, káè a gee buu Nyúè vi ba rara neè weèe áè, káè a cep ntuu Nyúè neè weèe, káè a yá'ni weèe áè, yïì anaè yi be jaè' weèe.	But now, brothers, if I come to you speaking with other languages, what would I profit you, unless I speak to you either by way of revelation, or of knowledge, or of prophesying, or of teaching?
gháè', no buu vi koo, ñañ ker ba buu moè' ce vi ku ba aèmboè bca. M ce laèa neè weèe tatap aèmboè máè m laèa neè weèe naè, ená aède' beèe ce a ce geèe njáèá buu ca a konïì ñgúè' moè' efa kúú Nyúè ka'.	envyings, murders, drunkenness, orgies, and things like these; of which I forewarn you, even as I also forewarned you, that those who practice such things will not inherit the Kingdom of God.
“Rla' Sayoèn, fa wáp ka'. Yá yoè ñkúú aèmboè e ce vúè, a cu mbenduè muu jaèaki'.”	Don't be afraid, daughter of Zion. Behold, your King comes, sitting on a donkey's colt.
Loo neè neè Nyúè aè nfeè' wááwá. Weèe aè ka' ce loo wa'a, weèe ma'shi tá Yú' Rara yi gee tá weèe riñ aè rloo. Cu neè njo, ke' sá ka'. Loo neè neè beèe Nyúè wááwá aè nfeè' wááwá,	with all prayer and requests, praying at all times in the Spirit, and being watchful to this end in all perseverance and requests for all the saints:
A mbuèu ce Nyúè aè m ce máè ená m ba ñwáè rfeè'shïì ker ba ñwáè ntuu foñ. Yuu ce m ce laèa na yu yuu mini, m ce nya' ba mnde' ka'. Nyúè aè m ce máè wa'a tá m bo yá'ni beèe enje jáá yuu mini, tá woweèe a riñ foñ aèmboè aède' ñwáè byemïì neè Jisos Kraêis.	to which I was appointed a preacher and an apostle (I am telling the truth in Christ, not lying), a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Máè suñ weèe wáá, weèe aè byemïì ka'. Buu ce m ce geèe aè rlii yaè Taê, vi ce duèñshi njáèá ñwáè ce m yu.	"Jesus answered them, ""I told you, and you don't believe. The works that I do in my Father's name, these testify about me."
Baná ñwáè efa boo a baa ca ce e m geèe yuu ce yïì ta aè m koèñ aè m ba nda?” Woweèe a beesïì enáê, “Muu nlee.” Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ñgaâa ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' ba bkwaèraè a ce duè mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè entombïì neè weèe.	"Which of the two did the will of his father?"" They said to him, ""The first."" Jesus said to them, ""Most certainly I tell you that the tax collectors and the prostitutes are entering into the Kingdom of God before you."
Weèr aè ka' loâ aèfo, a du a ba' aè rla' Fileèpaêi. AÈ m ba rla' ce baèraè' ce a m vúâ Rum a m ce sa'. AÈ m ba rla' rgoâr aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè. Weèr aè m cu aèfo aè mnoèñ aèñgoo.	and from there to Philippi, which is a city of Macedonia, the foremost of the district, a Roman colony. We were staying some days in this city.
Weèr aè m laèa neè weèe aè nfeè' ce seèe aè m ba naè wáá ená ñwáè ka' tá faè' ka', e fa ye ka'.	"For even when we were with you, we commanded you this: ""If anyone will not work, neither let him eat."""
ba Saimúèn ce e m ba moè' efa múè beèe Siloèt ba Judas IÌskarïìyoèt ce e m loè a fyeni Jisoès naè.	Simon the Canaanite; and Judas Iscariot, who also betrayed him.
Weèe aè m be yá Jisos Kraâis ka', a ku koñ ye. Weèe ce yá ye seè'ni na ka', a ku byemi neè ye, a ce lu'shi njáèá rlu'shïì ce aède' ñwáè suñ ka',	whom not having known you love; in whom, though now you don't see him, yet believing, you rejoice greatly with joy unspeakable and full of glory--
Rwáp li yu njep rkoèñnïì ka'. Yi yu ená rkoèñnïì ce li mïìsi li ke juèu rwáp, njobeè' rwáp li ke ba ba aè nfeè' ce seèe aè rïìñ ená a be fa seèe ñgá' njobeè' seèe aè geèe yuu bebep. Baná rkoèñnïì lïû ñwáè ce e ce wáp buu li yu aè bábá'.	There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear has punishment. He who fears is not made perfect in love.
Pol aè m ce koèñ ená a Timotïì a duê, yi ka' ba wa'a, a gee ye búè njobeè' Jus wááwá ce a m ba aè bdïì' anaè a m rïìñ ená yïì ta yu ñwáè Greês.	Paul wanted to have him go out with him, and he took and circumcised him because of the Jews who were in those parts; for they all knew that his father was a Greek.
E m laèa enáê, ‘AÈ ka' ba njobeè' máè m boo mbañruèñwáè ba njeñwáè, mbañruèñwáè be maè'shi yïì ta ba yïì maê, cu a ñgwa yïì, tá a ye a ba ñwáè moè'sir.’	and said, 'For this cause a man shall leave his father and mother, and shall join to his wife; and the two shall become one flesh?'
Wèr à dù njep Ntʉ̀, woowèe a du yap à cǔu moʼ.	We went to Ntfu but they went to a different direction.
Awá Yú' Nyúè yi lor Jisoès a du aègho aè ntee rïìñ tá Sataèn bo moèoshi ye.	Then Jesus was led up by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil.
AÈ ka' ba aè mbuèuñkuèr, ñwáè nsuu aè laa neè yïì ñwáè rfaè' ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa mfaè' enáê, ‘Ká' ñgaâa mfaè', la' woweèe. Káè' la' beèe ce máè ba lor elúèsimbuèu naè, ka' la' bár beèe, misi neè beèe ce máè ba lor entombïì naè.’	When evening had come, the lord of the vineyard said to his manager, 'Call the laborers and pay them their wages, beginning from the last to the first.'
Rjɛɛ anà rli tɛɛ kùyɛɛ.	That arrow is straight.
Woweèe a m tuu, a ba' aè ñgoâñ beèe Gáèrasaè. Wáè ka' táá aè ñgoèñ anaè, ñgoâñ Galeèle yi kútïì neèñguu roè.	They arrived at the country of the Gadarenes, which is opposite Galilee.
Jisoès ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a m ce caèa aè ñkúè msañ moè' nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè, woweèe a ce tee tu msañ a ce ye.	It happened that he was going on the Sabbath day through the grain fields, and his disciples began, as they went, to pluck the ears of grain.
Yáê, a maè' yeè Ndap Nyúè e táá mboèmmbo.	Behold, your house is left to you desolate.
Woweèe a ku bii tarni a ke' be byemi ka', a ce yu' rboèñ, a ce báèáñger seê. E bipshïì neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe túr yuu ye taâa a?”	"While they still didn't believe for joy, and wondered, he said to them, ""Do you have anything here to eat?"""
Yu'-neè rboèñ ce lu'shi njobeè' wee blaè' embe buèu vi yu goèr seê. Woweèe a m ku fa ñgá' neè ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè ce a m ba entombïì neè weèe naè wa'a.	Rejoice, and be exceedingly glad, for great is your reward in heaven. For that is how they persecuted the prophets who were before you.
Woweèe a m ce yoèp enáê, “Nyúè ghoni ñkúú ce e ce vúè aè rlii Tataê, tá cumúnyañ ba mbe buèu. Seèe ku'si Nyúè embe buèu.”	"saying, ""Blessed is the King who comes in the name of the Lord! Peace in heaven, and glory in the highest!"""
Buu ca aè ka' koni wa'a, ku' beèe aè mncúèkïì aè mncúèkïì, a kaarïì a ce nyoèrni, a ce nyáèñshi beèe mo' neè mkuèu. Jisoès aè ká' entombïì a laa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu enáê, “Loèr neè nfeè' neè yes beèe Farïìsi ce yu ñgaâa mbo'ni naè.	"Meanwhile, when a multitude of many thousands had gathered together, so much so that they trampled on each other, he began to tell his disciples first of all, ""Beware of the yeast of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy."
See ke loèr rlee yoñshi Nyúè ce e yu yïìseèe Tata aègho, ker lor ro' bfúr viseèe ce Nyúè aè m boo a feeseè ye aègho.	With it we bless our God and Father, and with it we curse men, who are made in the image of God.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè ye enáê, “Wáâ too máè ená ñwáâ mboèñmboñ njoká? Ñwáè moè' yu ñwáâ mboèñmboñ ka', ñwáâ mboèñmboñ ku ba Nyúè caè'caè'.	"Jesus said to him, ""Why do you call me good? No one is good except one--God."
Weèe aè ba rïìñ weená yi yu boèñboñ ená ñwáè moè'sir kwe aètu beèe neè ce ená to' sïìp yi bú.”	"nor do you consider that it is advantageous for us that one man should die for the people, and that the whole nation not perish."""
Yi yu mini wa'a ená ká' ese aè nfeè' anaè vú ba' seè'ni na, woweèe a ke beè' mncir Musïìs, yuu mo' yi ce cete wap bfee, woweèe a ke' riñ yuu ce a ce beè' ka'.	But to this day, when Moses is read, a veil lies on their heart.
E m yá aèmboè rbuu li múè'ti, yuu mo' yi ce suèu embo aèmboè ma cáâ' báèbár wa'a, a ghashïì aè bcuèu kyeèe efa gho a suusi njep nsheè.	He saw heaven opened and a certain container descending to him, like a great sheet let down by four corners on the earth,
E yu Nyúè bgúâú beèe ka', e yu ba Nyúè beèe ce a cu bteèe. Weèe ce faèa seê.”	"He is not the God of the dead, but of the living. You are therefore badly mistaken."""
Seèe rïìñ ená seèe yu boo Nyúè, a riñ ená ñgoèñ wááwá yi yu mbaè mmbo Sataèn.	We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies in the power of the evil one.
Wèr kòŋ woowèe kaʼ koomucàr.	We donʼt love them at all.
A mbuèu ce máè tuu Timotïì ená e vú yá weèe tá e bo keèr suñ weèe aèmboè ñgeâe boèñboñ ce m ce geèe njobeè' m ce duè aèmbuèu Jisos Kraêis. Timotïì yu muu waè ce máè koèñ, njobeè' weèr ye yu ñwáè moè'sir njep Tata Jisos Kraêis. E ke faè' neè yi ntee-ñwáè. Buu ce e be suñ weèe yu buu ce m ce yá'ni aè bcor ce vi yu aè bdïì' wááwá.	Because of this I have sent Timothy to you, who is my beloved and faithful child in the Lord, who will remind you of my ways which are in Christ, even as I teach everywhere in every assembly.
M ce laèa wa'a njobeè' Nyúè aè fa seèe ba yú' ce yi geèe seèe ce wáp buu ka', e fa seèe ba yú' ce yi geèe seèe túr ñger ba ntee rkoèñnïì ker ba ntee ce aètaè yi gee seèe túr ñger mbenduè yïìseèe nyor.	For God didn't give us a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and self-control.
a yá yïì ce a m kur yi tu aègho naè. Yi m noèñ aègee vïì anaè ka'. Yi m kashi nyor a noñ jáá.	and the cloth that had been on his head, not lying with the linen cloths, but rolled up in a place by itself.
AÈde' seèe laa seená yi yu aèmboè ñgúè mostaè ce e ñwáási seê.	It's like a grain of mustard seed, which, when it is sown in the earth, though it is less than all the seeds that are on the earth,
Woweèe a du aègho a fa neè Jisoès, a co'ni bcáè' a laashi mbenduè mo, a ko'si Jisoès mbo.	They brought it to Jesus. They threw their cloaks on the colt, and set Jesus on them.
Bfúr vi a m ce laèa wa'a, a byemi neè ye ka' foñ.	For even his brothers didn't believe in him.
A mbuèu ce ntee yi m bep máè neè beèe anaè, máè laa máná woweèe a kani efa ryu'ni neè máè, a ker riñ ya nduunjïì ka'.	Therefore I was displeased with that generation, and said, 'They always err in their heart, but they didn't know my ways;'
Baènabaès ba Pol a ka' yu' yuu ce beèe ca a m ce roèo aè rgeèe neè woweèe, a shashi wap bcáè', a cañ a niñ mbe waâp mú, a laa mbekïì enáê,	But when the apostles, Barnabas and Paul, heard of it, they tore their clothes, and sprang into the multitude, crying out,
Rboâñtu li yu neè ñwáè ce e ce tarni máè tarni ka'.”	"Blessed is he who finds no occasion for stumbling in me."""
Njeñwáè anaè aè m ba ñwáè enje jáá. A m bi ye aè ñgoâñ Sïìroèfoènisïìyaè. E m bu' mmbo neè Jisoès ená e fúr yú' nyúèrkaè' ca enjep muu yïì.	Now the woman was a Greek, a Syrophoenician by race. She begged him that he would cast the demon out of her daughter.
Ka' yi yu rara ená beèe mo' a be baè' aè dïû' rlúèshïì anaè wa'a, yi ku ba rara foñ ená beèe ce a m yu' blaâa Nyúè a byemi ka' naè, a m baè' aè dïû' rlúèshïì anaè ka'.	Seeing therefore it remains that some should enter therein, and they to whom the good news was before preached failed to enter in because of disobedience,
Kwaè'shi ka neè aèmboè Abraèhaêm. A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Abraèham aè m byemi yuu ce Nyúè aè m laèa, li rbyemïì anaè li gee e ba ñwáâ nyáánïì aè bsii Nyúè.”	"Even as Abraham ""believed God, and it was counted to him for righteousness."""
A ka' fa weèe ñgá' aè rla' mo', weèe cañ du aè rla' mo' jáá. M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená weèe be jáèr aè mla' Isráèl wááwá ka', tá Muu Ñwáè vúê.	But when they persecute you in this city, flee into the next, for most certainly I tell you, you will not have gone through the cities of Israel, until the Son of Man has come.
Bfúr waê, m ce bu' mmbo neè weèe ená weèe lor ba ya ñgeèe aèmboè má máè aè loèr ñgeèe ye naè. Weèe aè m be gee yuu bebep neè máè ka' koo múcaèr.	I beg you, brothers, become as I am, for I also have become as you are. You did me no wrong,
E m kwe aè btu beèe wááwá, tá beèe ce a cu bteèe a bo cu neè yap tu ka', cu ba aètu ñwáè ce e m kwe a waâp tuè, a fúú efa rkwe.	He died for all, that those who live should no longer live to themselves, but to him who for their sakes died and rose again.
AÈde' yuu mo' yi caa rkoèñnïì ka'. Rkoèñnïì li ke yá faèa ñwáè ka', li ke kwaè'shi boèñboñ aèmboè beèe mo', ker táá tatap aè nfeè' wááwá.	bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.
A be koo weèe fa mbe mmbo beèe mo' tá a fa weèe ñgá', yúshi weèe. Beèe wááwá a be baèa weèe njo' máè.	Then they will deliver you up to oppression, and will kill you. You will be hated by all of the nations for my name's sake.
AÈ m ba aè mnoèñ anaè, Jisoès aè ko' mbe rtuèu aè rgeèe rloo, a cu mbo, a loo neè Nyúè caar túè' aè raa.	It happened in these days, that he went out to the mountain to pray, and he continued all night in prayer to God.
Beèe mo' beèe ñkyeèe, a byá' ñwáè ce yïì ñgúè' nyor mo' aè m kwe, a vú aègho.	Four people came, carrying a paralytic to him.
Awá woweèe a gheteèr ená a ba koo ye. A ka' gheèter wa'a, ñwáè aè joo ye ka' njobeè' yïì nfeè' aè m be gháá ka'.	They sought therefore to take him; but no one laid a hand on him, because his hour had not yet come.
A ke too ye enɛ Nfò a?	Is he called Nfor?
Bfúr waê, rmoèoshïì jáá jáèá jáá li ka' vú neè weèe njo' le rbyemïì baná weèe kuè ce lu'shi,	Count it all joy, my brothers, when you fall into various temptations,
Yuu entombïì ce m ce laèa neè wáè yi yu ená weèe loo neè beèe wááwá, yoñshi Nyúè, loo buu ce weèe aè buu ese ye. Loo ená e ja' beèe mo' foñ.	I exhort therefore, first of all, that petitions, prayers, intercessions, and givings of thanks, be made for all men:
Ñwáè moè' aè m vúè a yá Jisoès, a bipshi neè ye enáê. “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, yuu boèñboñ ce aède' m gee ka' koni ryoèñ ce nfeseè yu ba ká?”	"Behold, one came to him and said, ""Good teacher, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?"""
njobeè' nfeè' moè' be ba tá beèe a laa enáê, ‘Rboâñtu li yu neè bbyeèñge ce a yu bkar, ce a m be bi boo ka', a ker nyoñsi boo ka'.’	For behold, the days are coming in which they will say, 'Blessed are the barren, the wombs that never bore, and the breasts that never nursed.'
Timotïì ce weèr ye ce faè' aèbee, aè caè'ni weèe. Lushoès ba Jasïìn, ba Soèsipataè ce weèr woweèe yu Jus naè, a caè'ni weèe foñ.	Timothy, my fellow worker, greets you, as do Lucius, Jason, and Sosipater, my relatives.
Waè' yi yááti ená yuu ce Nyúè aè m kaè' neè beèe Isráèl yi buu efa rgeèetïì a? Yi yu wa' ka'. Beèe wááwá embe ndúè' Isráèl a yu beèe Isráèl ka'.	But it is not as though the word of God has come to nothing. For they are not all Israel, that are of Israel.
Weèe ka' tá ce wáp ye ñgaâa bbaèa ka', ca yi be ba ncoâo nrara neè woweèe ená woweèe a be kwe, bú, keèr duèñshi ená Nyúè be geèe tá weèe luêñ.	and in nothing frightened by the adversaries, which is for them a proof of destruction, but to you of salvation, and that from God.
Baná weèe aè ka' ce fa yuu neè beèe ce a buu yuu, weèe fa fyáp msoèñ tá beèe a bo rïìñ yuu ce weèe aè geèe ka'. Ñgaâa mbo'ni a ke geèe wa'a aè mndap mloo ker ba aè btase tá beèe a bo ce yoèñshi woweèe. M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená woweèe a koni wap blaè' wáá.	Therefore when you do merciful deeds, don't sound a trumpet before yourself, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may get glory from men. Most certainly I tell you, they have received their reward.
Máè yá ncïìndap Nyúè moè' aèmboè e nyáá ekuè mbuèuntii, a túr rkáèá Nyúè ce e yu nteèe. AÈ m ba rkáèá ce a ke fa ncoèo beèe Nyúè aègho. E m fuñ bcïìndap Nyúè ce a m ba beèe ñkyeèe, ce Nyúè aè m fa woweèe ñger ená a bepsi buâu aè nsheè ba buu enjep roè naè.	I saw another angel ascend from the sunrise, having the seal of the living God. He cried with a loud voice to the four angels to whom it was given to harm the earth and the sea,
Ñwáè ce e m yu' buu ca, a ker yá vi neè mmir a máâ Joân. Máè ka' yu' buu ca, yá vi, a gwe njeptii ncïìndap Nyúè ce e m duèñshi máè buu ca tá m bo gú'shi neè ye.	Now I, John, am the one who heard and saw these things. When I heard and saw, I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel who had shown me these things.
Ñwáè ce e m koo ncúèkïì baa naè aè gee ntaa foñ, a ye sá' aè ncúèkïì baa.	In the same way, he also who got the two gained another two.

Mɛ̀ tɛɛ dôŋ.	I have made a head stand.
Blaèa ce m be laèa seè'ni na a blaèa ce m ce laèa neè beèe ce a ce tarni ená m yu ñwáè ntuu neè Tataê.	My defense to those who examine me is this.
M ce sañ neè weâe btaèr njobeè' weèe rïìñ ñwáè ce e m ba efa rkáè'. M ce sañ neè weâe mnsuènsuè njobeè' ce weèe aè so Sataèn.	I write to you, fathers, because you know him who is from the beginning. John	Joân	16	24	Caar gháá seè'ni na, weèe aè be loo yuu mo' fa máâ rlii ka'. Loo neè tá weèe bo koni, tá le rlu'shïì li bo mïìsi.	Until now, you have asked nothing in my name. Ask, and you will receive, that your joy may be made full.
John	Joân	16	25	“Máè suñ weèe buu ca ba aè mñgaèa. Nfeè' ce gháá ce m be keèr suñ weèe buu ba aè mñgaèa ka'. M be suñ weèe rara aèmboè Taèr.	I have spoken these things to you in figures of speech. John	Joân	16	28	Máè m loè ese Taèr, a vú njep ñgoèñ na. M ce loè seè'ni enjep ñgoèñ na a ce kúti aè ryá Taèr.”	I came out from the Father, and have come into the world. Again, I leave the world, and go to the Father."
Rbyemïì li m geèe Ábáèl aè gee tañshïì neè Nyúè, yi ba boèñboñ aè bsii Nyúè a caa yi Káên. Yi tañshïì yi m boèñ wa'a, Nyúè aè lor ye aèmboè ñwáâ nyáánïì njobeè' e m byemi neè ye. Seèe aè rïìñ wa'a njobeè' Nyúè aè m koo buu ce e m fa neè ye. Ka' e m kwe eluâuñgoèñ wa'a, li rbyemïì li ku bii laèa.	By faith, Abel offered to God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain, through which he had testimony given to him that he was righteous, God testifying with respect to his gifts; and through it he, being dead, still speaks.

Matthew	Matïìyoè	6	17	Weèe aè ka' ce jïì mdip, weèe yo' mgúr mbe tuè, yár mmir,	But you, when you fast, anoint your head, and wash your face;
Matthew	Matïìyoè	6	18	faè dïì' beèe a bo rïìñ ená weèe ce jïì mdip ka', tá ku rïìñ ba yeè Ta Nyúè ce beèe a ke yá ye ka', tá yeè Ta ca ce e ke yá buu ce beèe a geèe aè bsúèti bo laè' weèe.	so that you are not seen by men to be fasting, but by your Father who is in secret, and your Father, who sees in secret, will reward you.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	6	19	“Weèe fa láè wee bkuè' njep ñgoèñ njep dïì' ce aède' mfyáp vi ye, nlo ye, byáèá vi kep ndap yáá ka'.	Don't lay up treasures for yourselves on the earth, where moth and rust consume, and where thieves break through and steal;"

Ñgá' ca yu rkwe embenjïì.”	"But for the cowardly, unbelieving, sinners, abominable, murderers, sexually immoral, sorcerers, idolaters, and all liars, their part is in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur, which is the second death."""
Yuu ce e m laèa anaè yi yu mini. Baná aè lapni woweèe tatap seê, tá woweèe a bo byemi ba yuu ce yi yu mini.	This testimony is true. For this cause, reprove them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith,
Jisoès aè ker ma' ñgaèa moè' neè woweèe enáê, “Kúú Nyúè yi yu aèmboè ñgúè mostaè ce ñwáè aè m loèr a bye fa yeâ ñkúè.	"He set another parable before them, saying, ""The Kingdom of Heaven is like a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and sowed in his field;"
Fa maè'shi tá buu mo' ce beèe mo' a ce yá'ni, vi ba yi jáá naè, vi lo bo' weèe ka'. Yuu ce yi geèe viseèe mntee vi ka' tap, aè geèe ba bghoènïì ce vi vúè ese Nyúè. Mncir ce vi yu a kuu ba byee naè vi yu aè cicïì. AÈde' mncir anaè vi ja' beèe ce a ce láè vi ka'.	Don't be carried away by various and strange teachings, for it is good that the heart be established by grace, not by food, through which those who were so occupied were not benefited.
Jisoès aè m ker laa neè beèe enáê, “A máè rraa enjep ñgoèñ na. Ñwáè ce e ka' vú fa máâ mbuèu baná aède' e ker jár aè túè'nji ka', e be koni ba rraa ce li fa ryoèñ.”	"Again, therefore, Jesus spoke to them, saying, ""I am the light of the world. He who follows me will not walk in the darkness, but will have the light of life."""
Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè', ñgaèñ yu'.”	"If any man has ears to hear, let him hear."""
Wɛ̀ ròo a koni.	You have searched and found.
Beèe anaè aè m ba Saimúèn ce e m too ená Pitaè, ba Andruè ce e m ba nfúr Saimúèn, ba Jáêms, ba Joân, ba Feleêp, ba Baètoèlomïì,	Simon, whom he also named Peter; Andrew, his brother; James; John; Philip; Bartholomew;
M ̀ be kʉti mbenjì mnǒŋ btaar.	I will come after three days.
Ŋwɛ̀ ca e ke dɛte sê.	This man is not always time conscious.
E ka' ce kwaè'shi wa'a, Nyúè aè laa neè ye enáê, ‘Lúr caê, m be koo lo ryoèñ neètú' e ntïìni na, tá ku' yoè buu ce wáè kupshi a lá na ba vïû nda?’	"But God said to him, 'You foolish one, tonight your soul is required of you. The things which you have prepared--whose will they be?'
Luke	Luêk	12	21	A mboè yi be kuè ba wa'a neè ñwáè ce e loèr yïì buu wááwá a lá ba neè yïì nyor, a ke' túr buu aè mbeèp yïì Nyúè ka'.”	So is he who lays up treasure for himself, and is not rich toward God."
AÈ ka' ba njo' buu ce Nyúè aè geèe neè weèe na, m ce loo neè weèe káâ' aè nfeè' ce beèe a m suñ máè ená weèe aè byemi neè Tata Jisoès, a ker koñ beèe Nyúè wááwá.	For this cause I also, having heard of the faith in the Lord Jesus which is among you, and the love which you have toward all the saints,
Wèr ròo enɛ sèe deʼ.	We wish that we should discuss.
Beèe mo' efa múè kúr beèe ca a m laèa yuu jáá, beèe mo' a laa yuu jáá. Bjep vi ba goèr seê, yi ba aètáèr neè ye aè rrïìñ yuu ce yi koni ka', e laa ená a lor Pol du aègho mbe barakïì.	Some shouted one thing, and some another, among the crowd. When he couldn't find out the truth because of the noise, he commanded him to be brought into the barracks.
Woowèe a m kàʼ enɛ a be dù nyʉ̀ sondɛ̀.	They planned that they would go on Sunday.
Ñgaâa yá'nïì buu Joân mo' a m káè' a ce sár mnsár a ñwáè moè' efa múè Jus aèmboè aède' ñwáè su'sïì nyor ba nrara aè bsii Nyúè.	There arose therefore a questioning on the part of John's disciples with some Jews about purification.
Fa yu'shi yuu ce beèe mo' a ce laèa ená weèe lor wee mnyor njep nsheè, a ker ce laèa ená weèe gú'shi neè bcïìndap Nyúè naè ka'. Woweèe a ce laèa wa'a, a ce bepsi weèe bepsi. Njáèá beèe anaè a ce laèa ená Nyúè aè geèe woweèe a yá rlo. Woweèe a laèa wa'a, a ce naèa ba tu aè cicïì, bfee wap aè ba bfee enjep ñgoèñ na.	Let no one rob you of your prize by a voluntary humility and worshipping of the angels, dwelling in the things which he has not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,
E m yá'ni beèe a laa enáê, “Mboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená, ‘A be too yaè ndap ená ndap rloo neè bto' wááwá’ a? Ka' yi yu wa'a, weèe aè gee yaè ndap aè kútïì ba mbúè' byáèá.”	"He taught, saying to them, ""Isn't it written, 'My house will be called a house of prayer for all the nations?' But you have made it a den of robbers!"""
Zhi yu njìsàp ce sò à be tarte kaʼ.	It is a long time that we have not met.
Beèe ce a ce cu njep ñgoèñ a be gú'shi neè nyaèa ca. Beèe ce a be gú'shi ka' be ba beèe ce a m sañ map mlii mbe ñwaè' Muu Njeèe ce a m yú. A m sañ mlii ca tá ñgoèñ yi ka' keè ba aègho.	All who dwell on the earth will worship him, everyone whose name has not been written from the foundation of the world in the book of life of the Lamb who has been killed.
E cu wa'a a ce keè' ba nfeè' ce Nyúè be láè yi ñgaâa bbaèa njep yeâ tïìi tá e tár mi mkuèu mbe waâp nduè.	from that time waiting until his enemies are made the footstool of his feet.
E m ker laa foñ neè ñwáè ce e ba be ye naè enáê, “Wáè ka' fár byee vïû neèmootïì, káè vïû aè mbuèuñkuèr áè, aè fa be ba bkar wo káè bfúr wo, káè beèe ce weèe woweèe aè raète, káè ñgaâa mbaèa ce weèe woweèe ce cu aè dïû' mo'sir ka'. Wáè ka' be ba woweèe baná aède' woweèe foñ a ku be wáè, tá yi ba seè'ni ená woweèe a laè' yoè ntar ce wáè m tar woweèe aègho naè.	"He also said to the one who had invited him, ""When you make a dinner or a supper, don't call your friends, nor your brothers, nor your kinsmen, nor rich neighbors, or perhaps they might also return the favor, and pay you back."
Yi yu wa' ka'. AÈmboè seèe rïìñ ená Nyúè yu ñwáè mini, baná aède' weèr byemïì aè rgeèe yuu ker lo kani efa rgeèe yi ka'.	"But as God is faithful, our word toward you was not ""Yes and no."""
Woweèe a ka' baè' a yá aèmboè a biñsi luèr embe nduè ncuâu rsheè.	They found the stone rolled away from the tomb.
Kòo nè yee mbàa lɛ àmbommee.	Take your money and keep on your own.
Yaè Ta ce e fa yi neè máè, túr ñger a caa buu wááwá. AÈde' ñwáè moè' fúr njeèe ca embaè mmbo yaè Ta ka'.	My Father, who has given them to me, is greater than all. No one is able to snatch them out of my Father's hand.
Weèe fa maè'shi tá ñwáè moè' bo' weèe neè blaâa bcicïì tá weèe gee njáèá buu ca ka'. Yu njo' buu anaè ce ená Nyúè be ko'si rshentee, fa ñgá' neè beèe ce a ce yu'ni neè ye ka'.	Let no one deceive you with empty words. For because of these things, the wrath of God comes on the children of disobedience.
Saimún Pitaè aè beesïì enáê, “Tataê, aède' weèr ka' ker du yá ba nda? A wáè ce aè túr blaèa ce vi ke geèe beèe a koni ryoèñ ce li be keè mïì ka'.	"Simon Peter answered him, ""Lord, to whom would we go? You have the words of eternal life."
Rraa ca li geèe beèe a gee buu wááwá ce vi yu bboèñboñ, a ba yáánïì, a ker ba mini.	for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth,
AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' elúèsimbuèu, e duñshïì yïì nyor neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ce a m báti ncoèp-moè'sir-aè-rrúèú, aè nfeè' ce woweèe a m ce ye byee. E m lapni woweèe njobeè' woweèe a m teèe-btu, a byemi ka'. E m lapni woweèe wa'a njobeè' beèe ce a m yá ye a m suñ woweèe ená e fúú efa rkwe, woweèe a kanïì.	Afterward he was revealed to the eleven themselves as they sat at the table, and he rebuked them for their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they didn't believe those who had seen him after he had risen.
“Yeèr beèe, weèe ce geèe wa' njoká? Weèr yu beèe aèmboè weèe. Weèr aè vúè aè rfeè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè weèe tá weèe bo maè'shi buu bcicïì ca, byemi ba neè Nyúè ce e yu nteèe, aè ba Nyúè ce e m boo rbuu ba nshe ba mdip ker ba buu wááwá.	"Men, why are you doing these things? We also are men of like passions with you, and bring you good news, that you should turn from these vain things to the living God, who made the sky and the earth and the sea, and all that is in them;
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	14	16	AÈ m ba mbe nfeè' entoèmbïì, e ma'shïì bto' wááwá vi ce geèe aèmboè vi gwáá.	who in the generations gone by allowed all the nations to walk in their own ways.
Acts	Mfaè' Ñgaâa Ntuu Jisoès	14	17	Ka' yi m ba wa', Nyúè aè m be borni efa rduèñshi weèe njáèá ñwáè ce e yu aè nfeè' wááwá aè buu bboèñboñ ce e ce geèe neè weèe ka'. E geèe mbeèñ ce gweè, weèe ce koni byee njep nfeâ' mboèñmboñ, ce ye, ce yu', ce lu'shi.”	Yet he didn't leave himself without witness, in that he did good and gave you rains from the sky and fruitful seasons, filling our hearts with food and gladness."
Yuu ce m ce laèa yi yu ba ená muu ce e be ye bti' yïì taê, ka' bii munte, e ku ba aèmboè ñkwaèa, ka' bti' anaè yu vi wa'a.	But I say that so long as the heir is a child, he is no different from a bondservant, though he is lord of all;
E ce bèeŋger mbe bkuu waʼa njo kùu zhi ce yaŋ ye.	He is rolling on the bed like that because he has a painful leg.
Pitaè aè ka' rïìñ wa'a, a nati a du mbe ndaèp mbe Máèári, ma yïì Joân. A m ce too rlii Joân mo' ená Maêk. Beèe magoèr a m kaari mbo a ce geèe rloo.	Thinking about that, he came to the house of Mary, the mother of John whose surname was Mark, where many were gathered together and were praying.
Ncïìndap Nyúè ce e m laèa neè máè naè aè ker laa enáê, “Sañ blaèa ca: ‘Mboâñtu mi yu neè beèe ce a be woweèe aè ñkaâ' bguèu yi Muu Njeèe.’” E ker laa neè máè enáê, “Blaèa ca aè laèa ba Nyúè seeseê.”	"He said to me, ""Write, 'Blessed are those who are invited to the marriage supper of the Lamb.'"" He said to me, ""These are true words of God."""
Ku' beèe ca a ka' kuè yá ye, a bááñger seê, a cañse a du aè rcaè'ni ye.	Immediately all the multitude, when they saw him, were greatly amazed, and running to him greeted him.
Weèe fa ce no mruè' tá mi ce koo weèe ka'. Mi ka' ce koo weèe baná mi be ce bepsi weèe bepsi. Fa neè wee mnyor ba neè Yú' Nyúè tá yi bo ruu njep weâe mntee.	Don't be drunken with wine, in which is dissipation, but be filled with the Spirit,
Geewa'a, nfeè' moè' be ba ce a be koo nduu ese woweèe tá woweèe a ji mdip aè nfeè' anaè.”	"But the days will come when the bridegroom will be taken away from them. Then they will fast in those days."""
E sɛ̀r muu embe ntaʼ.	She has pulled the chair and dislocated the child from it.
Beèe magoèr a m byemi. Bbyeèñge Greâk ce ñgaâa mlii ba Greâk ce a m ba mmbañruè, a m byemi foñ.	Many of them therefore believed; also of the prominent Greek women, and not a few men.
Wɛ̀ kyese nlàa anà.	I have exaggerated the talk.
“Ndoèo! Ndoèo aè co' rla' rgoèr ca. AÈ m ba entoèmbïì rla' ca li m ba aèmboè njeñwáè ce e yar bcáâ' bboèñboñ ce vi m ce fúp, mo' vi ce baèñ. E m suèsi yïì nyor neè buu ce a m geèe neè gul ba bluèr ce vi ce laè'ñger.	saying, 'Woe, woe, the great city, she who was dressed in fine linen, purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls!
E dù à rlor nè zhii bo.	She has gone to take it herself.
Ñwáè ce e ka' cu nteèe, byemi neè máè, baná ñgaèñ be cu nfeseè. Waè' wáè byemi a?”	"Whoever lives and believes in me will never die. Do you believe this?"""
E fa buu bboèñboñ neè beèe ce njeè ce yañ woweèe, a juu ñgaâa mbaèa, woweèe a duseè mboèmmbo.	He has filled the hungry with good things. He has sent the rich away empty.
Nòŋsi muu tɛ e bo buumi.	Lay down the child so that she can sleep.
Byú' bbebep vi m ce yá Jisoès aè nfeè' wááwá ku gweñger aè nsheè kuèntombïì neè ye, ce waani ce laa ená, “A wáè Muu Nyúè.”	"The unclean spirits, whenever they saw him, fell down before him, and cried, ""You are the Son of God!"""
Yú' yi laa neè Felep enáê, “Duè tee mutuè ca.”	"The Spirit said to Philip, ""Go near, and join yourself to this chariot."""
“Baná aède' m be'nïì beèe eluèuni na ba aè ká? Woweèe a yu aèmboè ká?	"To what then will I liken the people of this generation? What are they like?
Luke	Luêk	7	32	Woweèe a yu aèmboè bghaèrbeèe ce a cute aè ntaa, beèe a ce ká' beèe, beèe anaè wowo a ker ce ká' woweèe, a ce laèa enáê, ‘Weèr aè fyáp mndoñ neè weèe, weèe aè bii bii ka', weèr aè fa nceâ rkwe, weèe aè war ka'.’	They are like children who sit in the marketplace, and call one to another, saying, 'We piped to you, and you didn't dance. We mourned, and you didn't weep.'
Luke	Luêk	7	33	Máè laèa wa'a njobeè' Joân ñwáè baèptir beèe aè m vúè a ce ye yuu ka', a ce no mruè' ka', weèe aè laa weená nyúèrkaè' yu njep ye.	For John the Baptizer came neither eating bread nor drinking wine, and you say, 'He has a demon.'

Baná weèe fúú efa waâp mú, táá jáá. Weèe fa joèo yuu ce yi yu rara ka' ka', tá m bo koni weèe.	"Therefore, ""'Come out from among them, and be separate,' says the Lord. 'Touch no unclean thing. I will receive you."
Ñwaè' ca ce sañ máâ Pol ce m yu ñwáè rfaè' neè Nyúè a ker ba ñwáè ntuu neè Jisos Kraêis. Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God's chosen ones, and the knowledge of the truth which is according to godliness,
