"Simon Peter said to them, ""I'm going fishing."" They told him, ""We are also coming with you."" They immediately went out, and entered into the boat. That night, they caught nothing."
Woowèe a no mtɛɛ.	They have drank palm wine.
Woweèe a ka' duè, Tata Nyúè aè tuu yïì ncïìndap neè Josáèf aè rlo a laa neè ye enáê, “Naèti mbekïì lor muu ca ba yïì maê, cañ du aègho aè to' Ijïìp, cu aèfo caar tá m ke laèa neè wáè ená aè kúti, njobeè' Hároèd táá aè rroèo muu ca tá e bo yú.”	"Now when they had departed, behold, an angel of the Lord appeared to Joseph in a dream, saying, ""Arise and take the young child and his mother, and flee into Egypt, and stay there until I tell you, for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him."""
Weèe aè maè'shi ená beèe a gee weèe aè wap bkwaèa, sop sá' efa weèe, nyúè' weèe, ko' weèe neè mkuèu mbe tuè, lip weèe neè mmbo nje mmïìr.	For you bear with a man, if he brings you into bondage, if he devours you, if he takes you captive, if he exalts himself, if he strikes you on the face.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè ñwáè moè' aè ba mbe shañ. A m too ye ená Baèrabaès. E m ba mbe shañ a beèe mo' ce a woweèe a m yúshi beèe aè nfeè' woweèe a m taè' buèr gopmáèn.	There was one called Barabbas, bound with those who had made insurrection, men who in the insurrection had committed murder.
Túè' aè ka' raa, beèe ce a m ku bii yap nje waâa túè a yá ená keñ aè m ku ba njo moè'sir. A m rïìñ ená ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a m niñ mbe keñ anaè a du mapñgi', Jisoès aè ba mbo ka'.	On the next day, the multitude that stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was no other boat there, except the one in which his disciples had embarked, and that Jesus hadn't entered with his disciples into the boat, but his disciples had gone away alone.
Bcɛ̀ʼ anà bvi bòŋŋger sê, laŋlaŋ zhǐi beer cà.	These clothes are very good, especially that red one.
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè yá ye wáá, ñwáè ce e ce laèa neè wáè seè'ni na yu ye.”	"Jesus said to him, ""You have both seen him, and it is he who speaks with you."""
Woweèe a ká' a ce bipshi fa waâp mú ená ñwáè ce e be geèe njáèá yuu ca yu ba nda lá?	They began to question among themselves, which of them it was who would do this thing.
Wɛ̌ ke bòose muu ŋwɛ̀ ntèetu geekɛ e yuʼ kaʼ.	No matter the number of times you plead with a stubborn child, he doesnʼt listen.
E laa enáê, “Masaè, ñwáè aè geèe yuu neè máè ka'.” Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “M be geèe yuu mo' neè wáè foñ ka'. Duè yo yu, wáâ duè aè fa keèr geèe yuu bebep ka'.”]	"She said, ""No one, Lord."" Jesus said, ""Neither do I condemn you. Go your way. From now on, sin no more."""
Yáê, “M be vúè aèmboè nyáèá wa'a. Rboâñtu li yu neè ñwáè ce e ce buumi ka', a ce keè'ni vi bcáè', faè dïì' a lor vi, tá e lo kar mbuèuriñ tá rïìtu yi koo ye aè múè beèe ka'.”	Behold, I come like a thief. Blessed is he who watches, and keeps his clothes, so that he doesn't walk naked, and they see his shame.
Blaâa bbebep, bde' bcicïì ba ñkáèrbuu mbembep fa keè fúú eku weâe cuèu ka'. Buu ca yu yáánïì ka'. Weèe aè ba ce yoèñshi ba Nyúè.	nor filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not appropriate; but rather giving of thanks.
Weèe aè m ye ba njáèá sá' ká efa buu ce rïìtu yi ce koo weèe aègho seè'ni na? Sá' efa buu anaè yu ba rkwe.	What fruit then did you have at that time in the things of which you are now ashamed? For the end of those things is death.
Woweèe a natïì mbekïì njaè' moè'sir, a kúti aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, a ka' baè', a yá beèe ce ncoèp-moè'sir-aè-rrúèú, ba beèe ce a woweèe a m ba, aèmboè a cute aèbee,	They rose up that very hour, returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and those who were with them,
Yaŋ ca zhi ghaʼshi banɛ sèe du àgho mbe ndàp mcɛ̀p.	This sickness is getting more serious therefore we should take it to the hospital.
Máèári ce aè rla' Makdalaè aè duê, a suñ ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès enáê, “Máè yá Tataê.” E m ker suñ woweèe buu ce e m laèa neè ye naè.	Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord, and that he had said these things to her.
Pitaè aè natïì a du a woweèe. E ka' duâ baè', a lor ye a du aègho mbe rum ndap yïì embekïì naè. Byepkúú wááwá a m táá a yeâ geñ, a ce war, a ce duèñshi bcáè' njáèá jáá jáèá jáá ce Dokaès aè m tar aè nfeè' ce e m bii nteèe.	Peter got up and went with them. When he had come, they brought him into the upper room. All the widows stood by him weeping, and showing the coats and garments which Dorcas had made while she was with them.
Wáè rïìñ ená káâ' aè nfeè' ce wáè m ba ghaèrñwáè vú gháá seè'ni na, wáè rïìñ blaèa embe Ñwaâ' Nyúè seê. AÈde' blaèa anaè vi gee aè túr bfee, byemi neè Jisos Kraêis, luêñ.	From infancy, you have known the holy Scriptures which are able to make you wise for salvation through faith, which is in Christ Jesus.
Yïì ma ba yïì ta a bááñgeèr seê. Jisoès aè laa ená woweèe a fa suñ ñwáè moè' yuu ce yi koni anaè ka'.	Her parents were amazed, but he commanded them to tell no one what had been done.
àmʉ̀ [àmɨ̀] prep.	among.
Máè m fyá' a yá máná e bú' ncir ka', a gee yuu mo' bebep ce aède' a m ba yú ye yú ka', aè ka' ba njobeè' e m koèñ ená Taèr Mañgoèñ sa' vi mnsa', máè laa máná m be tuusi ye neè ye.	But when I found that he had committed nothing worthy of death, and as he himself appealed to the emperor I determined to send him.
M ̀ kaʼ koŋ m̀ dû.	I will go if I wish.
Woweèe a ka' kuè bii ce suñ buu ca, Jisoès aè ku nyáá mbe waâp tar, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Cumúnyañ ba neè weèe.”	"As they said these things, Jesus himself stood among them, and said to them, ""Peace be to you."""
Waè' aè be yoèñshi ñwáè rfaè' anaè njobeè' e ba gee yuu ce wáè ba laa ená e gee a?	Does he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded? I think not.
Ñwáè rfaè' moè' aè ka' vúè, a laa yi enáê, ‘Masaè, a yo mbaèa caè na. Máè m ku kur njep kaâa cáè', a kupshi a noñsïî.	Another came, saying, 'Lord, behold, your mina, which I kept laid away in a handkerchief,
Ñwaè' ca aè sañ máâ nleeñwáè neè ñkaraâ Gayoès ce máè koèñ neè mini-ñwáè.	The elder to Gaius the beloved, whom I love in truth.
E ka' yá ená e geèe wa' nyor aè boñ Juês, e koo Pitaè foñ. Ca yi m koni aè nfeè' ce a m ce ye Ñkaâ' bráâd ce a láè yes njo ka'.	When he saw that it pleased the Jews, he proceeded to seize Peter also. This was during the days of unleavened bread.
Timotïì ka' vúê, weèe konïì ye boèñboñ seê, tá e bo wáp yuu mo' ka', njobeè' ye ye ce faè' foñ ba neè Tata aèmboè máè.	Now if Timothy comes, see that he is with you without fear, for he does the work of the Lord, as I also do.
Ca ce laèa ba Tata ce e m geèe beèe a riñ ca eluâuñgoèñ seê.	All his works are known to God from eternity.'
Wèr à yɛ̀rsi mambe.	We have swept the compound yard.
Maè' neè ncápntee, ba rshentee, ba ntee bebep, ba mlap, ba mnsa'ni. Ñwáè fa keèr yu' ryañ neè nfúr yïì ka'.	Let all bitterness, wrath, anger, outcry, and slander, be put away from you, with all malice.
Jisoès aè m ko' mbe rtuèu a ká' beèe ce e m koèñ, woweèe a vú a yá ye.	He went up into the mountain, and called to himself those whom he wanted, and they went to him.
Govanoè aè ka' beè' ñwaè' anaè, a bipshi neè Pol ená a ye ñwáâ aè ñgoèñ efá lá? E ka' yu' ená e yu ñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Sïìlesïìyaè,	When the governor had read it, he asked what province he was from. When he understood that he was from Cilicia, he said,
E m laèa enáê, “Yáê, yaè ñwáè rfaè' ce máè ce, ñwáè ce máè koèñ seê, a ce yu' rboèñ neè ye. M be suèusi ya yú' mbe yeâ nduè tá e suñ aèmboè la rsa' neè beèe enje jáá.	"Behold, my servant whom I have chosen; my beloved in whom my soul is well pleased: I will put my Spirit on him. He will proclaim justice to the nations.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	12	19	E be sár mnsár a beèe, káè waani ka'. Ñwáè moè' be yu' yïì njeèndoñ aè btase ka'.	He will not strive, nor shout; neither will anyone hear his voice in the streets.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	12	20	E be kep ñke' ce yi búúti ka', káè liisi lam ce e ce fa ñgá' ka', caar tá e gee tá rsa' mini li so.	He won't break a bruised reed. He won't quench a smoking flax, until he leads justice to victory.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	12	21	Bto' wááwá vi be láè yap ntee ba njep ye.”	In his name, the nations will hope."
Máè yá beâe bgoèrgoèr ba beâe bká'ká' ce a m kweñger aèmboè a táá kuèntombïì neè kaèbaèraè' anaè. A m múè' mñwaè'. A m ker mú' ñwaè' mo', ñwaè' anaè aè ba ñwaâ' ryoèñ. Ñwáè ce e m cu mbe kaèbaèraè' naè aè m fyá' mbe mñwaè' ce a m sañ mfaè' beèe ce a m kweñger anaè mbo, a teni mnsa' ñwáè wááwá aèmboè mi mfaè' mi m ba.	I saw the dead, the great and the small, standing before the throne, and they opened books. Another book was opened, which is the book of life. The dead were judged out of the things which were written in the books, according to their works.
Foèo Nyúè yi ce yááti ba njïì enjep muu yïì, seèe aè riñ njáèá ñwáè ce Nyúè yu ba njïì enjep ye, njobeè' e ku ba aèmboè Nyúè yu. Muu yïì ca ce loèr vi blaèa ce vi túr ñger seê, a ce geèe ñgoèñ ca yi ku bii aègho. E m loèr yïì nyor a gee tañshïì aègho tá e bo geèe tá Nyúè foosi seèe efa yïìseèe buu bbebep. E ka' geèe wa'a, a ko' mbe buèu, a cu aè bo maè' Nyúè ce yi kúú yi táá kuèntombïì.	His Son is the radiance of his glory, the very image of his substance, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself made purification for our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;
Mnoèñ vi ka' ba btaar, beèe mo' a ce geèe Ñkaâ' bguèu aè rla' Kánaè aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê. Ma yïì Jisoès aè m ba aèfo.	The third day, there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee. Jesus' mother was there.
Mñguu anaè vi m ba aèmboè mnyaèabaèraè' ce a ba'shi tá a bo duè bïìr aègho wa'a. Mtaa ce mñguu anaè vi m soèp mi feeseè mtaa kúú ce a geèe neè guêl. Wap bsii vi m feese bsii ñwáè.	The shapes of the locusts were like horses prepared for war. On their heads were something like golden crowns, and their faces were like people's faces.
Mɛ̀ koo mbàa ca ese ye.	I have taken this money from him.
Bbyèŋge bwap a ke cu ba njepmbè.	Their wives live out of the village.
Yi be kuè ba wa'a, aè noèñ ce Muu Ñwáè be yááti naè.	It will be the same way in the day that the Son of Man is revealed.
Wěmbùm a ke cu à ŋgǒŋ mjɛɛ.	People of Mbum live on grass-fields.
Ku' ñgaâa mbo' beèe a yu njep ñgoèñ, a ce kani ená Jisoès aè m beèeñger aè ñwáè, a vú njep ñgoèñ ka'. Njáèá ñwáè anaè yu ñwáè mbo' beèe, a ba ñwáè baèa Kraêis.	For many deceivers have gone out into the world, those who don't confess that Jesus Christ came in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the Antichrist.
AÈde' wá wáè foñ ku fyá' yá ená káâ' nyúè ce máè m duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè rloo neè Nyúè vú ba' ntïìni na, ku ba ba mnoèñ ncoèp baa-aè-rrúèú.	seeing that you can recognize that it is not more than twelve days since I went up to worship at Jerusalem.
A m kur ye mmir, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “Suñ ka ená aè lïìp nda wáè lá?”	"Having blindfolded him, they struck him on the face and asked him, ""Prophesy! Who is the one who struck you?"""
“Yi ka' ba ená moè' efa weèe túr ñwáè rfaè' ce e ce faè' nsuu, káè e ce cïìñ ba njeèe neè ye áè, e ka' kúti efa mñkúè, waè' aè be laèa neè ye enáê, ‘Vúè cárcár vú cu aè nsheè yeñger’ a?	But who is there among you, having a servant plowing or keeping sheep, that will say, when he comes in from the field, 'Come immediately and sit down at the table,'
A m̀ ̀ ba elǔuŋgòŋ bvisèe btaa a ce saŋ njɛ̀ɛ ŋwàʼ ca kaʼ.	In former times, our fathers were not writing like this.
jaè' weèe efa ñgá' ce weèe ce yá anaè, keèr jaè' weèr foñ efa ñgá'. E be geèe cena aè nfeè' ce Tata Jisoès ce vúè embe buèu neè ñger-ñwáè, a bcïìndap Nyúè weèe.	and to give relief to you who are afflicted with us, when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his mighty angels in flaming fire,
njobeè' e be keè ba ñwáâ ñgoèr aè bsii Tata Nyúè. E be keè no mruè' ka', no yuu tatap ka'. E be keè ruu neè Yú' Rara, ká' enjep rbúè yïì maê.	For he will be great in the sight of the Lord, and he will drink no wine nor strong drink. He will be filled with the Holy Spirit, even from his mother's womb.
Weèe rïìñ ená aè m ba aè nfeè' entombïì ce máè m feè'shi nsuñ mboèñmboñ neè weèe naè, máè m ce cu a weâe mú njobeè' máè m ce yañ.	but you know that because of weakness of the flesh I preached the Good News to you the first time.
Nïìkoèdámoès aè bipshïì enáê, “Ñwáè aè ka' ba nleeñwáè wáá, aède' a gee eká ka' ker bi ye? Waè' aède' e ker kúti njep rbúè yïì maê, a bi ye ñkaèraè' baa a?”	"Nicodemus said to him, ""How can a man be born when he is old? Can he enter a second time into his mother's womb, and be born?"""
Geèe laè neè buu ce vi be ce duèñshi ená weèe aè kupse, a ma' yeè buu bbebep. Weèe fa ce laèa fa weâe mú enáê, ‘Abraèham yu yeèr taê’ ka'. M ce suñ weèe ená aède' Nyúè ku lor bluèr ca beesi aè boo Abraèhaêm.	Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance, and don't begin to say among yourselves, 'We have Abraham for our father;' for I tell you that God is able to raise up children to Abraham from these stones!
Máè ka' fyá' a yá ku' mmbaâ' bbúú. Ñwáè moè' aè cu mbenduè mmbaè' anaè a ba aèmboè muu ñwáè wa'a. E m soèp rtaa kúú ce a geèe neè guêl, a túr saâ' ncáncáp mbaè boè.	I looked, and behold, a white cloud; and on the cloud one sitting like a son of man, having on his head a golden crown, and in his hand a sharp sickle.
Weèe du cárcár du suñ ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ená e fúú efa rkwe. E ce duè lá aè ñgoâñ Galeèle entombïì neè woweèe. Woweèe a be baè' aèfo tá a yá lá ye. A yuu ce máè suñ weèe.”	"Go quickly and tell his disciples, 'He has risen from the dead, and behold, he goes before you into Galilee; there you will see him.' Behold, I have told you."""
Weèr ce laèa buu ca aèmboè beèe ce a Jisos Kraâis weèe a yu aèbee, a riñ werná ku ba Nyúè ce e be jaè' weèr tá weèr ka' geèe buu ca.	Such confidence we have through Christ toward God;
Ñwáè wááwá be kuè byáè' yi ntáèr.	For each man will bear his own burden.
AÈmboè Taèr e ke geèe beèe ce a kweñger a fúú efa rkwe, cu bteèe, a mboè Muu ye ye e ke geèe beèe ce e ce, a cu bteèe aè njáâá wa' foñ.	For as the Father raises the dead and gives them life, even so the Son also gives life to whom he desires.
Yi yu ba ená ñwáè aè ka' lor wáè aè mnsa', weèe ye ka' ce duè mbe koêr, aè gheteèr weèe ye seesi mïìsi aè nduunjïì faè dïì' e bo loèr wáè duè aègho fa neè ñwáè nsa' mnsa', tá ñwáè nsa' mnsa' lor wáè fa neè ñwáè ncir, tá ñwáè ncir fa wáè mbe shañ ka'.	For when you are going with your adversary before the magistrate, try diligently on the way to be released from him, lest perhaps he drag you to the judge, and the judge deliver you to the officer, and the officer throw you into prison.
Ca a zhii mbʉ.	These are his goats.
Bèe wɛɛwɛ ku bii njep ndèetoʼ kaʼ.	Not every one is still practising tradition.
Mbuèu moè' yu aègho neè máè aè rroèo ñwáè tá e bo suñ beèe aèmboè máè ka'. Geewa'a m ce suñ weèe ená Joân aè m laèa aèmboè máè, tá weèe bo byemi, luèñ.	But the testimony which I receive is not from man. However, I say these things that you may be saved.
Weèe rïìñ weená aè m ba aè nfeè' ce a m yuu weèe efa ndeèe to' ce weêe bta a m láè neè weèe, sá' aè ba njo ka' naè, a m yuu weèe ba neè buu ce nlo e ke koo aègho aèmboè mbaèa na ka'.	knowing that you were redeemed, not with corruptible things, with silver or gold, from the useless way of life handed down from your fathers,
Yi yu aèmboè ñgúè mostaè ce ñwáè aè m byeè mbe yeâ ñka', yi lo a ku' a ba aè ce, bsiñ vi ba'rïì mndap aè mnta' efa gho.”	"It is like a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and put in his own garden. It grew, and became a large tree, and the birds of the sky lodged in its branches."""
AÈ ka' ba aè mbuèuñkuèr, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a du aèwaâa túè,	When evening came, his disciples went down to the sea,
Pitaè aè m ku bii ce señ aèmboè rlo ce e m yá naè, Yú' yi laa neè ye enáê, “Yáê, beèe a mntaar a ce roèo wáè.	"While Peter was pondering the vision, the Spirit said to him, ""Behold, three men seek you."
Geèe tá yïìseèe beèe a lor yaèp nfeè' ce geèe ba buu bboèñboñ tá woweèe a bo koni buu ce vi be jaè' woweèe keèr jaè' beèe mo' foñ. Woweèe a fa loèr yaèp nfeè' búsi ba aè cicïì ka'.	Let our people also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they may not be unfruitful.
Gayoès, ce m ce cu mbe yeâ ndaèp, ñgaâa rbyemïì a ce niñ cor mbo foñ naè aè caè'ni weèe. ÁÈrastoès ce e ce láè mbaèa to' naè ba Kwatoès a caè'ni weèe.	Gaius, my host and host of the whole assembly, greets you. Erastus, the treasurer of the city, greets you, as does Quartus, the brother.
A sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Weèe ka' yu' njeèndoñ Nyúè ntïìni, weèe fa teèe tu aèmboè weêe bta a m teèe neè Nyúè, a kani efa rgeèe yuu ce e m laèa naè ka'.”	"while it is said, ""Today if you will hear his voice, don't harden your hearts, as in the rebellion."""
Wèr tʉr koosimnses nè ye.	We have sympathy for him.
Rfàʼ anà li yu àtɛ̀r.	That job is not tedious.
Ntaaŋguu ntatap e ke kepti jòr kaʼ.	A strong wood cannot break easily.
Nsuñ mboèñmboñ ca kuèu muu yïì ce Jisos Kraâis ce e yu Tata neè seèe. AÈ ka' ba aèmboè li rbi, a m bi ye mbe ndúè' Dávïìd.	concerning his Son, who was born of the seed of David according to the flesh,
Pitaè aè m fúr woweèe wááwá njepmbeè a gú'shi a loo; a karsi nyor a ke' gúâú ñwáè, a laa enáê, “Taèbitaè, naèti mbekïì.” E m múè' mi mmir a ka' yá Pitaè, a nati a cu mbekïì.	"Peter put them all out, and kneeled down and prayed. Turning to the body, he said, ""Tabitha, get up!"" She opened her eyes, and when she saw Peter, she sat up."
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' Musïìs aè m suñ beèe mncir ce Nyúè aè m fa neè woweèe wááwá, a lor mnyoâr njeèe ce vi m ce baèñ, a cúú aè fuè ce a too ená Hisoèp, a fúú njep bláá muu naè' ce a m fïìñshi neè mdip, a ñwañshi mbenduè ñwaè' mncir a ker ñwañshi beèe wááwá aègho.	For when every commandment had been spoken by Moses to all the people according to the law, he took the blood of the calves and the goats, with water and scarlet wool and hyssop, and sprinkled both the book itself and all the people,
Máè m geèe buu bghagha' ce vi ke duèñshi ená ñwáè yu ñwáè ntuu Jisoès naè a weâe mú, a ke' borni aè nfeè' moè' ka'.	Truly the signs of an apostle were worked among you in all patience, in signs and wonders and mighty works.
Ñwáâ ñgoèr se efa weâe mú be ba ba ñwáè rfaè' neè weèe.	But he who is greatest among you will be your servant.
Hároèd aè ka' yá ená ñgaâa bfee ekuè mbuèuntii a bo' ye, ntee yi yañ ye seê, e fa rsa' ená a yúshi boo mmbañruè wááwá ce a káè' embe bfeâ' bbaa kúti njïìnjïì ce a yu aè rla' Bátáèláèháêm, ker ba aè mú mla' ce mi yu aègee rla' ca. E m fa rsa' wa'a, njobeè' bfeè' vi m ba aèmboè bbaa, ká' embe nfeè' ce ñgaâa bfee ekuè mbuèuntii a m yá rkaèñsïì ce a m suñ ye ená a yá naè.	Then Herod, when he saw that he was mocked by the wise men, was exceedingly angry, and sent out, and killed all the male children who were in Bethlehem and in all the surrounding countryside, from two years old and under, according to the exact time which he had learned from the wise men.
E m bɛ̀ɛ mndap ce e m yɛ mbà Bùyà.	He was impressed by the houses he saw at Buea.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè ñwáè ce e túr ñgwa, e ke kwaè'shi aèmboè buu enjep ñgoèñ ce roèo ená e gee nyor boñ ñgwa yïì.	but he who is married is concerned about the things of the world, how he may please his wife.
Ŋgòŋ zhi yu jʉ̀ʉ.	The weather is dull.
Baná seèe gheter ce gee ba buu ce vi be geèe tá seèe cu neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè, keèr geèe tá seèe ce kuè' aèbee.	So then, let us follow after things which make for peace, and things by which we may build one another up.
Weèr yaè Ta yu ñwáè moè'sir.”	"I and the Father are one."""
caar duè baè' aè nfeè' ce seèe be ba ñwáè moè'sir aè liseèe rbyemïì ker ba aè buu ce seèe aè rïìñ aèmboè Muu Nyúè. Seèe ka' cu wa'a, yi gee seèe gháá, misi ba yáánïì aèmboè Kraâis yu naè.	until we all attain to the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, to a full grown man, to the measure of the stature of the fullness of Christ;
A m fa Baèrabaès aè shañ njobeè' e m barsi beâe aè rla' anaè ená a tee tu neè ñkwe Ruêm, a ker yú ñwáè foñ.	one who was thrown into prison for a certain revolt in the city, and for murder.
Timotïì aè kúti a vú a yá weèr a suñ weèr nsuñ mboèñmboñ. E suñ weèr ená le rbyemïì li ku bii tatap, weèe aè ku koñ Nyúè aèmboè weèe aè m koèñ naè. E suñ foñ ená weèe túr weèr aè ntee boèñboñ, a ce koèñ aè ryá weèr aèmboè weèr ce koèñ aè ryá weèe foñ naè.	But when Timothy came just now to us from you, and brought us glad news of your faith and love, and that you have good memories of us always, longing to see us, even as we also long to see you;
M ce suñ weèe máná be keèe ba aè noâñ mnsa' tá beèe a laa yuu kuèu blaèa bcicïì wááwá ce woweèe a m laèa,	I tell you that every idle word that men speak, they will give account of it in the day of judgment.
Ka' m yu aènjïìsaèp wa'a, seèe ku ba aèbee enjep ntee. M ce lu'shi njobeè' máè yu' máná weèe yu aèbee, a ku táá tatap aè rbyemïì ce weèe aè m byemi neè Jisos Kraêis.	For though I am absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, rejoicing and seeing your order, and the steadfastness of your faith in Christ.
Wèr ye à fʉ a gee mbɛp.	We went out and talked.
Ñwáè ce e túr btuè', ñgaèñ yu'.”	"He who has ears to hear, let him hear."""
Cena yi yu ená Jisoès yu ñwáè ce e geèe leè' ce Nyúè aè ye seèe woweèe naè yi tap a caa leâ' rúèú.	By so much, Jesus has become the collateral of a better covenant.
weèe fa maè'shi tá ñwáè moè' bo' weèe ka' aè njáâá ká ka'. Tá noèñ ca yi ka' ba, nteèetu ce aèlúèsimbuèu be ba, tá ñwáè ce e baèa Kraâis vúê. Ca yu ñwáè ce e bú yi wáá.	Let no one deceive you in any way. For it will not be, unless the departure comes first, and the man of sin is revealed, the son of destruction,
Weèr ce feè'shi ba aèmboè Jisos Kraâis ce a m taa mbe kïìntaa. Rfeè'shïì ca li ce jepsi Jus efa rbyemi neè ye, aè ba blúr neè beèe enje jáá.	but we preach Christ crucified; a stumbling block to Jews, and foolishness to Greeks,
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè, Jisoès aè be niñ aè múè rla' ka'. E m ku bii ba mbe dïì' ce Maataè aè m duè a yá ye naè.	Now Jesus had not yet come into the village, but was in the place where Martha met him.
E ka' laèa wa' mïìsi, Nyúè aè lor ye a du aègho mbe buèu, woweèe a táá a ce fyá', mmbaè' vi vú a cete ye, woweèe a ke' ker yá ye ka'.	When he had said these things, as they were looking, he was taken up, and a cloud received him out of their sight.
Woweèe a ka' kúti mbe ndaèp, ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a ker bipshi yuu kuu yuu ce e m laèa anaè.	In the house, his disciples asked him again about the same matter.
Ñwáè aè ka' túr ntee aè rfa, Nyúè be koo ba yuu ce ñwáè anaè túr, ke' ba ba yuu ce e buu ka'.	For if the readiness is there, it is acceptable according to what you have, not according to what you don't have.
Máè ka' fyá' a yá waèawa mñkuèr aèmboè e ce fáñ mbe buèu. E ka' ce fáñ wa'a, a waa enáê, “Ñgá', ñgá', ñgá'.” Bcïìndap Nyúè ce a báti a taar naè a be loè fyáp msoèñ map tá yi ba bebep neè beèe ce a ce cu njep ñgoèñ.	"I saw, and I heard an eagle, flying in mid heaven, saying with a loud voice, ""Woe! Woe! Woe for those who dwell on the earth, because of the other voices of the trumpets of the three angels, who are yet to sound!"""
Jisoès aè m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Yaè ta ce faè' aè nfeè' wááwá. Má máè ce faè' aè njáâá wa'a.”	"But Jesus answered them, ""My Father is still working, so I am working, too."""
E ba waŋ mɛ̀ nè bo à tu entombì.	He slapped me on the jaw first.
Muu wèr tèetu sê.	Our child is very stubborn.
Ñwáè moè' ka' ker fe'shi nsuñ mboèñmboñ moè' ce e yu jáá efa yïì ce weèr aè m feè'shi neè weèe naè, ndoèo co' ye. Ka' aè ba fe'shi ba weèr áè, káè ncïìndap Nyúè embe buèu áè, ndoèo co' ñgaèñ.	"But even though we, or an angel from heaven, should preach to you any ""good news"" other than that which we preached to you, let him be cursed."
Jisoès aè m ba aè rla' Bátanïì mbe ndaèp mbe Saimúèn ñwáè msaèasïì. A ka' ce ye byee, njeñwáè moè' aè niñ neè mú njáèá ntúñ bluèr moè'. Njáèá mgúr mo' ce mi m ce rúèú boèñboñ, a luu ntaa seê, mi ba njo jiñ. E bú' ndoo mú ntúñ anaè a cu'ni mgúr enjo mbe tu Jisoès.	While he was at Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper, as he sat at the table, a woman came having an alabaster jar of ointment of pure nard--very costly. She broke the jar, and poured it over his head.
M ̀ be boŋshi kwaa fàdìʼ njè bo lò koo mɛ̀ kaʼ.	I will economise corn so that I would not suffer from hunger.
Mtàʼsi mi ke koʼ nè mbèŋ kaʼ.	Edible beetles donʼt come out in the rainy season.
Woweèe a maè'shi njïû yáánïì a du ba aè njïû mbembep. Woweèe a loèr ba njïì yïì Balaèm ce e m ba muu Beyoè. Balaèm ca aè m koèñ aè rgeèe yuu bebep tá e bo koni mbaèa.	forsaking the right way, they went astray, having followed the way of Balaam the son of Beor, who loved the wages of wrongdoing;
Ñger ce Joân aè m túr aè rbaèptir beèe naè yi m loè ba efá? Yi m loè ba ese Nyúè káè ese beèe?” Woweèe a du mcúè, a seesi a laa enáê, “Seèe aè ka' laa seenáê, yi ñger anaè yi m loè ese Nyúè, baná e be bipshi neè seèe enáê, ‘Weèe aè m ka' ba byemi yuu ce e m laèa ka' njoká?’	"The baptism of John, where was it from? From heaven or from men?"" They reasoned with themselves, saying, ""If we say, 'From heaven,' he will ask us, 'Why then did you not believe him?'"
Nyúè aè ka' foosi beèe efa yaèp buu bbebep, mbuèu moè' ker ba aègho neè woweèe aè rtañshi tañshïì tá yi bo siñsi yaèp buu bbebep ka'.	Now where remission of these is, there is no more offering for sin.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè Jisos Kraêis, e m ku tañshi tañshïì yi nfeè' moè'sir, Tañshïì anaè yi túr ñger aè rsiñsi buu bbebep ce beèe a geèe, nfeseè. E ka' tañshi tañshïì ca wáá, a du a cu aè bo ma' Nyúè.	but he, when he had offered one sacrifice for sins forever, sat down on the right hand of God;
Mɛ̀ caŋ a ku kone bɛbɛʼ efa nlàa ce e ba lâa.	I rushed and just got a fraction of what he said.
Gee ne wa'a, Jisoès a ñwáè ce e m ce baèptir beèe ka'. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ca a beèe ce a m ce baèptir beèe neè ye.	(although Jesus himself didn't baptize, but his disciples),
Nyúè aè m fúr Jisoès ca efa rkwe, weèr aè yá ye neè mer mmir foñ.	This Jesus God raised up, to which we all are witnesses.
Loèr nfeè' neè ye njobeè' e m jepsi blaâa Nyúè ce weèr aè m ce feè'shi naè seê.	of whom you also must beware; for he greatly opposed our words.
Weèe aè ka' du niñ ka' mbe ndaèp ce efá, weèe ku cu ba mbo, nati ba embo ka' du aè rla' mo'.	Into whatever house you enter, stay there, and depart from there.
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' Jus a m ce tami nyor nyúè anaè tá a bo fúú cu mmbomntaa, a lá ye njep rsheè anaè, njobeè' li m ba aètútú.	Then because of the Jews' Preparation Day (for the tomb was near at hand) they laid Jesus there.
Weèe be laèa wa'a, tá e duñshi weèe rum ndap moè' ñgoèr mbenduè ndap anaè, ce a kupshi, a fa buu mbo wááwá. Weèe fár byee ñkaè' ca mbo.”	"He will himself show you a large upper room furnished and ready. Get ready for us there."""
Beèe Saduèsi mo' ce a m kani ená aède' ñwáè kwe ker fúú efa rkwe ka', a vú a yá Jisoès tá a bo bipshi yuu neè ye. Woweèe a laa neè ye enáê,	Some of the Sadducees came to him, those who deny that there is a resurrection.
Yàp njè embe Ŋkambɛ̀ʼ à vʉ̀.	Their elder brother of Nkambe has come.
Baná beèe ce a Jisos Kraâis weèe a yu aèbee a be keèr gweè mnsa' ka',	There is therefore now no condemnation to those who are in Christ Jesus, who don't walk according to the flesh, but according to the Spirit.
Ncïìndap aè nyáá mbe waâp nduè, rraa Tata li suu mbe waâp nduè, woweèe a wáp seê.	Behold, an angel of the Lord stood by them, and the glory of the Lord shone around them, and they were terrified.
Ñwáè ce e ka' ce nyoñ ba mmbee, baná ñgaèñ ku bii munte, a be lááte aè ryá'nïì ce li yu aèmboè aède' ñwáè ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè ka'.	For everyone who lives on milk is not experienced in the word of righteousness, for he is a baby.
Mú fu' mo' yi ce vúè embaè mbuèuñgoèñ, woweèe a kwa'shïì ená a koni yuu ce a ce roèo. Woweèe a súñ ma co' ce keñ aè m táá aègho a lá mbe keñ a co'ti a ce duè aèwaâa roâ aè to' Kreêt.	When the south wind blew softly, supposing that they had obtained their purpose, they weighed anchor and sailed along Crete, close to shore.
Ñwáè aè ka' juu ñgwa yïì, lor ñgwa moè' baná e koo ñgwa ñwáè moè'. Ñwáè ce e ka' lor njeñwáè ce nduu aè juèu, baná e koo ñgwa ñwáè moè' foñ.	Everyone who divorces his wife, and marries another, commits adultery. He who marries one who is divorced from a husband commits adultery.
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè weèe, Kraâis aè fa weèe Yú' Rara, weèe wááwá aè yi buu ce mini.	You have an anointing from the Holy One, and you all have knowledge.
Woweèe a m be riñ yap yu yuu ce a m sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè ená Jisoès be fúú efa rkwe naè ka'.	For as yet they didn't know the Scripture, that he must rise from the dead.
Mú mnoèñ mo' vi ka' caèa, Máèári aè natïì a du cárcár mbe rla' mo' ce li m ba mbe mtuâu aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè.	Mary arose in those days and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Judah,
Máèári e aè rla' Makdalaè ba Máèári ma yïì Joseès a m ba aèfo, a yá mbe dïì' ce a tuñ Jisoès.	Mary Magdalene and Mary, the mother of Joses, saw where he was laid.
AÈde' a yoñshïì wáè aè njáâá ká, ce aè ka' gee yuu bebep, a lip wáè, aè kur ntee. Wáè ka' ce yá ñgá' njobeè' yuu boèñboñ ce wáè geèe, ku kur ntee, baná Nyúè be yu' rboèñ neè wáè.	For what glory is it if, when you sin, you patiently endure beating? But if, when you do well, you patiently endure suffering, this is commendable with God.
Ñwáè ce e ka' suñ aè bsii beèe ená e yu yaè ñwáè baná má máè foñ be suñ aè bsii yaè Ta embe buèu ená e yu yaè ñwáè.	Everyone therefore who confesses me before men, him I will also confess before my Father who is in heaven.
jaè' laè yo tu suu embe kïìntaa.”	"save yourself, and come down from the cross!"""
Wɛ̀ jani ba kɛ waʼa?	Why are you staring in a preoccupied manner?
Beèe ca a ce koèñ ená a so weèe, koo weèe aè mbeèp yaèp. A ce koèñ aè rso weèe ba aè yuu boèñboñ ka'. Woweèe a ce koèñ ená seèe gaèpni tá weèe bo koèñ ba woweèe.	They zealously seek you in no good way. No, they desire to alienate you, that you may seek them.
Baná weèe koo bfúr mo' nje nyoèr a weâe mú aèmboè Kraâis aè m koo seèe foñ na, tá beèe a bo ce kuè'si Nyúè.	Therefore accept one another, even as Christ also accepted you, to the glory of God.
Káè yu bgovanoè áè, weèe yu'ni neè woweèe aèmboè beèe ce ñkúú aè tuusi tá a bo fa ñgá' neè ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep, yoèñshi beèe ce a geèe buu bboèñboñ.	or to governors, as sent by him for vengeance on evildoers and for praise to those who do well.
Yi yu wa' ka'. Beèe ce a rïìñ Nyúè ka' a ke tañshi yap tañshïì ba neè mnyúâmkaè'. Woweèe a ke tañshi tañshïì ca ba neè Nyúè ka'. M ce koèñ máná weèe mnyúâmkaè' weèe ba ñwáè moè'sir ka'.	But I say that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice, they sacrifice to demons, and not to God, and I don't desire that you would have fellowship with demons.
A ke màʼ bìr bèe kweŋger gòr sê.	When a war is fought many people die.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè, weèe aè ka' tá ye nyor Muu Ñwáè, keèr no vi bláá ka', weèe konïì ryoèñ ka'.	"Jesus therefore said to them, ""Most certainly I tell you, unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink his blood, you don't have life in yourselves."
Ñwáè yá'ni buu Jisoès ce Jisoès aè m koèñ se naè aè laa neè Pitaè enáê, “A Tataê.” Pitaè aè ka' yu' ená a Tataê, a ma' cáè' aè nyoèr njobeè' e m co'ni bcáè' efa nyoèr. E ka' maè' wáá, a nyáá embe keñ a coo njep roè a du a yá Jisoès.	"That disciple therefore whom Jesus loved said to Peter, ""It's the Lord!"" So when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord, he wrapped his coat around him (for he was naked), and threw himself into the sea."
Weèe táá ye ba aègee rtuèu ce a too ená Sayoèn. Weèe aè baè' aè rla' Nyúè ce e yu nteèe. A too rla' anaè enáê, “Jáèrusaláèm yïû mbekïì”. Bcïìndap Nyúè ce aède' ñwáè be' ka', a yu mbo a ce lu'shi.	But you have come to Mount Zion, and to the city of the living God, the heavenly Jerusalem, and to innumerable multitudes of angels,
yoñshi neè Nyúè aè buu wááwá ce vi ka' koni weèe. Buu ca a buu ce Nyúè ce koèñ ená beèe ce a ce duè aèmbuèu Jisos Kraâis a geêe.	In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus toward you.
Woweèe a ka' duè cep, beèe anaè a lor yap yu ntuu anaè aètáèr, a du ba aè rgeèe yaèp ntaè'teè, beèe mo' aè du aè mñkúè, beèe mo' a du aè rkap yaèp ntaa.	But they made light of it, and went their ways, one to his own farm, another to his merchandise,
E m loèr ye a ye a du a yá Jisoès. Jisoès aè ke' Saimúèn a laa enáê, “Wáâ Saimúèn ce aè yu muu Joân, a be too wáè ená Káfaès.” Rlii ce ená Káfaès na li ku ba foñ aèmboè rlii ce li yu ená Pitaè naè.	"He brought him to Jesus. Jesus looked at him, and said, ""You are Simon the son of Jonah. You shall be called Cephas"" (which is by interpretation, Peter)."
Cep boo mnsuènsuè foñ ená woweèe a fa maè'shi wap mnyor aèwaèa ka'.	Likewise, exhort the younger men to be sober minded;
Ñwáâ ñgoèr ca aè laa neè ye enáê, “Tataê, máè ghááte aè ñwáè ce aède' aè niñ mbe máâ ndaèp ka'. Kuè laa ba mbúè nlaèa moè'sir tá yaè ñwáè rfaè' ke'se.	"The centurion answered, ""Lord, I'm not worthy for you to come under my roof. Just say the word, and my servant will be healed."
Ryoèñ ce nfeseè ca li yu ba ená ñwáè riñ wáè, ce ku ba ba wáè caè'caè' ce aè yu Nyúè mini, ker riñ Jisos Kraâis ce wáè tuu njep ñgoèñ na.	This is eternal life, that they should know you, the only true God, and him whom you sent, Jesus Christ.
E ka' vúè koni weèr aèfo, weèr aè koo ye mbe keñ weèr woweèe a du aè rla' Mitileèn.	When he met us at Assos, we took him aboard, and came to Mitylene.
Yu'ni neè neè wee btu, njobeè' weèe yu beèe ce weèe ce gú'shi neè Kraêis.	subjecting yourselves one to another in the fear of Christ.
Rïìñ neè ená weèe Jisos Kraâis weèe ka' ba aèbee, weèe túr buu wááwá njobeè' e yu tu neè byú' wááwá ce vi túr ñger.	and in him you are made full, who is the head of all principality and power;
Beèe ce a láè ntee aè rgeèe buu bboèñboñ aè nfeè' wááwá, a lá mmir mbenduè bkuè' ese Nyúè ba ryu'nïì ba ryoèñ ce nfeseè, Nyúè be geèe tá woweèe a cu nfeseè.	to those who by patience in well-doing seek for glory, honor, and incorruptibility, eternal life;
Yi boèñ ená m túr njáèá mkwaè'shïì ca kuu weèe, njobeè' m túr weèe aè ntee boèñboñ. Weèe aè m koni máè aè rfaâ' rboèñboñ ce Nyúè aè m fa máè. Weèe aè m koni máè aè nfeè' ce máè m táá a ce feè'shi, a ker ce saèr Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ neè beèe, ker ba seè'ni ce m yu mbe shañ na.	It is even right for me to think this way on behalf of all of you, because I have you in my heart, because, both in my bonds and in the defense and confirmation of the Good News, you all are partakers with me of grace.
Jisoès aè m rïìñ yuu ce woweèe a m túr aè mbúè, a laa enáê, “Weèe ce weèe yu ñgaâa mbo'ni, weèe ce moèoshi máè njoká?	"But Jesus perceived their wickedness, and said, ""Why do you test me, you hypocrites?"
ená nfeè' e seè'ni na ka' gháá aèmboè e gháá na tá e bo loèr cor geèe tá beèe embe buèu ce a yu btu, ba bcïìndap Nyúè ce bgoèrgoèr a riñ bfee ce Nyúè túr aè buu wááwá.	to the intent that now through the assembly the manifold wisdom of God might be made known to the principalities and the powers in the heavenly places,
E ba koo mbàa anà a lɛ̂ àmbommi.	He took the money and kept it on his own.
Jus a m doèori AÈláèksandaè a tár kuèntombïì neè beèe, a laa neè ye ená e laa yuu. AÈláèksandaè aè naa bo mbekïì ená beèe a cu nyañ tá e laa yuu.	They brought Alexander out of the multitude, the Jews putting him forward. Alexander beckoned with his hand, and would have made a defense to the people.
Yuu ce yi m koni ñwáâ nlee naè, yi m koni neè ñwáè embe yeâ njïì, a koni neè ñwáè embe njïì ñwáè embe yeâ njïì, a caasi moè' efa bfúr beèe nsaèamba anaè ka'.	In the same way, the second also, and the third, to the seventh.
Woweèe a ku ce waani, a ce laèa ená a taa lá ye mbe kïìntaa. A ka' waani wa'a, a so.	But they were urgent with loud voices, asking that he might be crucified. Their voices and the voices of the chief priests prevailed.

Matthew	Matïìyoè	25	46	E laèa wa'a, tá woweèe a du niñ njep ñgá' ce nfeseè, tá beâe byáánïì a du cu rcu ce nfeseè.”	These will go away into eternal punishment, but the righteous into eternal life."
Ñwáè ce e geèe seèe aè túr bfee bboèñboñ ku ba Jisoès caè'caè'. Njáèá bfee ca vi túr sá' seê.	in whom are all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge hidden.
Nyúè aè m geèe woweèe a riñ ená buu ce woweèe a m ce suñ beèe aè m ba buu ce vi be koni aè nfeè' yaèp ka'. E m geèe woweèe a riñ ená vi be koni ba aè nfeâ' yïì. AÈ ka' ba seè'ni na, beèe ce a m feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè Jisos Kraâis neè weèe aè ñger Yú' Rara, ce a m tuu embe buèu, a suñ weèe buu anaè. Bcïìndap Nyúè foñ a ce koèñ aè rfyá' nje múè buu ca.	To them it was revealed, that not to themselves, but to you, they ministered these things, which now have been announced to you through those who preached the Good News to you by the Holy Spirit sent out from heaven; which things angels desire to look into.
À ce kòŋ enɛ m fa ba nè wɛ̀ a?	Do you prefer that I should rather give it to you?
Yi ku ba wa' foñ neè buu bboèñboñ ce beèe a ce geèe. Buu bboèñboñ ce beèe mo' a ce geèe vi loè yañse yááti. Buu bboèñboñ ce beèe mo' a ce geèe vi loè lor nfeè' ka' yááti. Geewa'a aède' vi lo buu efa ryáátïì ka'.	In the same way also there are good works that are obvious, and those that are otherwise can't be hidden.

AÈristakoès ce weèr ye yu mbe shañ, aè caè'ni weèe. Mak ce e yu nfúr Baènabaès aè caè'ni weèe foñ. Máè fa weèe ncep aèmboè Mak wáá. Máè suñ weèe ená e ka' vúê, weèe konïì ye boèñboñ.	"Aristarchus, my fellow prisoner, greets you, and Mark, the cousin of Barnabas (concerning whom you received commandments, ""if he comes to you, receive him""),"

Mɛ̀ tuu muu mbà ro.	I have sent a child to the stream.
Bʉbʉ zhi ke mì banɛ a be càŋsi ŋkʉʉ ce a ghar.	When ever the chiefʼs funeral is over, they bring out the newly crowned chief.
Nyúè aè m ce laèa aèmboè leâ' fi wa'a baná e m geèe leè' entoèmbïì yi kútïì yuu rúèú. Yuu yi ka' kúti rúèú, beeñger aè yuu cicïì, baná yuu anaè yi be bú.	"In that he says, ""A new covenant,"" he has made the first old. But that which is becoming old and grows aged is near to vanishing away."
Njáèá buu bbebep ca vi ke loè ba enjep ntee: bsaèkïì, byáèá, nyúshi beèe, aè rkoo ñgwa ñwáè moè' káè nduu ñwáè moè',	For from within, out of the hearts of men, proceed evil thoughts, adulteries, sexual sins, murders, thefts,
“Weèe fa maè'shi tá wee mntee vi ce fa weèe ñgá' ka', weèe byemi neè Nyúè, ker byemi neè máè foñ.	"Don't let your heart be troubled. Believe in God. Believe also in me.
John	Joân	14	2	Bdïì' vi yu mbe ndaèp yaè Ta goèr seê. Yi ka' tá baè ba wa' ka', máè m ba suñ weèe. M ce duè aè rkupshi dïì' neè weèe.	In my Father's house are many homes. If it weren't so, I would have told you. I am going to prepare a place for you.
John	Joân	14	3	M ka' du kupshi dïì' neè weèe, m kútïì vú lor weèe tá seèe duê, tá weèe bo ba foñ faèdïì' ce m yu.	If I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and will receive you to myself; that where I am, you may be there also.

Nsuñ kuu yuu ce Jisoès aè m geèe na aè m duè aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè wááwá ker ba aè mla' ce mi m sïìr ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè a kaari a tarte.	This report went out concerning him in the whole of Judea, and in all the surrounding region.
Túè' aè ka' raa, Jisoès aè fúú efa rla' anaè a du aè dïì' ce e be kuè ba mimñgi'. Beèe a ká' a ce roèo ye, a ka' yá ye, a koñ ená e ku cu a woweèe. AÈ ka' ba njobeè' rboâñntee ñwáè moè'sir foñ ce yu Jisos Kraêis, beèe magoèr se a konïì rboâñntee Nyúè ce yu rfa ce e fa aè cicïì.	But the free gift isn't like the trespass. For if by the trespass of the one the many died, much more did the grace of God, and the gift by the grace of the one man, Jesus Christ, abound to the many.
Kúr ñkuânyaèm mo' goèr se yi m ba aèfo, a ce yeñger aèwaâa rtuèu.	Now on the mountainside there was a great herd of pigs feeding.
Bcïìndap Nyúè wowo a m sïìr kaèbaèraè', ba beâe bgoèrgoèr, ba buu bteèe ce vi m ba kyeèe naèè, a kaari a tarte. A ka' sïìr, a gú'shi neè Nyúè,	All the angels were standing around the throne, the elders, and the four living creatures; and they fell on their faces before his throne, and worshiped God,
Loèr neè ba ndeèe Tata Jisos Kraêis. Fa fa neè njïì neè buu bebep ce ñwáè e ke koèñ aè rgeèe naè ka'.	But put on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make no provision for the flesh, for its lusts.
Beèe wááwá ce Yú' Nyúè yi ce duèñshi woweèe nduunjïì, a yu boo Nyúè.	For as many as are led by the Spirit of God, these are children of God.
Máè ka' keè' a yá aèmboè muu njeèe aè naèa nlaèadoñ yïì entoèmbïì efa múè vïû saèambaê. E ka' naèa, máè yu' aèmboè moè' efa buu bteèe ce vi m ba kyeèe naè aè laèa, njeèndoñ aè rúúñgeèr aèmboè mbeèñ wa'a, a laa enáê, “Vúè!”	"I saw that the Lamb opened one of the seven seals, and I heard one of the four living creatures saying, as with a voice of thunder, ""Come and see!"""
Beèe Farïìsi foñ a ker bipshi neè ye ená e ba gee eká a ka' ce yá buu lá. E suñ woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè anaè aè ba yo' máè nshe nje mmïìr, máè du a su'si mmir, a ká' a ce yá buu.”	"Again therefore the Pharisees also asked him how he received his sight. He said to them, ""He put mud on my eyes, I washed, and I see."""
Lɛ̀ bcɛ̀ʼ mà mʉ̀ ndap.	Put the clothes in the room.
Ñgaèa aè ka' kuèu, nfeè' ce a be geèe muu búè aè gháá. E ka' gháá, a fa rlii muu ená Jisoès. Rlii ca aè m ku ba rlii ce ncïìndap Nyúè aè m fa muu wáá tá yïì ma ka' keè koo rbúè.	When eight days were fulfilled for the circumcision of the child, his name was called Jesus, which was given by the angel before he was conceived in the womb.
Beèe mo' a maè' buu ca a da' nduunjïì a du ba aèmbuèu bde' bcicïì.	from which things some, having missed the mark, have turned aside to vain talking;
E m laèa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe aè ka' ce geèe rloo, weèe laa weenáê, ‘Taèr, tá lo rlii li ba rrara, tá yo kúú yi ká'.	"He said to them, ""When you pray, say, 'Our Father in heaven, may your name be kept holy. May your Kingdom come. May your will be done on Earth, as it is in heaven."
Woweèe a ka' caèa ñgoâñ Pïìsidïìyaè, a ba' aè ñgoâñ Paèmfilïìyaè,	They passed through Pisidia, and came to Pamphylia.
a duè fa yeâ laè', a yá'ni beâe aèfo mbe yaèp ndap rloo, woweèe a bááñgeèr seê, a laa enáê, “Ñwáè ca aè geèe bfee ca ba efá, a koni ñger aè rgeèe buu bghagha' ca ba efá?	"Coming into his own country, he taught them in their synagogue, so that they were astonished, and said, ""Where did this man get this wisdom, and these mighty works?"
Loèr yo dïì' yá ñgá' aèmboè ñwáè soogáâ mboèñmboñ neè Jisos Kraêis.	You therefore must endure hardship, as a good soldier of Christ Jesus.
Mɛ̀ bʉʼ rkìŋ anà ànjii.	I have broken that pot unexpectedly.
Nyúè aè geèe seèe aè riñ buu ca njïì enjep yi Yú'. Yú' Nyúè yi rïìñ buu wááwá, a riñ ka' buu Nyúè ce vi yu aè bsúèti.	But to us, God revealed them through the Spirit. For the Spirit searches all things, yes, the deep things of God.
Mruè' ñkaè' ca mi ka' mïì, ma yïì Jisoès aè laa neè Jisoès enáê, “A no mruè' mi sáê.”	"When the wine ran out, Jesus' mother said to him, ""They have no wine."""
Ñwáâ aè ñgoâñ Saèmarïìyaè ce e m ce duè aè mbeèp anaè foñ aè vú a búú a yeâ nduè, a ka' yá aèmboè e noèñ, nse yi koo ye.	But a certain Samaritan, as he traveled, came where he was. When he saw him, he was moved with compassion,
Nyúè be loèr yi ñger fúr seèe aègho efa rkwe aèmboè e m fúr Tata Jisos Kraâis efa rkwe naè.	Now God raised up the Lord, and will also raise us up by his power.
Mmbañruè wááwá ce a m ye, a m ba ncúèkïì kyeèe, ka' lor bbyeèñge ba bghaèrbeèe.	Those who ate were four thousand men, besides women and children.
Zhìsò mbʉ à mʉ bʉ.	Our goat got missing.
Beèe mo' efa weâr mú yu beâe Pátïìyaè ba Mádïìyaè, beâe Álaèm ba Máèsoèpoètámïìyaè, beâe Judaè ba Kaèpaèdosïìyaè, beâe Pontuès ba Ásïìyaè.	Parthians, Medes, Elamites, and people from Mesopotamia, Judea, Cappadocia, Pontus, Asia,
Pitaè aè beesïì enáê, “Kupse neè, ma' yeè buu bbebep tá a bo baèptir weèe wááwá aè rlii Jisos Kraêis, tá Nyúè foosi weèe yeè buu bbebep, tá weèe koni Yú' Rara ce yu rfa ese Nyúè.	"Peter said to them, ""Repent, and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of sins, and you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit."
Njeñwáè anaè aè m tár ntúñ mdip a kúti aè laè' a laa neè beèe enáê,	So the woman left her water pot, and went away into the city, and said to the people,
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' Nyúè aè geèe wa'a, máâ Poêl, m ce loo neè weèe. M yu ñwáè shañ njobeè' m yu ñwáè rfaè' neè Jisos Kraêis, a ce faè' neè weèe ce weèe yu beèe enje jáá.	For this cause I, Paul, am the prisoner of Christ Jesus on behalf of you Gentiles,
Kúr ñkuânyaèm mo' goèr se yi m ba aèfo a ce yeñger mbe rtuèu. Byú' mnyúâmkaè' ca vi bu' mmbo neè Jisoès ená e ma'shi tá a niñ ba njep ñkuânyaèm anaè. Jisoès aè ma'shïì.	Now there was there a herd of many pigs feeding on the mountain, and they begged him that he would allow them to enter into those. He allowed them.
Musïìs aè m sañ aèmboè aède' ñwáè ba yáánïì njo' mncir, a laa enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' lá mncir wááwá baná ñgaèñ be cu njo' mncir anaè.”	"For Moses writes about the righteousness of the law, ""The one who does them will live by them."""
Ñgaâa ntuu Nyúè wááwá, ká' embe nfeè' yïì Saâmwáèl du ba' mbe nfeè' yïì ñgaâa ntuu wááwá ce a m ba mbenjïì Saâmwáèl a m laèa aèmboè mnoèñ ca.	Yes, and all the prophets from Samuel and those who followed after, as many as have spoken, they also told of these days.
Mɛ̀ koni ntaʼ ministà.	I have got the position of minister.
Beèe moè' ce a yu bwer, a kani yuu mini, a ce geèe ba buu bbebep naè, a be yá ñgá' rshentee ba bepntee Nyúè.	but to those who are self-seeking, and don't obey the truth, but obey unrighteousness, will be wrath and indignation,
Geewa'a, beèe Farïìsi ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a m kani yuu ce Nyúè aè m koèñ aè rgeèe neè woweèe, a kani foñ ená Joân fa baèptir woweèe ka'.	But the Pharisees and the lawyers rejected the counsel of God, not being baptized by him themselves.
Ñwáè ce e m koo ncúèkïì ta naè aè loèr mbaèa anaè a ku ká' a ce geèe ntaa aègho, a ye sá' aè ncúèkïì taê.	Immediately he who received the five talents went and traded with them, and made another five talents.
Cena yi ka' mïì, máè ker yá yuu báèá mo' mbe buèu. AÈ m ba yuu laèa ka'. Máè m yá bcïìndap Nyúè saèambaê. Woweèe a m vúè neè mñgá' saèambaê. Mñgá' saèamba ca aè m ba mñgá' ce elúèsimbuèu. Nyúè be mïìsi li rshentee ba neè mñgá' ca.	I saw another great and marvelous sign in the sky: seven angels having the seven last plagues, for in them God's wrath is finished.
E natïì a ce duè, a ka' ce duè, a yá ñwáâ aè to' IÌtopïìyaè. AÈ m ba ñwáè ce a m soèñ, ce e m ce faè' njeptii Mayaâa Kandáès ce e m ce sa' to' IÌtopïìyaè. Buu Mayaâa wááwá aè m ba mba yeâ mmboè. E m duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm aè rgeèe rloo neè Nyúè,	He arose and went; and behold, there was a man of Ethiopia, a eunuch of great authority under Candace, queen of the Ethiopians, who was over all her treasure, who had come to Jerusalem to worship.
Máè m vúè aè rla' Koreèn ka' faè dïì' m bo loè geèe tá nyor bep weèe ka'. M ce ká' Nyúè ená e táá yaè njïìnsa' ená yuu ce m ce laèa na yi yu mini.	But I call God for a witness to my soul, that I didn't come to Corinth to spare you.
Kuâu jár neè ba njep nduunjïì ce yi yu kuèyáá, tá kuèu ce weèe ce nyáèá ntáèñ aègho naè yi bo tap tap, ke' yañ goèr ka'.	and make straight paths for your feet, so that which is lame may not be dislocated, but rather be healed.
“Seèe ku'si Tata ce e yu Nyúè beèe Isráèl. E m vúè a yá yïì beèe, a tee woweèe efa ñgá'.	"Blessed be the Lord, the God of Israel, for he has visited and worked redemption for his people;
Luke	Luêk	1	69	E fa seèe ñwáâ ñgoèr ce e be geèe tá beèe a luêñ, aè ba ñwáè embe ndúè' Dávïìd ce e yu yïì ñwáè rfaè'.	and has raised up a horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David
Luke	Luêk	1	70	E m laèa eluâuñgoèñ ekuè cuèu yi ñgaâa ncep ntuu ce a m ba brara ená,	(as he spoke by the mouth of his holy prophets who have been from of old),
Luke	Luêk	1	71	e be jaè', fúr seèe embaè mmbo beèe ce a baèa seèe,	salvation from our enemies, and from the hand of all who hate us;
Luke	Luêk	1	72	aè rduèñshi yïì ñkoosimnse neè viseèe btarkú, keèr kuushi yi leâ' rara	to show mercy towards our fathers, to remember his holy covenant,
Luke	Luêk	1	73	ce e m ye a Abraèham ce e yu yïìseèe tarkú.	the oath which he spoke to Abraham, our father,
Luke	Luêk	1	74	E m ye leè' ená e be fúr seèe embaè mmbo yiseèe ñgaâa bbaèa, tá seèe bo faè' neè ye, ce wáp yuu mo' ka',	to grant to us that we, being delivered out of the hand of our enemies, should serve him without fear,
Luke	Luêk	1	75	ba brara, keèr ba byáánïì a yeâ bsii, caar keè caèa kweñger.	In holiness and righteousness before him all the days of our life.
Luke	Luêk	1	76	AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè wáè, muu waè, a be keè too wáè ená ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè embe buèu, njobeè' aè be duè entombïì neè Tataê, kupshi nduunjïì neè ye.	And you, child, will be called a prophet of the Most High, for you will go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways,
Luke	Luêk	1	77	AÈ be geèe tá yïì beèe a riñ ená Nyúè be foèosi yaèp buu bbebep, geèe tá woweèe a luêñ.	to give knowledge of salvation to his people by the remission of their sins,
Luke	Luêk	1	78	Yïìseèe Nyúè yu ñwáè ñkoosimnse, a boñ ñgeèe foñ. E be geèe tá nyúè bap embe buèu sañ mbe seâe nduè.	because of the tender mercy of our God, whereby the dawn from on high will visit us,
Luke	Luêk	1	79	E be sañ mbenduè beèe ce a cu aè túè'nji, njeptii rleèñshi rkwe naè, tá e bo duèñshi seèe nduunjïì cumúnyañ.”	to shine on those who sit in darkness and the shadow of death; to guide our feet into the way of peace."
Fa nya' neè mnde' neè ñwáè moè' ka', njobeè' weèe aè maè' ye ñgeâe rúèú ce weèe aè m ce geèe naè,	Don't lie to one another, seeing that you have put off the old man with his doings,
AÈ ka' ba aè noèñ entoèmbïì embe múè ñgaèa, weèr a vú aèbee aè rye byee Nyúè. Pol aè fe'shïì blaâa Nyúè, a fe'shi caar a ba' neè ntee tú' njobeè' e m rïìñ ená túè' be raa tá e duê.	On the first day of the week, when the disciples were gathered together to break bread, Paul talked with them, intending to depart on the next day, and continued his speech until midnight.
Kúúsi neè rboèñ ce weèr aè m ce geèe neè weèe naè, mú' wee mntee lá btoo foñ. M ce laèa neè weèe aèmboè boo wa.	Now in return, I speak as to my children, you also be open wide.
Mdip ca mi ruu kaʼ, mi yu mbʉ̀rʉŋ.	This container of water is not full, it is only partway full.
Joân aè m vúè a yá weèe a ce duèñshi weèe nduunjïû yáánïì, weèe aè byemïì yuu ce e m ce laèa ka', ñgaâa ñkuèu mbaâa baèraè' ba bkwaèraè, a byemïì yap yu. Weèe aè ka' yá wa'a, a ke' kupse, byemi ka'.	For John came to you in the way of righteousness, and you didn't believe him, but the tax collectors and the prostitutes believed him. When you saw it, you didn't even repent afterward, that you might believe him.
Rkoèñnïì anaè li yu ba ená seèe aè m koèñ Nyúè ka', yu ba ená e m koèñ seèe, a tuu muu yïì ená e ba yuu geèe tañshïì aètu yïìseèe buu bbebep.	In this is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son as the atoning sacrifice for our sins.
“Ndoèo aè co' weèe, beèe Farïìsïî, njobeè' wee ke fa ñgúè' moè'sir efa rúêú, efa mú buu jáá jáèá jáá ce a ke láè njep njaèp, a ma' ñgeâe mini, a koñ Nyúè ka'. Weèe aè ba geèe buu ca keèr geèe mmo' ca foñ.	But woe to you Pharisees! For you tithe mint and rue and every herb, but you bypass justice and the love of God. You ought to have done these, and not to have left the other undone.
M ce koèñ máná weèe riñ aèmboè m ce gheèter neè weèe, ker ba beâe aè rla' Laèodisïìyaè ker ba beèe wááwá ce weèr woweèe aè m be tarte ka'.	For I desire to have you know how greatly I struggle for you, and for those at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;
Àfyoŋ ce còo embe bùu.	The aeroplane is steaming in the air.
Baná ñgúè beèe aè m ba ncoèp-kyeèe-aè-rrúèú ká' embe nfeè' yïì Abraèhaêm, du ba' mbe nfeè' yïì Dávïìd, a ker ba ncoèp-kyeèe-aè-rrúèú ká' embe nfeè' yïì Dávïìd du ba' mbe nfeè' a m ce koo beèe ce duè aègho aè to' Babiloèn naè, a ba ncoèp-kyeèe-aè-rrúèú ká' embe nfeè' ce a m duè neè beèe aè to' Babiloèn du ba' mbe nfeè' yïì Kraâis anaè.	So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; from David to the exile to Babylon fourteen generations; and from the carrying away to Babylon to the Christ, fourteen generations.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, woweèe a ká' ese noèñ anaè, a ce seèesi aèmboè a be geèe ka' yú ye.	So from that day forward they took counsel that they might put him to death.
E ka' fúr wa'a, nshe aè ja' njeñwáè ca, a sa'ti, a nyoñ rdip ce nyaèa ca aè m fúr ekuè cuèu naè wááwá.	The earth helped the woman, and the earth opened its mouth and swallowed up the river which the dragon spewed out of his mouth.
Woweèe a ka' yá ye, a gú'shi neè ye, beèe mo' a tarnïì yap tarni.	When they saw him, they bowed down to him, but some doubted.
E ka' laèa wa'a, a koo woweèe nje nyoèr, a la' mmbo mbe waâp nduè, a ghoni woweèe.	He took them in his arms, and blessed them, laying his hands on them.
Woweèe a tuu ñgaâa yá'ni yaèp buu, ker ba beèe mo' efa múè beèe vi Hároèd ená woweèe a du laa enáê, “Ñwáè ryá'nïì, weèr rïìñ werná aè yu ñwáè mini, a ce yá'ni beèe mnduunjïì Nyúè neè mini-ñwáè. Wá ke loèr ñwáè moè' jáá ka'.	"They sent their disciples to him, along with the Herodians, saying, ""Teacher, we know that you are honest, and teach the way of God in truth, no matter who you teach, for you aren't partial to anyone."
Ka' cu mmbañruè mo' a baa a ce de' a Jisoès. Mmbañruè ca aè m ba Musïìs ba AÈlajaè.	Behold, two men were talking with him, who were Moses and Elijah,
M mbe dù ntaa yuu wɛ̀ kwâa mbàa.	I will go to the market and buy corn for you, understood?
Mɛ̀ dù ŋkar, ntar à bûu.	I went visiting, and there was no entertainment.
Ñwáè anaè aè m ce cu ba aè dïì' anaè. Yi ke' ba aètáèr aè rkur ye, ka' neè bkwaèñ ka'.	He lived in the tombs. Nobody could bind him any more, not even with chains,
Beâe bgoèrgoèr efa múè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì, ba bleebeèe a ka' toshi ye aè buu moè', e beesïì yuu ka'.	When he was accused by the chief priests and elders, he answered nothing.
Ŋkòʼ e Kùyà zhi ke ŋaŋ sê.	The juju from Kuya is very rough.
Baná aè rgeèe tá weèe bo rïìñ weená Muu Ñwáè túr ñger njep ñgoèñ na aè rfoèosi beèe efa yaèp buu bbebep.” E laa neè ñwáè yañ ca enáê, “M ce laèa neè wáè ená aè nati mbekïì, lor yo keèñ du aè laè'.”	"But that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins"" (he said to the paralyzed man), ""I tell you, arise, and take up your cot, and go to your house."""
Ñwáè ce e ka' tá ba weèr ye ka', baná ñgaèñ yu yaè ñwáè bbaèa. Ñwáè ce e ka' tá ce baashi weèr ye ka', baná ñgaèñ ce da'si da'si.	"He who is not with me is against me, and he who doesn't gather with me, scatters.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	12	31	Baná m ce suñ weèe máná Nyúè be foèosi beèe efa buu bbebep wááwá ce woweèe a geèe, ker ba buu bbebep ce woweèe a laèa. AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè ñwáè ce e bepsi rlii Yú' Rara, aède' Nyúè foosïì ñgaèñ ka'.	Therefore I tell you, every sin and blasphemy will be forgiven men, but the blasphemy against the Spirit will not be forgiven men.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	12	32	A be foèosi ñwáè ce e ka' laa yuu bebep kuu Muu Ñwáè. Ñwáè ce e ka' laa yuu bebep kuu ba Yú' Rara baná a be foèosi ñgaèñ ka', ka' aè nfeâ' seè'ni na, káè aè nfeè' ce e bii ka' ba áè.	Whoever speaks a word against the Son of Man, it will be forgiven him; but whoever speaks against the Holy Spirit, it will not be forgiven him, neither in this age, nor in that which is to come.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	12	33	“Weèe aè ba rïìñ ená mbaèñ ce yi ka' ba boèñboñ, baná ce yi yu boèñboñ. Mbaèñ ce yi ka' ba bebep, baná ce yi yu bebep foñ. A ke rïìñ ce ba neè mbaèñ ce anaè.	Either make the tree good, and its fruit good, or make the tree corrupt, and its fruit corrupt; for the tree is known by its fruit."
E m geèe ba aèmboè a sañ mbe dïì' mo' embe Ñwaâ' Nyúè. A sañ mbo enáê, “Tataê, muu ñwáè yu ká tá aè ka' kwaè'shi aèmboè ye? E yu ká tá aè ka' jaè' ye.	"But one has somewhere testified, saying, ""What is man, that you think of him? Or the son of man, that you care for him?"
Weèr rïìñ ená Nyúè aè m suñ buu neè Musïìs. AÈ ka' ba aèmboè ñwáè ca, weèr rïìñ faèdïì' ce e ce vúè ka'.”	"We know that God has spoken to Moses. But as for this man, we don't know where he comes from."""
Nyúè a ñwáè ce e geèe seèe aè tamïì nyor aè rkupseè ca, a ker fa yú' neè seèe, aèmboè btár, yi ce duèñshi ená seèe be koni buu ce Nyúè aè kaè' seèe.	Now he who made us for this very thing is God, who also gave to us the down payment of the Spirit.
Weèe aè vúè neè beèe ca mbena ce aèmboè woweèe a yáèá buu embe mndap nyúè ka', a laa yuu mo' bebep aèmboè yïìseèe nyúè ka'.	For you have brought these men here, who are neither robbers of temples nor blasphemers of your goddess.
Weèe aè ka' ce koèñ aè rbyemïì, weèe riñ weená e yu AÈlajaè ce a m laèa ená e be keèe vúè naè.	If you are willing to receive it, this is Elijah, who is to come.
Ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè wááwá a m laèa aèmboè ye, a suñ beèe ená ñwáè ce e ka' byemi, baná Nyúè be foèosi ñgaèñ efa yïì buu bbebep a yeâ rlii.”	"All the prophets testify about him, that through his name everyone who believes in him will receive remission of sins."""
Seèe ka' suñ yïìseèe buu bbebep, baná Nyúè ce e ke láè yi nlaèa, a ker ba kuèyáá, be foèosi seèe yïìseèe buu bbebep, suè'si seèe efa buu wááwá ce vi yu yáánïì ka'.	If we confess our sins, he is faithful and righteous to forgive us the sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
E mʉ du fà làʼ.	He went to the village.
Jisoès aè m loè a ce duè, a ka' baè' aètútú rla' Jáèrikuè, nfeèp moè' a cu aèwaâa nduunjïì a ce loo buu.	It happened, as he came near Jericho, a certain blind man sat by the road, begging.
Byee ce Nyúè ce fa anaè yu byee ce vi suèu embe buèu a ce fa ryoèñ ce mini neè beèe enjep ñgoèñ na.”	"For the bread of God is that which comes down out of heaven, and gives life to the world."""
À kaʼ luute ce gèe banɛ m̀ be lìp wɛ̀.	If you continue doing it therefore I will beat you.
‘Weèr ce kashi nfúènfú ce weèr aè koo aè mkuèu fa weâe laè' na, aè rduèñshi ená weèe aè geèe yuu bebep. Ka' yi yu wa'a, rïìñ neè ená kúú Nyúè yi vúè aètútú.’	Even the dust from your city that clings to us, we wipe off against you. Nevertheless know this, that the Kingdom of God has come near to you.'
Moè' efa woweèe ce a m ce too li rlii ená AÈgaboès aè m naèti mbekïì, a laa aè ñger Yú' rara ená njeè be koo aè ñgoèñ wááwá. Ca yi m koni aè nfeè' ce Klaâdïìyoès aè m ce sa' beèe naè.	One of them named Agabus stood up, and indicated by the Spirit that there should be a great famine all over the world, which also happened in the days of Claudius.
Woweèe a m laèa enáê, “Seèe be geèe seeká neè beèe ca? Beèe wááwá aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a rïìñ ená woweèe a geèe yuu báèá seê. AÈde' seèe kanïì ka'.	"saying, ""What shall we do to these men? Because indeed a notable miracle has been done through them, as can be plainly seen by all who dwell in Jerusalem, and we can't deny it."
Mɛ̀ cep ntuu nè zhìi tâa.	I sent the message through his father.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe ka' ce kuèu mbaâa baèraè', weèe fa koo caèa embe dïì' ce ncir yi laèa ka'.”	"He said to them, ""Collect no more than that which is appointed to you."""
Boo waê, seèe fa kuè koèñ beèe ba ekuè cuèu ka'. Seèe duñshi rkoèñnïì neè mini-ñwáè aè yuu ce seèe ce geèe.	My little children, let's not love in word only, neither with the tongue only, but in deed and truth.
Ca yu wa bláá ce vi kur leâ' Nyúè, ce vi be fúú, suèu aètu beèe magoèr, tá Nyúè bo foèosi woweèe efa buu bbebep ce woweèe a geèe.	for this is my blood of the new covenant, which is poured out for many for the remission of sins.
njeñwáè ye ye ka' ma'shi nduu yïì du bguèu a mbañruèñwáè moè', baná e noèñ a mbañruèñwáè ce yu nduu yïì ka'.”	"If a woman herself divorces her husband, and marries another, she commits adultery."""
Jisoès aè beesïì enáê, “AÈde' aè túr ñger mbe máâ nduè ka', ce a m ka' tá baè fa ñger anaè neè wáè embe buèu ka'. Baná yuu bebep yi ñwáè ce e koo máè a fa mba wáâ mmboè, yi yu yi goèr a caa yo.”	"Jesus answered, ""You would have no power at all against me, unless it were given to you from above. Therefore he who delivered me to you has greater sin."""
a laa ená e fa ye ñwaè' tá e bo duè fa neè btu embe mndap mloâo aè rla' Daèmaskoès, e ka' duè yá beèe ce a ce jáèr njep nduunjïì Kraêis, káè yu mmbañruè á, káè yu bbyeèñge áè, e bo kur woweèe vúè aègho aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm tá a bo sa' woweèe.	and asked for letters from him to the synagogues of Damascus, that if he found any who were of the Way, whether men or women, he might bring them bound to Jerusalem.
E geèe wa'a a fa seèe buu bboèñboñ ce e m kaè' ená e be fa seèe naè, tá weèe bo túr ñger aè rcañ efa gee buu bbebep enjep ñgoèñ na, ce beèe enjep ñgoèñ na a koèñ se naè. Yi ka' ba wa'a tá weèe bo geèe ba ñgeèe ce yi yu aèmboè yïû Nyúè.	by which he has granted to us his precious and exceedingly great promises; that through these you may become partakers of the divine nature, having escaped from the corruption that is in the world by lust.
Loèr neè nfeè' faè dïì' weèe bá yuu ce weèe ce faè' aètu mo ka' tá weèe bo koni wee blaè' wááwá.	Watch yourselves, that we don't lose the things which we have accomplished, but that we receive a full reward.
Yi ka' ba wa'a, woweèe a ka' moo aè rcu wa' laèr, mbañruèñwáè lor ñgwa yïì, njeñwáè yá nduu yïì a ye a cu. Yi yu aèndeèe ce mbañruèñwáè ka' lor ñgwa, njeñwáè ye ye du bguèu neè ce a ku cu wa'a tá ntee njeñwáè yi ce loè mbañruèñwáè seê, tá ntee mbañruèñwáè yi ce loè njeñwáè seê.	But if they don't have self-control, let them marry. For it's better to marry than to burn.
Beèe enje jáá ba Juês, ker ba beèe ce a m ba btu neè woweèe, a kwa'shïì a byemi ená a be jar neè ñgaâa ntuu Jisoès, túúshi woweèe neè bluèr.	When some of both the Gentiles and the Jews, with their rulers, made a violent attempt to mistreat and stone them,
Ñwáè ce aède' e gapnïì seèe efa rkoèñnïì ce Kraâis koèñ seèe naè, yu nda? Yuu mo' yi yu ka', káè seèe yu aè ñgá' áè, káè buu aè tap neè seèe se áè, káè beèe a ce fa seèe ñgá' áè, káè njeè ce yañ seèe áè, káè seèe aè buu bcáè' áè, káè yu rkwe áè, káè beèe a ce yú seèe áè, aède' seèe Jisoès weèe gapnïì ka'.	Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? Could oppression, or anguish, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword?
Jisoès aè m ker nati a ce duè aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm. A ka' ce duè, a ce jár aè mla' mñgoèrñgoèr ba aè mla' mká'ká', a ce yá'ni beèe.	He went on his way through cities and villages, teaching, and traveling on to Jerusalem.
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Fa joèo máè ka' njobeè' máè be du a yá Taèr ka'. Duè, du suñ bfúr wa ená m be duè faèdïì' ce yaè Ta ce e yu yeè Taê, a ba yaè Nyúè, a ba yeè Nyúè foñ naè yu.”	"Jesus said to her, ""Don't hold me, for I haven't yet ascended to my Father; but go to my brothers, and tell them, 'I am ascending to my Father and your Father, to my God and your God.'"""
Woweèe a natïû aèfo, a niñ mbe keñ a du aè rla' Antïìyoèk, faèdïì' ce a m fa woweèe mbaè mmbo Nyúè tá Nyúè bo keè'ni woweèe, tá woweèe a gee rfaè' ce woweèe a m geèe a misi naè.	From there they sailed to Antioch, from where they had been committed to the grace of God for the work which they had fulfilled.
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a laa neè ye enáê, “Yi ka' ba wa'a neè mbañruèñwáè ba ñgwa yïì, baná yi boèñ ená ñwáè lor ñgwa ka'.”	"His disciples said to him, ""If this is the case of the man with his wife, it is not expedient to marry."""
Ñwáè ce Nyúè aè tuu ce suñ beèe blaâa Nyúè, njobeè' Nyúè aè loèr yi Yú' a fa neè ye a bár yuu mo' ka'.	For he whom God has sent speaks the words of God; for God gives the Spirit without measure.
Pailáèt aè ka' yu' blaèa ca, a fúr Jisoès njepmbeè, a cu mbe dïì' mnsa' tá e bo teni mnsa'. A m ce too dïì' ca ená dïì' ce a feèe neè bluèr. A m ce too dïì' anaè aè li Hibruè enáê, “Gaèbataè.”	"When Pilate therefore heard these words, he brought Jesus out, and sat down on the judgment seat at a place called ""The Pavement,"" but in Hebrew, ""Gabbatha."""
Ncïìndap Nyúè moè' yu ce Nyúè aè m be laa yuu ce e m laèa neè muu yïì neè ye ka'. E m laèa neè muu yïì enáê, “Cu a máâ bo maè' caar tá m gee tá aè tár mkuèu mbenduè beèe ce a baèa wáè.”	"But which of the angels has he told at any time, ""Sit at my right hand, until I make your enemies the footstool of your feet?"""
a fe'shi blaèa Tata aè rla' Págaè, a nati a du aè rla' AÈtalïìyaè.	When they had spoken the word in Perga, they went down to Attalia.
Baná aèmboè Kraâis aè m yá ñgá' aè nfeè' ce e m ba aè ñwáè, a yu' ryañ se naè, wee weèe foñ aè ba túr ba njáèá ntee ce e m túr, njobeè' ñwáè ce e ka' yá ñgá' wa'a, baná ñgaèñ aè gaèpni a yuu bebep.	Forasmuch then as Christ suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves also with the same mind; for he who has suffered in the flesh has ceased from sin;
Pitaè aè laèa neè ye enáê, “Weèe nduu woè aè kwaè'shi a byemi ená weèe be moèoshi Yú' Tata Nyúè njoká? Yáê! Mkuèu beèe ce a tuñ nduu woè mi yu kuè ncúèúndúè'. Woweèe a be byáè' wáè fúú aègho foñ.”	"But Peter asked her, ""How is it that you have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord? Nyo ce wèr à ba lipshi nà ku bii ntèe.	The snake that we had beaten is still alive.
“Musïìs aè ka' baè' bfeè' mñkyeèe, a kwa'shi aè rcaè'ni bfúr vi ce a m ba boo Isráèl.	But when he was forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brothers, the children of Israel.
A mbuèu ce máè m kwaè'shi máná m loo bfúr ca tá woweèe a du entombïì yá weèe, tá a bo baashi rfa ce weèe aè m kaè'ni aè rfa na mbe dïû' mo'sir tá m ka' vúè. Weèe aè ka' gee wa'a, yi duñshïì ená weèe aè fa njobeè' weèe aè koèñ aè rfa ke' ba njobeè' a taèa weèe taèa ka'.	I thought it necessary therefore to entreat the brothers that they would go before to you, and arrange ahead of time the generous gift that you promised before, that the same might be ready as a matter of generosity, and not of greediness.
Beèe Farïìsi ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a ká' a ce de'ñger a ce laèa enáê, “Ñgaâa ñgeèe buu bbebep a vúè, ñwáè ca aè konïì woweèe, a ce yeñger a woweèe.”	"The Pharisees and the scribes murmured, saying, ""This man welcomes sinners, and eats with them."""
Ñwáè ka' riñ aè rlaèa bli enjep ñgoèñ na, ker laa bli ce bcïìndap Nyúè a ke laèa, ke' koñ beèe ka', baná ñgaèñ ku ba aèmboè mbee ce e ke laèa ñooñ-ñooñ naè.	If I speak with the languages of men and of angels, but don't have love, I have become sounding brass, or a clanging cymbal.
njobeè' yuu mini yi yu njep seèe, yi be kuè ba njo nfeseè.	for the truth's sake, which remains in us, and it will be with us forever:
Ŋwɛ̀ tʉʼ kaʼ zhe ŋwɛ̀ banɛ a be jùu ye efa làʼ.	If a witch kills a person, therefore he will be driven away from the village.

doc à gaasi maŋgʉp efa ndùu booŋgʉp.	The hawk has scared the mother fowl from the chicks.
“Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir ba beèe Farïìsïî. Weèe yu ñgaâa bo' wee btu njobeè' weèe aè cete ncúèúndúè' ce yi ce duè mbe dïû' kúú Nyúè aè bsii beèe. Matthew	Matïìyoè	23	14	Ndoèo aè co' weèe ce ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir ba beèe Farïìsïî, weèe yu ñgaâa mbo'ni. Wee ke bo' byepkúú, ye yaèp buu wááwá. Wee ke geèe mloo msaèsap aè rduèñshi neè beèe ená weèe rïìñ aè rloo seê. Baná yeè ñgá' be keèe ba goèr seê.	But woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! Efa múè buu bteèe ca, yïì entombïì yi m feese búrúè'. Yïì embenjïì yi feeseè nduu naè'. Yïì embenjïì yïì ce e m feese nduu naè' naè aè túr bsii vi feeseè bsii ñwáè. The first creature was like a lion, and the second creature like a calf, and the third creature had a face like a man, and the fourth was like a flying eagle.
A ka' fúr ye aèwañ, muu Fároè ce aè m ba muunje, aè lor ye a du aègho, a ke' aègho aèmboè muu yïì.	When he was thrown out, Pharaoh's daughter took him up, and reared him as her own son.
Beèe magoèr a ce duè a yeâ mbuèu njobeè' mncoèo ce e m geèe. E m geèe ñgaâa byañ a ke'seè.	A great multitude followed him, because they saw his signs which he did on those who were sick.
Tata Nyúè e ke sa' seèe wa'a ce naèshi seèe naèshi faè dïì' seèe bo keè gweè mnsa', yá ñgá' aè nfeè' ce e be sa' ñgoèñ naè ka'.	But when we are judged, we are punished by the Lord, that we may not be condemned with the world.
a ce keè' ená e laa mú yuu mo' bebep tá a bo koo ye.	lying in wait for him, and seeking to catch him in something he might say, that they might accuse him.

Weèe be táá aè bsii Nyúè wa'a, ce weèe ka' ku lá ntee neè Jisos kraâis aè nfeè' wááwá, táá tatap keè' ce cïì'ti ka', kuè ce keè' ba buu ce beèe ce a m feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca neè weèe a m suñ weèe ená weèe be koni naè. A mbuèu ce bfee Nyúè vi m laèa enáê, ‘M be tuusi ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè ker ba ñgaâa ntuu neè woweèe tá woweèe a koo beèe moè' efa woweèe yúshi, fa ñgá' neè beèe mo' efa woweèe,’	Therefore also the wisdom of God said, 'I will send to them prophets and apostles; and some of them they will kill and persecute,

M ker ce bipshi máná beèe Isráèl a m rïìñ ka' lá? M be beèesi neè yuu ce Musïìs aè m sañ eluâuñgoèñ. E m sañ yuu ce Nyúè aè m laèa, enáê, “M be geèe tá weèe ko'ndoñ neè beèe ce a ghááte aè to' ka'. M be geèe tá ntee yi bep weèe neè to' ce yi rïìñ yuu ka'.”	"But I ask, didn't Israel know? First Moses says, ""I will provoke you to jealousy with that which is no nation, with a nation void of understanding I will make you angry."""
A m bi Musïìs aè nfeè' ca, e ba mboèñmboñ se aè bsii Nyúè. E m kuè' mbe ndaèp yïì ta aè mñwáá btar.	At that time Moses was born, and was exceedingly handsome. He was nourished three months in his father's house.
A mboè aè rlaèa bli ce weèe aè be yá'ni ka', yi ku ba wa'a. Baná weèe aè ka' ce koèñ ená Yú' Nyúè yi fa weèe bfee aè rfaè' neè Nyúè, weèe koñ goèr ba njáèá bfee ce aède' vi gee tá cor du kuèntombïì.	So also you, since you are zealous for spiritual gifts, seek that you may abound to the building up of the assembly.
Weèe ce koosimnse njo' buu ce máè suñ weèe na.	But because I have told you these things, sorrow has filled your heart.
E m vúè fa yeâ laè', yïì beèe a konïì ye ka'.	He came to his own, and those who were his own didn't receive him.

Seèe ka' laa ená seèe túr yuu bebep ka', baná seèe ce bo' viseèe btu, a ker buu mini.	If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.

ÁÈlisabáèt aè ka' yu' aèmboè e caè'ni ye, muu enjep yeâ rbúè aè karsïì nyor. ÁÈlisabáèt aè ruusïì neè Yú' Rara,	It happened, when Elizabeth heard Mary's greeting, that the baby leaped in her womb, and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit.

Yi yu ená beèe wááwá a ce kweñger njobeè' a yu raèraè Adaèm, a ba ená Nyúè be keè fúr beèe ce a yu a Jisoès weèe aèbee efa rkwe.	For as in Adam all die, so also in Christ all will be made alive.
Byú' mnyúâmkaè' anaè vi bu' mmbo neè Jisoès, a laa enáê, “Wáè ka' ce fúr weèr, aè laa tá weèr du niñ njep kúr ñkuânyaèm ca.”	"The demons begged him, saying, ""If you cast us out, permit us to go away into the herd of pigs."""
Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Bsïìi vi túr bto, bsiñ vi túr mndap, Muu Ñwáè aè ke' túr dïì' ce aède' e lá yi tu ka'.”	"Jesus said to him, ""The foxes have holes, and the birds of the sky have nests, but the Son of Man has no place to lay his head."""
Baná Sataèn ka' ce fúr Sataèn enjep beèe baná ñgaèpni yi yu nje yeâ nyoèr. Yi ka' ba wa'a, aède' yi to' yi táá aè njáâá ká? M ce laèa wa'a njobeè' weèe aè laèa ená m ce fúr byú' mnyúâmkaè' enjep beèe ba aè ñger Básábuèl.	If Satan also is divided against himself, how will his kingdom stand? For you say that I cast out demons by Beelzebul.
Cena yu nfúú efa rkwe ce entoèmbïì. Bár beèe ce a m kweñger naè a m ker fúú efa rkwe ka', caar tá bfeè' ncúèkïì ca vi mïî.	The rest of the dead didn't live until the thousand years were finished. This is the first resurrection.
Judas IÌskarïìyoèt ce aè m ba moè' efa beèe ncoèp-baa-aè rrúèú aè m duè a yá beâe bgoèrgoèr efa ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì tá e bo fyeèni Jisoès neè woweèe.	Judas Iscariot, who was one of the twelve, went away to the chief priests, that he might deliver him to them.
Mboâñtu mi yu yi neè weèe njobeè' me mmir mi ce yá buu, wee btuè' vi ce yu' buu.	"But blessed are your eyes, for they see; and your ears, for they hear.
Matthew	Matïìyoè	13	17	M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ku' ñgaâa ncep ntuu Nyúè magoèr, ba beèe ce a m ba yáánïì aè bsii Nyúè a m ce koèñ aè ryá yuu ce weèe ce yá na, a yá ka', a koñ aè ryu' yuu ce weèe ce yu' na, a yu' ka'.	For most certainly I tell you that many prophets and righteous men desired to see the things which you see, and didn't see them; and to hear the things which you hear, and didn't hear them.
