beèe mo' a ce laèa yap ená AÈlajaè aè ker nyáá, beèe mo' a ker ce laèa yap ená ñwáè ncep ntuu Nyúè moè' eluâuñgoèñ aè fúú efa rkwe.	and by some that Elijah had appeared, and by others that one of the old prophets had risen again.
Fyeèni neè yeè buu, lor mbaèa efa gho gap neè ñgaâa fuèp. Tar neè bposaè ce aède' vi bep ka', láè neè yeè buu ba mbe buèu mbe dïì' ce aède' vi du aè yuu ka'. AÈde' nyáèá ba' mbo ka'. AÈde' mfyáp vi ye ka'.	Sell that which you have, and give gifts to the needy. Make for yourselves purses which don't grow old, a treasure in the heavens that doesn't fail, where no thief approaches, neither moth destroys.
Neè mini-ñwáè, m be kuè ce lu'shi wa'a duè kuèntombïì, njobeè' m rïìñ máná le rloo ba rjaè' ce li loè ese Yú' Jisoès Kraâis li be geèe tá m luêñ.	For I know that this will turn out to my salvation, through your supplication and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
Buu bteèe anaè vi yop yáá a ce kuè'si a ker ce yoèñshi ñwáè ce e m cu mbe kaèbaèraè', aè ba ñwáè ce e ku ba nteèe aè nfeè' wááwá naè.	When the living creatures give glory, honor, and thanks to him who sits on the throne, to him who lives forever and ever,
AÈnaèniyaès aè beesïì enáê, “Tataê, máè yu' beèe a laèa buu magoèr se aèmboè ñwáè ca. Beèe a laèa aèmboè ku' buu bbebep ce e geèe neè yoè beâe aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm.	"But Ananias answered, ""Lord, I have heard from many about this man, how much evil he did to your saints at Jerusalem."
Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ enáê, “Ñwáè wááwá ce e ka' war aè rlii Tataê, baná ñgaèñ be luèñ” naè.	"For, ""Whoever will call on the name of the Lord will be saved."""
Ñwáè tañshi tañshïì moè' aè lo a ce suèu njep nduunjïì anaè aè nfeè' anaè foñ, a ka' yá ye, a lá' yi yu a caa a duê.	By chance a certain priest was going down that way. When he saw him, he passed by on the other side.
Woowèe a be fʉ kʉʉsi yer mbàa àyàŋsè.	They will give back our money tomorrow.
Saèkaèriyaè ce e m ba tar muu ca, aè m ruu neè Yú' Rara, a cep ntuu Nyúè neè beèe enáê,	His father, Zacharias, was filled with the Holy Spirit, and prophesied, saying,
njobeè' a yá aèmboè woweèe a ce cu rcu rrara a ce yu'ni.	seeing your pure behavior in fear.
À kaʼ bèeŋger mbe njì càŋ na à yɛ lɛʼ mrùʼ.	If you turn behind that barn, you will see a calabash of wine.
Buu wááwá ce Nyúè aè m geèe vi cu a ce keè' nfeè' ce Nyúè be geèe tá boo vi a yááti.	For the creation waits with eager expectation for the children of God to be revealed.
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe ce buumi ba ká? Naèti neè mbekïì, gee rloo, faè dïì' weèe bo gweè rmoèoshïì ka'.”	"and said to them, ""Why do you sleep? Rise and pray that you may not enter into temptation."""
Pailáèt aè ker bipshi neè woweèe enáê, “Baná m gee má ká neè ñwáè ce weâe too ená ñkúú Jus na?”	"Pilate again asked them, ""What then should I do to him whom you call the King of the Jews?"""
Nyúè aè m geèe ená buu ca ba wa'a njobeè' e m koèñ ená muu yïì ba yáánïì aèmboè ye ye yu naè aè buu wááwá.	For all the fullness was pleased to dwell in him;
AÈpoloès aè ka' ba aè rla' Koreèn, Pol aè jár neè mkuèu a du a ba' aè rla' Áfásoès. E ka' baè' a yá beèe mo' efa ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès.	It happened that, while Apollos was at Corinth, Paul, having passed through the upper country, came to Ephesus, and found certain disciples.
Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ mbe Ñwaâ' Nyúè enáê, “Yi ka' ba wa'a, baná mbañruèñwáè be maè'shi yïì ta ba yïì maê, cu a ñgwa yïì, tá a ye a ba ñwáè moè'sir” naè.	For this cause a man will leave his father and mother, and will be joined to his wife. The two will become one flesh.
Beèe mo' a laa yap enáê, “Yú' nyúèrkaè' yi ka' karsi ñwáè tu, e laa njáèá buu ca ka'. AÈde' yú' nyúèrkaè' yi gee nfeèp ce yá buu aè njáâá ká?”	"Others said, ""These are not the sayings of one possessed by a demon. It isn't possible for a demon to open the eyes of the blind, is it?"""
tá e lor fa neè yïì nyor aèmboè ñgwaguâu mboèñmboñ ce e yu nyáánïì, a ba nrara, a túr faèa koo múcaèr ka'.	that he might present the assembly to himself gloriously, not having spot or wrinkle or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
Baná weèe roo ba kúú Nyúè tá e fa buu ca neè weèe foñ.	But seek God's Kingdom, and all these things will be added to you.
Jisoès aè beesïì neè ye enáê, “M suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè máná, ñwáè ce e ka' ma'shi yïì ndap, káè bfúr vi, káè bjar vi, káè yïì taê, káè yïì maê, káè boo vi, káè vi mñkúè, aètu máè, ker ba njobeè' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ,	"Jesus said, ""Most certainly I tell you, there is no one who has left house, or brothers, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or land, for my sake, and for the sake of the Good News,"
Munte koŋ mcɛ̌r gòr.	A child likes play a lot.
Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a duê, a yáá ye, a laa neè ye enáê, “Tataê, jaè' weèr, seèe aè kwe.”	"They came to him, and woke him up, saying, ""Save us, Lord! We are dying!"""
Baná bcïìndap Nyúè ku ba ba byú' ce vi ke geèe rfaè' neè Nyúè. E ke tuu vi ená vi du ja' beèe ce e be geèe tá woweèe a luêñ.	Aren't they all serving spirits, sent out to do service for the sake of those who will inherit salvation?
Weèe aè ka' koni fáñ aè rgeèe yuu boèñboñ weèe gee yi, njobeè' buu bbebep aè kuè' aè ñgoèñ seè'ni na.	redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
À be kèe dù nyʉ̀ kɛ?	Which day shall you go?
Ñgaâa yá'ni buu Joân a m yá buu ca a suñ Joân. E ká' beèe a mmbaa efa waâp mú,	The disciples of John told him about all these things.
Bsaèp ba bbáèr efa rla' anaè vi m ku ba yáánïì. Ncïìndap Nyúè aè ka' feè' rla' anaè, bsaèp efa gho vi ba bkïìlomátaè ncúèkïì-baa neè mnjeâe-mmbaa ba ncoèp- baa-aè-mmbaa. (2,222) Bbáèr efa gho vi ku ba wa'a. Bsaèp embekïì vi ku ba foñ wa'a.	The city lies foursquare, and its length is as great as its breadth. He measured the city with the reed, Twelve thousand twelve stadia. Its length, breadth, and height are equal.
AÈ ka' ba aèmboè bcïìndap, e a laa enáê, “Nyúè aè m geèe vi bcïìndap a ba aèmboè fu', yi ñgaâa mfaè' anaè a ba aèmboè mcuèñ mor.”	"Of the angels he says, ""Who makes his angels winds, and his servants a flame of fire."""
M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená faèdïì' wááwá ce a ka' fe'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ ca njep ñgoèñ na, a be suñ yuu ce e geèe na, ce kuushi ye.”	"Most certainly I tell you, wherever this Good News is preached in the whole world, what this woman has done will also be spoken of as a memorial of her."""
A m ce ye Ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap aè bfeè' wááwá baná govanoè be fúr ñwáè shañ moè' embe shañ. E m ce fúr ba ñwáè ce aè laèa beèe ená e fúr.	Now at the feast the governor was accustomed to release to the multitude one prisoner, whom they desired.
Ñwáè aè ka' ce geèe yuu ce Nyúè ce koèñ, baná ñgaèñ yu nfúraè, ba njar yaè, ba yaè maê.”	"For whoever does the will of God, the same is my brother, and my sister, and mother."""
E dù banɛ m̀ be dù foŋ.	He has gone, therefore I will also go.
AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce a m koo Joân a fa aè shañ, Jisoès aè du aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, a ce feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ yïì Nyúè neè beèe.	Now after John was taken into custody, Jesus came into Galilee, preaching the Good News of the Kingdom of God,
Nfò à faa enɛ e be lìp Nyakò.	Nfor has planned to beat Nyako.
Yàa tarkʉ à còo mɛ̀ mŋkàa kù tù.	My grand father has marked me with a sacrificial powder on the forehead.
Woweèe a m tami nyor aè rkwe njo' máè. AÈ ku yoñshi ba máè woweèe caè'caè' ka', bcor wááwá ce ñgaâa rbyemïì embo yu beèe enje jáá, a yoèñshi woweèe foñ.	who for my life, laid down their own necks; to whom not only I give thanks, but also all the assemblies of the Gentiles.
AÈ ka' ba aè noèñ entombïì embe múè ñgaèa anaè aè mbuèuñkuèr, ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a kaarïì aèbee mbe ndaèp, a li' keèñ njobeè' woweèe a m ce wáp Juês. Jisoès aè ku nyáá a waâp mú, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Cumúnyañ ba neè weèe.”	"When therefore it was evening, on that day, the first day of the week, and when the doors were locked where the disciples were assembled, for fear of the Jews, Jesus came and stood in the midst, and said to them, ""Peace be to you."""
AÈ ka' ba nyúè moè', Jisoès aè ka' ce yá'ni beèe, beèe Farïìsi ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir ce a m vúâ aè bu' mla' aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, ba aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè wááwá ker ba aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm a cuteè aèfo. Tata Nyúè aè m fa Jisoès ñger aè rgeèe tá ñgaâa byañ a ke'se.	It happened on one of those days, that he was teaching; and there were Pharisees and teachers of the law sitting by, who had come out of every village of Galilee, Judea, and Jerusalem. The power of the Lord was with him to heal them.
A m sañ rlii a yeâ cáè' ce e m maè' aè nyoèr ker ba a yi ká'shi. Rlii ce a m sañ anaè li m ba enáê, “Ñkúú ce e caèa bkúú wááwá. Tata ce e caèa btata wááwá.”	"He has on his garment and on his thigh a name written, ""KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS."""
Pitaè aè kanïì, a laa neè ye enáê, “M rïìñ ye ka'. M rïìñ yuu ce aè ce laèa anaè ka'.” A ka' laèa wa'a, a lá'si nyor embe mambe a táá njep mntosïì. [E ka' táá njo, nduñgúp aè toêñ.]	"But he denied it, saying, ""I neither know, nor understand what you are saying."" He went out on the porch, and the rooster crowed."
buu wááwá ce e m geèe be luñ efa rbúèteè, tá vi bo koni rboèñ efa foèo ce boo Nyúè a be koni.	that the creation itself also will be delivered from the bondage of decay into the liberty of the glory of the children of God.
AÈ m ba nyúè moè' Jisoès aè niñ mbe keñ a ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Seèe tuu túè ca du neèñguñ.” E ka' laèa wa'a, a woweèe a ká' a ce tuu.	"Now it happened on one of those days, that he entered into a boat, himself and his disciples, and he said to them, ""Let's go over to the other side of the lake."" So they launched out."
Ñwáè ce e ka' ce geèe buu bbebep baná ñgaèñ koèñ rraa ka', a koñ aè rbaè' faèdïì' rraa li yu ka', tá yïì buu bbebep bo yááti aèwañ ka'.	For everyone who does evil hates the light, and doesn't come to the light, lest his works would be exposed.
Woweèe a m ce laèa ená woweèe a túr bfee, a kúti ba blúr.	Professing themselves to be wise, they became fools,
Woweèe a koèñ ená beèe a ca'ni woweèe aè mntaa, a ker koñ foñ ená beèe a too woweèe ená Rabaèi.	the salutations in the marketplaces, and to be called 'Rabbi, Rabbi' by men.
Bfúr waê, weèr ce laèa neè weèe ená weèe fa ncep neè beèe ce a yu bbor, fa ñger neè beèe ce wap mntee vi ce bu', ja' beèe ce a sáè, túr ntee boèñboñ neè ñwáè wááwá.	We exhort you, brothers, admonish the disorderly, encourage the fainthearted, support the weak, be patient toward all.
e ye leè', a ka' ená e be fa ye yuu ce e ka' laa ená e fa ye.	Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatever she should ask.
Mmbo mmap mi sîi.	Their hands are dirty.
Nyúè ce e ke fa seèe cumúnyañ, gee tá weèe cu rcu rrara, túr faèa koo múcaèr ka', ker gee tá faèa ba aè yuu ce weèe ce geèe káè aè yuu ce weèe ce kwaè'shi ka', kuè ba bboèñboñ aè buu wááwá du ba' aè nfeè' ce Tata Jisos Kraâis be vúè.	May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Pitaè aè beesïì enáê, “E ke laè' bkïìloè.” Jisoès aè laa neè ye enáê, “Baná aède' ñgaâa to' a la' ka'.	"Peter said to him, ""From strangers."" Jesus said to him, ""Therefore the children are exempt."
Máè m ker yá ñwáè ntuu moè' efa múè ñgaâa ntuu entombïì naè ka'. Máè m ku yá ba Jáms ce e yu nfúr Tata Jisoès.	But of the other apostles I saw no one, except James, the Lord's brother.
Yi m loè ku ce maè' ye njep mor ba njep roè aè ryú ye. Ka' ba ená aède' aè gee yuu mo', aè koosïìmnse neè weèr, ja' weèr.”	"Often it has cast him both into the fire and into the water, to destroy him. But if you can do anything, have compassion on us, and help us."""
Mɛ̀ nyii ye ya cɛ̀ʼ, e ku ce bàŋ mmir àmbù mo.	I refused to give him my shirt and he is still coveting it.
AÈde' seèe laa wa'a njobeè' Máèlkisidáèk aè m duè aè rkoni Abraèham ce e m ba tarkú Lávïì, a be bi Lávïì ka'.	for he was yet in the body of his father when Melchizedek met him.
Jisoès aè m rïìñ ená beèe anaè a ce roèo aè rkoo ye aè ñger, ghar aè ñkúú. E ka' rïìñ wa'a, a nati a beeñger aè ñgúè' rtuèu moè' a cu aèfo mimñgi'.	Jesus therefore, perceiving that they were about to come and take him by force, to make him king, withdrew again to the mountain by himself.
Woweèe a du mcúè, a seesi enáê, “Seèe ka' laa seená yi ñger anaè yi m loè ese Nyúè, baná e be bipshi neè seèe enáê, ‘Weèe aè m ka' ba byemi yuu ce e m laèa ka' njoká?’	"They reasoned with themselves, saying, ""If we say, 'From heaven,' he will say, 'Why didn't you believe him?'"
E ka' kúti, a ker yá aèmboè woweèe a ce buumi, mmirlo mi ku ce duè neè woweèe duè. Woweèe a túr yuu ce a laa neè ye ka'.	Again he returned, and found them sleeping, for their eyes were very heavy, and they didn't know what to answer him.
Saimúèn ba beèe ce a woweèe a m ba, a fúú a ce roèo ye.	Simon and those who were with him followed after him;
Yi ba seè'ni ená weèe to'shi yeè buu bbebep, ñwáè to'shi vi neè ñwáè; loo neè neè wee btu, ñwáè loo neè ñwáè, tá Yú' yi bo jaè' weèe tá weèe ke'si efa wee byañ. Ñwáâ mboèñmboñ ka' loo yuu ese Nyúè neè yi ntee-ñwáè, Nyúè yu' li rloo cárcár seê.	Confess your offenses to one another, and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The insistent prayer of a righteous person is powerfully effective.
Mbeèñ aè ka' gweê, nshe nyoñ mbeèñ anaè, byee ce beèe a byeè vi ku' ja' beèe anaè baná Nyúè be ghoèni nshe anaè.	For the land which has drunk the rain that comes often on it, and brings forth a crop suitable for them for whose sake it is also tilled, receives blessing from God;
Weèe aè duèñshi njáèá rkoèñnïì ca neè bfúr wee wááwá ce a yu aè ñgoâñ Máèsáèdonïìyaè. Bfúr waê, weèr ce tapsi weèe ená weèe gee tá njáèá rkoèñnïì ca li du ba kuèntombïì.	for indeed you do it toward all the brothers who are in all Macedonia. But we exhort you, brothers, that you abound more and more;
Woweèe a ku ce kwaè'shi ba aèmboè bbyeèñge aè nfeè' wááwá, a ke' sáè efa rgeèe buu bbebep ka'. Woweèe a ka' yá beèe ce a táá tatap ka', baná a be bo' woweèe tá woweèe a bo geèe buu bbebep foñ. Woweèe a weti a lááte nje múè ñgeèe bwer. Woweèe a gweè mnsa' Nyúè war.	having eyes full of adultery, and who can't cease from sin; enticing unsettled souls; having a heart trained in greed; children of cursing;
AÈ m ba nyúè mmbomntaa Nyúè moè', Jisoès ba ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a caa aè ñkúè msañ moè'. Ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu a tee msañ anaè a ce si'si mbaè mmboè a ce ye.	Now it happened on the second Sabbath after the first, that he was going through the grain fields. His disciples plucked the heads of grain, and ate, rubbing them in their hands.
M rïìñ máná m be vúè caè'ni weèe tá seèe koni bghoènïì ese Kraâis goèr seê.	I know that, when I come to you, I will come in the fullness of the blessing of the Good News of Christ.
Beèe a ka' riñ buu Nyúè ca wa'a, beesi njïì neè ye, baná njïì moè' ker ba aègho ce aède' ñwáè geêe, woweèe a beesïì yap ntee aè nfeè' moè' ka', njobeè' woweèe a ka' beesi njïì wa'a, baná woweèe a ker taa Jisos Kraâis mbe kïìntaa, a ker coosi ye aè múè beèe, a bá sá' efa li rkwe.	and then fell away, it is impossible to renew them again to repentance; seeing they crucify the Son of God for themselves again, and put him to open shame.
Gheèter neè cu neè cumúnyañ-ñwáè tá weèe bo cu aèbee aèmboè beèe ce Yú' Nyúè yi geèe a ba ñwáè moè'sir.	being eager to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
Seèe aè rïìñ seená aètaè byee vi gee seèe seèe ba jáá aè bsii Nyúè ka'. Seèe ka' tá ye ka', yïì anaè yi túr yuu mo' aè rgeèe ka'. Seèe ka' ye, yïì anaè yi gee seèe seèe ba jáá ka'.	But food will not commend us to God. For neither, if we don't eat, are we the worse; nor, if we eat, are we the better.
Baná Nyúè e ke koosimnse neè ñwáè ce e koèñ aè rkoosimnse neè ye, ker teesi tu ese ñwáè ce e koèñ aè rteèesi tu ese ye.	So then, he has mercy on whom he desires, and he hardens whom he desires.
Bfúr waê, weèe ce weèe aè byemi neè yïìseèe Tata Jisos Kraâis ce e yu ñwáè foèo, weèe fa so'niñgoèñ ka'.	My brothers, don't hold the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ of glory with partiality.
Ce ke' neè noèñ ce Nyúè be vúè, ker gheter foñ gee tá noèñ ca yi yañse ba. Be ba aè noèñ anaè tá rbuu ba nshe a bú, tá buu wááwá she dúèdúè.	looking for and earnestly desiring the coming of the day of God, which will cause the burning heavens to be dissolved, and the elements will melt with fervent heat?
AÈmboè buu ca yu wa'a, fa maè'shi neè tá ñwáè moè' gee mncir neè weèe aèmboè buu ce aède' weèe ye, ker ba buu ce aède' weèe no ka'. Fa maè'shi neè foñ tá ñwáè moè' gee mncir neè weèe aèmboè njáèá njïì ce aède' weèe gee mñkaè' ka', káè yu ñkaè' enjep feè' áè, káè yu Ñkaâ' ñwáá fi áè, káè yu Ñkaâ' mmbomntaa áè.	Let no one therefore judge you in eating, or in drinking, or with respect to a feast day or a new moon or a Sabbath day,
Baná yi yu ená beèe a ke yu' wáá ka' byemi; beèe a feè'shi aèmboè Kraâis wáá, beèe a ka' yu'.	So faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
Woweèe a laa enáê, “Seèe fa koo ye aè múè ñkaè' ka' njobeè' seèe ka' koo ye aè múè ñkaè', beèe a lo ká' ñgá'.”	"For they said, ""Not during the feast, because there might be a riot of the people."""
Cena yu buu ce Jisos Kraâis aè m geèe beèe ce a ce duè aèmbuèu Nyúè a rïîñ. Nyúè aè m geèe Jisos Kraâis a riñ buu ca tá e bo geèe tá beèe ce a ce duè aèmbuèu Nyúè a riñ buu ce vi be koni nfeè' múcaèr. Yi ka' ba wa'a, Jisos Kraâis aè tuu yïì ncïìndap ená e du yá Joân ce e yu yïì ñwáè rfaè', gee tá e yá buu ca.	This is the Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show to his servants the things which must happen soon, which he sent and made known by his angel to his servant, John,
Jisoès aè ku cip, a laa yuu ka'. E ker bipshi neè ye enáê, “A wáè Kraêis, Muu Nyúè ce weèr ce gú'shi neè ye naè a?”	"But he stayed quiet, and answered nothing. Again the high priest asked him, ""Are you the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?"""
“Ñgaâa yá'ni yoè buu a fúú enjep ndeèe ce viseèe bta a m yá'ni seèe njoká? Woweèe a ke suè'si mmbo aè njïû yáánïì ka' ye byee ka'.”	Why do your disciples disobey the tradition of the elders? For they don't wash their hands when they eat bread.
Baná m ce koèñ máná weèe riñ ená nsuñ Nyúè ce kuu rluèñ aè duè neè beèe enje jáá. Woweèe a be yu'shi boèñboñ.”	Be it known therefore to you, that the salvation of God is sent to the nations. They will also listen.
Weèe aè ka' koñni wa'a, baná beèe wááwá a be rïìñ ená weèe yu ñgaâa yá'ni yaè buu.”	"By this everyone will know that you are my disciples, if you have love for one another."""
AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè máè, nfeè' ce gháá ce m be fa la ryoèñ neè Nyúè aèmboè tañshïì wa'a. Nfeè' ce m be maè'shi aè gháá.	For I am already being offered, and the time of my departure has come.
E ka' yá aèmboè fu' yi ce caèa neè ñger-ñwáè, a wáp, a ká' a ce suèu njep múè roè, a waa a laa enáê, “Tataê, jaè' máè.”	"But when he saw that the wind was strong, he was afraid, and beginning to sink, he cried out, saying, ""Lord, save me!"""
Jisoès aè m káè' a ce yá'ni ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ená Muu Ñwáè be kuè yá ñgá' goèr seê, tá bleebeèe ba beâe bgoèrgoèr efa ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì ker ba ñgaâa ryá'ni mncir a kani ye. A be keè yú ye, mnoèñ vi ba btaar, e fúú efa rkwe.	He began to teach them that the Son of Man must suffer many things, and be rejected by the elders, the chief priests, and the scribes, and be killed, and after three days rise again.
a laa enáê, “Wáè ce aè yu Kraâis anaè, to' ka ená aè lïìp nda wáè lá.”	"saying, ""Prophesy to us, you Christ! Who hit you?"""
AÈ ka' ba aè nfeè' ana neètú' anaè, e lor woweèe a su'si wap mnfur. E ka' suè'si mïìsi, a baptir ye ker ba beèe wááwá embe yeâ ndaèp.	He took them the same hour of the night, and washed their stripes, and was immediately baptized, he and all his household.
Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ kuu Jisoès Kraâis ce e yu Muu Nyúè aè káè' embe na.	The beginning of the Good News of Jesus Christ, the Son of God.
Bbyɛ̀ŋge a kòŋ mntaŋshì sê.	Women like lies telling too much.
Fa lapni nleeñwáè ka', cep ye aèmboè aède' aè cep yoè taê. Geèe yuu ce aède' aè gee neè bfúr wo neè boo mnsuènsuè.	Don't rebuke an older man, but exhort him as a father; the younger men as brothers;
Weèe fa sa' beèe ce Nyúè aè fa mba weâe mmboè aèmboè weèe yu lá waêp mmasaè wa' ka'. Weèe duñshi ba ndeâe mboèñmboñ, ce woweèe a yá, bo koni.	neither as lording it over those entrusted to you, but making yourselves examples to the flock.
Ncïìndap Nyúè anaè aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Fa wáp neè ka', máè vúè weèe neè nsuñ mboèñmboñ, aè ba nsuñ ce beèe wááwá a be yu', lu'shi seê.	"The angel said to them, ""Don't be afraid, for behold, I bring you good news of great joy which will be to all the people."
Rkìŋ ce rli bʉʼti nà a rlìsò.	This broken pot is ours.
Geewa'a, ñwáè aè ka' ce cu rcu ce Nyúè koèñ, yuu ce e túr yi ghááteè ye, baná ñgaèñ aè koni sá' seê.	But godliness with contentment is great gain.
Yi yu wa'a njobeè' yi ke niñ ba njep ntee ka', yi ke niñ ba njep rbúè, fúú enjo.” E ka' laèa wa'a a raasi ená byee wááwá vi yu bboèñboñ aè bsii Nyúè.	"because it doesn't go into his heart, but into his stomach, then into the latrine, thus purifying all foods?"""
M ce suñ weèe máná m be keèr no mruè' ce a geèe neè mbaèñ ce na ka' caar baè' aè noèñ ce m be no mïû mfi weèe seèe weèe mbe dïû' kúú yaè Taê.”	"But I tell you that I will not drink of this fruit of the vine from now on, until that day when I drink it anew with you in my Father's Kingdom."""
Mki mi ghupti njep mbùu rkiŋ.	The potash has coagulated under the pot.
Mɛ̀ bʉsi mbàa njoʼ muu wàa.	I have sacrificed money for the sake of my child.
A ye e ce vʉ̌ à tètè nà.	There he is coming from afar.
E jʉ̀p coʼ mbe lùr.	He has hit an iron on the stone.
a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Duè neè nje rla' enje weâe cuèu na. Weèe be baè' njo tá weèe ku yá aèmboè a cúú jaèaki', muu aè táá aègee mo. Fyáèá neè vú aègho fa neè máè.	"saying to them, ""Go into the village that is opposite you, and immediately you will find a donkey tied, and a colt with her. Untie them, and bring them to me."
Seèe cu bteèe a ce jáèr, a ba aègho njo' ye. Yi ku ba aèmboè yeè beèe ce a ke sañ mghaèghar a laèa. Woweèe a laèa enáê, ‘Neè mini-ñwáè, seèe yu boo vi.’	For in him we live, and move, and have our being.' As some of your own poets have said, 'For we are also his offspring.'
Woweèe a rïìñ yuu ka'. Woweèe a kaè' yuu, gee yuu anaè ka', a ce koèñ beèe ka', a ce koosimnse neè beèe ka'.	without understanding, covenant breakers, without natural affection, unforgiving, unmerciful;
Weèr aè ka' baè' aè rla' Ruêm, a ma'shi Poêl, e ce cu neè yi tu, ñwáè soogáè moè' aè ce keè'ni ye.	When we entered into Rome, the centurion delivered the prisoners to the captain of the guard, but Paul was allowed to stay by himself with the soldier who guarded him.
Máâ loo wa'a ce yoèñshi Nyúè njobeè' m ce kuushi aèmboè weèe aè koni máè aè rfaè' Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ, ká' embe nfeè' ce weèe aè m byemi neè Nyúè vú gháá seè'ni na.	for your partnership in furtherance of the Good News from the first day until now;
Rïìñ ená be keè ba aè nfeè' elúèsimbuèu tá ñgá' ba seê.	But know this, that in the last days, grievous times will come.
Ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè bsoogáè rjeèe naè aè ka' yu' ca, a du a suñ neè tu yïû goèr. E m laèa neè ye enáê, “AÈ be geèe wáká seè'ni aè? Ñwáè ca yu ñwáè Ruêm.”	"When the centurion heard it, he went to the commanding officer and told him, ""Watch what you are about to do, for this man is a Roman!"""
A mbuèu ntee yi ce kwe weèr ka'. Ka' wer mnyor vi káè' a ce sáè wa'a, ryoâñ rfi ce li yu njep weèr naè, li ce top aè mnoèñ wááwá.	Therefore we don't faint, but though our outward man is decaying, yet our inward man is renewed day by day.
Bsogɛ̀ a bèe ce a ke màʼ bir nè toʼ.	Soldiers are those who fight when the country is at war.
Beèe ce a ke suñ beèe buu ce Nyúè aè geèe woweèe aè rïîñ, a ke túr ñger aè rfaè' neè bfee ce Nyúè aè fa woweèe anaè boèñboñ.	The spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets,
E shoo, a laa enáê, “Beèe e luèuni a ce roèo mncoâo bghagha' wa'a njoká? AÈi', m suñ weèe máná aède' m duñshïì ncoèo neè beèe ca ka'.”	"He sighed deeply in his spirit, and said, ""Why does this generation seek a sign? Most certainly I tell you, no sign will be given to this generation."""
Tá m ka' laèa buu moè', m ce yoèñshi yaè Nyúè aè rlii Jisos Kraâis njo' weèe wááwá, njobeè' beèe a ce suñ aèmboè le rbyemïì aè bdïì' wááwá.	First, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for all of you, that your faith is proclaimed throughout the whole world.
Ñwáè ce e ka' túr btuè', ñgaèñ yu'.	If anyone has an ear, let him hear.
E ka' káè' ce fyá', a vú neè ñwáè rfaè' moè' ce e m túr rkaa a ye aè mmalaèr aèñgoo.	When he had begun to reconcile, one was brought to him who owed him ten thousand talents.
Joân aè m jáèr aè bdïì' wááwá ce vi m ba aè ñgoâñ faèdïì' ce rdip Jodaèn li m ba, a ce feè'shi blaâa Nyúè neè beèe, a ce laèa ená woweèe a kupse, ma' yaèp buu bbebep tá a baptir woweèe, tá Nyúè bo foèosi woweèe.	He came into all the region around the Jordan, preaching the baptism of repentance for remission of sins.
E m ba rraa anaè ka'. E m ku vú yi ba aè rsuñ beèe aèmboè rraa anaè.	He was not the light, but was sent that he might testify about the light.
“AÈ ka' ba aèmboè noèñ ba nfeè' ce buu ca vi be koni, ñwáè moè' rïìñ ka', ka' bcïìndap Nyúè, káè Muu Nyúè áè. Ñwáè ce e rïìñ, ku ba ba Taèr caè'caè'.	But no one knows of that day and hour, not even the angels of heaven, but my Father only.
E laa neè Jisoès enáê, “Máè láè mncir ca wááwá ká' aè nfeè' ce máè m ba muu ñká'.”	"He said, ""I have observed all these things from my youth up."""
Pitaè aè ka' yá woweèe, a laa neè woweèe enáê, “Yaè beèe Isráèl, weèe ce báèáñger njo' yuu ce yi koni na, a ce keè' weèr ntuñ-ñ-ñ njoká? Waè' weèe ce kwaè'shi ená weèr aè geèe ñwáè ca aè jár ba aè yer ñger káè njobeè' weèr rïìñ aè rcaè'ni Nyúè boèñboñ a?	"When Peter saw it, he responded to the people, ""You men of Israel, why do you marvel at this man? Why do you fasten your eyes on us, as though by our own power or godliness we had made him walk?"
E laa neè ye enáê, “Wáè bipshi neè máè aèmboè yuu boèñboñ njoká? Ku ba ñwáè moè'sir ce e yu ñwáâ mboèñmboñ. Wáè ka' ce koèñ aè rkoni ryoèñ ce nfeseè, aè lá mncir.”	"He said to him, ""Why do you call me good? No one is good but one, that is, God. But if you want to enter into life, keep the commandments."""
Joân aè beesïì enáê, “A máè ñwáè ce AÈsayaè aè m laèa aèmboè ye eluâuñgoèñ enáê, ‘Njeèndoñ moè' ce fuñ aè ntee rïìñ enáê, Kupshi neè nduunjïì neè Tata.’”	"He said, ""I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness, 'Make straight the way of the Lord,' as Isaiah the prophet said."""
Jisoès aè ka' laèa blaèa ca wáá, mluè mi ká' a ce koo ye. E laa rara enáê, “M ce suñ weèe neè mini-ñwáè ená ñwáè moè' efa weâe mú be fyeèni máè.”	"When Jesus had said this, he was troubled in spirit, and testified, ""Most certainly I tell you that one of you will betray me."""
Beèe ce a woweèe a m ce cu a m wáp seê. Beèe ce a m ba aè bdïì' wááwá aè rla' embe mtuâu aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè a m suñ buu ca.	Fear came on all who lived around them, and all these sayings were talked about throughout all the hill country of Judea.
Mɛ̀ deʼ mɛnɛ m̀ laa yuu e tee mɛ̀.	I wanted to say something and he interrupted me.
AÈ ka' ba aè noèñ entombïì efa ñkaè' ce a m ce ye bráâd ce a láè yis njo ka', ñgaâa yá'ni buu Jisoès a vú a yá ye, a bipshi neè ye enáê, “AÈ ce koèñ ená weèr fár byee ba fá tá aè bo ye ñkaâ' caèasi-mndap aègho?”	"Now on the first day of unleavened bread, the disciples came to Jesus, saying to him, ""Where do you want us to prepare for you to eat the Passover?"""
E beesïì neè woweèe enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' juu ñgwa yïì, lor moè', baná e koo njeñwáè ce e yu ñgwa yïì ka',	"He said to them, ""Whoever divorces his wife, and marries another, commits adultery against her."
E màʼ ŋgàa nè mɛ̀.	He has spoken a proverb to me.
a laa neè woweèe enáê, “M ka' fa Jisoès mba weâe mmboè, weèe fa máè ká?” Woweèe a be' mbaèa mntaar a fa neè ye.	"and said, ""What are you willing to give me, that I should deliver him to you?"" They weighed out for him thirty pieces of silver."
Woweèe a laa enáê, “Nfeè' múcaèr ce e ce laèa na, yu ba ená ká? Seèe rïìñ njáèá yuu ce e laèa na ka'.”	"They said therefore, ""What is this that he says, 'A little while?' We don't know what he is saying."""
AÈ ka' ba aè noèñ mo', aèmboè aè nyúè taar neèmootïì, e yá yuu mo' aèmboè rlo wa'a. E m yá ncïìndap Nyúè boèñboñ se aèmboè e vúè, a niñ mbe ndaèp, a laa neè ye enáê, “Koèniyuès.”	"At about the ninth hour of the day, he clearly saw in a vision an angel of God coming to him, and saying to him, ""Cornelius!"""
Woweèe a yu beèe embe ndúè' Abraèham ba Aisïìk ba Jakoèp. A m bi Kraâis aè ñwáè embe ndúè' anaè, e ba Nyúè ce e túr ñger mbenduè buu wááwá. Seèe yoñshi ye aè nfeè' sïìp. Yi yu wa'a.	of whom are the fathers, and from whom is Christ as concerning the flesh, who is over all, God, blessed forever. Amen.
Yïì anaè yi mïì wáá, tá ñgoèñ yi mïî, tá Jisos Kraâis so mnyúâmkaè' ker ba beèe wááwá ce a ce sa', loèr yi kúú fa neè Nyúè ce e yu yïì Taê.	Then the end comes, when he will deliver up the Kingdom to God, even the Father; when he will have abolished all rule and all authority and power.
Boo vi anaè ku ba beèe ce a túr láá foñ. Jisoès ye ye aè m vúè a ku ba ñwáè aèmboè woweèe tá e bo kwe, bepsi ñger Sataèn, njobeè' Sataèn a ñwáè ce e túr ñger aè rvúè neè rkwe mbenduè beèe.	Since then the children have shared in flesh and blood, he also himself in the same way partook of the same, that through death he might bring to nothing him who had the power of death, that is, the devil,
E ker tuu ñwáè rfaè' moè', woweèe a ker lip ye foñ, a coosi ye, a koosi ye rïìtu, e du mboèmmbo.	He sent yet another servant, and they also beat him, and treated him shamefully, and sent him away empty.
AÈ ka' ba seè'ni ce seèe aè byemi neè Jisoès na yuu mo' yi ker ce naèshi seèe aèmboè yi m ce naèshi naè ka'.	But now that faith has come, we are no longer under a tutor.
Ma kúr beèe yi m ce jáèr a Jisoès weèe, e karsïì nyor a laa neè woweèe enáê,	Now great multitudes were going with him. He turned and said to them,
Woweèe a beesïì neè ye enáê, “Weèr ce roèo ba Jisoès ce aè rla' Nasaráèt.” Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “A máè ye.” Judaès ce e m fyeèni ye naè aè m táá a woweèe.	"They answered him, ""Jesus of Nazareth."" Jesus said to them, ""I am he."" Judas also, who betrayed him, was standing with them."
Visèe bcoʼ vi yû?	Where are our rods?
a bu' mmbo neè ye ená e ma'shi tá woweèe a ku joèo ba yi cuâu cáè'. Ñgaâa byañ wááwá ce a m joèo ye, a m keè'se.	and they begged him that they might just touch the fringe of his garment. As many as touched it were made whole.
M ce baèptir weèe neè mdip, geewa'a e be baèptir yi weèe ba neè Yú' Rara.”	"I baptized you in water, but he will baptize you in the Holy Spirit."""
E laa neè woweèe enáê, “Buu ce aède' beèe a riñ kuu kúú Nyúè ka' naè, Nyúè aè geèe weèe aè rïîñ. AÈ ka' ba yi aèmboè beèe ce a yu yïìseèe beèe ka' naè, a ce suñ woweèe buu wááwá ba aè mñgaèa.	"He said to them, ""To you is given the mystery of the Kingdom of God, but to those who are outside, all things are done in parables,"
Weèe be yu' ená a ce maè' bïìr, keèr yu' aè mñoo ená a ce maè' bïìr aè bdïì' mo' foñ. Weèe ka' yu' wa'a, mluè mi fa koo weèe ka'. Buu ca vi be kuè koni, vi koni wa'a, yi ke' ba ba ená nfeè' ce ñgoèñ yi be mïì aè gháá ka'.	You will hear of wars and rumors of wars. See that you aren't troubled, for all this must happen, but the end is not yet.
Mor anà zhi ce ŋyɛ̀ɛ mʉfɛ̀ɛ sê.	That fire is burning very slowly.
A mbuèu ce Nyúè aè m yá ye aè ñwáâ nyáánïì njo' li rbyemïì.	"Therefore it also was ""reckoned to him for righteousness."""
Kʉʉ e ke lò gee ngòŋ zhi ba àmbò mbeŋ be gwè waʼa.	Harmatan dust makes the weather to look as if it will rain.
a niñ mbe keñ, a ce duè aè rla' Kaèpanuèm ce li m ba neèñguu túè anaè. A ka' ce duè, túè' aè sii woweèe. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' anaè, Jisoès aè be vú a koni woweèe ka'.	and they entered into the boat, and were going over the sea to Capernaum. It was now dark, and Jesus had not come to them.
Woweèe a m túr mú nca foñ. E yoñshïì Nyúè, a fa neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu ená a gapshi neè beèe anaè foñ.	They had a few small fish. Having blessed them, he said to serve these also.
Keè'ni yo tu, lor nfeè' aè yuu ce aè ce yá'ni. Ce gee ba buu ca aè nfeè' wááwá, njobeè' wáè ka' ce geèe vi, baná aè be tee yo tu efa ñgá', keèr tee btu beèe ce a ce yu' buu ce aè ce laèa.	Pay attention to yourself, and to your teaching. Continue in these things, for in doing this you will save both yourself and those who hear you.
Nfò à ba ba mbena ntìni.	Nfor was here today.
Nlaèa ce m be laèa na yu nlaèa mini. Nlaèa anaè yi yu ená ñwáè aè ka' koñ aè rba tu-nta', baná ñgaèñ aè koèñ ba rfaâ' rboèñboñ.	This is a faithful saying: if a man seeks the office of an overseer, he desires a good work.
Ñwáè moè' efa múè beèe ce a m ba a Jisoès aè co' saè', a tee tuè' ese ñkwaèa ñwáè ce e m ba tu neè ñgaâa tañshi tañshïì.	But a certain one of those who stood by drew his sword, and struck the servant of the high priest, and cut off his ear.
Woweèe a m yu'ni foñ njobeè' máè m duèñshi mncoèo ba buu bbáèá, ker ba njo' ñger Yú' Rara. Káâ' ese aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm du ba' aè rla' IÌlirikoèm, máè feè'shi Nsuñ Mboèñmboñ aèmboè Kraêis, a bár yuu mo' ka'.	in the power of signs and wonders, in the power of God's Spirit; so that from Jerusalem, and around as far as to Illyricum, I have fully preached the Good News of Christ;
Mncir ca aè láè ba beèe, a lá ba aè buu ce vi be cu nfeseè ka'.	(all of which perish with use), according to the precepts and doctrines of men?
Cena yi ka' mïì wáá, Jisoès aè ker duñshi yïì nyor neè ñgaâa yá'ni yïì buu aèwaâa túè Tïìbárïìyaès. E m duèñshi yïì nyor ba aè njáèá enáê.	After these things, Jesus revealed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias. He revealed himself this way.
Yuu ce Nfò ce suŋ na yu ba yuu à tʉʉ ŋgòŋ kaʼ.	What Nfor is talking about is not something, which is nearby.
Yi ku ba aèmboè a sañ enáê, “Ñwáè ce e ka' ce koèñ aè rcu ce yu' rboèñ, ce lu'shi, ñgaèñ fa laèa yuu bebep káè nya' mnde' ka'.	"For, ""He who would love life, and see good days, let him keep his tongue from evil, and his lips from speaking deceit."
Ñwáè aè ka' lá ntee ba aè yuu ce yïì nyor koèñ, baná ñgaèñ be ba ñwáè bbaèa neè Nyúè njobeè' e ce yu'ni neè mncir Nyúè ka'. Neè mini-ñwáè, e moèo aè ryu'ni neè mncir anaè laèr.	because the mind of the flesh is hostile towards God; for it is not subject to God's law, neither indeed can it be.
Seèe lor nfeè' faè dïì' seèe gee yuu mo' ce ntee yi bep Tata Nyúè neè seèe ka'. Waè' seèe túr ñger a caa ye a?	Or do we provoke the Lord to jealousy? Are we stronger than he?
Kraâis ye ye aè m kwe aètu yïìseèe buu bbebep, a ku kwe ñkaèraè' moè'sir caè'caè'. Ye ce e m ba ñwáâ nyáánïì, aè m kwe aètu beèe ce a m ba byáánïì ka', tá e bo loèr seèe fa neè Nyúè. AÈ m ba aè nfeè' ce e m ba aè ñwáè, a yú ye. Nyúè aè ka' fúr ye efa rkwe, e ba aè yú'.	Because Christ also suffered for sins once, the righteous for the unrighteous, that he might bring you to God; being put to death in the flesh, but made alive in the spirit;
E gwàr ye nè sàʼ.	He cut him with a cutlass.
A ka' ye byee mïìsi, e lor ndoñ aèmboè e m loèr bráâd naè, a laa enáê, “Ndoñ ca yu leâ' fi ce Nyúè aè kur a beèe neè wa bláá.	"Likewise, he took the cup after supper, saying, ""This cup is the new covenant in my blood, which is poured out for you."
To wee weèe foñ aè yá a ker yu' yuu ce ñwáè ce a too ená Pol na ce geèe aè rla' Áfásoès, ker ba aè ñgoâñ Ásïìyaè wááwá. Byá anaè aè laèa ená mnyúè ce beèe a kupshi kupshi yu lá mnyúè ka'. E geèe wa'a, a beesi mntee ese beèe magoèr.	You see and hear, that not at Ephesus alone, but almost throughout all Asia, this Paul has persuaded and turned away many people, saying that they are no gods, that are made with hands.
Yú' ñwáè ce e m fúr Jisos Kraâis efa rkwe yi ka' ba njep weèe, baná ñwáè ce e m fúr Jisos Kraâis efa rkwe be geèe foñ tá weêe mnyor ce aètaè vi kweñgeèr na, vi kúti bteèe. E be geèe wa'a aè ñger yi yú' ce yi yu njep weèe naè.	But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
Baná wee weèe foñ aè ka' gee buu wááwá ce a laèa ená weèe geêe, weèe laa weenáê, ‘Weèr ku ba ba ñgaâa mfaè', weèr aè ku gee ba yuu ce weèr aè ba geèe.’ ”	"Even so you also, when you have done all the things that are commanded you, say, 'We are unworthy servants. We have done our duty.'"""
AÈ ka' ba njobeè' beèe a m ce tami nyor ená túè' be raa tá a cu mmbomntaa Nyúè, Josáèf ce aè rla' AÈrimaètiyaè aè du aè mbuèuñkuèr anaè, a du a yá Pailáèt. Josáèf ca aè m ba moè' efa múè ñgaâa kansuèr ce beèe a m ce yu'ni neè ye seê. E m ce keè' nfeè' ce Nyúè be vúè sa' aèmboè ñkúú. E kur ntee a du a yá Pailáèt, a laa ená e fa gúâú ñwáè neè ye tá e tuñ.	When evening had now come, because it was the Preparation Day, that is, the day before the Sabbath, Joseph of Arimathaea, a prominent council member who also himself was looking for the Kingdom of God, came. He boldly went in to Pilate, and asked for Jesus' body.
Mmirloè mi m ce koo Pitaè ba beèe ce a woweèe a m ba naè, a ka' wañ woweèe efa mmïìr boèñboñ, a yá foâo Jisoès, a yá mmbañruè a baa caè aèmboè a táá a Jisoès.	Now Peter and those who were with him were heavy with sleep, but when they were fully awake, they saw his glory, and the two men who stood with him.
E ka' mïìsi wáá, a loâ aè rla' Atáèns a du aè rla' Koreèn.	After these things Paul departed from Athens, and came to Corinth.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Weèe túr bráâd yi sá'? Duè fyá' ka neè.” Woweèe a ka' duè fyá', a laa neè ye enáê, “Weèr túr bráâd taê, ba nca baa.”	"He said to them, ""How many loaves do you have? Go see."" When they knew, they said, ""Five, and two fish."""
Bkúr beèe a m loâ aè ñgoâñ Galeèleê, ba aè Mla' Rúêú, ba aè rla' Jáèrusaláèm, ba aè ñgoâñ Juèdiyaè, ba neèñguu Jodaèn, a du a yeâ mbuèu.	Great multitudes from Galilee, Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea and from beyond the Jordan followed him.
Awá Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Baná weèe aè be riñ mbuèu efa yuu ce m ce laèa ka' a?”	"He asked them, ""Don't you understand, yet?"""
“Bfúr waê, beèe embe ndúè' Abraèham ker ba weèe ce weèe ce wáp Nyúè, a tuusi nsuñ rluèñ ca ba neè seèe.	Brothers, children of the stock of Abraham, and those among you who fear God, the word of this salvation is sent out to you.
Beèe enje jáá ce a rïìñ Nyúè ka' a ke duè yap ba aèmbuèu buu ca, yeè Ta aè rïìñ ená weèe aè ba túr buu ca.	For the nations of the world seek after all of these things, but your Father knows that you need these things.
Fʉm a dìʼ ce a ke bʉsi ŋkʉʉ.	ʼFumʼ is where a chief is buried.
Jisoès aè laa neè woweèe enáê, “Loèr neè nfeè' neè yis beèe Farïìsi ba beèe Saduèsïî.”	"Jesus said to them, ""Take heed and beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and Sadducees."""
E beesïì enáê, “Masaè, Muu Ñwáè anaè yu nda tá m bo byemi neè ye?”	"He answered, ""Who is he, Lord, that I may believe in him?"""
M ce laèa wa'a njobeè' kúú Nyúè yi yu aèmboè ñkúú ce e m ce koèñ aè rfyá' ñwaâ' mñkaa ñgaâa mfaè'.	Therefore the Kingdom of Heaven is like a certain king, who wanted to reconcile accounts with his servants.
Sèe caŋsi muu ca fàdìʼ ŋgǎatʉʼ a bo yʉ zhe kaʼ.	Let us take this child away so that witches should not kill him.
Nyúè aè m fa seèe mncir ba njïì enjep Musïìs, aè ka' ba njïì enjep Jisos Kraêis, seèe aè rïìñ rboâñ Nyúè ba mini Nyúè.	For the law was given through Moses. Grace and truth were realized through Jesus Christ.
Baná m ce koèñ ená weèe riñ ená Yú' Nyúè yi ka' ba njep ñwáè, aède' ñgaèñ laa enáê, “Ndoèo co' Jisoès” ka'. Yú' Nyúè yi ka' tá ba njep ñwáè ka', aède' ñgaèñ laa enáê, “Jisoès yu Tataê” ka'.	"Therefore I make known to you that no man speaking by God's Spirit says, ""Jesus is accursed."" No one can say, ""Jesus is Lord,"" but by the Holy Spirit."
Baná weèe roèo entombïì ba kúú Nyúè, gee ñgeâe yáánïì aèmboè e ce koèñ, tá e fa weèe buu ca wááwá foñ.	But seek first God's Kingdom, and his righteousness; and all these things will be given to you as well.
Rkèp rlisèe rli yû?	Where is our flute?
Mboè Nyúè be sa' mnsa' tá vi ba yáánïì aè mbeèp yïì beèe ce a ce war neè ye neèmootïì ba neètú' foñ a? Waè' aède' e caasïì nfeè' efa rteni wap mnsa' a?	Won't God avenge his chosen ones, who are crying out to him day and night, and yet he exercises patience with them?
E ka' laèa mïìsi, ñwáè Farïìsi moè' aè be ye ená a ye a du yeñger. E du a niñ mbe ndaèp ñwáè anaè a cu aè nsheè a ye a bo yeñger.	Now as he spoke, a certain Pharisee asked him to dine with him. He went in, and sat at the table.
E m laèa enáê, “Suñ neè beâe aè rla' Sayoèn enáê, ‘Yáê, yeè ñkúú ce vúè aè ryá weèe, a ba neè rbornïì-ñwáè, a cu mbenduè muu jaèaki'.’ ”	Tell the daughter of Zion, behold, your King comes to you, humble, and riding on a donkey, on a colt, the foal of a donkey.
Ñwáè moè' efa múè beâe aè to' Kreât anaè, ce e m ce yá buu ce vi be keè ba, aè m laèa enáê, “Beâe aè to' Kreât a yu ñgaâa mnde'. Woweèe a yu aèmboè mnyaèa efa rïìñ wa'a, a ba mñkuñri ce a yu bbor.”	"One of them, a prophet of their own, said, ""Cretans are always liars, evil beasts, and idle gluttons."""
